text: Binuikala nusesuka bua kulekela kulonda ku nyima kuandi yeye neabashiye mu tshihela, yeye neashihe bantu aba bonso
Disanka didi kudi bantu badi mu tshikadilu atshi
Mei a bena meji adibo bunvua talalâ adi ahita mbila ya mukokeshi wa bahote buakane
Bantu aba babidi, bena lukinu, bakabuela, bakashikama ku mpala kuandi; bena lukinu aba bakamudingila, Nabota mene, ku mesu kua bantu bonso, bamba ne, Nabota wakahenda Nzambi ne mukelenge kabidi
Bualu bua biadishindabo, umue neabishe mukuandi; kadi diakabi didi kudi udi udishinda nkayandi kayi ne mukuabo bua kumuhisha
Bualu bua mukenji wa mukelenge wakadi mukole ne bua tshikutu tshiakatamba kuhishibua, nunku ndimi ya kahia yakashiha bantu aba bakadi bambula Shadalaka, Meshaka ne Abedenego
Kanuangatshi bintu bia buhikudi kudi mushihi wa muntu udi muhile bulelela, bualu bua nebamushihe bulelela
Neahunge n ebe tshihungidi, Udi mua kunaya handi bu mûdi unaya ne nyunyu, anyi
Muinai wakahongolola luhanza luandi ha diba, ne bakadihesha bakole bua kuoshadi bantu ne kahia
Muan a Ngombe wa Or Dut

Kadi mu muaba wawa Yehowa neikale n etu mu butumbi, Bualu bua Yehowa udi mulumbuluishi wetu, Yehowa udi mutueledi wa mikenji, Mionshi ya buatu buebe yakusululuka; Muena musoko kena wamba ne, Ndi ne disama, Isaiah Nuenu ba mu bisamba bia bantu, luai bienu ha buihi Bualu bua Yehowa udi ne bisamba bionso bia bantu tshiji, Bashihibue babo nebimashibue, Bintu bionso bia mu diulu nebivingutuke kabidi; Bua muele wanyi wa nvita wakunua mashi makumbane mu diulu

mba mu Gebala, Amona ne Amaleka; Ba mu Ashû kabidi bakudisangisha n abo; Wenzele bantu aba bu muwakenzela Midiyana; bakashihibua ku Ene dô, Uvuishe bantu babo banene bu Olebe ne Zêbe, Bakamba biabo ne, Tudinyengele miaba ya kuikala ya Nzambi Wewe, Nzambi wanyi, ubavuishe bu luhuishi ludi lunyunguluka ku Bu mudi kahia kosha ditu, wewe ubihate ne tshihuhu tshiebe, Ubafuishe bundu ku mesu tente, Batatshishibue bundu ne batshine tshiendelele; Mbua bamanye biabo ne wewe nkayebe, Psalms Yehowa wa misumba, ke mudi muaba webe ûdi mushikame mulengele nunku
Muana wa mukalenga ubulula tshisaka, kumonaye muana wa balume udila
Mukelenge Solomo wakatula ngabu ya or nkama ibidi; bakatula ngabu ne ngabu ku nshekele ya or nkama isambombo

Lehabama wakananga Mâka, muana wa Abashaloma, ha mutu ha bakashi bandi bonso ne bakashi bahika bakadiye mubake bualu bua yeye wakabaka bakashi dikumi ne muanda mukulu ne bakashi bahika makumi asambombo; wakalela n abo bana ba balume makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu ne ba bakashi makumi asambombo
Yeye wakalela muakuny andi Ebele kabidi Ebele wakadi mulami wa mikoko, kadi Kana wakadi tshidime
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Ashe, Setû, muana mulume wa Mikaele
Amu pelabu mpungi, bamue bantu nebasemene ku mukuna
Bantu kabayi banji kulala, bantu balume bonsu ba mu musoku, bakulumpe ne bansongalume kunyungulula nzubu wa Lote
Meme kulalaku matuku makumi anayi a munya ne a butuku, tshiyi mua kudia nansha kunua
Mose wakabandisha tshianza tshiandi, wakakuma dibue ne mulangala wandi misangu ibidi, mai a bungi akabuluka, ne bantu bonso bakanua, ne bimuna biabo
Kubapeshaye biakudia bikumbane bua kudia tshidimu tshijima
Bonsu ne: Enze
Kadi hakahidia Bena Yuda kuitabusha dî diabo, bunakadi n abu mbua kulayidila kudi Kaisa; tshiakadi ne bualu bua kubanda n abu tshisamba tshianyi
Bakamuhesha mukana muambe malu manene ne bihendu bia kuhenda n abi Nzambi, ne bakamuhesha bukokeshi bua kuenzeye malu andi ngondo makumi anai ne ibidi

Obadaya wakatamba kutshina Yehowa bikole, bualu bua hakakeba Izebele kushiha baprofete ba Yehowa, Obadaya wakangata lukama lua baprofete, wakasokoka makumi atanu mu nyongolo makumi atanu mu nyongolo, wakabadisha bidia, wakabanuisha mai
Kanudi munyinyi wa nyama ei, kanulengi tshianza ham bidi hai, kayena miakane kunudi
Hankatshi ha luseke ludi lubanda ku tshibumba ne mushiku wa mbelu wa mikoko batudi ba biamu bia or ne bangend a mushinga bakalongolola

Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Walukile mu nshila wa mu tshihela tshia ku Damaseke; hawafikaku, bûdi n abu mbua kuela Hazaele manyi ha mutu bua kuikaleye mukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Sulia; wele Yehu, muana wa Nimishi, manyi ha mutu bua kuikaleye mukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Isalele; wele Elisha, muana wa Shafata wa mu Abele mehola, manyi ha mutu bua kuikaleye muprofete mu muaba webe
Nempeshe ndelanganyi yebe ditunga dionsu edi
Dituku adi Davidi wakamba ne, Washiha Bena Yebuse, aye biandi ku misulu ya mai, ashihe balema ne bafofo, badi mutshima wa Davidi ukina
Wakadi ne mei mafunda munda muau ne ha nyima hau; mei a muadi, madilu ne mulau akadi mafundamu
Kadi binuikala ne mukau wa luonji ne difuilangana mu mitshima yenu, kanuditumbishi ne kanudingi ku malu malelela
Biwalua ne mulambu wa bintu bia kumudilu binudi nuhuola kudi Yehowa, nufile bintu bidi mu miehu biosha mu kahia, miehu mihia mihia idibo ba tua diambedi
Kanuakamanya ne bakadi bela mikete anu ku lumbu lua musoko
Hakamba diba kubuela, bayidi bandi bakalua kudiye, bakamba ne, Muaba eu udi tshihela, diba diakumana kuya; ubatume, baye mu luseke elu ne mu misoko idi ha buihi, badisumbile bia kudia
Ne monai, nansha muetu umue wa mu tshitudilu tshia Yabesha gilada wakalua ku disangisha
Kadi kuena ubuelamu to

Judges Abimeleke, muana wa Yelubâla, wakaya ku Shekeme kudi bana babo ne mamu wandi, yeye wakabambila ne bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wa mamu wandi ne, Ntu nnusengelela ne, Nukonke bena Shekeme bonso mu matshu abo ne, Bualu kai budi butambe buimpe ku mesu kuenu bua bana balume bonso ba Yelubâla badi makumi muanda mutekete banukokeshe, anyi bua muntu umue anukokeshe
Davidi wakashikama mu musoko eu wa lumbu, nunku bakabikila musoko eu ne, Musoko wa Davidi
Baluishi nebabatshimune
Kanungu ka Tshibambalu ne tshibambalu anyi Tshisangilu Tshinene tshidi tshikwaata mudimu wa mushinga anu padi tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia beenatshi babwêla
Tatu andi muenu, tatu wa mukashi mene, wakamuhumbisha ne yeye wakalalaku matuku asatu; bakadia, bakanua, bakalalaku
Bânaba wakaya ku Tâso bua kukeba Shaula
Timote, muena mudimu n anyi, ne Lukio ne Yasona ne Sosipato, bana betu, badi banuela muoyo, Meme Têtio, munufundidi wa mukunda eu, ndi nuela muoyo mu Mukelenge
Bana ba balume ba Shimona: Amenona ne Lina, Bene hanana ne Tilona
Kapitene wakamuandamuna ne, Mukelenge, meme tshiena muntu mimene mua wewe kubuela mu nsubu muanyi; wewe wamba anu dî diebe, Buntu wanyi neasangale
Bualu bua kanuakuamba mei malelela bua bualu buanyi, bu mudi muntu wanyi Yobo wamba

Yeye ngudi udimanyika ne udi udibandisha ku mpala kua bionso bidi bidikibua ne, Nzambi, anyi bionso bidi bantu batendelela; nunku yeye udi ushikama mu ntempelo wa Nzambi udilesha kudi bantu ne, Meme ndi Nzambi
Bualu bua tuakasua kulua kunudi kudi meme Paulo misangu ne misangu, kadi Satana wakatuhumbisha
Kadi tshiakuitabusha mei tô ne hanakulua bua kudimuenena ku mesu: hakangambila anu tshituha tshia mei; lungenyi luebe ne bubanji buebe bidi bihita lumu lunakunvua bunene
Yehowa Nzambi nealue, banjelo bandi ba tshijila nebalue n andi
Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua nuenu kanuikadi bahika babo, nakatshibula mitshi ya tshikokedi yakatekabo ha nshingu yenu, nakanujalamisha
Bimuna bionsu abi, kabikadi ne bulema pambidi to
Yesu wakamba ne, Meme kabidi tshiena nkubanda, ya biebe, kuenji bualu bubi kabidi tshiendelele
Mitshi ei yakatamba bule, nunku bakamanya mua kuntangila mu muaba wa tshijila; kadi kabakamanya mua kuntangila ha bule; idiku tô ne ku dituku edi

Wakajingila nkanu mifindakasha ne miluka ya kulengesha n ai bibuiku biakadi ku mutu wa makunshi, nkanu muanda mutekete ku tshibuiku tshimue, nkanu muanda mutekete ku tshibuiku tshikuabo, Wakenza makunshi nunku: wakateka nkanu ei mu milongo ibidi bua kulengesha n ai bibuiku biakadi ku mutu wa makunshi; Wakenza tshibuiku tshikuabo diatshimue
bualu ebu budi bu kubisha Kilisto ku bafue

Mukelenge udi munkatshi muenu neambule bintu biandi bia luendu ha diaha diandi, nealuhuke butuku; nebamutubuile disoso mu lumbu lua musoko bua kumuluhuilamu; yeye neabuikile mpala wandi bua katangidi buloba ebu ku mesu
Bualu kai tshiji tshia mutshima webe tshidi tshikuata bukole
Bua malu enu onso manyanguke nengenze malu munkatshi muenu andi tshiyi muanze kuenza diambedi, malu a mushindu undi tshiyi ngenza kabidi
Mutoyi udi ufuma ku musoko, Diambedi Siona kayi muanji kutantamana, wakalela; Wakunvua bualu bu nunku diambedi nganyi
Nuenu bena Izrayele, nukadi pa kusabuka musulu wa Yardene, bua kubuela mu ditunga edi, didi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu unupa
Samuele Natana Udi Ubela Davidi Yehowa wakatuma Natana kudi Davidi
Hezikiya wakamba ne, Badi balue kundi bafume ku buloba bua kule, ku Babulona mene
Hakashikishabo kufila bintu, Bânaba ne Shaula bakahingana, bafume ku Yelushalema; bakalua ne Yone, dinga dina Mâko
Bana balume ba Lakele, mukashi wa Yakoba, ba kadi Yosefe ne Benyamina
Butuku abu wakabika biandi wakangata bakashi bandi babidi ne bakashi babidi benji ba mudimu ne bana bandi dikumi ne umue, bakasabuka ku dilobo dia Yaboka
Bayandi wakaya n andi, wenda udila; wakamulonda tô ne ku Bahulima
Nudi banyanguke
Bana balume ba Shobala: Abana ne Manahata ne Ebala ne Shefi ne Onama

Ebu mbuhianyi budi muntu mubi uheta kudi Nzambi, Biavulangana bana bandi, mbua bobo kushihibua ku muele Badi bashala ku nyima kua lufu Nansha biadibutshileye biamu bia argent bu luhuishi, yeye udi mua kubilongolola, kadi bantu bakane nebabiluate, Yeye udi wasa nsubu wandi bu tshibayibayi, Udi ulala hanshi bu muntu mubanji, kadi kena wenza nunku kabidi; Malu a buowa adi amuhita bukole bu mai mavule; Luhehele lua ku esete ludi luya n andi, ne yeye udi umukaku; ludi lumûmusha mu muaba wandi
Mukelenge Yehowa
Abalahama wakaya lubilu ku tshisumbu tshia ngombe, wakangata lukungulu lua ngombe luakadi lutekete ne luimpe, wakalufila kudi muntu wandi, ne yeye wakaluhandulula lubilu
Petelo wakamuandamuna ne, Ahu tuetu, tuakushia malu etu onso, tuakukulonda, tuetu netuhete tshinyi
Nzambi wakumpa mikemu yabo, ne Nzambi wakafuka mulayi wandi kudi Abalahama ne kudi Isaka ne kudi Yakoba

bilumbu mikala atontolola Kadi katangila, padiku kakuyi bilumbulwilu bikwaabo bidi ne bukookeshi abu, malomba a kufutshibwa bwa kulongola bubi bwa pa bwabo, bumweeneka anyi bwikala mu lungenyi lwa muntu, bufumina ku dipangadika diangata anyi dituma kudi bamfumu ba Ditunga

Yakoba wakambila bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wandi ne bonso bakadi n andi ne, Umushai nzambi ya bende idi munkatshi muenu, nudilongolole, nuluate bilulu bikuabo, tubike tumuke, tuye ku Betele, nengenzeleku Nzambi, waka ngunvuila mu dituku dia dikenga dianyi, wakadi n anyi mu nshila kunakaya, tshioshelu
Kadi bakadi bela mabue ne bieledi, bakanyunguluka, bakaunyenga
Nunku nuenu bantu babi, binuamanya mua kuha bana benu bintu bimpe, Tatu wenu udi mu diulu kena utamba kuha badi bamulomba bintu bimpe, anyi
Yoshua ne Bena Isalele bonso hakadimanyisha bu bantu batekete ku mpala kuabo, bakanyema mu nshila wa ku tshihela
Kanuhingashi muhika wakunyemena kunudi munyeme mu bianza bia mukelenge wandi; yeye ashikame n enu mu muaba udiye usungula mu umue wa misoko yenu udi utamba kumusankisha; kanumuenzedi bibi
Ne tuetu hetu netuhanduke munyi
Sala udi ne bidimu makumi tshitema nealele, anyi
Ke muvuabu bakumbaje mikenji yebe, banemeke nanku ndondu webe

Hawabihata, hawabatuma kukuabo, Bua muanda eu bubi bua Yakoba nebujimishibue, Bualu bua musoko wa ngumbu ya nvita udi ushala ha buau, Huma matamba a mitshi, nebâhule, Mu dituku adi Yehowa neashihule miehu yandi ya blé ya ku musulu wa Pelata tô ne ku kasulu ka Ejipitu; ne ba nusangishe muntu ne muntu, nuenu, Bena Isalele
Wakadi ne dikima dikole: wakashiha Bena Amaleka, wakasungila Bena Isalele mu bianza bia bakadi bahaula
Baminyampala aba bakadi ne Yelemiya tshiji, bakâmukuma, bakamubuesha mu nsubu wa lukanu wakadi mu nsubu wa Yonatana secrétaire; bualu bua bakasungula nsubu au bu nsubu wa lukanu

Bikaleye kai muenze nunku, bonso bamona bualu ebu nebabange kumuseka, halongeye tushola tua kunshi nkayatu, kai mumanye mua kutshishikisha tshionso, nebambe ne, Muntu eu wakubanga kuibaka tshibumba, kai mumanye mua kutshishikisha
ne grame , bilondeshile tshipimu tshivuabu natshi muaba wa tshijila
Mulume eu wakamutangila talalâ, wakadi welangana meji munda bua kumanyeye ne, Yehowa wakungendesha dikasa bimpe, anyi

Nunku hakadiye wenza mudimu wandi wa buakuidi ku mesu kua Nzambi mu mulongo wandi, bu muakadi tshilele tshia mudimu wa bakuidi, yeye wakasungudibua bua kubueleye mu ntempelo wa Mukelenge bua kuosha musenga wa mananashi
Kadi biasumba muntu muhika wandi ku argent, ne hakamutengulabo, yeye udi mua kutshidia
Yone wakadi mumane kuambila Helode ne, Wewe kuena mumanye mua kuikala ne mukashi wa muan enu
Bayidi bakamukonka ne, Bafundi batu bambila tshinyi ne, Budi Eliya n abu mbua kudianjileye kulua ku mpala
Hakamanya muntu ne, Tshiena mumuhite bukole wakalenga tshianza ha tshikundukundu tshiandi ne tshikundukundu tshia Yakoba tshiakakoyoboka hakadiye uluangana n andi bibula
Kuvudishi malu mabi; kuikadi muhote; udi musue kufua dituku dia lufu luebe kadiyi dianze kufika bua tshinyi
Wakashiha bakuidi ba bitendelelu abi ha bioshelu biabo, wakoshahu mifuba ya bantu; nunku wakahingana ku Yelushalema
Lea wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpa bintu bia bungi, katataka bayanyi neashale n anyi bualu bua meme nakamulelela bana ba balume basambombo, wakamuidika dina ne, Zebuluna
Pikala bantu batandangane bua bintu bijimine: ngombe, mpunde, mikoku, mbuji, bilamba nansha bintu bikuabu, nebaye kuditshipa bonsu babidi kudi Mvidi Mukulu
Nunku bubidi buabo bakahingana ku Beteleheme Hakaluabo ku Beteleheme bena musoko bonso bakadi basasakata bualu buabo bamba ne, Eu nNaomi, anyi
Yeye wakabambila mei makuabo a bungi, wakabadimusha ne, Disungilai kudi ba mu tshikondo etshi tshia tshitshu

Hashishe mukashi wandi Zeleshe ne balunda bandi bakamuambila ne, Balongolole tshiowelu bule bua coudées makumi atanu, hatshiabu wewe wambile mukelenge bua kuowelaku Môdekai; hashishe neumanye mua kuya ne mukelenge ne disanka ku bidia bia disanka dinene
Kanuitabushi mulambu ei ku bianza bia benyi bua kuyifila kudi Nzambi wenu, mulambu ei idi ne bilema, tshiena nyitabusha bualu bua idi munyanguke
Ndi nkusengelela bua muan anyi wa mu Kilisto Onesimo unakuela mu lukanu luanyi
Wangate mafuta, ulabe ku ntenta wa kusambakena, ne ku bionsu bidiku bua kubadila
Kusululabu bilamba biabu, kumushabu mikiya
Nennuhitshishe muinshi mua mulangala, nennusuike mu tshihungidi
Kusungulabu bena mvita tshinunu ku tshisamba tshionsu tshia bena Izrayele
Amen
Wewe udi uditumbisha bua mikenshi, udi ufuisha Nzambi bundu bua bushihi buebe bua mikenshi, anyi
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ndi muan ebe, muan a bute Esau

Masalayi, hakamukuminau milonda mu bianza ne ku makasa ku mutshi mutshiamakane, akangata bilulu biandi akabanyangana anai, disalayi biadi, disalayi biadi; ne tshikowelu tshiandi kabidi, kadi tshikowelu katshiakadi ne mitelu, tshiakadi tshikuma tshijima kulu tô ne hanshi
Hakambabo kufika kunfudilu kua musoko, Samuele wakambila Shaula ne, Ambile muena mudimu webe ahite ku mpala kuetu ne yeye wakahita , kadi wimane biebe bua meme kutunyuisha mei a Nzambi
Ebi mbiota bia bana balume ba Noa ku milongo yabo, bisamba bia bantu biakamuangalaka ha buloba ku nyima kua nvula munene biakafuma kudibo
Bualu meme Ndi Maweja Nangila
Bakabiangula nunku, bakûsha bisaka dikumi ne bibidi tente ne bihesa bia mitanda itanu ya bidia bia seola biakadibo bashîa kudi bakadia

Nudi nukeba kujingulula malu adi mafunda mu Mukunda wa Nzambi, bua nudi nuelangana meshi ne, Mu malu â tudi ne muoyo wa tshiendelele; malu au kabidi adi angamba; kanuena basue kulua kundi bua nuenu kuikala ne muoyo
Ndi mbakina ne lukuna lukole lua tshishiki; Nzambi, utangile munda muanyi, umanye mutshima wanyi

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Shelumiele, muana mulume wa Shulishadai
Bualu bua bakashihabo bana bakalelabo bu mulambu wa kufila kudi mpingu, mu dituku adi diodimue bakabuela mu tshitendelelu tshianyi bua kutshinyanga; ne mona, bakenza nunku mu nsubu muanyi
Nudisangishe bua kuntendelela
Wewe wakungambila ne, Bulelela, nenkue nzele bimpe, nenkukumbashile tunkanunuina tuebe bungi bua nsenga ya kukala kua mai manene, idibo kabayi mua kubala
Yosefe wakalua ne Yakoba, tatu andi, wakamuteka ku mpala kua Palô, ne Yakoba wakavudishila Palo disanka
Nunku nakumutuma ne disuminyina ditambe, bua nuenu nusanke hanuamonangana n andi kabidi, ne bua meme ngikale ne kanyinganyinga kakehe
Wakamba ne, Legona, bualu bua bademon ba bungi bakadi munda muandi
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nuenu, bakokeshi ba Bena Isalele, nuitabushe bua malu makole anuakenza ne ashike
Amu mukaji neapete dinyoka, pikalaye muenze bibi
Yesu wakabambila ne, Bulelela, Eliya udi ulua diambedi, udi ulongolola bintu bionso bu muakadibi diambedi; bakafundila Muana wa muntu tshinyi ne, Neakenge makenga a bungi, nebamuhetule
Monai, Bena Isalele, baprofete benu badi bu mibuabua mu bikulu
Nuenu badi ne nsala katataka nudi ne disanka, bua nuenu nenukute
Nunku nudimuke bienu bua umue wenu kalekedi mukashi wa ku bunsongalume buandi
Hashika ngondo muanda mutekete nebabange kukeba bitalu bikuabo
Neanuendeshe diakalenga ku midimu yenu yonsu
Nunku ambila badi balaba luhemba ku lumbu ne, Nelushimbuke
Tshikale tshitela ne buanda bua ndanda busambakaja ne bua miosa ya nyama bufikuluke, bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzuu
Bualu bua yeye nealue tshisamba tshinene, ne bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebisanke bua bualu buandi
Kadi blê ne bintu bikuabo kabiakadi bifue, kabiakanza kukola nansha
Musombeshanganyi wakadiku, wakadi ne bena mabanza andi babidi; mukuabo wakadi ne dibanza dia ndenalio Hakahangabo bintu bia kumufuta, yeye wakabalekelela mabanza bubidi buabo
Yehowa wakabaha dikisha ku nseke yonso bu muakalayeye bankambua babo; kakuakadi umue wa bena lukuna babo bonso wakamanya mua kubatantamena; Yehowa wakafua bena lukuna babo bonso mu bianza biabo
Lewitiki Kulama kua Muinda Ek
Nenkutume wewe ne mamu webe wakakulela mu buloba bukuabo, munuakadi kanuyi baledibue, nenufuilemu
Revelation Nakamona bakalamuna Muana wa Mukoko tshimue tshia bimanyishilu muanda mutekete, ne nakunvua umue wa bifukibue binai bidi ne muoyo wamba dî dia bu mukungulu wa nvula ne, Lua
Hashishe lukuka, himitalu, ludi lulela bubi: ne bubi, hakolabu budi bulela lufu
Bena Ejipitu bakenzesha bantu bualu bua kubihata mu buloba lubilu, bakamba ne, Tudi bantu bafue bonso
Nunku unvuai dî dia Yehowa, nuenu bonso badi mu buhika, banakumusha mu Yelushalema bua kubatuma mu Babulona
Dituku dia usanka dia bidia kabî biela luevene diakafika, diakadibo ne bualu bua kushiha bana ba mikoko ya Kuhita kua Yehowa
Sala wakimita difu, wakalelela Abalahama muana mulume mu bununu buandi mu tshikondo tshiakamuambila Nzambi
Bualu bua wadibandisha nebamuhuekeshe, wadihuekesha nebamubandishe

Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Mona, meme nakakuteka ku mutu kua milambu yanyi idibo banyukula ne bintu bionso bidi Bena Isalele bajila, nakakuha bintu ebi bu tshituha tshia bintu biebe bualu bua kujidila kuebe ne kua bana bebe balume tshiendelele
Bualu bua mu muaba wakakufukabo, mu buloba buwakaledibua, nenkulumbuluishe
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Alona ne, Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua bana bebe tô mu bikondo biabo bionso udi ne tshilema kena mua kulua ha buihi bua kufileye milambu kudi Nzambi wandi
Kadi ndi n ebe bualu ebu ne, udi witabusha mukashi au Izebele, udi udibikila muprofete mukashi; ne udi uyisha ne udi uhambuisha bahika banyi bua kuendabo masandi ne bua kudiabo bintu bishihela mpingu
Nakunuha tshifuanyikishi etshi bua nuenu kuenza bu munakunuenzela
Hakaya bifukibue bidi ne muoyo ku muaba mukuabo, nkata yakaya n abi diakamue; hakajuka bifukibue hanshi, nkata yakajuka n abi diakamue
Wewe kuolola diboku diebe dia bukole, buloba kumina baluishi betu
Maweja Nangila neabutule bena ditunga adi, bu muvuaye mubutule Sihone ne Oge, bakalenga ba bena Amore, ne matunga abu
Yeye nealongolole minda ha bitekelu biai bia or numpe ku mpala kua Yehowa ku dituku ku dituku
Bakabika, bakamuihata mu musoko, bakalua n andi ku mutu kua mukuna wakadibo base musoko bua kumukuha ma luhongo mutu muinyika munshi
Bana ba Gibâ, makumi tshitema ne batanu
Yeye wakamba ne, Kulengi nsongalume tshianza nansha, kumuenzedi bualu, bualu bua katataka ndi mumanye ne wewe udi utshina Nzambi, bualu bua wewe kuakumpidia muan ebe, muana umuehele mene
Mukanda eu udi mufundila Tito, muana wanyi wa bushua mu ditabusha dimue dia bonso
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Kakuena tshiasu tshikuabo
Nakalota lumu lunene; bintu bianyi biakavulangana, biakahita bia bonso bakadi ku mpala kuanyi mu Yelushalema; nakatshidi anu ne meji anyi

Biamu biabo bia argent ne bia or kabiena bimanye mua kubahandisha mu dituku dia tshiji tshikole tshia Yehowa; kabiena bisankisha mitshima yabo, kabiena biukutshisha mafu abo, bualu bua biakadi tshilenduishi tshiakabahonesha mu bubi
Kukonkaye uvua muenze bibi ne: Udi utuuta mukuebe nanku bua tshinyi

Tuakanyenga buloba mu bianza bia bakelenge babidi bakadi dishiya dia Yadene, ku tshibanda tshia Ânona tô ne ku mukuna wa Hêmona; Bena Sidona badi babikila Hêmona ne, Sileona, ne Bena Amole badi babikila Hêmona ne, Senî; misoko yonso ya mu mpata, ne misoko yonso ya mu Gilada, ne ya mu Bashana tô ne ku Saleka ne Edelei, misoko ya bukelenge bua Oga mu Bashana
Yehowa wakamunanga; wakatuma Natana muprofete kudiye, wakamuidika dina ne, Munangibue kudi Yehowa, bualu bua Yehowa
Bana ba balume ba Mika: Pitona ne Meleke ne Talea ne Ahaza
Ela dî diebe, amba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nengele ndobo mu mbanga yebe, Nenkuele mu tshihela tshia lusenga, Nunku Bena Ejipitu bonso nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Hakunvua Bâsha lumu elu, yeye wakalekela kuasa Lama; mudimu wakashika
Kadi tshiena ngitabusha mukashi ayishe, anyi ikale ne bukokeshi ku mutu kua muteme; kadi ikale biandi talala
Exodus Biba muntu ngombe anyi mukoko, biamushiheye anyi biamuhaneye, yeye neahingashe ngombe itanu ku ngombe umue, ne nukoko mai ku mukoko umue
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Umuka biebe munkatshi mua tshisumbu etshi tshia bantu, nenubashihe mu tshituha tshihi

Hawakanda diulu bua nvula kayimatshi, bualu bua bobo bakukuenzela bibi; biatendelelabo ku muaba eu, bitabushabo dina diebe, biakudimunabo mitshima yabo bua mibi yabo hawabakengesha, ubunvuile mu diulu, ubuikidile bantu bebe, Bena Isalele, mibi yabo hawabalesha nshila muimpe udibo ne bualu bua kuendela; nunku umatshishe nvula ha buloba buebe buwakuha bantu bebe bu buhianyi buabo
Bua hatuakadi munkatshi muenu mene, tuakanuelela mukenshi eu ne, Bikala muntu kai witabusha kuenza mudimu, kadi biandi tshintu
Wakuenza tshinyi
Mvidi Mukulu mumane kujikija mudimu uvuaye muenze, kuikishaye dituku dia muanda muteketa
Bayidi bandi bakamukonka ne, Muntu udi mumanye mua kukutshisha bantu aba mu muaba eu wa tshihela kudi kunyi
Hakabandulukabo, bakamona dibue dimana kubunguluisha; diakadi ditambe bunene
Muaba wa Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu awu, nenusanke bonsu, nuenu, bana benu ne bena mudimu benu
Dibadika dia bantu edi, divua dienzeka bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Bakandamuna mukelenge ne, Mbulelela, mukelenge

Tuakadielela mikenji kabidi bua kufila tshituha tshia nshekele bua mudimu wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi wetu ku tshidimu ku tshidimu; ne bua kufila bintu bia mampa ne bia mulambu wa bukula ne bia dituku dia lumingu ne bia ngondo mihia mihia ne bia bidia bia disanka ne bia bintu bia tshijila ne bia milambu ya kubuikidila n ai Bena Isalele mibi yabo ne bia mudimu wonso wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi wetu
Betania wakadi hehi ne Yelushalema, ntanta bu ya kilometa isatu; Bena Yuda ba bungi bakadi balue kudi Mâta ne Malia bua kubasamba bua muan abo

Tshisamba tshia Shimeyone tshivua ne meku aa: diku dia bena Nemuyele, ndelanganyi ya Nemuyele; dia bena Yamine, ndelanganyi ya Yamine; dia bena Yakine, ndelanganyi ya Yakine; dia bena Zera, ndelanganyi ya Zera; ne dia bena Shawule, ndelanganyi ya Shawule
Bakuabo bakamba ne, Nyeye; bakuabo ne, Nasha, kadi udi mumufuane
Kupita matuku muanda mutekete, Nowa kutuma nyunyi wa nkudimba tshiakabidi
Hakamanya muntu ne, Tshiena mumuhite bukole wakalenga tshianza ha tshikundukundu tshiandi ne tshikundukundu tshia Yakoba tshiakakoyoboka hakadiye uluangana n andi bibula

Utuangane n anyi mishiku, Bualu bua dinanga diebe didi dihita nvinyo buakane, manyi ebe adi ne dihembu dimpe, dina diebe didi bu manyi adibo bahongolola; nunku bansongakashi batshidi tumama badi bakunanga
Bua muntu eu nunku nenditumbishe, kadi bua meme nkayanyi tshiena nditumbisha, anu mu matekete anyi
Bena Izrayele ne benyi badi munkatshi muabu, bakumbaje mikenji eyi kashidi
Bualu buakalua nunku kudiye; bantu bakamudiata mu makasa ku tshibi, yeye wakafua
Moshe kuandamuna ne: Lekela kungumvuila mukawu
Bena Isalele bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose; bakabanya buloba
Badishi ba ngulube bakanyema, bakambila bantu ba mu musoko ne ba mu luseke alu bualu abu
Kadi hakatangila Davidi bantu bandi banungane, Davidi wakamanya ne muana udi mufue; Davidi wakebesha bantu bandi ne, Muana wakulua, anyi

Yehowa, Nzambi wa Abalahama ne wa Isaka ne wa Yakoba, bankambua betu, witabushe bua bantu bebe bikale ne meji â onso munda muabo tshiendelele, ujadike mitshima yabo kûdi; uvuishe Solomo muan anyi mutshima mutoke, bua kutumikileye mikenji yebe ne mei ebe ne mikandu yebe, bua kuenzeye malu â onso, ne bua kuibakeye mbalasa eu unakabanga kulongolola bintu
Mukashi wakabulula mesu; hakamoneye Petelo, wakashikama
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Mibuabua idi ne mena ai, nyunyu ya mulu idi ne masua ai; kadi Muana wa muntu kena ne ha kuladika mutu wandi

Yoshiya wakumusha kabidi bena mbuku ne bena muhongo ne mpingu yonso ne malu a bundu onso biakadi mu Yuda ne mu Yelushalema bua yeye ajadike mei onso a mikenji akadi mafunda mu mukanda wakasangana Hilekiya muakuidi mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudi Bena Isalele, yeye wakabahana mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete ne bia Bena Amona
Muntu udi ulama mei a buambi bua mu mukanda eu udi ne disanka
Tô ne lelu eu kabena banua, bualu bua badi batumikila mukenji wa nkambua wabo
Meme kuenza mushete wa mabaya a ndunga, kusonga mabue abidi mafuanangane ne a kumpala
Monai, udi ulua

Nunku kabidi bantu kabatu bela maluvu mahia mahia mu milondo ya biseba bikulukulu; bienzabo nunku, biseba nebihandike, maluvu neaye hanshi, ne biseba nebifue; kadi bantu batu heta maluvu mahia mahia mu biseba bihia bihia, ne bubidi buabi nebishale
Hakunvua Anania mei â, wakahona hanshi, wakahuola, muoyo wandi; buowa bunene buakakuata bantu bonso bakunvua bualu ebu
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Tshiena nkuambila ne, Tô ne ku misangu muanda mutekete, ndi nkuambila ne, Tô ne ku makumi muanda mutekete misangu muanda mutekete
Yeye wakadi mutendeledi muakane, wakadi utshina Nzambi ne ba mu nsubu wandi bonso, wakadi uha bantu bintu bia luse bia bungi, wakadi utendelela Nzambi matuku onso
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi ne bukookeshi bwa kwakula
Tshikena kumona tshiakukuambilabo bua dilolo ne dinda tshidi tshia bushuwa, kadi wewe sokoka tshikena kumona etshi, bualu bua tshidi tshilesha malu a matuku a bungi atshidi ku mpala

Wakashiha Muena Ejipitu, muntu munene wa nfiondo, bule buandi buakadi coudées Au mmalu akenza Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, wakadi ne dina dinene munkatshi mua bantu banene basatu; yeye wakatamba bantu makumi asatu butumbi, kadi yeye kakalua munene bu bantu aba basatu bakadi ku mpala; Davidi wakamuteka ku mutu kua bena nvita bakadi ha buihi n andi
Nunku Baluka wakaubala mu matshu abo
Shaula wakafuma ku budimi, wenda ulonda ngombe, wakakonka ne, Bantu badi badidila tshinyi

Udi wamba bua Damaseke ne, Damaseke wakulekela, udi utshunguluka bua kunyemeye, Monai mudibo balekela musoko wa butumbi, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Neatemeshe kadilu mu ngumbu ya Damaseke, Edi ndi dia Yehowa bualu bua Kedâ ne makelenge a Hasô akayishabo ben au kudi Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona
Kadi Ira kena musangane mukaji awu kabidi to
Ei yakadi miaba yabo yakashikamabo, ne bobo bakafunda kulondolola kuabo
Ba munkatshi mua Bena Efelayima, bena nvita ba bukitu, bantu ba butumbi mu nsubu ya batatu abo binunu makumi abidi ne nkama muanda mukulu

Nunku Hilekiya ne bantu bakabikilabo kudi mukelenge bakaya kudi Huleda muprofete mukashi, mukashi wa Shaluma, muana wa Tokata, muana wa Hasela, mulami wa bilulu bia mukelenge mukashi eu wakadi mushikame mu Yelushalema ku luseke luibidi; bakamuambila bualu ebu
Kadi bena ditunga kukanyina Lote, bamba ne: Umuke apa

Yeye wakasungula Bena Lewi bakuabo bua kuenzelabo mudimu ku mpala kua mushete wa Yehowa, ne bua kutendekenabo ne bua kusakidilabo ne bua kutumbishabo Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele; Asafa wakadi ku mutu kuabo, ne ku nyima kuandi kuakadi Zekâya ne Yiele ne Shemilamota ne Yehiele ne Matitiya ne Eliaba ne Benaya ne Obeda edome ne Yiele, bakadi ne nzenze ne bisanji; Asafa wakimba biamu bia kukumakasha bikole; Benaya ne Yahaziele bakuidi bakela mpungi misangu yonso ku mpala kua mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa
Akisha wakitabusha mei onso akamuambila Davidi; yeye wakamba ne, Davidi wakavuisha Bena Isalele, bantu bandi, bua bobo bamulengulule, nunku yeye neikale muhika wanyi tshiendelele
Wakaya biandi dituku dibidi, wakamona balume babidi ba Bena Ebelu baluangana, yeye wakakonka muntu
Isalele wakamona bana babidi ba Yosefe, wakamukonka ne, Aba mbanganyi

Nzambi nkayandi wakababikila bu bantu bandi bua kujadikeye n abo dina diandi ne bua kubenzeleye malu manene; yeye wakenza malu a kukema mu buloba buabo ku mesu kua bantu bandi bakahikuleye mu Ejipitu mu bianza bia bisamba bikuabo ne bia nzambi yabo
Ba bana ba Melali: ba Yâziya, Beno, ne Shohama ne Zakû ne Ibeli
Hashishe muakuidi wakamba ne, Tusemenai ha buihi ne Nzambi
Luai, numone muakadiye mulale
Nuenu kanuakunsungula, nakunusungula, nakunujadika bua nuenu kuya kukuama mamuma ne bua mamuma enu ikale tshiendelele, bua tshintu tshionso tshinualomba Tatu mu dina dianyi yeye anuhetshi
Bamonyi ba bualu nebolole bianza kudiye diambedi bua kumushiha, ne ku nyima bantu bonso nebolole bianza biabo
Yeye wakadi utekemena ne, Paulo neampe biuma
Bantu ba mu Beteleheme ne ba mu Netofa lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu ne muanda mukulu
Bukokeshi bua Bâsha Mu tshidimu tshisatu tshia bukelenge bua Asa, mukelenge wa Yuda, Bâsha, muana wa Ahiya, wakabanga kukokesha Bena Isalele mu Tîsa; wakabakokesha bidimu makumi abidi ne binai
Bakamuambila mei onso akabambila Bena Yabesha
Hakunvua Yesu dî diabo, wakamuambila ne, Kutshinyi, itabusha anu kuitabusha, nebamusungile
Bualu bua mianda ya Nzambi idi mimanyibue kudi bantu idi imueneka munda muabo, bualu bua Nzambi wakaimuenesha kudibo
Bobo badi bena mudimu ba Kilisto, anyi
Aba mbana ba balume ba Lea bakaleleleye Yakoba mu Padana alama, ne muan andi wa bakashi Dina, bana bandi ba balume ne bana bandi ba bakashi makumi asatu ne basatu
Deuteronomy Nuenu nudi bana ba Yehowa, Nzambi wenu: kanuditahi nsalu, kanubeyi makiki enu bualu bua bantu bafue
Nealukile kuabo neunvuangane ne bantu aba badi bahidia tshihungidi tshia tshijila

Kadi Alona ne bana bandi ba balume bakafila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ne ku tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi ne ya midimu yonso ya mu muaba wa tshijila ne ya kubuikila n ai mibi ya Bena Isalele bu muakadi mikenji yonso yakela Mose, muntu wa Nzambi
Maweja Nangila mmunange bisamba bia bena Izrayele
Hakamoneye umena kuabo ukengeshibua, wakaya kumuluila nvita, wakasombuela wakadi ukenga, wakashi Muena Ejipitu
Abiya ne Yalobama bakadi baluangana nvita
Tshibuikidiji atshi, tshivua ne bule bua metre umue ne santimetre makumi abidi ne itanu, ne butshiama bua santimetre makumi muanda mutekete ne itanu
Dituku dikuabo, muana wa bakashi wa Shua, mukashi wa Yuda, wakafua, Yuda wakasambibua, wakaya kudi bakoshi ba miosa ya mikoko yandi ku Timena, kudi mulunda wandi Hila, Muena Adulama
Mukelenge wa Sodoma wakaluhuka bua kumuakidila hakahinganeye ku dishiha dia Kedolaome ne bakelenge bakadi n andi, mu tshibanda tshia Shawe etshi ntshibanda tshia Bakelenge
Yehowa wa misumba neababishile nsokotshi bu muakakumeye Bena Midiyana ku Dibue Mu dituku adi bujitu buandi nebûmuke ha diaba diebe, ne mutshi wandi wa tshikokedi neûmuke ha nshingu hebe
Bayidi bandi bakunvua dî edi
Nealuate tshikowelu tshia ku ne mihanu ya lin, nêle mukaba wa lin ku tshimono tshiandi, nease tshifufu tshia lin ku mutu ebi mbilulu bia tshijila, yeye neowe mai, neabiluate
Neanyenge nzambi yabo, mpingu yakatulabo, ne malonga abo mimpe a argent ne a or, neaye n abi mu Ejipitu

Tubalu tuabo tuakadi nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi asatu ne tusambombo; nyama yabo ya mpunda tumelo tuabo tuakadi nkama mai ne makumi asatu ne tutanu; nyama yabo ya mpunda yakadi binunu bisambombo ne nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi abidi
Bakabaha mukanda mufunda nunku ne, Bapostolo ne bana betu badi bakulu badi batumina bana betu ba mu bisamba bia bende mu Antiokia ne mu Sulia ne mu Kilikia muoyo

Mukelenge Yehowa nealue bu muena bukole, Neadishe tshisumbu tshiandi tshia mikoko bu mudi mulami wa mikoko uyidisha, Eu nganyi wakidikisha mai onso munda mua tshianza tshiandi, Wakulombola Nyuma wa Yehowa nganyi
Katuena tunua mayi a mu ditunga dienu to
Tuetu bakamukudimuna anu bu muakatukonkeye, tuakadianjila kumanya ne, Yeye wakadi mua kutuambila ne, Luai ne muan enu wa balume kunoko, anyi
Badi Batela Malenda ku Bilulu Biabo Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele bua bobo ne tunkanunuma tuabo badienzele malenda ku bilulu biabo, ne bobo bateke muonshi wa bleu ku malenda abo
Ku ndelanganyi ya bena Refayime bonsu, Oge, mukalenga wa Bashane, ke wa ndekelu udi mushale ne muoyi
Hashishe Davidi wakabikila Siba, muhika wa Shaula, wakamuambila ne, Nakafila bintu bionso, biakadi kudi Shaula ne kudi ba mu nsubu wandi bonso, kudi muana wa mukelenge webe
Meme ndi Maweja Nangila
Kadi bidi bimpe bua meme kusemena ha buihi ne Nzambi
Mukashi kai, bikaleye ne mpalata Hamumoneye, neabikile balunda bandi ne bena mutumba n andi, neabambile ne, Nusanke n anyi, bua nakumona mpalata wakadi mujimine
Ku luseke ludi diba dipatukila mukalu wenu neubange kuinshi menemene kua Mayi manene a luepu
Udi mua kusuika mbowa ne mionshi bua yeye kuela mabula mu budimi, anyi

Bualu bua tudi ne ditekemena dia nunku, tudi tuamba dî dietu ne dikima dikole; ne katuena bu Mose wakateka tshilulu tshikudika ha mpala wandi bua Bena Isalele kabatangidi kunshikidilu kua butumbi buakadi bujiminajimina; kadi meshi abo akakoleshibua, bualu bua tô ne ku dituku edi, habalabo dihungila dikulukulu, tshilulu tshikudika tshiotshimue tshitshidi tshishala, bualu ebu kabuena buanze kubuluibua kudibo ne, Tshidi tshiumushibua mu Kilisto
Yesu wakambila Petelo ne, Hingasha muele webe mu luhaha; tshiena nua luhanza luakumpa Tatu, anyi
Kapitene ka bansentedi kakakuata Yelemiya, kakamuambila ne, Yehowa Nzambi webe wakahisha bena musoko eu ne mulau eu

Bikaleye kayi ne mushinga wa muana wa mukoko, alue biandi ne nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi anyi mputu nyunyu ibidi, umue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, muakuidi munene neayifile bua kumubuikidila n au bubi, ne yeye neikale mulengeshibue
Bena Izrayele kuashila Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu tshimenga tshia Pitome ne tshia Ramsese bua balaminemu bintu biende
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu neanuambuluishe bua nutekeshe bisamba ebi
Nunku Mose wakasonga mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi; wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakabanda ku mukuna wa Sinai, bu muakamuambila Yehowa; wakaya ne mabue abidi mu bianza biandi
Ne yeye wakangambila ne, Ngasa wanyi udi ukukumbana, bua bukole buanyi budi bukumbashibua tshishiki mu butekete buebe
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bakuhempa lusengu lua Moaba, diboko diandi diakutshibuka

Kadi meme hanyi bualu ebu busokoka kabuakusokolodibua kundi bua meji andi n au adi mahite a bantu bakuabo, kadi mbua dijingulula dimanyishibue kudi mukelenge, ne bua wewe umanye meji adi mu mutshima webe
Muntu yonsu udi usemena ku nzubu wa Maweja Nangila, udi ufua
Nusope tshitapitapi, nuenze mikata, bua kuyindambula bu mudibu bandambula ntete inudi nushipula, panudi bamane kunowa

Bialekela muntu ngombe wandi mu budimi bua muntu mukuabo, ne biadieye mitshi yandi ya tumuma tukese, yeye neamuhingashile bintu bidi bitamba buimpe bia mu budimi buandi ne bia mu budimi buandi bua nvinyo

Wakangata ngombe ibidi yakadi ku mutshi wa tshikokedi, wakayisaya munyinyi, wakayituma mu bianza bia miloho ei ku matshika onso a Isalele, Wamba ne, Yonso udi kayi ulonda Shaula ne Samuele, nebenzele ngombe yandi nunku
Kabakadi ne musungula bualu bua musoko wakadi kule ne Sidona, ne bobo kabakabuelakana ne bantu bakuabo; musoko eu wakadi mu tshibanda tshia ha buihi ne Bete lehoba

Muntu webe, tatu wetu wakabambila ne, Nudi bamanye ne mukashi wanyi wakundelela bana balume babidi, umue wabo wakumuka kundi, nakamba ne, Nyama mubi wakamuhandulula, ne ku dituku adi tshiakamutangila kabidi, binumusha muana eu mukuabo kundi, ne biakuatshishibueye bualu bubi, nennubueshe nsuki yanyi mitoke to mu Muaba wa Bafue ne kanyinganyinga kakole Nunku hanaya kudi muntu webe, tatu wanyi, ne nsongalume eu kayi n etu, bualu bua muoyo wandi udi musuikakana ne muoyo wa nsongalume eu, hashishe, hatangileye ne nsongalume kena n etu, yeye neafue, ne tuetu, bantu bebe, netubueshe nsuki ya muntu webe, tatu wetu, mu Muaba wa Bafue ne kanyinganyinga kakole
Bakamba ne, Yesu wa ku Nazaleta
Yesu wakendakana mu luseke luonso lua Galela, uyisha bantu mu nsunagoga yabo, ubambila lumu luimpe lua bukelenge bua mu diulu; ukolesha bantu bakadi ne mabedi ne matekete onso
Mêyi a ditunga adi ateela mêna a mpetu mikwabo ya mu musoku ne mushindu wa kuyabanya

Hashishe yeye wakamueneka kudi bayidi dikumi ne umue ha nkayabo, hakadibo bashikame badia bidia; yeye wakababela bualu bua buhidia buabo ne bukole bua mitshima yabo, bua bobo bakahidia kuitabusha dî dia bakamumona, hakabikeye ku lufu
Hatuakadi tuya ku muaba wa kutendelela, nsongakashi muhika wakasangakana n etu, wakadi ne nyuma mubi wakadi umubukisha, wakamuenesha banfumu andi bintu bia bungi bualu bua lubuku luandi
Bule bua tshilulu tshimue buakadi coudées Wakatuangana bilulu bitanu ha buabi, bilulu bitanu ha buabi
Kadi hakafikeye kudi muntu wa Nzambi ku mukuna, yeye wakamukuata ku makasa andi
Muntu yonsu uvua musombe mu ditunga diabu, mu tshisamba tshiabu, wakula muakulu wa ditunga diabu

Bualu hua dihingana tshianyima dia batshimbakanyi nedibashihe, Kadi muntu yonso udi ungunvuila neashikame talalâ, Nsumuinu Muan anyi, bi witabusha mei anyi, bua wewe utelejishe matshu ebe ku meji, e, biwadidila dijingulula dia mianda muadi, biwakukeba bu mûdi ukeba tshiamu tshia argent, nunku neujingulule ditshina dia Yehowa, Bualu bua Yehowa udi uha bantu meji; Yeye udi ubutshila bantu bakane lungenyi ludi lubakuatshisha; bua yeye alame nshila ya kulu mbulula kuakane, Hashishe neujingulule buakane ne dikosa diakane dia nsambu, Bualu bua meji neabuele mu mutshima webe, Budimu nebutangidile malu adi afika kûdi, bua kukuhandisha ku nshila wa malu mabi, badi balekela kuya mu nshila ya buakane Badi basanka bua kuenza bienzedi bibi, Badi bakonyangasha nshila yabo, Bua bualu ebu budi bua kukuhandisha mu bianza bia mukashi wa bende, mu bianza bia mukashi udi muena Udi ulekela mulombodi wakamubangila hakadiye nsongakashi, Bualu bua nsubu wandi udi uhueka tô ne ku lufu, nshila yandi idi ihueka tô ne ku bantu Kakuena muntu wa badi babuela kudiye uhingana kabidi, Bua bualu ebu budi bua wewe Bualu bua badi ne mitshima miakane nebashikame mu buloba, Kadi nebajimishe bantu babi ha buloba, Nsumuinu Muan anyi, kuhu diyisha dianyi muoyo Bua neyikutentekashile dileha dia matuku Luse ne lulamatu lua ku bushuwa kabiumuki kûdi
Bimwangalaji bia ngumu ya kumvwa, ya kutangila ne mifunda bia Mbulamatadi bidi midimu ya bantu bônso mudibo ne tshia kuya kakuyi kansungansunga kudi nkongu yônso ya beena tshidiidi ne ya beena musoko
Ndi ntekemena mu Mukelenge Yesu bua kunutumina Timote tshituha tshihi bua meme kuikala ne busambi buimpe hanamanya malu enu

Hakahita matuku â, Elisabeta wakimita difu; yeye wakadisokoka ngondo itanu, wakamba ne, Mukelenge wakungenzela bimpe nunku, mu matuku akadiye untangila, bualu bua kumusha bundu buanyi munkatshi mua bantu
Anyi, biwatendelela Nzambi anu ne nyuma, muntu udi munkatshi mua badi kabai ne bihedi bia Nyuma udi mumanye mua kuamba ne, Amen, munyi, hawasakidila Nzambi, hadiye kai mumanye dî diudi wamba
Badi Bakuata Yehoyakina bua Kuya n Andi mu Babulona Bak
Yehowa wakamba ne, Mpala wanyi neaye n ebe, ne meme nenkuhe dikisha
Kadi matuku nealue abanyengabo mubaki wa mukashi, nebajile bia kudia dituku adi
Kutuadilaye Abrame mampa ne maluvu
Nakamona malu â mu tshikena kumona; hanakâmona, nakamanya ne, Ndi mu Shushana, luhangu lunene lua mukelenge lua mu province wa Elama; mu tshikena kumona atshi nakadimona hehi ne musulu wa Ulai
Bena nsudi ba bungi bakadi mu Isalele mu matuku a muprofete Elisha; kadi bakuabo kabakalengeshibua, anu Nâmana Muena Sulia
Nanku, bena Izrayele bavua bajula mitanda, bayasa muaba mukuabu, pavua Maweja Nangila muambe
Ku Gelasa Yesu udi umusha bademon munda mua mufitu Bakafika ku luseke lua Bena Gelasa, luakadi buludiludi ne Galela
Isaka wakambila Esau ne, Mona, nakumana kumuvuisha mukelenge, webe nakufila bana benu bonso kudiye bu bahika bandi nakumujadika ne manvua ne nvinyo muhiamuhia nenkuenzele wewe tshinyi, muan anyi
Nunku bantu bonso bakaya kuabo bua kudiabo ne bua kunuabo ne bua kutuminabo bantu bakadi hatuhu bintu bia kudia ne bua kusankabo, bualu bua bobo bakajingulula mei akabambilabo
Dina dia mai dia Yakoba diakadihu
Solomo wakalala tulu diatshimue ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika mu musoko wa Davidi, tatu andi
Pashishe Yakobe kuambila bena mudimu bende ne: Unguijayi mushiki wa mabue muaba awu
Udi musue kunshiha bu muwakashiha Muena Ejipitu makelela, anyi

Ezekiel Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kahidi ne, Muana wa muntu, tangisha mpala webe ku mukuna wa Seî, ûdiule; uwambile ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, ndi n ebe tshilumbu, wewe mukuna wa Sei, nengolole tshianza tshianyi ha mutu hebe bua kukukengesha, nenkuvuishe tshikulu ne tshihela tshia hatuhu
Bana ba Adina nkama isambombo ne makumi atanu ne batanu
Nebashikame mu buloba buabo mene
Dituku ditanu: Shelumiyele, muana wa Surishadayi, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Shimeyone
Musambu wa Mose Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bonso mei a musambu eu mu matshu abo, tô ne hakashikisheye
Mulume udi wenda masandi ne mukashi wa mulume mukuabo, nebashihe mulume ne mukashi wake ndeye n andi masandi

Wewe ubambile ne, Muntu yonso wa mu bisamba bia Bena Isalele anyi wa benyi badi munkatshi muabo udi ufila mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia anyi mulambu mukuabo ne udi uhidia kulua ne mulambu ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena bua kûshihela Yehowa nebumushe muntu au munkatshi mua bana babo

Malaya Pashishe Moshe kumanyisha bamfumu ba meku a bena Izrayele mikenji mikuabu ya kudi Maweja Nangila ya ne: Pikala muntu mulaye bua kulambula Maweja Nangila mulambu, nansha mutshipe bua kujila tshintu, udi ne bua kukumbaja bimpe bionsu bidiye mulaye abi
Nebabashipe ne muele mu misesu

Ne udi wenzesha bonso, ne bakese ne banene, ne babanshi ne bahele, ne badishikamine ne bahika, bua babahe tshimanyinu ha tshianza tshiabo tshia balume anyi ha mpala habo; bua kakuikadi muntu udi mua kusumba, nasha kuhana, anu udi ne tshimanyinu, dina mene dia nyama wa luonji, anyi nomba wa dina diandi
Kadi bakadi belangana meji bua kungenzela bibi
Nanku kakufuta to

Nuye kabidi mu buloba budi mutumba ne bena Amore, budibu base kudi bena Kenaane: ke ku mpata ya Yardene, ku mikuna, mu mpata ya luseke lua Mayi manene, mu tshitupa tshia kuinshi tshia ditunga, ne ku luseke lua muelelu wa Mayi manene
Hashishe, mukelenge wa ku nôde neafikeku, ne unguishe mishiki ya buloba, neanyenge musoko udi muasa ne ngumbu ya nvita

Bena mudimu bakashi ba Esetê ne bantu bandi batungula bakalua kudiye, bakamuambila bualu ebu; mukelenge mukashi wakatamba kunyingalasha mutshima wandi; yeye wakatuma bilulu bua Môdekai aluate, ne bua kumusheye bilulu biandi bikayabala; kadi yeye kakabiangata
Bikala muntu mubi mukumbane bua kukumibua, hashishe mulumbuluishi neamuladike hanshi, nebamukume ku mpala kuandi; bungi bua mikumu nebuikale bu bubi buandi
Wakamukonka nunku bua kumuteta munda, bua yeye wakadi mumanye bualu buakadiye ha kuenza
Malu â akulua bua kushikisha dî diakafundabo mu Mukanda wa Nzambi ne, Kabena batshibula mukuha wandi
Hakadibo baluhuka, bakalua kudiye ne kamama kakuatshike ne demon
Muku wa Petelo mukashi wakadi ne mubidi wandi mukuatshike kahia ka bungi; bakasengelela Yesu bua disama diandi
Wakateka bitekelu bia minda mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ku mpala kua mesa ku luseke lua nsubu lua ku sude
Wewe newenze tshibuikilu ne tshiamu tshia or mutambe buimpe, buludi buatshi nebuikale coudées ibidi ne tshituha ne butshiama buatshi nebuikale coudée umue ne tshituha

Nuangate tshifulu tshia luhandu, ne muele wa Nyuma udi dî dia Nzambi; nutendelele Nzambi misangu yonso ne kulomba kuonso ne disengelela dionso mu Nyuma Mumpe; nuikale batabale mu dinanukila dionso ne disengelela bua basanto bonso, ne bua bualu buanyi kabidi, bua meme kuheshibua mua kuakula hanabulula mukana muanyi ne bua meme kumanyisha bantu ne dikima bualu bua lumu luimpe busokoka
Badi bahidia nunku nebadiangatshile dilumbuluisha

Wakumusha bakuidi bonso mu misoko yonso ya mu Yuda, wakanyanga bitendelelu biakadi bakuidi boshahu musenga wa manananshi ku Geba tô ne ku Bê sheba; wakashimbula bitendelelu biakadi ku tshibuelelu tshia ku tshibi tshia Yoshua, mukelenge wa musoko, biakadi ku tshianza tshia bakashi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko
Bakambila Samuele ne, Shaula wakalua ku Kâmele, ne mona, wakimanyikaku dibue dia tshivulukidi, wakatshunguluka, wakalota, wakaya ku Gilegala
Kadi nyama ya tshijila, nansha ya mulambu wa mapiku, nuyilambuile anu muaba wikale Maweja Nangila musungule
Kadi biwunvua di diandi ne biwenza mei onso andi nkuambila, nunku meme nengikale bu muena lukuna kudi bantu badi n ebe lukuna, ne bu muena nvita kudi bantu badi basue kusangana n ebe
Kings Ku nyima kua malu â Nabota, Muena Yizelele, wakadi ne budimi bua tumuma tukese mu Yizelele ba buihi ne nsubu wa Ahaba, mukelenge wa mu Samalea
Bowa kukuata ne tatuabu Yakobe

Salai wakambila Abalama ne, Bubi buanyi buikale kûdi wewe nakafila mukashi muena mudimu wanyi mu tshiadi tshiebe, ne hakamoneye ne, Nakuimita difu, yeye wakundengulula, Yehowa alumbuluile tshilumbu tshidi hankatshi hetu n ebe
Bakadi bamufila ku Asia bakadi Sopato wa ku Beloya, muana wa Pulo; ne Bena Tesalonike, Alistâko ne Sekundo; ne Gayo wa ku Dêbe; ne Timote; ne Tukiko ne Tofimo ba ku Asia
Nenkumanyishe malu adi alua mu tshikondo tshia ndekelu wa tshiji tshikole tshia Nzambi, bualu bua tshikena kumona etshi tshidi tshilesha malu a mu tshikondo tshisungula tshia kunshikidilu

Yehowa wa misumba wakuditshiha, wamba ne, mbua kutshibula Muena Ashû bituha mu buloba buandi, Ebu mbualu bunakuhangidisha Bualu bua Yehowa wa misumba wakuhangidisha bualu, Mu tshidimu tshiakafua mukelenge Ahaza muakamueneka dî edi dia tshijila Nuenu ba mu Peleshete, buonso buenu, Ban a bute ba bahele nebikale ne bia kudia, Ela mukunda, wewe tshibuelelu tshia ku musoko; asa muadi, wewe musoko
Eli wakajingulula ne, Yehowa wakabikila muana
Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa udi Wamba ne, Umbulai mitubu mu tshibanda etshi tshionso
Kayeu aha
Bualu bua Yehowa wa misumba
Kadi messager wakalua kudi Shaula ne, Ulue biebe lubilu, kujanguluki, bualu bua Bena Peleshete badi bahaula buloba
Kadi bobu nebajikije tulumbu tukese
Bana balume ba Limona, Muena Bêlota, Lekaba ne Bana, bakalua ku nsubu wa Ishi boshete munda munya, hakadiye mulale tulu
Tudi tukulomba amu ne: wanyishe bua tupitshile mu ditunga diebe

kadi nealumbuluishe bahele ne buakane, Buakane nebuikale mukaba wa mu tshimono tshiandi, Tshimungu netshiule mu nsubu umue ne muana wa mukoko, Mukashi wa ngombe ne nkashama nebidie mashinde hohamue, Muana utshidi wamua mabele neanayile ha mutu ha buina bua nyoka wa dikala, Kabiena bienzela bikuabo bintu bibi, kabiena bishiha bikuabo, Hashishe mu dituku adi Lutonga lua ku miji ya Yishai neluimane bialu bu dibendela dia kusangishaku bisamba bia bantu
Wenze kabidi mushete wa mabaya
Wewe udi kudibo bu muimbi wa misambu ya dinanga, muikale ne dî diakane, ne mumanye mua kuimba tshisanji bimpe; badi bunvua mei ebe, kadi kabena baenza
Mutuangaji neumushe tshitambala tshia ku mutu wa mukaji awu, neamupeshe mu bianza mulambu wa bualu buvuabu ba mubande nabu, kabayi bajadike

Bua kabampandi bu mudi nyama wa ntambue mua kuenza, Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, bingikala muenze bualu ebu; bingikala mufute muntu malu mabi hakadiye n anyi talalâ; bua malu â udi n anyi lukuna angihate, ampete; Yehowa, ujuke biebe mu tshiji tshiebe, Disangisha dia bantu ba ha buloba dikunyunguluke; Yehowa udi ulumbuluisha bantu ba ha buloba
Mvidi Mukulu ujikija kuakula ne Abrahame, kulayanganabu
Hakadiye uya ku Sikelaga, bakuabo ba Bena Manashe bakalamata kudiye, Adena ne Yozabada ne Yediele ne Mikaele ne Yozabada ne Elihu ne Siletai, tupitene tua binunu bia bantu ba Manashe

Mulombi wa bintu wakadiku, dina diandi Lazalo, bakamuladika ku tshibi tshiandi, mubidi wandi wonso wakadi ne mputa; wakasua bamudishe nkototo yakadi imata hanshi ku mesa a muntu mubanshi; mbua mene mene yakalua, yakalaka mputa yandi
Mose wakabanda mu mukuna ne difutu diakabuikila mukuna

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu kadi katangilula, mu mishindu mileeja kudi mêyi a ditunga, diludika dia lupetu lwa mbulamatadi, dia bintu bia mbulamatadi pamwe ne dia lupetu lwa mbulamatadi ya polovensa, ya bitupa bia teletwale bidiludika ne ya biâpu bia mbulamatadi
Nakatangila, ne mena, buloba buakadi bukuamisha mamuma buakalua tshihela, Bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba ne, Buloba buonso nebuikale muaba wa hatuhu, kadi tshiena mbutula bintu bionso tshishiki
Nunku nakabuelamu, nakatangila, ekumona

Yonatana wakatumbisha Davidi kudi tatu wandi Shaula, wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge kenzedi muntu wandi Davidi bualu bubi, bualu bua yeye kena muanze kukuenzela wewe bibi, ne bualu bua malu onso akakuenzeleye adi matambe buimpe; bualu bua yeye wakateka muoyo wandi mu tshianza tshiandi hakashiheye Muena Peleshete, ne Yehowa wakaha Bena Isalele luhandu lunene: wewe wakatangila bualu ebu, wakasanka; wewe udi musue kumatshisha mashi a muntu muakane bua kushiha Davidi udi kayi ne bualu tshinyi
Rakele kuandamuna Yakobe ne: Angata nansha Bila, mupika wanyi ewu, ashale mukajebe, bua alele bana, bikale banyi
Ne nsengu dikumi iwakatangila, ne nyama wa luonji, nebikale ne mukashi wa masandi lukuna, nebimuvuishe bu tshintu tshia hatuhu ne butaka, nebidie munyinyi wandi, nebimushidishe ne kahia
Kadi hakatolokabi, hakatoyabi, luhela luakamueneka

Mbalanda watshi wakatangilangana ne tshiendelu tshia mu lubanza; bifuanyikishi bia mabue a ngashi biakadi ha biluwa biatshi, ku luseke elu ne ku luseke lukuabo; ne tshibandilu tshiatshi tshiakadi ne bidiatshilu muanda mukulu
Kabakahanga tshintu tshimpe tshimue tshiakalaya Yehowa Bena Isalele; bakaheta bintu ebi bionso
Kabena bashîa dibue dimue ha mutu ha dikuabo, nebâsasule buonso buau
Munkatshi mwa midimu eyi, bibambalu bibidi ebi bidi bitwilangana bwa kwenza ne kwanyisha mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda twa Tshisangilu tshinene

Efeso Ne Nzambi wakanuvuisha ne muoyo hanuakadi bafue bua kushiha kuenu kua mikenshi ne bua malu mabi enu, anuakendamu diambedi bu mudi tshikondo tshia buloba ebu, bu mudi mukelenge wa bukokeshi bua mu luhehele, wa nyuma udi wenzesha katataka munkatshi mua bana ba buhidia
Pashishe, kubuikilaye mukuabu pa mutu pende, bua kumulama bimpe, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mutekete tshia bukelenge bua Peka, muana wa Lemalaya, Ahaza, muana wa Yotama, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakabanga kukokesha
Bena Yuda bakamukonka ne, Bidimu biebe kabiena bikumbane makumi atanu, wewe wakumona Abalahama, anyi
Shaula wakambila Davidi ne, Wewe kuena mua kuya bua kuluangana ne Muena Peleshete eu bualu bua wewe utshidi nsongalume ne yeye wakadi muena mata ku bunsongalume buandi tô ne katataka

Bualu bua Davidi udi wamba bualu buandi ne, Nunku mutshima wanyi wakusanka, ludimi luanyi luakuamba disanka dianyi; Bua wewe kuena ushîa muoyo wanyi mu Muaba wa Bafue, Wewe wakunmanyisha nshila ya muoyo; Bana betu, ndi mua kunujukuila bualu bua nkambua wetu Davidi ne, Yeye wakafua, bakamujika, lukita luandi ludi munkatshi muetu tô ne katataka
Mabue neikale dikumi ne abidi bu bungi bua mena a Bena Isalele, nebafunde dina dia tshisamba ne tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele ha dibue ne ha dibue
Muhika kena ushikama mu nsubu wa nfumu wandi tshiendelele; muana udi ushikamamu tshiendelele
Nakakuha meji ne lungenyi; nenkuhe bubanji ne biuma ne butumbi biakadi bakelenge bonso ku mpala kuebe kabayi n abi; kakuena mukuabo udi nkulonda ku nyima neikale n abi kabidi

Udi kai ne buakane ikale kabidi ne malu adi kâi makane; udi mubiha avuishibue biandi kabidi mubiha; udi muakane ikale biandi kabidi ne malu makane; udi wa tshijila avuishibue biandi kabidi wa tshijila
Tangila, badi bawela mu kahia bu nkunyi; kahia kadi kosha nsongo yau ibidi, ne hankatshi hau hakuhia kabidi; badi bamanye mua kuenza n au mudimu kai
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ndiku, mukelenge wanyi
Bualu bua yeye wakabuela mu nsubu wa Nzambi, wakangata bidia bilesha, wakahidia, wakahaku bakadi n andi; biakadi tshijila, anu bakuidi ba Nzambi bakadi badia
Kadi katuena mua kulambula Maweja Nangila milambu mudi bena Izrayele netu bonsu benza bua tshinyi
Bantu bonso batu benza malu mabi au nebumushibue munkatshi mua bana babo

Badi bukuta ne bintu bia manyi bikumbana bia mu nsubu muebe, Kûdi wewe kudi mushimi wa mai a muoyo; Unanukile kulesha luse luebe lujalame kudi badi bakumanye, Dikasa dia diambu kadifiki kundi bua kundiata, Mu muaba wawa benji ba malu mabi badi balala hanshi, Psalms Kunyingabadi bua benji ba malu mabi, Bualu bua nebafubidile tshituha tshihi bu mashinde mataha, Eyemena Yehowa ne enza malu mimpe; Wikale ne disanka diebe mu Yehowa, Uteke nshila webe mu bianza bia Yehowa; Yeye neumueneshe buakane buebe bu mudi munya umueneka, Shala holâ ku mpala kua Yehowa, umuindile ne lutulu
Nunku badi babikila muaba eu ne, Bama, Nunku ambila ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kanuena nudinyanga bu muakenza batatu benu, anyi
Bua bualu ebu bakuidi ba Dagona anyi bakuabo bakadi balue mu nsubu wa Dagona kabena hadiata makasa ku tshibuelelu tshia Dagona mu Ashedodo tô ne lelu
Wowo neubande ha mutu ha mitubu yau yonso, neuhasalale mibungiji yau yonso
Muntu keena mwa kwanji kufunda Mulombodi wa ditunga ne Minisitila Kavulambedi ku tubadi bwa bibawu bikalabo babûnda pambelu pa midimu yabo too ne ku tshikondo tshiaajika bumfumu bwabo
Neumone malu ahita abu
Yeye wakamba ne, Bulelela, ku mushinga bungi nunku
Dikosolola dia teletwale munda mwa polovensa badi badifila kudi dîyi dilongolodi

Tshipwita nansha umwe kabeena mwa kumufunda anyi kumukwata munkatshi mwa midimu to, pa kumbusha bôbu bamukwata tshianza mu tshisaka, ne dianyisha dia Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi batshipwita bakulumpa bilondeshila mwanda
Kadi yeye wakamanya lubombo luabo, wakabambila ne, Nudi nuntetshila munda tshinyi
Kunengi bua kufila bintu bia kunowa kudi Nzambi, ne nvinyo ûdi ukama
Ulongeshe Yoshuwa malu onsu
Bakabika ne dinda, bakahingana, Isaka wakabatuma kuabo, bakaya talala
Hakadiye ushikama ku mukuna wa Oleve buludiludi ne ntempelo, Petelo ne Yakobo ne Yone ne Andele bakamukonka nkayabo ne, Utuambile bualu, malu â nealue dituku kai
Davidi wakakokesha Bena Isalele bonso; Davidi wakalumbuluila bantu bandi bonso biakane, wakabenzela malu makane

Kadi bantu aba bakahingisha Amasaya bua bobo kabayi n andi mu nvita, bakaluangana ne ba mu misoko ya Bena Yuda ku Samalea tô ne ku Bete holona, bakashiha bantu binunu bisatu, bakanyenga bintu bia bungi
Tangilai, batatu hetu bakashihibua ku miele ya nvita, ne bana betu balume ne bana betu bakashi ne bakashi betu hadi mu buhika bua bualu ebu
Pashishe mukalu awu neuye kumpala ufika ku bibandabanda bidi luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua dijiba dia Ngenesarete, too ne ku musulu wa Yardene, bua kushikidila ku Mayi manene a luepu
kadi mu Kilisto tudi tuamba dî ne mitshima mitoke bu mutudi ba kudi Nzambi ne ku mesu kua Nzambi
Dituku dia kumudilu nedikale dituku dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Bila kuimita difu, kulelela Yakobe muana wa balume
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Mukashi, witabushe dî dianyi, diba nedilue dikala bantu kabai batendelela Tatu ku mukuna eu anyi mu Yelushalema
Mukelenge wakamukonka ne, Ka, mulunda, wakubuela munomo, kui ne tshilulu tshia dibanji

Hakambeye nunku, mpata yakajuka hankatshi ha Bafalese ne Basadoke, tshisumbu tshiabo tshiakatahuluka, bualu bua Basadoke batu bamba ne, Kakuena dibika dia bafue anyi muanjelo anyi nyuma; kadi Bafalese badi bitabusha ne, Malu â onso adiku
Amenona wakamba ne, Bantu bonso bakuabo bumuke kundi
Nunku buhianyi bumue kabuena bumuka ku tshisamba ne ku tshisamba, tshisamba ne tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele netshikale ne buhianyi buatshi
Kadi masalayi a Bena Kasada akabalonda ku nyima, akabihata, akaheta Sedekiya mu mpata wa Yeleko
Pamona mukalenga wabu nanku, neanulekele
Kuakungambila ne, Eu udi mukashi wanyi bualu kai
Nedishale bupianyi buebe ne bua ndelanganyi yebe
Bena Isalele bakamona mpala wa Mose ne musunyi wa ha mpala ha Mose wakakonka: Mose wakateka tshilulu tshikudika ha mpala handi kabidi tô ne hakayeye kusomba ne Yehowa
Bakeluba bakabanda mulu
Bualu bua wewe wakahidia dî dia Yehowa yeye kabidi wakakuhidia bua wewe kuikala mukelenge

Luka Yeye wakabelela lusumuinu bua kubamanyisha ne, Mbimpe bia nuenu kutendelela Nzambi matuku onso, kanuhangi; wakamba ne, Mu musoko mukuabo muakadi njuji, yeye kakadi utshina Nzambi, kakadi unemeka bantu; mu musoko au kabidi muakadi mukashi wa mu lufuila; wakalua kudiye misangu ya bungi, wakamuambila ne, Unsombuele kudi udi n anyi lukuna
Bakulu bonso ne bantu bonso bakamuambila ne, Kunvu dî diandi nansha, kuitabushi nansha
Ngondo wa kumudilu, mu matuku dikumi ne anai, diba dia dilolo, ndituku dia kuhita kua Yehowa
Abimeleke wakashikama ku Aluma; ne Zebula wakihata Gala ne bana babo bua bobo kabashikami mu Shekeme
Yeye wakasungula dikumi ne babidi, bua kuikalabo n andi ne bua kubatumeye bua kuambila bantu bualu bua Nzambi, ne bua kuikalabo ne bukole bua kumusha bademon
Wewe, muntu wa Nzambi, wakufuma mu Yuda, anyi
Meme kabidi nengumushe mesu anyi kudi muntu au, nemmumushe munkatshi mua bana babo, bualu bua yeye wakafua muana wandi kudi Moleke bua kuona nsubu wanyi ne kunyangisha dina dianyi dia tshijila
Tshikondu tshivuabu balele Izake, Abrahame uvua mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama
Uvua mundaye ne: Neulele bana ba bungi
Hanuadia ne hanuanua, kanuena nudia, kanuena nunua anu bua kudisankisha, anyi
Mukelenge wakafuma ku tshibunda tshiandi, wakabuela mu nsubu wa kudia kabidi; Hamana wakamana kudiela ha ditanda hakadi Esetê
Balaka, muana mulume wa Sipô, wakatangila malu onso akenzela Bena Isalele Bena Amole

Nzambi wakambila Solomo ne, Bua bualu ebu buakadi mu mutshima webe, wewe kuakundomba bubanji ne biuma, nansha butumbi, nansha mioyo ya badi n ebe lukuna, nansha matuku a bungi ha buloba, kadi wakundomba meji ne lungenyi bia kukokesha n abi bantu banyi banakukuhingishila mukelenge ku mutu kuabo
Biahia mudimu wa muntu, neajimishe mudimu eu wonso, kadi yeye mene neasungidibue, kadi anu bu muntu musambuke kahia
Yeye wakangata masalayi ne tupitene lubilu, wakanyema kudibo

Numbers Bena Isalele bakashikama mu Shitima, bantu bakabanga kuenda masandi ne bana bakashi ba Bena Moaba, bualu bua bakabikila bantu ku milambu ya nzambi yabo, ne bantu bakadia, bakinamina nzambi yabo
Hakamba diba kubuela, Yoshua wakela dî diandi ne bakahatuka ku mitshi, bakabela mu lubuebue luakadibo basokome, bakateka mabue manene ku mushiku wa lubuebue, adiku tô ne ku dituku edi mene mene
Bakakulela diambedi mikuna kayiyi mianze kufukibua, anyi
Lelu nengendakane munkatshi mua bimuna biebe bionsu

Mâko Mu matuku au tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu tshiakadiku kabidi, kabakadi ne tshia kudia; Yesu wakabikila bayidi bandi, wakabambila ne, Ndi ne bantu aba luse, bualu bua bobo bakusomba n anyi matuku asatu, kabena ne tshia kudia; binabatuma kuabo ne nsala, nebahange mu nshila; bakuabo mbafume kule
Bena Yuda bakaya ku Gilegala bua kusangakenabo ne mukelenge wabo, ne bua kusambula mukelenge Yadene

Tuakanyenga misoko yandi yonso tshikondo atshi, tuakahaula musoko ne musoko muakadi bantu, ne bakashi ne bana bakese: katuakashiya nansha muntu; kadi tuakadiangatshila bimuna, ne bintu biakadi mu misoko ituakanyenga

Nunku badi balua kûdi bu muakadibo balua diambedi, ne badi bashikama ku mpala kuebe badifuanyikisha bu bantu banyi; badi bunvua mei ebe, kadi kabena baenza; badi ne dinanga dinene ku mishiku, kadi mitshima yabo idi mitangisha ku luhetu luabo

Mu diba adi dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ne, Utumine badi mu buhika ebu ai edi ne, Yehowa udi wamba bua Shemaya, Muena Nehelama ne, Bualu bua Shemaya wakunuambila mei a, ne meme tshiena mumutume nansha, ne yeye wakunuenzesha bua nuenu kueyemena mei a mashimi; nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, nenkengeshe Shemaya, Muena Nehelama, ne bana bandi kabidi
Mahalata uvua muanabu ne Nebayote
Bikala mukashi kai ne tshilulu tshibuikila ku mutu, bakose nsuki yandi kabidi; kadi bikala bundu bukuata mukashi bua dikosa anyi dibeya dia nsuki yandi, abuikile tshilulu ku mutu
Yeye wakadila kudi Yehowa, ne Yehowa wakamulesha mu tshi, wakawela mu mai, mai akalua mimpe
Bualu bua meme hanyi nengikale kudiye bu lumbu lua kahia lumunyunguluke, ne nengikale butumbi buandi munkatshi muabo
Tatuebe udi ukuela lupemba, lupite ne luvua baledi banyi bangele meme
Nunku nuye bienu bualu bua nenumusangane ha diba edi
Nyuma ngudi uha muoyo, mubidi kawena wenza bualu; mei anakunuambila adi nyuma ne muoyo
Nunku Yoshua wakosha Ai ne kahia, wakunguisha bionso biakadimu mushiki tshiendelele, wakahaudibua tô ne ku dituku edi
Bonsu pamue:
Wakadianjila kuidikisha luseke lua ku esete ne luidi, luakadi coudées nkama itanu bu tshidikishilu tshia luidi

Yehoyada muakuidi wakahatuka ne tupitene tua bantu lukama tuakadi ku mutu kua bantu, wakatuambila ne, Muihatai hadiye wenda munkatshi mua bantu, muntu wamulonda, numushihe ne muele wa nvita; bualu bua muakuidi wakamba ne, Kanumushihi mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mei enu akadi annyoka

Mose wakasungula balume ba lungenyi lule ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, wakabateka bakokeshi ha mutu ha bantu, bakokeshi ba bantu tshinunu ne ba bantu lukama ne ba bantu makumi atanu ne ba bantu dikumi
Nunku bantu bakasungila Yonatana, kakafua nansha
Bakalua ne muana wa mpunda kudi Yesu, bakateka bivualu biabo ha nyima handi, Yesu wakashikama ha nyima handi

bulongolodi budi butangila: a b c mêyi maludiki a bungenda mushinga, mwikalamu dikuba, diaasa ne dianyisha dia kumpanyi; mêyi ne mikandu, bulongolodi bwa nzubu ya mashika; mêyi maludiki a bulongolodi ne bukookeshi bwa beena nsambu ne mêyi maludiki a mianda ya beena nsambu; d e f g h i j k l m n o bulongolodi budi butangila midimu ya badi baditambakeena; bulongolodi bwa mianda ya midimu butangila bu mudi mêyi adi aludika nsombelu wa bamfumu ne beena mudimu ,bukubi bwa beena mudimu,tuludiki tudi tutangila dikuba dia bantu mu musoko ne nangananga, tuludiki tudi tutangila dikubisha dia bantu ne dipangila dia mudimu, kadiyi dielela menji; bulongolodi bwa mianda ya bubanji butangila mêyi adi atangila majimba, bia mwinshi mwa buloba ne mafuta a bia mwinshi mwa buloba, matanda, bifidi bia midilu ne dilama dia makookeshi a kwa Nzambi; bulongodi budi butangila bufuki mu lungenyi ne midimu ya bianza; bulongolodi budi butangila manga ne midimu ya londapu, didimwija ku masaama, bu mudi mankenda a mubidi, mankenda a miaba ya tshinsangansanga ne dikuba dia bamamu ne bâna, bulongolodi butangila mudimu wa balambi ba manga, disumbisha dia manga, dibweela dia mu ditunga dia benda ne dipitshilamu, tuludiki twa mianda ya bukole ne makanda a mubidi tutangila matunga abidi ne tutangila bukwa matunga, bulongolodi budi butangila mankenda ku mudimu, ditwangaja dipiluke dia biâpu bia manga ne diabanya dia bangangabuka; dîyi didi ditangila mianda ya masungulangana; bulongolodi butangila dilamba, diludika, dibiikidisha, dipatula ne disumbisha dia maluvu makola mengula; bulongolodi butangila dilamba, dibiikidisha ne dipatula ne disumbisha dia maluvu makolesha ne adi kaayi makolesha; bulongolodi butangila difula, dibiikidisha ne dipatula ne dipitshisha dia biamwa bia mvita; bulongolodi butangila dimitshisha dia mukaji ku biamwa , diludika dia mamanya a pa bivuba ne a pa ditentemuna dia bitupa bia mubidi ne bia misunya ya mubidi; bulongolodi butangila beena tshimwangi,badibo bipata ne badi banyeema; bulongolodi butangila diangatshibwa ku midimu ya manga ne ku midimu mikwabo ne ditambakana

Bantu bakuabo ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne batuadi ba majitu ne bimbi ba misambu ne Bena Netinima ne bonso bakadilamununa kudi bena buloba bua kulondabo mikenji ya Nzambi ne bakashi babo ne bana babo balume ne bana babo bakashi ne muntu yonso wakadi ne lungenyi lua kujingulula malu bakalamata kudi bana babo ne kudi bantu babo banene, bakadiela mulau, bakaditshiha bua kulondabo mikenji ya Nzambi yakabambileye kudi Mose, muntu wa Nzambi, ne bua kutumikilabo mikenji yonso ya Yehowa, Mukelenge wetu, ne mikenji yandi mijalame ne mei andi mafunda
Maweja Nangila kuambila kabidi Moshe ne: Pikala mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kayi ukuteleja, bidi amu bua mmone mua kuenza bishima bia bungi mu Ejipitu
Hakalua dituku disatu ne dinda, makubakuba ne miele ya nvula ne difutu difike biakadi ha mukuna, ne di dia mpungi diakatamba bukole, bantu bonso bakadi mu tshitudilu bakazakala
Meme tshiakaha ba mu nsubu wa tatu webe milambu yonso yakosha Bena Isalele ha kahia, anyi
Nunku tshiji tshikole tshia Yehowa wa misumba tshiakaha kudibo
Kadi matuku makuabo nealue; habanyengabo mubaki wa mukashi, nebajile bia kudia matuku au
Bualu udi ne disama dia nsudi, dimuenekela mu tshibangu tshia tshiwuja
Tangila, muanjelo wa Mukelenge wakimana ha buihi n andi, dinkenka diakatema mu nsubu; wakatuta Petelo ha mbale, wakamubisha ku tulu, wakamba ne, Juka lukasa

Nunku bakaya kudi mukelenge, bakamukonka bua mukandu wa mukelenge ne, Wewe mukelenge, kuakufunda dina diebe ha mukanda wamba ne, Muntu yonso walomba bualu kudi nzambi mukuabo anyi kudi muntu mukuabo mu matuku au makumi asatu, kayi ubulomba kûdi nkayebe, mukelenge, bamuele mu buina bua ntambue, anyi

Bualu bua Nzambi udi Mukelenge wa ba ha buloba bonso; Nzambi udi ukokesha ku mutu kua bisamba bia bantu; Bakokeshi ba bantu badi badisangisha hamue Psalms Yehowa udi munene, udi muakane bua kumutumbisha bikole Mukuna wa Siona udi mulengele mu kubanda kuau mulu, Nzambi wakudimanyisha mu mbalasa yau bu tshinyemenu tshile

Nunku nakamusela ku bituha bia argent dikumi ne bitanu, ne ku homer Nakamuambila ne, Bûdi n abu mbua kuikala muena kuanyi matuku a bungi; kulondi malu a masandi, kuikadi mukashi wa muntu mukuabo; ne meme nengikale muomumue kûdi
Nakanuha miaba yonso inuadiata muinshi mua makasa enu bu munakambila Mose
Tshilota tshidi tshia hushuwa ne dijingulula diatshi didi dilelela
Yeye wakamba ne, Wewe udi mumanye bualu bunakuluila kûdi, anyi
Kadi meme udi nuambila ne, Kanuluanganyi ne muntu mubi; biakukuma muntu dihi ku ditama dia ku tshianza tshia balume, umuandamuine dia ku bakashi kabidi

Kabena bashikama mu tshilumbuluidi tshia bantu banyi, kabena bikala ne mena abo mafunda mu mikanda ya mena a ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele, ne kabena bamanye mua kubuela mu buloba bua Isalele; hashishe nenumanye ne, Ndi Yehowa
Davidi wakadilama bu muena lungenyi mu nshila yandi yonso; Yehowa wakadi n andi
Lea wakimita difu, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Lubena, bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa wakatangila dikenga dianyi, ne katataka bayanyi neansue
Biakusumbishabo Muena Ebelu mulume anyi Muena Ebelu mukashi, yeye neakukuatshile mudimu bidimu bisambombo; kadi hafika tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete wewe neumulekele
Mulau wa Tuishi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ubike ne dinda dionso, uye kudi Palô hayeye ku mai, umuambile ne, Yehowa udi Wamba ne, Ulekele bantu banyi, baye kuntendelela
Muana eu Samuele wakadiunda, wakaleha mu diakalengele kudi Yehowa ne kudi bantu kabidi
Bimenga bionso bia Bena Gêshona ku meku abo biakadi dikumi ne bisatu ne miaba yabi ya ku matshika

Hashishe, ushihe biebe mulondo au ku mesu kua bantu badi bakuha, ubambile ne, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Nembutule bantu aba ne musoko eu bu mudi muntu ushiha mulondo wa mufumbi udibo kabayi bamanye mua kufumba bua kuikalau mujima kabidi; nebajike bantu mu Tofete bualu bua kakuena kushala munga muaba bua kubajika
Bualu bua â adi matuku a disombuela, bua kushikisha malu onso akafundibua mu Mukanda wa Nzambi
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Tshiakubatuma
Bantu aba, ndi mubabenge, bualu bavua benza bibi bipite
Bakamba ne, Bakuabo badi bamba ne, Yeye udi Yone Mubatiji, bakuabo ne, Yeye udi Eliya; bakuabo ne, Yeye udi Yelemiya anyi muprofete mukuabo
Dituku dia kumudilu nedikale dituku dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Bubanshi buenu buakoneka, bivualu bienu biakudibua kudi bishi
Udi unuipatshila baluishi benu, nuenu batangile, unuamba bua kubabutula

Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Nenkumbashe matuku a kulela bana, Buonso buenu badi bamunange, Bua nuamue mabele a kunusamba kuandi, Bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba dî edi ne, Bu mudi muntu udi mamu andi usamba, Nenumone malu â, ne mitshima yenu neyisanke; Bua, monai, Yehowa nealue mu kahia, Bualu bua Yehowa neashikishe dikosa diandi dia bilumbu ne kahia, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Badi badidila ne badi badilengesha bua kubuelabo mu bibidi bua kutendelela, balonda muntu wa munkatshi muabo, badia munyinyi wa ngulube, wa tshintu tshibi ne wa kahuku, nebalue ku nshikidilu wabo hohamue

Katataka ndi nuambila ne, Ehukai kudi bantu aba, kanubenzedi bualu; bualu bua bikala lungenyi elu anyi mudimu eu bia bantu, nebijimine; kadi bikala bualu ebu bua Nzambi, kanuena bamanye mua kubuhumbisha; nunku nebansangane nuluisha Nzambi nvita
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele nunku kadi bobo kabakatumikila dî dia Mose bualu bua kanyinganyinga ka mutshima, ne bua dikenga dia buhika
Nganyi udi bu wewe, udi ne butumbi bua tshijila, udi utshinyisha bantu ne bienzedi bia butumbi, udi wenza malu a kukema

Mu bidimu bisambombo nukune bintu mu buloba, nuhuole bintu bidi bikumbana, kadi tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete nushiye buloba bua kututuka ne bualu bua bantu bahele ba munkatshi muenu badie bintu, ne bintu bidibo bashiye, nyama ya mu mpata neyibidie
Pashishe mashi adi mashale, mutuangaji ayitshikije kuinshi kua tshilambuilu atshi

Mukelenge Wakenza ngabu ya or yakatulabo nkama ibidi: bujitu bua or ya mu ngabu umue buakadi nshekele Wakenza ngabu ya or yakatulabo nkama isatu; bujitu bua or ya mu ngabu umue buakadi mines Mukelenge Wakenza nkuasa munene e wa bukelenge wa mibanga, wakalamika tshiamu tshia or ha nyima n andi honso
Nanku divuba divua dimane pankatshi pa mitanda ya bena Izrayele ne mitanda ya bena Ejipitu, ditokeshila bena Izrayele, difila midima kudi bena Ejipitu
Yehowa wakabambila ne, Monai, yeye wakadisokoka munkatshi mua bintu
Nunku mu tshikondo atshi nuakadi ne mamuma kai mu malu adi anufuisha bundu katataka
Nakamuambila ne, Mukelenge wanyi, wewe udi mumanye
Bualu bua dituku diudi uhatuka usabuka kasulu ka Kidelona, umanye biebe ne, Wewe neufue bulelela: mashi ebe neikale ha mutu hebe
Kadi yeye wakamanya budimu buabo, wakabambila ne

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bantu nebasumbe madimi ku biuma, nebafunde mena abo mu mikanda, nebayilamike ne bimanyinu, nebabikile bamanyi ba bualu, mu buloba bua Benyamina ne mu miaba yonso idi ha buihi ne Yelushalema, ne mu misoko ya mu Yuda, ne mu misoko ya ku mikuna ne mu misoko ya mu tshibanda ne mu misoko ya ku luseke lua Sude; bualu bua nenkudimure buhika buabo bua kubahingashila diakalengele diabo

Nunku imanai bienu, bamane kusuika bulelela mu bifuka bienu bu mukaba, bamane kuteka buakane bu tshibuikilu tshia ha tshiadi; bamane kubuesha makasa enu mu bisabata bia kudilongolola kua lumu luimpe lua ditalala
Bua mu tshikondo atshi tuakadi ne bintu bia kudia bikumbane, tuakadi ne diakalengele, katuakamona dikenga
Paudi mumukebe kuyi mumusangane, nanku alame bintu bidiye nabi abi
Bakashiha bionso biakadi mu musoko ku miele yabo, balume ne bakashi, bana ne bakulumpe, ngombe ne mikoko ne mpunda
Umpe mitanda ya bidia itanu mu tshianza tshianyi, anyi bintu bikuabo biudi n abi
Yehowa udi Wamba kabidi ne, Mona, nenkubishile bualu bubi mu nsubu webe mene; nenunyenge bakashi bebe ku mesu kuebe, nembafile kudi muena mutumba n ebe, nealale ne bakashi bebe mu munya
Mukenji eu newikale kudiye ne kudi bana bandi badi banulonda ku nyima tô ne tshiendelele
Nshikidilu wafiki, nshikidilu wafiki, udi unutabalela; monai, udi ulua
Hakambeye nunku, wakaya, wakabikila muan abo Malia mu busokoko, wakamuambila ne, Muyishi wakulua, udi ukubikila
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuidikishe mua kubuela ku mushiku wa mbelu mubumbakane; ndi nuambila ne, Ba bungi nebakebe kubuelaku, nebahange

Tshiole tshinene tshiakadi mu Samalea; bakatshintshimika musoko tô ne hakahanabo mutu wa nyama wa mpunda ku nshekele Hakadi mukelenge wa Isalele wendakana ha mutu ha lumbu lua musoko, mukashi mukuabo wakadila kudiye ne, Mukelenge, unkuatshishe
Bitata abi nebishale tshivulukilu kudi bena Izrayele
Mose wakambila Nzambi ne, Meme ndi nganyi bua kuya kudi Palo ne bua buhatula Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu
Davidi ne bantu bandi bakaya ku Kila, bakaluangana ne Bena Peleshete, bakabashiha ne kushiha kukole, bakahingana ne ngombe yabo
Kabuyi bunyangakaja bulongolodi bwa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi, bulongolodi bwa tunungu , , , , ne budi butangila, bilondeshila dishintuluka dia maalu, Bimamwenda wa bukalenga bia mu polovensa
Eu mmukalu wa ku luseke lua nôde
Hanakadi ngelangana meshi nunku, nakadi ne kutatakana, anyi
Bualu bubi bua Peô budi bututamba bukese, anyi

Bintu bionso biakangatabo kudi bena nvita biakadi mikoko binunu nkama isambombo ne makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu, ne ngombe binunu makumi muanda mutekete ne bibidi, ne nyama ya mpunda binunu makumi asambombo ne tshinunu tshimue, ne bakashi binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi badi kabayi banze kumanyibua kudi balume
Wewe wakumpa muoyo ne wakundesha luse lujalame, kadi wewe wakadi usokoka malu â mu mutshima webe
Bena Isalele bakavula bintu bia kudilengesha n abi ku mukuna wa Holeba tô ne ku mpala kuakadibo baya
Bana bakese, nudi ba Nzambi, nuakubahita bukole; bualu bua yeye udi munda muenu udi uhita yeye udi wa mu buloba bunene

Kadi biashala bakuabo bahanduke, nebashale, bana balume ne bana bakashi, nebahatukemu bua kulua kunudi, nuenu nenumone bienzedi biabo ne midimu yabo, nenusambibue bua makenga anakutumina Yelushalema, bua malu au onso mene anakubatumina
Nunku nakaudia; ne wakadi mutue nse nse bu buitshi mukana muanyi

Bakahitshila mu buloba bua Midiyana, bakafika ku Palana; bakangata bantu ba mu Palana, bakafika n abo mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku mesu kua Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu; yeye wakamuha nsubu ne bintu bia kudia ne madimi
Ku nyima kuandi bakalongolola kudi bana babo, Bawai, muana wa Henedada, mukokeshi wa tshituha tshia luseke lua Kila

Wakakema ne bonso bakadi n andi bualu bua bungi bua minyinyi yakakuatabo; Yakobo ne Yone, bana ba Zebedayo, ba bilembi ne Simona, bakakema kabidi Yesu wakambila Simona ne, Kutshinyi, katataka tô ne tshiendelele wewe neukuate bantu

Filemona Paulo, umena lukanu wa Kilisto Yesu, ne Timote muan etu wa mu Kilisto, kudi Filemona munangibue ne muenu mudimu n etu, ne kudi Apia, muan etu mukashi wa mu Kilisto, ne kudi Âkipo, disalayi n etu dia Yesu, ne kudi ekelesia wa mu nsubu wandi: Ngasa ikale n enu ne ditalala bia kudi Nzambi Tatu wetu ne kudi Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto
Ndayi nutusumbile ntete ayi bua tumone mua kushala ne muoyi

Hakunvueye lumu ne, Tîhaka, mukelenge wa Atiopa, ulualua bua kuluangana n ebe, wakatuma ba messager kudi Hezikiya kabidi ne, Nuambile Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne, Nzambi webe ûdi weyemena kakudingi nansha ne, Kabena bafila musoko wa Yelushalema mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Ashû
Bantu aba Mose ne Alona mbantu bakambila Yehowa ne, Hatulai Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Ejipitu ku misumba yabo
Bakuabo nebababikile ne, Buloba bua bubi, ne Bantu badi Yehowa n abo tshiji tshiendelele
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Udi ushiha ngombe udi muomumue ne muntu udi ushiha munga muntu; Meme kabidi nembasunguile malu adi abatatshisha, Nuenu badi bazakala hanunvua dî diandi, Unvuai
Tangilai, yeye udi ulua ne matutu; ne disu dionso nedimumone, ne bobo bine bakamutua difuma nebamumone; ne bisamba bionso bia ha buloba nebidile muadi bua bualu buandi
Yehowa wakuamba tshinyi
Bâzilai wakebesha mukelenge ne, Matuku a muoyo wanyi adi bungi munyi bua meme kuya ne mukelenge ku Yelushalema
Bu muakafundabo ne, Muntu wa kumudilu, Adama, wakalua musûke udi ne muoyo

Tangila, hantshidi muimane hehi ne mushimi wa mai, ne bana bakashi ba bena musoko bakadi balua bua kusunabo mai, witabushe ne nsongakashi undi ngambila ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Utule mulondo webe wa mai, umpe mai a kunua, yeye angandamune di ne, Nua biebe, nennuishe tumelo biebe kabidi, nunku yeye mene ikale mukashi uwakasunguila muntu webe Isaka, nunku nemmanye ne wewe wakufuila mukelenge wanyi luse
Nunku bakalua ne Danyele ku mpala kua mukelenge
Bana ba balume ba Esheke muan abo: Ulama muan a bute wandi, ne Yeusha muana muibidi ne Elifelete muisatu
Kadi nuenu, kanuikadi nunku; udi mutambe bakuabo munkatshi muenu alue biandi muakunyi; udi biandi nfumu alue muena mudimu
Judges Bena Efelayima bakadisangisha hamue, bakaya ku luseke lua ku node; bakambila Yefeta ne, Wewe wakasabuka bua kuluangana ne Bena Amona, kuakatubikila bua tuetu kuya n ebe bualu kai
Bena bilengulengu bakambila Palo ne, Bualu ebu budi bu munu wa Yehowa, kadi mutshima wa Palô wakakoleshibua, yeye kakabunvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Bualu tshintu tshia nanku, tshidi tshiumbusha mulumbuluishi, nansha yeye muntu wa meji, ku ba muanda, tshimutuma ku ba wetu, bua kunyangaye bilumbu bia bantu
Samuele wakebesha Shaula ne, Wakantatshisha bua kumbisha nunku bualu kai
Bakasangana mashi a baprofete ne a basanto ne a bonso bakashihibua ha buloba munkatshi muau
Ebu mbualu bua hatuhu kabidi

Numbers Hashishe hakashika disama, Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Eleazâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi ne, Nubale bungi bua bantu ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele, ba mu bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, badi bamanye mua kuya mu nvita ya Bena Isalele
Abishai, muan abo ne Yoaba, wakadi ku mutu kua bantu basatu; yeye wakela difuma diandi kudi bantu nkama isatu, wakabashiha, wakadi ne dina dia butumbi munkatshi mua bantu aba basatu
Bualu bua udi ne mashi munda muau; wakela ha dibue didi hatuhu, ne kakâhongoluela hanshi ha buloba bua luhuishi luabuikile
Aba mbana ba Shobala Aluwana ne Manahata ne Ebala ne Shofo ne Onama

Nakaha Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada buloba buonso ku Gilada tô ne ku hankatshi ha tshibanda tshia Ânona tô ne ku kasulu ka Yaboka ku butshika bua Bena Amona; ne buloba bua Alabâ kabidi ne tshibanda tshia Yadene ku Kinelete tô ne ku dishiha dia Alabâ, Dishiba dia Luehu, kuinshi kua mukuna wa Pisega ku esete
Bobo badi bamba kunkuma ne mabue

Samuel Hakahita matuku asatu, Davidi ne bantu bandi bakafika ku Sikelaga; Bena Amaleka bakadi bafuma ku Sude, bahaula bintu, bakabutula Sikelaga, bakawosha ne kahia; bakakuata bakashi bu bahika ne bonso bakadimu, ne banene ne bakese; kabakashiha umue wabo, bakabatuala, bakaya n abo
Dikopu dimue dia tshiamu tshia mpawungi divua dia bujitu bua grame
