Yeye wakamba kabidi ne, Ndi ne bualu bua kukuambila
Yeye wakateka bintu biakajidila tatu wandi ne bintu biakajidileye nkayandi bia argent ne bia or ne mpanza mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Kakuena umue wabo washala, bualu bua nenvuishe ntatu kudi bantu ba ku Anatota, tshikondo tshia kubala malu mabi abo mene
Hakambeye nunku, wakamuambila ne, Undonde
Mu dituku adi nenkebe kubutula bisamba bionso bidi bilua kuluisha ba mu Yelushalema

Bakahingana, bakabikila balami ba tshibi tshia musoko, bakabambila ne, Tuetu biakafuma ku tshitudilu tshia Bena Sulia, kabakatangila muntu, katuakunvua dî dia muntu; kadi tuhalu ne nyama ya mpunda biakadi bisuikibue, ne ntenta yakashala hatuhu
Mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Yeye udi ne bua kuya n ebe bua tshinyi

Yolama wakalua ne malonga a tshiamu tshia argent ne a or ne a tshiamu tshia mitaku: ebi kabidi biakajidileye mukelenge Davidi kudi Yehowa bu muakajidileye Yehowa argent ne or bia bisamba bionso biakahiteye bukole; bia mu Sulia ne bia mu Moaba ne bia Bena Amona ne bia Bena Peleshete ne bia Bena Amaleka ne biakanyengeye kudi Hadadezê, muana wa Lehoba, mukelenge wa mu Soba
Bualu bua Môdekai wakadi muntu munene mu nsubu wa mukelenge, ne lumu luandi luakafika ku nseke yonso; bualu bua muntu eu Môdekai wakadiundadiunda mu butumbi buandi
Nungambile, ne meme nemuhingishilebi
Eleazâ, muana wa Dodo, Muena Ahoa, wakadi umue wa bena bukitu bandi basatu wakadi ku nyima kuandi
Bakafuma kudi kunyi hakuluabo kudi
Paulo wakasua aye n andi
Hashishe, yeye wakebesha balume ba mu musoko ne, Mukashi au wa masandi wakadi ku Enayima udi kudi kunyi
Kanungu ka Bukalenga bwa mbulamatadi budi ne tshia kwenza mwaabo mônso bwa kujimija kashidi tshinyangu tshia bulume ne bukaji tshienza bu njila wa kusendekela anyi wa kupandulwila nende dîku
Ahaba wakakonka ne, Ku bianza bia nganyi
Bakabanga kusanka
Wewe neubale bungi bua bintu kudi mundi mulume udi ne bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ku bi dimu makumi asambombo bu nshekele ya argent makumi atanu bu nshekele udibo bafila mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Buloba bua Ejipitu nebuikale tshihela tshia hatuhu ne tshikulu; nunku nebamanye ne, Ndi Yehowa
Mu dituku adi nenudie bua mukelenge unuakadisunguila, kadi Yehowa kena ununvuila mu dituku adi nansha
Mukelenge wanyi, eu udi mukashi ne eu udi muana wandi wakabisha Elisha ku lufu
Bulelela, nakalama bintu bia muntu eu mu tshihela tshianana, nansha tshintu tshiandi tshimue tshiakajimina; ne yeye wakushintakasha bubi ku buimpe
Maweja Nangila kupatula bena Izrayele mu Ejipitu, balondangane mu bisamba biabu
Buloba nebuike biakudia bivule
Yesu wakatshinguluka, wakamba ne, Bana bakashi ba Yelushalema, kanunjingi, nudijinge, nujinge bana benu
Kakuena muntu udi mumanye mua kudivuila kundi, hikala Tatu wakuntuma kai mumukoke; ne meme nemubishe dituku dia kunshikidilu
Elazare, muana wa Arone, uvua musele muana wa Putiyele
Nakamba ne, Muntu bu meme udi ne bua kunyema bua tshinyi
Mutshi wakadiunda, wakalua mukole, lusongo luau luakafika mu diulu, wakamueneka kudi ba kunfudilu kua buloba
Bana ba Hebelone: Yeliya kahita, Amalia muibidi ne Yahaziele muisatu ne Yakemama muinai

Tshianza tshia mufuba tshidi tshimuvuisha muhele, Udi uhuola mu tshikondo tshia munya mukole udi muana mulume wa meji, Masanka adi ha mutu ha muntu muakane, Tshivulukidi tshia muntu muakane tshidi tshivudisha disanka, Muena mutshima wa meji udi witabusha mikenji, Udi wenda ne mutshima mutoke kena ne ditshina, Udi uvinya disu diandi udi mbisha kanyinganyinga, ne muena Mukana mua muntu muakane mudi mushimi wa muoyo, Lukuna ludi lusonsola nvita, Badi basangana meji mukana mua muntu udi ujingulula mianda, Bena meji badi baditekela lungenyi, Biuma bia mubanji bidi musoko wandi wa ngumbu; buhele bua bantu bahele budi kubutuka kuabo
Nunku Yoaba ne bantu bakadiye n abo bakasemena ha buihi ne Bena Sulia bua kuluangana n abo; bobo bakanyema ku mpala kuandi

Kadi biamba muhika au mubi munda munda ne, Nfumu wanyi kena ulua katataka; biabangeye kukuma bahika n andi, biadieye bidia, bianueye mitutu hohamue ne badi bakuatshike maluvu, nfumu wa muhika au nealue dituku didiye kai mutekemene ne ha diba didiye kai mumanye, neamukose hankatshi, neamuteke mu luseke lua bena lubombo; muadi newikalemu ne kusumakana menu

Bualu bua dî dia Nzambi didi ne muoyo ne bukole, didi dihita muele wonso musakisha nseke ibidi kutua, didi ditubula tô ne ku dihandulula dia muoyo ne nyuma, ne dia manungu ne buongo bua mikuha, didi dijingulula lukasa meshi ne mata adi mutshima musue kuenza
Nuvuluke dituku dia Lumingu, didi dituku dia tshijila kunudi, mundi yonso udi wona dituku adi nebamushihe, mundi yonso udi wenza mudimu dituku adi, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Ntshidi ne bukole lelu, bu munakadi n abu dituku diakantuma Mose; bu muakadi Bukole buanyi dituku adi, mbu mutshidibu katataka, bua kuluangana nvita ne bua kuya ne bua kuhingana
Ebu mbuhianyi bua tshisamba tshia Bena Shimeona ku meku abo
Musoko udi muibaka muakanangane ku matumba anai, ne bule buau budi muomumue ne butshia; ne wakidikisha musoko ne dilenga, kilometa binunu bibidi, nkama ibidi, makumi anai
Mu tshisaka tshivua kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, tshikale ne mampa kaayi mela buanga, Moshe kuangata diampa dimue kadiyi diela buanga, mukata muenza ne mafuta, kabidi ne kakata kakese
Kolinto Tshiena ne budishikaminyi, anyi
Abalahama wakamba bua Sala, mukashi wandi, ne, Yeye udi muan etu mukashi, ne Abimeleke, mukelenge wa Gelâ, wakatuma bantu, bakangata Sala

Ku butshika bua musoko nenuidikishe ku luseke lua ku esete coudées binunu bibidi, ne ku luseke lua ku Sude coudées binunu bibidi, ne ku luseke lua ku wesete coudées binunu bibidi, ne ku luseke lua ku nôde coudées binunu bibidi Buloba ebu bua ku matshika a misoko nebuikale buhianyi buabo
Mona, hakadiye uyikila ne mukelenge nunku, Natana muprofete wakabuela
Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa udi Wamba ne, Umbulai mitubu mu tshibanda etshi tshionso
Bakafila mikenji ya mukelenge mu bianza bia miloho ya mukelenge ne kudi ba gouverneur bakadi dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata; bobo bakakuatshisha bantu ne mudimu wa nsubu wa Nzambi
Kanushimianganyi, bualu bua nuakamana kuvula muntu mukulukulu ne bienzedi biandi, nuakaluata muntu muhia muhia udi uvuishibua muhia muhia mu dimanya dilelela, bu mudi tshifuanyikishi tshia Mumufuki

Hakadibo kabai badie musangu mule, Paulo wakimana munkatshi muabo, wakamba ne, Balumiana, biakadi bimpe bia nuenu kunvua dî dianyi; bu nuenu benze nunku, kanuakadi kumuka ku Kuleta, kanuakadi kuikala ne bualu bukole ebu ne bua dibutuisha dia bintu

Bena Isalele bakatuma miloho kudi Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, ne, Witabushe bua tuetu tuhitshile ku buloba buebe, katuena tusesuka mu madimi anyi mu madimi a tumuma, katuena tunua mai a mena a mai anuakumbula, netulonde anu mu musesu wa mukelenge tô ne hatuahita ku butshika bua buloba buebe
Bana babo bakahingasheye mu muaba wabo Yoshua wakabatengula; bualu bua kabakadi batengudibue mu nshila
Nyuma Muimpe neanuyishe mua kuamba ha diba adi
Bakamuambila ne, Tuetu tuyaya n ebe

Yesu wakamukandika, wakamuhatula lukasa, wakamuambila ne, Kuambidi muntu bualu ebu; uye biebe, udileshe kudi muakuidi, ufile biakamba Mose bu tshimanyishilu ku mesu kua bantu bualu bua kulengeshibua kuebe
Bena Isalele bakakonka Samuele ne, Nganyi wakamba ne, Shaula neatukokeshe
Kapitene ka bansentedi kakakuata Yelemiya, kakamuambila ne, Yehowa Nzambi webe wakahisha bena musoko eu ne mulau eu

Mukalu wa ku luseke lua ku nôde wakadi ku tshinkonya tshia mai tshiakadi kunshikidilu kua Yadene; mukalu wakabandila ku Bete hogola, wakayila ku nôde kua Bete alabâ; mukalu wakabandila ku dibue dia Bohana, muana wa Lubena; mukalu wakabandila ku Debî ku tshibanda tshia Akola, wakayila ku nôde kudi kutangilangana ne Gilegala udi kuinshi kua mukuna wa Adumima, udi ku muelelu wa musulu wa ku sude; mukalu wakayila ku mai a Ene shemeshe, wakashiha ku Ene logele; mukalu wakabandila ku tshibanda tshia muana wa Hinoma tô ne ku luseke lua Bena Yebuse ku sude eu udi Yelushalema mene ; mukalu wakabandila ku mutu kua mukuna udi ku mpala kua tshibanda tshia Hinoma ku wesete, udi kunfudilu kua tshibanda tshia Bena Lefa ku nôde; mukalu wakadi ku mutu kua mukuna tô ne ku mushimi wa mai a Nefetoa, tô ne ku bimenga bia ku mutu kua mukuna wa Efelona; mukalu wakayila tô ne ku Bala eu udi Kîyata yalima mene ; mukalu wakanyunguluka ku Bâla ku wesete ku mukuna wa Sei, wakayila ku luseke lua mukuna wa Yalima lua ku nôde eu udi Kasalona mene , wakahuekela ku Bete shemeshe, wakanyunguluka ku Timena; mukalu wakayila ku luseke lua Ekelona lua ku nôde; mukalu wakayila tô ne ku Shikelona, wakaya tô ne ku mukuna wa Bâla, wakahatuka ku Yabenêle; kunshikidilu kua mukalu kuakadi kukala kua mai manene
Yeye wakamuebesha ne, Netumuenzele tshinyi
Maweja Nangila neafuile nsongakaji awu luse, bualu tatuende kavua musue bua abikumbaje to
Udi ne dijingulula, abale biandi nomba wa nyama wa luonji; bualu bua udi nomba wa muntu; ne nomba wandi udi nkama isambombo ne makumi asambombo ne isambombo

Badi batusangana kabidi bamanyishi ba bualu bua Nzambi badi ne mashimi, bualu bua tuakamanyisha bua Nzambi ne, Wakabisha Kilisto ku bafue, udiye kai mubishe ka bafue, bikala bantu bafue kabai babishibue ku lufu
Mukelenge wakamba ne, Eu Babulona mimene, tshiakuibaka musoko eu bu muaba wa mukelenge kushikameye ku bukole buanyi bunene bua mpete butumbi ne buneme, anyi
Reyuma mukaji mukuabu wa Nahore, uvua mulele bana ba balume aba banayi: Teba, Ngahame, Tahashe ne Maaka
Nunku Esetê wakasemena ha buihi, wakalenga lusongo lua dikombo
Tudi tuamba malu â, kemu mei adi meshi a bantu atuyisha, kadi mu mei adi Nyuma Muimpe utuyisha; tudi tujingulula malu a Nyuma ne mei a Nyuma
Yeye kena wikala ne muntu umuehele washala munkatshi mua bantu aba, ne kena umona diakalengele dindi nvuishila bantu banyi, bualu bua yeye wakuamba mei a kutombokela n au Yehowa
Abrahame ne Sara bakavua bakole bakulakaje, Sara mumane kupita diba dia buledi, katshiyi umona tshijila tshia bakaji
Kasala kaadi kadi Debout Congolais
Nvita yakadiku kabidi; Davidi wakaluhuka, wakaluangana ne Bena Peleshete, wakabashiha ba bungi: bakanyema ku mesu kuandi

Yeye wakamuela lusumuinu luandi ne, Nzambi kena bu muntu udi wamba mei a mashimi, Eyo, nakuangata dî bua kubavudishila disanka Yeye kena mutangile malu mabi munkatshi mua bana ba Yakoba, Nzambi wakabaha tula mu Ejipitu, Bulelela, kakuena muena muhongo munkatshi mua bana ba Yakoba, Mona, bantu aba badi bahika bu mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue, Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Kubedi mulau, kubavudishidi disanka nansha
Udi ubisha tshianza tshiandi kudi Bena Isalele udi utu mu kamonyi ka disu dia Yehowa

Mutshi au uwakamona, wakadiunda tô ne hakaluau mimene ne mukole, lusongo luau luakafika mu diulu, wakamueneka kudi ba kunfudilu kua buloba; mabeshi au akadi malengele, mamuma au akadi a bungi, akadi makumbane bia kudia bia bantu bonso; mu dileshi diau muakadi nyama ya mu mpata ilala, ne munkatshi mua matamba au nyunyu ya mulu yakadi ne miaba ya kuikila
Hashishe Shaula wakalekela kulonda Bena Peleshete; Bena Peleshete bakaya ku muaba wabo
Kadi tushale bua bakaji bakamba, bana ba nshiya, ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu

Hashishe Yeshua ne bana bandi balume ne bana babo ne Kadamiele ne bana bandi balume ne bana balume ba Yuda bakajuka diatshimue bua kuikalabo ku mutu kua mudimu wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi; bana ba Henedada ne bana babo, Bena Lewi, bakadi n abo
Nakasangisha myrrhe wanyi ne bintu bia muhuya muimpe; nakadia buitshi buanyi busangishe ne dikatshi; nakanua nvinyo yanyi misangisha ne mabele
Udi mumanye mua kubala bana ba Yakoba nganyi
Nenkulame muaba onsu uudi uya
Wanyi munanga udi mua kuenza bualu kai mu nsubu muanyi, yeye mumane kuenza malu a bundu
Yakobe kuteka Leya ne bana bende pa nkayabu, Rakele ne muanende Yozefe pa nkayabu, bakaji bende babidi bapika pa nkayabu ne bana babu
Kadi Yehowa wakakolesha mutshima wa Palô, yeye kakalekela Bena Isalele
Bana balume ba Esau: Elifaza ne Luele ne Yeusha ne Yalama, ne Kola
Zimeli wakabuela mu nsubu, wakamushiha mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete tshia bukelenge bua Asa, mukelenge wa Yuda; wakakokesha mu muaba wandi

Bikalabo baprofete, ne bikala dî dia Yehowa munda muabo, basengelele biabo Yehowa wa misumba mpindiu bua mpanza itshidi ishala mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne mu nsubu wa mukelenge wa Yuda ne mu Yelushalema, bua kayiyi ku Babulona
Kadi tuakikala bu bana batekete munkatshi muenu, bu mudi ndeshi ukuongoluela bana bandi balela
Yosefe wakabambila ne Tshiena mua kuenza nunku anu muntu wakasanganabo ne luhanza mu tshianza tshiandi neikale muhika wanyi kadi bakuabo benu nuhingane kudi tatu wenu talala
Bualu bua bobo bakadi baditshiha ne kuditshiha kukole ne, Wahidia kulua kudi Yehowa ku Misepa neafue bulelela
Mukelenge wakambila Yelemiya ne, Nenkukonke bualu; kunsokoki bualu bumue nansha
Numupingajile kabidi madimi ende
Dibadika Midimu ya bena Levi a
Monai, nudi nujila bia kudia bua kuikala ne diyoyo ne difuilangana, Kujila aku kua bia kudia nkujila kunakusungula, Eku kakuena kujila kua bia kudia kunakusungula, anyi
Dibadika dia bantu adi divua dienzeka mu tshipela tshia Sinayi, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Lea wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpa difutu dianyi bualu bua meme nakafila muena mudimu wanyi wa bakashi kudi bayanyi, wakamuidika dina ne, Yisakâ
Nunku nutonde mibi yenu kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu, nuenze bu mudi disua diandi; nuditahulule kudi bena buloba ne kudi bakashi ba bende
Bena Izrayele badi bu mudi nyama wa ntambue, udi ushipa nyama, udia munyinyi
Hashishe wakalua n anyi ku mbalanda wa nsubu wa tshitendelelu, wakidikisha biluwa bia mbalanda, biakadi ne butshiama bua coudées itanu ku luseke ne ku luseke

Mu matuku a Zelubabela ne Nehemiya Bena Isalele bonso bakafila bintu bua bimbi ba misambu ne bua batuadi bia ku dituku ne ku dituku; bakabanyangana ne Bena Lewi bintu biabo kabidi; Bena Lewi bakaha bana ba Alona tshituha tshia bintu biabo
Timothy Nunku wewe muan anyi, ukoleshibue mu ngasa wa mu Kilisto Yesu

Mona, mukuabo wa Bena Isalele wakalua kudi bana babo ne mukashi wa Bena Midiyana ku mesu kua Mose ne ku mesu kua tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, hakadibo badila ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena
Mu tshikondo atshi Hezikiya wakumusha or yonso ya ku bibi bia mu ntempelo wa Yehowa ne ya ku makunshi yakalamika Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda; wakabifila kudi mukelenge wa Ashû

Hakahita matuku asatu, miloho yakendakana munkatshi mua tshitudilu; yakambila bantu ne, Hanuatangila mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bakuidi Bena Lewi bautuala, nenumuke ku muaba unudi, nenûlonde

Hakunvueye lumu ne, Bakukuata Yone, wakaya biandi mu Galela; wakumuka mu Nazaleta, wakalua kushikama mu Kapênuma, musoko eu udi hehi ne dishiba, udi ku mukalu wa Zebuluna ne Nafatale; bua kushikisha dî diakambabo kudi muprofete Yeshaya ne, Buloba bua Zebuluna ne buloba bua Nafatale, Bantu bakadi bashikame mu midima Ku tshikondo atshi Yesu wakabanga kuambila bantu bualu bua Nzambi ne, Kudimunai mitshima yenu; bualu bua bukelenge bua mu diulu budi hehi
Gideona wakadi ne bana balume makumi muanda mutekete bakaleleye, bualu bua yeye wakadi ne bakashi ba bungi
Yeye wakalomba mukanda wa kufundahu, wakafunda ne, Dina diandi Yone
Udi mwa kushipa, kushintulula anyi kukeepesha manyooka

Mufuba udi wamba ne, Nyama wa ntambue udi mu nshila; Bu mudi tshibi tshiendakana ha biamu biatshi, Mufuba udi ubuesha tshianza tshiandi munda mua dilonga; Mufuba udi wela meji ne, Ndi ne lungenyi luhite Udi uhita mu nshila, ubuela mu matandu adi kayi bua bualu buandi, Bu mudi mubuluke udi wela bishelele, mbu mudi muntu udi udinga muena mutumba n andi ne, Hikalaku kakuyi nkunyi, kahia kadi kajima; Bu mudi makala mela ha mutu ha makala a kahia, bu mudi nkunyi miela mu kahia, Mei a muena bunsonge adi bu tuhesa tua bia kudia bilengele; Mishiku idi ne mei a lubombo ne mutshima mubi Muntu udi ne lukuna udi ulusokoka ku mei adi mishiku yandi yamba, Havuisheye dî diandi bu dî dia luse, kuitabushi dî diandi nansha; Bikala lukuna luandi lubuikila ne lubombo, Udi wumbula dijimba neahonemu; Ludimi ludi ne mashimi ludi lukina bantu bakutahalu mputa; Proverbs Kuditumbushi bua malu a makelela, bualu bua kuena mumanye muanda walua dituku dikuabo
Hakabueleye kudiye, yeye wakamuambila ne, Ambule muana webe
Nenulongolole nshila, nenutahulule mikalu ya buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe bu buhianyi bituha bisatu, bua mushihianganyi yonso anyemenemu
Yona Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yona tshiakabidi ne, Bika, ya biebe ku Ninewe, musoko au munene, ubambile mei andi nkuambila
Nealuishe muntu yonsu
Lelu tuakumumvua wakula munkatshi mua kapia

Stefano wakamba ne, Bana betu ne batatu, unvuai; Nzambi wa butumbi wakamueneka kudi tatu wetu Abalahama, hakadiye mu Mesopotamia, diambedi yeye kai muanze kushikama mu Halana, wakamuambila ne, Umuke mu buloba buebe ne munkatshi mua bena kuenu, ulue mu buloba bundualua kukulesha
Yesu wakatshinguluka, wakabamona bamulonda, wakabakonka ne, Nudi nukeba tshinyi
Kulondolola Balami ba Bibi ne Batangidi Mudimu wa balami ba bibi: ba Bena Kola, Meshelemeya, muana wa Kole, wa bana ba Asafa
Psalms Unvuai bualu ebu, nuenu bantu bonso
Nuenu Bafalese, mulau ulualua kunudi, bualu bua nudi basue nkuasa minene mu nsunagoga, nudi basue kabidi bantu banusekelele mu bisalu
Kanutendeledi mvidie yabu
Nebabusangishe ne manyi mu dilonga, ne hashikishabo kubulamba, nebafile bituha bidi bilamba kudi Yehowa bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu
Bavua base tshimenga tshia Ebrone, bidimu muanda mutekete bangabanga ne kuasa tshimenga tshia Tanise mu Ejipitu
Munyi mundi mua kutangila bualu bubi budi bulua kudi bantu banyi
Yeye wakumusha nzambi ya bende ne luhingu luakatekeye mu nsubu wa Yehowa, ne bioshelu biakaseye ku mukuna kuakadi nsubu wa Yehowa ne mu Yelushalema, wakabimasha ku mpenge kua musoko
Kadi bantu aba bakadi ne butumbi munkatshi muabo ne bakadi banganyi diambedi kembualu kundi; Nzambi kena ubala mpala wa muntu ndi ngamba ne, Bantu aba bakadi ne butumbi kabakanyisha bualu

Ubahenyishele miele ya nvula, ubamuangalashe; Olola tshianza tshiebe mulu mûdi mushikame, Mukana muabo mudi muamba mei a mashimi, Nzambi, nenkuindile musambu muhia muhia; Wewe udi uha bakelenge luhandu mu nvita, Unsungile, umpandishe mu tshianza tshia bantu ba bende, Bana betu ba balume bikale bakole mu bunsongalume buabo Mayeba etu ûle tente, ngombe yetu ituale bujitu bua bungi

Yeye wakateka Bena Lewi mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne biamu bia kukumakasha ne nzenze ne bisanji bu muakadi mukenji wa Davidi ne wa Gada, mumonyi wa malu wa mukelenge, ne wa Natana muprofete; bualu bua mukenji wakadi wa Yehowa mukana mua baprofete bandi
Nunku, tuye bietu kudiye kukala kua tshitudilu, batuala bihendu bia bualu buandi
Yone Mitshima yenu kaizakadi; nuitabushe Nzambi, nungitabushe meme kabidi
Bantu bonso bakadi mu nsunagoga bakûlangana ne tshishi, hakunvuabo malu â
Yehowa wakamba ne, Wele hanshi Nunku wakawela hanshi ne wowo wakakudimuka nyoka, Mose wakamunyema
Yeye kakanuha ditalala mu nseke yonso, anyi
Wakadi ubayisha mu ntempelo ku dituku ku dituku

Hakafika munda munya, Eliya wakabaseka ne, Elai dî dikole, bualu bua yeye udi nzambi: yeye udi welangana meji, anyi wakuya kuntu, anyi wakuya ku luendu, anyi yeye udi ulala tulu ne bunudi n abu mbua kumuhisha
Kadi bielanganeye meji ne mputa wakuamba kushika, ne nsuki mifike yakamueneka mu muaba eu, mputa wakuondahibua, ne muntu eu udi muakane, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane
Mukelenge wandi wakadi ne tshishi; wakamufila mu bianza bia bakengeshi ne, Ashalemu tô ne hafuteye dibanza dionso
Nakunvua mukuabo ungambila dî diakafuma mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, muntu wakadi muimane hehi n anyi
Kakuena udi wa tshijila, amu wewe

Nditekemena ditudi n adi bu luongo lua muoyo wetu, didi dikuata bikole, didi dishindama, didi dibuela tô ne munda mua muaba udi ku nyima kua tshilulu tshikudika, kuakabuela Yesu bu mudianjidi bua bualu buetu, mumane kulua muakuidi mimene tshiendelele wa ku mulongo wa Melekisedeke
Bulalu buonso budiye ulalahu hahatuka tufina budi ne bukoya, ne bintu bionso bidiye ushikamahu bidi ne bukoya
Kadi padibu basukule tshintu atshi, dikeji dishale dimueneka kakese, mutuangaji neakose anu muaba udi dikeji awu
Bena Peleshete bakamukuata, bakatunyina mesu andi, bakahueka n andi ku Gaza, bakamusuika ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku; yeye wakadi uhela mu nsubu wa lukanu
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Bena disangisha bonso bakatumina Bena Benyamina bakadi ku dibue dia Limona dî dia kubadisha n adi ditalala
Mose ne Eleazâ muakuidi bakangata or ya tuhita tua binunu ne binunu ne tuhita tua nkama ne nkama, bakalua n ai mu ntenta wa kusambakena bu tshivulukidi tshia Bena Isalele ku mesu kua Yehowa
Ekesode Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Katataka wewe mutangile bu mundi ngenzela Palô, bualu bua yeye neabalekele ku tshianza tshikole, neabihate mu buloba buandi ne tshianza tshikole
Nuenu badi badila katataka nudi ne disanka, bua nuenu nenuseke
Bana ba bantu aba mene bakadi bashala mu buloba, hakahanga Bena Isalele kubashiha, Solomo wakabenzesha mudimu bu bahika bandi tô ne ku dituku edi

Bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nakuditshiha meme nkayanyi ne, Musoko wa Bosela neulue tshintu tshidi tshikuatshi ha bantu buowa ne tshidibo bahenda, bu tshihela ne tshidibo bela mulau; misoko yau yonso idi mu ntshiamba neyikale bikulu tô ne tshiendelele
Bantu bavua Yakobe mutume ne mukenji bua kumonangana ne Esawu, kupinganabu, bambila Yakobe ne: Tuamonanganyi ne mukuluebe Esawu
Utshienze ne mabaya, ushiye munda muatshi mutuhu, utshienze bu munakukulesha ku mukuna
Kakuakadi mukelenge mu Edome; anu muloho wakadi mukelenge
Bakatamba kukema, bakamukonka ne, Ahu udi mumanye mua kusungidibua nganyi
Hakabandisha Mose tshianza tshiandi Bena Isalele bakatamba bukole, ne hakahuekesheye tshianza tshiandi, Bena Amaleka bakatamba
Kadi bua malu â onso netujadike n ebe tshihungidi, netutshifunde, bantu betu banene ne Bena Lewi betu ne bakuidi betu nebatekeku tshimanyinu tshiabo
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; kakasesuka ku malu mabi onso a Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, akenzesheye Bena Isalele
Dilomba diebe didi tshinyi
Tshia dikumi tshia tshidimu tshisatu Padi bidimu bisatu bikumbana, nenuikale ne tshidimu tshia bia dikumi
Bualu bua badi balonda malu a mubidi badi bateka meshi abo ku malu a mubidi; badi balonda Nyuma badi bateka meshi abo ku malu a Nyuma

Bulelela, Yehowa, bakelenge ba Ashû bakabutula ba mu bisamba bionso bia bantu ne maloba abo; bakela nzambi yabo mu kahia, bualu bua kayakadi nzambi mene, kadi yakadi bintu bienza ku bianza bia bantu mene, bia mitshi ne bia mabue; nunku bakayibutula
Shaula wakamba ne, Balue ne milambu ya kuosha ne ya kuvuisha n ai bantu ditalala kundi
Nunku Hamana wakadi wamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Nganyi udi mukelenge usanka bua kunemeka muntambe meme
Budimi ne lubuebue luakadimu biakaya mu bianza bia Abalahama tshiendelele ku mpala kua bana ba Hete bu muaba wa kujikabo bantu bafue
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Ubungambile
Yeye wakalela muana, muana mulume mene, udi ne bualu bua kukokesha bisamba bionso ne dikombo dia tshiamu; ne muana wandi wakakuatshibua mu diulu kudi Nzambi ne ku nkuasa wandi wa butumbi
Ndi mumane kudilongolola, kembua kusuikibua nkayaku, kadi bua kufua kabidi ku Yelushalema bua dina dia Mukelenge Yesu

Bualu bua bakakuatshila bantu mudimu ku mpala kua mpingu yabo, ne bakahia tshilenduishi kudi Bena Isalele bua kubashindisha mu malu mabi, nunku Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nakubisha tshianza tshianyi bua kuditshiha bua bualu buaho ne, Badi ne bualu bua kudituadila dihila dia malu mabi abo
Hashishe mukelenge Hezikiya wakabika hatshiatshia, wakasangisha bantu banene ba mu musoko, wakabanda n abo ku nsubu wa Yehowa
Tshibondo tshimue tshiakadi ne mamuma a nfigi mimpe, bu mamuma a nfigi akulua diambedi; tshibondo tshikuabo tshiakadi ne mamuma a nfigi mahite bubi, akadibo kabayi mua kudia
Kanuena bamanye ne, Bundi n abu mbua kuikala mu malu a Tatu wanyi
Kusongi mpingu ya mvidie
Nenushale ne muoyi matuku makese
Nenku padi bidimu bikumbana makumi atanu, nuikale nuenza tshibilu tshia Mufikilu wa disanka dinene

Kuhita ka bena maluvu kakambila Yosefe tshilota tshiandi ne, Mu tshilota tshianyi, nakumona muonshi wa tumuma tua nvinyo ku mpala kuanyi, mudishi eu wakadi ne matamba asatu akasampila ntonga, ne bilongo biakabaluluka, biakakuama tumuma tuhia
Yelemiya Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya tshiakabidi, hakatshidiye mu lukanu mu tshiendelu tshia bansentedi ba mukelenge
Yeye wakabambila bikole ne, Kanungambi kudi muntu mukuabo
Bule buatshi buakadi coudées makumi atanu, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées makumi abidi ne itanu
Muntu udi ulala mu nsubu neuvuwe bilulu biandi, ne muntu udi udia bidia mu nsubu neuvuwe bilulu biandi
Bualu bua Muana wa Nzambi, Yesu Kilisto, wakanuambidibua munkatshi muenu kutudi, kudi meme ne Siluano ne Timote, kakadi ne E ne Nasha; kadi munda muandi mudi anu E
Bena Benyamina tshinunu bakadi n andi, ne Siba, muena mudimu wa Shaula, ne bana bandi balume dikumi ne batanu, ne bena mudimu bandi makumi abidi bakadi n andi; bakasabuka Yadene ku mesu kua mukelenge
Yetelo wakamba ne, Yehowa avudishibue disanka, wakanusungila mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu ne mu bianza bia Palô, wakahatula bantu mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana, Amiele, muana mulume wa Gemali
Neafile tshituha tshia mulambu ne mulambu bu mulambu udibo bakuha ku mesu kua Yehowa, netshikale kudi muakuidi udi umiamine mashi a mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Muana wa muntu, dia bidia ne dikanka, nua mai ne dizakala ne buowa
Kadi pikala ngombe ne tshibidilu tshia kusangana nsengu, bamanyisha mfumuende, kayi musue kumulama, neapingaje ngombe wa muoyi, angate ngombe uvua mufue awu

Biabaka mulume mukashi, adi ulala n andi ne udi umukina, udi wambila bakuabo mei a bundu, udi wona lumu luandi, udi wamba ne, Nakabaka mukashi eu ne hanakasangila n andi bulalu, tshiakasangana bimanyinu bu mukashi utshidi kamama; hashishe tatu wa mushikankunde eu ne mamu wandi nebaluhuke ne bimanyinu biandi bu bia mukashi utshidi kamama kudi bakulu ba mu musoko ne ku tshilumbuluidi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko
Yeye wakakonka tuhita tua Palô diakadi n andi mu nsubu wa lukanu mu nsubu wa mukelenge wandi ne, Nudi nubungamina lelu nunku tshinyi

Dikenga ne kanyinganyinga bidi bimutshinyisha; Bualu bua wakuolola tshianza tshiandi bua kutombokela Nzambi, Udi uya kuluangana n andi muinyike mutu, Bualu bua matama andi akulua mafuta, Wakushikama mu misoko yakubutulabo, Yeye kena wikala mubanji, ne biuma biandi kabiena bishala kudiye; Yeye kena wehuka midima; Keyemenyi biandi malu a hatuhu, kadidingi biandi, Nebamufute difutu diandi dionso diambedi dituku diandi kadiyi dianze kufika, Neanyange tumuma tuandi tua nvinyo tubishi, bu mudi muonshi watu wenza, Bualu bua tshisumbu tshia babengi ba Nzambi katshiena tshitanta, Badi bimita ntatu, badi balela makenga, Yobo Hashishe, Yobo wakakudimuna Elifaza ne, Nakunvua malu a bungi bu nunku, Mei a hatuhu adi ne nshikidilu, anyi
Nunku Hilama wakaha Solomo mitshi ya cèdre ne ya cyprès bu muakasueye muonso
Mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete tshia bukelenge bua Asa, mukelenge wa Yuda, Zimeli wakakokesha mu Tîsa matuku muanda mutekete
Kadi misangu yonsu idibu babuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena ne mashi a nyama wa mulambu bua kukobolola nawu bantu muaba wa tshijila, kabena mua kudia munyinyi wa nyama awu
Hakatshiabu bu ha diba didibo bafila milambu, mai akafuma ku nshila wa ku Edome, akûsha buloba abu tente
Nunku Esetê wakasemena ha buihi, wakalenga lusongo lua dikombo
Tshiakafua dituku adi; ne mikoko yakadi mihite kunyana yakunvua dî dianyi, yakamanya ne, Di adi diakadi dia Yehowa
Wakasumba ne tshiji tshikole
Kadi bobo bakatamba kutshina; bakambilangana ne, Bakelenge babidi kabakamanya mua kuimana ku mpala kuandi, nunku tuetu netuimane munyi
Tunkanunuina tua Ashê Bana ba balume ba Ashê: Yimena ne Yishewa ne Yishewi ne Beliya, ne Sela wakadi muan abo wa bakashi
Filipo wakadi Muena Bete saiîa, musoko wa Andele ne Petelo
Kadi kuakadi uhenda muan enu wa bakashi, Sodoma, mukana muebe mu dituku dia kudisua kuebe, diambedi kabayi banze kusokolola bubi buebe, anyi
Katataka ndi nufila mu bianza bia Nzambi ne mu dî dia ngasa wandi didi dimanye mua kunudiundisha ne mua kunuha buhianyi munkatshi mua bonso badi balengeshibue

Halua bualu ebu, muntu yonso watela dina dia Yehowa neasungidibue; bualu bua mu mukuna wa Siona ne mu Yelushalema nemuikale bakuabo bahanduke bu muakamba Yehowa; ne munkatshi mua bantu aba badi bashala nemuikale bakuabo badi Yehowa Ubikila
Bakalua n andi ha nyima ha tubalu, bakamujika diatshimue ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Yuda

Wakangata ngombe ibidi yakadi ku mutshi wa tshikokedi, wakayisaya munyinyi, wakayituma mu bianza bia miloho ei ku matshika onso a Isalele, Wamba ne, Yonso udi kayi ulonda Shaula ne Samuele, nebenzele ngombe yandi nunku
Bitalu bienu nebikale bu bidia bia nyunyu yonso ya mu diulu ne bia nyama yonso ya ha buloba; kakuena muntu udi uyihata
Kadi mutshi wa olive wakayambila ne, Nshiye mafuta anyi andi ntumbisha n au Nzambi ne bantu kabidi, bua kuya kuhehukahehuka ku mutu kua mitshi mikuabo, anyi

Kulomba kuanyi kuikale ku mpala kuebe bu muhuya wa musenga wa manananshi, Yehowa, uteke mutentekedi bua kukanda mukana muanyi; Kuinyiki mutshima wanyi ku bualu bubi, Muntu muakane antute, muanda eu newikale luse kundi; ambele Hedibue bakokeshi babo hanshi ha mabue, Bu mudi muntu ubundulula buloba, ubuhanda ne lukasu, Kadi mesu anyi adi kûdi wewe, Yehowa Mukelenge; Undame bua tshikuatshibu mu bukuondo buakungandabo, Bantu babi bakuatshibue mu makuondo abo bobo, Misambu Ndi ndila ne dî dianyi kudi Yehowa, Ndi mpumuna mei a kuabakana kuanyi ku mpala kuandi, Hahanga nyuma wanyi munda muanyi, Utangile ku tshianza tshianyi tshia balume, umone biebe; Ndi ndila kûdi, Yehowa; Unvua kudila kuanyi, Umushe muoyo wanyi mu nsubu wa lukanu, Misambu Yehowa, unvua kulomba kuanyi, uteleje matshu ebe ku kutendekena kuanyi, Kulumbuluishi muena mudimu webe, Bua muena lukuna wakukengesha muoyo wanyi; Nunku muoyo wanyi udi uhanga munda muanyi, Ndi nvuluka matuku a diambedi, Ndi ngolola bianza bianyi kûdi; Yehowa, witabe kundi lukasa; Ungunvuishe luse luebe lujalame ne dinda dionso, Yehowa, umpandishe kudi badi n anyi lukuna; Unyishe mua kuenza bu mudi disua diebe, Yehowa, usangashe muoyo wanyi bua dina diebe
Bakangatshila Solomo tubalu mu Ejipitu ne mu maloba onso
Kanungu ka Polovensa mudibo bayitela kudi kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi idi yenza bitupa bia malaba bia masungula a batshipwita bakulumpa ba Bukalenga bwa kumpala
Netuoshe nsubu webe ne kahia ne wewe kabidi
Samuele kakalua kutangila Shaula kabidi tô ne muakafueye; kadi Samuele wakadila muadi bualu bua Shaula; ne Yehowa wakakudimuna mutshima bualu bua yeye wakasungula Shaula mukelenge wa Bena Isalele
Hakambabo kubuela mu Ejipitu, Abalama wakambila mukashi andi Salai ne, Tangila ndi mumanye ne wewe udi mukashi muimpe kumona, ne hakumona Bena Ejipitu, bobo nebambe ne, Eu udi mukashi wandi
Mose wakabambila ne, Nuakushiya bakashi bonso ne muoyo, anyi
Davidi wakadilama bu muena lungenyi mu nshila yandi yonso; Yehowa wakadi n andi
Lekela kuikala munu wa anu mai nkayau; kadi unue tuluvu tukese bua kuondaha munda muebe ne bua matekete audi n au misangu ya bungi
Bonso bakadi ha tshilumbuluidi bakamutangila talala, bakamona mpala wandi mukudimuke bu wa muanjelo
Bualu bua Yone Mubatiji wakulua kai udia bidia kai unua maluvu; nudi nuamba ne, Yeye udi ne demon munda
Bayidi bakahingana ku nsubu kuabo kabidi
Kolinto Ndi musue bua nuenu mimanye mua kuikala n anyi lutulu mu kutshimbakana kukese; kadi bulelela, nudi nuikala n anyi lutulu
Hanuanyenga musoko nenuwoshe ne kahia; nuenze bu mu dî dia Yehowa; monai, nakanuambila
Nebimashe bintu biabo bia argent mu misesu, ne tshiamu tshiabo tshia or netshikale kudibo bu tshintu tshidi ne manyanu
Hashishe bantu bandi bakasemena ha buihi n andi, bakamukonka ne, Tatu wetu, bu muprofete mukuambile bua wewe kuenza bualu bunene, kuakadi kubuenza, anyi
Ba mu bisamba bia ba bende nebabangate, nebabafile ku muaba wabo
Bualu bua kahia kakatemeshibua mu tshiji tshianyi, kadi katema tô ne mu Muaba wa Bafue, kadi kosha buloba ne bintu biakadiundamu, kadi kosha makunshi adi muinshi mua mikuna mile
Ndi mupeshe bantu bakuabu tshipedi tshia kuenza midimu ya bianza
Kapia kabutulu Are mu ditunga dia Mowabe, kabutulu bakalenga bavua ku mikuna ya ku musulu wa Amone
Kaluena luimpe bua kuluelabo mu budimi, anyi ha diala; nebaluimashe tshianana
Yai bienu, enzai mudimu, katuena tunuha bisonsa, kadi nuenu nenulue ne bungi bua tushola bu mutuakuamba
Abalahama waka bika, wakakukuila bana ba Hete, bena buloba
Bantu nebanukengeshe bikole, nebanyenge bintu bionsu binudi nabi, muntu nansha umue kayi mua kunuakuila
Kadi muntu wakahidia kumututa
Kadi bualu bua yeye kakadi ne bia kumana n abi dibanza, mukelenge wandi wakamba ne, Bamuhane ne mukashi wandi ne bana bandi ne bintu biandi bionso, bua kumana dibanza
Ahazaya wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne bibidi hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema tshidimu tshimue
Dina dia musapa wa kumpala didi Pishona; wowu udi munyingulule ditunga dijima dia Avila
Dutelonone Bena Isalele Badi Bahita Oga wa ku Bashana Bukole Nom
Biamulonda musombuedi, kabafidi mushihi mu tshianza tshiandi, bualu bua yeye wakashiha mukuandi ku mpukahuka, kakadi n andi lukuna diambedi

bitadi bia mbulamatadi pa makookeshi a bantu,bitadi bia mbulamatadi pa midimu ya bantu ne bitadi bia kufuta polovensa ne misoko bu mudi tshitadi tshia malaba, tshitadi tshia pa makasa a mushinga wa difutshisha ne tshitadi tshia pa tudiendelandela;
Ne nakunvua dî dikole mu diulu, diamba ne, Ne bobo bakamuhita bukole bualu bua mashi a Muana wa Mukoko, ne bualu bua dî dia bumanyishi buabo; ne bobo kabakasua mioyo yabo tô ne ku lufu

Binabuikila diulu bua nvula kayiloki, anyi binatuma mikumbi bua kudiayi bintu biakamena mu buloba, anyi binatuma tshihuhu munkatshi mua bantu banyi, biadihuekesha bantu banyi badi babikila dina dianyi, biatendelelabo, biakebabo mpala wanyi, ne biakudimunabo mitshima yabo bua mibi yabo, nengunvuile mu diulu, nembabuikidile mibi yabo, nensangashe buloba buabo
Yehowa wa misumba udi Wamba ne, Nenvuishe musoko eu muaba wa nkese ne muaba wa bintampi
Bualu bua bobo badi bantu banyi banakuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, kababahanyi bu bahika
Bualu bua matuku a Muana wa muntu nebuikale bu muakadibu mu matuku a Noa
Kakuakadi muntu wakamuha tshintu
Bu meme tshî mulue, tshî mubambile bualu, kabakadi kuikala ne bubi; kadi katataka kabena ne tshilayidilu tshia bubi buabo
Bantu ba tshisamba tshienu ne bakuidi banene bakukufila mu bianza bianyi, wakuenza tshinyi
Kabidi mmunyi mudi bantu mua kumanya ne: meme ne bena Izrayele tudi bapete diakalenga kuudi, paudi kuyi munkatshi muetu
Yehowa wakabidika mukana mua mpunda, wakambila Belâma ne, Nakuenza tshinyi bua wewe wakunkuma misangu isatu

Hezikiya wakatendelela Yehowa, wamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi mushikame mu nkuasa wa butumbi udi ha mutu ha bakeluba, wewe udi Nzambi, anu wewe nkayebe, wa makelenge onso a ha buloba; wewe wakufuka diulu ne buloba
Bena Isalele bonso nebunvue lumu elu, nebatshine, kabena benza bualu ebu bubi kabidi munkatshi muenu
, Besalele Wakenza mushete wa acacia Buludi bua mushete buakadi coudées ibidi ne tshituha, ne butshiama buau buakadi coudée umue ne tshituha, ne bule buau bua mulu coudée umue ne tshituha
Mitshima yabo yakatamba kunyingalala
Tuanji kuitabusha bualu ebu, ne bobo nebashikame n etu Bena musoko bonso ba mu musoko wandi bakitabusha mei a Hamô ne a muan andi Shekeme, balume bonso ba mu musoko wandi bakätengudibua

Kadi muntu yonso udi uluhuka ku bibi bia nsubu webe, Uyaya mu misesu, mashi andi neikale ha mutu handi, ne tuetu netubinge; ne muntu yonso udi wikala n ebe mu nsubu, mashi andi neikale ha mitu hetu, biamulengabo tshianza
Yozefe udi uteta bana babu Bafika mu Ejipitu, kudielabu mpala panshi kumpala kua Yozefe, bualu yeye ke uvua utangila ditunga adi dijima, usumbisha bantu benyi bonsu biakudia

Yelemiya Yehowa, wewe udi muakane hanakeba kukuela mpata, Wewe wakubakuna, bakuela miji; badi badiunda; e, badi bakuama mamuma; Kadi wewe, Yehowa, udi mu mmanye meme, Buloba nebuase muadi, Biwikala mulumbile lubilu ne bantu badi benda hanshi, ne Bualu bua bana benu mene ne ba mu tshiota tshia tatu webe Nakulekela nsubu wanyi, Yuda, buhianyi buanyi, Yuda, buhianyi buanyi, wakulua kundi bu nyunyu udi ne matoba matoba udi udia munyinyi, anyi
Mulume wakamba ne, Mukashi uwakumpa bua kuikala n anyi wakumpa dimuma dia mutshi, nakudia
Bakamanyisha mukelenge mei au
Idi ne mukelenge ha mutu hai, udi muanjelo wa tshina tshidi katshi ne nshikidilu; dina diandi mu muaku wa Bena Ebelu didi Abadona, ne mu muaku wa Bena Gelika didi Apoluona
Nenukuate ditunga, divua Maweja Nangila mulaye bankambua benu
Maminu akuanji kulua mu diyeba, anyi
Bulelela, bonso badi bashikama mu Yelushalema badi bamanye ne, Bantu aba bakuenza tshimanyinu tshidi tshimanyibua; katuena bamanye mua kutshivila
Biashala mudimu wa muetu wakaseye ha mutu hatshi, yeye neangate difutu
Bualu bua wakadi ne Bena Isalele lukuna lua tshiendelele, wakahaula kudi bakadi ne miele ya nvita mu tshikondo tshia dikenga diabo, mu tshikondo mene tshia kukengeshibua kuabo kua kunshikidilu
Kanuitabushi bua Hezikiya abueshe ditekemena dia Yehowa mu mitshima yenu hambeye ne, Yehowa neatusungile bulelela; kabena bafila musoko eu mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Ashû

Yehowa wakambila Abalama ne, Umanye biebe bimpe ne, Tunkanu nuina biebe nebikale bendakanyi mu buloba budi kabuyi buabo, netukuatshile bena buloba mudimu, nebatukengeshe to bidimu nkama mai, meme nendumbuluishe tshisamba tshia bantu baditu tukuatshila mudimu, hashishe, netuhatuke ne biuma bia bungi
Hashishe, Samuele wakangata dibue, wakadimanyika hankatshi ha Misepa ne Shene, wakaditeka dina ne, Ebene ezê, Wamba ne, Yehowa wakaluatshisha tô ne lelu
Wa bana ba Azegada, Yohanana, muana wa Hakatana; bakadi n andi bakadi balume lukama ne dikumi
Yeye neanunyenge tshia dikumi tshia bimuna bienu; nuenu nenuikale bahika bandi
Muhika mukuabo wa mu nsubu wa Shaula wakadiku, dina diandi Siba; bakamubikila kudi Davidi; mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Wewe udi Siba, anyi

Nenuenze bu mudibo bamba ha muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, usungula; nuenu nenutumikile mei onso adibo banuyisha: nenuenze bu mudi mikenji idibo banuyisha, ne bu dilumbulula didibo banuambila; kanusesuki ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi mu dî didibo banuambila

Kudiye kabidi, Abalahama wakabanyangana n andi tshia dikumi tshia bintu bionso diambedi muikale mukudimuna dina ne, Mukelenge wa buakane; hashishe kabidi, udi biandi Mukelenge wa Salema, kuamba ne, Mukelenge wa ditalala; kai tatu, kai mamu, kai bankambua, kai tshibangidilu tshia matuku anyi nshikidilu wa muoyo, kadi muvuishibue bu Muana wa Nzambi udi muikale muakuidi tshiendelele
Kadi nuenu bana betu, kanuena mu midima bua dituku adi dinukuate bu muibi; bua buonso buenu nudi bana ba munya ne bana ba dituku, katuena ba butuku anyi ba midima
Kings Mu matuku au disama diakakuata Abiya, muana wa Yalobama
Wakalua ne mulambu wa bukula, wakabuambula dianza tente, wakabuosha ha tshioshelu hehi ne mulambu udibo bosha ne dinda
Wewe wakuenza buhote mu bualu ebu, kubangila mu dituku edi wewe newikale ne nvita
Bualu mu thisuku amu, nansha nsongakaji muele mbila, muntu kavua mua kumueneka bua kumusungidila to

Nzambi wakambila Solomo ne, Bua bualu ebu buakadi mu mutshima webe, wewe kuakundomba bubanji ne biuma, nansha butumbi, nansha mioyo ya badi n ebe lukuna, nansha matuku a bungi ha buloba, kadi wakundomba meji ne lungenyi bia kukokesha n abi bantu banyi banakukuhingishila mukelenge ku mutu kuabo
Kadi bua munyinyi wa nyama wa mulambu wa bobumue, baudie ujika onsu anu dituku dimue, kauladi to
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakambila Belâma ne, Ya biebe ne balume aba kadi wewe wambe anu dî dinaknambila
Bakuabo bakamba ne, Yeye udi Kilisto
Bituenza nunku wewe kuena wikala n etu tshiji tô ne hawatubutula buonso buetu, nunku difuka dikese dia bantu kadiena mua kushala anyi kuhanduka, anyi
Anu umue udi muedi wa mikenshi ne mulumbuluisha nyeye udi ne bukole bua kue sungila ne bua kushiha

Bualu buakadi nunku kabidi mu matuku a Lota; bakadi badia, bakadi banua, bakadi basumba, bakadi bahana, bakadi bakuna, bakadi bibaka; kadi dituku diakahatuka Lota mu Sodoma, kahia ne soufre biakafuma mulu, biakabashiha bonso; bualu nebuikale nunku halua dituku diamueneka Muana wa muntu
Kadi bualu bundi ngenza nembuenze kabidi, bua meme kuhumbisha bantu badi bakeba ha kutumbilaho; nunku mu malu adibo batumbila nebabasangane muomumue n etu
Benze tshitekelu tshia muendu ne bintu bionsu bidiku: miendu, ne mafuta a kutemesha nawu
Bualu bua mukelenge wa Babulona udi wimana ku masangu a nshila, kundekelu kua nshila ei ibidi, bua kutempesha lubuku; udi unyungisha mikete, udi webesha telafima, udi utangila mu mutshima wa nyama
Bakadi ne Yone bu mubakuatshishi

Bantu bakamukudimuna dî ne, Yehowa atukande bua katumulekedi bua kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu; Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakatuluhula ne batatu betu mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa buluka, wakenza malu a kukema ku mesu kuetu, wakatulama bimpe mu nshila yonso utuakenda ne munkatshi mua bantu bonso butuakahita mu nshila
Bena Yuda bakanyenga Gaza kabidi ne matshika au, ne Ashekelona ne matshika au, ne Ekelona ne matshika au
Hashishe mukelenge wakangebesha ne, Udi ulomba tshinyi
Bena Izrayele ntshisamba tshia Maweja Nangila Lelu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu udi unuambila, bua nukumbaje meyi ende ne mikenji yende
Bakuabo bakadi bitabusha malu akambeye, bakuabo bakadi bâhidia
Ntenta wanyi udi mushimbuke, Bualu bua balami bonso bakuandamuka bahote, Unvuai

Budi bu lutete lua mutada, ludi lutambe ntete yonso ya ha buloba bukese; kadi halukunabo mu buloba, ludi Bileha, ludi lutambe midioko yonso bunene, ludi bela matamba manene; nunku nyunyu ya mu diulu idi mimanye mua kuikila mu dileshi diau
Bena Sulia ne Bena Isalele kabakaluangana nvita tô bidimu bisatu
Yozefe kulayangana ne bana abu, ubambila ne: Meme nkadi mikolu ku tshiina
Bualu ebu kabuena bulelela
Hashishe bantu bandi bakasemena ha buihi n andi, bakamukonka ne, Tatu wetu, bu muprofete mukuambile bua wewe kuenza bualu bunene, kuakadi kubuenza, anyi
Kadi nuenu badi bashale, nubuele mu nzubu wa lukanu
Hakahita tshituha tshihi, bakadi bimane ha buihi bakalua, bakambila Petelo ne, Bulelela, wewe udi wabo, bualu bua muaku webe udi ukusokolola
Nunku Davidi wakalota Muena Peleshete bukole ku tshieledi ne dibue; wakataha Muena Peleshete, wakamushiha; kadi Davidi kakadi ne muele wa nvita mu tshianza tshiandi

Dituku dia kumudilu nedikale dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila, ne dituku dia muanda mutekete nedikale dituku dia disangisha dia tshijila, kabenji mudimu mu matuku â, anu mudimu wa kudikebela bia kudia

Davidi wakadi muana wa balume wa Muena Efelata wa mu Beteleheme yuda, dina diandi diakadi Yishai, wakadi ne bana ba balume muanda mukulu; mu matuku a Shaula yeye wakadi muntu mununu, mukoke munkatshi mua bantu
Yeye wakamba ne, Lua

Yoshiya Udi Ulengesha Nsubu wa Yehowa Mukelenge wakela dî kudi Hilekiya, muakuidi munene, ne kudi bakuidi ba mu mulongo muibidi ne kudi balami ba nsubu bua bobo bumushe malonga onso a Bâla ne a Bashela ne a kutendelela n au misumba yonso ya mu diulu mu nsubu wa Yehowa; wakayosha ku mpenge kua Yelushalema mu madimi a ku Kidelona; bakaya ne butue buabi ku Betele
Yehowa, kakuena mukuabo bu wewe, kakuena Nzambi mukuabo ku mpala kuebe, bu mudi malu onso atuakunvua ku matshu etu
Diulu ne buloba nebijimine, kadi mei anyi kêna ajimina
Hakabueleye mu nsubu muandi, yeye wakangata kele, wakakuata mukashi wandi muhika, wakamukosolola bituha dikumi ne bibidi, wakabituma ku nseke yonso ya Isalele
Gideona wakamanya ne, Yeye udi muanjelo wa Yehowa; Gideona wakamba ne, Aka, Mukelenge Yehowa

Anyi bikala munyinyi eu mubishe muandamuke muteke tô kabidi nunku yeye nealue kudi muakuidi, muakuidi neamutangile, ne biandamukeye mutoke tô, nunku muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu wakadi ne nsudi udi muakane, ne yeye neikale muakane
Pa tshintu tshimue tshivuaye mukune, kupetaye lukama
Bakandamuna ne, Wa kumudilu
Anyi udi musue batume disama dikole mu buloba buebe tô matuku asatu
Bana babo bakaya ku Shekeme bua kudishabo bimuna bia tatu abo Isalele wakebesha Yosefe ne, Bana benu kabena badisha bimuna ku Shekeme, anyi
Lumu luandi luakaya mu miaba yonso ya luseke alu
Kadi halua tshidimu tshinai, nujidile mamuma onso a mu tshidimu atshi bua kutendelela n au Yehowa
Kings Hakamana Solomo nsubu wa Yehowa ne nsubu wa mukelenge ne malu onso akasua mutshima wa Solomo kuenza, Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Solomo tshiakabidi bu muakamuenekeye kudiye ku Gibeona
Nenubatshimune lukasa, mubabutule bonsu, mbanyenge bintu biabu, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mulaye
Muntu neibe bintu bia Nzambi, anyi

Pilato wakabikila bakuidi banene ne miloho ne bantu, wakabambila ne, Nuakulua ne muntu eu kundi ne, Yeye udi utombosha bantu; hanakumulumbuluisha malu andi ku mesu kuenu, tshiena mumusangane ne bualu bunudi bamubande; ne Helode kabidi kena mumusangane n abu, yeye wakamuhingisha kutudi; yeye kena muenze bualu buafuileye
Bua muanda eu kabidi bakambila bafue mene lumu luimpe, bua bobo balumbuluishibue bu mudibo balumbuluisha bantu badi ne mibidi, kadi bua kuikalabo ne muoyo mu nyuma bu mudi Nzambi musue
Bantu kukonka Abrahame ne: Mukajebe Sara udi penyi
Kadi Bena Isalele kabena bakuluila; bualu bua kabena bunvua di dianyi; bualu bua bonso ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele badi ne mitu mikole bu dibue ne mitshima ya tshitshu
Nutumikile mei anyi
Bu meme muenze nunku, nakadi kudinga muoyo wanyi kakuena bualu bubi busokoka kudi mukelenge , hashishe wewe nkayebe wakadi kuluangana n anyi
Bakamuelela tshifufu mu Yelushalema, kadi yeye wakanyemena ku Lakisha, bakamuihata ku Lakisha, bakamushihelaku
Bua ditabusha bakahita mu Mai Manene Makunze bu mudi ha buloba bume; hakateta Bena Ejipitu kuenza nunku, bakaminyibua mu mai
Maweja Nangila udi ubalama matuku onsu, usomba munkatshi muabu
Kadi yeye kakashala kai ne ntemu; wakanuenzela bimpe, wakanuha nvula ne bidimu bia kuvudisha bia kudia bifume mu diulu, wakûsha mitshima yenu tente ne bidia ne disanka
Hakahita ngondo ibidi, yeye wakahingana kudi tatu wandi, ne yeye wakamuenzela bu mu kuditshiha kuakaditshiheye; yeye kakadi mumanye mulume
Bonso badi bakula miaku mikuabo, anyi
Wakatshiawila tatu wandi ne bana babo, tatu wandi wakamukuhulula ku di diandi ne, Etshi ntshilota kai tshiwakulota

Tshiotshi tshiakimana ha nyima ha ngombe dikumi ne ibidi; isatu yakatangila ku nôde, isatu ku wesete, isatu ku sude ne isatu ku esete; tshiowelu tshiakadi ha nyima hai; mikila yai yakadi mituangane muinshi mua tshiowelu
Balaka wakamukudimuna dî ne, Biwaya nganyi, nenye; kadi biwikala kuyi uya, tshiena nya

Mu malu â yeye wakutuha milayi yandi ya mushinga mukole ne mitambe bunene; bua ku milayi ei nuenu nulue babanyanganyi n andi ba muoyo wa bunzambi, bamane kuhanduka ku malu mabole adi mu buloba bualu bua nkuka mibi
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Numanye muanda eu ne, Tshiena ngenza malu â bua bualu buenu, nukuatshike bundu, nudihuekeshe bua bienzedi bienu, nuenu Bena Isalele
Nunku ndi nsanka bua bualu buenu, kadi ndi musue nuenu nuikale bena meshi ku malu mimpe ne badi ne mitshima mitoke ku malu mabi
Nunku muprofete au wakumuka, wakalamina mukelenge mu nshila, wakasuika tshilulu ku mesu andi, wakadifuanyikisha bu muntu mukuabo

Hakadi bintu ebi bilongolola nunku, bakuidi badi babuela misangu yonso mu muaba wa kumudilu, benza mudimu wabo; kadi muakuidi munene udi ubuela mu muaba muibidi, yeye nkayandi, musangu umue ku tshidimu ku tshidimu; kena ubuela kai ne mashi adiye ufila bua bualu buandi ne bua matuhakana a bantu
Yeye wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakatshiangata
Moshe kubikila Arone ne balombodi ba bena Izrayele bonsu
Kadi, tangilai, tshianza tshia udi untungila tshitungu tshidi n anyi ha mesa
Nzubu wa tshijila Bena mudimu bavua bapite bakuabu ku lungenyi kutuadija kuasa nzubu wa tshijila
Nuambile muena nsubu ne, Muyishi udi ukukonka ne, Nsubu wa buenyi unadila bidia bia Kuhita kua Yehowa ne bayidi banyi udi hanyi

Diambedi hakadi Shaula mukelenge mene, nguewe wakahatuka, wakahingana ne Bena Isalele; Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakukuambila ne, Wewe newikale mulami wa bantu banyi Bena Isalele, ne wewe newikale mukelenge ku mutu kua bantu banyi Bena Isalele
Maweja Nangila kena nenu to
Gala, muana wa Ebede, wakaluhuka, wakimana ku tshibi tshia musoko; ne Abimeleke ne bantu bakadi n andi bakabika kuakadibo balamina
Bana ba balume ba Eleyehoenai: Hodawiya ne Eleyashiba ne Pelaya ne Akuba ne Yohanana ne Delaya ne Anani, muanda mutekete bonso
Yeye wakabikila muena mudimu, wakamuebesha ne, Abu mbualu tshinyi

Mvidi Mukulu neanuele lupemba Panudi nuitaba meyi anyi, nutumikila mikenji yanyi, nuyilonda, nendokeshe mvula pa diba diende, bua nupete biakudia bia bungi mu madimi enu, kabidi bua mitshi ikuame bimuma

Edome udiku, ne bakelenge bandi ne bakokeshi bandi badiku, bobo bakadi ne bukole buabo buonso, kadi badi bajadikibua ne bantu badi bashihibue ku muele wa nvita; badi balala ne badi kabayi batengudibue, ne badi bahueka mu Dina dia Bafue
Abalahama wakamuambila ne, Bualu bua nakuelangana meji ne, Bushuwa, ditshina dia Nzambi kadiena mu muaba eu, ne bobo nebanshihe bualu bua mukashi wanyi
Nunku, bana betu, hanuadisangisha bua kudia, nuindilangane
Solomo wakakokesha mu Yelushalema ku mutu kua Bena Isalele bidimu makumi anai
Hatuakunvua malu â, tuetu ne bena ha muaba au tuakadi tumusengelela ne, Kubandi ku Yelushalema
Ambilanganai mei a bushuwa, buonso buenu, muntu ne muntu ne muena mutumba n andi; kosai bilumbu mu bilumbuluidi bidi ku bibuelelu bia musoko ne kulumbulula kua bushuwa ne kua ditalala
Pashishe kubikilaye kabidi bana bonsu ba balume ba Arone, kubalaba mashi ku nsongu yabu ya matshi, ku biala ne ku minu minene ya bana ba nkasa bia ku luseke luabu lua dia balume
Hashishe Shaula wakambila bantu bakadi n andi ne, Nubale, numone wakumuka kutudi
Kumfikidi munda to

Nakumûsha tente ne Nyuma wa Nzambi ne lungenyi ne dijingulula ne meji mu kuenza kua midimu yonso ya bianza, bua kulongololeye bintu bia or ne bia argent ne bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne bintu bidibo basonga n abi mabue, ne bidibo basonga n abi mitshi, ne midimu yonso ya bantu badi ne lungenyi lule
Kadi mutshi uvua pankatshi pa mitshi mikuabu uvua mutshiamakane mutue eku ne eku mu nzubu mujima wa tshijila
Bantu aba ne bena mudimu bebe badi bimana ku mpala kuebe badi bunvua lungenyi luebe badi ne disanka dinene
Ebi mbidia bitu biafuma mu diulu, bua muntu kudia biandi, kafu
Yesu wakamba ne, Nuenu bamanyi ba mikenshi, mulau ulualua kunudi kabidi, bua nuenu nutu nuateka ham bidi ha bantu majitu adi bualu bukole ha kuatuala, kadi nuenu kanutu nuâlenga munu
Ne mabue a nvula manene a bujitu bua ntalanta adi afuma mu diulu adi ahonena bantu; ne bantu bakahenda Nzambi bualu bua dikenga dia mabue a nvula; bualu bua dikenga diau diakatamba bunene
Nanku neupeshe Arone ne bana bende bena Levi, bua babambuluishe muabu muonsu mu dina dia bena Izrayele bakuabu, balame nzubu wa tshijila
Bena Izrayele kujuka mu dinda dionsu, kufilabu milambu ya kuosha ne ya ditua ndondu

Mbalanda watshi wakatangilangana ne tshiendelu tshia mu lubanza; bifuanyikishi bia mabue a ngashi biakadi ha biluwa biatshi, ku luseke elu ne ku luseke lukuabo; ne tshibandilu tshiatshi tshiakadi ne bidiatshilu muanda mukulu
Kuakashihelabo Yesu kuakadi muaba wa mitshi ya mamuma; mu muaba au muakadi lukita luhia luhia, muakadi tshitalu katshi tshianze kujikibuamu diambedi
Hashishe nakambila bakadi mu buhika malu onso akandeshabo kudi Yehowa
Bena Peleshete bakangata mushete wa Nzambi, bakalua n au mu nsubu wa Dagona, bakauteka hehi ne Dagona
Yeye wakamuhabi, wakaya kudiye, ne mukashi wakimita difu kudiye
Nyeye utudi tuamba, tudimusha muntu yonso ne tuyisha muntu yonso mu meshi onso, bua tuetu tumanye mua kumuenesha muntu yonso muakane tshishiki mu Kilisto
Shimishona wakamba ne, Nfuafue ne Bena Peleshete
Ne bitalu biabo nebilale mu musesu wa musoko mimene, udibo babikila mu meshi a nyuma Sodoma ne Ejipitu, kuakadi kabidi Mukelenge wabo mushihibue ku mutshi mutshiamakane
Tshisangilu tshia ntwadijilu badi batshilombola kudi mufundi wa mikanda wa dipoko wa buludiki bwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga
Binuikala bakenge tshianana bulelela

Nuenu nuakukudimuka mpindiu, nuakuenza bualu ebu buakadi buakane ku mesu kuanyi, hanuakumanyishangana dî dia budishikaminyi, muntu ne muntu ne muena mutumba n andi, ne hanuakuhunga mei bua muanda eu mu nsubu udibo bambikidila

Yeye kena kunoko, wakubika; numiluke bu muakanuambileye hakadiye mu Galela ne, Budi Muana wa muntu n abu mbua kumufilabo mu bianza bia bantu babi ne bua kumushihabo ku mutshi mutshiamakane ne bua kubikeye kabidi hahita matuku asatu
Hakashikishabo kutengula bantu bonso, bobo bakashala mu miaba yabo mu tshitudilu tô ne hakondahibuabo
Mukelenge wa Sulia wakadianjila kuambila tupitene tua makalu andi makumi asatu ne tubidi ne, Kanuluanganyi ne bantu bakese anyi banene anu ne mukelenge wa Isalele mene
Shaula wakashiha Bena Amaleka ku Hawila tô ne ku Shû udi ku mpala kua Ejipitu
Bena Peleshete bakatamba kulonda ku nyima ha buihi ne Shaula ne bana bandi balume; Bena Peleshete bakashiha Yonatana ne Abinadaba ne Malakishua, bana balume ba Shaula
Anu Yonatana, muana wa Asahele, ne Yahezeya, muana wa Tikewa, bakabanga bualu ebu; Meshulama ne Shabetai, Muena Lewi, bakabakuatshisha
Kadi Maweja Nangila kena muitabe dilomba dianyi to
Paulo wakamba ne, Yone wakadi ubatiza bantu ne dibatiza dia kukudimuna kua mitshima wambila bantu ne, Mbimpe bia nuenu kuitabusha ulualua ku nyima kuanyi, au udi Yesu mene
Bena Isalele bakambila Bena Hiwi ne, Bumue nuenu nudi ba munkatshi muetu, nunku netuhunge n enu tshihungidi munyi
Mbulamatadi udi ushindika ne muntu yônso udi mwa kwikala ne bintu biende nkayende anyi ne bintu bia mu tshibûngi bipeta bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu anyi bunkambwa
Yeye wakambila Yetê, muan a bute wandi, ne, Bika, ubashihe
Moshe ne Arone kudiela panshi kumpala kua bena Izrayele bonsu
Ndi ntumbisha dina dia Maweja Nangila
Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Yeye neamuteke ha mutu ha bintu biandi bionso
Mampa a tshijila anudi nundambula, ashale anu pa mesa apu kashidi
Nenvuishe muana wa muhika webe tshisabata tshinene bualu bua yeye udi muana webe
Yehowa udi wamba nunku

Nunku bena ekelesia ba mu Yudaya yonso ne ba mu Galela ne ba mu Samalea bakadi ne ditalala, bakadi badiunda mu bualu bua Nzambi; bakadi benda mu dishina dia Mukelenge ne mu disamba dia Nyuma Muimpe; bakadi bavulangana ba bungi

halua lusenga kudiungusha mu mishiki, Wewe udi mua kukebela mukashi wa nyama wa ntambue bintu bia kudieye, habutamabo mu mikele yabo, Udi uhesha nyunyu wa tshikololo tshia kudia tshiandi, Yobo Udi mumanye tshikondo tshidi mbushi idi yenda ha Udi mumanye mua kubala ngondo idiyi ikumbasha bua kulela, Idi inama hanshi, idi ilela bana bai, Bana bai badi bakola, badi baheta bukole mu mpata, Wakutuma nyama wa mpunda wa mu mpata bua kuyeye mu budishikaminyi buandi nganyi

Yone kudi ekelesia muanda mutekete idi mu Asia, ngasa ikale kunudi ne ditalala, bia kudi Yeye udiku ne wakadiku ne udi ulua; ne kudi Nyuma muanda mutekete idi ku mpala kua nkuasa wandi wa butumbi; ne kudi Yesu Kilisto, mumanyishi wa kueyemena, muledibue diambedi wa ku bafue, ne mukokeshi wa bakelenge ba ha buloba
Bene hadada wakanyemena mu musoko, wakabuela mu tshisokomenu munda mua nsubu
Yehowa avudishile bintu biandi disanka, itabushe mudimu wa bianza biandi: atshibule nyima ya bantu badi bahika ku mpala kuandi, ne ya badi n andi lukuna bua kababiki kabidi

Nanku pikala Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupesha biakudia bia bungi mu madimi enu, misangu mikuabu kanuena mua kuambula tshia dikumi bua kutshinkisha muaba wikalaye musungule bua kusomba, bualu njila neikale mupite bule

Ne tudi ne di diakamba baprofete ditamba kujadikibua; nunku nudi nuenza bimpe binuadimuka bienu, bu mudibu kudi muinda udi utema mu muaba wa midima, tô ne hatshia butuku ne habanda mutoto wa nkesha mu mitshima yenu; numanye bualu ebu diambedi ne, Kakuena diyisha dia baprofete dia mu Mukanda wa Nzambi didi difuma ku dijingulula dia muntu

Bintu bia kutempa n abi bia mu tshianza tshiandi tshia balume biakamulesha bua Yelushalema bantu kushikamamu, mua kuela mbila ya nvita, mua kujadika mitshi minene ku mpala kua bibi bua kubishimbula, mua kuela mishiki ya buloba ne kuasa bibumba bia kutshintshimika n abi musoko

Kanudi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu tshia dikumi tshia manvua enu, anyi tshia nvinyo yenu mihia mihia, anyi tshia manyi enu, anyi tshia ban a bute ba ngombe yenu ne ba mikoko yenu: nansha milambu yenu mudi nuditshiha n ai, nansha bintu bidi mitshima yenu misue kufila, nansha milambu idibo bakuha: kadi nubidie ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, musungule, ne wewe ne muana webe mulume ne muana webe mukashi ne muhika webe mulume ne muhika webe mukashi, ne Muena Lewi udi ku mbelu kuenu: nuikale ne disanka ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu malu onso anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu
Pashishe, kuinshi kua muntumpu aku, ulembelejeku ndibu ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi pankatshi pa tumuma tua grenade
Kumupatulabu lukasa mu nzubu wa lukanu
Yehoyada wakahunga tshihungidi hankatshi ha Yehowa ne mukelenge ne bantu ne, Tuetu netuikale bantu ba Yehowa; wakahunga tshihungidi tshikuabo hankatshi ha mukelenge ne bantu
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Jeremiah Bualu bua Bena Amona
Monai, ndi nutumina mulayi wa Tatu wanyi; kadi nushale mu musoko eu tô ne hanuluatshishabo bukole bua mu diulu
Nunku bakaya ku musoko: hakambabo kubuela mu musoko, Samuele wakasungila n abo bua kuyeye ku mutu kua mukuna

Hashishe Yaele, mukashi wa Hebê, wakangata mutshi wa mulondo wa ntenta, ne marteau mu tshianza tshiandi, wakaya kudiye bitekete bitekete, wakamukumina mutshi au ha luhuhu luandi; ne mutshi wakahatuka, wakabuela mu buloba; bualu bua yeye wakadi mulale tshihuka, mutambe kuhungila, nunku wakafua
Davidi wakebesha Nzambi ne, Nye bua kuluangana ne Bena Peleshete, anyi
Pashishe nyama kayena mua kushipa muntu to, tshianana meme nenyishipeshe kabidi
Nebamufile mu bianza bia bantu ba bisamba bia bende, nebamuseke, nebamuhende, nebamutuile mate; nebamukume, nebamushihe; kadi hahita matuku asatu, neabike kabidi
Kadi badi kabai mu ekelesia, Nzambi nkayandi udi ubalumbuluisha
Mikumbi yakamuangalaka buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, yakatamba bungi, kakuakadi mikumbi bu ei diambedi, ne mikuabo bu ei kayena ilua kabidi
Bavua benza nabi kabidi bitaku bia makunji a ku lupangu ne a ku tshibuelelu tshia lupangu, kabidi ne milonda ya bitupa ya ku nzubu wa tshijila ne ya ku lupangu
Hashishe Atalaya wakadihanda bilulu biandi, wakamba ne, Kutungila kua tshitungu, kutungila kua tshitungu
Kadi yeye wakabandamuna ne, Wakungondaha wakungambila ne, Ambula bulalu buebe, endaku
Nunku Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bana benu banuakushiha ne banuakuladika hanshi munkatshi muau badi munyinyi, ne musoko eu udi luesu lunene; kadi nennuhatule munkatshi muau
Hazaele Udi Ubuela mu Bukelenge bua Sulia Elisha wakaya ku Damaseke
Kalongu kinâyi : Bidi bitangila Tshibutshilu tshia ditunga tshiabanyi tshia mpetu ne bintu
Mulami wa nsubu wa lukanu wakamanyisha Paulo mei â ne, Balumbuludi bakutuma bua kunulekela; nunku nuluhuke mpindiu, nuye talala
Hakadiye utendelela mu nsubu wa Niseloka, nzambi wandi, Adalameleke ne Shalese, bana bandi balume, bakamushiha ne muele wa nvita, bakanyema mu buloba bua Alalata
Bakadi baya ne bantu bakuabo babidi, benji ba malu mabi, bua kubashiha n andi
Hakamutangila tatu wa mukashi, yeye wakadi ne disanka bua kusangakena n andi

Nutumikile badi banukokesha, nubakokele; bua bobo badi bikale ne tshitabala bua mioyo yenu, bu bantu balua kubadila Nzambi bintu; bua bobo benze bualu ebu ne disanka, kabai ne manunganyi, bua bualu ebu kabuena bamukuatshisha

Fundila muanjelo wa ekelesia wa ku Filadelefia ne, Ndi mumanye midimu yebe tangila, nakuteka tshibi tshiunzulula ku mpala kuebe, tshidi mukuabo kai mua kutshinshila ne, Wewe udi ne bukole bukese, ne wakalama dî dianyi, ne kuakahidia dina dianyi
Mukelenge wakabika butuku, wakambila bantu bandi ne, Nennuambile bu muakatuenzela Bena Sulia
Wakadi uhingana ku Lama bualu bua nsubu wandi wakadiku: wakalumbululaku Bena Isalele, wakashilaku Yehowa tshioshelu
Tudi bamanye ne, Tuetu tudi ba Nzambi, ne ba ha buloba bonso badi balala mu bubi

Wakautuma mu bianza bia Elasa, muana wa Shafana, ne Gemaleya, muana wa Hilekiya udi Sedekiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, mutume ku Babulona kudi Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wamba ne, Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wambila bantu bonso bakumushisheye mu Yelushalema bua kubuelabo mu buhika mu Babulona dî edi ne, Asai nsubu, nushikamemu; nukune bintu mu madimi, nudie mamuma abi
Papita Maweja Nangila bua kushipa bena Ejipitu, neamone mashi adi kulu kua tshiibi ne ku mabaya adi ku nseke yatshi
Nunku wewe mubambile ne, Hanuanyukula bintu bidi bitamba buimpe, bintu ebi nebikale bibadibue kudi Bena Lewi bu bintu biakuvulangana ku tshishihuidi ne ha tshikaminu
Yeye wakakuata bakulu ba mu musoko ne meba a mu tshihela ne mingonge, yeye wakatuisha n abo Bena Sukota
Kadi Yesu wakabela nyuma wa bukoya, wakashikisha disama dia muana, wakamuhingisha mu bianza bia tatu andi
Mahalelela wakikala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asambombo ne bitanu, wakalela Yalede
Numushe mikiya yenu dituku disatu ne dia muanda mutekete

Nunku nakadi kulala hanshi diba adi, nakadi kuikala holâ; hohamue ne bakelenge ne bena meji ba ha buloba, anyi hohamue ne bakokeshi bakadi ne biamu bia or, Nakadi kuikala bu muana wa kabishi musokoka, Ku muaba au bantu babi badi halekela kutatshisha banga bantu, Ku muaba au bena lukanu badi bashikama talalâ, Bahuekele ne baneme badiku, Bualu kai yeye udi uha muntu udi mu dikenga munya, Badi bajinga lufu, ne kaluena tulua kudibo, Bobo badi basanka bikole, Bua tshinyi Nzambi udi uhesha muntu udi ne nshila wandi musokoka munya, Kuhumuna kuanyi kudi kulua ku mpala kua bia kudia bianyi, Bualu bua tshindi utshina tshidi tshinkuata; Tshiena ne ditalala, tshiena mua kushikama holâ; Job Hashishe, Elifaza, Muena Temana, wakakudimuna Yobo ne, Biakeba muntu kukuambila dî mpindiu, neukuate tshiji, anyi
Hakadiye mu musoko mukuabo, muntu wakadiku, wakadi ne disama dia nsudi dia bungi; hakamoneye Yesu, wakatua mpala hanshi, wakamutendekena, wakamba ne, Mukelenge, biwasua, udi mumanye mua kundengesha
Mifundu yaadi mmienza ne mutu wa nkashama mweela munkatshi, ku dia bakaji ne ku dia balume kudi mubanga wa kapumbu ne difuma,biônso biteeka pa dibwe
Bualu bua bobo bakadi ne bungi bua bintu bia kuenza n abi mudimu wonso, ne bintu bikuabo ha mutu
Anjai kutshina Yehowa, numukuatshile mudimu mu bulelela ne mitshima yenu yonso; elanganai meji a malu manene akanuenzeleye
Malonga onso a or ne a argent akadi binunu bitanu ne nkama inai
Ndi mukelenge muedibue manyi ha mutu kadi bualu ebu budi buntekesha lelu; bantu aba, bana ba Seluya, badi bampite bukole; Yehowa afute muenji wa malu mabi bu mudi bubi buandi
Nakabikila munanga bua kulua mu buloba, ne ha mikuna ne ha maminu ne ha nvinyo ne ha manyi, ne ha bintu bionso bidi buloba bulua n abi; ne kudi bantu ne nyama, ne ku midimu yonso ya ku bianza biabo
Bumuka mu Sukote, kufikabu ku Etame, ku muelelu wa tshipela
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Udi udituadila dikenga diebe bua malu ebe a tshikama ne a bundu
Kutekabu kakanu aku pankatshi pa tshilambuilu luseke lua kuinshi
Hashishe, Mose wakabanda ne Alona ne Nadaba ne Abihu ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele makumi muanda mutekete
Mabue a mvula awu kushipa bantu ne bimuna bia mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Mulambu kununkilawu Maweja Nangila mupuya muimpe
Matthew Yesu wakabuela mu buatu, wakasabuka, wakalua mu musoko muandi
Hakahita ngondo dikumi ne ibidi, yeye wakadi wendakana mu mbalasa wa bukelenge mu province wa Babulona
Bantu bakeyemena mei a Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda
Muntu yonsu udi wangata makuta a mabuejila bua kushipa muntu udi kayi ne bualu, asangane muena tshibawu kuenza anyi

Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Binuamanya mua kushiha tshihungidi tshianyi tshinakahunga ne munya ne tshihungidi tshianyi tshinakahunga ne butuku, bua munya ne butuku kabikadiku mu tshikondo tshiabi; nunku nebamanye mua kushiha tshihungidi tshinakahunga ne Davidi muntu wanyi, bua yeye kikadi ne muana mulume wa kushikama mu nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge bua kukokesheye, ne tshinakahunga ne Bena Lewi bakuidi, bankuatshidi ba mudimu
Nyuma wa bukoya wakamuhaluisha, wakela dî diandi bikole, wakahatuka munda muandi
Kadi Yehowa wakangunvuila musangu eu kabidi

Ndi ndomba bualu ebu ne, Luse luenu lutambe kudiundadiunda mu dimanya ne mu dijingulula dia malu onso; bua nuenu mimanye mua kujadika malu adi makane; ne bua nuenu nuikale ne mitshima mitoke, kanui balenduishi ba bakuabo, tô ne halua dituku dia Kilisto; ne bua nuenu nûshibue tente ne mamuma a buakane adi afuma kudi Yesu Kilisto bua butumbi ne kutumbishibua bia Nzambi

Wakangata tshifulu tshia butumbi tshia mukelenge tshiakadi ku mutu kuandi; bujitu buatshi buakadi bua ntalanta wa or, tshiakadi tshilengeshibue ne mabue, a mushinga mukole; bakatshiasa ku mutu kua Davidi
Bafalese bakuabo bakadi n andi, hakunvuabo mei â, bakamukonka ne, Tuetu kabidi, tudi bafofo, anyi
Tshibangidilu Diledibua dia Izake Maweja Nangila kusankisha Sara, kumukumbaja bionsu bivuaye mumulaye
Bualu bua ndi ne malu a bungi a kunufundila, tshiakasua kunufundila ha mabeshi ne mai a mikanda; kadi ndi ntekemena bua kulua kunudi, ne bua kuakula n enu ku mesu, bua disanka dienu dikumbashibue
Hakaya nsongalume, Davidi wakajuka ku muaba wandi wa ku luseke lua Sude, wakakuma mpala wandi hanshi, wakakukuila Yonatana misangu isatu, bakasangana mishiku, bakadilangana tô ne hakahita Davidi
Nzambi wakasokolola bubi bua bantu bebe, tangila, buonso buetu tudi bahika bebe, ne tuetu ne muntu wakasanganabo ne luhanza
Mukelenge wa Babulona wakaya ne bena bukitu bonso bu binunu muanda mutekete ku Babulona mu buhika, ne bena mudimu ne hatudi ba biamu tshinunu ne bantu bonso bakadi ne bukole bua kuluangana mata
Yehowa wakankonka ne, Yelemiya, udi umona tshinyi
Etshi netshikale tshimanyinu kudi Bena Isalele

Kadi nuenu suai badi n enu lukuna, nubenzele bimpe, nubasombeshe bintu, kanui nubitekemena kabidi; nunku difutu dienu nedikale dinene, nenuikale bana ba Udi Mutambe Bunene wa mu diulu, bualu bua yeye udi wenzela badi kabai bamusakidila ne badi babi malu mimpe

Mu dituku adi nebele mpungi munene; bakadi bamba kufua mu buloba bua Ashû, Yeshaya Mulau wikale kudi tshifulu tshia bunfumu tshia diambu tshia bakuatshiki ba maluvu ba mu Efelayima, Monai, Mukelenge udi ne muntu munene ne mukole Tshifulu tshia bunfumu tshia diambu tshia bakuatshiki ba maluvu ba mu Efelayima Tshilongo tshidi ne bulengele buatshi bua butumbi tshidi tshifubidila, Mu dituku adi Yehowa wa misumba neikale tshifulu tshia butumbi Neikale nyuma wa kulumbulula kuakane kudi muntu udi mushikame mu tshilumbuluidi, Kadi bantu aba mene badi batshinkakana ne nvinyo, Mesa onso adi mabuikila ne bilushi biabo ne bukoya, Neayishe muntu kai lungenyi
Palô wakamba ne, Nennulekele, nuye mu tshihela bua kushihela Yehowa Nzambi wenu nyama, kadi kanuyi kule, nundombele Nzambi
Bena Izrayele ne ndelanganyi yabu yonsu nebalame mukenji ewu kashidi
Shaula wakajuka, bubidi buabo bakahatuka, yeye ne Samuele
Meku onsu a bena Ngade aa avua ne bantu balume
Ndi nuambila ne, Muntu au wakuhueka ku nsubu kuandi mubinge, mukuabo muhile; bualu bua wadibandisha nebamuhuekeshe, wadihuekesha nebamubandishe
Mesu andi adi ludimi lua kahia, ne ha mutu bandi hadi bifulu bia butumbi bia bungi; ne udi ne dinu difunda, didi muntu kai mudimanye, anu yeye nkayandi

Hashishe yeye wakahitshila n anyi mu mushiku wa mbelu udi hehi ne tshibuelelu, wakabuela n anyi mu nsubu nujidile bakuidi yakadi mitangile ku luseke lua nôde; nakatangila muaba mukuabo kundekelu kuai ku luseke lua wesete
Kadi bakelenge bonso bakabambila ne, Tuakamana kuditshiha kudibo mu dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ne katataka katuena bamanye mua kubalenga tshianza

Hakitabusheye, Paulo wakimana ha tshibandilu, wakahoha bantu tshianza; hakahuabo talala, yeye wakabambila di mu muaku wa Bena Ebelu, wakamba ne, Acts Bana betu ne batatu, unvuai divila dianyi dindi musue kunuambila katataka
Yesu ne bayidi bandi bakaya mu misoko ya Kaisalia wa Filipoi; yeye wakakonka bayidi bandi mu nshila ne, Bantu badi hangamba meme ne, Nganyi

Mukelenge wa Isalele wakamba ne, Kuatai Mikaya, nuye n andi kudi Amona, gouverneur wa musoko ne kudi Yoasha, muenyampala; nuambile gouverneur ne, Mukelenge udi wamba ne, Buesha muntu eu mu nsubu wa lukanu, umudishe bidia bia dikenga ne mai a dikenga tô ne hanahingana ne ditalala

Kanungu ka Pa kumbusha tusumbu tukese twa matuku mala ne twa pa bwâtu, bibambalu biônso bibidi bidi mwa kushimika kamwe anyi tusumbu twa bûngi tudi tusambakaja bantu bûngi bwa momumwe nseka yônso bwa kutwangaja ngelelu wa meeji padiyo kayiyi ipetangana pa mwanda udi ukengela ne tuswika dîyi dimwe mu ngakwilu wa momumwe
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Tshiakatatshisha Bena Isalele, kadi anu wewe ne ba mu nsubu wa tatu webe, bualu bua nuenu nuakahetula mikenji ya Yehowa, nuakalonda Bâla
Hashishe, mukelenge Dayawesha wakafunda mukanda, wakautumina bantu bonso ba mu bisamba bionso ne ba miaku yonso, badi bashikame mu buloba buonso, ubambila ne, Ditalala divulangane kunudi
Mvidi Mukulu kuambila Abrahame ne: Kubikidi kabidi mukajebe ne Sarayi to
Wakoluela bayidi bandi tshianza, wakamba ne, Monai mamu wanyi ne bana betu
Mushiki eu wikale mumanyi wa bualu ne dibue edi dikale mumanyi wa bualu, ne, Meme tshiena nsambuka mushiki eu bua kukuenzela bibi, ne wewe kuena usambuka mushiki eu ne dibue bua kungenzela bibi
Kadi yeye wakabandamuna ne, Ba mu tshikondo tshibi ne tshia masandi, badi bakeba tshimanyinu; kabena babaha tshimanyinu tshikuabo anu tshia muprofete Yona
Bikala dî diandi ditusankisha anyi kadiyi ditusankisha, netutumikile dî dia Yehowa Nzambi wetu, utudi tukutuma, bua tuetu tuikale ne diakalengele hatuatumikila dî dia Yehowa Nzambi wetu
Kadi ndi nuambila bualu ebu ne, Udi ukuna maminu mabalê neahuole mabalê; ne udi ukuna maminu a bungi neahuole a bungi
Yehowa wakamba ne, Bulelela, nenkukoleshe bua wewe kuikala ne diakalengele; bulelela, nenkuakuile kudi bena lukuna bebe mu tshikondo tshia ntatu ne tshia dikenga
Yeye wakabatangila buonso buabo, wakamuambila ne, Olola tshianza

Ulengeshe ne udi n ebe lukuna lukasa, hautshidi n andi mu nshila; biwikala kui wenza nunku, udi n ebe lukuna neakufile mu bianza bia mulumbuludi, ne mulumbuludi neakufile mu bianza bia mpolushe, nebakuele mu nsubu wa lukanu
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Bûdi wamba mbulelela
Yeye wakabandamuna ne, Bakanuha bienu lungenyi lua kumanya malu a bukelenge bua mu diulu adi masokoka, kadi kabakabahalu
Ezekiel Hashishe bakulu bakuabo ba mu Bena Isalele bakahia kundi, bakashikama ku mpala kuanyi
Mukashi wakamuambila ne, Bualu nebuikale buakane
Bavua bumvue bibi, bafike kabidi munda bikole, bualu Shekeme uvua muenze bualu bubi bua dikamakama, mubuelele muana wa bende wa Yakobe mu nzubu ku bukole
Yeye wakabambila ne, Luai numone
Nakalota tshilota tshiakankuatshisha buowa; meji anakadi ngela munda ha bulalu buanyi ne bikena kumona binakamona ku mutu wanyi biakantatshisha
Witabusha muprofete mu dina dia muprofete, neahete difutu dia muprofete; witabusha muntu muakane mu dina dia muntu muakane neahete difutu dia muntu muakane
Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Ya biebe mu tshihela bua kusangakena ne Mose Yeye wakaya, wakasangakena handi mu mukuna wa Nzambi, wakatuangana n andi mishiku
Dina diende didi ne bua kujimina mu diku dietu, bua padiye kayi mulele muana wa balume anyi
Kanutahi mputu ham bidi henu bua kujinga n ai bantu bafue, kanutahi nsalu ham bidi henu meme ndi Yehowa
Baprofete bakadiku ku mpala kuanyi ne ku mpala kuebe, mu matuku a kale, bakamba mei a kuhisha n au bisamba bia bungi ne makelenge manene, mei a kubadimusha bua nvita, bua makenga ne bua tshihuhu
Hakadibo baya, balami bakuabo bakalua mu musoko, bakambila bakuidi banene malu onso
Bulelela, meme ndi bu muena tshiota tshienu, kadi mukuabo udiku udi untamba meme kuikala wa ha buihi ne tshiota mene

Ne biasua muntu kubenzela bibi, kahia kadi kahatuka mukana muabo, kadi kashidisha badi n abo lukuna; ne biasua muntu kubenzela bibi, budiye n abu mbua kushihibua nunku, Bobo badi ne bukole bua kuinshila diulu, bua nvula kailoki mu matuku a mayisha abo a baprofete, ne badi ne bukole ha mutu ha mai bua kuândamuna mashi ne bua kukuma buloba ne bihuhu misangu yonso yasuabo

Nembadishe munyinyi wa bana babo balume ne munyinyi wa bana babo bakashi; ne buonso buabo, muntu ne muntu, neadie munyinyi wa mulunda wandi, mu kutshintshimika kua musoko ne mu dikenga bidi bena lukuna babo, bobo mene badi bakeba mioyo yabo, babakengesha n abi
Yeye wakamba ne, Bakuetu, ndi nnusengelela ne kanuenji bualu bubi nunku
Bualu bua tudi bamanye ne
Bualu bua Yehowa wa misumba, wakukukuna, wakukuhisha bua wewe kukenga, bualu bua bubi bua Bena Isalele ne bua Bena Yuda, budibo bankuatshishe n abu tshiji, hakafilabo musenga wa manananshi kudi Bâla
Nuenu bafundi ne Bafalese, nudi bena lubombo
Yeye wakamba ne, Bakutumbisha Davidi bua binunu makumi bia bantu, kadi bakuntumbisha meme anu bua binunu bia bantu
Bakaya nkayabo mu buatu ku muaba wa hatuhu
Kadi, padi kanyama aka kafue, kaponena mu ntete mimane kubombeka mu mayi bua kuyidia, ntete ayi idi ipia mikiya
Elasto wakashala ku Kolinto; kadi nakashîa Tofimo ku Melita ne disama
Numanye bienu ne, Luhandu ebi luakutumibua kudi bantu ba bende, bobo kabidi nebumate
Mukelenge Yehowa utu wamba ne, Bualu bua nuakela tshibingu ne, O
Nebashimbule ngumbu ya Tulo, nebabumbule bibumba biandi
Hakatshidibo benda bayikila, monai, dikalu dia kahia ne tubalu tua kahia biakamueneka, biakabahandulula, ne Eliya wakabandishibua mu diulu mu nvunde
Nunku ndi numanyisha ne, Kakuena muntu udi wakula mu Nyuma wa Nzambi, udi wamba ne, Yesu udi muedibue mulau; ne kakuena muntu udi mua kuamba ne, Yesu udi Mukelenge, bikaleye kai mu Nyuma Muimpe
Lea wakimita difu, wakalela muana wa balume, wakamuidika dina ne, Lubena, bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa wakatangila dikenga dianyi, ne katataka bayanyi neansue
Solomo kabidi udi ushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge
Anu meme nkayanyi nakuhanduka bua kukuambila
Munyinyi onsu wa mafuta, wa nyama mudifuile, nansha mushipa kudi nyama mukuabu wa lonji, kabena mua kuudia to, kadi badi mua kukuata nawu midimu mikuabu
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Zebuluna, Gadadiele, muana mulume wa Sodi

Wakenza nunku bua tuetu katuikadi bu bana kabidi badi batshikishibua eku ne eku ne badi batambakashibua ku luhehele luonso lua diyisha, ku majimbu a bantu, ku budimu budibo balonda mu mashimi abo; kadi bua tuetu, hatuamba mei malelela mu luse, tudiunde kudiye mu malu onso, udi mutu, Kilisto mene
Unvuai, nuenu bakelenge, telejai matshu, nuenu bana ba bakelenge; meme mene, meme nengimbile Yehowa musambu; nengimbile Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, musambu wa kumutumbisha n au
Binuayifila kudi gouverneur wenu, yeye neikale n enu disanka, anyi

Bena Kasada bakakosa makunshi a tshiamu tshia mitaku bituha bituha akadi mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne bitekelu bia tshiowelu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku tshinene biakadi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, bakaya ne tshiamu tshia mitaku tshiabi ku Babulona
Bantu ba bungi bafume ku misoko yakadi hehi ne Yelushalema bakadi badiunguisha, batuale basame ne bakadi batatshisha kudi nyuma ya bukoya; masama a buonso buabo akashika
Kanungu ka Muntu yônso udi mwa kuselangana ne muntu ônso udiye musungula; wa bulume anyi bukaji bushilangana ne bwende,ne udi mwa kwaasa dîku
Munkatshi muetu mudi badi ne nvî mitoke tô ne banunu Busambi bua Nzambi budi buta mba bukese kûdi, anyi
Nebakuhedi tô ne ku tshituha tshia bukelenge
Yeye wakadi wamba bualu bua Nzambi mu nsunagoga ya mu Galela
Bânaba wakasua kuya kabidi ne Yone wakadibo babikila ne, Mâko
Bualu mbimpe kuenzela bena Ejipitu mudimu pa mutu pa kufuila mu tshipela
Bana ba balume ba Ishi: Zoheta ne Bene zoheta
Ku nyima Bena Yuda bakaya kuluangana ne Bena Kanâna ba ku mukuna, ne ba ku luseke lua ku Sude ne mu tshibanda kabidi
Luseke lua Mukanda wa Nzambi luakadiye ubala luakadi luamba ne, Mu kudihuekesha kuandi bakanyanga tshilumbu tshiandi; Muntu mutungula wakakonka Filipo ne, Muprofete udi wamba nganyi
Diyoyo diakadi mu musoko mujima, bantu bakunguila, bakakuata Paulo, bakabanga kumumusha ku bukole mu ntempelo, bibi biakinshidibua lukasa
Kadi dituku dia muanda mukulu, kanuenji mudimu to

Bualu bua benji ba malu mabi nebabutudibue; Tshituha tshihi katshiyi tshianji kuleha, muntu mubi kena wikalaku kabidi; Kadi badi ne mitshima mihuekele nebahiane buloba, Muntu mubi udi welela muntu muakane tshifufu, Mukelenge udi umuseka, bualu bua udi umona ne, Bantu babi badi bahatula muele wa nvita, badi banana buta buabo, Muele wabo wa nvita neutubule mitshima yabo, Bintu bikese bidi muntu muakane n abi bidi bitamba bintu bia bungi Bualu bua maboko a bantu babi neatshibudibue, Yehowa udi mumanye matuku a bantu badi ne mitshima miakane, Kabena bafuishibua bundu bikondo bia diakabi; Kadi bantu babi nebajimine, ne badi ne Yehowa lukuna nebikale Muntu mubi udi usomba bintu, kena ubifuta kabidi; Bualu bua badi Yehowa uvudishila disanka nebahiane buloba, Biendedi bia muntu bidi bijadikibua kudi Yehowa, Biatankukeye, kena udishinda tshiula, Nakadi nsongalume, katataka nakulua muntu mukole; Dinda tô ne ku dilolo yeye udi ulesha bantu luse, udi ubasombesha bintu; Umuka ku malu mabi, enza malu mimpe; Bualu bua Yehowa udi unanga kulumbulula kuakane, Bantu bakane nebahiane buloba, Mukana mua muntu muakane mudi muamba mei a lungenyi, Mukenji wa Nzambi wandi udi mu mutshima wandi; Muntu mubi udi utentekela muntu muakane, Yehowa kena umushiya mu tshianza tshiandi, Windile Yehowa, ulamate nshila wandi, Nakumona muntu mubi muikale ne bukole buandi bua bungi, kadi nakahitshilaku, ne mona, yeye kakadiku; Tangila muntu udi ne mutshima mutoke bimpe, mona muntu udi Kadi batomboki nebabutudibue, buonso buabo mene
Udi wenza tshinyi mu muaba eu

Bena Gêshona bakangata tshiabo tshituha munkatshi mua meku a tshisamba tshia Yisakâ ne mu tshisamba tshia Ashê ne mu tshisamba tshia Nafatale ne mu tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe tshia mu Bashana, bimenga dikumi ne bisatu
Arone kuolola diboku ku mutu kua mayi onsu mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Davidi wakambila Akisha ne, Wewe neumanye bu mudi muntu webe musue kuenza
Muanjelo wakabambila ne, Kanutshinyi, bualu bua nakunusua ne lumu luimpe lua disanka dinene, nedikale kudi bantu bonso; lelu bakunulelela Musungidi mu musoko wa Davidi, yeye udi Kilisto Mukelenge
Anyi biambeye bualu, kena ubuenza, anyi
Bakashala Palô misoko ya kutekelamu bintu biandi, mena ai Pitoma ne Lamesese
Pashishe Yakobe kupukila Rakele ne disanka, udila muadi, umuambila ne: Ndi mulele webe
Bua tshimpanga tshiwakamona tshiakadi ne nsengu ibidi, nsengu ai idi bukelenge ba Bena Madai ne Bena Pelesa
Yeye wakasa bioshelu bia ku mutu kua mikuna mu misoko yonso ya Yuda bua kuoshelahu musenga wa manananshi bua kufuisha Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua bandi, tshiji
Mona, muntu udi Nzambi ubela udi ne disanka; nunku kubengi dikengesha didi Wa Bukole Buonso ukuyisha n adi
Bakakonkangana ne, Wakuenza bualu ebu nganyi
Awu kumutandisha, wamba ne: Atshi ntshilota kayi
Bakamuebesha ne, Mesu ebe adi matabale munyi
Kadi, Abrahame kuela Abimeleke lusanzu bua tshiina tshia mayi tshivua bena mudimu bende bakandamana natshi
Nyunyi yonsu idi kayiyi ne mikiya, nudi mua kuyidia
Nanku Maweja Nangila neabipate
Yeye wakashi kama luseke lumue ne banowi, bakamulesha mateta akamanabo kukanga, yeye wakadia, wakukuta, wakashiya makuabo
Kuandamukaye lupingu lua luepu

Bulelela, Nzambi kena uhidia muntu udi muakane tshishiki, Yeye neanji kûsha mukana muebe ne tuseku Bena lukuna bebe nebafuishibue bundu, Job Hashishe, Yobo wakamukudimuna ne, Ndi mumanye bimpe ne, Bualu ebu mbulelela; Biasueye kuelangana n andi mpata, Yeye udi ne meji mu mutshima, ne udi ne bukole buhite, Yeye udi umusha mikuna minene kayiyi mimanye bualu, hayikudimuneye mu tshiji tshiandi
