Bu mudi ngasa wa Nzambi mumpeshibue bu muibaki udi ne meshi, meme nakajadika bishimikidi bia nsubu, kadi mukuabo udi wasa ha mutu habi
Yeye wakambila bana babo ne Bakumpingashila argent yanyi, idi mu tshibombi, mitshima yabo ya kahandika, bakazakala, bakambila ngana ne, Bualu ebu buakutuenzela Nzambi budi tshinyi
Yeye udi uvuisha makasa anyi bu makasa a ngulungu; udi unshikika ha miaba yanyi mibanda
Longololayi nsuki yenu bimpe

Biela muntu meshi ne, Ndi ngenzela muan anyi mukashi utshidi kamama bibi; ne bikala mukashi muhite tshikondo tshiandi tshia dibaka, ne bikaleye ne bualu bua kuenza nunku, tatu enze bualu bu mudiye musue; yeye kena wenza bibi; babake biabo
Genesis Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Abalahama hehi ne mitshi ya telebinta ya Mamale hakadiye ushikama ku mbelu kua ntenta wandi munda munya

Etshi ntshintu tshia tshijila tshia Alona ne tshia bana bandi balume munkatshi mua milambu ya Yehowa idibo bosha ha kahia mu dituku diakabasunguleye bua kuenzelabo Yehowa mudimu wa buakuidi, Yehowa wakela mukenji wandi kudi Bena Isalele bua kubahabo tshintu etshi mu dituku diakabasunguleye
Nuteleje muntu yonsu, mubanji ne mupele, kakuyi kansungansunga
Mu dituku adi munya kawena utema bikole, ne mufitu kawena wikalaku; kadi nedikale dituku dimue ha buadi, didi dimanyibua kudi Yehowa; kakuena munya, kakuena butuku; kadi hila butuku, munya neuteme
Davidi wakunyua lumu mu tshihela ne, Nabala udi ukosa miosa ya mikoko yandi
Eleyasafa muana mulume wa Laele neikale mukelenge wa nsubu wa batatu ba Bena Gêshona

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu muaba eu unudi nuamba ne, Udi munyanguke, kauyi ne bantu anyi bimuna, mu misoko ya mu Yuda ne mu misesu ya Yelushalema yakushala hatuhu, kayiyi ne bantu, kayiyi ne bena nsubu, kayiyi ne nyama, nebunvue kabidi dî dia kunaya ne dia disanka, dî dia mubaki wa mukashi ne dia mukashi mubaka, dî dia bantu badi bamba mei abo, haluabo ne milambu ya kusakidila n ai Yehowa mu nsubu muandi ne, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Mu muaba eu mudi tshihela tshia hatuhu, kauyi ne bantu ne kauyi ne nyama, ne mu misoko yau yonso, nemuikale miaba ya balami kushikamamu, baladika mikoko yabo
Bakajadika makunshi a nsubu wa Yehowa mu tshidimu tshinai tshia bukelenge, mu ngondo wa Ziwa
Ndi mua kubitabusha ku bianza bienu, anyi
Wakamulenga bianza ku mesu andi tshiakabidi; mufofo wakatangila talalâ, wakatabala kabidi, wakamona bintu bionso bimpe

Hashishe, Yoshua wakabikila bantu dikumi ne babidi bakasunguleye munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, muntu wa mu tshisamba ne tshisamba; Yoshua wakabambila ne, Hitai ku mpala kua mushete wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munkatshi mua Yadene, muntu ne muntu ambule dibue, aditeke ha diaha diandi, bu bungi bua bisamba bia Bena Isalele; nunku mabue au neikale munkatshi muenu bu tshivulukidi, ne hanukonka bana benu mu tshikondo tshialua ne, Mabue â ntshinyi
Hashishe mukelenge wakambila Itai, Muena Giti ne, Wewe uyaya n etu kabidi bua tshinyi
Yeye wakuamba ne, Funda; bualu bua mei â adi mei a kueyemena ne malelela
Ndi nkusengelela bua muan anyi wa mu Kilisto Onesimo unakuela mu lukanu luanyi
Numanyishe bana benu mei â, nubambileu hanuashikama mu nsubu yenu ne hanuenda mu nshila ne hanuaya ne hanuabika
Mikenji mishilangane Mukaji kena mua kuvuala bilamba bia mulume
Nunku, Yesu kabidi, bua kujidileye bantu ne mashi andi, wakakenga ha bule ha tshibi tshia musoko
Kadi yeye wakabambila ne, Nuenu nubahe bia kudia
Hashishe Tatenai, gouverneur wa buloba budi dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, ne Shetâ bozenai ne bena mulongo wabo bakenza bualu buakabambila mukelenge Dayawesha ne mitshima yabo yonso
Gideona, muana wa Yoasha, wakalua mufume ku nvita ku mukuna wa Helese
Abrahame udi wipata Agare ne Ismayele Muana awu kukola, kulekela diamua mabele
Bonso badi bayishi, anyi
Tshikale ne metre abidi ne tshitupa nseke yatshi yonsu
Ndi nnusengelela ne, Yai bienu, nutangile bimpe muaba mudiye musokome ne bantu bakamutangilaku; bualu bua nakunvua lumu ne, Yeye udi ne budimu bua bungi
Yetelo wakamba ne, Yehowa avudishibue disanka, wakanusungila mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu ne mu bianza bia Palô, wakahatula bantu mu bianza bia Bena Ejipitu
Yeye kakadi mumanye mua kumutangila bualu bua tshisumbu tshia bantu ne bualu bua yeye wakadi wa tshituha
Nenkuhe wewe ne tunkanunuina tuebe buloba buonso bua Kanana bûdi wendakanamu, bu buhianyi buenu bua tshiendelele, nengikale Nzambi wabo
Moshe kuebeja Maweja Nangila ne: Udi unkengesha nenku, kuyi umfuila luse bua tshinyi
Bakamulesha mukanda wa muprofete Yeshaya

Deuteronomy Hanuaya kuluangana nvita ne bantu badi n enu lukuna, ne hamutangila tubalu ne makalu ne bantu badi banuhita bungi, kanubatshinyi bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, udi n enu
Nuakuhisha, nuakushiha muntu muakane; yeye kena ufuilangana n enu

Nakalunuisha ba mu Dedana, Tema ne Buza ne bonso badi babeya nsuki yabo biketu; ne bakelenge bonso ba mu Alaba ne bakelenge ba bantu ha bisamba bikuabo badi babuelakana n abo ne badi bashikame mu tshihela; ne bakelenge bonso ba Zimeli ne bakelenge bonso ba Elama ne bakelenge bonso ba Bena Madai; nakalunuisha bakelenge bonso ba ku node ba kule ne ba ha buihi muntu unua ne mukuabo ne ba mu makelenge onso a ha buloba
Nunku yeye wakamuidika dana ne, Gada

Muele wa Yehowa wakula tente ne mashi, Ngombe ya mu mpata neyihueke n ai ku tshishihelu, Bualu bua Yehowa udi ne dituku dia kusombuela Misulu ya Bena Edome neyandamuke kamonyi, Kabena babujima butuku anyi munya; Kadi mpunga tshikola ne nkese nebidiangatshilebu bu miaba yabi; Nebabikile bantu babo banene bua kubuelabo mu bunfumu, Meba neatoloke mu mbalasa yabo ya bunfumu, tshiendelu tshia nyunyu ya nfiondo
Dielulula Nuitabe mikenji ya Mvidi Mukulu Moshe kuambila kabidi bena Izrayele ne: Nuenu bitabe meyi ne mikenji bindi munulongeshe, nenuikale ne muoyi
Hakabika bantu ne dinda dionso, monai, bakasangana bantu aba bonso anu bitalu
Nudilumbuluile bualu munda muenu ne, Bidi bimpe bua mukashi atendelele Nzambi kai ne tshilulu tshibuikila ku mutu kuandi, anyi
Yehowa mene wakungambila ne, Ya uluishe bena buloba ebu, ubabutule
Shaula wakadi ne difuma mu tshianza tshiandi

Eu udi mukenji wa disama dia nsudi dia mu tshilulu anyi dia mu nsubu, ne wa tshiuja kabidi anyi wa tshilamulamu anyi wa ditoba ditoke, bua kubalesha hadi bintu kabiyi biakane ne hadibi biakane eu udi mukenji wa disama dia nsudi
Ebi mbintu bia kujidila n abi tshioshelu, hakelabo manyi ha mutu hatshi
Hashishe Samuele wakangata lusengu lua manyi, wakamuela manyi ha mutu handi munkatshi mua bana babo; Nyuma wa Yehowa wakatulukila Davidi bikole ku dituku adi
Yehowa wakangambilaku tshikondo atshi bua meme nnumanyishe mei ne mikenji, bua nuenu kubienza mu buloba bunudi nubuela bua kubuhiana

Mu matuku a kunshikidilu mukelenge wa ku Sude neamubunde; mukelenge wa ku nôde nealue kumuluisha bu nvunde, muikale ne makalu a nvita ne badi benda ha nyima ha tubalu tua nvita ne mu matu a bungi; neabuele mu matunga a bungi, uhita bu mudi musulu wa mai uhasalala

Yehoshafata wakakokesha mu Yuda; wakadi ne bidimu makumi asatu ne bitanu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu mu Yelushalema; bina dia mamu wandi diakadi Azuba, muana mukashi wa Shilihi
Bulelela
Yeye wakamba ne, Nulue n abi kundi

Nomba Bena Kanâna Badi Baluangana ne Bena Isalele Atada, mukelenge wa Bena Kanâna, wakadi ushikama ku luseke lua ku Sude, wakunvua lumu ne, Bena Isalele badi baya mu nshila wa ku Atalima, yeye wakaluangana ne Bena Isalele, wakaya ne bakuabo mu lukanu
Nebazaze mifuba yabu, babase mikete mipite bungi

Bintu biakafileye biakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete, bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi, mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu, ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kumusha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Nashona, muana mulume wa Aminadaba
Wakamuambila ne, Muan enu wakulua; tatu webe wakushiha muana wa ngombe wa manyi, hua yeye wakumuangata mukole

Bantu bakuabo ba Bena Hiti ne Bena Amole ne Bena Pelese ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse bakadi bashala, bakadi kabayi Bena Isalele; Solomo wakabuesha bana babo bakadi bashala ku nyima kuabo, bakadi kabayi bashihibue kudi Bena Isalele, mu buhika tô ne ku dituku edi
Wewe wakahandulula mai ku mpala kuabo, nunku bakahita munkatshi mua mai manene ha buloba bume; wakela bakadi babalonda mu bunene bua mai bu mudibo bela dibue mu mai manene
Tshiona tshia mahuahua a bakeluba tshiakunvuibua tô ne ku tshiendelu tshia ha mbelu ha nsubu, tshikale tshikole bu dî dia Nzambi Mutambe Bukole hakuleye
Nunku kakuena mukuabo udi mumanye malu a Nzambi, anu Nyuma wa Nzambi udi muamanye
Kadi mukashi eu kena wikala ne diboko dikole; mulume wandi kena ujalama ne diboko diandi kadiena ne bukole
Yeye wakatuma di, bakalua n andi
Lakele wakamba ne, Biwampa tumuma tua muan ebe, Yakoba nealale n ebe butuku ebu

Kanungu ka Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata didi mwa kutwa ndondu anyi kusheemeja diumvwangana, kudisanga anyi kuditeeka mu tshisumbu tshidi tshitekesha budishikaminyi bwadio bwa kuyisha bobumwe bwa bukwa mufika
Hashishe bakalomba mukelenge; Nzambi wakabaha Shaula, muana wa Kishi, muntu wa mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina, tô bidimu makumi anai
Numuambile ne: Yozefe webe udi wamba ne: Tatu afike kuneku lukasa, bualu Mvidi Mukulu mmunteke mulombodi wa ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu
Kadi nuenu nuakandekela, nuakakuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu, tshiena nnusungila kabidi
Muana muakunyi wakambila tatu wandi ne, Tatu, umpe luanyi luseke lua biuma lualua kundi
Hakafikabo ku dibue dinene dia mu Gibeona, Amasa wakasangila habo
Yesu wakumukaku, wakaya mu nseke ya Tulo ne Sidona
Nunku bantu bakadi bamuangalaka buloba bua Ejipitu buonso bua kukeba bisonsa

Muku wa Simona mukashi wakadi mulale hanshi ne disama dia mubidi kahia; bakambila Yesu bualu buandi; wakalua biandi, wakamukuata ku tshianza, wakamubisha; disama dia mubidi kahia diakamulekela, wakabalongoluela bia kudia
Bikale ne bitambala bia lin bisuike ku mitu kuabo, baluate mihanu ya lin mu bimono biabo; kabaluatshi tshintu tshidi mua kubahatuisha tshisululu
Kulondolola Hilama Udi Wanyisha Davidi Sam

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Katshiena tshikala bu tshihungidi tshinakahunga ne batatu babo mu dituku diakabakuata ku tshianza bua kuluhuka n abo mu buloba bua Ejipitu; bualu bua bakashiha tshihungidi tshianyi, ne meme nakadi mukelenge wa ha mutu habo
Hautshidi ufila kuha kuebe ku tshishihelu ne biwavuluka ne, Muan etu udi n anyi bualu, ushîe kuha kuebe ku mpala kua tshishihelu, uye biebe, ulengeshe n andi; hashishe ulue, ufile kuha kuebe
Muakuidi munene wakadihandila bilulu biandi, wakamba ne, Tudi ne bualu bua bamanyi kabidi kudi kunyi

Wewe, bienda ku mpala kuanyi bu muakenza Bayidi tatu ebe, biwatumikila mikenji yonso inakukuambila, biwananukila kulonda mei anyi mafunda ne mei anyi, majalame, nenjadike nkuasa wa bukelenge buebe, bu munakahunga tshihungidi ne Davidi tatu ebe ne, Kuena uhanga muntu wa kukokesha Bena Isalele
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bulelela, Mukelenge, wewe udi mumanye ne, Ndi mukusue
Ndi ngamba tshiakabidi ne, Muntu kambadi meme bu muena kutshimbakana; kadi binuenza nunku, nungitabushe bu muena kutshimbakana bua meme kabidi kumanya mua kuditumbisha kakese
Yeye nealame makasa a bantu bandi ba tshijila, kadi neahuwishe bantu babi mu mîdima: bualu bua muntu kena utamba ku bukole buandi

Hatantamaneye, nebanyenge bukelenge buandi, nebabutahulule tô ne ku mpehele inai ya mu diulu; kadi kabena babuhiana kudi bana bandi, kabuena buikala ne bukole buakadibu n abu hakadiye ubukokeshe; bualu bua nebabuangate, nebabuheshe banga bantu badi kabayi ba munkatshi mua bantu bandi
Kadi bualu bua ditabusha diakumana kulua, katuena mu bulombodi bua ndeshi kabidi

Mukelenge wakambila bena meji ba mu Babulona ne, Muntu yonso wabala tshifundu etshi, wandesha dijingulula diatshi nebamuluatshishe bilulu bikunzubile, nebamuele lukanu lua or mu nshingu muandi, nebamuteke bu muisatu munkatshi mua bakokeshi na bukelenge ebu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Mona, ndi mulue kudi mu ditutu difike, bua bantu bunvue hanayikila n ebe, bobo bitabushe di diebe tshiendelele
Kadi usombe anu mu ditunga edi dindi nkuleja
Dikenga dilualua kudi bantu bualu bua malu adi abalenduisha

Yesu wakabikila tshisumbu tshia bantu kabidi, wakabambila ne, Buonso buenu unvuai, numanye bimpe; tshintu tshionso tshidi anu ham bidi ha muntu, biabuelatshi munda muandi, katshiena tshimanye mua kumubihisha; kadi malu adi aluhuka munda mua muntu ngadi amubihisha
Salai wakadi nkumba, kakadi ne muana nansha

Ka, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ujadike ne muntu webe Davidi tatu wanyi mulayi uwakamuha ne, Wewe kuena uhanga muntu wa kushikameye ku mesu kuanyi mu nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Isalele; bikala bana bebe badimuke mu nshila yabo ku mpala kuanyi bua kuendabo bu muwakuenda ku mpala kuanyi
Biakadi bimpe bua meme kushalaku
Tshikutu tshia kapia ne ndimi yaku kupitabi pankatshi pa bitupa bia nyama bivua Abrame mupande abi
Ndi nuambila nuenu balunda banyi ne, Kanutshinyi badi bashiha mubidi, kadi ku nyima kabena bamanye mua kuenza bunga bualu
Mbushi eu wakadi ne lusengu lumueneka hatoke tô hankatshi ha mesu andi
Yeye kakitabusha bua muntu mukuabo amulonde, anu Petelo ne Yakobo ne Yone muan abo ne Yakobo
Pashishe Leya kulela muana wa bakaji, diende Dina
Kadi diandamuna dia Nzambi didi dimuambila tshinyi
Kanuenji malu mabi, avuabu benza kudi bantu bavua badianjile kuasa mu ditunga edi
Bobo badi benza nunku bua kuangata tshifulu tshia butumbi tshidi tshisunsuke, kadi tuetu mbua kuangata tshidi katshi tshisunsuke

Muntu au, mukelenge wa buloba, wakabambila ne, Ku bualu ebu nemmanye ne, Nudi nuamba mei malelela, nushiye umue wenu kundi, bakuabo benu bangate bia kudia bia kumana n abi tshiole tshidi mu nsubu yenu, yai bienu
Abalama wakadi muikale ne bidimu makumi muanda mukulu ne bisambombo, hakamulelela Haga Yishemaele
Ke muudi ne bua kubajiidila nanku, bua Arone ne ndelanganyi yende bashale batuangaji kashidi

Wakaha bana balume ba Gêshona makalu abidi ne ngombe mai, bu muakadi mudimu wabo wakaha bana balume ba Melali makalu anai ne ngombe muanda mukulu bu muakadi mudimu wabo wakenzabo, ku tshianza tshia Itamâ, muana mulume wa Alona muakuidi

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanusankishe bu muakanulayeye; nuenu nenusombeshe bisamba bia bungi bintu, kadi kanuena nusomba bintu kudibi; nuenu nenukokeshe bisamba bia bungi, kadi bisamba ebi kabiena binukokesha
Nzambi wakafuka muntu ne tshifuanyikishi tshiandi, wakamufuka ne tshifuanyikishi tshia Nzambi, wakabafuka balume ne bakashi

Yehowa, unyishe nshila webe, Kunfidi mu bianza bia bena lukuna banyi bua bangenzele bu mudibo basue; Ndi ngitabusha ne, Nemmone buimpe bua Yehowa Windile Yehowa; Misambu Kûdi wewe, Yehowa nkundi ngela dî dianyi; Unvua dî dia kutendekena kuanyi, Kunkoki bua kuya n anyi diatshimue ne bantu babi, Ubafute bu mudi mudimu wabo, Bualu bua kabena banemeka bienzedi bia Yehowa, Yehowa avudishibue disanka, Yehowa udi bukole buanyi ne ngabu wanyi; Yehowa udi bukole bua bantu bandi, Usungile bantu bebe, uvudishile badi buhianyi buebe disanka; Misambu Samunai Yehowa, nuenu ba mu diulu, Samunai Yehowa ne butumbi budi buakanangane ne dina diandi; Di dia Yehowa didi ha mai; Dî dia Yehowa didi dî dikole, Di dia Yehowa didi ditshibula mitshi ya cèdre, Yeye udi utuhisha mukuna wa Lebanona bu mudi muana wa ngombe utuhika, Di dia Yehowa didi dihenyisha miele ya nvula bu ndimi ya kahia
Filipo wakahueka ku musoko wa Samalea, wakabanga kubambila bua Kilisto
Meme nenshale mu mpata ya tshihela tô ne hangunvua dî kûdi dia kummanyisha malu
Dituku dia dikumi ne anai dia ngondo wa kumudilu ndituku dia kuhita kua Yehowa

Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Nenkanyine mudi wa bia kudia, bua yeye kabutudi bintu bidi buloba buenu bumenesha; ne muonshi wenu wa tumuma mu budimi kawena uhohoka tumuma tua nvinyo hatshididi tubishe

Bualu bua baprofete: Bualu bua buloba budi bûle tente ne bena masandi; Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nakumona malu a hatuhu Nakumona malu mahite bubi Nunku Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba bua baprofete aba ne, Nunku Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Kanunvu mei a baprofete badi banuambila mei
Nunku yeye wakafumaku tubalu ne makalu ne masalayi a bungi; bakayaku butuku, bakanyunguluka musoko
Ukenge n anyi bu mudi disalayi dimpe dia Kilisto Yesu
Badi balengesha bua malu mabi abo badi basemena ha buihi n anyi; badi kule ne mikenji yebe
Tshiena nyamu nansha
Hakadiambabo ne, Tudi bena lungenyi, bakalua bahote
Bakatshintshimika musoko tô ne ku tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshimue tshia bukelenge hua Sedekiya

Kanana wakalela Sidona muaba buta wandi ne Hete ne Bena Yebuse ne Bena Amole ne Bena Gîgashi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Aka ne Bena Sina ne Bena Âwada ne Bena Semâ ne Bena Hamata Ku nyima kua malu au, Bena Kanana bakamuangalaka

Kusombesha Bahele Bintu Bikalaku muntu muhele, umue wa bana benu, ku mbelu kua muntu yonso mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe, kanukoleshi mitshima yenu, kanubuikidi tshianza tshienu kudi muan enu udi muhele; kadi nubulule tshianza tshienu kudiye, numusombeshe bintu bidiye musue bua kushikisheye n abi malu andi

Muhika wandi wakangata nyama ya tumelo dikumi mu tshisumbu tshia tumelo bia mukelenge wandi, wakaya ne biuma bia mukelenge wandi bia mishindu yonso mu tshianza tshiandi, wakabika, wakaya ku buloba bua Mesopotamia, ku musoko wa Naho
Davidi wakebesha Yehowa ne, Nenye kuluangana ne Bena Peleshete, anyi
Potifare umvua muvua muena kuende umulondela bionsu bivua Yozefe muenze abi, kufikaye munda bikole bitambe
Tshisumbu tshinene tshia ngulube tshiakadi mu tshibandabanda tshia mukuna, yakadi idia mashinde
Ambilanganai mei a bushuwa, buonso buenu, muntu ne muntu ne muena mutumba n andi; kosai bilumbu mu bilumbuluidi bidi ku bibuelelu bia musoko ne kulumbulula kua bushuwa ne kua ditalala
Wa bana ba Azegada, Yohanana, muana wa Hakatana; bakadi n andi bakadi balume lukama ne dikumi
Nakasengelela Tito bua kuya, nakatuma muan etu wa mu Kilisto n andi, Tito wakakeba kunutekela budimu, anyi
Yeye wakakonka muhika ne, Eu mulume kai udi wendakana mu budimi bua kusambakana n etu
Yesu wakabandamuna ne, Nuenu ba tshikondo etshi tshia buhidia, nenshale n enu musangu bule munyi
Davidi wakakonka bantu bakadi bimana ha buihi n andi ne, Nebenzele muntu washiha Muena Peleshete eu ne wumusha bundu ku mesu kua Bena Isalele tshinyi

Yone wakabandamuna buonso buabo ne, Bulelela, ndi nubatiza ne mai, kadi udi muntambe meme ulualua, tshiena ne buakane bua kusulula mionshi ya bisabata biandi; yeye neanubatize mu Nyuma Muimpe ne mu kahia; tshihehudi tshiandi tshidi mu tshianza, yeye neatokeshe tshituilu tshiandi bimpe, neasangishe mponda mu mudiba wandi, kadi yeye neoshe bisote mu kahia kadi kakai kajima tshiendelele
Ndi nushila ditalala, ndi nuha ditalala dianyi; tshiena nuhadi bu mudi ba ha buloba banuhadi

Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Binuatangisha mpala yenu bua kuya ku Ejipitu, binuayaku bua kushikama, muele wa nvita unudi nutshina neunuhete mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne tshiole tshinudi nutshina netshinulonde ku nyima kuenu kuakua mu Ejipitu; nenufuileku

Môdekai wakumuka ku mesu kua mukelenge muluate bilulu bia bleu ne bitoke bia bukelenge, ne tshifulu tshia butumbi tshia or, ne tshikowelu tshikunzubile tshia bilulu bia lin; bena musoko bakadi mu Shushana bakela mbila, bakasanka

Kanungu ka Tshipangu tshia mianda ya bubanji ne ya nsombelu wa bweena ditunga tshidi ne mudimu wa kufila ngenyi pa maalu a bubanji ne nsombelu wa bweena ditunga adibo ba tshipeesha kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga, Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshia batshipwita bakulumpa ne kudi Bukalenga bunene
Mukaji udibu babanda ne: mmuende tshiendenda Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Tuambe ne: Mukaji wa bende mmuende tshiendenda
Kadi baminyampala ba Bena Amona bakambila Hanuna, mukelenge wabo, ne, Udi welangana meji ne, Davidi udi utumbisha tatu webe bualu bua yeye wakakutumina bakusambi, anyi

Kanungu ka Bûngi bwabi mu tshipidi tshiônso, midimu ya kutuma dîyi dîba diônso ne miaba yônso idi ne tshia kulondeshila bipangidikilu bilelela bitangila popamwe dikumbana dia mubidi, dia kalasa kalonga, bibidilu bîmpe pamwe ne dileeja dia mpala dia momumwe dia polovensa ne polovensa
Nakasengelela Tito bua kuya, nakatuma muan etu wa mu Kilisto n andi, Tito wakakeba kunutekela budimu, anyi
Wewe newikale udima, kadi buloba kubuyi butoloka bintu bia nsongu
Muena Peleshete wakasemena ha buihi ne Davidi: mutuadi wa ngabu wandi wakaya ku mpala kuandi
Yeye wakamuambila ne Uluhuke, wimane ku mukuna ku mpala kua Yehowa
Dina dia diboko disatu didi Hidekela, didi dinyunguluka ku esete kua buloba bua Ashû

Yehowa wakahita ku mpala kuandi, wakela dî ne, Yehowa, Yehowa, Nzambi wa luse ne dinanga, kena ukuata tshiji lubilu, udi mûle tente ne luse lujalame ne bushuwa, udi ulesha binunu bia bantu luse lujalame, udi ubuikidila bantu malonga abo ne kusambuka kuabo kua mikenji ne malu mabi abo; kadi kena ubingisha muntu udi uhila; udi utumina bana ba tshikondo tshisatu anyi tshinai mibi ya batatu abo
Udi weyemena nganyi mpindiu hawakuntombokela
Yehowa udi muena nvita, Yehowa ndina diandi
Hakabalabo nunku, monai, Yonatana ne muambudi wa ngabu wandi kabakadiku
Malu â akadi enjibua mu Betania dishia dia Yadene, muakadi Yone ubatiza
Nuvuishibue bahia bahia mu nyuma wa meshi enu
Moshe kuambila mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne: Maweja Nangila udi wamba ne: Mundankulu, nempitshile mu ditunga dia Ejipitu

Ne wewe mene kuena uhanduka mu tshianza tshiandi, kadi nebakukuate bushuwa, nebakufile ku tshianza tshiandi; neumonangane ne mukelenge wa Babulona ku mesu mene, ne yeye neayikile n ebe mpala ne mpala mene; neuye ku Babulona
Wakidikisha butshiama bua mushiku wa mbelu wa ku tshibuelelu etshi, wakadi coudées dikumi; ne butshiama bua nshila wa munda mua tshibuelelu buakadi coudées dikumi ne isatu

Bikala lumu luimpe luetu ne tshilulu tshikudika, ludi n atshi anu kudi batshidi bajimina; bakafofomishabo mesu a meshi a badi kabai bitabusha kudi nzambi wa tshikondo etshi, bua dinkenka dia lumu luimpe lua butumbi bua Kilisto, udi tshifuanyikishi tshia Nzambi, kaditemi kudibo
Leya uvua ne bana ba balume basambombu: Rubene, ke muanabute, bamulonda kudi Shimeyone, Levi, Yuda, Isakare ne Zebulone
Kadi mukuabo neakonke ne, Bantu bafue nebabike ku lufu munyi

Bualu bua Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba dî diandi bua makunshi a tshiamu tshia mitaku, biobi biakadi Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, kayi muye n abi hakayeye ne Yekoniya, muana wa Yehoyakima, mukelenge wa Yuda, mu buhika, diatshimue ne bena butumbi bonso ba mu Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema, mumuke n abo ku Yelushalema, muye n abo ku Babulona
Yozefe umona bana babu, kubamanya
Ba Bena Shilona: Asaya, muan a bute wandi ne bana bandi ba balume
Yeye wakajuka, wakamulonda
Yeye kabidi wakahitshisha muan andi wa balume mu kahia, wakatempa mbuku; wakadisunguila bena muhongo ne bena buloshi; wakenza malu mabi a bungi ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kumufuisha n au tshiji
Hakatangila Shaula ne yeye wakadilama bikole bu muena lungenyi, buowa buakamukuata bualu buandi
Muhimbu wa bimanu bia ha mbelu bia nsubu mituangane wakadi coudées itanu, ne tshituha tshia tshibumba tshiakashala tshiakadi coudées itanu
Kadi Yesu wakamba ne, Kanumukandi; bienza muntu bualu bua kukema mu dina dianyi, yeye kena mumanye mua kumpetula lukasa
Wakatabasha mesu ebe munyi

Bua bituenza malu mabi bua disungula dia mutshima hatuakamana kuangata dimanya dia bushua, kakuena kushala kabidi munga mulambu bua kubuikidila n au mibi, kadi kudi kushala kuindila kukuabo kua dilumbulula kudi kukuatshisha buowa, ne kahia kakole nekoshe bahitshi bandi
Nunku wakajuka, wakaya ku Hebelone
Yeye wakamuitaba ne Ndi nkeba bana betu, ndi nkusengelela ne, undeshe kudibo badisha mikoko
Katuena ne bukole bua kudia ne bua kunua, anyi
Udi ne matshu unvue biandi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele kabidi ne, Nuenu nuvuluke matuku anyi a Lumingu dituku edi didi bu tshivulukidi hankatshi hetu ku bikondo bienu bionso bualu bua kunumanyisha ne, Meme ndi Yehowa wakunujidila

Mikenji ya bintu bidi bikuata butu nansha nsumba Padi butu bukuata ku bilamba bienza ne miosa ya nyama, nansha ku bia ndanda, nansha ku bilamba bia pambidi bienza ne miosa ya nyama, nansha ne ndanda, nansha ku bilamba bia biseba, nansha ku bintu bienza ne biseba, padi makeji awu amueneka makunzubile, nansha a mayi a matamba, mutuangaji neakenkete butu abu
Bana ba Amalama: Alona ne Mosê ne Miyama
Solomo wakakokesha Bena Isalele bonso mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi anai
Yeye wakamba malu â mu nsunagoga hakadiye uyisha bantu mu Kapênuma
Hakayabo n abo ha bule umue wabo wakamba ne Nyema lubilu, bua kuhandisha muoyo webe kutangidi ku nyima kuebe, kushadi ha mpata nyema ku mikuna kufu biebe

Dina dia Yehowa divudishibue disanka Ku dihatuka dia diba tô ne ku dibuela diadi Yehowa udi mulu ku mutu kua bisamba bionso bia bantu, Udi bu Yehowa wetu nganyi, udi winangila hanshi Udi bua kumushikamisha munkatshi mua baminyampala, Udi ushikamisha mukashi udi nkumba mu nsubu, Psalms Hakaluhuka Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu, Yuda wakalua nsubu wandi wa tshijila, Mai manene akamona muanda eu, akanyema, Mikuna mile yakatuhika bu bimpanga, Budi bukukuata ntshinyi, wewe mai manene, bua udi unyema
Pilato wakamukudimuna ne, Meme ndi Muena Yuda, anyi
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ditalala didiku
Munyi mudiye mua kulua kumona mpala yenu mihite ya bansongalume ba mulongo wenu bubi
Yakoba wakamba ne, Anji kunsumbisha bintu bia buan a bute diambedi
Bana aba ke bankambua ba meku adi ne dina diabu
Nenkufuile
Bakamukudimuna ne, Tudi bamumanye

Azemaweta, muana wa Adiele, wakadi ku mutu kua bibutshilu bia mukelenge; Yonatana, muana wa Uziya, wakadi ku mutu kua bibutshilu bia mu madimi ne bia mu bimenga ne bia mu misoko mikese ne bia mu nsubu ya mukelenge; Ezeli, muana wa Keluba, wakadi ku mutu kua mudimu wonso wa madimi; Shimei, Muena Lamata, wakadi ku mutu kua madimi a tumuma tukese; Zabedi, Muena Shefemi, wakadi ku mutu kua bintu biakakumbana mu madimi a tumuma tukese biakatekabo mu bitekelu bia nvinyo; Bâla hanana, Muena Gedê, wakadi ku mutu kua mitshi ya diye ne ya sycomore ya mu bibanda; Yoasha wakadi ku mutu kua bitekelu bia manyi; Shitelai, Muena Shalona, wakadi ku mutu kua bimuna biakadishabo mu Sifiona; Shafata, muana wa Adelai, wakadi ku mutu kua bimuna bia mu bibanda; Obila, Muena Yishemaele, wakadi ku mutu kua tumelo; Yedeya, Muena Melonita, wakadi ku mutu kua nyama ya mpunda; Yaziza, Muena Hageli, wakadi ku mutu kua mikoko

Yeye wakateka balumbuluishi mu misoko yonso ya ngumbu ya mu buloba buonso bua Yuda, ku musoko ku musoko, wakambila balumbuluishi ne, Nuelangane meji bimpe bua malu anudi nuenza; kanulumbuluishi mu dinu dia bantu, kadi mu dina dia Yehowa; yeye udi n enu mu kulumbulula kuenu
Wewe neulamike tshiamu tshia or mutambe buimpe ha nyima honso ne munda mua mushete kabidi, neuteke tshiamu tshia or ku mibangu ya mushete
Tuye kumushiha, tumuele mu mukela mukuabo, netuambe ne, Nyama mubi wakamudia, netumone tshiavuisha bilota biandi
Ku dituku ku dituku wakadi uhatuka mu musoko, hakamba diba kubuela

Nuangate mabeshi a hisopa, nutue mu mashi adi mu dilonga, numianune mashi ku mutshi wa ha mutu ha mushiku wa mbelu ne ku biluwa bibidi bia mushiku wa mbelu, muntu kaluhuki mu nsubu wandi tô ne ha tshia butuku
Luhingu alu luakadi lunene be ne luakadi lukenka ne dinkenke dikole, luakimana ku mpala kuebe; tshinfuanyi tshialu tshiakakukuatshisha buowa
Amen
Kadi mitshima yabo yakabandika, bakatshina, bakelangana meshi ne, Tudi lutangila mukishi
Yakoba wakatabala ku tulu tuandi, wakamba ne Bulelela, Yehowa udi kunoko ne meme tshiakamanva bualu ebu
Nzambi wakabiteka mulu mua diulu bua kutokeshayi buloba, ne bua kukokeshayi mu munya ne butuku, ne bua kutahululayi munya kudi midima, Nzambi wakabimona ne, Mbimpe
Wewe mukashi mubake, udi wenda masandi, udi witabusha balume ba bende mu muaba wa bayebe
Maloba a bena Izrayele, kabena mua kuangata lelu kudi bena tshisamba kampande, maloba kudi bena tshisamba tshikuabu nansha

Biatshidiabo dituku disatu, bualu ebu budi bubi, tshiena ngitabusha mulambu, muntu yonso udi ûdia neadituadile bubi buandi, bualu bua yeye wakuona tshintu tshijila tshia Yehowa, nebumushe muntu au munkatshi mua bana babo
Hakayikileye n anyi, ungambila mei â, nakinama hanshi, tshiyi ngakula
Ku nyima kua disanka dia Kuhita kua Yehowa bakadia bintu biakasanganabo mu buloba, ne mampa adi kayi ne luevene ne manvua akoshabo
Bobo bakamba ne, Yeye udi ushima, utuambile
Umushe maluvu ebe
Yakobe kusemena kudi tatuende Izake
Tshintu tshionso tshidibo bajila mu Isalele netshikale tshiebe
Bu mudi Tatu ubisha bafue, ubaha muoyo; nunku kabidi Muana udi uha badiye musue muoyo
Bafalese bakuabo bakamba ne, Muntu eu kena mufume kudi Nzambi, bualu bua yeye katu wajila dituku dia Lumingu
Nunku nuenu nudi ne bualu bua kusua benyi bualu bua nuenu nuakadi benyi mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kanulondi nshila wa bisamba bia bantu, bualu bua bilele bia kutendelela kua bantu aba bidi hatuhu
Nakanuambila ku tshikondo atshi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuha buloba abu bu buhianyi: bena nvita nebasabuke ne bintu bia nvita ku mpala kua bana benu ba Bena Isalele
Dutelonone Buloba Buimpe bua Kuhiana Nuenze mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu, bua nuenu nuikale ne muoyo, nukumbane, nubuelemu bua kuhiana buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu
Yesu wakimana, wakamba ne, Numubikile, Bakabikila muntu mufofo, bakamuambila ne, Kolesha mutshima webe, bika, yeye udi ukubikila
Kanungu kisâtu Polovensa ne bitupa bia teletwale bidikadile bia Ditunga dia Kongu wa Mungalata bidi ne bwikadi bwa pa mêyi ne mikandu ne badi babiludika kudi biâpu bia munda mwabi
Kuvungululaye ntenta pa mutu pa muaba wa tshijila

Danyele Mu tshidimu tshia kumudilu tshia bukokeshi bua Dayawesha, muana wa Ahashawelosha, wa tshisamba tshia Bena Madai, wakalelabo mukelenge ku mutu kua bukelenge bua Bena Kasada; mu tshidimu tshia kumudilu tshia bukokeshi buandi, meme Danyele, nakatangila mu Mifundu ya Nzambi ne bidimu makumi muanda mutekete nebihite diambedi dibutuka dia Yelushalema kadiyi dianze kushika bu bungi bua bidimu biakambila Yehowa Yelemiya muprofete
Nunku Hataka wakaya kudi Môdekai mu muaba mubaluluke wakadi ku mpala kua tshibi tshia mukelenge

Davidi wakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Binuelangana meji ne mbimpe, ne biasua Yehowa Nzambi wetu nunku, tubikile bana betu bonso badi bashala mu nseke yonso ya buloba bua Isalele ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi badi mu misoko yabo ne ku mpenge ya misoko yabo, badisangishe kutudi; tuye bietu, tuangate mushete wa Nzambi wetu, tulue n au munkatshi muetu; bualu bua tuetu katuakûkeba mu matuku a Shaula
Hakamukuminabo milonda mu bianza ne ku makasa ku mutshi mutshiamakane, bakabanyangana bilulu biandi, bela n abi nshobo; bakashikama, bakamulamaku
Maminu akuanji kulua mu diyeba, anyi

Bua malu â, amba biebe mei ebe bualu bua buloba bua Isalele, ambila mikuna minene ne mikuna mikese, bihongo ne bibanda ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, nakuamba dî mu mukau wanyi ne mu tshiji tshianyi tshikole, bualu bua nuakufuishibua bundu kudi ba mu bisamba bia bantu
Maweja Nangila neanutumine masama mashilangane nuwuaye muenzele bena Ejipitu: mulaka, maputa, mpusu, ne tshikupi tshidi katshiyi mua kujika to
Ishi boshete, muana wa Shaula, wakadi ne bidimu makumi anai hakabangeye kukokesha Bena Isalele, wakabakokesha bidimu bibidi
Yeye wakambila bantu ne, Shikamai hanshi; wakamema mitanda muanda mutekete ne mishiha; wakatendelela Nzambi, wakabitshibula, wakabifila mu bianza bia bayidi, bayidi bakaha bantu
Yakambila mutshi wa olive ne, Utukokeshe
Nenuteleje bidiye wamba
Nembapeshadi bua badikuate
Bidi matabisha akatumineye Esau mukelenge wandi, ne mona, yeye udi kabidi ku nyima kuetu
Yakobe muine udi utulonda panyima apa
Yehowa wakakonka ne, Wadinga Ahaba bua kuyeye kuhona ku Lamota gilada nganyi

Kadi Nzambi, udi usamba bantu buhuekela, wakatusamba mu kulua kua Tito; tuakasambibua kembua kulua kuandi nkayaku, kadi bua busambi buakasambibueye n abu bua bualu buenu hakatuambileye bualu bua dijinga dienu ne kudila kuenu ne lukunukunu luenu bia bualu buanyi; nunku nakatamba kusanka
Wakidika muan a bute wa bakashi dina ne, Yemima; muibidi ne, Kesia; ne muan a mukala ne, Kelene hapuka
Nunku kudimuna mutshima webe, ulekele bubi buebe ebu, ulombe Nzambi ne bumue neakubuikidile meshi adi munda muebe
Neutshiteke hankatshi ha tshitendelelu ne tshioshe lu, newelemu mai
Yeye kujinguluila muntu yonsu ndota yende
Kumonaye ne bionsu bidi bimpe
Bualu mbantu banyi, bamvua mupatule mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Kadi padiu ushala kabidi too ne ku dituku disatu, bawoshe mu kapia
Bana balume ba Shimei: Yahata ne Zina ne Yeusha ne Belia
Ndi mfuila bantu luse too ne ku ndelanganyi tshinunu, mbajimijila bubi buabu, buntomboji ne ditupakana diabu
Hanuakuna matamba a mitshi yenu ya olive bua mamuma ahone, kanuakumi tshiakabidi; neashale a benyi ne a bana ba nshiya ne a bakashi ba mu lufuila

Baprofete bandi badi bu nyama wa ntambue udi wasa muadi hatshidiye udia nyama wakukuateye; bakujimisha mioyo ya bantu, badi banyenga bintu bia mu tshibutshilu ne bintu bia mushinga mukole, bakuvuisha bakashi ba mu lufuila ba bungi munkatshi muabo
Binuadikonka ne, Netudie tshinyi tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete hatudi katuyi tukuna bintu, katuyi tuhuola bintu

Kadi ndi ntonda kûdi ne, Ntu ngakuatshila Nzambi wa bankambua betu mudimu mu Nshila udibo babikila ne, Ngua batahuluki, ndi ngitabusha malu onso adi mu mikenshi ya Nzambi ne akafunda baprofete; ndi ne ditekemena kudi Nzambi didi bantu aba bitabusha kabidi ne, Dibika dia bafue nedikaleku, ne dia bakane ne dia babi
Hakunvua bantu bonso malu au, ne basangishi ba mulambu kabidi, bakabingisha Nzambi, bakadi bamane kubatijibua ne dibatiza dia Yone
Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Bobo bakumana kuangata difutu diabo
Yudasa kabidi, mumutungidi, wakadi mumanye muaba au; bualu bua Yesu wakadi uyaku misangu ya bungi ne bayidi bandi

Kadi biunvua baminyampala lumu lua diyiki dianyi n ebe, ne bialuabo kûdi bua kukuambila ne, Utuambile mei awakuambila mukelenge, ne mei akukuambila mukelenge, kutusokoki bualu, ne katuena tukushiha; mu diba adi wewe ubambile ne, Nakadi nsengelela mukelenge ne kampingashi ku nsubu wa Yonatana bua meme kufuilaku

Yeye nênze nunku ne muana mulume wa ngombe, bu muakenzeye ne muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buabo nunku, ne bubi buabo nebuikale bubuikidibue
Kadi hakadi difutu kadiyi dibandishibua, kabakaya mu luendu tô ne ku dituku diakabandishibua difutu

Monai, ndi mbisha Bena Kasada, Badi bazakasha mitshima ya bantu ne badi babakuatshisha buowa; Tubalu tuabo tudi tuhita nyama ya nkashama lubilu, Buonso buabo badi balua bua kuenza tshimbambila; Badi bahetula bakelenge, badi baseka bakokeshi
Nanku bena Izrayele kukumbaja bimpe bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe

Bualu bua Ahaza wakatshina mukelenge wa Ashû, wakandamuna mu nsubu wa Yehowa tshibuelelu tshiakadi ne tshibuikilu ku mutu, tshiakadi bantu babuelamu dituku dia Lumingu tshiakibakabo mu nsubu ne tshibi tshia ku mbelu tshiakadi mukelenge mubuele
Zekâya, muana wa Meshelemiya, wakadi mulami wa ku tshibuelelu tshia mu nsubu wa kusambakena
Nuenu nudi ne bualu bua kujimisha miaba yonso yakadi bisamba binudi nuihata bitendelelaku nzambi yabo ku mutu kua mikuna mile, ne ku mutu kua tukuna tukese ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi
Uvua musele Metabeyele, muana wa Matrede, kabidi ne muikulu wa Mezahade

Bualu bua tuetu bakitabusha tudi tubuela mu dikisha, bu muakuambeye ne, Bua yeye wakuamba mu muaba mukuabo buala bua dituku dia muanda mutekete nunku ne, Nzambi wakikisha kabidi dituku dia muanda mutekete ku midimu yandi yonso, ne mu muaba au kabidi ne, Nunku kutshidi kushala bua bakuabo babuelemu, ne bua bantu bakadi ne lumu luimpe luambibua kudibo diambedi kabakabuelamu bua buhidia buabo, yeye udi Usungula dituku dikuabo ne, Lelu, Wamba mu Misambu ya Davidi musangu mumane kuleha mule nunku bu muakambibua diambedi ne, Bualu bua bu Yoshua mubahe dikisha, kakadi kuamba ku nyima bua dituku dikuabo
Padi muntu kampande udia munyinyi wa ku mulambu awu dituku disatu, Maweja Nangila kena mua kuanyisha to
Nanku muntu awu kena mupie mikiya to
Bakafunda mu mikenshi ne, Nengakule ne bantu aba mu miaku ya bende ne ku mishiku ya bantu ba bende; kadi Mukelenge udi wamba ne, Bua malu â mene, kabena bangunvuila
Nanku bena Amone kukuata ditunga adi, kuasamu
Yeye wakabashia, wakabuela mu buatu kabidi, wakaya dishia
Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Biatumikila muntu dî dianyi, yeye kena umona lufu tô tshiendelele
Yakobe kumuebeja ne: Kadi wewe mene, dina diebe nnganyi

Katuena tunufundila malu makuabo anu malu anudi mibala ne anudi bamanye mene; ndi musue nuenu mimanye malu au tô ne kunshikidilu; bu munuakatumanya tshituha ne, Tuetu tudi butumbi buenu, bu munudi butumbi buetu, mu dituku dia Mukelenge wetu Yesu
Tudi tunvua, muntu ne muntu, muaku wandi wa kuakatulabo munyi
Ne muinshi wa mananashi au musangisha ne mitendelelu ya basanto, biakabanda ku mpala kua Nzambi, bihatuka mu tshianza tshia muanjelo

Ku tshikondo atshi Yoshua wakalua, wakabutula Bena Anaka ba ku mikuna ne ku Hebelone ne ku Debî ne ku Anaba ne ku mikuna yonso ya Yuda ne ku mikuna yonso ya Isalele: Yoshua wakababutula ne misoko yabo
Edi ndikonka dia Yehowa wa misumba kunudi, nuenu bakuidi, badi balengulula dina dianyi

Yeye wakadi mumiamina ha buloba buimpe udi unvua dî dia Nzambi, udi udijingulula; yeye mene udi uvudisha maminu; manga adi avulangana lukama lukama, manga makumi asambombo asambombo, manga makumi asatu asatu
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba dî edi
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Nansha, kadi netukusuike bikole, ne tukufile mu bianza biabo, katuena tukushiha nansha
Yoaba wakamanyisha Davidi bungi bua bantu bakabalabo
Kadi too ne mpindiewu, Maweja Nangila kena muanji kunupesha lungenyi lua kujingulula bionsu bivua bienzeka ebi to

Yesu wakabandamuna ne, Yai bienu, nuambile Yone malu anudi nunyua ne anudi numona; bafofo badi batabala, balema badi benda, bena nsudi badi balengeshibue, bena mahaha badi bunvua, bafue badi babishibua ku lufu, badi bambila bahele lumu luimpe lua Nzambi, Muntu yonso udi kai ulenduka bua bualu buanyi udi ne disanka
Mumanyi wa mikenshi mukuabo wakakudimuna dî, wakamba ne, Muyishi, hawakuamba dî edi, udi utuhenda bietu kabidi

Yeye wakadi nkayandi bu ntanta wa kuela dibue diafika; wakatua binu hanshi, wakatendelela Nzambi, wakamba ne, Tatu, biwasua, ungumushile luhanza elu; kadi bualu buenjibue bu mûdi musue, kabuenjibu bu mundi musue
Wakaya kuandi, wakasangana muana muladika ha bulalu, demon mumane kuluhuka
Muntu ne mundi wakela mulangala wandi hanshi, wakakudimuka nyoka, kadi mulangala wa Alona wakatuma milangala yabo

Mukashi au wakalua kudi Shaula, wakatangila ne yeye udi ne kanyinganyinga kakole, wakamuambila ne, Mona, muntu webe mukashi wakitabusha dî diebe, nakafila muoyo wanyi mu tshianza tshianyi, nakenza bu mu mei onso awakangambila

Bualu bua bakuhanda ku Ashû, Nansha biadiabo bulunda ne ba munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu, Bualu bua Bena Efelayima bakuvudisha bioshelu bua kuenzelahu malu mabi, Nansha bina bakindila mayisha mangi a mu mikenji yanyi Badi bafila milambu ya nyama minshihela, Bua Bena Isalele bakuhua Mufuki wabo muoyo, Hoshea Bena Isalele, kanusanki bua kutumba bu mudi ba mu bisamba bia bende hatumba
Buludi ne butshia ne bule buau bidi muomumue
Bulelela, hakeleye nyima bua kumuka kudi Samuele, Nzambi wakamuha mutshima mukuabo; ne bimanyinu abi bionso biakalua dituku adi

Bakadi ku mutu kua binunu bia bena nvita ne tuhita tua binunu ne binunu ne tuhita tua nkama ne nkama, bakalua kudi Mose, bakambila Mose ne, Bantu bebe bakabala bungi bua bena nvita badi ku nyima kuetu, nansha umue wetu udi mushale
Nembahe mutshima umue ne nshila umue, bua bannemeke tshiendelele, bua diakalengele diabo ne dia bana babo badi babalonda ku nyima kuabo
Davidi wakakolakola bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wa misumba, wakadi n andi
Moshe kuteka mushete awu muaba wa tshijila
Bualu bua bantu badi bitabusha ne mutshima bua kuheta buakane, badi bajukula ne mukana bua kuheta luhandu
Bakenza bibuiku bikuabo ku mutu kua bibumba bia makunshi; bakenzahu mamuma a grenades nkama ibidi mu milongo minyunguluke tshibuiku tshikuabo
Milambu ya mufuki wa tshintu ne ya mwena lungenyi lufuka badi bayijadika ne bayikuba kudi mêyi a ditunga
Shaula wakaluatshisha Davidi bintu biandi bia mata, wakateka tshifulu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku ku mutu kuandi, wakamuluatshisha tshikowelu tshia mata
Bualu bua nyeye wakuamba ne, Kuendi masandi, wakuamba kabidi ne, Kushihi muntu
Diabolo wakamuambila ne, Nenkuhe bukokeshi ebu buonso ne butumbi bua makelenge au; bakamana kubumpa; muntu yonso undi musue kumuhabu, nemuhebu
Zêba ne Salemuna bakanyema; yeye wakabihata, wakakuata Zêba ne Salemuna, bakelenge babidi ba Midiyana, wakatatshisha musumba wabo wonso
Abambana balume ba Yishemaele ku mena abo ne misoko yabo ne ku meku abo, baminyampala dikumi ne babidi ku bisamba biabo
Bana ba balume ba Elifasa bakadi Temana ne Omâ ne Sefo ne Gatama ne Kenaza

Wewe udi ushilangana ne bakashi bakuabo ba masandi, bualu bua muntu kena ukukeba bua kuenda n ebe masandi, wewe udi umukeba, ne bualu bua wewe udi umuha difutu, kadi yeye kena ukuha difutu; mu muanda eu wewe udi ushilangana n abo
Itshikije mashi makese ku nseke ya tshilambuilu
Tatu wabo wakabebesha ne, Yeye wakaya mu nshila kai

Bualu bua tuetu tutu tuadia luehu lua ku nsubu wa mukelenge, kambimpe bua tuetu kutangila bundu bua mukelenge, nunku tuakufunda mukanda eu bua kumanyisha mukelenge wetu; bua yeye atangile mu mikanda yakafunda batatu andi ne habaleye mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a musoko eu, neamanye biandi ne musoko eu udi wa batomboki batu benzela hakelenge ne nseke bibi kale tô ne katataka; anu bua bualu ebu bakabutuisha musoko eu
Kena mumanye mua kudiona bualu bua tatu andi anyi bua mamu andi anyi bua muan abo mulume anyi bua muan abo mukashi hafuabo, bualu bua tshijila tshiandi kudi Yehowa tshidi ha mutu n andi
Psalms Nzambi wanyi, Nzambi wanyi, wakundekela tshinyi
Bifukibua bionso bia Nzambi bidi bimpe, ne bantu kabena ne bua kubimasha bikalabo babitabusha ne kusakidila; bualu bua biobi bidi bijidibua ne dî dia Nzambi ne kutendelela
Luke Yesu wakadi uhitshila mu madimi a blé dituku dia Lumingu lua Bayuda, bayidi bandi bakatshibula miehu yai, benda baivinga mu bianza, badia
Wakamukudimuna dî ne, Bûdi wamba mbulelela
Bakaya ku musoko mukuabo
Hakambeye nunku, wakela dî diandi bikole ne, Lazalo, luhuka
Samuele Dî dia Samuele kudi Bantu Samuele wakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Monai, nakunvua dî dienu mu malu onso anuakungambila, nakateka mukelenge ku mutu kuenu
Bayidi bakuabo bakamuambila ne, Tuakumona Mukelenge
Nansha biandekela tatu wanyi ne mamu wanyi, Yehowa neangambule
Muanjelo wa Nzambi wakungambila mu tshiota tshianyi ne, Yakoba, nakuitaba ne, Ndiku
Nuenu balonde buenzayi ebu, nudi nuenzela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu bibi
Hashishe, mu bikena kumona bia butuku nakamona nyama muinai, wakadi ukuatshisha bantu buowa ne wakadi ne luonji lukole, muhite bukole, muikale ne menu manene a tshiamu tshifike
Kuena witabusha ne, Meme ndi munda mua Tatu, Tatu udi munda muanyi, anyi
Bitalu bienu nebikale bu bidia bia nyunyu yonso ya mu diulu ne bia nyama yonso ya ha buloba; kakuena muntu udi uyihata
Nunku bakamulengulula, kabakamuha kantu kakese
Ku mutu kua tshituha etshi tshidi tshihite bukese tô ne ku tshituha tshia ha mutu hatshi tshidi tshihite bunene kuikale coudées inai, butshiama buatshi buikale coudée umue
Bakahueka ku Seleukia, batumibue kudi Nyuma Muimpe
Lamika tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yonso ya mabaya ne enza nkanu ya or ya kuelamu mitshi, lamika or ku nseke yonso ya mitshi ei
Hakamutangila Mukelenge, yeye wakamufua luse, wakamuambila ne, Kudidi

Buloba buandi butangilangane ne buloba bua tshijila ne buloba bua musoko ku luseke lua esete ne ku luseke lua wesete; bule buabu buikale bule bua tshituha tshia buhianyi bukuabo bua bisamba bia Bena Isalele, ku butshika bua buloba ku luseke lua wesete tô ne ku butshika buabu ku luseke lua esete
Mukashi wakakonka Eliya ne, Ndi n ebe bualu kai, wewe muntu wa Nzambi

Hakunvua Labana lumu lua Yakoba muana wa muan abo mukashi, yeye wakaya lubilu bua kumuakidila, wakamuhukila, wakatuangana n andi mishiku, wakalua n andi ku nsubu wandi Yeye wakambila Labana malu onso Labana wakamuambila ne Bulelela, wewe udi mufuba wanyi ne musunyi wanyi Yeye wakashala n andi to ngondo mujima
Pikala bualu ebu bubi, budi kabuyi buengelela Maweja Nangila, buenzeke munkatshi muenu bulelela, muena tshibawu awu, nansha yeye mulume nansha yeye mukaji, nuye nende ku tshibuelelu tshia tshimenga
Bana ba Sena, binunu bisatu ne nkama isambombo ne makumi asatu
Bobo bakaya, bakambila bakuabo bualu ebu; kudi kabakitabusha dî diabo
Muntu eu wakumuka ku musoko wa Beteleheme yuda, bua kusomba kuakasanganeye muaba, mu luendu luandi yeye wakalua ku mikuna ya Efelayima ku nsubu wa Mika; Mika wakamukonka ne

Hashishe, Yelemiya wakangata mukanda mukuabo, wakaha Baluka, muana wa Neliya, wakafundamu mei akaluhuka mukana mua Yelemiya, mei onso akadi mu mukanda wakoshabo mu kahia kudi Yehoyakima, mukelenge wa Yuda
Kanudionyi ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi ha buloba, kanudienzedi bibi ne bintu bidi ne bukoya, kanudinyangi ne bintu ebi
Umuambile dî edi ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mona, nensasule tshintu tshinakuasa, nentule tshintu tshinakukuna; nengenze nunku mu buloba bujima
Numbers Bena Isalele bonso bakalua mu tshihela tshia Sina mu ngondo wa kumudilu, bakashikama mu Kadesha, Mîyama wakafua, bakamujikamu
Ndi nuambila ne, Nasha, nakuluila bua kuabulula bantu; mu nsubu umue nemuikale bantu batanu bâbuluke; basatu nebikale ne babidi mpata, babidi nebikale ne basatu mpata

Nuhane binudi n abi, nubihe bantu bahele ku luse; nudienzele bibombo bidi kabi bikulukasha, bintu bia mu tshibutshilu tshia mu diulu bidi kabi bishika tshiendelele, mudi muibi kai ulua ha buihi, mudi tshishi katshi tshinyanga
Binuitabusha, nenuangate bintu bionso binualomba mu kutendelela kuenu
Bantu kabatu bela maluvu mahia mahia mu milondo ya biseba bikulukulu; bienzabo nunku, malulu neahande biseba, neaye hanshi, ne biseba nebifue
Nenunkebe, kanuena nunmona; kanuena bamanye mua kulua kungikala
Bualu bua mukenji wa mukelenge wakadi mukole ne bua tshikutu tshiakatamba kuhishibua, nunku ndimi ya kahia yakashiha bantu aba bakadi bambula Shadalaka, Meshaka ne Abedenego
Kadi Bena Yuda bakalamata Davidi
Yozefe kubandamuna ne: Bu munudi kanuyi ne makuta, tushintakajayi bimuna bienu ne biakudia
Bana betu, nukebe balume muanda mutekete munkatshi muenu badi ne lumu luimpe, badi bûle tente ne Nyuma ne lungenyi, netubateke ha mutu ha bualu ebu
Yosefe wakamba ne, Numpe bimuna bienu, nennuhe bia kudia ku bimuna bienu bikale argent yenu mishike

Buloba buandi butangilangane ne buloba bua tshijila ne buloba bua musoko ku luseke lua esete ne ku luseke lua wesete; bule buabu buikale bule bua tshituha tshia buhianyi bukuabo bua bisamba bia Bena Isalele, ku butshika bua buloba ku luseke lua wesete tô ne ku butshika buabu ku luseke lua esete
Badi batshilombola kudi Mulombodi wa Ditunga
Kuimanyinabu pa bule kuinshi kua mukuna

Hashishe Gideona wakangata bena mudimu bandi dikumi, wakenza bu muakamuambila Yehowa; bualu bua yeye wakadi nutshine ba mu nsubu wa tatu wandi, ne bena musoko kabidi, yeye kakenza bualu ebu mu munya, kadi wakabuela mu butuku
Meku onsu a bena Efrayime avua ne bantu balume

Yeye neashihe muana wa mukoko wa mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, ne muakuidi neangate mashi makuabo a mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji, nealabe ku lusongo lua ditshu dia ku tshianza tshia balume dia muntu udiye musue kulengesha ne ku tshiala tshia ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku muan a dikasa munene wa ku tshianza tshia balume
Hanatabala, Nzambi, bidi bimpe bua wewe ushihe bantu babi, ne bua Badi bakutombokela ne mei abo mabi, badi n ebe lukuna badi Yehowa, tshiena nkina badi bakukina, anyi
Buowa buakabakuata bonso, bakakonkangana ne, Edi ndî kai
Tangila, meme nkayanyi, nendokeshe mai mangi ha buloba bua kujimisha bintu bionso bidi ne muhuya wa muoyo munda muabi muinshi mua diulu, tshintu tshionso tshidi ne muoyo ha buloba netshifue
Kubambilabu ne: Maweja Nangila mmututume bua kubadika bena Izrayele bonsu bakadi bakumbaja bidimu makumi abidi ne bisambuke
Yeye udi uvila Tatu ne Muana, eu udi mufuilakanyi ne Kilisto
Nzambi neunvue muadi wandi Yeye neadisankishe mu Wa Bukole Buonso, anyi
Nutumikile, nunvue mei onso anakanuambila: nunku nenukune dikasa dimpe ne bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima tshiendelele, hanuenza malu adi mimpe ne makane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Esetê wakasangana luse ku mesu kua bantu bonso bakamutangila
Matempu ne ngombe ebi, nebakuate nabi mudimu bua ntenta wa kusambakena
Mutuangaji angate tshintu tshimue tshia ku mulambu ne ku mulambu bua kulambula Maweja Nangila
Yudasa, mumutungidi, wakadi muimane n abo

Wewe newenzeshe tshilulu tshia dilumbulula tshia ha tshiadi kudi bantu badi ne lungenyi lule, bobo nebenze tshilulu etshi bu muakenzabo efoda, ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bilulu bikunze kunzû ne bia lin mutambe buimpe
Yeye wakadi ne bana balume makumi anai ne bikulu makumi asatu bakenda ha nyima ha bana ba nyama ya mpunda makumi muanda mutekete; yeye wakalumbulula Bena Isalele bidimu muanda mukulu
Luke Hakashika malu â, Mukelenge wakasungula banga bayidi kabidi makumi muanda mutekete, wakabatuma ku mpala kuandi ku babidi ku babidi mu misoko yonso ne mu miaba yonso, yakadiye wamba kuya
Bakulu ba Bena Yuda bakasa nsubu, bakadi ne diakalengele bualu bua dî dia Nzambi diakabambila Hagai muprofete ne Zekâya, muana wa Ido
Hakamoneye ne, Bualu ebu budi busankisha Bena Yuda, wakakuata Petelo kabidi
Malu adiku, adi kule, adi ne ndondo mule; udi mumanye mua kuajingulula nganyi
Yeye wakamuebesha ne, Ei idi misoko kai iwakumpa, muan etu
Bumuka ku Bene Yakane, kuyabu ku Ore Ngidngade
Hanakabanda ku mukuna bua kuangata mabue akadi ne mei a tshihungidi tshia Yehowa mafundahu, nakashala ku mukuna matuku makumi anai munya ne butuku; tshiakadia bidia, tshiakanua mai
Mukelenge wakadi ne tshishi, wakatuma masalayi andi, wakashiha batahianganyi aba, wakosha musoko wabo

Kuhita ka bena maluvu kakambila Yosefe tshilota tshiandi ne, Mu tshilota tshianyi, nakumona muonshi wa tumuma tua nvinyo ku mpala kuanyi, mudishi eu wakadi ne matamba asatu akasampila ntonga, ne bilongo biakabaluluka, biakakuama tumuma tuhia
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Muntu webe nyeye
Nunku ujuke biebe, hingana ku nsubu kuebe; hafika makasa ebe ku musoko, muana neafue

Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bualu buenu, wakamba ne, Wewe kuena ubuelamu: Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, utu wimana ku mpala kuebe, yeye neabuelemu: ukoleshe mutshima wandi, bualu bua yeye neahianyishe Bena Isalele buloba
Kanuitabushi dî dia mumonyi umue udi utumpila mukuabo tshianana bua dihambuka diandi anyi bua bubi buakenzeye; malu neajalame anu ku mei a bamonyi babidi anyi basatu

Yeye wakangata muana mukese, wakamushikika munkatshi muabo, wakamuambula mu maboko andi, wakabambila ne, Witabusha muana mukese nunku mu dina dianyi udi ungitabusha meme; wangitabusha meme, kena ungitabusha meme nkayanyi, udi witabusha udi muntume
Wewe kuena ne tshituha anyi luseke mu bualu ebu, bua mutshima webe kawena muimpe ku mesu kua Nzambi
Mukelenge wa Babulona wakamuha dikuatshisha ku dituku ku dituku, tshituha tshia bintu bia buatshia buatshia tô ne ku dituku dia lufu luandi
Biamanyeye mua kuluangana n anyi ne bua kunshiha, nunku tuetu netuikale bahika benu; kadi binamuhita bukole, binamushiha, nunku nuenu nenuikale bahika betu, nenutukuatshile mudimu

Mukelenge wandi wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakunzulula bibi bia nsubu, wakamba kuya mu nshila wandi; ne monai, mukashi wandi muhika wakadi muhone hanshi ku tshibi tshia nsubu, ne bianza biandi mu mbelu
Kadi Yehoshafata wakakonka ne, Kakuena muprofete wa Yehowa mukuabo kunoko utudi mua kuebesha, anyi
Hakafika diba dia kudiabo bidia, Boaza wakamuambila ne, Lua kunoko, udie bidia, utue tshihesa tshiebe mu vinaigre
Patudi tuya, ke patudi mua kupanda, nansha wewe, nansha tuetu, nansha kabidi bana betu
Bakalenduka bua bualu buandi
Nanku, kanuena mua kunemeka mvidie idibu batendelela
Neahunge n ebe tshihungidi, Udi mua kunaya handi bu mûdi unaya ne nyunyu, anyi

Nanku bakulu bonsu ba mu tshimenga atshi, bavua bafika ku tshitalu tshia muntu awu, nebowele bianza pambidi pa muana wa ngombe uvuabu banyongoboje nshingu awu, bela lusanzu ne: Katuena bashipe muntu ewu, kabidi katuena bamanye mudiye mufue
Bualu bua Ahaza wakangata bintu bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne bia mu nsubu wa mukelenge ne bia mu nsubu ya bantu banene, wakabifila kudi mukelenge wa Ashû, kadi bualu ebu kabuakamukuatshisha
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Witabushe bua meme kuya kudiye bua kukosa mutu wandi
Bobo kabidi nebamukonke ne, Mukelenge, dituku kai dituakakutangila ne nsala ne nyota ne buenyi ne butaka ne disama ne mu nsubu wa lukanu, tuahanga kukukuatshisha
Wewe neusunsulule mukata eu, neuwelehu manyi tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia mulambu wa bukula
Hakabikeye ku lufu, bayidi bandi bakavuluka dî edi diakambeye, bakitabusha malu akadi mafunda ma Mukanda wa Nzambi ne dî diakamba Yesu

Bakamuambila ne, Bahika bebe bakalua kule ku buloba bukuabo bualu bua dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi webe; bualu bua tuetu tuakunvua lumu luandi ne malu onso akenzeye mu Ejipitu, ne malu akenzeleye bakelenge babidi ba Bena Amole bakadi dishiya dia Yadene, Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona, ne Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakadi mu Ashatelota
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bika ne dinda dionso, wimane ku mpala kua Palô, umuambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu udi wamba ne, Ulekele bantu banyi, baye kuntendelela

Hawamana matuku au, ulale kabidi ku luseke lua ku tshianza tshiebe tshia balume, utuale mibi ya ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Yuda; ndi nkulekela matuku makumi anai, dituku dimue dikale bu tshidimu tshijima
Bakasua kumubanda

Bumue nebakunvuile, bua buonso buabo, muntu ne muntu, balukile, balekele kuenda mu nshila wabo mubi, bua meme nkudimune mutshima wanyi bua makenga andi mpangidisha kubakengesha n au bua bienzedi biabo bibi
Kadi miadi yabu ya mu bupika buabu kufika kudi Mvidi Mukulu
Nzala mimane kutekesha bena Izrayele, mubidi luya ne disama dia tshiambu bimane kubakuata, nembatumine nyama ya lonji, kabidi ne nyoka ya lulengu

Mu nseke yonso yakaya mukenji wa mukelenge ne dî diandi, muadi munene wakadi munkatshi mua Bena Yuda, bakajila bia kudia, bakasa muadi, bakadila, ba bungi bakaluata bilulu bikayabala, bakadiela butue ham bidi
Abashaloma ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadi n andi bakasabuka Yadene

Bobo nebenze mushete wa mutshi wa acacia buludi bua mushete nebuikale coudées Wewe neulamike tshiamu tshia or mutambe buimpe ha nyima honso ne munda mua mushete kabidi, neuteke tshiamu tshia or ku mibangu ya mushete
Mikaya wakamuambila ne, Biwahingana ne ditalala, Yehowa kakungambila di
Kadi ndi udikuma tô ne hanavuisha mubidi wanyi mabuba, ndi ngubuesha mu buhika; bua bumue, hanamana kuambila bakuabo bualu bua Nzambi, meme tshikadi mubengibue
Kadi Yozefe uvua wambila tatuende malu mabi onsu a bana babu
Mambre ne bana babu Eshekole ne Anere bavua batue ndondu ne Abrame
Tudi kujadika mikenshi

Bualu bua hanakalua n abo mu buloba bunakaditshiha bua kubaha, ne bobo bakatangisha mesu abo ku mukuna wonso mule anyi ku mutshi wonso wa mabeshi a bungi, bakafilahu milambu yabo, bakafilahu bintu biakankuatshisha tshiji; bakoshelaku bintu bia muhuya muimpe, bakahongololaku milambu ya bia kunua

Nunku mukashi udi kai ne mulume ne mukashi utshidi kamama badi baditatshila bua bintu bia Mukelenge, bua bobo bikale ba tshijila mu mubidi ne mu nyuma kabidi; kadi mukashi udi ne mulume udi uditatshila bua bintu bia ha buloba, bu mudiye mumanye mua kusankisha mulume wandi
Bidi bimpe bua meme kumuambila ne, Ndi musue kuakula, anyi

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, nentume di bua kubikila bilembi bia minyinyi ya mu mai bia bungi, nebibakuate; ku nyima nembikile bilembi bia nyama bia bungi, ne biobi nebibakebe ku mikuna mile yonso ne ku mikuna mikese ne munkatshi mua mena a mu mabue
Kadi wewe, muana wa muntu, unvua dî dindi nkuambila; kuntombokedi bu mudibo benza kudi tshisamba atshi tshia bantombokedi

Bena Ashe kabakihata bantu ba mu Ako, anyi bantu ba mu Sidona, anyi ba mu Alabâ, anyi ba mu Akiziba, anyi ba mu Heleba, anyi ba mu Lehoba; kadi Bena Ashê bakashikama munkatshi mua Bena Kanâna, bena buloba; bualu bua kabakabihata nansha
Hanuadisangisha, muntu ne muntu udi ne musambu, udi ne diyisha, udi ne bualu buakabuluibua kudiye, udi ne muaku udibo kabai bamanye, udi ne kujingulula kua muaku

Mukelenge wakabatekela tshituha tshia bia kudia biandi bishema bia buatshia buatshia ne tshia nvinyo wakadiye unua, bua bobo bakoleshibue nunku bidimu bisatu; bua ku ndekelu kua bidimu ebi bamanye mua kuimana ku mpala kua mukelenge
Isaka wakatuma Yakoba yeye wakaya ku Padana alama kudi Labana muana wa Betuele, Muena Alama muan abo wa balume ne Lebeka, mamu wa Yakoba ne Esau
Ahiya wa Bena Lewi wakadi mulami wa bibutshilu bia mu nsubu wa Nzambi ne wa bibutshilu bia bintu bia tshijila
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa, bu muakenza tatu wandi mu malu andi onso
Nuenu nutumikile mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, nubienze, buloba bundi musue kunuha bua kushikamamu kabunuluki
Mukelenge wa Ashû wakatuma Tâtana ne Labasalisa ne Labashake, bafume ku Lakisha ne masalayi a bungi bua kuluanganabo ne Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, mu Yelushalema Bakafika ku Yelushalema
Petelo wakenza nunku
Bena Lewi bakatuala mushete wa Nzambi ha maha abo ne mitshi, bu muakamba Mose bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa
Kakuena munga muimpe anu Nzambi
Hakanyungulukabo musangu wa muanda mutekete, ne hakela bakuidi mpungi, Yoshua wakambila bantu ne, Elai mbila, bualu bua Yehowa wakunuha musoko
Bakalua ne milambu ne bia dikumi bia bintu bia tshijila ne lulamatu lua mitshima yabo; Kenaniya, Muena Lewi, wakadi ku mutu kuabi, ne Shemei muan abo wakamulonda

Bualu bua nuenu nuakulengesha mitshima yenu mu kutumikila kuenu kua malu a bushua bua kuikala ne dinanga dia bana benu ba mu Kilisto didi kadî ne lubombo, nunku nunangangane mu mitshima yenu bikole; bualu bua nuakaledibua tshiakabidi, kenku bintu bidi bijimina, kadi ku bintu bidi kabi bijimina, ku dî dia Nzambi udi ne muoyo ne udiku tshiendelele

dilongolola dia mianda ya bisalu bidi bieepula nyama ku masama, dilongolola dia labolatwala, lupitadi ne biondapelu bia tshidiilu tshia nyama pamwe ne dilonda dia meeyi ne mikandu ya ditunga idi itangila mianda ya dikuba dia nyama, dilongolola dia diyisha kumpala dia makanda a mubidi a bangabanga;
Mukalenga kuambila Yozefe ne: Ndi mulote ndota
Bena Yuda bakakonka ne, Yeye udi wamba ne, Kanuena bamanye mua kulua kunaya, neadishihe, anyi

Enza biebe tshilulu tshinene tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzu ne bua lin udi mutambe buimpe utshienzeshe kudi bantu badi ne lungenyi lule badi bamanye mua kuenza tshifuanyikishi tshia bakeluba mu tshilulu atshi
Habakuka Dî dia Yehowa diakunvua muprofete Habakuka
Buonso buabo bakahua, bakatelesha muakadi Bânaba ne Paulo bamba bua bimanyinu ne malu a kukema biakenza n abo Nzambi munkatshi mua bisamba bia bende
Nunku kanuikadi bu bahote, kadi nujingulule mudi disua dia Mukelenge
Kadi kabakumusha bitendelelu bionso biakadi ku mutu kua mikuna; kadi mutshima wa Asa wakadi muakane kudi Yehowa matuku andi onso
Wakamba munda munda ne, Binalenga anu ku tshmialu tshiandi, nenkoleshibue
Bualu bukuabo, nakunvua mikemu ya Bena Isalele badi mu butaka kudi Bena Ejipitu, ndi muvuluke tshihungidi tshianyi
Bualu bukuabo kabidi, tutumbile bietu mu ntatu, tumanye ne, Ntatu idi yenzesha ditantamana, ne ditantamana didi dienzesha dijadikibua, ne dijadikibua didi dienzesha ditekemena
Hakalua tshikondo tshidi bimuna bimita mafu, nakabandisha mesu anyi mu tshiota, nakatangila ne mbushi ya bimpanga yakadi ne matoba yakaya kudi mashina a mbushi akadi ne mihola mihola ne matoba matoba
Dî edi nunku diakakemesha bayidi bandi
Nebende pankatshi pa biluilu binayi, bibidi kumpala, bibidi kunyima kuabu
Samuele Badi Batamba Bena Amona ne Bena Sulia Bukole Kul
Tshibangidilu Yakobe udi umuangala ku Shekeme, uya ku Betele Dituku dikuabu Mvidi Mukulu kuambila Yakobe ne: Juka, uye kuasa ku Betele
Binuahua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muoyo, binualonda nzambi mikuabo, binuenzela nzambi mikuabo midimu, binuayitendelela, ndi nnumanyisha lelu ne, Nenufue bulelela
Wewe kuditshihi kudi mutu webe, bualu bua wewe kuena mumanye mua kuvuisha lusuki lumue anyi lutoke anyi lufike
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Witabushe bua muntu webe alukile, bua meme kufuila mu musoko wanyi, hehi ne lukita lua tatu wanyi ne mamu wanyi
Bena Ejipitu ne bena Kenaane bamane kujikija makuta onsu ku biakudia, bena Ejipitu kuya kudidila Yozefe, bamba ne: Enza muebe muonsu mua kuenza bua utupeshe biakudia
Mukelenge wakabambila ne, Nushale ku Yeleko tô ne hamena nsuki yenu kabidi, hashishe nuhingane
Hakadibo bayikila n andi, muntu mutungula wa mukelenge wakalua bua kubikileye Hamana ku bidia bia disanka dinene biakalongolola Esetê

Muana wakadiku, mamu wandi wakadi Muena Isalele ne tatu andi wakadi Muena Ejipitu wakaluhuka munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, muana mulume eu wa mukashi wa Bena Isalele wakasangana ne Muena Isalele mukuabo mu tshituilu, muana mulume wa mukashi wa Bena Isalele wakateta dina dia Yehowa tshitelatela, wakamuhenda, ba kalua handikudi Mose
Bobu kabidi bavua mua kutumona nanku
Bantu aba badi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo, Bena Lewi, ku meku abo
Binuansua, nenuenze mikenshi yanyi
Nunku Bena Isalele bakatombokela ba mu nsubu wa Davidi tô ne ku didiku edi
Teka mesa ku mpala kua tshilulu, ne teka muinda ku luseke lua tshitendelelu ludi ku Sude, neuteke mesa ku luseke lua ku nôde
Bakabanuisha nvinyo mu makoho a or dikoho ha buadi dikoho ha buadi , bakadi ne nvinyo ya bukelenge ya bungi bu muakadi bubanji bua mukelenge
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Udi umbikidila meme ne, Muimpe, tshinyi

Solomo wakamba ne, Wewe wakalesha muntu webe Davidi, tatu wanyi, luse lunene lujalame, bu muakendeye ku mesu kuebe mu bushuwa ne buakane ne mu butoke bua mutshima kûdi; wewe wakumulamina luse elu lunene lujalame bualu bua wewe wakamuha muana mulume bua kushikameye mu nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge: bualu ebu buakuenjibua lelu
Nunku Davidi wakitabusha bintu bakalueye n abi kudiye mu bianza biandi; yeye wakamuambila ne, Uye biebe ku nsubu kuebe talalâ; mona, nakunvua dî diebe, nakukuitabusha
Wakasumba tshituha tshia buloba kuakashimikeye ntenta yandi kudi bana ba Hamo tatu wa Shekeme, ku lukama lua kesita

Muntu udi mujike udi uditatshila bua bintu bia Mukelenge, bu mudiye mumanye mua kusankisha Mukelenge; kadi muntu udi ne mukashi udi uditatshila bua bintu bia ha buloha, bu mudiye mumanye mua kusankisha mukashi wandi, ne yeye udi mutahulula mu nseke ibidi
Bamonyi ba bualu ebu bakateka bivualu biabo ku makasa a nsongalume dina diandi Shaula
Nenku bakulu ba mu tshimenga atshi nebabikile mulume awu, bua abajadikile mudiye ubenga kupiana mukaji wa mufue

Hakatangila kahita ka bena bidia ne, Kujingulula eku kudi kuimpe, yeye wakambila Yosefe ne, Mu tshilota tshianyi, mona, nakadi ne bisaka bisatu bia bidia ha mutu hanyi, mu tshisaka tshiakadi ku mutu mene mene muakadi bidia bia Palô bilamba, ne nyunyu ya mulu yakalua, yakabizokola mu tshisaka tshiakadi ha mutu hanyi
Wakadi umuenzela nunku ku tshidimu ku tshidimu hakayeye ku nsubu wa Yehowa: wakamutatshisha nunku, yeye wakadi anu udila, kakadia biandi
Hakadi Davidi ufuma kuakashiheye Muena Peleshete, Abinê wakamuangata, wakaya n andi kudi Shaula muambule mutu wa Muena Peleshete mu tshianza tshiandi
Bana babo ba bakashi bakatumina Yesu dî ne, Mukelenge, ûdi musue udi usama
Enzai mudimu matuku asambombo; kadi dituku dia muanda mutekete nedikale dituku dia tshijila, dituku dia kuikisha ku mesu kua Yehowa; muntu yonso udi wenza mudimu dituku adi nebamushihe
Yuda wakamba ne, Yeye ashale n atshi, bua bundu kabutukuatshi, mona, nakamutumina muana wa mbushi eu, ne wewe kuakamusangana
Nebabaleje midimu idibu mua kuenza ne bintu bidibu mua kuambula
Nuenu balombodi bafofo, mulau ulualua kunudi
Hashishe, Yesu wakabambila ne, Kanutshinyi; yai bienu, nuambile bana betu ne, Yai mu Galela, nenunmoneku
Bukokeshi ne bukole bidi mu tshianza tshiebe, nunku kakuena muntu udi mua kukukolela
Mmuomu, nebamutendelele ne milambu ya kumuoshela ne milambu ya bia kudia biabo, nebaditshihe mutshihu kudi Yehowa, nebenze bu mudibo baditshiha
Kadi bu mudi mulayi wandi tudi tutekemena diulu dihia dihia ne buloba buhia buhia mudi buakane buikalemu
Maweja Nangila neameneshe kabidi bisosa bia nuenu kudisha bimuna bienu
Petelo wakabika, wakaya n abo
Kadi kafila mwaku mudiku kamona mu mianda ya dilomba dia luse
Muena mpata wa mu tshikondo etshi udi hanyi
Hakinvuabo bua dibika dia bafue, bakuabo bakaseka; kadi banga bakamba ne, Netunvue dî diebe kabidi bua bualu ebu

Bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebateke kahia ha tshioshelu, balonge nkunyi mu kahia, ne bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebalonge bituha ne mutu ne dianyi ha nkunyi mu kahia kadi ha tshioshelu, kadi nebuvuwe bintu bia munda ne bioku ne mai; ne muakuidi neoshile bintu bionso ha tshioshelu, bu mulambu udibo bosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshi tua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Kanutahi mputu ham bidi henu bua kujinga n ai bantu bafue, kanutahi nsalu ham bidi henu meme ndi Yehowa
Lehabama wakashikama mu Yelushalema, wakibaka misoko ya mabue mu Yuda
Balake kukandika Balaame ne: Ne wabengi kubatshipa, kadi kubeedi lupemba nansha
Meme nenteke bundu buanyi kudi kunyi
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Ungambile Udi ne muaba mu nsubu wa tatu webe bua tuetu kulalamu, anyi
Nzambi wanyi, ubavuluke bualu bua bobo bakanyanga buakuidi ne tshihungidi tshia buakuidi ne tshia Bena Lewi
Arone ne bana bende ba balume bamutenteke bianza pa mutu
Muana mulume udi biandi muakuidi mu muaba wandi neabiluate matuku muanda mutekete hayeye mu ntenta wa disangisha bua kuenza mudimu mu muaba wa tshijila

Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne bukookeshi bwa kutumina bukalenga bwa mbulamatadi mukanda udiye mufunda yêye nkayende anyi mufunda mu tshibûngi bwa kubumanyisha idi mwenda munda, bukalenga abu budi ne tshia kufila diandamuna mu ngondo isatu idi ilonda
Jukai, nutendelele Nzambi bua kanuhonyi mu mateyi
Mukuabo neahingane mu muaba wandi; neatume mulambuishi bua kuhiteye ku luseke lua bukelenge ludi luhita bulengele; kadi hahita anu matuku mibi, yeye neumushibue kakuyi tshiji, kakuyi nvita
Bualu bua mesu anyi adi amona nshila yabo yonso, kayena misokoma kundi, ne mibi yabo kayena misokoma ku mesu kuanyi

Kanungu ka Dîba didi maalu makole afwana kujimija budikadidi anyi bujima bwa tshipaapu tshia ditunga anyi kufikisha ku dimanyikija dia lweendu lwa bishimikidi bia ditunga, Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka bulongolodi bwa tshimpitshimpi anyi bwa bilwilu panyima pa diyukilangana ne minisitila wa kumpala ne balombodi ba bibambalu biônso bibidi bia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga, bu mudibio biambibwa mu tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu edi

Bualu bua ndi musue Bena Isalele bangate milambu idibo basue kushihela mu tshisuku, balue n ai kudi Yehowa, ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena kudi muakuidi, bayifile bu mulambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala kudi Yehowa

Mose ne Alona bakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Dilolo nenumanye ne, Yehowa wakunuluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne dinda nenumone butumbi bua Yehowa, bualu bua Yehowa udi munvue munudi numujiana, tuetu tudi banganga bua nudi nutujiana
Yehoshafata wakavuisha ditalala ne mukelenge wa Isalele
Kinshasa ke tshimenga tshia mpwilamambu tshia ditunga ne kabidi lubanza lwa bishimikidi bia ditunga
Ndi mumanye ne ndi neitabushishibue mu Mukelenge Yesu ne, Kakuena tshintu tshidi tshibi nkayatshi; anu kudi muntu udi utshibala bu tshintu tshibi, tshidi tshibi kudiye
Biwamanya ne, Yeye udi utungila bituamulomba tshintu tshionso, nunku tudi bamanye ne, Tudi ne milombu ituakamulomba
Lelu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, udi unulaya ne: nuenu benze mudiye musue, bakumbaje meyi ende ne mikenji yende, Yeye neikale Mvidi Mukulu wenu

Lungenyi elu kabidi ludi lufuma kudi Yehowa wa misumba, Yeshaya Mulau wikale kûdi, Aliele, Aliele, Hashishe nentatshishe Aliele, Nenkunyungulule ne bitudilu bianyi, nenkutshintshimike ne mialu ya mata, Nebakutulule hanshi, newambe mei ebe hawikala muinshi mua buloba, Kadi tshisumbu tshia badi n ebe lukuna netshikale bu dinfuenkenya dibotesha, Yehowa wa misumba nealue kûdi ne mikungulu, Tshisumbu tshia bisamba bionso bidi biluisha Aliele, Muanda au newikale bu tshilota Hampakanai

Hakalekelabo nshila mululame, bakahambuka, bamane kulonda nshila wa Belama, muana wa Beo, wakasua difutu dia bienzedi bibi; kadi yeye wakadi mubedibue bua malu mabi andi; mpundu wakadi kamama wakakula mukana bu muatu, kakakanda buhote bua muprofete

Zêba ne Salemuna bakadi mu Kakô, ne misumba yabo yakadi n abo, bu binunu dikumi ne bitanu, bonso bakadi bashala ba mu musumba wa bantu ba ku esete; bualu bua bena nvita bu binunu lukama ne makumi abidi bakahona bafue
Penina wakadi ne bana kadi Hana kakadi ne bana nansha

Mukeluba mukuabo wakolola tshianza tshiandi ku kahia kakadi hankatshi ha bakeluba bakuabo, wakangata dikala diaku, wakaditeka mu bianza bia muntu wakadi muluate tshivualu tshia lin, ne yeye wakadiangata, wakaluhuka n adi
Kena muan abo ne Yakobo ne Yose ne Yuda ne Simona, anyi
Kadi bobo badi basue kuikala babanshi badi bahona mu kutetshibua kua munda ne mu buteyi ne mu nkuka ya bungi Idi mihote ne idi ibanyanga, bu yoyo mene idi inyisha bantu mu dibashihesha ne mu dibutuka
Nyama yenu neivulangane, biakudia bitshiompoka

Bakashiha Pâsha nedata ne Dalafona ne Asepata, Polata ne Adalia ne Alidata, ne Pâmashata ne Alisai ne Alidai ne Wayezata, bana halume dikumi ba Hamana, muana wa Hamedata, muena lukuna wa Bena Yuda; kadi kabakahaula bintu biabo
Munkatshi muetu mudi badi ne nvî mitoke tô ne banunu Busambi bua Nzambi budi buta mba bukese kûdi, anyi
Ku nyima kua bualu ebu Bena Lewi bakabuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena bua kuenza mudimu ku mpala kua Alona ne kua bana bandi balume, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose bua Bena Lewi, bakabenzela nunku
Nzambi wakantuma ku mpala kuenu bua kunusangasha difuka dikese dia bantu ne bua kusungila mioyo yenu ku luhandu lunene
Yeye wakalonda ku nyima kua muntu wa Nzambi, wakamusangana mushikame muinshi mua mutshi wa telebinta
Munudi nudilombela kabidi muanzu wa butuangaji mbishi

Mukokeshi neikale ne bualu bua kufila milambu ya kuosha, milambu ya bia kudia ne milambu ya bia kunua, halua bikondo bia bidia bia disanka, bia ngondo mihia mihia, matuku onso a Lumingu, ne matuku onso a bidia bia disanka akusunguilabo Bena Isalele
Uluangane nvita mimpe ya ditabusha, ulamate ku muoyo wa tshiendelele, kuwakabikidibua ne kuwakitabushila Yesu ne dijukula dimpe ku mesu kua bamanyi ba bungi
Unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe, bua matuku ebe ikale a bungi mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ukuha

Muomumue bakashi kabidi badilengeshe ne bilulu bidi bibakanyina; bikale ne kalolo ne buhuekele; kabaluki nsuki yabo bihia; kabaluatshi ngolo ne mabue ne bilulu bia mushinga muhite bungi; kadi badilengeshe ne bienzedi bimpe, bu mudi buakane bua bakashi badi bamba ne, Tudi tutshina Nzambi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ebu mbualu bua mudimu wa Bena Lewi ba bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu tô ne ha mutu nebenze mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena, hahitabo bidimu makumi atanu, nebalekele mudimu, kabankuatshidi mudimu kabidi, kadi nebakuatshile bana babo mu ntenta wa kusambakena, bua kulamabo bintu, kabenji mudimu mukole, wewe newenzele Bena Lewi nunku hawabalesha mudimu wabo
Enza biebe nkanu ya or ibidi, uyiteke ku nseke ibidi kuinshi kua mutu watshi; neyikale bu miaba ya kubueshamu mitshi ya kutshituadila
Badi ha buihi n ebe ne badi kule nebakuseke, wewe umena lumu lubi, mûle tente ne diyoyo
Ndi nkutendekena ne, Kunkengeshi; bua wakadi wela mulamatshi dî ne, Hatuka munda mua muntu eu
Nsubu webe ne bukelenge buebe nebujadikibue ku mesu kuebe tshiendelele; nkuasa webe wa butumbi neajadikibue tshiendelele
Kufundabu mena a bantu balume bonsu bavua ne bidimu bituadije ku makumi asatu too ne ku makumi atanu, bavua ne bua kuenza midimu mishilangane ya mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Tatu wandi wakamudila
Lumu lunakunvua mu buloba buanyi lua bienzedi biebe ne lungenyi luebe luakadi lulelela
Ndelanganyi ya Esawu, idi misombe mu mikuna ya Seyire, ne bena Mowabe, badi basombe mu Are, mbamane kuitaba bua tupitshile muabu
Nunku ndi nkusengelela ne, Webeshe mukelenge bualu ebu, yeye kena uhidia kunfila kûdi
Bualu bua wewe udi mumanye muntu webe

Bualu bua disua dia Nzambi didi nunku, bua nuenu nuhuishe buhote bua bantu batshimbakane ku kuenza kuenu kua malu mimpe; bu badishikamine, kadi kembu badi bangata budishikaminyi buabo bu tshibuikilu tshia malu mabi; kadi mikale bu bahika ba Nzambi
Matshika a Bena Amole akabangila ku dibue dinene, akabanda tô ne ku mutu kua Akalabima
Kadi kabakabala Bena Lewi ne Bena Benyamina, bualu bua dî dia mukelenge diakatondesha Yoaba
Mitshi ya lin ne ya orge yakashihibua, bualu bua orge yakadi mu miehu ne lin yakadi ne bilongo
Tuanji kuitabusha bualu ebu, ne bobo nebashikame n etu Bena musoko bonso ba mu musoko wandi bakitabusha mei a Hamô ne a muan andi Shekeme, balume bonso ba mu musoko wandi bakätengudibua

Bualu bua Apolo, muan etu wa mu Kilisto, nakamusengelela tô bua yeye alue kunudi ne bana betu bakuabo ba mu Kilisto; ne yeye kakasua kulua katataka, nasha kakese; kadi yeye nealue kunudi haheteye tshikondo
Nunku wele meji a dî dindi mua kuikala n adi bua kuambila wakuntuma
Bena Ejipitu kuipata bena Izrayele mu ditunga diabu bamba ne: Umukayi lukasa, bualu tudi mua kubutuka
Bobo bakatamba kuela mbila ne, Umushihe ku mutshi mutshiamakane
Kadi biahanga mukuabo wenu meshi, âlombe kudi Nzambi udi uha bonso ne mutshima mutoke kai ubatobolola; neamuhebue
Mu malu au onso Yobo kakamba bualu bubi ku mishiku yandi nansha
Bakamba ne, Wenze tshionso tshidi tshimpe ku mesu kuebe
Nuenu badi bûkute katataka, mulau ulualua Kunudi, bua nenuikale ne nsala
Mîyama wakashala ku butshika bua tshitudilu matuku muanda mutekete, bantu kabakaya ku luendu to ne hakaluabo ne Mîyama kabidi
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne tshitema ne nkama isatu
Bakelenge badi bamanye bulelela ne, Yeye udi Kilisto, anyi
Nunku nakabuelamu, nakatangila, ekumona
Mukelenge Yehowa, wewe wakulua ne bantu aba dia munemu dia Yadene bua kutufila mu bianza bia Bena Amole ne bua kutufuisha munyi
Dituku dikuabu uvua mutuele meme ne mutangidi wa balambi ba biakudia biebe mu nzubu wa lukanu, bualu uvua mutufikile munda
Muana wa balume wa Yonatana wakadi Meliba bâla; Meliba bâla wakalela Mika
Mbulamatadi udi ne tshia kwikala mumanya, mu dienza dia midimu yende, dishilashilangana dia mianda ya bunkambwa mu ditunga
Tshisamba tshia Yuda:

Hanakadi ngenza nunku, nakadi ngenda mu nshila wa ku Damaseke ne bukole ne dî bia bakuidi banene; bakafika diba munda munyi mukelenge, nakatangila munya mukole ufuma mu diulu mutambe dinkenka dia diba, wakuntemena meme ne bakadi benda n anyi
Wawile bantu bebe tshilota, nunku netukujinguluiletshi
Meme kuikisha dituku dia muanda mutekete, kudijidila, bua dikale dituku dia Dikisha
Mukenji ewu, bikale bawenzulula ku tshidimu tshionsu kudi ndelanganyi yenu yonsu
Hakatshiabu, hakadibo baya mu nshila, hakambabo kufika ha buihi ne musoko, Petelo wakabanda ha mutu ha nsubu bua kutendelela Nzambi, diba diamba kufika munda munya

Hakatangila Yakoba Lakele, muana wa Labana, muan abo wa balume ne mamu andi, ne mikoko ya Labana muan abo wa balume ne mamu andi, Yakoba wakasemena ha buihi, wakumusha dibue diakadi ku mushiku wa dina, wakanuisha mikoko ya Labana, muan abo wa balume ne mamu andi

Mukelenge Solomo wakatula ngabu ya or nkama ibidi; bakatula ngabu ne ngabu ku nshekele Wakatula ngabu ya or nkama isatu mikuabo; wakatula ngabu ne ngabu ku nshekele ya or nkama isatu; mukelenge wakayiteka mu nsubu wa ditu dia Lebanona
Bakamuambila mei onso akabambila Bena Yabesha

Bobo bakamba ne, Bulelela, tuakutangila ne Yehowa udi n ebe, nunku tuakuambilangana ne, Tutshihangane n ebe, tuhunge n ebe tshihungidi, bua wewe kutuenzedi bualu bubi, bu mutuakadi katuyi tukulenga tshianza, tuakukuenzela anu malu mimpe; tua kukumusha talalâ, ne katataka wewe udi musankishibue kudi Yehowa
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Bianza bia Zelubabela biakujadika bishimikidi bia nsubu eu; bianza biandi nebimushikishe; hashishe, neumanye ne Yehowa wa misumba wakuntuma kûdi
Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, wakakudimuna mukelenge ne, Amen
Abalama wakatahulula bantu bandi, wakatuangana n abo butuku, yeye ne bahika bandi bakabatamba bukole, wakabihata to ne ku Hoba, udi ku tshianza tshia bakashi tshia Damaseke
Mose wakababikila; Alona ne bakokeshi bonso ba munkatshi muabo ba kahingana kudiye; Mose wakasomba n abo
Udi umanyisha beena ditunga dipangadika edi mu muyuki wenda

Ba munkatshi muenu badi bahanduka nebanvuluke munkatshi mua bisamba biaya n abo mu buhika, hananyingalasha mitshima yabo ya masandi yakûmushabo kundi, ne hanafofomesha mesu abo akadibo batangisha ku mpingu yabo bu bena masandi
Kolosai Nunku binuikala babishibue hohamue ne Kilisto ku lufu, nukebe malu a mu diulu, mudi Kilisto, mushikame ku tshianza tshikole tshia Nzambi
Malu onso akalua bu muakambeye, bakampingasha mu mudimu wanyi, kadi bakowa muntu mukuabo
Tshidimu tshia Dikisha ne dituku dia Dikisha Bidimu bilondangane bisambombu, nukune biakudia, nubinowe kabidi
Bualu bua biadishindabo, umue neabishe mukuandi; kadi diakabi didi kudi udi udishinda nkayandi kayi ne mukuabo bua kumuhisha

Bintu bidi bidimenena mu tshidimu tshia kubanda kua buloba nebikale bintu bienu bia kudia, bintu biebe ne bia muhika webe mulume ne bia muhika webe mukashi ne bia muena mudimu webe ne bia muenyi udi ushikama n ebe ne bia bimuna biebe ne bia nyama yonso idi mu buloba buebe bintu bionso biakadimenena nebikale bintu bia kudia
Ebu mbuhianyi bua tshisamba tshia Bena Dana ku meku abo: bimenga ne misoko yabi
Wakamutendekena, wakateka ntalanta ya argent ibidi mu bibombi bibidi ne bilulu abi bibidi, wakabiteka ha maha a bantu bandi babidi, bobo bakabituala ku mpala kua Gehazi
Hatuakabuela mu Lomo, bakitabusha bua Paulo ashikame ha nkayandi ne disalayi dimulame

Nembavuishe tshisamba tshimue mu buloba abu ha mikuna ya mu Isalele; mukelenge umuehele neikale nfumu wa buonso buabo; kabena bikala bisamba bibidi kabidi, kabena batahuluka kabidi makelenge abidi kashidi
Nukebe kuheta ditalala ne bantu bonso, ne kujidibua kudi muntu kai n aku kena mumanye mua kutangila Mukelenge
Nakaha Maki Gilada
Debola, muprofete wa Nzambi mukashi, mukashi wa Lapidota, wakadi ulumbuluila Bena Isalele ku tshikondo atshi
Kadi meyi a musambu ewu neanusonguele
Bamuteke ku butshika bua tshitudilu matuku muanda mutekete, ne ku nyima nebamuhingishe kabidi
Kanualakanyi biamu bia mpawungi ne biamu bitoke bia mushinga mukole bidibu balamike ku mpingu aku to
Yeye wakamba ne, Kanuena mua kuhita
Ba messager bandi bakahingana kudiye, yeye wakabakonka ne, Nuakuhingana bua tshinyi
Tshitala tshiakasama
Bena Izrayele nebasungidile muntu udi mushipangane mu mpukapuka awu
Hakunvueye muakamuambilabo nunku, wakababuesha mu nsubu wakadi munda mua nsubu munene, wakabuesha makasa abo mu miomba
Eliya wakambila baprofete ba Bâla ne, Nudisunguile ngombe umue, numulongolole diambedi, bualu bua nuenu nudi ba bungi; nubikile dina dia nzambi wenu, kadi kanuteki kahia muinshi
Nenudie bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene matuku muanda mutekete, bu munakanuambila mu ngondo wa Abiba unakasungula; bualu bua nuakahatuka mu Ejipitu mu ngondo wa Abiba
Dinanga Didi ne Bukole bu mudi Lufu n Abu Udi ufuma ku tshihela mukuate ku diboko dia wandi munanga nganyi
