Bena Benyamina bakenza nunku, bakadiangatshila bakashi bakabakumbana bungi buabo ba munkatshi mua bakadi baja maja, bakakuatabo; bakaya n abo, bakahingana ku buhianyi buabo, bakasa misoko, bakashikamamu
Yeye wakadi mutendeledi muakane, wakadi utshina Nzambi ne ba mu nsubu wandi bonso, wakadi uha bantu bintu bia luse bia bungi, wakadi utendelela Nzambi matuku onso
Anyi wakamuha meshi nganyi
Eleazâ, muana wa balume wa Alona, wakabaka umue wa bana ba bakashi ba Putiele, yeye wakamulelela Pinehasa

Bua muanda eu meme kabidi, hanakunvua lumu lua ditabusha dia mu Mukelenge Yesu didi munkatshi muenu, ne lua dinanga dinudi nulesha basanto bonso, tshiena ndekela kusakidila Nzambi bua bualu buenu, ntu ngatela mena enu mu kutendelela kuanyi, bua Nzambi wa Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto, Tatu wa butumbi, anuhe nyuma wa meshi ne wa dibuluila mu dimumanya dienu; ne bua yeye anumunyikile mesu a mu mitshima yenu, bua nuenu kumanya didi ditekemena dia kunubikila kuandi, ne budi bubanshi bua butumbi bua buhianyi buandi mu basanto, ne bua nuenu kumanya budi bunene buhite bua bukole buandi kutudi tuetu badi bamuitabusha
Bena Isalele bakatshunguluka kudi Bena Benyamina kabidi, bakabashiha ne miele ya nvita, ne bena musoko bonso ne bimuna biabo ne bionso biakasanganabo; ne misoko yonso yakasanganabo, bakayosha
Abalahama wakangata mikoko ne ngombe, wakabika kudi Abimeleke, bubidi buabo bakafua ndondo

Bualu bua Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Muele wa nvita wa mukelenge wa Babulona neufike ham bidi hebe, nembutule bantu bangi ba mu tshisamba tshiebe ku miele ya nvita ya bena bukitu, bonso badi bahite ba mu bisamba bia bantu kubakuatshisha buowa
Bena Gada bakasa Dibona ne Atalota ne Aloe ne Atalota shofana ne Yazê ne Yogebeha, ne Betenimela ne Betehalana, misoko yakadi ne mpangu ya mabue, ne mpangu ya mikoko
Kukuatshi tshiji mu mutshima webe lukasa, bualu bua tshiji tshidi tshiala mu tshiadi tshia bahote
Nunku, bualu bua yeye wakananukila kuikala ne lutulu, wakaheta mulayi
Tshianza tshia Nzambi tshiakadi n abo; bantu ba bungi bakitabusha, bakakudimuna mitshima yabo kudi Mukelenge
Nsongalume mukuabu mupika, muena Ebrewu, uvua netu mu nzubu wa lukanu amu, wenzela mulombodi wa bena mvita ba mu bukalenga mudimu
Bualu bua buonso buabo badi badikebela malu abo, kabena bakeba malu a Yesu Kilisto
Nanku mupika apete anu budikadidi, bua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu anusankishe mu bionsu binudi nuenza

Halua Yehowa n enu mu buloba bunudi nuya bua kubuhiana, hanuihatshileye bisamba bia bungi ku mpala kuenu, Bena Hiti ne Bena Gîgashi ne Bena Amole ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Yebuse, bisamba muanda mutekete bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole; habafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu bianza bienu, nenubashihe; hashishe nenubajimishe ha buloba: kanuhungi n abo tshihungidi, kanubaleshi luse, kanubakanganyi n abo, kanubakishi muan enu mukashi kudi muana wabo mulume, kanuangatshidi muana wenu mulume mukashi kudibo
Hakadibo bahita mu nshila dinda, bakamona mutshi wa nfigi mufubidile tô ne ku miji yau
Hezikiya wakatamba kudila
Hakambeye di edi, tshitala tshiakasama tshiakabidi

Kadi kanudi nyama mikuabo idi ihingishilula bintu mukana, anyi idi ne mikono mihanduluke kamelo, bualu bua kadi kahingishilula bintu mukana, kabidia, kadi kakena ne mikono mihanduluke, kakena kakane kunudi

Bantu bonso nebatshine, nebambe mudimu udi Nzambi muenze, Bantu bakane nebasanke mu Yehowa, nebanyemene kudiye; Misambu Nzambi, kukutumbisha kudi kukuindila talalâ mu Siona; nebakushikishile wewe mitshihu
Hakatentekelabo buloba nunku matuku makumi anai, bakahingana
Wewe newenze nunku bua kubalengesha ubamiamine mai a kubalengesha n au ku bubi, babeye mubidi wabo wonso ne dihaya, buvuwe bilulu biabo ne badilengeshe
Hamulengeshabo ku nyima, bamubadile matuku muanda mutekete

Bantu ba Bende Badi Bashikama mu Samalea Mukelenge wa Ashû wakangata bantu ba mu Babulona ne ba mu Kuta ne ba mu Awa ne ba mu Hamata ne ba mu Sefâwayima, wakabateka mu misoko ya Samalea mu miaba ya Bena Isalele; bobo bakaheta misoko ya Samalea, bakashikamamu
Nakatendelela Yehowa, nakamba ne, Mukelenge Yehowa, kushihi bantu bebe ne buhianyi buebe buwakahikula ne bukole buebe, bantu bawakahatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole
Yeye wakabika, wakaya ku nsubu kuandi
Kadi netufuile ku mesu kuebe, netujimishe buloba buetu kabidi bualu kai
Buloba kubajibikila bonsu ne bena meku abu, ne bantu bonsu bavua nabu Kora, ne bintu biabu
Malu â kakadi mu mutshima wandi, anyi
Hebrews Bua bualu ebu butudi n abu mbua kutamba kudimuka ku malu atuakunvua bua bumue katulu kuhambuka

Yosefe wakangata tshitalu, wakatshinyengela ne tshilulu tshitoke tshia line, wakatshiladika mu lukita luandi luhia luhia, luakadiye mumane kumbula mu dibue; wakabungulusha dibue dinene, wakaditeka ku mushiku wa mbelu wa lukita, wakaya biandi
Yudasa, mumutungidi, wakamukonka ne, Labi, mmeme, anyi
Hakafikeye ha buihi, wakatangila musoko, wakajinga, wakamba ne, Bu wewe mumanye mu dituku edi malu adi akuhesha ditalala
Yotama wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu dikumi ne bisambombo; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Yelusha, muana mukashi wa Sadoka
Bulalu buonso budiye ulalahu hahatuka tufina budi ne bukoya, ne bintu bionso bidiye ushikamahu bidi ne bukoya
Kanudionenyi mitshima yenu ne malu au Ebi mbilele bia bisamba bindi ngihata ku mesu kuenu, buloba buabo buakoneka, nempingishe bubi ha mutu habu, buloba nkayabu budi buluka bena buloba

Halua dituku dia matuku dikumi ne atanu a ngondo wa muanda mutekete hanuashikisha kuhuola bintu, nenudie bidia bia Yehowa matuku muanda mutekete, dituku dia kumudilu nedikale dituku dia kuikisha, ne dituku dia muanda mukulu nedikale dituku dia kuikisha

Wewe neubambile kabidi ne, Eu udi mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia unudi nûfila kudi Yehowa bana balume ba mikoko ba tshidimu tshimue, badi kabayi ne tshilema, bana babidi ba buatshia buatshia, bu mulambu wa kuosha wa tshiendelele
Hashishe mukelenge wakangebesha ne, Udi ubungamina tshinyi, bualu bua tshiena nkumona ne udi usama
Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi, mu dienza dia dîyi, mwa kukosa, dîba diônso, mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi anyi mbulamatadi wa bilwilu

Mu matuku a masanka a kudia bidia ne mu bikondo bisungula bia bidia abi mulambu wa bia kudia wikale tshihiminu tshia épha bua kutshina ne ngombe, tshihiminu tshia épha bua kutshifila ne tshimpanga, ne bungi budiye mua kufila ne bana ba mikoko, ne tshihiminu tshia hin Halongolola mukokeshi mulambu wa kufila bua disanka dia mu mutshima wandi, hafileye nansha mulambu wa kuosha nansha mulambu wa kuvuisha hau ditalala bu mulambu wa kusangileye n au Yehowa, bamunzuluile tshibi tshia ku tshibuelelu tshia ku luseke lua esete, afile mulambu wandi wa kuosha anyi milambu yandi ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala bu mudiye wenza Dituku dia Lumingu; hashishe aluhuke biandi, binshile tshibi ku nyima kuandi
Yesu wakabambila ne, Balunda ba mubaki wa mukashi badi bamanye mua kujila bia kudia hatshidi mubaki wa mukashi n abo, anyi
Nunku kapitene wakamuangata, wakaya n andi kudi kamanda, wakamuambila ne, Paulo, muena lukanu, wakumbikila kudiye, wakungambila bua kulua ne nsongalume eu kûdi, udi ne dî dia kukuambila
Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Naho ne Nzambi wa tatu wabo ikale mulumbuluishi hankatshi hetu Yakoba wakaditshiha ku ditshina dia tatu wandi Isaka

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula; ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi; ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia; ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Pagiele, muana mulume wa Okelana
Muyishi webe kena usokoma kabidi, mesu ebe neamone Muyishi webe
Wewe udi mumanye mikenshi ya Nzambi ne, Kuendi masandi, kushihi muntu, kuibi, kudingidi muntu, unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe

Idikisha tshituha tshikuabo tshia buloba ebu bua tshijila, bule buatshi coudées binunu makumi abidi ne bitanu, butshiama buatshi coudées binunu dikumi, bu muaba wa tshitendelelu, buloba buhite tshijila
Kadi nyama udi mufue neashale mu dina dia muena tshiina

Yehowa Nzambi wakamba ne, Monai, mulume wakulua bu umue wetu, udi mumanye malu mimpe ne malu mabi, bua yeye kolodi tshianza tshiandi bua kuangateye mamuma a mutshi wa muoyo, wadia, wikala ne muoyo tshiendelele, Yehowa Nzambi wakamuihata mu budimi bua Edene, bua kuihileye buloba buakafumeye
Luke Hakabueleye mu nsubu wa muntu munene wa Bafalese dituku dia Lumingu lua Bayuda bua kudia bidia, bakadi bamutentekela
Ndi nkutuma kudibo, ne wewe ubambile ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba nunku

Mei a baprofete adi makanangane ne bualu ebu, bu muakafundabo ne, Hashika malu â, nempingane, Nengenzele nunka bua bantu badi bashale bakebe Mukelenge, Mukelenge udi Wamba nunku udi umanyisha malu â kale
Bualu bua Yozakâ, muana wa Shimeta, ne Yehozabada, muana wa Shomê, bantu bandi bakamutaha mputa; wakafua
Gouvemeur wakabambila ne, Kanuena mua kudia bintu bitambe bia tshijila tô ne habika muakuidi bua kukonkeye bualu ebu ne Ulima ne Tumima
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bualu bua Yehowa Nzambi webe wakungendesha dikasa dimpe
Baleleshi kuandamuna ne: Bakaji ba bena Ebrewu badi ne bukole bua bungi, bapite ba bena Ejipitu
Bana betu mbanganyi
Unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi webe, bua matuku ebe ikale a bungi, ne bua wewe ukume dikasa dimpe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ukuha

Nukuame mamuma makane adi alesha dikudimuna dia mitshima yenu; kanuedianganyi meshi munda muenu ne, Tuetu iudi ne Abalahama tatu wetu; ndi nuambila ne, Nzambi udi mumanye mua kubisha mabue â alue bana ba Abalahama

Nakanyingalasha mitshima yenu ne mukanda wanyi, kadi tshiena ne dibungama katataka bua buala abu; kadi nakadi ne dibungama bua ndi ntangila ne mukanda au wakanyingalasha mitshima yenu, kadi anu bua musangu muihi , katataka ndi ne disanka, kambualu bua nuakanyingalashibua, kadi bualu bua nuakanyingalashibua tô ne ku dikudimuna dia mitshima yenu; bualu bua nuakanyingalashibua bu mudi Nzambi musue, bua nuenu kanujimishi tshintu tshimue bua bualu buetu
Bakuabo bakangata diteta dia tuseku ne mikumu, ne dia nkanu ne nsubu ya nkanu ha mutu
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu ngondo wa kumudilu, mu dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo, angata muana wa ngombe udi kayi ne tshilema, lengesha n andi tshitendelelu tshia ntempelo
Nunku nufile balume, bantu balembakane, ba mu Gibea kutudi, bua tuetu tubashihe, neamushe bubi ebu mu Isalele
Numuke bintu bulelela; mitshima yenu kayinyingaladi, hanuamuhabi; bua bualu ebu Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka mu mudimu wonso unudi nuenza ne bianza bienu

Nomba Kulengesha kua Badi Kabayi Bakane Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Eu udi mukenji wakuela Yehowa ne, Nuambile Bena Isalele bua bobo balue kûdi ne muana wa ngombe mukunze, udi kayi ne ditoba anyi tshilema, udi kayi muanze kuya muinshi mua mutshi wa tshikokedi
Ka kuvua kushala tshintu tshibishi nansha tshimue ku mitshi yonsu ya mu ditunga dia Ejipitu nansha pa madimi

Hakatangila Zimeli ne, Bakanyenga musoko, yeye wakabuela mu nsubu wa mukelenge, wakamuosha, wakafuilamu, bua malu mabi akenzeye ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kuendeye mu nshila wa Yalobama ne bua malu mabi akenzesheye Bena Isalele
Bifuanyikishi bia mikumbi biakadi bu tubalu tulongolola bua nvita; ne ha mitu hai hakadi bu mudi bifulu bia butumbi bifuana ngolo, ne mpala yai yakadi bu mpala ya bantu
Nuenu nudi bena diakalenga, bualu nuakumona bionsu ebi, bua nujadike ne: Maweja Nangila nkayende ke Mvidi Mukulu, kakuena mvidie mukuabu, amu Yeye
Hakadiye umusengelela ne mei andi ku dituku ku dituku, wakamutatshisha, mutshima wandi wakatata tô ne ku lufu
Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Wewe ne bana bebe balume, kanunu nvinyo ne bintu bikole bia kunua hanuahuola mu ntenta wa kusambakena bua kanufu bienu
Katataka wewe ubafundile musambu eu, wayisha Bena Isalele bonso musambu; uteke musambu eu mukana muabo, newikale bu mumanyi wa bualu buanyi kudi Bena Isalele
Nzambi Udi Ukengesha Bena Isalele Dut

Makunshi abidi, tshiowelu tshimue, ngombe ya tshiamu tshia mitaku dikumi ne ibidi yakadi muinshi mua tshiowelu bu bitekelu biatshi, biakenzabo kudi mukelenge Solomo bua kubiteka mu nsubu wa Yehowa bintu ebi bionso biakadi ne bujitu bua tshiamu tshia mitaku buakadibo kabayi mua kuidikisha
Bungi buabo basangisha ne bana babo bakadi bayishibue bua kuimbilabo Yehowa misambu, bonso bakadi ne tshimbidi tshiakane, bakadi nkama ibidi ne makumi muanda mukulu ne muanda mukulu
Pashishe kukonkaye nsongakaji ne: Ungambile: udi muana wa nganyi
Bakamutandisha ne, Wewe udi muyidi wandi, tuetu tudi bayidi ba Mose
Muntu yonso udi uheshibua bia bungi nebamulombe bia bungi; biatekabo bia bungi mu bianza bia muntu, nebamulombe bikuabo ha mutu
Kulua kua Muana wa muntu nekuikale bu muakadi ha matuku a Noa
Bualu nzubu ayi ke tshintu tshimue tshidi bena Levi natshi mu ditunga dia bena Izrayele
Bua ditengula didi dikukuatshisha biwikala wenza mikenshi; kadi biwikala mushihi wa mikenshi, ditengula diebe diakulua bu kadi ditengula
Wakamuambila ne, Angata mukanda webe, ushikame lubilu, ufunde makumi atanu
Nunku Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bu mundi meme ne muoyo, bua mutshihu wanyi wakahetuleye ne tshihungidi tshianyi tshiakashiheye, nemmukengeshe
Bantu ba mu Mikemasa, lukama ne makumi abidi ne babidi
Wakateka tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kuosha ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshiendelele wakoshahu mulambu wa bukula bua manvua bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Nzambi kena wa bafue, udi wa badi ne muoyo

Davidi wakatuma bantu ku nvita, tshituha tshisatu tshia kumudilu mu bianza bia Yoaba, ne tshituha tshisatu tshikuabo mu bianza bia Abishai, muana wa Seluya, muan abo ne Yoaba, ne tshituha tshisatu tshikuabo mu bianza bia Itai, Muena Giti

Bualu muntu mulema kena mua kunkuatshila mudimu to, nansha yeye muikale mpofu, muntu udi utebuka, muikale ne diulu tshibatabata, nansha ne tshidimba tshile ne tshipi, nansha muntu uvua mutshibuke mukolu nansha diboku, nansha muntu ne katonta nyima, nansha muntu mushawuke, nansha muntu ne lusonga mu disu, nansha muntu ne lubika, nansha muntu mutungu

Bobo kabakunvuila balumbuluishi babo; kadi bakenza malu a masandi kudi nzambi yabo, bakayinamina; bobo bakasesuka lubilu mu nshila wakadi batatu abo bendamu hakadibo batumikila mikenji ya Yehowa; kadi bobo kabakenza nunku

Nanku mafuta adi mashale mu tshianza awu, mutuangaji neaalabe muntu udi udikobolola miaba iwaye mulabe mashi a mukoku wa mulambu wa dinua tshibalu: ku lusongu lua ditshi, ku tshiala, ne ku muana nkasa munene bia luseke luende lua dia balume

Ndi ngambila bena dibaka di, kememe udi wamba kadi mMukelenge udi ubambila ne, Mukashi kumuki kudi mulume wandi, kadi biumukeye kudiye, ashale biandi mujike, anyi alengeshe ne mulume wandi ne mulume kalekedi mukashi wandi
Wewe kuakumanya mua kutabala tshituha tshimue tshia diba
Yeye wakaditshiha, wakamulaya ne, Nenkuhe tshionso tshiwalomba
Kena muana wa Adame, kena ushintulula meji ende
Bafundi bakuabo ne Bafalese bakamuandamuna ne, Muyishi, tudi basue kutangila tshimanyinu tshia bualu buebe
Wenze kabidi mabaya asambombu, a kuteka muaba wa tshijila luseke ludi diba dibuelela
Hashishe, ba bungi nebalenduke, nebafilangane ku bilumbu, nebikalangane ne lukuna
Ne nemuhe mutoto wa nkesha
Hakahita bidimu bibidi bijima, Abashaloma wakasangisha bakoshi ba miosa ya mikoko ku Bâla hasô, udi hehi ne Efelayima; Abashaloma wakabikilaku bana balume bonso ba mukelenge
Hakamona Alona ne Bena Isalele bonso Mose, monai, musunyi wa ha mpala handi wakakonka, bobo bakatshina bua kulua n andi ha buihi
Ikale kabidi ne tuampa tukese katuyi tuela buanga, tulaba mafuta, kabidi ne bukula ne mvinyo, bia kulambula musangu umue ne milanbu mikuabu
Wakidikisha luseke lua node, luakadi nkama itanu bu tshidikishilu tshia luidi
Nenuikale ne mitshi ya olive mu madimi enu onso, kadi kanuena nudilaba manyi ai ham bidi; bualu bua mamuma neahohoke
manene, ne njû kudi bantu bakadinga ne, Tudi bana benu
, kumushilabu Maweja Nangila , ku mpunde
Bena Isalele ne Bena Peleshete bakela mualu wa nvita, mulongo ne mulongo
Bena Isalele bakamba ne, Nutuambile ne, Bualu ebu bubi buakalua munyi
Hashishe lukuka, himitalu, ludi lulela bubi: ne bubi, hakolabu budi bulela lufu
Badi batekemena ne dî didibo bamba nedijadikibue
Halua dituku dibidi, fila mpumbu wa mbushi udi kayi ne tshilema bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au mibi; nunku tshioshelu ne tshilengeshibue bu muakalengeshibuatshi ku mulambu wa mulum a ngombe
Nembahatule mu buloba budibo bashikame, kadi kabena babuela mu buloba bua Isalele; nunku nenumanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Nenuikale bu tshintu tshidibo bahenda, tshidi tshikuatshisha bantu buowa, tshidibo bela mulau ne tshidibo bahetula
Bualu bua bobo badi badila kundi ne, Utuhe munyinyi wa tuetu kudia
Diela dia muoyo dia kudi meme Paulo difunda ne tshianza tshianyi, ntshimanyinu mu mukanda wonso; nunku mundi nfunda

Hashishe Paulo wakangata bantu aba, hakatshiabu wakadilengesha n abo, wakabuela mu ntempelo, umanyisha bakuidi ba Nzambi bua dishika dia matuku a kudilengesha kuabo; wakashalamu tô ne hakafilabo mulambu wa muntu ne muntu
Nulame mikenji eyi kashidi miaba yonsu inudi nusomba
Dî dia wanyi munanga
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Yehoyada wakamubakisha bakashi babidi; yeye wakalela n abo bana ba balume ne bana ba bakashi
Tshiakubiumvua kabidi to
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Bika biebe, uhueke lubilu bualu bua bantu bebe bawakahatula mu Ejipitu, bakoneka, bakasesuka lubilu mu nshila unakabalesha; bakadienzela luhingu ne biamu biakatulabo

Hakunvua Elisabeta muoyo wakamuela Malia, muana wakatabuluka mu difu diandi; Elisabeta wakûshibua tente ne Nyuma Muimpe; wakela dî diandi bikole, wakamba ne, Wewe udi mukashi mutambe kusankishibua, muana udi munda muebe udi muvudishila disanka
Bakumukaku, bakaya ku Gudugoda; ku Gudugoda bakaya ku Yotebata, muakadi buloba bua tusulu tua mai
Yehowa kakahunga tshihungidi etshi ne batatu betu, kadi wakatshihunga anu n etu buonso buetu badi ne muoyo lelu eu

Nenuenze bu mudibo bamba ha muaba udi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, usungula; nuenu nenutumikile mei onso adibo banuyisha: nenuenze bu mudi mikenji idibo banuyisha, ne bu dilumbulula didibo banuambila; kanusesuki ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi mu dî didibo banuambila
Biakadi bimpe kumusuika dibue dia kuhela n adi mu nshingu, kumuela mu mai manene, diambedi kai muanze kulenduisha umue wabo wa mu bantu aba bahuekele

Hakaluabo ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa ku musoko wa Davidi, Mikala, muana wa bakashi wa Shaula, wakatangila ha disoso dia nsubu, ne hakamoneye Davidi uja maja utuhika, yeye wakamulengulula mu mutshima wandi
Ka Bena Isalele bonso bamanye bushua ne, Nzambi wakuvuisha Yesu eu unuakushiha ku mutshi mutshiamakane Mukelenge ne Kilisto kabidi
Mukashi mukuabo wakamba ne, Mukelenge, meme ne mukashi eu tudi bashikame mu nsubu umue; hatuakadi n andi mu nsubu nakalela muana
Bakashi aba bakadi Malia wa ku Magadala ne Yoana ne Malia mamu wa Yakobo; bakashi bakuabo kabidi bakadi n abo bakambila bapostolo malu â

Kadi biajidileye budimi buandi ku nyima kua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, muakuidi neamubadile mushinga bu bungi bua bidimu bidi bishala tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, nebamuhuekeshile mushinga wakasanganabo
Bena Isalele bakakonka Samuele ne, Nganyi wakamba ne, Shaula neatukokeshe
Bualu bua neumuhuile njiya, ne Yehowa neakufute
Kadi pa wabu bakengesha bena Izrayele nanku, bavua amu bavulangana mu ditunga dijima
Eliya wakadi muntu wa mutshima muomumue n etu, ne yeye wakalomba Nzambi ne kulomba kukole bua nvula kailoki; ne nvula kayakaloka ha buloba tô bidimu bisatu ne ngondo isambombo
Wakenza mabaya abidi a kuteka ku matumba a nsubu a ku nyima

Davidi Udi Ulongolola Ntempelo Davidi wakela mukenji wandi bua kusangishabo bantu bakadi bashikama mu buloba bua Isalele diambedi; wakasungula bahandi ba mabue bua kusongabo mabue a kuibaka n au ntempelo wa Nzambi
Hashishe mukelenge wakamba ne, Babikile Hamana lubilu, benze bu muakuamba Esetê
Anu Lahaba, mukashi wa tshiendenda, ikale ne muoyo ne bantu bonso badi n andi mu nsubu muandi, bualu bua yeye wakasokoka batentekedi batuakatuma
Yesu Kilisto udi muomumue makelela ne lelu ne tshiendelele
Ku dituku dionsu, mutuangaji ikale uteka nkunyi pa tshilambuilu dinda, utekepu ne milambu ya kuosha bangabanga ne kuoshilapu munyinyi wa mafuta wa milambu ya bobumue
Hakatshiabu, wakatukidila bakuabo baluangana, yeye wakateta bua kubasunga, wakamba ne, Balumiana, nudi bana ba muntu umue; nudi nuenzelangana bibi tshinyi
Bualu bua Yehowa wakamba ne, Bobo nebafue mu tshihela
Hashishe Nyuma wa Yehowa wakatulukila Yahaziele, muana wa Zekâya, muana wa Benaya, muana wa Yiele, muana wa Matanaya, Muena Lewi wa bana ba Asafa, munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshia bantu
Nzambi wakasangakena ne Belâma, ne Belâma wakamuambila ne, Nakasa bioshelu muanda mutekete, nakosha mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga ha tshioshelu ne ha tshioshelu
Wa bana ba Bebai, Zekâya, muana wa Bebai; bakadi n andi bakadi balume makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu
Bakalenduka bua bualu buandi
Kanungu ka Bukalenga bukoshi bwa nsambu ke budi bujadika budikadidi bwa muntu ne muntu pamwe ne makookeshi a nshindameenu a bweena mwaabo
Bakadi babadibua mu kulondolola kuabo, mu bikondo biabo, bu ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo bena nvita ba dikima bakadi binunu makumi abidi ne nkama ibidi
Mukenji eu newikale kudiye ne kudi bana bandi badi banulonda ku nyima tô ne tshiendelele
Bua bualu ebu ba bungi ba munkatshi muenu badi batekete, badi ne mabedi, ne bakuabo bakumbana badi balala tulu mu lufu
Luseke lua ku mutu, lupangu luvua anu bule bumue
Kanungu ka Mulombodi wa Ditunga udi uteeka Minisitila anyi meena kavulambedi wa mu tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia batshipwita munwa mfwanka panyima pa diumvwangana dienda ne beena tshitupa etshi
Bakaya ne dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Dana, bobo bakadi halua ku nyima kua bakuabo, bakaya ku luendu luabo ku bisumbu biabo, ne Ahiezê, muana mulume wa Amishadai, wakadi ku mutu kuabo
Matuku au Yesu wakafuma ku Nazaleta wa Galela, wakabatijibua kudi Yone mu musulu wa Yadene
Yesu wakabakandika ne, Muntu mukuabo kamanyi bualu ebu
Paulo wakamba ne, Yone wakadi ubatiza bantu ne dibatiza dia kukudimuna kua mitshima wambila bantu ne, Mbimpe bia nuenu kuitabusha ulualua ku nyima kuanyi, au udi Yesu mene
Kadi katataka Kilisto wakumana kubishibua ku bafue, bu mamuma a kukuama diambedi a bantu bakulala tulu mu lufu
Ndi musue bantu aba bikale mu tshianza tshianyi, hashishe nengumushe Abimeleke
Mutshima wandi udi uditekela malu a bunsonge
Nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, wakumusha Bena Amole ku mpala kua bantu bandi Bena Isalele; ne wewe neubakokeshe, anyi
Ne nyoka wakela mai bu musulu mahatuke mukana muandi ku nyima kua mukashi, bua kumukokela ha musulu
Bakulu ba Yozefe dikumi, kuya mu Ejipitu bua kusumba biakudia

Hakahita Bena Yuda ku tshibumba tshia mu tshihela, bakatangila kuakadi tshisumbu tshia bantu, monai, anu bitalu bilale hanshi ha buloba, nansha muntu wakahanduka, Hakalua Yehoshafata ne bantu bandi bua kuhaulabo bintu, bakasangana bubanji ne bilulu bia bungi, ne bintu bia mushinga mukole biakanyengabo; kabakamanya mua kubituala; bakashalaku matuku asatu bua kuhaulabo bintu, bualu bua biakadi bia bungi
Nutungunuke ne luendu too ne ku mikuna ya Lebanone, ne ku musulu munene wa Perate
Nehemiya Badi Bateketa Kulomba Kasombela Bantu bakuabo ne bakashi babo bakadi ne muadi munene, bakafunda bana babo, Bena Yuda
Bua Ashe yeye wakamba ne, Ashe asanke biandi ne bana, ikale ne diakalengele kudi bana babo: atue dikasa diandi mu manyi
Bimuna bionsu abi, kabikadi ne bulema pambidi to
Mu matuku a batatu benu tô ne mpindiu nuakûmuka ku mikenji yanyi, kanuakuyitabusha
Kumukabu ne muntu awu muaba uvua mitanda, kumuasabu mabue, kufuaye
Nunku bakalama Petelo mu nsubu wa lukanu, kadi bena ekelesia bakamulombela Nzambi bikole
Bakumuka mu Bimuna, bakashikama mu Oboto

Bua bualu ebu yeye udi mutuanganyi wa tshihungidi tshihia tshihia, bua lufu lumane kulua bua dihikula diabo dia ku malu masambuka mikenshi adi munshi mua tshihungidi tshia kumudilu, babo bakubutidibua badi mua kuangata mulabi wa buhianyi bua tshiendelele
Pikala muntu mulume wa tshisamba tshikuabu musele bana abu, nebumushe tshitupa tshia buloba buetu bua kubusangisha ne buloba bua tshisamba tshiabu tshipiatshipia
Hakunvuabo dî adi, bakûlangana ne tshishi, bakadi bela mbila ne, Atemise wa Bena Efeso ke udi munene
Hakafikabo ha buihi ne musoko wakadibo baya, yeye wakamba kuhita

Mu bibangidilu bia ngondo yenu nenufile mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa bana balume ba ngombe babidi ne tshimpanga tshimue ne bana balume ba mikoko muanda mutekete ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne bintu bisatu bia dikumi bia tshihiminu tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ku muana wa ngombe yonso, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi bia tshihiminu tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ku tshimpanga tshionso, ne tshintu tshia dikumi tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ku muana wa mukoko yonso, mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia udi utua dihembu kudi Yehowa

Wakashiya Sadoka muakuidi ne bana babo bakuabo bakuidi ku mpala kua nsubu wa Yehowa ku mutu kua mukuna wa Gibeona, bua kufilabo milambu ya kuosha ha tshioshelu ku dituku ku dituku dinda ne dilolo, bu muakafundabo mikenji ya Yehowa yakeleleye Bena Isalele
Nuenu bafundi ne Bafalese, nudi bena lubombo
Bakashi ba ours Wakafumaku, wakaya ku mukuna wa Kâmele, wakahingana ku Samalea
Tatu wenu Abalahama wakatamba kusanka bua kutangila dituku dianyi; wakadimona, wakasanka

Eu udi mudimu wa bana balume ba Kohata udibo benza ne bintu bia tshijila mu ntenta wa kusambakena, hayabo ku luendu Alona neabuelemu ne bana bandi balume nebatuhe tshilulu tshikudika, nebabituale hatshi mushete wa Nzambi, nebâteke tshibuikilu tshia biseba bia nkonge ha mutu hatshi, nebâteke tshilulu tshifike ha mutu hatshi kabidi, nebabueshemu mitshi ya mushete
Milonda yebe ya bibi bia musoko neyikale ya tshiamu tshifike ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, bukole buebe nebuikale bule bua matuku ebe onso
Pashishe wowe mayi
Nunku Yehowa Nzambi wandi wakamufila mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Sulia; bakamubutula, bakaya ne bantu bandi ba bungi mu buhika ku Damaseke
Palô wakamba ne, Ya, ujike tatu webe, bu muakukutshihisheye
Bumuka mu Elima, kuyabu kuasa pabuipi ne Mayi manene makunze
Bualu bua bidia bionso bia mu mishete yetu biakashika, katuena ne matabisha a kuha muntu wa Nzambi; tudi ne tshintu kai

Muakuidi angate tshituha tshia mashi a mulambu wa kujimisha n au bubi, âlabe ha makunshi a ntempelo ne ba matumba anai a tshioshelu ne mihimbu mitshinyunguluke, ne ha makunshi a ku tshibuelelu tshia ku tshiendelu tshia munda
Padi Arone mumane kuenza bionsu bidi bikengela bua kudikobolola ne kukobolola bena diku diende pamue ne bena Izrayele bonsu, neapatuke mu ntenta, asemena ku tshilambuilu tshidi kumpala kua ntenta
Aba bakadi bana balume ba Bena Lewi bu muakadi nsubu ya batatu abo
Biakuma ngombe wa muntu ngombe wa muntu mukuabo, biamushiheye, bobo nebahane ngombe udi ne muoyo, nebabanyangane mushinga wandi, nebabanyangane ngombe mufue, kabidi

Hatuakumuka mu Toa, tuakasabuka, baye balulame ku Samotaka; hakatshiabu, tuakafika ku Neapoli; tuakajukamu, tuakaya ku Filipoi, musoko wakadi muhite yonso mikuabo ya mu luseke alu lua Makedonia; musoko eu wakadi nkolonyi wa Bena Lomo; tuakadi tulala mu musoko au matuku
Ndi ndijidila bua bualu buabo, bua bobo kabidi bikale bajidila mu bulelela
Ebu mbu munuakamanya kudi Epafa, muhika n etu munanga, udi biandi muena mudimu munanukidi wa Kilisto bua bualu buetu
Bualu bua hatuhu budi buenjibue ha buloba, bua bantu bakane badiku bakaheta malu akadi kuikala kudi bantu babi; bantu babi badiku bakaheta malu akadi kuikala kudi bantu bakane

Hakumukeye mu buatu, katataka muntu mukuatshike ne nyuma wa bukoya, ulua mu majambu, wakasangila ne Yesu, wakadi wikala mu majambu; kakuakadi muntu mumanye mua kumusuika ne tshintu, bintu bionso biakahanga, ne lukanu mene; bakamusuika misangu ya bungi ne nkata ne nkanu, yeye wakatshibula nkanu, wakatula nkata; kakuakadi muntu mumanye mua kumukokesha
Bantu bakashiyabo mu musoko diambedi ne bakadi banyema ne bakadi baya kudi mukelenge wa Babulona, Nebuzaladana, kapitene ka masalayi, wakaya ne buonso buabo mu buhika
Kadi nuenu kanuakatumikila dî dianyi; nuakuenza nunku bua tshinyi
Bualu nudi tshisamba tshia bantu badi bamutombokela
Mukelenge wa Isalele wakadifuanyisha bu muntu mukuabo, wakaya mu nvita
Nulame mukenji ewu kashidi
Nendishe musoko eu bu tshintu tshidi tshikemesha bantu ne tshia kubingila ne tuseku; muntu yonso udi uhitshilaku neabingile ne tuseku bua makenga onso adi aukuata

Nzambi wakamuambila ne, Bualu hua wewe wakuamba bualu ebu; kuakudilombela matuku a bungi, kuakudilombela bubanji, nansha mioyo ya badi n ebe lukuna; kadi wakudilombela lungenyi lua kulumbulula n alu; ka nakenza bu mudi dî diebe: nakukuha mutshima muakane wa lungenyi, nunku kakuakadi muntu bu wewe diambedi ne mukuabo kena ulonda ku nyima kuebe bu wewe
Matuku onso a Lemeke akadi bidimu nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi muanda mutekete ne mua nda mutekete, yeye wakafua biandi
Davidi wakambila Ebeyatâ ne, Dituku adi diakadiku Doege, Muena Edome, nakamanya ne, Yeye neamanyishe Shaula bulelela

Bana ba balume ba Shela, muana wa Yuda: Ele, tatu wa Leka, ne Lâda, tatu wa Malesha ne ba mu nsubu wa bakumi ba bilulu bia lin, ba mu nsubu wa Ashabea; Yolama ne Bena Kozeba ne Yoasha ne Salafa wakakokesha mu buloba bua Moaba, ne Yashubi lehema
Bakabanda ha buloba buonso, bakanyunguluka tshitudilu tshia basanto ne musoko munangibue; ne kahia kakahueka, kafuma mu diulu, ne kakabashidisha
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mukelenge eu neaye ne Sedekiya ku Babulona, ne yeye neikaleku tô ne hanalua kudiye
Bakanusumba ku mushinga mukole; kanulu bahika ba bantu
Petelo wakakonka ne, Muntu kai udi mumanye mua kuhidia mai bua kubatijibuabo, bobo bamane kuangata Nyuma Muimpe bu mutudi bangate
Nuikale ne dî ne, E, E, anyi Nasha, Nasha

Yehowa wakasomba n enu mpala ha mpala ha mukuna munkatshi mua kahia, Meme nakimana hankatshi henu ne Yehowa tshikondo atshi, bua kunulesha dî dia Yehowa; nuenu nuakatshina bualu bua kahia, kanuakabanda ku mukuna; yeye wakamba ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu

Yeye udi tshifuanyikishi tshia Nzambi udi kai mua kumuenebua, muan a bute wa bifukibua bionso; bualu bua munda muandi muakafukibua bintu bionso bia mu diulu ne bia ha buloba, ne bintu bidi bimuenebua ne bintu bidi kabi bimuenebua, ne bidi nkuasa ya butumbi anyi makelenge anyi manfumu anyi makokeshi; bintu bionso biakafukibua ku bukole buandi ne bua bualu buandi

Wewe amba di diebe ne, Balame lukita bimpe tô ne ku dituku disatu, nunku bayidi bandi kabalu kumuiba, bambila bantu ne, Yeye wakubika ku lufu; bienzabo nunku, dihanga dia ku mpala neditambe dia ku nyima bunene
Mvidi Mukulu akuele wewe ne ndelanganyi yebe lupemba, muvuaye muele Abrahame, bua ditunga diudi usomba bu muenyi edi, didi Mvidi Mukulu mupeshe Abrahame, dishale diebe
Nunku mukelenge kateki bualu ebu mu mutshima wandi bua kuelangana meji ne, Bana balume bonso ba mukelenge bakafua; bualu bua anu Amenona nkayandi wakafua
Hakadi budimi mu tshianza tshiebe, kabuakadi buebe, anyi

Bualu bua ndi ngitabushishibua ne, Kakuena lufu, kakuena muoyo, kakuena banjelo, kakuena bakokeshi, kakuena malu atshidiku, kakuena malu atshilualua, kakuena makelenge, kakuena bule, kakuena ndondo, kakuena tshintu tshionso tshikuabo tshifukibua tshidi ne bukole bua kutuhandulula ku dinanga dia Nzambi didi mu Kilisto Yesu Mukelenge wetu

Nunku bantu bakangata bia kudia ne mpungi mu bianza biabo; yeye wakatuma Bena Isalele bakuabo muntu ku ntenta wandi muntu ku ntenta wandi; wakashala anu ne bantu aba nkama isatu; tshitudilu tshia Midiyana tshiakadi kuinshi kuandi mu tshibanda
Kuonso kuakayeye, mu misoko mikese ne mu bimenga ne mu mpata, bakateka bena mabedi mu bisalu bakamutendekena bua kulengabo ku mubangu wa tshivualu tshiandi; bakadi bamulenga mbobo bakakoleshibua
Elisha wakatuma messager wandi kudiye ne, Ya, wowe mai mu Yadene misangu muanda mutekete, musunyi webe neulue kûdi kabidi; wewe newikale muakane

Mukelenge wakela mukenji kudi Yelamele, muana wa mukelenge, ne kudi Selaya, muana wa Azaliele, ne kudi Shelemiya, muana wa Abedele, bua kukuatabo Baluka mufundi ne Yelemiya muprofete, kadi Yehowa wakabasokoka
Bua kupeta muaba wa kulama bipiabipia, anu nuenu banji kumusha bia kale
Ke mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubabikila, ubakonka ne: Nudi benze nenku bualu kayi
Bayidi bandi bakamba ne, Katataka wewe udi utujukuila bualu, kuena ubuamba mu lusumuinu
Kanuena nutangila muaba eu kabidi
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Sua Mukelenge Nzambi webe ne mutshima webe wonso ne muoyo webe wonso ne lungenyi luebe luonso
Wakamba ne, Nenye, nengikale bu nyuma wa kudinga mukana mua baprofete bandi bonso
Buonso buabo bakadi ne mabedi makole bakamûnguila bualu bua kubalengeye bianza
Umuambile ne, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba dî edi ne, Monai, muntu udi ne dina dia Lutonga; neadiunde mu muaba wandi, nease ntempelo wa Yehowa
Bualu bua bakabakeba kenku ditabusha, hadi bu mudibo babukeba ku kuenza kua mikenshi
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Umubikile

Mikenji ya bena Levi Mikiya mipeta ku masama a bantu balume Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone bua bamanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Padi muntu mulume mupete disama ku butaka buende, tufina tupatukamu, muntu awu mmupie mikiya
Belâma wakitaba kudi miloho ya Balaka ne, Biampa Balaka nsubu wandi mûle tente ne argent ne or, tshiena mumanye mua kuhidia dî dia Yehowa Nzambi wanyi, bua kuenza bualu bukese anyi bualu bunene

Ba bungi bakalua ne kuha kudi Yehowa ku Yelushalema, ne bintu bia mushinga mukole kudi Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda; nunku yeye wakadi utumbishibua ku mesu kua bantu ba mu bisamba bionso kubangila ku dituku adi
Kanuditshihi ne mashina ne dina dianyi, kanutedi dina dianyi tshitelatela, meme ndi Yehowa
Kusombabu mu tshimenga tshia Arane

Yeye wakabambila bikole ne, Kanuambidi muetu bualu ebu; wakabambila ne, Budi Muana wa muntu n abu mbua kukengeshibua makenga a bungi, ne bua kuhidibua kudi bakulu ne kudi bakuidi banene ba Nzambi ne kudi bafundi, ne bua kushihibua, ne bua kubishibua hahita matuku asatu
Ezela Mena a Bantu Bakadi mu Buhika Neh
Yeye wakabela ne, Kanunsokolodi
Bena Atiopa ne Bena Lubima kabakadi tshisumbu tshinene ne makalu ne bena tubalu bia bungi, anyi
Bantu bakadi bahitaku bakatangila tshitalu tshiandi mu nshila ne nyama wa ntambue muimane ha buihi n atshi; bakamba bualu ebu mu musoko muakadi muprofete mununu mushikame
Ne a mibidi yenu ne, Netuluate tshinyi
Muntu kai udi mutekete, ne tshiena mutekete n andi
Ntenta wanyi udi mushimbuke, Bualu bua balami bonso bakuandamuka bahote, Unvuai
Muanjelo wakalua kudiye tshiakabidi, wakamulenga tshianza, wamba ne, Juka biebe, udie, bualu bua luendu ludi lukutonda
Nunku yeye udi ne bukole bua kusungila ne luhandu lujima badi basemena ha buihi ne Nzambi bua bualu buandi, yeye muikale ne muoyo tshiendelele bualu bua kubakuila
Abrahame kuandamuna ne: Mvua muele meji ne: bantu ba kuneku kabena batshina Mvidi Mukulu
Bua nakadi ne budishikaminyi kudi bantu bonso, kadi nakadivuisha muhika wa bonso, bua meme kuheta mioyo ya bakuabo ba bungi
Pashishe nempingane
Bena Yuda bakamuambila ne, Tudi bamanye katataka ne, Wewe udi ne demon munda
Hakatangila bakelenge batanu ba Bena Peleshete bualu ebu, bakahingana ku Ekelona dituku adi
Hakadibo bamukonka nunku ku dituku ku dituku ne hakadiye kayi mubunvuile, bakambila Hamana bua kutangilabo ne malu a Môdekai neajalame
Ateke tshianza pa mutu pa mukoku awu
Hakatshiabu, bakokeshi babo ne bakulu ne bafundi bakadisangisha mu Yelushalema; Ana, muakuidi munene wakadika, ne Kayafa, ne Yone, ne Alesandelo, ne ba mu tshiota tshionso tshia muakuidi munene

Nunku nakamba di dianyi bu muakangambileye; ne hanakadi ngamba mei anyi, tshiona tshiakadiku, ne monai, tshiona bu tshia nvunde tshiakadiku; ne mifuba yakasangakana mufuba mukuabo wakatuangana ne mufuba mukuabo
Hakalueye ku nsubu, kakitabusha bua muntu mukuabo abuele n andi anu Petelo ne Yone ne Yakobo ne tatu wa muana ne mamu wandi
Bakalua ne mutu wa Oleba ne wa Zêbe kudi Gideona dishiya dia Yadene
Muntu nansha umwe kabena mwa kumwenzeja mudimu wa ku bukole anyi mumukanyika to
Hakahitalu hehi ne Musia, bakahueka ku Toa
Yehowa wakambila Solomo ne, Bualu bua wewe wakatamba kuenza nunku, kuakatumikila tshihungidi tshietu ne mei anyi binakukuambila, bulelela, nenunyenge bukelenge, nembuhe muntu webe
Aba mbakuatshishi bakadiye n abo
Nuenu bamane kumusha binudi ne bua kundambula, nuangate penu bidi bishale, bu mudi bena Izrayele bonsu bangate bintu bidi bishale ku ntete ya bukula, ku maluvu a mvinyo, ne ku mafuta
Badi balutuila binu, badiambula milambu, bamba ne: Ke mvidie wetu uvua mutupatule mu Ejipitu ewu
Nakaheta argent ne or ne bintu bia mushinga mukole bifume kudi bakelenge ne ku provinces; nakadiangatshila bimbi ba misambu, balume ne bakashi, ne biombelu bia mishindu yonso bia kuimba n abi misambu

Nunku Hanamele, muana wa manseb anyi, wakalua kundi mu tshiendelu tshia balami ba nsubu wa lukanu bu muakadi di dia Yehowa, wakangambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Usumbe budimi buanyi budi mu Anatota, mu buloba bua Benyamina; bua bukokeshi bua buhianyi budi kûdi ne bua kubuhikula budi kûdi; udisumbilebu
Muena mudimu udi uheta tshinyi ku mudimu udiye wenza
Hakatshiabu, hakalua Bena Peleshete bua kunyenga bintu bia bantu bafue, bakasangana Shaula ne bana bandi balume basatu bafuile ku mukuna wa Gileboa
Wakakonka ne, Yeye utshidi ne muoyo, anyi
Mukalu wa ku luseke lua wesete wikale Mai Manene, ubanga ku butshika bua ku luseke lua sude wenda tô ne ku muaba udi mutangilangane ne tshibuelelu tshia ku Hamata
Bana ba balume ba Melali: Mali ne Mushi
Romans Butudi n abu, tuetu bantu bakole, mbua kutuala matekete a badi batekete, kembua kudisankisha nkayetu
Mitoto muanda mutekete idi banjelo ba ekelesia muanda mutekete, ne bitekelu bia minda muanda mutekete bidi ekelesia muanda mutekete
Wakamba ne, Ku dikeba dia nyama ya mpunda; hatuakamona ne kayena imueneka, tuakulua kudi Samuele
Kakuena mukenshi mukuabo udi mutambe ei

Nuenu nuakuitabusha Yehowa bu Nzambi wenu lelu, nuakuamba ne, Tuetu netuende mu nshila yandi, netutumikile mei andi ne mikenji yandi ne mikandu yandi, netunvue dî diandi; ne Yehowa wakanuitabusha bu bantu ba buhianyi buandi bu muakanulayeye, bua nuenu nutumikile mikenji yandi yonso, ne kunubandisha ku mutu kua bisamba bionso biakafukeye mu butumbi ne mu dina ne mu buneme; bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bu muakuambeye
Kadi tuasakidila kudi Nzambi udi utulombola misangu yonso bu bantu batambibue mu Kilisto, udi ununkishila dihembu dia lungenyi luandi mu bianza bietu ku miaba yonso
Nunku Yehowa Nzambi, dî diwakambila muntu webe bualu buandi ne bua tshiota tshiandi, udijadike tshiendelele; wenze bu muwakamba
Yeye wakamba ne, Mmeme
Arone neakule ne bantu, ubambila malu auvua ne bua kuamba wewe
Hakatshidibo basulula muana wa mpunda, banfumu andi bakabakonka ne, Nudi nusuluila muana wa mpunda tshinyi
Balume bonso ba mu nsubu wandi, baledibue mu nsubu wandi, ne basumbibue ku argent kudi ba bende, bakatengudibua n andi
Kabakasesuka ku mikenji ya mukelenge kudi bakuidi ne Bena Lewi mu malu au onso nansha mu bibutshilu bia bintu
Shaula ne Bena Isalele bakadisangisha, bakadi ne tshitudilu tshiabo mu tshibanda tshia Ela; bakela mualu wa nvita ku mpala kua Bena Peleshete
Davidi wakamba ne, Nuenu bana ba Seluya, nakanuenzela bualu kai bua nuenu nuikale bena lukuna kundi lelu
Tshisumbu atshi tshia bantu netshibakume ne mabue, netshibashihe ne miele yabo ya nvita; nebashihe bana babo ba balume ne ba bakashi, neboshe nsubu yabo ne kahia

Bikala tshisamba tshia Bena Ejipitu katshiyi tshibandeku anyi tshibuelemu, nvula kayena ibalokela kabidi; hashishe, tshihuhu netshibalukile tshidi Yehowa ukengesha n atshi bisamba bidi kabiyi bibandaku bua kujidila bidia bia disanka dia bitandatanda
Bakadi bakuma Stefano mabue ulomba Mukelenge wamba ne, Mukelenge Yesu, angata muoyo wanyi, Wakatua binu hanshi, wakela dî dikole ne, Mukelenge, kubatekedi bubi ebu
Shimei wakambila mukelenge ne, Dî diwakuamba ndimpe: muntu webe nênze bu muakamba mukelenge wandi

ne bahuekele ne banene, Mukana muanyi nemuambe mei a lungenyi; Nenteleje matshu anyi ku lusumuinu, Bualu kai ndi ne bua kutshina mu matuku a makenga, Mbantu badi beyemena luhetu luabo, Bulelela, kakuena muntu udi mua kuhikula bualu bua mushinga wa kuhikula n au mioyo yabo udi mukole, bua yeye ashale ne muoyo tshiendelele, E, yeye neamone ne, Bena meji badi bafua; Meji Kadi muntu kena mua kushala mu butumbi buandi, Eu nnshila udi badi bahote mu kudieyemena kuabo bayamu; Badi basungudibua bu tshisumbu tshia mikoko bua kubuelabo mu Muaba wa Bafue; Bantu Kadi Nzambi, neahikule muoyo wanyi ku bukole bua Muaba wa Kutshinyi havuishibua muntu bubanji, Bualu bua, hafueye, kena uya ne tshintu tshimue nansha, Nansha biavudishileye mutshima wandi disanka hatshidiye ne muoyo, yeye neaye anu ku mulongo wa bankambua bandi, Muntu udi ne butumbi, kadi kena ujingulula, Psalms Wa Bukole, Nzambi, Yehowa mene, wakuamba dî diandi, Mu muaba wandi wa mu Siona, udi mulengele tshishiki, Nzambi wetu udi ulua, kena uhuwa talalâ, Yeye udi wela dî kudi diulu didi mulu ne kudi buloba, Sangishai bienu bantu banyi ba tshijila kundi, Diulu didi diamba bua buakane buandi, Unvuai, nuenu bantu banyi, nengakule; Tshiena nnubela bua milambu yenu; Tshiena ngitabusha ngombe umuehele wa ku nsubu yenu, Bualu bua nyama yonso wa muitu nguanyi, Ndi mumanye nyunyu yonso ya ha mikuna, Bu meme muikale ne nzala, tshiakadi kukuambila; Ntu ngadia munyinyi wa ngombe, anyi
Bantu ba bende, ba mu bisamba bia bantu badi batamba kukuatshisha bakuabo buowa, nebautahe, nebaushiye
Batuangaji kabena ne bua kunyanga biakudia bia tshijila bidi bena Izrayele bumusha ku milambu idibu balambula Maweja Nangila
Matuku onso, butuku ne munya, mu majambu ne mu mikuna, yeye wakadi wela bila, wakadi uditaha ne mabue
Yoaba wakateka mei mukana muandi
Hoshea Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Hoshea, muana wa Beli, mu matuku a Uziya, Yotama, Ahaza ne Hezikiya, bakelenge ba Yuda, ne mu matuku a Yalobama, muana wa Yoasha, mukelenge wa Isalele
Nunku ndi nusengelela bua nuenu nûjadike luse luenu kudiye

kudi nsubu wanyi wa tshijila hakamunyangabo, ne ku buloba bua Isalele hakabubutulabo, ne kudi Bena Yuda hakayabo mu buhika; bua malu â nennufile mu bianza bia bantu ba ku luseke lua esete bu bintu biabo, ne bobo nebashimike ntenta yabo munkatshi muenu, nebashikame munkatshi muenu; nebadie mamuma enu, nebanue mabele enu
Kadi Uliya wakalala anu ku mbelu kua nsubu wa mukelenge ne bantu bonso ba mukelenge wandi, kakaya ku nsubu kuandi
Kabidi uvua munusungule nuenu ndelanganyi yabu
Hatuakafika ku Sulakusa, tuakalalaku matuku asatu

Yehoyada wakadi muenyampala wa mu nsubu wa Alona; bantu binunu bisatu ne nkama muanda mutekete bakadi n andi, ne Sadoka, nsongalume muena bukitu, ne ba mu nsubu wa tatu wandi bakadi tupitene makumi abidi ne tubidi
Maweja Nangila kuambila Arone ne: Uye kumonangana ne muanenu Moshe mu tshipela
Nunku Davidi wakasokoma mu budimi; bakabala ngondo mukelenge wakashikama bua kudieye bia kudia

Ebi mbintu biebe kabidi: bintu bidi Bena Isalele banyukula, ne milambu yonso idibo bakuha, nakunuha ne bana bebe balume ne bana bebe bakashi badi n ebe, bu tshintu tshienu tshiendelele muntu yonso udi muakane mu nsubu webe neabidie

Jeremiah Mu tshidimu tshia tshitema tshia bukokeshi bua Sedekiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, mu ngondo wa dikumi, Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakalua ne masalayi andi onso bua kuluisha Bena Yelushalema, ne bakautshintshimika
Patshiabu dinda, nennuandamune malu onsu adi Maweja Nangila mummanyishe
Kabiena bilua ku nkuka idi iluangana mu bituha bia mibidi yenu, anyi
Chronicles Yoshiya wakadila Yehowa bidia bia disanka dia kuhita kua Yehowa; bakashiha mikoko ku dituku dia dikumi ne dinai dia mu ngondo wa kumudilu
Matuku onso a Kenana akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne dikumi, yeye wakafua biandi
Deuteronomy Tuakanyunguluka, tuakaya mu nshila wa ku Bashana: ne Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, wakalua ne bantu bandi bonso bua kuluangana n etu ku Edelei
Bena Kasada nebalue kabidi bua kuluanganabo ne bena musoko eu, nebabatambe bukole, nebawoshe ne kahia
Nanku Melkisedeke uvua mukalenga wa bena Saleme, muikale kabidi mutuangaji wa bantu ne Mvidi Mukulu muena kulu
Tshituha tshihi ba ha buloba kabena bantangila kabidi; kadi nuenu nudi nuntangila; bualu bua meme ndi ne muoyo, muenu kabidi nenuikale ne muoyo
Bena nvita binunu nkama isatu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama itanu bakadi mu bianza biabo, bakadi baluangana nvita bikole, bua kukuatshisha mukelenge bua kudisheye bena lukuna bandi
Bantu ba kumpala ba mu ditunga dia Edome bavua ndelanganyi ya Seyire, muena Ori

Bua ndi mumanye kudilongolola kuenu kunakatumbisha bua bualu buenu kudi ba mu Makedonia ne, Bena Akaya bakadianjila kulongolola kufila kuabo tshidimu tshia ku mpala; ne lukunukunu luenu luakasonsola mitshima ya bantu ba bungi
Kadi kabakatumikila dî diebe, ne kabakenda mu mikenji yebe; kabakenza bualu bumue bua malu onso awakabambila bua kuenzabo
Mona, nentshifile mu bianza biebe lelu, wewe neumanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Nyuma ne mukashi musela badi bamba ne, Lua
Ku luseke lua sude, coudées binunu binai ne nkama itanu mu bule bualu, kuikale bibi bisatu: tshibi tshia Shimeona, tshibi tshia Yisakâ ne tshibi tshia Zebuluna
Tudi bantu ba nsongu
Nakamukudimuna ne, Ndiku
Yeye wakambila kapitene bua kumutumeye ne bila kumulesheye luse ne bua kahidishi balunda bandi bua kuluabo kumukuatshisha
Bintu bionso bidi ne mahuahua bidi bienda ne mikolo mai bidi bibi kunudi
Tshimuangi Tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila Pavua Moshe ne Arone mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, Maweja Nangila kubambila ne: Ngondu ewu ikale wenu wa ntuadijilu wa tshidimu
Hanutshidi ne munya, nuitabushe munya, nunku nenuikale bana ba munya
Buhianyi buinai buakadi bua Bena Yisakâ ku meku abo
Kadi Galio kakabatshuka bua malu â onso

Belâma wakambila Nzambi ne, Balaka, muana mulume wa Sipô, mukelenge wa Moaba, wakantumina dî ne, Bantu bakaluhuka mu Ejipitu, bakatangadika buloba buonso, lua biebe, ubangelele mulau, hashishe nemmanye mua kuluangana n abo, nembihate
Yeye mene wakadi ne lumu luimpe lumanyibua kudi bana babo ba mu Kilisto ba mu Luseta ne mu Ikonio
Kadi yeye wakamuambila ne, Uhe bantu, badie, bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bobo nebadie ne bintu nebishale
Ndi muteke muanzankongolo wanyi mulu, newikale bu tshimanymu tshia tshihungidi hankatshi hetu ne buloba
Bingambila nsongalume ne, Tangila, mikete idi luseke lûdi, uyangate, ulue n ai; bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo ditalala didi kûdi, kakuena bualu bubi
Ngomere kulela bana ba balume aba: Ashekenaze, Rifate ne Togarma
Netuambe tshinyi bua malu â
Yesu wakamanya meshi abo, wakamba ne, Nudi nuelangana meshi a bualu bubi munda muenu bua tshinyi

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bu mundi meme ne muoyo, bulelela, yeye neafue mu muaba udi mukelenge wakamubuesha mu bunfumu mushikame, muena mutshihu udiye muhetule, muena tshihungidi tshidiye mushihe, mu Babulona mene
Hakafuma Bena Sulia ku Damaseke bua kukuatshishabo Hadadezê, mukelenge wa Zoba, Davidi wakashiha Bena Sulia binunu makumi abidi ne bibidi
Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Witabusha unatuma neangitabushe meme; wangitabusha meme neitabushe wakuntuma
Hakaya bayidi ba Yone, Yesu wakabanga kuambila bisumbu bia bantu bualu bua Yone ne, Nuakuyila mu tshihela bua kutangila tshintu kai
Kanuena mua kubakengesha to

Kadi meme tshiakuenza bualu ne tshintu tshimue tshia bintu ebi nasha; ne tshiena nfundila malu â bua bualu ebu buenjibue nunku kundi; bualu bua meme kufua kudi kutamba bua muntu kuvuisha kutumba kuanyi hatuhu
Hakambeye nunku, wakatshinguluka, wakamona Yesu muimane, kakamumanya ne, Yesu
Nunku mukelenge wakafua, bakaya n andi mu Samalea; bakajika mukelenge mu Samalea
Bana bakalelabo kabidi badi bavuluka bioshelu biabo ne Bashela babo badi hehi ne mitshi mibishi idi ha mikuna mile
Nu nku yeye wakalamata bakashi benji ba mudimu ba Boaza to ne kunshiki dilu kua kunowa kua orge ne blé yeye wakashikama ne mamuen andi

Ezra Hakadi Ezela utendelela, utondela bantu mibi, udila, udikuma hanshi ku mpala kua nsubu wa Nzambi, tshisumbu tshinene tshia Bena Isalele, ne balume ne bakashi ne bana, tshiakadisangisha kudiye; bantu bakadila bikole

Diambedi kabayi banze kulala tulu, yeye wakabanda kudibo ku musaka wa nsubu; yeye wakambila balume aba ne, Ndi mumanye ne, Yehowa wakanuha buloba, ne buowa buakatukuata bualu buenu ne bena buloba bonso badi batekete teketê ku mpala kuenu
Yeye wakamukonka ne, Wewe wakuenza tshinyi
Filipo wakaya lubilu kudiye, wakamunvua ubala mukanda wa muprofete Yeshaya, wakamukonka ne, Udi mujingulule bualu bûdi ubala, anyi
Muakuidi wakambila Davidi ne, Kakuena bidia bia hatuhu mu tshianza tshianyi, kadi anu bidia bia tshijila, bikala bantu aha kabayi basangile ne bakashi
Hakadibo banue nvinyo ya ku bidia bia disanka, mukelenge wakebesha Esetê ne, Tshiudi ulomba ntshinyi
Yeye wakaha muntu yonso wa mu Isalele ne balume ne bakashi mutanda wa bidia ne tshihesa tshia munyinyi ne tshisumbu tshia tumuma tûme
Tshisamba kai tshia hanshi ha buloba tshidi bu bantu bebe Bena Isalele
Bualu bua bubi buakadi ha buloba tô ne hakalua mikenshi ya Mose, kadi bubi kabuena bubadibua kudi muntu hadiku kakui mikenshi
Tshisamba tshia Efrayime tshivua ne meku aa: diku dia bena Shutela, ndelanganyi ya Shutela; dia bena Bekere, ndelanganyi ya Bekere; dia bena Takane, ndelanganyi ya Takane

Ebelu Bualu bua muakuidi mimene yonso, muangatshibue munkatshi mua bantu, udi ubueshibua mu mudimu bua kukuatshisha bantu mu malu a kudi Nzambi bua yeye afile bintu bihebua ne milambu mishiha bua mibi, udi mumanye mua kuikala ne lutulu kudi bahote ne kudi bahambuki, bualu bua yeye muine udi musuikibue ku butekete; ne bua bualu ebu yeye udi ne bualu bua kufila milambu bua mibi yandi kabidi muomumue ne ya bantu
Nakamba bua tuseku ne, Tudi tuhote, bua masanka ne, Adi enza tshinyi
Hakabangabo kuimba misambu ne kutumbisha Nzambi, Yehowa wakateka balaminyi kudi Bena Amona ne kudi Bena Moaba ne ba ku mikuna ya Seî, bakaluila kuluisha Bena Yuda; bakadi bashihibue
Bakambila Davidi ne, Ahitofele udi munkatshi mua bena tshifufu ba Abashaloma
Uvuluishe bantu malu â, ubambila bikole ku mesu kua Mukelenge bua bobo kabatandanganyi bualu bua mei adi kâi ne mudimu ne adi ahambuisha bantu badi baunvua
Muena mudimu kupatula kabidi Shimeyone mu lukanu
Muana wandi wa bakashi wakadi Shela, wakasa Bete holona wa ku tshibanda ne wa ku mukuna, ne Uzeneshêla
Mmusue bua nuikale bantu bende, badi bamuenzela mudimu bu muvuaye mumane kunuambila

Mvidie ya dishima Dituku dikuabu, pikala muambi nansha muntu udi Mvidi Mukulu uleja malu munumuenekela, nnumanyisha tshishima, tshishima atshi tshienzeka bu muvuaye munuambile, muntu awu unuambila bua kutendelela mvidie inudi kanuyi bamanye, kuyenzela mudimu, kanumuitabi to
Wakaladika tshitalu tshiandi mu lukita luandi, bakamujinga, bamba ne, E, muan etu
Wakakeba mua kumumona

Dibadika Dilaya dia bena Nazire Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe, bua amanyishe bena Izrayele ne: Pikala mulume nansha mukaji ulaya bua kudijidila bu muena nazire, bua kungenzela meme Maweja Nangila mudimu, muntu awu kena mua kunua mvinyo nansha maluvu makole to
Hashishe Nyuma wakambandisha, wakalua n anyi mu tshikena kumona tshifume kudi Nyuma wa Nzambi tô ne ku buloba bua Bena Kasada, kudi bantu bakadi mu buhika
Bana kabena ne bualu bua kubushila batatu ne bamamu bintu; kadi batatu ne bamamu badi babutshila bana bintu
Diba adi, Maweja Nangila kungambila ne: Ubakandike, kabayi ku mvita, bualu tshiena munkatshi muabu to

Wewe, muana wa muntu, mu dituku dindi nyenga tshinyemenu tshiabo, disanka diabo didibo banyisha, tshintu tshidi tshisankisha mesu abo tshidi mitshima yabo manga, ne bana baho ba balume ne bana babo ba bakashi, mu dituku adi mene muntu udi muhanduke kena ufika kudi bua kukuambila lumu elu ku matshu ebe, anyi
Pashishe, dituku dia muanda mutekete, mutuangaji neakonkonone muntu awu tshiakabidi
Bena Samalea ba bungi ba mu musoko au bakamuitabusha bualu bua dî dia mukashi diakambeye ne, Yeye wakungambila malu onso anakenzela

Diambedi mikuna kayiyi mianze kumueneka, Wewe udi uhingasha bantu mu dinfuenkenya kabidi, Bualu bua bidimu tshinunu bidi ku mesu kuebe Wewe udi ubumusha bu muakadi mai mûla ahueka n abo; Adi adiunda bimpe ne dinda, adi akola; Bualu bua tuakushidishibua mu tshiji tshiebe, Wewe wakuteka malu mabi etu ku mpala kuebe, Bualu bua matuku etu onso adi ajimina bualu bua tshiji tshiebe; Matuku a mu bidimu bietu adi akumbana bu bidimu makumi muanda mutekete; Udi mumanye bukole bua tshiji tshiebe nganyi
Kadi bikala bakuabo kabai bitabusha, dihanga diabo dia kuikala ne ditabusha nedivuishe dieyemenyibua dia Nzambi ne hatuhu, anyi
Wanyi munanga udi bu ngulungu anyi bu lukungulu lua ntole
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Umukayi muaba udi bantu aba bimane
Lumu lua bualu abu luakatangadika mu luseke alu luonso
Ndi nufundila mukenshi muhia muhia kabidi, budi bualu bulelela munda muandi ne munda muenu; bualu bua butuku butshiatshia, ne munya mulelela wakumana kutema
Mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Muana mulume wa mukelenge webe udi hanyi
Kutshinyi, bualu bua Nzambi wakamana kunvua di dia nsongalume mudiye mulale
Davidi, muana wa Yishai, wakadi ukokesha mu Isalele
Yeye Wakabikila tumelo binu hanshi ku butshika bua musoko hehi ne mushimi wa mai dilolo ha diba diyaya bakashi bua kusunabo mai
Mu tshituha tshia Bena Isalele nenuangate umue kudi makumi atanu, wa bantu ne wa ngombe ne wa nyama wa mpunda ne wa mikoko, nubifile kudi Bena Lewi badi balama nsubu wa Yehowa
Bana betu bananga, kanudingibu
Wenze nkanu ya mpawungi ya kubueja mitshi
Dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa muanda mutekete bakabanga kufila milambu ya kuosha kudi Yehowa; kadi kabakanza kujadika bishimikidi bia ntempelo wa Yehowa
Wakenza makunshi mazole a tshiamu tshia mitaku, bule buau bua mulu buakadi coudées dikumi ne muanda mukulu; dibulungu dia tshibumba diakadi coudées dikumi ne ibidi
Bimuna bia bena Levi kabidi nebikale bianyi meme, pa muaba wa bamuanabute ba bimuna bia bena Izrayele
Bakidika muaba au ne, Kibelota hatawa, bualu bua bakajikamu bantu bakadi ne lukuka
Wakenza mesu a mbote makumi atanu mu tshilulu tshimue, ne mesu a mbote makumi atanu mu tshilulu tshikuabo mesu a mbote akadi atuangana

Solomo wakatula bintu bionso bia kuteka mu nsubu wa Nzambi, ne tshioshelu tshia or ne mesa a bidia bilesha; ne bitekelu bia minda bia or mimpe bia kutemenabi mu nsubu bu muakadi mukenji; ne bilongo ne minda ne mpandu bia or mimpe; ne bijimishi bia minda ne mpanza ne nkutu ne bivuadi bia kutekamu kahia, bia or mimpe; ne ku bibuelelu bia nsubu wakateka bibi bia ku muaba wa tshijila ne bibi biakadi munda mua nsubu, ntempelo mene, biakadi bia or
Wangate manyi adibo bela ha mutu, wamiamine ha nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne ha bintu bionso bidimu, ujidile nsubu ne bintu biandi bionso, neikale mujidila
Yesu kakasua bantu bamanye bualu ebu

Wakavula bivualu biebe, wakadilongoluela n abi bitendelelu ha mitu ha mikuna bilengeshibue ne mibidi ya mushindu ne mushindu, wakendelamu masandi; malu a mushindu eu kaena manze kuenjibua, ne kaena enjibua kabidi

Nunku Mukelenge, Yehowa wa misumba mene, Munya wa Bena Isalele newandamuke kahia, Yeye neavingutule butumbi bua ditu diandi Mitshi itshidi ishala ne muoyo mu ditu diandi neyikale anu Mu dituku adi difuka dikese dia ba mu Isalele ne ba mu bana ba Yakoba badi bahanduka ku lufu, kabena beyemena muntu wakabakuma, kadi nebeyemene Yehowa, Wa Tshijila wa Isalele, mu bushuwa
Nanku anu bantu balume ba mu meku a batuangaji, ke badi mua kudia munyinyi awu, bualu udi mulambu wa tshijila menemene

Hashishe bakaluhuka ne muana wa mukelenge, bakateka tshifulu tshia butumbi ha mutu handi; bakamuha mukanda wa dihungila, bakamujadika mukelenge, bakamuela manyi ha mutu handi; bakamututshila nkashi, bamba ne, Mukelenge ikale ne muoyo
Katataka Samuele wakamana kufua, Bena Isalele bonso bakamujinga, bakamujika mu Lama mu musoko wandi mene
Mueyelu wa Mvidi Mukulu kumutulukila
Ke pavua Maweja Nangila mukandike bena Izrayele bua kabadi mashi, bualu muoyi wa tshintu tshionsu udi mu mashi
Hakatangila Ahazaya, mukelenge wa Yuda, bualu ebu, yeye wakanyema mu nshila wa ku nsubu wa mu budimi ebu
Yeye wakaluhuka, wakaya ku mukuna wa Oleve, bu muakadi tshilele tshiandi; bayidi bakamulonda

Kadi tshiena mbala muoyo wanyi bu tshintu tshia mushinga mukole kundi, binamanya mua kushikisha tshidikishilu tshianyi tshia lubilu ne mudimu unakuangata kudi Mukelenge Yesu wa kumanyisha bantu lumu luimpe lua ngasa wa Nzambi
Ditalala diakadi hankatshi ha Bena Isalele ne Bena Amole
Muntu yonsu uvua nabi bungi buvuaye nabu dikenga
Misoko neyikale bu binyemenu kudi musombuedi, mushihi wa mundi kafu biandi tô ne himaneye ku mpala kua tshisumbu tshia bantu bua kumulumbuluishabo
Neunutonde, unupatukila mu diulu
Dituku dia muanda mukulu diakadi dia disangisha dia tshijila; bualu bua bakadi bajidila tshioshelu matuku muanda mutekete, ne bakadia bidia bia disanka matuku muanda mutekete
Tudi bamanye ne, Tuakumuka ku lufu, tuakubuela mu muoyo, bualu bua tudi tunanga bana betu
Kuyabu pamue ne muena mudimu wa Abrahame
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi anayi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Uhatule muntu eu muena bihendu ku butshika bua tshitudilu, bantu bonso bakunvua mei andi batentekashe bianza biabo ha mutu handi ne bantu bonso bamukume ne mabue
Chronicles Adama, Shete, Enosha, Kenana, Mahalalele, Yelede, Hanoka, Metushela, Lameke, Noa, Sheme, Hama, Yefeta
Dina dia muan a bute wandi diakadi Yoele, ne dina dia muakunyi wandi diakadi Abiya: bakadi balumbuluishi mu Bê sheba
Bayidi bandi bakamukonka ne, Labi, wakuenza bualu bubi nganyi, muntu eu, anyi bamuledi, bua yeye udi muledibue mufofo
Mukelenge wakambila Doege ne, Wewe ushihe bakuidi
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nebanufile
Yeye udi ungambila ne, Funda ne, Badi babikidibua ku bidia bia dibanji bia Muana wa Mukoko badi ne disanka
Wewe wele balunda muoyo, muntu ne dina diandi muntu ne dina diandi
Nakadila bu mudi nyunyu wa kandindi anyi nyunyu wa mudinga udila, Nengambe tshinyi
Dî diakalua kudiye ne, Petelo, bika, shiha, udie

Muntu au wakambila Yoaba ne, Nansha wewe mumpe binunu dikumi bia argent mu tshianza tshianyi, tshiakadi kulenga tshianza tshianyi ham bidi ha muana wa mukelenge; bualu bua mukelenge wakanuambila ne Abishai ne Itai mu matshu etu ne, Dimukai, kanulengi nsongalume Abashaloma tshianza
Bienzedi Shaula wakatshidi ufunyina bayidi ba Mukelenge bua kubashiheye, wakaya kudi muakuidi munene
Meku onsu a bena Menashe aa avua ne bantu balume
Kadi, nsongu ibidi ya tukanu tukese atu, uyiteke ku masosu abidi a tshiamu tshia mpawungi, adi ku mampinda a tshilamba tshia efode
Bukokeshi bua Amona Kul
Hakamona Bena Yuda bisumbu bia bantu nunku, bakûlangana tente ne mukau, bakadila mei akadi Paulo wamba, bakamuhenda

Kadi mukashi wandi wakamuambila ne, Bu Yehowa musue kutushiha, yeye kakadi kuitabusha mulambu wa kuosha ne mulambu wa bukula ku bianza bietu, ne yeye kakadi kutulesha malu â onso kabidi, ne yeye kakadi kubambila malu â ku tshikondo etshi
Bualu mu mashi ke mudi muoyi
Ndelanganyi ya Yayire, muana mukuabu wa Menashe, kunyenga misoku mikuabu ya bena Amore, kuyinyikabu ne: Misoku ya Yayire
Nunku muntu eu wakahita bantu bonso ba ku luseke lua Esete buneme
Mei ebe neakubingishe, mei ebe kabidi neakuhishe
Bualu bua hanuakadi bahika ba bubi, nuakadi ne budishikaminyi ku buakane
Kadi kanutshinyi, kanupampakanyi bua panuvua bampane
Mvidi Mukulu kufuka tshibuashibuashi bua kupandulula mayi adi muinshi ne adi mulu
Mu ngondu wa Abibe unuvua bapatuke mu Ejipitu, nuikale nuenza tshibilu tshia dipatuka dienu
Elisha wakamuambila ne, Ya umuambile ne, Wewe neusangale bulelela, kadi Yehowa wakundesha ne, Yeye neafue bulelela
Kadi adi mujikila hankatshi ha malu â abidi: ndi njinga bua kumuka hanu bua kuikala ne Kilisto; bua bualu ebu budi butamba buimpe; kadi kushala mu mubidi mbualu bunudi nutamba kukengela
Ndi nfunda kudi bonso ba mu Lomo, banangibue kudi Nzambi, babikidibue bua kuikala basanto
Bakumuka ku mikuna ya Abalima, bakashikama mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mitangilangane ne Yeleko
Bakadi bakeba Yesu; hakadibo bimane mu ntempelo, bakakonkangana ne, Nudi nuelangana meshi munyi
Esawu kuya ku Seyire
Muena Peleshete eu udi kayi mutengula, udi nganyi bua kufuneye bulobo ku mpala kua bena mata ba Nzambi wa muoyo

Samuele Buhidia bua Shaula, Nzambi Udi Umubenga Samuele wakambila Shaula ne, Yehowa wakantuma kûdi bua kukuela manyi ha mutu bua wewe kuikala mukelenge ku mutu kua bantu bandi Bena Isalele; nunku unvue biebe mei a Yehowa
Bualu ebu buakenjibua tô bidimu bibidi, nunku bonso bakadi bashikama mu Asia bakunvua dî dia Mukelenge, Bena Yuda ne Bena Gelika
Kapia ka Maweja Nangila kutema munkatshi muabu, kuosha tshitupa tshia mitanda
Akisha wakamba ne, Wakuhaula bena nganyi lelu eu
Mose wakangata mulangala ku mpala kua Yehowa bu muakamuambileye
Dane uvua mulele muana wa balume anu umue, diende Ushime
Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakalua bua kuluangana n andi, wakamusuika nkanu bua kuya n andi ku Babulona
Nanku kabakufua to
Tatu wanyi wakanunemeshila mutshi wa tshikokedi wa bujitu, kadi meme nennukumbashile majitu makuabo: tatu wanyi wakamutuma ne nsokotshi, kadi meme nennukume ne tuminyiminyi
Utshiteke hehi ne tshilulu tshidi ku mushete wa Nzambi, ku mpala kua tshibuikilu tshidi ha mutu ha mushete, kundi nsangakena n ebe

Mukelenge wakashimbula bioshelu biakadi ku mutu kua nsubu wa Ahaza, biakenza bakelenge ba Yuda; ne bioshelu biakenza Manashe mu biendedi bibidi bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa; wakaubutula, wakela lufuishi luabi mu kasulu ka Kidelona
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, mu matuku alualua, Nemmiamine maminu mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele ne mu tshisamba tshia Bena Yuda adi amenesha bana ba bantu ne bana ba bimuna
Nusanke, nuikale ne disanka dingi, bualu bua difutu dienu didi mu diulu ndinene; bakakengesha baprofete nunku bakadi ku mpala kuenu
Kadi yeye wakabambila bikole ne, Mbulelela
Pelabu amu mpungi umue, bamfumu ba bisamba bia bena Izrayele nkayabu nebasemene pabuipi nebe
Nenshipe bamuanabute bonsu ba bantu ne ba nyama
Yeye wakamuambila ne Ya biebe, umone ne bana benu badi bakole ne bimuna bidi bimpe, anyi, walukila ungambile
Bualu bua Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nenkuenzele bu mudi malu awakuenza, wewe wakuhetula mutshihu webe hawakushiha tshihungidi tshietu
Bienzedi bia lungenyi bidi bilujadika
Kubuejaye mitshi ku mushete, kumubuikilaye tshibuikidiji
Kadi Bena Yuda bakadi bahidia bakavundulula mitshima ya bantu ba bisamba bia bende, bakaivuisha mifike kudi bena kuitabusha
Moshe ne Arone kuenza bionsu abi
Bobo mene bakafila nshingu yabo bua kuikosabo bua muoyo wanyi; kudibo kutudi tubasakidila, kememe nkayanyi, kadi bena ekelesia bonso ba mu bisamba bia bende

Badi banyana bua dikengela dia bia kudia ne nzala; Badi baka mabeshi a buanji hehi ne mitshi mihi, Badi babihata munkatshi mua bantu bakuabo, Bua nunku badi bashikame mu mpongo, Munkatshi mua bihuka bia mu tshihela badi bela mikunda yabo, Badi bana ba batshimbakanyi ne bana ba badi kabayi bamanyibue, Mpindiu nakulua musambu wabo wa kuimbimba, Badi bandengulula ne dihetu, badi bimana bashilangana n anyi kule, Bualu bua Nzambi wakusulula mulemu wa ku buta buanyi, ne wakunfuisha bundu, Bantu ba tshianana badi babika ku tshianza tshianyi tshia balume; Badi bashiha nshila wanyi, Badi baya ku mpala bu mudibo Malu a buowa adi antshintshimika; Mpindiu mutshima wanyi udi uhumuna kanyinganyinga kau munda muanyi; Butuku budi batubula mifuba yanyi, buyihatula ham bidi hanyi, Ku bukole bua disama dianyi tshivualu tshianyi tshidi tshinyanguka; Yeye wakungela mu bitahikidi, Ndi ndila kûdi ne kuena witaba kundi, Wewe wakakudimuka bu muena lukisu kundi; Wewe udi ungambula mu luhehele, udi ungendeshamu, Bua ndi mumanye ne, Wewe neunfikishe ku lufu, Kadi muntu udi wamba kukuluka kena wolola tshianza tshiandi mulu, anyi

Bena Ngershone ke bavua ne mudimu wa kulama bintu bia ntenta wa kusambakena ebi: ntenta wa munda, ntenta muibidi, ne ntenta wa kubuikila ku ntenta ibidi ayi, kabidi ne tshilamba tshivua tshilembeleja ku mushiku wa ntenta
Romans Nunku netuimbe ne, Abalahama, nkambua wetu, wakasangana tshinyi bua mubidi wandi
Budi bualu butamba bukese kundi bua meme kulumbuluishibua kunudi, anyi kudi tshilumbuluidi tshia tshikondo etshi tshia bantu; bulelela, tshiena ndilumbuluisha kabidi
Bakimana muntu ne muntu mu muaba wandi bu muakadi mukenji wa Mose, muntu wa Nzambi; bakuidi bakamiamina mashi akangatabo ku bianza bia Bena Lewi
Hashishe Boaza wakambila Luta ne, Muan anyi, kuena munvue, anyi

Nuikale bahote, nutabale; umena lukuna wenu, diabolo mene, udi wendakana bu nyama wa ntambue udi ukungula, ukeba bantu ba kudieye; numutantamene bajalame mu ditabusha dienu; bualu bua nudi bamanye ne makenga momumue adi makumbashibue mu bana benu ba mu Kilisto badi ha buloba ebu
Nutshipingaje kudi muenatshi
Hakamba diba kuhueka, muntu mubanshi wa ku Alimataya, dina diandi Yosefe, wakalua, yeye kabidi wakadi muyidi wa Yesu

Bualu bua Nzambi, undi nkuatshila mudimu mu nyuma wanyi mu lumu luimpe lua Muana Wandi, udi mumanyi wanyi bu mundi tshî ndekela kunutela misangu yonso mu mitendelelu yanyi, ndomba bianyi ne, Bikala bualu mua kuikala nunku, mpindiu, musangu mumane kuleha, nempete dikasa dimpe ku disua dia Nzambi bua kulua kunudi
Wakidika muana dina ne, Ikaboda, wamba ne, Butumbi buakumuka kudi Bena Isalele; bualu bua bakanyenga mushete wa Nzambi ne bualu bua tatu andi muenu ne bua bayandi kabidi
Arone kubambila ne: Umushayi tukanu tua tshiamu tshia mpawungi tudi ku matshi a bakaji benu, ne a bana benu ba balume ne ba bakaji, nutuntuadile
Malu â akalua bifuanyikishi bia malu etu, bua katukumi mitshima yetu ku malu mabi bu muakakumabo mitshima yabo
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, bantu aba bakujadika mpingu yabo mu mitshima yabo, bakuteka tshilenduishi tshia kudibuesha mu bubi ku mpala kuabo; ngunvue kulomba kuabo, anyi
Nakamba ne, Muntu bu meme udi ne bua kunyema bua tshinyi
Kena ulua ku disanka edi, anyi
Musoko eu kawena wikala luesu lunene kunudi, ne nuenu kanuena nuikala munyinyi munda mualu
Mpindiu, Mukelenge, ndi ngindila tshinyi
Danyele Mukelenge Beleshasâ wakalambishila miloho yandi tshinunu bidia bia disanka bia bungi, wakanua nvinyo ku mpala kua bantu aba tshinunu
Pawajikija, nennuishe tumelu tuebe kabidi
Nunku bakamushikika mu dikalu diandi

Bu mudi mulami wa mikoko ukeba tshisumbu tshia mikoko yandi mu dituku didiyi mitangadishibue, nunku nenkebe mikoko yanyi; nenyisungile ku miaba kudiyi mitangadishibue mu dituku dia matutu ne dia mîdima mikole
Kadi nsongalume kakadi mumanye bualu, anu Yonatana ne Davidi bakadi bamanye bualu
Wakamuambila ne, Bimpe, wewe udi muhika muimpe: bualu bua wewe wakadi mutumikile hawakadi ne tshintu tshikese, wikale biebe nfumu wa misoko dikumi
Nasha kakese

Hakatangila Esau ne bana bakashi ba Bena Kanana kabakasankisha mutshima wa Isaka tatu andi, Esau wakaya kudi Yishemaele, wakangata Mahalata muana mukashi wa Yishemaele muana wa Abalahama, wakadi muan abo wa bakashi ne Nebayota bu mukashi wandi, ha mutu ha bakashi bakadiye n abo

Mikalu ya buloba ikale nunku: Ku luseke lua nôde, ku Mai Manene, mu nshila wa ku Helelona, ku tshibuelelu tshia ku Hamata tô ne ku Sedada, Hamata, Belota ne Sibelayima, udi ku mukalu wa hankatshi ha Damaseke ne Hamata, ne Hasâ enona udi ku mukalu wa Haulana
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; yeye kakasesuka ku malu malu onso a Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, akenzesheye Bena Isalele, kadi utshivua wendamu
Ku Pâbâ ku wesete banai ku tshibandilu, ne babidi ku Pâbâ

Kadi Petelo ne Yone bakabakudimuna ne, Nusungule budi buakane ku mesu kua Nzambi, kutumikila di dienu anyi dî dia Nzambi; bualu bua katuena bamanye mua kuenza bualu bukuabo, anu kuambila bantu malu atuakumona ne atuakunvua
Kuvudi mukashi bilulu hatshidiye ne tshijila tshia kulela kuandi
Kadi dikenga dikole nedikale kudi badi ne mafu ne kudi badi bâmusha bana mabele mu matuku au
Bakosha musenga wa manananshi ku mutu kua mikuna, bu muakenza bisamba biakihata Yehowa ku mesu kuabo; bakenza malu mabi a kufuisha n au Yehowa tshiji
Bualu bua bantu bonso bakadi badila hakunvuabo mei a mu mikenji
Bakuidi bakamukudimuna ne, Netshikale tshibihe
Neamufuile munda bikole
Kuangataye bimuna biende ne bintu biende bionsu bivuaye mupete mu tshitupa tshia Mezopotamiya tshia ku mutu kua misulu
Ke pandi mukukandike ne kulengi ewu mukaji, nansha ne tshianza mene; tshianana, udi untombokela
Bumuka ku Obote, kufika ku Iye Abarime, mu tshipela tshivua luseke luvua diba dipatukila lua Mowabe
Hezikiya wakasamba Bena Lewi bonso bakadi ne meji makane mu mudimu wa Yehowa

Tangila, meme ndi ngamba kuibakila dina dia Yehowa Nzambi wanyi nsubu wa kumujidila ne bua kuoshelamu musenga wa manananshi, ne bua kutekamu bidia bia kulesha, ne bua kuoshelamu milambu dinda ne dilolo ne ku dituku dia lumingu ne habala ngondo ne hadiabo bidia bia disanka ku mpala kua Yehowa Nzambi wetu
Manseb a Shaula wakamba ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne ungambileku tshiakakuambila Samuele
Mukashi wa Yalobama wakajuka, wakaya, wakahingana ku Tîsa; hakafikeye ku mbelu kua nsubu, muana wakafua
Wewe, mukuna eu munene, udi tshinyi
Hakunvua Bena Moaba bonso lumu ne, Bakelenge aba bakalua kuluangana n etu, bonso bakadi ne bukole bakaluata bintu bia nvita, bakimana ku mukalu wa buloba buabo
Abrame kumutuadila nyama yonsu ayi, kuyipanda nseke, kuteka luseke ne luseke bitangilangane
Ndi ne bukole bua kuenza malu onso, kadi tshiena nkokeshibua munshi mua bualu bumue
Yehowa wakakonka Satana ne, Udi ufuma kudi kunyi
Bakamutshintshimikila mu Abele wa Bete mâka; bakunguisha mushiki wa mabue ku buludiludi ne lumbu; bantu bonso bakadi ne Yoaba bakumbula kuinshi kua lumbu, bua kulushimbula
Bena Isalele bakalekela kuihata Bena Peleshete bakalukila, bakahaula tshitudilu tshiabo
Wakamuambila malu onso akamuenzela muntu au
Nasha kakese
Bakakuata mukelenge wa Ai ne muoyo, bakalua n andi kudi Yoshua
Davidi wakasamba Beta sheba mukashi wandi; wakabuela kudiye, wakalala n andi; yeye wakamulelela muana mulume, wakamuidika dina diandi ne, Solomo
Bibi bionso ne biluwa bionso biakadi bunene bumue; ne bibi bia ha masoso biakatangilangana mu milongo isatu
Kadi bakamba ne, Katuena tunua nvinyo nansha; bualu bua Yonadaba, muana wa Lekaba, nkambua wetu, wakatuelela mukenji ne, Kanunu nvinyo, nansha nuenu nansha bana benu balume tshiendelele
Nudi ne matshu, kanuena nunvua
Hilama Wakenza biowelu ne nkasu ne bihanza
Nunku nudi nudibanda, nudi nuitabusha malu akenza bankambua benu; bobo bakabashiha, nuenu kabidi nutu nuibaka nkita yabo
Bu muakadi bukoya buabo ne bu muakadi kuntombokela kuabo mbu munakabenzela; nunku nakabasokoka mpala wanyi
Hakatshiabu, bantu bakabika ne dinda dionso, bakasaku tshioshelu, bakafua milambu ya kuosha ne milambu ya kubavuisha ditalala
Ka Yehowa wakungambila ne, Baprofete badi bamba mei a mashimi mu dina dianyi
Tangila, hashimbuka lumbu, kabena banukonka ne, Luhemba lunuakulabahu ludi hanyi
Bualu bua mu Nyuma umue buonso buetu tuakabatijibua mu mubidi umue, ne tudi Bena Yuda anyi Bena Gelika, anyi bahika anyi badishikamine; bakatunuisha Nyuma umue

Bobo bakanyenga buloba buandi, ne buloba bua Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, bakelenge babidi ba Bena Amole, bakadi dishiya dia Yadene kudi diba dihatuka; ku Aloê udi ku butshika bua tshibanda tshia mai a Ânona tô ne ku mukuna wa Sileona dina dikuabo ne Hêmona , ne buloba buonso bua Alabâ dishiya dia Yadene ku esete tô ne ku dishiha dia mai a Alabâ kuinshi kua mukuna wa Pisega
Kadi Mefibosheta, bu muakuamba mukelenge, yeye neadie bidia ku mesa anyi bu umue wa bana ba mukelenge
Bakambila mukelenge Solomo ne, Yoaba udi munyemene mu Ntenta wa Yehowa, udi wimana ku tshishihelu
Uvule Arone bilamba biende bia mudimu wa butuangaji
Nuenu kanuena bantume munemu to
Ba mu Dedana bakenduluka n ebe mushinga bua mbulankete ya kuambika ha nyima ha tubalu
Bantu ba mu Yeleko nkama isatu ne makumi anai ne batanu

Mark Mu matuku au tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu tshiakadiku kabidi, kabakadi ne tshia kudia; Yesu wakabikila bayidi bandi, wakabambila ne, Ndi ne bantu aba luse, bualu bua bobo bakusomba n anyi matuku asatu, kabena ne tshia kudia; binabatuma kuabo ne nsala, nebahange mu nshila; bakuabo mbafume kule
Nakadi nshikama ku dituku ne ku dituku mu ntempelo, nyisha bantu, kanuakantuala
Bantu bandi bakamuambila ne, Mona, mukashi mutempi wa lubuku udi mu Ene dô
Biakuma ngombe wa muntu ngombe wa muntu mukuabo, biamushiheye, bobo nebahane ngombe udi ne muoyo, nebabanyangane mushinga wandi, nebabanyangane ngombe mufue, kabidi

Bidi bibaluluke bu bibanda, Mai adi aluhuka mu milondo yandi, Nzambi wakamubadila mu Ejipitu, Udi walamina bu nyama wa ntambue, Tshiji tshiakakuata Balaka bualu bua Belâma wakakuma bianza biandi Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Nakakubikila bua kungelela bantu badi hanyi lukuna mulau, kadi mona, wewe wakubavudishila disanka misangu ei isatu
Solomo wakalua ne bintu biakajidila Davidi tatu wandi ne argent ne or ne mpanza yonso, wakabiteka mu bibutshilu bia mu nsubu wa Nzambi
Nebamushipe pende
Bakidika muaba au ne, Tabela, bualu bua kahia ka Yehowa kakatema munkatshi muabo

Netshikale luseke lua tshijila lua buloba; netshikale buloba bua bakuidi badi bakuata mudimu mu tshitendelelu ne badi basemena hehi ne Yehowa bua kumukuatshila mudimu; netshikale muaba wa kuashila bakuidi nsubu ne muaba wa tshijila wa tshitendelelu
Hakaya muntu ku luseke lua ku esete ne luidi mu tshianza tshiandi, wakidikisha coudées tshinunu, wakampitshisha mu mai, ne mai akafika mu tuhombo tuanyi

Bilulu biakadiye n abi, nansha tshilulu tshiakenzabo ne miosa ya mikoko nansha tshilulu tshia lin, nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama ya miosa ya mikoko anyi ya lin, nansha mu tshiseba anyi mu tshintu tshiakenzabo ne tshiseba, bikala bintu bifike anyi bikunze mu tshilulu anyi mu tshiseba anyi mu milongo ya buludi anyi mu milongo ya butshiama anyi mu tshintu tshiakenzabo ne tshiseba, edi ndisama dia nsudi, nebaleshe disama edi kudi muakuidi
Nanku bantu balume bonsu
Bualu bua bobo badi bampebue bajima munkatshi mua Bena Isalele mu miabo ya ban a bute bonso ba Bena Isalele nakadiangatshilabo
Nakowa ku makasa anyi, ndi mua kuanyanga kabidi, anyi
Exodus Nzambi wakamba mei â onso ne, Ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, wakakuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu nsubu wa buhika

Hakadisangisha bantu ba bisamba bia bende ne Bena Yuda ne bakelenge babo bua kubenzela bibi ne bua kubakuma mabue, bakamanya bualu abu, bakanyemena ku misoko ya mu Lukaonia, mena ai Luseta ne Dêbe, ne ku luseke alu; bakambaku lumu luimpe
Bakafila milambu ya kuosha ha kahia mu nsubu wa Yehowa misangu yonso mu matuku a Yehoyada
Argent yetu yakushika

Malu Akenza Yoshiya bua Kulengesha n Au Bukelenge Buandi Bualu bua mu tshidimu tshia muanda mukulu tshia bukelenge buandi, hakatshidiye muana, yeye wakabanga kukeba Yehowa, Nzambi wa Davidi, nkambua wandi; mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne bibidi yeye wakabanga kumusha bioshelu biakadi ha mutu ha mikuna ne mitshi ya Bashela ne mpingu yakasongabo ne mpingu yakatulabo mu Yuda ne Yelushalema
Hakaluabo ku Mala kabakamanya mua kunua mai a Mala, mai akadi ne bululu, nunku balodiha muaba au ne, Mala
Mabeshi au akadi malengele, mamuma au akadi a bungi be, akadi makumbane bia kudia bia bantu bonso
Kakuena kuikala tshikena kumona tshia kudinga n atshi bantu kabidi, anyi kutempa kua mbuku kua mei a lubombo munkatshi mua ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele
Meme nakadi kukuha argent dikumi ne mukaba
Mu muanda eu tudi bamanye ne tuetu tutu tuikala munda muandi, ne yeye utu wikala munda muetu, bualu bua wakutuha diha dia Nyuma wandi
Mayi a mu musulu wa Nile kununka mupuya mubi, bena Ejipitu kabayi mua kunua mayi awu kabidi to
Hashishe, Paulo wakumuka munkatshi muabo
Bena Isalele bakasa bitudilu biabo, bakadi bu bisumbu bia bana ba mikoko bibidi ku mpala kuabo; kadi Bena Sulia bakûsha buloba tente
Dimukai munudi nunvua; bua udi ne bintu nebamuhe binga, kadi udi kai ne tshintu nebamunyenge tshidiye wela meshi ne, Ndi n atshi
Wewe udi udikebela malu manene, anyi
Bikaleye kai wenza nunku, Nzambi nealumbuluishe ba ha buloba munyi
Moshe kuangata dikombu divua Mvidi Mukulu mumuambile bua kuya nadi

Nyeye udi mushikame ha mutu ha mukalu udi utuangasha buloba Nyeye udi uvuisha bakokeshi bu bantu ba hatuhu, Kabena banze kukunyibua musangu mule, kabena banze kumiaminyibua, Wa Tshijila udi ukonka ne, Nenunfuanyikishe kudi nganyi, Bandishai mesu enu kulu, numone bienu

Hakafikabo, bakalua kudi Mose ne kudi Alona ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele mu tshihela tshia Palana ku Kadesha, bakalua kudibo ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso ne dî diabo, bakabalesha mamuma a buloba abu
Nunku ntshidi ne bua kudila kudi mukelenge kabidi bualu kai
Yesu wakela dî diandi bikole mu ntempelo, uyisha bantu ne, Nudi banmanye, nudi bamanye kunakufuma; tshiakudivuila, wakuntuma udi mulelela, unudi kanui bamanye
Hakambeye nunku, wakangata mutanda wa bidia, wakasakidila Nzambi ku mesu kua buonso buabo, wakautshibula, wakabanga kudia

Kadi Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Ya biebe, bualu bua yeye udi bu luhanza lunakasungula bua kutuala dina dianyi ku mesu kua bisamba bia bende, ne kua banfumu, ne kua bana ba Isalele; bualu bua neamuleshe bungi bua malu adiye ne bua kukengela bua dina dianyi
Bena Yuda bakamuambila ne, Katuena ne bukokeshi bua kushiha muntu

Mu matuku a kunshikidilu, nenkutume bua kuluangana ne ba mu buloba buanyi, bua ba mu bisamba bia bantu bammanye meme, hanamuenesha tshijila tshianyi ku mesu kuabo ku bienzedi bindi nkuenzela wewe, Gogo
Matayo Mukanda wa bankambua ba Yesu Kilisto, muana wa Bayidi, muana wa Abalahama

Kadi pikalabu bajikile mulume, ne nsongakaji udi kayi mubangile, mulume umukuata ku bukole, mulume neafute tatuende wa nsongakaji tshibawu tshia nkanu makumi atanu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole
Kadi kena mua kuelamu mafuta nansha kutekamu musenga wa kamonya to, bualu mmulambu wa bualu budibu babanda nabu mukaji, kabayi bajadike
Kuambilaye mansebende Labane ne: Ndi musue kukuenzela mudimu bidimu muanda mutekete, bua meme kusela Rakele muanebe wa mukala
Panudi nutendelela Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, kanulondi bibidilu bia bisamba abi to
Nfumu wakambila muntu wandi ne, Ya biebe mu misesu ne ha buihi ne mpangu, ubabueshe mu nsubu, ûle tente
Nenuvuwe bilulu dituku dia muanda mutekete, nenubale bakane, ku nyima nenuhingane mu tshitudilu
