Eku kakuena kufila kua bia kudia biebe kudi badi ne nzala, Nunku munya webe neutshie bu mudi kabundubundu katshia, Hashishe wewe neumubikile, ne Yehowa neitabe kudi; biwafila tshidi mutshima webe musue kudi badi ne nzala, Yehowa neakulombele matuku onso, neaukutshishe Bamue ba bantu bebe nebase tshiakabidi mu miaba yakadi nushale bikulu; Biwalukisha dikasa diebe bua kadinyangi dituku dia Lumingu, nunku newikale ne disanka mu Yehowa, Yeshaya Tangilai, tshianza tshia Yehowa katshiena tshitamba buihi bua katshisungidi bantu, Kadi malu mabi enu akadi alua Bualu bua bianza bienu bidi binyanguke ne mashi, Kakuena muntu udi ufunda tshilumbu ne mutshima muakane, Badi batoya makela a nyoka wa dikala, Matande adibo baluka kaena mua kuandamuka bivualu biabo, Makasa abo adi aya lubilu kudi malu mabi, Kabena bamanye nshila wa ditalala, Bua malu â kulumbulula kuakane kudi kule n etu, Tudi tububuta bua kuheta tshimanu bu mudi bafofo benza; Tudi tukanga bu nkashama, Bualu bua malu mabi etu akuvulangana ku mpala kuebe, ludi tumutombokela, ne tudi tuhidia Yehowa; Ka kulumbulula kuakane kudi kuhingashila ku nyima, Bulelela, bushuwa kabuena bumueneka, Yeye wakamona muakadiku kakuyi muntu, Yeye wakavuala buakane bu kazaku ka tshiamu ka nvita, Bu mudi bienzedi biabo, mbu mudiye ubafuta, Nunku nebatshine dina dia Yehowa ku wesete, bualu Yehowa udi wamba ne, kudi Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bu mundi ngamba, etshi ntshihungidi tshindi mpunga n abo: Nyuma wanyi udi ham bidi hebe, ne mei anakuteka mukana muebe, kabiena biumuka mukana muebe, anyi mukana mua bana bebe baledibue, anyi mukana mua bikulu bebe, ku dituku edi to ne tshiendelele
Yesu wakambila bayidi bandi ne, Biasua muntu kundonda, adihidie, ambule mutshi wandi mutshiamakane, alonde

Ndi mumanye mua kuhuekeshibua, ndi mumanye mua kuikala ne bintu bitamba; mu bualu buonso ne mu mianda yonso nakumana kuyila bualu busokoka bua kuikala ne difu diukute, ne mua kuikala ne nsala, ne mua kuikala ne bintu bitambe bungi, ne bua kuikala ne bintu bitambe kukeha
Nakateka malu au onso mu meji; nakamba ne, Nempete meji, kadi nakuahanga

Ahaba wakambila Obadaya ne, Hitshila mu buloba buonso ku mishimi ya mai yonso ne ku tusulu tuonso, bumue neuheteku mashinde a kudisha n au tubalu ne nyama ya mpunda katujimishi nyama yetu yonso nansha

Hakafikabo ku buloba bua Sufa, Shaula wakambila muena mudimu wandi wakadi n andi ne, Lua, tuhingane, tatu nealekele kunyingalasha mutshima bualu bua nyama ya mpunda, neabange kunyingalasha mutshima bualu buetu
Nakalongoluela mushete muaba, mudi tshihungidi tshia Yehowa tshiakahungeye ne bankambua betu hakumukeye n abo mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Ebeyatâ wakalua kudi Davidi ne efoda
Nehemiah Mu ngondo wa Nisana mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi tshia bukokeshi bua mukelenge Atashasete hakadibo balua ne nyinyo ku mesu kuandi, meme nakangata nvinyo, nakamuha mukelenge
Kadi meme nkadi mumane kufuisha muananyi
Yakasungila musoko wa Samalea mu tshianza tshianyi, anyi
Nakukunvuila bualu bua Yishemaele kabidi, mona, nakumusankisha, nemmukumbashe, nemmuvuishe bisamba bia bungi, yeye nealele baminyampala dikumi ne babidi, nemmuvuishe tshisamba tshinene
Pashishe, ujidile bena Levi bua bikale banyi meme Maweja Nangila, pa muaba wa bamuanabute bonsu ba bena Izrayele
Nuenu nuambile tatu wanyi bua butumbi buonso bundi n abu mu Ejipitu, ne bua malu onso anuakumona, nuhingane ne tatu wanyi kunoko lubilu

Juka biebe, Nzambi, udiakuile bualu buebe; Kuhu di dia bena lukuna bebe muoyo; Psalms Tudi tukusakidila, Nzambi, tudi tukusakidila; Hanafika ku tshikondo tshinakusungula, Hafingatuka buloba ne bantu bonso badi bashikamemu, Ndi neambila badi ne diambu ne, Kanuikadi ne diambu; Kanuambudi lusengu luenu mulu, Bualu bua kubandisha kua muntu kakuena kufuma ku esete Kadi Nzambi nyeye udi mulumbuluishi; Bualu bua mu tshianza tshia Yehowa mudi luhanza ne maluvu adi alulukamu; Kadi meme hanyi nengambe butumbi buebe tshiendelele, Nenkose nsengu yonso ya bantu babi, nenyumushe; Psalms Badi bamanye Nzambi mu Yuda, Mu Salema kabidi mudi nsubu wandi wa ntenta mushimikibue, Mu muaba au yeye wakatshibula mikete yakadi mu mata Wewe udi ne butumbi, udi ne buneme buhite mikuna Bena mitshima nutantamane bakulua bu bintu bia kunyenga; Bua kubela kuebe, Nzambi wa Yakoba, Wewe, wewe hebe, udi ukuatshisha bantu buowa; Wewe wakunvuisha bantu dikosa diebe dia bilumbu difuma mu diulu; bakajuka Nzambi bua kulumbululeye bilumbu, Bulelela, tshiji tshia bantu netshikutumbishe; wewe neudiluatshishe Uditshihe kudi Yehowa Nzambi webe mitshihu yebe, umufutai; udi ukanda Psalms Neudile kudi Nzambi ne dî dikole, Mu dituku dia makenga anyi nakakeba Mukelenge
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Fila Abishaga, Muena Shunama, kudi Adoniya muan enu bu mukashi wandi

Mukaji mukamba Pikala bana ba balume babidi ba muntu umue basombe muaba umue, umue mufue kayi mushiye muana wa balume, mukaji wa mufue awu, kabena mua kumupiana kudi muntu mukuabu to, amu kudi bayende tshina
Nunku nenuikale ne mukelenge haluhukeye ne habueleye
Uvua ne mikoku, mbuji, ngombe, biamu bia mpawungi, ne biamu bitoke bia mushinga mukole kabidi

Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, wewe udi muakane; bualu bua wewe wakatahila difuka dihanduka bu mudidi lelu eu; mona, tudi ku mesu kuebe mu kuhila kuetu; kakuena udi mumanye mua kuimana ku mpala kuebe bua bualu ebu
Monai, bu mudi dima mu bianza bia mufumbi, mbu munudi mu bianza bianyi, nuenu Bena Isalele
Bena Isalele bonso bakadi banyema muntu ne muntu ku ntenta wandi
Yeye wakabambila ne, Bulelela, nuakuvuisha mukenshi wa Nzambi bu wa hatuhu, bualu bua nuenu kulonda tshilele tshienu
Hakahita ngondo isatu, bakambila Yuda ne, Tamâ ma muen ebe wakandamuka bu mukashi wa masandi, ne yeye wakimita difu kabidi ku masandi
Wa munkatshi mua bana ba Yosefe, wa mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima, Elishama muana mulume wa Amihuda

Kadi Nzambi wakabakoma nyima, wakabalekela bua kutendelelabo tshisumbu tshia bidi mulu; bu muakafundabo mu mukanda wa baprofete ne, Nuakambula nsubu wa tshilulu wa Moleke, Bankambua betu bakadi ne nsubu wa tshilulu wa tshimanyishilu mu tshihela bu muakalongolola wakadi wakula ne Mose ne, Umuenze bu tshifuanyikishi tshiwakutangila, Bankambua bakamuhiana, bakalua n andi ne Yoshua, hakabuelabo mu buloba bua bisamba bia bende bakumushabo kudi Nzambi ku mesu kua bankambua betu, wakadika tô ne mu matuku a Davidi
Yehowa wakateka dî mukana mua Belâma, wakamba ne, Hingana kudi Balaka, umuambile nunku

Hakunvueye lumu ne, Tihaka, nfumu wa Atiopa, ulualua bua kuluangana n ebe, wakatuma ba messager kudi Hezikiya kabidi ne, Nuambile Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne, Nzambi webe ûdi weyemena kakudingi nansha, hambeye ne, Kabena bafila Yelushalema mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Ashû

Mukelenge wandi wakamuambila ne, Bimpe, muana wanyi muimpe ne muntumikidi, wewe wakadi untumina hawakadi ha mutu ha bintu bikese, nenkuteke ha mutu ha bintu bia bungi, buela mu disanka dia mukelenge webe
Kabakamusangana ne bualu bua kufueye, kadi bakalomba Pilato ne, Bamushihe

Bualu bua bonso ba mu Isalele kabena Bena Isalele bulelela, ne buonso buabo kabena bana bandi: bualu bua badi tunkanunuina tua Abalahama; kadi mbu muakafundabo ne, Mu Isaka tunkanunuma tuebe, netubikidibue
Bobo kabanyangishi bintu bia tshijila Nakafila Bena Isalele kudi Yehowa, bua kabatekedi bantu bujitu bua bubi bua bakuidi hadia bakuidi bintu bia tshijila bia bantu meme ndi Yehowa wakabajidila

Biwahidia kulekela bantu banyi, nentumine bisumbu bia tuishi kûdi ne kudi bahika bebe ne kudi bantu bebe ne mu nsubu yenu, nsubu ya Bena Ejipitu neyikale ne bisumbu bia tuishi tente, ne hanshi ha buloba kabidi
Hakatshiabu Davidi wakafundila Yoaba mukanda, wakautuma mu bianza bia Uliya
Monai maleta manene andi munufundile n au ne tshianza tshianyi tshine
Bakamuambila ne, Tuetu tuyaya n ebe
Yesu wakatuambila bikole ne, Nuambile bantu bualu ebu, nubamanyishe ne, Eu nyeye wakusungudibua kudi Nzambi bua kuikala Mulumbuludi wa badi ne muoyo ne wa bafue
Yakoba wakambila Labana ne, Umpe mukashi wanyi, bualu bua matuku anyi akukumbana bua meme kuikala n andi
Nebakufuishe bundu ku mesu kua bisamba bia bantu; neumanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Nunku bakalua bahandi ba nkunyi ne basunyi ba mai kudi Bena Isalele bonso, bu muakabambila bakelenge babo
Sheme ne Yafete bakangata tshilulu, bakatshiteka ha makaya abo, bakaya tshianyima, bakabuikila butaka bua tatu abo, mpala yabo yakadi mitangile kukuabo, kabakatangila butaka bua tatu abo nansha

Psalms Nzambi, wewe udi Nzambi wanyi; ndi nkukeba bikole; Nunku nakukutangila talalâ mu nsubu webe wa tshijila, Bualu bua luse luebe lujalame ludi luhita muoyo bulengele, Nunku nenkuvudishile disanka hantshidi ne muoyo; Muoyo handi nkuvuluka ha bulalu buanyi, Bualu bua wakumana kuikala mukuatshishi wanyi, Muoyo Kadi badi bakeba muoyo wanyi bua kûbutula Nebafidibue ku bukole bua muele wa nvita; Kadi mukelenge neusanke mu Nzambi
Ne wakangambila ne, Uwangate, ûdie; neuvuishe difu diebe bululu, kadi mukana muebe nemuikale mushemakane bu buitshi
Diba adi, bantu bonsu ba mu tshimenga atshi, nebamuase mabue, bamushipa
Anu umue udi muedi wa mikenshi ne mulumbuluisha nyeye udi ne bukole bua kue sungila ne bua kushiha
Miaba yonsu ayi kushalamu bintu bikese bikuatakane bu mudi mabue a mvula
Ndi nuambila kabidi ne, Kubuela kua kamelu mu disu dia kashingi kudi kutamba kubuela kua muntu mubanshi mu bukelenge bua Nzambi butekete
Biajidileye budimi buandi ku tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, mushinga wabu newikale bu muakatuanganabo
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Mona, nentshibule buta bua Elama, tshieyemenu tshia bukole buabo
Wakenza bualu bubi ne, Udi ukumina mukuenu tshinyi
Shafana secrétaire wakambila mukelenge ne, Hilekiya muakuidi wakumpa mukanda
Mukashi kaluatshi bilulu bia mulume, ne mulume kaluatshi bilulu bia bakashi: muntu yonso udi wenza malu au nunku udi bu tshintu tshibi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Kadi Nyuma wakabuela munda muanyi, wakangimanyika kulu; wakayikila n anyi, wakangambila ne, Ya, udijidile mu nsubu muebe
Makire kulela Ngilaade
Nanku Maweja Nangila udi wamba ne: Mpindiewu neujadike bukole buanyi
Muana wa balume wa Shamai wakadi Maona; Maona wakadi tatu wa Bete sû
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Umpe muan ebe mulume
Nebahinganemu, nebumushe bintu bionso bidi hibubihisha ne bintu bionso bidi bibunyanga
Wakenza mabaya asambombo a kuteka ku nyima ku luseke lua ku wesete
Kadi ba bungi badi ku mpala katataka nebikale ku nyima, badi ku nyima katataka nebikale ku mpala
Mitshi ya olive ibidi idi ha buihi n atshi, umue ku tshianza tshia balume tshia luhanza alu, mukuabo ku tshianza tshialu tshia bakashi
Nyuma wakungambila ne, Ya n abo, kuedi mpata
Davidi wakambila Abishai ne bantu bandi bonso ne, Monai, muan anyi mulume wakaluhuka munda muanyi udi ukeba muoyo wanyi; nunku Muena Benyamina eu kena mua kutamba kuenza nunku, anyi
Tshibangidilu Abrahame udi usumba lukita bua kujika Sara Sara mumane kukumbaja bidimu lukama makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete, kufuaye mu Kiriyate Arba, momumue ne Ebrone, mu ditunga dia Kenaane
Petelo wakamba ne, Nasha, mulumiana, tshiena wabo
Yakoba wakimanyika dibue dinene bu tshibumba ha muaba wakayikidileye n andi, wakahongolola mai a kutendelela n au ha mutu hadi wakelahu manyi kabidi
Nudi mua kulua ne bintu bia kumudilu binudi nuhuola kudi Yehowa, kadi bintu ebi kabiena bu bintu bidi bitua dihembu ha tshioshelu
Neubalumbuluishe, anyi
dikuba dia bisumbu bia bantu badi kabayi ne makanda

Hashishe bana balume bonso ba mukelenge bakabika, bakabanda ha nyima ha nyama ya mpunda, Hakatshidibo baya mu nshila, lumu luakafika kudi Davidi ne, Abashaloma wakashiha bana balume bonso ba mukelenge, nansha umue wabo udi mushale
Mukelenge Lehabama Wakenza ngabu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku, wakayiteka mu bianza bia tupitene tuakadi tulama nsubu wa mukelenge
Wewe Yelushalema, Yelushalema, utu washiha baprofete, utu wakuma bakukutuminabo mabue
Ku mpala kua malu onso, bana betu, kanuditshihi nasha kudi diulu, nasha kudi buloba, nasha ne mutshihu mukuabo; kadi E wenu ikale E ne Nasha wenu ikale Nasha, bua nuenu kanudibueshi mu dihila
Wakasa nsubu milungakashe mu lumbu luakadi lunyunguluke ntempelo ne muaba wa tshijila kabidi; wakenza nsubu ku nseke yonso
Yeye wakasumba tshilulu tshia line; hakamutululeye hanshi, wakamujingila tshilulu, wakamuladika mu lukita lumbula mu dibue; wakabunguluisha dibue dinene, wakadijibika ku mushiku wa mbelu wa lukita
Nunku Ahazaya, muana wa Yeholama, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakakokesha bantu
Ndi musue kunukonka anu bualu bumue, Nuakangata Nyuma bua kuenza kua mikenshi anyi bua kunvua kua lumu luimpe ne ditabusha
Nzambi atambe kuela bena lukuna ba Davidi mulau binashila muntu au muana mulume umue wa bintu bionso bidiye n abi tô ne muatshiabu
Kanusakididi bualu bukuabu ku mikenji ya Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, indi munulongeshe
Bakakosa Sheba, muana wa Bikili, mutu, bakawela kudi Yoaba

Bua malu â nennuihate mu buloba ebu bua kunutuma ku buloba bunudi kanuyi banze kumanya, nansha nuenu nansha batatu benu; ne mu muaba wawa nenukuatshile nzambi mikuabo mudimu munya ne butuku; bualu bua tshiena nnulesha diakalengele

Bobo nebanutshintshimike ku bibi bienu bionso tô ne hahona ngumbu yenu yonso inuakueyemena mu buloba buenu buonso; bobo nebanutshintshimike ku misoko yenu yonso mu buloba buonso budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha
Hanakadi muana, nakadi ngakula bu muana, nakadi ngela meshi bu muana, nakadi njingulula malu bu muana; katataka hanakulua muntu mukole, nakulekela malu a buana
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Meme kabidi nengangate lusongo lua mutshi wa cèdre, nendushimike hanshi; nengahule ditamba ditekete didi ku mutu kualu, nendikune ha mutu ha mukuna mule munangahale
Hashishe nakabadimusha, nakabakonka ne, Nudi nulala ku mbelu kua musoko bua tshinyi
Aba mbakelenge ba luseke bakashikama mu Yelushalema; kadi Bena Isalele ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne Bena Netinima Kadi bakuabo ba Bena Yuda ne ba Bena Benyamina bakashikama mu Yelushalema
Tshintu tshifukibua netshikenke mufuki watshi ne, Wakunfuka nunku bualu kai, anyi
Shaula wakaluangana nvita mikole ne Bena Peleshete matuku andi onso; bakatangila Shaula muntu mukole anyi muntu wa bukitu, yeye wakamuangata bu muntu wandi
Bakashikama mu bitudilu biabo matuku muanda mutekete; kadi mu dituku dia muanda mutekete bakabanga kuluangana; Bena Isalele bakashiha Bena Sulia bakadi benda hanshi binunu lukama mu dituku dimue
Tudi tukusengelela ne, Witabushe bua tuetu kuya ku Yadene, muntu ne muntu baditahile mitshi, tudienzeleku muaba utudi mua kushikama
Ha mutu ha balume bakabalabo mu kulondolola kuabo ku bidimu bisatu tô ne ku mutu, muntu yonso wakadi ubuela mu nsubu wa Yehowa, bu muakadi mudimu wa buatshia buatshia wa ku mulongo wa muntu ne muntu
Ulabe Arone ne bana bende ba balume mafuta aa, bua kubajidila, bua bangenzele mudimu wa butuangaji
Muana wa mukalenga kuambila mamu awu ne: Angata muana ewu, umunkoleshile
Pashishe, wambile bena Izrayele ne: tshiadi tshia mukoku wa tshimpanga ne tshibelu tshiudi muele mulu munyukule mbia tshijila
Kutuabu binu panshi bua kumutendelela

Nunku Ahaza wakatuma ba messager kudi Tigelata pilesê, mukelenge wa Ashû, ne, Meme ndi muntu webe ne muana webe mulume; lua biebe, ansungile mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Sulia ne bia mukelenge wa Isalele, badi baluangana neanyi
Shaula wakambila bantu bandi ne, Nunkebele mukashi mutempi wa lubuku, bua meme kuya kudiye kunuebesha
Nunku, ukudimune mutshima webe; anyi nendue kûdi lubilu, ne nenduangane n abo nvita ne muele wa nvita wa mukana muanyi
Bobo bakangata ku bianza bia Mose bintu bionso biakafua Bena Isalele ne disanka bua kuenza n abi bintu bionso bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu

Bua ditabusha Hanoka wakumushibua ha buloba, wakatekibua ma diulu bua yeye katangidi lufu, ne kabakamusangana bualu bua Nzambi wakamuteka ma diulu; bualu bua ku mpala kua diumushibua diandi wakadi ne bualu buandi buambibua ne, Yeye wakasankisha Nzambi
Bakambila Davidi ne, Wewe kuena ubuela munemu, anu haumusha bafofo ne balema, bela meji ne Davidi kena mua kubuelamu

bakanangane ne dibikila diakanubikilabo n adi, mu kudihuekesha kuonso, mu kalolo, mu lutulu ne mu kuikalangana ne luse; nunanukile mua kulama buobumue buenu bua mu Nyuma Muimpe mu tshisuikidi tshia ditalala
Bana betu, kanutontolodianganyi, bua nuenu kanulumbuluishibu; tangilai, mulumbuluishi udi muimane ku mpala kua tshibi

Ndi musue buonso buenu numanye mua kuakula miaku, kadi ndi ntamba kusua bua nuenu numanye mua kuambila bantu dî dia Nzambi; muntu udi wambila bantu dî dia Nzambi udi utamba muntu udi ubambila dî mu muaku udibo kabai bamanye, bikaleye kai utujinguluila muaku, bua ekelesia adiundishibue
Hama, tatu wa Kanana, wakamona butaka bua tatu wandi, wakamanyisha bana babo babidi bakadi ha bule
Bana balume ba Palu: Eliaba

Yehowa wakamana kujadika dî diandi diakambeye: bualu bua meme nakahingana mu muaba wa tatu wanyi Davidi bua kushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Isalele bu muakatulaya Yehowa; nakamana kuashila dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, nsubu
Igale, muana wa Yozefe, wa mu tshisamba tshia Isakare

Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Bakashi ba mu lufuila ba bungi bakadi mu Isalele mu matuku a Eliya, hakadi diulu dibuikila bidimu bisatu ne ngondo isambombo, ha kalua tshiole tshinene ha buloba bu onso; kadi Eliya kakatumibu a kudi bakuabo, anu ku Salefata mu boloba bua Sidona, kudi mukashi wakadi mu lufuila
Umubikile ne: Sara
Nzambi wa ditalala ikale ne buonso buenu
Hangela bianyi mpungi, meme ne bonso badi n anyi, hashishe nuenu kabidi nuele mpungi ku matshika onso a tshitudilu, nuambe ne, Bualu bua Yehowa ne bua Gideona
Mose wakambila Eleazâ muakuidi ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, ne bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ya bisamba bia Bena Isalele bua bualu buabo
Bantu bakadi bindila Zakâya, bakakema bualu bua yeye wakanenga musangu mule mu ntempelo
Nunku bakatshina Yehowa, kadi bakadisunguila bakuidi ba munkatshi muabo, bakabafidila milambu mu nsubu yakadi ku mutu kua mikuna
Mose ne Alona bakenza bu muakamba Yehowa, bakenza nunku

Yeye wakabambila ne, Bakafunda ne, Mbimpe bia Kilisto kukengeye ne kubikeye ku lufu hahita matuku asatu; mbimpe kabidi bia kuambilabo bisamba bionso bualu bua kukudimuna kua mitshima ne bua kujimishibua kua mibi yabo mu dina diandi, babangile ku Yelushalema
Kahia kakafuma kudi Nzambi, kakamuosha ne bantu bandi makumi atanu
Yeye wakabika, wakalua kudi tatu wandi
Luseke lua Mukanda wa Nzambi luakadiye ubala luakadi luamba ne, Mu kudihuekesha kuandi bakanyanga tshilumbu tshiandi; Muntu mutungula wakakonka Filipo ne, Muprofete udi wamba nganyi
Yeye wakamuebesha ne, Wewe ulualua ne ditalala, anyi
Buonso buabo, banene ne bakese, bayishi ne bayidi, bakela nshobo bua kusungulabo mudimu wabo
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Monai dibue dinakuimanyika ku mpala kua Yoshua; ha dibue edi hadi mesu muanda mutekete
Pikala muntu mutekesha makuta ende nansha bintu bikuabu bia mushinga ku nzubu kua muntu mukuabu, bintu abi bijimine, bobu bakuate muivi, bua tshintu tshimue neafute bintu bibidi

Nunku Hilekiya, muakuidi munene, ne Ahikama ne Akabo ne Shafana ne Asaya bakaya kudi Huleda, muprofete mukashi, wakadi mukashi wa Shaluma, muana wa Tikewa, muana wa Hâhasa, mulami wa bilulu bia mukelenge; yeye wakadi mushikame mu luseke luibidi lua mu Yelushalema ; bakasomba n andi
Mu dina adi kamuakadi mai, anu bitotshi; ne Yelemiya wakabuela mu bitotshi
Bakunguisha mushiki munene wa mabue ha mutu handi; udiku tô ne lelu; ne Yehowa wakalekela tshiji tshiandi
Mushindu wa kukumbaja mapangadika adi mu tuloongu tudi ku mutu etu pamwe ne makookeshi makwabo a batshipwita badi bawuleeja kudi mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda mwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu
Moshe ne Arone bakavua bamane kuenza bishima bia bungi, mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu mutangile

Hashishe bûdi n abu mbua kuya ku mukuna wa Nzambi, kudi masalayi a Bena Peleshete; hawafika ha buihi ne musoko, neusangile ne tshisumbu tshia baprofete bafume ku mutu kua mukuna badi ne lunzenze lua nshinga dikumi ne dizele ne lushiba ne tshisanji; bobo mene nebikale bamba dî dia Nzambi
Wa bana ba Elama, Yeshaya, muana wa Atalaya; bakadi n andi bakadi balume makumi muanda mutekete
Hashishe yeye wakangambila ne, Bubi bua Bena Isalele ne bua Bena Yuda budi buhita hunene, buloba budi bûle tente ne kumatshisha kua mashi, ne musoko udi mûle tente ne kunyanga kua bilumbu bia bantu

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua bobo bakubenga mikenji inakateka ku mpala kuabo, ne kabena batumikila dî dianyi, kabena bendelamu, kadi bakulonda anu mampaka a mu mitshima yabo, ne bakulonda Babâla, bu muakabayishabo kudi batatu abo
Ulabe mafuta awu kabidi ku dilongu dinene ne ku tshitaku tshiadi bua kubindila
Bobo bakasumbibua munkatshi mua bantu, bua kuikala mamuma a kuhuola diambedi kudi Nzambi ne kudi Muana wa Mukoko
Wakenza malu mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa bu muakenza Amasaya, tatu wandi
Ne bituikala bana, tudi bahianyi kabidi; bahianyi ba Nzambi, ne bahianyi tshiahamue ne Kilisto: bituakenga n andi, mbua tuetu tutumbishibue n andi
Yesu wakambila bayidi bandi ne, Matuku nealue anuasua kutangila dituku dimue dia mu matuku a Muana wa muntu, kadi kanuena nuditangila, Nebanuambile ne, Kayeu kuakua
Bualu bena Ejipitu bavua benda babipatshila
Wewe neuteke mabue abidi ha bilulu bia ha maha ha efoda; mabue au neikale bu tshivulukidi tshia Bena Isalele, Alona neatuale mena abo ku mesu kua Yehowa ha maha andi abidi bu tshivulukidi
Kadi hakamoneye Bafalese ba bungi ne Basadoke balua kubatijibua, yeye wakabakonka ne, Nuenu bana ba nyoka, wakunudimusha bua kunyema ku mulau ulualua nganyi

Abishai Udi Usungila Davidi mu Bianza bia Muntu wa Nfiondo Bena Peleshete bakaluangana ne Bena Isalele kabidi; Davidi wakahueka ne bantu bandi bakadi n andi, bakaluangana ne Bena Peleshete; Davidi wakahungila
Asa wakakengesha bantu bakuabo mu tshikondo atshi tshiotshimue
Badi babiaasa ne bidi bienza midimu yabi bidilekelela, mu dineemeka dia mêyi ne mikandu, dia bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne dia bibidilu bîmpe
ndongamu miludiki ya ditunga dijima bwa kudiundisha bishimikidi bia nshindameenu bu mudi malobo, bipalu bia ndeka ne ngâla ya tuwulu;

Kadi yeye, mûle tente ne Nyuma Muimpe, wakatangila mulu talala, wakamona butumbi bua Nzambi, ne Yesu muimane ku tshianza tshia bukole tshia Nzambi, wakamba ne, Monai, ndi ntangila diulu dibululuke, ne Muana wa muntu muimane ku tshianza tshia bukole tshia Nzambi
Mu difuku dia tshitema dia ngondo muinai tshiole tshiakatamba bukole mu musoko; nunku bena buloba kabakadi ne bia kudia

Yeye wakabambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Nuambile muntu wakantuma kundi ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, meme nentume malu makole ku muaba eu ne kudi bena buloba abu bu mudi mei onso adi mafunda mu mukanda eu wakabala mukelenge wa Yuda

Nunku yeye wakahumbulula mpumbuluila mu budimi to ne ku dilolo, ne yeye wakashehula bintu biakahumbululeye, biakadi bu épha Yeye wakamuambula, wakaya mu musoko, mamuen andi wakatangila biakahumbululeye yeye wakahatula, wakamuha biaka shiyeye hakukuteye
Moshe udi unyemena ku Madiyane Moshe mumane kukola, kuyaye bua kumonangana ne bana babu
Nudi nulomba ne kamuena nuangata bintu, bualu bua nudi nabilomba bibi, anu bualu bua kubimuangalasha ku masanka enu
Hakatumeye babidi ba mu bakadi bamukuatshisha, Timote ne Elasto, ku Makedonia, yeye nkayandi wakashala mu Asia tshituha
Katataka, muan anyi, Yehowa ikale n ebe; wikale ne diakalengele, wibakile Yehowa, Nzambi webe, nsubu bu muakuambeye bualu buebe
Yosefe wakela bantu bandi mukenji bua kulongololabo tshitalu tshia tatu wandi, banganga buka bakalongolola tshitalu tshia Isalele
Kanuangatshi bintu bia buhikudi kudi muntu wakasemena ku musoko wa kunyemena, bualu bua kumuhingisha ku buloba buandi to ne hafua muakuidi munene

Udi uvuisha Udi uyisha bianza bianyi mua kuluanganabi nvita; Wewe wakumpa ngabu wa luhandu luebe, Wakadiundisha muaba undi ngendela muinshi mua makasa anyi, Nakihata badi n anyi lukuna, nakabaheta; Nakabasa, nakabasompola, nunku kabakamanya mua kujuka kabidi; Bualu bua wewe wakajingila ne bukole bua kuluangana nvita; Wewe wakenzesha bena lukuna banyi bua kunkomabo nyima, Bakadila; kadi kakuakadi muntu wakabasungila, Ka nakababotesha balue bu luhuishi ku mpala kua luhehele, Wewe wakansungila ku mafuilangana a bantu; Mu diba diakunvuabo lumu luanyi bakantumikila; Ba mu bisamba bia bende bakateketa, Yehowa udi ne muoyo; dibue dianyi divudishibue disanka, Nzambi eu mene udi usombuela, Udi unsungila mu bianza bia bena lukuna banyi; Bua malu â nenkutumbishe munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu, Yehowa, Yeye udi uhesha mukelenge wakasunguleye luhandu lunene, Misambu Diulu didi diamba butumbi bua Nzambi; Dituku dimue didi diakulangana ne dikuabo dituku, Kakuena muaku, kakuena mei; mukunda wabi udi uya mu miaba yonso ya ha buloba, didi bu mubaki wa mukashi haluhukeye mu nsubu muandi, Dihatuka diadi didi kunfudilu kua diulu, Mikenji ya Yehowa idi miakane tshishiki Mei a Yehowa adi malelela, Ditshina dia Yehowa didi ditoke, Kubinanga kudi kuhita kunanga or buimpe; Muntu webe udi mudimushibue kabidi kudibi; Udi mumanye mua kujingulula mahanga andi nganyi
Bu munuakamana kukumbana mu malu onso, ne mu ditabusha, ne mu kuamba, ne mu lungenyi, ne mu disuminyina dionso, ne mu dinanga dienu kutudi, nukebe mua kukumbana mu ngasa eu kabidi
Mose Wakenza bu muakamuambila Yehowa; bantu bonso bakasangakena ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Muntu udi bu muhuya; Yehowa, winyike diulu diebe, uhueke biebe hanshi

Bualu bua Nzambi udi umue, ne mutuanganyi umue udiku hankatshi ha Nzambi ne bantu, nyeye muntu mene, Kilisto Yesu; wakadifila bu tshintu tshia kuhikula n atshi bantu bonso; bumanyishi bua muanda eu budi ne bua kumanyishibua mu bikondo biabu mene
Yehowa wakakonka Satana ne, Wakumona muntu wanyi Yobo, anyi
Kadi katataka nudiumushile bienu kabidi malu â onso: lukuna, tshishi, lukinu, bihendu, mei a bundu mukana muenu

Biakula muntu muaku unudi kanui bamanye, bakule nunka kudi babidi, kabahitshi ha basatu, balondangane muntu ne muntu, ne umue wenu abajinguluile muaku kadi bikalaku kakui mubajinguluidi, muena muaku ahue biandi mu ekelesia, adiakuile munda munda, akule kudi Nzambi kabidi
Ulekele bantu banyi baye kuntendelela

Wakumusha luhingu lua Ashela mu nsubu wa Yehowa, wakaya n alu ku mpenge ya Yelushalema ku kasulu ka Kidelona, wakaluosha ku kasulu ka Kidelona, wakalubutula bu luhuishi, wakela luhuishi ha nkita ya bantu ba tshianana
Alona wakahingana kudi Mose ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena, disama diakashika
Bana balume ba Kusha: Seba ne Hawila ne Sabeta ne Lâma ne Sabeteka
Yoaba wakalekela kulonda Abinê; hakasangisheye bantu bonso, bantu ba Davidi dikumi ne tshitema ne Asahele kabakadiku
Panudi nunowa biakudia, kanuena mua kuangulula binuvua bapue muoyi to
Bualu bua wewe wakalua anu makelela eu, bûdi n abu mbua kubanda n etu ne kuhueka n etu lelu, anyi
Nemmuande bukuondo buanyi, neakuatshibue mu buteyi buanyi; nendue n andi ku Babulona, nemmulumbuluishileku bua ditomboka diandi diakantombokeleye
Nanku Maweja Nangila kuakuisha mpunde, webeja Balaame ne: Tshimvua muenze bua wewe kuntuuta misangu isatu ntshinyi
Bimuna biakadi bimita mafu ku mpala kua mitshi ei biakalela bana bakadi ne matoba

MALU lyrics Maalu katonda bakole Kutonda nkumba, kutonda ne balela Kutonda ntontodi wa nyingala pankatshi Udi kayi ne maalu ela munu mulu e Taatù wa kafwa, maamù wakaya kwabu Bana bakashala batangula ntàngu Taatù wanyì musumbi dya bilamba Muntu yônso udi ne maalu e Maamù wakafua, Taatù kutubenga Bana bakashala batangula ntàngu Maamù wanyì, mulami dya cisenga Muntu yônso udi ne maalu e Kusekiseki mwineba Maria Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Kabulu kwamba kusekiseki mwineba Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Maalu akudia ne akulwata Maalu a basanka ne makenge Maalu akulala ne kubika kwee Akwata baluma ne bakaji e Akwata babanji ne bapele Maalu akwata banfumu ba matunga Yoyoyo Kemayi Ngabilayi kwakalwa maalu Mulùme nganyi wa ditanta
Ndi njikija matandu abu
Kanulu kudi Yehowa ne mulambu wa bukula budi busangisha ne luevene, kanuoshi luevene anyi buitshi bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa
Kadi Petelo wakamba ne bulobo ne, Bikala bualu bunkuata bua kufua n ebe, tshiena nkuhidia
Kadi bakuabo bakadi Bena Kupulio ne Bena Kulene, hakafikabo ku Antiokia, bakabanga kuambila Bena Gelika kabidi lumu luimpe lua Mukelenge Yesu
Ndi ntshinka ne, Meme tshiena nshala kaba kakese ku nyima kua bapostolo badi batambe bonso bunene
Davidi wakatuma batentekedi, wakajingulula ne bulelela, Shaula wakalua
Yeye, mumane kubandishibua ku tshianza tshia balume tshia Nzambi, mumane kuangata mulayi wa Nyuma Muimpe kudi Tatu, wakuitshikisha bualu ebu bunudi numona ne bunudi nunvua
Joshua Yoshua wakabika ne dinda dionso; bakumuka ku Shitima, bakulua ku Yadene, yeye ne Bena Isalele bonso; bakalalaku diambedi kabayi banze kusabuka
Isalele wakabisha luendu luandi, wakashimika ntenta yandi ku nyima kua tshibumba tshinene tshia Ede
Ne bakulu makumi abidi ne banai ne bifukibue binai bidi ne muoyo bakahona hanshi, bakatendelela Nzambi udi ushikama mu nkuasa wa butumbi, bamba ne, Amen; Aleluya
Bualu bua haleba musangu muihi
Nuenu nudimuke; bua kanuena bamanye dituku dialua muena nsubu, ne ndilolo, ne mundankulu, ne mpasama tshitala tshiambedi, ne ndinda; bialueye lukasa, kalu kunusangana balale tulu
Yeye wakamba ne, Bakuatai ne muoyo
Yakobe katshivua umona bimpe to, bualu ukavua muntu mukole
Nunku nudikokeshe kudi Nzambi; kadi nukandamene diabolo ne yeye neanunyeme
Yeye wakabambila ne, Bualu bua bukole bua mitshima yenu Mose wakitabusha bua nuenu numushe bakashi benu; kadi ku tshibangidilu kakuakadi nunku
Nakatangila musoko wa tshijila, Yelushalema muhia muhia, uhueka muluhuke mu diulu kudi Nzambi, muikale mulongolola bimpe bu mukashi mulengeshela mulume wandi

Hakatangileye kakanu ka ku diulu ne nkanu ya ku maboko a muan abo mukashi, ne hakunvueye mei a Lebeka muan abo mukashi ne, Mulume au wakungambila nunku, yeye wakaya kudi mulume wakadi muimane ne tumelo hehi ne mushimi wa mai

Monai, muanjelo wakadi uyikila n anyi wakumuka, ne munga muanjelo wakalua kusangakena n andi; wakamuambila ne, Ya lubilu, ambila nsongalume eu ne, Yelushalema neikale ne bantu muomumue ne misoko idi kayiyi ne ngumbu, bualu bua bisumbu bivule bia bantu ne bia bimuna nebikalemu
Luta, Muena Moaba, wakambila Naomi ne, Anji kuitabusha bua meme kuya mu budimi bua undi mua kusangana luse ku mesu kuandi bua meme kuhumbululaku mpumbuluila Yeye wakamuambila ne, Yaku, muan anyi
Hakalela Nahô Tela, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu lukama ne dikumi ne tshitema, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Bu munuakadi bantu bedibue mulau munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu, nuenu Bena Yuda ne Bena Isalele, nunku ndi musue kunuhandisha, ne nenulue bantu badi basankisha bakuabo
Tshidi ne mudimu wa kufila ngenyi ne kwambulwisha mwa kupeta ngenyi idi itangila tshidiidi tshia kwenza ne idi itangila mêyi adi ditunga mwa kweela

Nunanukile mu ditendelela dienu nutabalamu ne disakidila; nutulombele kabidi mu tshikondo tshiotshimue bua Nzambi atunzuluile tshibi tshia dî bua tuetu kuamba bualu busokoka bua Kilisto, buakunsuikilabo mu nkanu kabidi, bua meme kubumanyisha bantu, bu mundi n abu mbua kubambila
Ahu binuatangila Muana wa muntu ubanda kuakadiye diambedi
Ha diba adi mene muyidi au wakaya ngandi ku nsubu kuandi
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Elanganai meji a bienzedi bienu
Bakamuambila ne, Mukelenge, Utuhe bidia ebi matuku onso

Nunku neusangane diakalengele ne lumu luimpe Eyemena Yehowa ne mutshima webe wonso, Umumanye yeye bimpe mu bienzedi biebe bionso, Kuikadi umena meji ku mesu kuebe wewe; Muanda eu neuvuishe kusangasha kudi mubidi Tumbisha Yehowa ne biuma biebe Nunku mayeba ebe neûle tente ne bintu bia bungi, Muan anyi, kuhetudi Bualu bua Yehowa udi ubela udiye munange, Disanka didi kudi mundi udi usangana lungenyi, Bualu bua kuheta kuau kudi kutamba kuheta kua argent Wowo adi ahita mabue a bilenga mushinga mukole; Dileha dia matuku a muoyo didi mu tshianza tshiau tshia balume; Nshila yau idi nshila ya disanka, Adi mutshi wa muoyo kudi badi bâkuata mu bianza; Yehowa wakafuka buloba ne meji andi; Bua lungenyi luandi mai male akahatuka, Muan anyi, malu â kaumuki ku mesu kuebe; Nunku nebikale muoyo ku mutshima Hashishe, newende mu nshila webe kuyi ne ditshina, Hawalala hanshi, kuena utshina; Kutshinyi buowa budi bulua kûdi lukasa, Bualu bua Yehowa neikale tshieyemenu tshiebe, Kuhadi bantu tshintu tshimpe, Kuambidi muena mutumba n ebe ne, Kuhangidisha bualu bubi bua kuenzela muena mutumba n ebe, Kufuilanganyi ne muntu hatuhu, Kuikadi ne muena tshimbambila mukau, Bualu bua Yehowa udi ukina muntu udi ne tshishiku, kadi bunyana Mulau wa Yehowa udi mu nsubu wa bantu babi, Udi ubuidia babuidi, Bena meji nebahiane butumbi, Proverbs Bana banyi balume, unvuai diyisha dia tatu, Bualu bua ndi nnulesha diyisha dimpe, Bualu bua nakadi muana mulume mulela kudi tatu wanyi, Tatu wakadi unyisha kabidi, wakadi ungambila ne, Heta meji, uhete biebe dijingulula dia mianda; Kualekedi nansha, ne wowo neakulame; Tshibangidilu tshia meji tshidi dî edi ne, Angata meji; Wabale bu tshintu tshia mushinga mukole, wowo neakubandishe; Nease tshitotola tshilengele ku mutu kuebe; Unvua, muan anyi, witabusha mei anyi, Nakukuyisha mua kuenda mu nshila wa meji, Hawenda, biendedi biebe kabiena bikandibue; Kuata diyisha bikole, kudilekedi nansha; Kubuedi mu nshila wa bantu babi nansha; Ehuka ku nshila au, kuhitshimu nansha; Bualu bua kabena balala tulu bikalabo kabayi benze bibi; Bualu bua badi badia bia kudia bia bubi, Kadi nshila wa bantu bakane udi bu diba dia kabundubundu, Nshila wa bantu babi udi bu mîdima mikole; Muan anyi, unvua mei anyi bimpe, Mei â kaumuki ku mesu kuebe; Bualu bua adi muoyo kudi badi bâheta, Ulame mutshima webe ne dilama dionso, Umusha mei a kusesuisha n au bakuabo mukana muebe, Mesu ebe atangile ku mpala kuebe, kâkenzakanyi, bilafinyi biebe bishale bitabala bitangila ku mpala
Nunku nuenu, bana banyi ba balume, unvuai dî dianyi, nuteleje matshu ku mei a mukana muanyi
Nengupule bilambuilu bienu bia manananshi

Yeye wakaha bonso bakamuitabusha bukole bua kuluabo bana ba Nzambi, bobo mene badi bitabusha dina diandi; bakadi kabai baledibue kudi mashi, anyi kudi disua dia mubidi, anyi kudi disungula dia muntu, kadi bakaledibua kudi Nzambi

Mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi Bua kulambula mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi, nuenze nunku: Anu bana ba Arone ba balume ke badi mua kuela bintu abi mulu, kumpala kua tshilambuilu, kubinyukula bua kubilambula Maweja Nangila
Hashishe Davidi wakamba ne, Kanuena mua kuenza nunku, bana betu, ne bintu biakatuha Yehowa, wakatusungila, wakafila tshisumbu tshia bantu tshiakulua kutuluisha mu bianza bietu
Wakudiumbuila majambu ha mukuna, wakadisongela muaba mu dibue bua yeye kulalamu
Yehowa wakambila Manashe ne bantu bandi dî diandi; kadi bobo bakamuhetula
Aba mbana ba balume ba Lakele bakaleleleye Yakoba buonso buabo dikumi ne banai
Obadiah Tshikena kumona tshia Obadaya
Bantu bakadi ku mutu kua Bena Isalele bakamona ne, Tudi ne tshilumbu tshikole Hakambabo ne, Katuena tuhuekesha bungi bua tushola butudi tulomba buatshia buatshia
Muntu webe udi mumanye mua kulabula bintu bidiye udia ne bidiye unua, anyi
Uye ne mitanda ya bidia dikumi, ne mikata ne mulondo wa buitshi; yeye neakuambile mualua muana eu
Kadi dî dia mukelenge diakahita mei a Yoaba ne tupitene tua masalayi bukole
Labana ne Betuele bakamba ne, Bualu ebu buakufuma kudi Yehowa, tuetu katuena mua kukuambila dî dibi anyi dî dimpe
Bualu bua ban a bute bonso ba mu Isalele mbanyi, ne ba bantu ne ba nyama, mu dituku dinakashiha ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu nakabajidila kundi
Nenuikale ne disanka bua bana banudi nulela, ne bua bintu bidi bidiunda mu buloba, ne bua kukumbasha kua nyama yenu ne bimuna bienu ne mikoko yenu
Ku nyima kua bualu ebu Yuda wa mu Galela wakabika mu matuku akadibo bafunda mena a bantu, wakalohesha bantu bakuabo ku nyima kuandi; yeye kabidi wakafua, bonso bakadi bamutumikila bakatangadishibua
Batuangaji badi mua kufika pabuipi nanyi, kadi bumushe mikiya
Bualu yeye ne mikiya, kabena mua kumunemeka to
Bua bualu buanyi, tshiena ngitabusha bua kuenzela Yehowa bibi bua kulekela kunulombela Nzambi; kadi meme nennuleshe nshila muimpe ne muakane
Nakunulomba bua kunsungila mu bianza bia muena lukuna, anyi
Nenubajingulule ku mamuma abo
Biasueye kumuhikula, yeye neasakidile tshituha tshitanu ha mutu ha mushinga wandi
Muntu yonso udi ulenga bulalu buandi tshianza neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale mukoya tô ne dilolo
Biwikala kuyi usokolola bualu buetu ebu hatuha Yehowa buloba, netukuenzele malu a luse ne a bushuwa
Butumbuke buvua metre umue ne desimetre itanu
Kubuelelangana kua mu nzubu kudibu bakandika Nulame mikenji yanyi bimpe
Yeye wakabebesha ne, Badi mua kuamba ne, Kilisto udi muana wa Davidi, munyi

Katuena bamanye mua kujingulula malu onso a Wa Bukole Buonso; Bua muanda eu bantu badi bamutshina; Yobo Hashishe, Yehowa wakandamuna Yobo dî dihatuka mu nvunde ne, Eu nganyi udi usokoka meji mu mîdima Suika mukaba webe mu tshimono bu muntu mulume; Wewe wakadi kudi kunyi hanakujadika bishimikidi bia buloba
Bakateka bakuidi mu bisumbu biabo ne Bena Lewi mu milongo yabo bua kukuatshilabo Nzambi mudimu mu nsubu udi mu Yelushalema, bu muakafundabo mu mukanda wa Mose
Mose wakaluhuka mu musoko kudi Palô, wakolola bianza biandi kudi Yehowa, ne makubakuba ne mabue a nvula biakashika, nvula kakamata ha buloba kabidi
Bakumuka ku Dishiba Dikunze, bakashikama mu tshihela tshia Sina

Nunku muntu wakadi ku mutu kua nsubu, ne wakadi ku mutu kua musoko ne bakulu bakadi badiundisha bana ba Ahaba, bakatumina Yehu dî ne, Tuetu tudi bantu bebe, netuenze bu mu dî diebe; katuena tudisunguila muntu bu mukelenge; enza muonso mûdi umona ne muimpe

Yehowa wakamba ne, Nengendeshe buimpe buanyi buonso ku mesu kuebe, nemmanyishe dina dianyi dia Yehowa ku mpala kuebe; nengikale ne dinanga kudi bantu bandi musue kuikala ne dinanga, nendeshe luse kudi bantu bandi musue kulesha luse
Nakanyunguluka, nakahueka ku mukuna, nakateka mabue mu mushete unakenza, adimu bu muakangambila Yehowa, Bena Isalele bakumuka ku Belota Bene yâkana, bakaya ku Mosela
Mukelenge wa Isalele wakambila bantu bandi ne, Nudi bamanye ne, Lamota gilada udi wetu ne tuetu tudi bashikame tshianana, katuena tûnyenga mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Sulia, anyi
Yeshaya Bandisha dî diebe bikole, kudikandi nansha, Kadi badi bakeba lungenyi kundi ku dituku ku dituku, Badi bakonka ne, Tuakajila bia kudia, kuakututangila munyi
Diba didi tufina, tuvua tupatuka, tupisha muntu awu mikiya, tujika, muntu awu udi ne bua kushala muindile matuku muanda mutekete bua mikiya yende kujika payi
Yeye wakabakoma nyima, wakadia, ne yeye wakatshinguluka kudibo, wakayikila n abo, wakakuata Shimeona, wakamusuika ku mesu kuabo
Luta Luta Udi Uhumbulula Bintu mu Budimi bua Boaza Naomi wakadi ne muikulu wa mu tshiota tshia bayandi, Elimeleke, muntu mukole ne mubanji, dina diandi Boaza
Yolama wakamuela nyima, wakanyema, wakambila Ahazaya ne, Ahazaya, kusonguela kudiku
Yosefe wakasangisha matete bu bungi bua nsenga ya kukala kua mai manene, akatamba bungi, yeye wakalekela kua bala, kabakamanya mua kuabala
Ikala ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima, bualu bua wewe neutahuluke bantu aba buhianyi bua buloba bunakalaya batatu abo bua kubahabu
Bualu ebu buakadi bumanyibua kudi bonso, ne Bena Yuda ne Bena Gelika, bakadi bashikama mu Efeso; buowa buakakuata buonso buabo, dina dia Mukelenge Yesu diakadi ditumbishibua
MUTU WA MUKANDA VI: Bidi bitangila bishimikidi bia ditwa nabi mungalata mpanda Kanungu ka Mbâsa Kasumbu kakese kadikadile komekela mianda ya Masungulangana Ditunga kadi kamanyika mu mêyi a ditunga
Nuenu basangane muanenu utata ne ngombe, nansha mpunde wende, mudishinde mutshibukile panshi mu njila, kanumulekedi utata nkayende
Kadi Maweja Nangila kubalejamu mudiye wa tshijila

Bantu aba mene kabidi bambe bualu bubi buakansanganabo n abu hanakimana ku mpala kua balumbuludi, anu dî edi dimue dinakela hanakimana munkatshi muabo ne, Badi bandumbuluisha ku mesu kuenu lelu bualu bua dibika dia bafue
Hashishe, yeye neakule n abo mu tshiji tshiandi, Meme hanyi nakujadika Mukelenge wanyi ha mutu ha Siona, mukuna wanyi wa tshijila
Tshisamba tshionsu tshia bena Izrayele tshivua ne dikunji diatshi
Bana betu, tangilai dibikidibua dienu ne, Kakuena ba bungi babikidibue badi bena meshi mu buntu buabo, kakuena ba bungi badi bakole, kakuena ba bungi badi baledibue bena butumbi
Bua udi bu kahia kadi mua kungosha tô ne ku Kubutuka; Bingikala muhetule tshilumbu tshia muhika wanyi mulume anyi mukashi, nunku, nengenze tshinyi habika Nzambi bua kundumbuluisha
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe kabidi ne: Teka tshianza pa tshiadi tshiebe
Nunku wakabikila muaba au ne, Sela hamalekota
Hashishe mukelenge Davidi wakamba ne, Umbikidile Betasheba

Paulo wakimana munkatshi mua Aleopago, wakamba ne, Bualu bua hanakadi mpita mu nshila, ntangila bintu binudi nutendelela, nakasangana kabidi tshioshelu tshiakadi ne dî difundaku ne, Nzambi wakafuka buloba ne bintu bionso bidihu, bualu bua yeye udi Mukelenge wa diulu ne buloba, katu wikala mu bitendelelu bidi bibaka ku bianza bia bantu

Neadisombuele kudi bantu badi kabai bamanye Nzambi ne kudi badi kabai batumikila lumu luimpe lua Mukelenge wetu Yesu; bobo aba nebahete dikenga, dibutuka dia tshiendelele mene, dia ku mesu kua Mukelenge ne ku butumbi bua bukole buandi, halueye bua kutumbishibua mu basanto bandi, ne bua kukemibua mu dituku diadia kudi bantu bonso bamane kumuitabusha bualu bua bumanyishi buetu kunudi buakitabushibua
Nunku dimukai, neuluke bu munakadi tshi mulekele tô bidimu bisatu bua kunudimusha muntu ne muntu butuku ne munya ne binsonshi ku mesu
Nunku bobo nebikale balumbuludi benu, Kadi bingikala ngumu sha bademon mu dina dia Nyuma wa Nzambi, bukelenge bua Nzambi buakumana kulua kunudi
Bena Isalele bonso ku Dana tô ne ku Bê sheba bakamanya ne Samuele wakadi mujadikibue bu muprofete wa Yehowa
Nunku bakalekela mifuba yandi ne mifuba ya muprofete wakafuma ku Samalea

Nzambi, Tatu wa Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto atumbishibue, wakatuvuidishila masanka onso a Nyuma mu miaba ya mu diulu mu Kilisto; bu muakatusunguleye munda muandi diambedi yeye kai muanze kufuka buloba, bua tuetu tuikale bantu ba tshijila badi kabai mua kubandibua ku mesu kuandi mu luse
Hashishe, wakabatumina muan andi, wakamba ne, Nebanemeke muan anyi
Kadi mukashi wakandamuna ne, Bulelela, Mukelenge; kadi mbua idi munshi mua mesa itu yadia nkototo idi bana bamatshisha hanshi

Muakuidi yonso udi wimana bulelela ku dituku ku dituku wenza mudimu wandi ne ufila ku musangu ku musangu milambu ya muomumue, yoyo mene idi kayi mua kumusha mibi tshiendelele; kadi yeye hakafueye mulambu umue bua mibi tshiendelele, wakashikama ku tshianza tshikole tshia Nzambi; ku musangu eu windila tô ne haluabo kuvuisha badi n andi lukuna ditanda dia munshi mua makasa andi

Lubena, Shimeona, Lewi ne Yuda, Yisakâ, Zebuluna ne Benyamina, Dana ne Nafatale, Gada ne Ashe Bantu bonso ba munda mua Yakoba bakadi makumi muanda mutekete, Yosefe wakadi mu Ejipitu diambedi Yosefe wakafua ne bana babo bonso, ne bantu bonso ba mulongo au Bena Isalele bakakumbana ba bungi, bakavulangana, bakalua bakole be, bakula mu buloba tente
Kadi nunemeke tshidimu tshia makumi atanu, tshia Mufikilu wa disanka dinene adi, bualu ntshia tshijila
Padi dituku dia muanda mukulu dikumbana, udi wangata nkudimba ibidi, nansha tumanda nkutshi tubidi, ubipeshila mutuangaji mu mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena, kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Wakuenza malu â onso a tshinyangu; nebamushihe bulelela; mashi andi neikale ham bidi handi
Kadi muntu mulume udibu kabayi bateke panshi, nebamuipate munkatshi mua bantu banyi, bualu kena munemeka ndondu wanyi to
Shaula wakatangila, wakajingulula ne Yehowa wakadi ne Davidi; Mikala, muana mukashi wa Shaula, wakamunanga
Muntu nealuhuke kudi Yakoba, neikale ne bukelenge butambe, neashihe tshituha tshia bantu badi bashala mu musoko
Dî edi ndilelela ne, Munga udi ukuna, munga udi unowa

Nakela mukenji mukuabo kabidi ne, Yonso udi ukudimuna dî edi, batule dibaya dinene dia ku nsubu wandi, bamuoweleku, muasa ku dibaya; bavuishe nsubu wandi bu diala bua bualu ebu; Nzambi nguakajadikishaku dina diandi abutule hakelenge bonso ne bantu bonso badi bolola bianza biabo bua kukudimunabo bualu ebu ne bua kuhaulabo nsubu eu wa Nzambi udi mu Yelushalema

Ku dituku dia makumi abidi ne asatu dia mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete yeye wakatuma bantu kuabo ku nsubu yabo ya ntenta, bakadi ne disanka dinene mu mitshima yabo, bua buimpe buakalesha Yehowa Davidi ne Solomo ne Bena Isalele, bantu bandi
Lumbilai bienu nunku, bua nuenu nuangate bukenshi
Kuinyikabu mayi a lubuebue alu ne: mayi a Meriba mayi a matandu, bualu bena Izrayele bavua batandangane ne Maweja Nangila
Ne bantu banene ne bantu bahuekele nebafue mu buloba ebu; kabena bajikibua, bakuabo kabena babajinga anyi baditaha mputa bualu buabo, anyi badibeya nsuki bualu buabo
Hakadiye uhita, wakamona Lewi muana wa Alafayo mushikame ku tshilambuidi, wakamuambila ne, Undonde
Hakavuishibueye ne buakane buonso, yeye wakalua muenzeshi wa luhandu lua tshiendelele kudi bonso badi bamutumikila; wakidikibua kudi Nzambi muakuidi mimene wa ku mulongo wa Melekisedeke
Nakamba mu mutshima wanyi ne, Nzambi udi wenzela bana ba bantu nunku bua kubateta ne bua bobo badimanye ne, Tuetu tudi anu bu nyama
Yelemiya Sedekiya wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne tshimue hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha bidimu dikumi ne tshimue mu Yelushalema
Yeye wakabambila ne, E, ndi mumanye, nuanji kuhuwa
; bena Merari bavua
Nunku Davidi ne bakulu ba mu Isalele ne tupitene tua binunu bia bantu bakaya bua kuangatabo mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa ku nsubu wa Obeda edome ne disanka dinene

Bualu bua musangu wakamana kuleha unuakadi kuikala bayishi, kadi nudi ne bualu kabidi bua bakuabo banuyishe nuenu mayisha a kumudilu a tshibangidilu tshia mei mamba kudi Nzambi; ne nuakulua bu badi ne mabele bualu, kanuena bu badi ne bia kudia bikole bualu
Kadi dî diakufuma mulu tshiakabidi ne, Kivuishi tshidi tshilengesha kudi Nzambi ne, Ntshianana
Mai akatamba, akavulangana a bungi ha buloba, ne buatu buakabanda ha mutu ha mai
Bena mudimu ne tuhalai bakadi bimaneku, bamane kutemesha kahia ka makala, bualu bua mashika; bakadi bota, kahia; Petelo kabidi wakadi n abo, muimane wota kahia
Bule bua mukeluba umue buakadi coudées dikumi, ne bule bua mukuabo buakadi muomumue

Deuteronomy Biabika muprofete anyi mulotshi wa bilota munkatshi muenu, udi unulesha tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema; ne hashikisheye tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema bua kunubikila ne, Tuye, tulonde nzambi mikuabo mudi kanuyi bamanye, tuyenzele mudimu; kanunvu mei a muprofete au, anyi mulotshi au wa bilota; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munutete, bua kumanya ne, Nudi basue Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne muoyo wenu wonso
Kanuena bamanye mua kukuatshila Nzambi mudimu ne Mamona diakamue
Hakabadimusha Nzambi mu tshilota ne, Kanuhinganyi kudi Helode, bakaya kuabo mu munga nshila
Nunku muena tshiota wakambila Boaza ne, Udisumbiletshi Yeye wakumusha tshisabata tshiandi

Kanungu ka : Ku bukookeshi bwa baminisitila badibo batwa mu nyima, baminisitila bindonda badi bakumbaja makookeshi adibo babapeesha kudi olodonase udi utangila bulongolodi ne ngenzelu wa mudimu wa Bukalenga bunene
Bakelenge Nsubu Mikuabo ya Solomo Solomo wakibaka nsubu wandi; hakaleha bidimu dikumi ne bisatu, wakamana nsubu wandi mujima
Bakidikisha bujitu bua bituha bia mpalata makumi asatu, bakamuhabi

dienza dia ndongamu ya mianda ya madimi ne ya meetu ne diilonda bu mudibio mu mikenji ya ndongamu wa ditunga, diteeka dia beena midimu wa budimi, dia beena mudimu bashindame bu mudibio mu bulongolodi bwa mukanda wa beena mudimu bashindame ba mbulamatadi, dilonda dia mêyi ne mikandu ya ditunga idi itangila mianda ya madimi, ya meetu, ya ditwa buluwa ne ya diloba pamwe ne ya miaba idi bantu basombela, ya dilamina bia pa buloba ne dikwata dia nyama ya diitu, dilongolola ne dilondesha dia mivu ya bia pa madimi, ditwa dia mishinga ya bia pa madimi;
Numanye bienu ne, Yehowa udi Nzambi
Kadi bilumbu binene bavua baye nabi kudi Moshe

Nsongakashi eu wakasankisha mutshima wandi, yeye wakasangana luse ku mesu kuandi; yeye wakamuha bintu bia kumulengesha n abi lubilu ne bansongakashi muanda mutekete basungula mu nsubu wa mukelenge bua kumukuatshila mudimu; yeye wakamuladika ne bansongakashi bandi muanda mutekete mu muaba wakatamba buakane mu nsubu wa bakashi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Angata Alona ne bana bandi balume badi n andi ne bilulu ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu ne mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne bimpanga bibidi ne tshisaka tshia mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, ubikile bantu bonso ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusangakena
Mulau ulualua kunudi; bualu bua nuenu nutu nûvua ha nyima ha luhanza ne dilonga, kadi munda muabi mudi bunyengi ne mudi
Deuteronomy Binuatangila nansha ngombe nansha mukoko bia mukuenu bihambuka, kusokoki bualu ebu kudiye, kadi ubihingashe kudi mukuenu
Nenshimike nsubu wanyi wa tshitendelelu munkatshi muenu, mutshima wanyi kawena wikala ne tshiji kunudi
Bantu bavua amu bimane kumpala kuende too ne ku dilolu
Acts Mu Ikonio bakabuela diakamue mu nsunagoga wa Bena Yuda, bakambila bantu dî diakitabushisha ba bungi, Bena Yuda ne Bena Gelika

Kudi Bayuda nakalua Muyuda, bua meme kuheta mioyo ya Bayuda; kudi bakadi ku nyima kua mikenshi nakalua ku nyima kua mikenshi, meme hanyi tshî muikale ku nyima kua mikenshi, bua meme kuheta mioyo ya bakadi ku nyima kua mikenshi
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nenteke Nyuma wanyi munda muenu, nenuikale ne muoyo, nennuteke mu buloba buenu mene; nenumanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa
Nunku mukelenge kakunvua dî dia bantu; bua bualu ebu buakafuma kudi Nzambi bua kujadika dî dia Yehowa diakambileye Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, mukana mua Ahiya, Muena Shiloa
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nutunte, nuye n andi kudi udi ha mutu ha dibanji
Ku mutu kua tshituha etshi tshidi tshihite bukese tô ne ku tshituha tshia ha mutu hatshi tshidi tshihite bunene kuikale coudées inai, butshiama buatshi buikale coudée umue
Hakatshiabu bantu bakaya mu tshisuku, bakambila Abimeleke bualu ebu
Mukelenge alue biandi
Muntu muase nzubu, kakulalamu to
Nsongalume wakadiku, wakaya lubilu, wakamanyisha Mose ne, Eladada ne Medada badi bamba dî dia Nzambi mu tshitudilu

Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Nakunvua kulomba kuebe ne kutendekena kuebe kuwakuntendelela n aku; nakajidila nsubu eu uwakungashila bua kutekamu dina dianyi tshiendelele; mesu anyi ne mutshima wanyi nebikaleku tshiendelele

E, ndi ndomba wewe kabidi, muenu n anyi ku mutshi wa tshikokedi wa bushua, bua wewe ukuatshishangane ne bakashi aba, bualu bua bobo bakenza n anyi mudimu wa lumu luimpe, ne Kulemento kabidi ne bakuabo benji n anyi ba mudimu, badi ne mena abo mafunda mu mukanda wa muoyo

Davidi wakanyingalala bikole; bualu bua bantu bakadi bahunga dî bua kumukuma mabue; mitshima ya buonso buabo yakanyingalala bua bana babo balume ne bana babo bakashi; kadi Davidi wakadikolesha mu Yehowa, Nzambi wandi
Ku luseke luandi lukuabo bakasa kudi Hatusha, muana wa Hashabaneya
Solomo wakafilaku tshinunu tshia milambu ya kuosha ha tshioshelu atshi
Hakalua Yesu, wakamusangana mumane kulala mu lukita matuku anai
Mukelenge Sedekiya wakambila Yelemiya ne, Ndi ntshina Bena Yuda bakubuela ku luseke lua Bena Kasada, bua tshifidibu mu bianza biabo, ne bua bobo kabantshimbishi
Bualu bua udi ubadibue munkatshi mua badi ne muoyo udi ne ditekemena; bualu bua mbua udi ne muoyo udi uhita nyama wa ntambue mufue
Nunku muntu udi wakula muaku udi bantu kabai bamanye, alombe Nzambi bua yeye amanye mua kubajinguluila muaku
Musoko eu udi ne bualu bua kulua bikulu bua tshinyi
Nennutumine tshiole ne nyama ya luonji, nebinyenge bana benu kunudi; tshihuhu ne mashi nebihitshile munkatshi muenu; nenvuishe muele wa nvita ham bidi henu
Bienzeke nanku

Nzambi wa Isalele wakamba, dibue dia Isalele diakangambila ne, Udi ukokesha bantu ne buimpe, udi ukokesha mu ditshina dia Nzambi, neikale bu munya wa misasa habanda diba, mbu dinda didi kadiyi ne matutu kulu, hamena mashinde a lutende ha buloba, hakenka diba hakumuka nvula
Tshidi tshintu tshiakunuambila Yehowa ne, Muntu ne muntu adisangishilebi mudiye mua kudia, tshihiminu ku muntu ne muntu, muntu ne muntu adisangishilebi bu bungi bua bantu ba mu ntenta wandi
Bana ba balume ba Pelese: Heselona ne Hamula
Ba bungi bakashihibua bualu bua nvita ei yakadi ya Nzambi
Anu nuenu nenusabuke musulu ewu, bua kukuata ditunga dimpe, didi dishiya dia musulu ewu
Yesu wakabambila ne, Bakenzela bantu dituku dia Lumingu, kabakenzela dituku dia Lumingu bantu; nunku Muana wa muntu udi mukelenge wa dituku dia Lumingu
Bena Isalele ne Bena Peleshete bakela mualu wa nvita, mulongo ne mulongo
Bakalua n andi ku muaba, dina diau Gologota, kukudimuna kua muaku ne, Muaba wa Kabalubalu ka mutu
Bena Izrayele kunanukila bikole, bamba ne: Nutulekele, tupite ne njila
Amu kutuadija pa diba adi, mukaji awu kena kabidi ne mikiya ya buvyele to
Ke mumvua mudinyoke
Nzambi wakabiteka mulu mua diulu bua kutokeshayi buloba, ne bua kukokeshayi mu munya ne butuku, ne bua kutahululayi munya kudi midima, Nzambi wakabimona ne, Mbimpe
Ne hatekabo bintu bionso munshi muandi, hashishe, Muana muine kabidi neatekibue munshi mua Tatu wakateka bintu bionso munshi muandi, bua Nzambi kuikala ku mutu kua bionso ne mu bintu bionso
Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Bakuabo badi bimana aha kabena bafua tô ne hamonabo Muana wa muntu ulua mu bukelenge buandi
Yeye wakamba kabidi ne, Monai, nakunvua lumu ne, Bintu bia kudia biakashala mu Ejipitu, yai bienu kuakua, nutusumbileku bia kudia, bua tuetu tuhanduke, katufu

Ba mu buloba abu nebase madilu, diku dionso ha buadi: ba mu diku dia tshiota tshia Davidi ha buabo, ne bakashi babo ha buabo; ba mu diku dia tshiota tshia Natana ha buabo, ne bakashi babo ha buabo; ba mu diku dia Bena Lewi ha buabo, ne bakashi babo ha buabo; ba mu diku dia Bena Shimei ha buabo, ne bakashi babo ha buabo; ne ba mu meku onso adi ashala, ba mu diku dionso ha buabo, ne bakashi babo ha buabo
Mukelenge Helode wakunvua lumu lua Yesu, bualu bua dina diandi diakamanyibua; wakamba biandi ne, Yone Mubatiji wakubika ku lufu, bua bualu ebu malu a kukema adi enjibua kudiye
Hashishe mukelenge Yoasha wakabikila Yehoyada ne bakuidi bakuabo bakadi n andi, wakabebesha ne, Bualu kai kanuena nulongolola miaba ei mishimbuke mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Aba banai bakaledibua mu Gata kudi bantu bale ba nfiondo, bakashihibua ku bianza bia Davidi ne bia bantu bandi
Leviticus Yehowa wakayikila ne Mose ku nyima kua lufu lua bana balume ba Alona hakaluabo ku mpala kua Yehowa ne hakafuabo

Kadi Muena Samalea wakadi ulua mu nshila, wakalua kudiye; hakamumoneye, luse luakamukuata, wakalua kudiye, wakamujingila tshilulu ha mputa, wakelabu manyi ne nvinyo; wakamushikika ha nyima ha nyama wandi, wakalua n andi ku nsubu wa tshilala benyi, wakamulama bimpe
Hakabuela bamessager mu nsubu, bakatangila luhingu mu bulalu ne musamu wa miosa ya mbushi ku mutu kualu
Bua muanda au mukelenge Beleshasâ wakakuatshika buowa bikole, mpala wandi wakandamuka, ne mitshima ya milono yandi yakalubakana
Mishindu ya bihedi idiku, kadi Nyuma udi anu muomumue
Nunku mukashi wakabika, wakaya mu nshila wandi, wakadia bidia; mutshima wandi kawakadi unyingalala kabidi
Ditutu dia mu munya diakadi ne dinkenke butuku kadiakumuka ku mpala kua bantu
Ha mutu ha malu au onso adi ham bidi, ku dituku ku dituku mutshima wanyi udi unema bujitu bua ntatu ya bena ekelesia bonso

Wakaya n anyi mu Nyuma ku mukuna mimene ne mule, wakandesha musoko wa tshijila, Yelushalema, uhueka hanshi, uluhuka mu diulu kudi Nzambi, muikale ne butumbi bua Nzambi; ne dinkenka diau diakafuana dibue dia mushinga mutambe bukole, bu dibue dia yasape, ditoke tô bu ntalatala

Kadi baminyampala ba Bena Peleshete bakadi n andi tshiji, baminyampala ba Bena Peleshete bakamuambila ne, Hingasha muntu au ku muaba wandi uwakamuha, kayi biandi n etu mu nvita ei bua yeye kandamuki muena lukuna wetu
Hakakenzakana Yesu, wakambila bayidi bandi ne, Ha kubuela kua bantu badi ne bintu bia bungi mu bukelenge bua Nzambi mbualu bukole

Hebrews Bualu bua mikenshi ya Mose mikale ne mindidimbi ya bintu bimpe bilualua, kayi mikale tshifuanyikishi mene tshia bintu ebi, tshiendelele kayena mua kuvuisha badi basemena ba buibi ne Nzambi bakane tshishiki ne milambu ya muomumue ya ku tshidimu ku tshidimu, idibo bafila misangu yonso
Tshilambuilu atshi, tshivua ne santimetre makumi atanu mu nseke yatshi yonsu
Nuenu benze nanku, nudi nusankisha Maweja Nangila
Nenku nebitabe mushinga udiye mutue
Bonso badi bajingulula bantu miaku, anyi

Nakadi bu mesu kudi bantu bafofo, Nakadi bu tatu kudi bakengi, Nakatshibula menu a ku tshinyanganyanga a muntu mubi, Hashishe, nakamba ne, Nenfuile mu nsubu muanyi; muji wanyi udi ulamba tô ne ku mai, butumbi buanyi budi buhia buhia munda muanyi, Bantu bakateleja matshu abo kundi, bakindila di dianyi, bakahuwa talalâ bua kunvua lungenyi luanyi
Balume aba babidi bakahueka bafume ku mikuna, bakasabuka musulu, bakatua kudi Yoshua, muana wa Nuna; bakamuambila malu onso akabakuata
Mvula kukamuka, makubakuba ne mabue a mvula kujika
Wakamana nsubu nunku
Bakashala Palô misoko ya kutekelamu bintu biandi, mena ai Pitoma ne Lamesese
Mu disuminyina kanuikadi bashanguluki; nuikale ne lukunukunu mu mitshima yenu; nukuatshile Nzambi mudimu

Solomo wakabala bantu binunu makumi muanda mutekete bua kutualabo majitu, ne binunu makumi muanda mukulu bua kutahabo mitshi ku mikuna, ne tuhita binunu bisatu ne nkama isambombo bua kuikalatu ku mutu kuabo

Buonso buabi binai biakadi ne mpala yabi ne mahuahua abi nunku: mahuahua abi akadi matuangane, dihuahua dimue dituangane ne dihuahua dikuabo; mpala yabi kayakandamuka hakadibi biya, kadi tshifukibue ne tshifukibue tshiakaya ku mpala mu nshila mululame
Hakunvua Yesu dî diabo, yeye wakamba ne, Badi ne bukole kabena ne muondahi bualu, anu badi ne mabedi
Isaka wakatuma Yakoba yeye wakaya ku Padana alama kudi Labana muana wa Betuele, Muena Alama muan abo wa balume ne Lebeka, mamu wa Yakoba ne Esau
Nunku bua bualu ebu ndi nuambila lelu ne, Ndi mbingishibua ku mashi a bantu bonso
Ei idi ndelanganyi ya Esau, nkambua wa Bena Edome ba mu mukuna wa Sei
Hashishe Ahazaya, muana wa Ahaba, wakambila Yehoshafata ne, Mbimpe bua bantu banyi baye ne bantu bebe mu matu
Muntu wakalua, mutuma kudi Nzambi, dina diandi Yone
Bonso badi Tatu umpa nebalue kundi; tshiena ngihata walua kundi
Umupeshe munyinyi awu
Hakafika Uliya kudiye, Davidi wakamukonka bualu bua Yoaba ne bua bantu ne bua nvita
Samuel Ku nyima kua bualu ebu Abashaloma wakadilongoluela dikalu ne tubalu ne bantu makumi atanu bua kuyabo ku mpala kuandi
Bakalua kudiye ne muntu wakadi ne mahaha, wakadi kabidi ne tshikukumina; bakamutendekena ne, Umulenge tshianza
Yakobe kuamba ne: Ndi nginyika muaba ewu dina ne: Penuyele, mpala wa Mvidi Mukulu, bualu ndi mumonangane ne Mvidi Mukulu mpala ne mpala, meme kushala ne muoyi
Bualu bukuabo, budiye n abu mbua kuikala ne lumu luimpe kudi badi kabai munkatshi mua bena ditabusha; bua kahonyi biandi mu malu adi avuisha bihendu ne mu buteyi bua diabolo
Yehoyakina wakadi ne bidimu dikumi ne muanda mukulu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema ngondo isatu ne matuku dikumi; Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa
Muntu kai wa munkatshi muenu, bikaleye utamba kuelangana meshi, udi mumanye mua kubinga ku bule buandi nkubita Nudi nutamba kuelangana meshi a bilulu tshinyi

Mu ngondo wa kumudilu, ngondo wa Nisana mene, mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne bibidi tshia bukelenge bua mukelenge Ahashawelosha bakadi bela Pû, eu nnshobo mene, ku mesu kua Hamana ku dituku ku dituku ne ku ngondo ku ngondo tô ne ku ngondo wa dikumi ne ibidi udi ngondo wa Ada mene
Bobo nebabutahulule bituha muanda mutekete; Bena Yuda nebashikame mu tshituha tshiabo ku sude, ne Bena Yosefe nebashikame mu tshituha tshiabo ku nôde

Ka Yehowa wakamba ne, Bitendelelu bia Isaka bia ha mikuna nebibutudibue; Hashishe, Amasaya, muakuidi wa ku Betele, wakatumina Yalobama, mukelenge wa Isalele, dî ne, Amosa wakulelela tshifufu tshibi munkatshi mua tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele; buloba kabuena mua kulama mei andi onso

Dî dia muadi wa balami, Mpangu ya mikoko yakadi ne ditalala yakunyanguka Yeye wakulekela tshisokomenu tshiandi bu mudi nyama wa ntambue wenza; Jeremiah Ku tshibangidilu tshia bukokeshi bua Yehoyakima, muana wa Yoshiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, dî edi dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Imana biebe mu tshiendelu tshia mu nsubu wa Yehowa, wambile ba mu misoko yonso ya mu Yuda badi balua kutendelela mu nsubu wa Yehowa mei onso andi nkuambila; kukosolodi dî dimue nansha
Yeye utshidi wanyi meme

Mu nseke yonso ya bukelenge bundi nkokesha, bantu bazakale, bikale ne ditshina ku mpala kua Nzambi wa Danyele; Yeye udi ubandisha, udi usungila, Nunku Danyele wakadi ne diakalengele mu matuku a bukokeshi bua Dayawesha ne mu bukokeshi bua Kolesha, Muena Pelasa
Yeye wakahingisha bintu biakajidila tatu wandi ne bintu biakajidileye kabidi, bintu bia argent ne bia or ne malonga makuabo mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Udi mua kubala bungi bua matutu ku meji andi nganyi
Mukelenge wa Ejipitu wakahingisha muan abo Eleyakima mu bukelenge bua Yuda ne Yelushalema; wakamuidika dina ne Yehoyakima
Bu munuakadi bantu bedibue mulau munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu, nuenu Bena Yuda ne Bena Isalele, nunku ndi musue kunuhandisha, ne nenulue bantu badi basankisha bakuabo
Kabena mua kutshishintakaja ne tshimuna tshikuabu, nansha tshikale tshimpe tshipite, nansha tshikale tshishadile ku buimpe
Nudi bafike ne bimuna bienu ne bintu bienu bionsu
Kadi Nebuzaladana, kapitene ka bansentedi, wakashiya bantu bahele bakadi kabayi ne tshintu mu buloba bua Yuda, ne wakabaha madimi a tumuma tua nvinyo ne madimi makuabo diatshimue
Katuena tunua mayi a mu ditunga dienu
Kabuena buikala tshieyemenu kudi Bena Isalele kabidi, tshivulukidi tshia bubi buabo, hahinganabo bua kubakeba; nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Mukelenge Yehowa
Bua muntu kena Muena Yuda anu bua mubidi wandi; ditengula dia mubidi nkayau kadiena ditengula dilelela
Bakafunda bifuanyikishi bia tumuma tukese tua grenade ne buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû kuinshi kua tshikowelu tshionso
Diba diakadi munda munya
Kadi Abashaloma wakatuma batentekedi ku bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele, benda bamba ne, Hanunvua dî dia mpungi, nenuambe ne, Abashaloma udi mukelenge mu Hebelone
Wakatuangana mishiku ne bana babo bonso, wakadidila ku nshingu yabo, hashishe bana babo bakayikila n andi
Ndi mukumanye, wewe udi Wa Tshijila wa Nzambi
Wakatshitulula, wakatshijingila tshilulu tshia line, wakamuladika mu lukita lumbula mu dibue, muakadi kamui tshitalu diambedi
Yeye wakamulelela Zimelana ne Yokeshana ne Medana ne Midiyana ne Yishebaka ne Shua
Mukelenge neampandishe ku midimu yabo yonso idi mibi, neansungile tô ne ku bukelenge buandi bua mu diulu; butumbi buikale kudiye ku bikondo ne ku bikondo
Nunku bobo nebadile kundi, ne tshiena mbunvuila
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neateke milau ei yonso ham bidi ha bena lukuna ne badi n enu tshiji, bakadi banukengesha

Yehowa wakatuhatula mu Ejipitu ne tshianza tshikole ne diboko diandi diolola ne malu makole ne bimanyinu ne malu a dikema; wakalua n etu mu muaba eu, wakatuha buloba ebu, buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Hashishe tuakebesha bakulu aba ne, Wakanuelela mukenji bua nuenu nuase nsubu eu ne bua nuenu numane lumbu elu nganyi
Bakenza nunku ku dituku ku dituku, bakasangisha argent ya bungi
Nunku mukelenge wakafua bu mu dî dia Yehowa diakamba Eliya
Usuike makopa makuabu makumi atanu ku mibangu ya luseke lukuabu
Kadi uhidie nsumuinu ya malu a hatuhu a bakashi bakulukashi
Mesu abo akabuluka
Ba Hemana, bana ba Hemana: Bukia, Matanaya, Uziele, Shebuele ne Yelimota, Hananya, Hanani, Eliata, Gidaleti ne Lomameti ezê, Yoshebe kasha, Maloti, Hotî, Mahaziota

Kanubueshi muntu mukuabo mu nsubu wa Yehowa mene, anu bakuidi ne Bena Lewi badi ne mudimu wabo; bobo nebabuele bualu bua bobo badi bantu ba tshijila; kadi bantu bonso bakuabo batumikile mukenji wa Yehowa
Katataka wewe udi wamba ne, Ya, wambile mukelenge webe ne, Mona, Eliya udiku
Hakaluabo n abo, bakabateka ku mpala kua balumbuludi
Mafuta a kuela mu muendu Ubikile bena Izrayele, bakutuadile mafuta mapiamapia a kuela mu muendu, bua wikale utema matuku onsu dilolu
Alukilai, kudimunai mitshima yenu bua kulekela malu mabi enu, bua bubi buenu kabuikadi bu tshilenduishi kunudi
Wewe newoshe tshimpanga tshijima ha tshioshelu, tshidi mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa, udi utua dihembu, udibo boshila Yehowa ha kahia
Wakantumina manyi ku tshioshelu misangu muanda mutekete ne ku malonga atshi onso ne ku tshiowelu ne ku tshitaku tshiatshi bua kubijidila
Mvidi Mukulu neavuluke ndondu wende Kadi badi bashala ne muoyi abu, nebashishe kujadika muvuabu bangenzele bibi bitambe, ne mudibu, bobu ne bankambua babu, bantombokela
Luke Disanka dia bidia bidi kabi ne luevene diakadi ba buibi, badi badibikila ne, Kuhita kua Yehowa
Kanubeyi nsuki yenu biketu, kanuhungi miedi yenu ku bihanga
Shaula ne Bena Isalele bakadisangisha, bakadi ne tshitudilu tshiabo mu tshibanda tshia Ela; bakela mualu wa nvita ku mpala kua Bena Peleshete
Mefibosheta wakadi ne muana wa balume, nsongalume, dina diandi Mika
Bantu bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi ne nkama ibidi
Elishure, muana wa Shedeyure, ke uvua ulombola bena Rubene
Kadi batuangaji ne bantu bonsu kababandi ku mukuna kundi to
Bantu bakadi bahitaku bakatangila tshitalu tshiandi mu nshila ne nyama wa ntambue muimane ha buihi n atshi; bakamba bualu ebu mu musoko muakadi muprofete mununu mushikame
Nakabanduluka, nakatangila, ekumona, tshimpanga tshiakadi ne nsengu ibidi tshiakimana ku muelelu wa musulu

Bualu kai nuenu nuakunkuatshisha tshiji ku bintu binudi nuenza ne bianza bienu, hanuoshila nzambi mikuabo musenga wa manananshi mu buloba bua Ejipitu, munuakuya bua kushikama; bua nuenu kudifuisha ne bua kudivuisha tshintu tshidibo bahenda ne bahetula munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bia ha buloba

Makenga â akunukuata, atudi tumona lelu, bualu bua nuakuoshila nzambi mikuabo musenga wa manananshi, ne nuakuenzela Yehowa bibi, kanuakutumikila dî dia Yehowa, kanuakuenda mu mikenji yandi, mu mei andi majalame ne mu mikenji idi ilesha bu mudiye
Yozefe kuya kujika tatuende

Thessalonians Tshiashadidi mpindiu, bana betu, nutulombele Nzambi, bua dî dia Mukelenge diendakane ne ditumbishibue, bu mudidi munkatshi muenu kabidi; ne bua tuetu tuhanduke mu bianza bia bena tshinyangu ne bantu babi; bualu bua bonso kabena ne ditabusha
Meme mene nakenza bualu ebu bubi; kadi mikoko ei, yoyi yakenza tshinyi
Edi ndikonka dia Yehowa wa misumba
Nunku newikale tshimanyinu kudibo; ne bobo nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa

nuenu badi bimane mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Tumbishai Yehowa, bua Yehowa udi muimpe; Bua Yehowa wakudisunguila Bualu bua ndi mumanye ne, Yehowa udi munene, Yehowa wakenza malu onso akasueye kuenza, Yeye udi ubandisha Yeye wakashiha ban a bute ba mu Ejipitu, Yeye wakatuma bimanyinu ne malu a kukema Yeye wakabutula bisamba bia bantu bia bungi, Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, Wakahesha bantu bandi bukole buabo bu buhianyi, Yehowa, dina diebe didiku tô ne tshiendelele; Bualu hua Yehowa nealumbuluile bantu bandi ne kulumbulula kuakane, Mpingu Idi ne mukana, kadi kayena yakula; Idi ne matshu, kadi kayena yunvua; Badi bayenza badi bafuanangana n ai; Nuenu Bena Isalele, nuvudishile Yehowa disanka
Yoshua wakabashiha ku Kadeshe bânea tô ne ku Gaza, ne ba mu buloba buonso bua Goshena tô ne ku Gibeona
Wewe neukole ukulakaja, ufua ne disanka ne ditalala, ulonda bankambua bebe

Hakahita matuku asatu, ne bobo bakadi ne kusama, bana ba balume ba Yakoba babidi, Shimeona ne Lewi, bana babo ne Dina, bakangata muntu muele Wandi wa nvita muntu muele wandi wa nvita, bakalua ku musoko ne mitshima ya dikima, bakashiha balume bonso
Mose wakavula Alona bilulu biandi, wakabiluatshisha Eleazâ, muan andi mulume, ne Alona wakafua biandi ha mutu ha mukuna, ne Mose ne Eleazâ bakahueka mu tshibanda
Bena mudimu ne tuhalai bakadi bimaneku, bamane kutemesha kahia ka makala, bualu bua mashika; bakadi bota, kahia; Petelo kabidi wakadi n abo, muimane wota kahia
Yeye udi Dibue; mudimu wandi wonso udi muakane, bualu bua nshila yandi yonso idi milulame: Nzambi wa kalolo udi kayi ne bubi, udi ne malu makane a bushuwa
Bidimu bia Kenaane bidi nkama tshitema ne dikumi
Muntu yonso udi ushikama ha tshintu tshiashikameye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Samuele wakakonka Yishai ne, Bana bebe bonso badiku, anyi
Nebanutumine munyinyi, bualu Maweja Nangila mumvue miadi yenu ne: Udi mua kutupesha munyinyi nnganyi
Samuel Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakatemena Bena Isalele kabidi, wakenzesha Davidi bualu buabo, wamba ne, Ya, bala bungi bua Bena Isalele ne bua Bena Yuda
Tatuende muenu umona bionsu bivua Moshe wenzela bantu, kukonkaye Moshe ne: Udi wenza mudimu anu nkayebe bua tshinyi
Hakajileye bia kudia minya makumi anai ne mafuku makumi anai, wakadi ne nsala
Nanku Maweja Nangila kunyingalala bua muntu uvuaye mufuke, muteke pa buloba
Kadi, matamba onsu ne mapu, bikale anu bilamakane, kabidi bienza ne tshiamu tshia mpawungi nkayatshi
Munkatshi muabo muakadi muntu mukuabo muluate bivualu bia lin, muikale ne kalondo ka mai a mukanda ka mufundi kasuika mu tshifuka tshiandi
Yeye wakandamuna ne, Hakadiye muana
Misangu mikuabu nudi mua kudikonka ne: Mmushindu kayi utudi mua kumanya ne: bualu ebu kabuena bufuma kudi Maweja Nangila
Hakabeleye muoyo, wakabalondela bualu ne bualu akenza Nzambi munkatshi mua bisamba bia bende ku mudimu wandi
Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nempingane ku Yelushalema ne luse; nebasemu nsubu wanyi kabidi
Uteke makombu aa mu ntenta wa kusambakena, kumpala kua mushete wa ndondu, muaba undi ndileja kunudi
Kabikadi ne buhianyi, bualu bua meme ndi buhianyi buabo; kanubahi luhetu mu Isalele, bualu bua meme ndi luhetu luabo
Umpe bakashi banyi ne bana banyi, banakakukuatshila mudimu, undekele, nenye, bualu bua wewe udi mumanye mudimu unakukuenzela
Bena Moaba bakalua bahika ba Davidi, bakamulambula milambu
Balunda bebe badi bakuela muoyo

Habuela bakuidi mu muaba wa tshijila wa mu ntempelo, kababatukimu bua kubuela mu tshiendelu tshia ha mbelu diambedi kabayi banze kutekamu bilulu biakadibo baluata hakadibo benza mudimu wabo, bua bidi bia tshijila; badi ne bua kuluata bilulu bikuabo, hashishe badi bamanye mua kubuela mu luseke lua ntempelo ludi bantu bakuabo bamanye mua kubuela
Alona wakolola tshianza tshiandi ku mutu kua mai a mu Ejipitu, biula biakabaha, biakûsha buloba bua Ejipitu tente
Bua wewe udi wamba ne, Diyisha dianyi didi diakane, Kadi nakadi kusua bua Nzambi ambe dî diandi, ne bua yeye akuleshe malu masokoka a mu meji andi
Hakahidieye kuitabusha, tuakalekela, tuakamba ne, Bualu budi Mukelenge musue buenjibue
Ezekiel Yeye wakangambila ne, Muana wa muntu, diaku malu audi umona munemu; diaku mukanda eu muvungulule, hashishe, ya wambile ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele dî

Kabena bayishangana kabidi muntu yonso ne muena mutumba n andi, ne muntu yonso ne muan abo, bamba ne, Umanye biebe Yehowa; bualu bua buonso buabo nebammanye, kudi udi mutambe buhuekele munkatshi muabo tô ne kudi udi mutambe bunene munkatshi muabo
Kadi kebai bukelenge buandi, nebanuhe bintu ebi
Bena Gibea bakadisangisha kundi, bakanyunguluka nsubu unakadi butuku; bakasua kushiha meme, bakakuata mukashi wanyi muhika ku bukole, ne yeye wakafua
Wakuelelangana meshi a bualu ebu mu mutshima webe munyi

Nomba Midima Yakahabo Bena Lewi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Balai bungi bua bana balume ba Kohata ba munkatshi mua bana balume ba Lewi ku meku abo ne ku nsubu ya batatu abo, mu bidimu makumi asatu to ne ku bidimu makumi atanu buonso buabo badi bakuata mudimu wa mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Amasaya kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Bayidi kabakajingulula malu â; di edi diakabasokoma, kabakamanya malu akambeye
Kutuadija musangu awu, mabue adi amu mu mushete amu
Nzambi udi anu Nzambi wa Bena Yuda nkayabo, anyi
Wa kumudilu wakahatuka wakadi mukunze kunzû, wakadi ne miosa ya bungi ham bidi handi, bakamuidika dina ne, Esau
Kadi kakuakadi dî, nansha muntu wakitaba

Chronicles Nyuma wa Nzambi wakatulukila Azaya, muana wa Odede; wakaya kusangakena ne Asa, wakamuambila ne, Unvuai, Asa ne Bena Yuda ne Bena Benyamina; Yehowa udi n enu, hantshidi n andi; binuamukeba, nenumuhete; kadi binuamulekela, yeye neanulekele
Yeye wakambila bana babo ne Bakumpingashila argent yanyi, idi mu tshibombi, mitshima yabo ya kahandika, bakazakala, bakambila ngana ne, Bualu ebu buakutuenzela Nzambi budi tshinyi
Matuku onso akashikama Davidi mu buloba bua Bena Peleshete akadi tshidimu tshijima ne ngondo mai

Abalahama wakambila Nzambi ne, Mbimpe Yishemaele ikale ne muoyo ku mesu kuebe Nzambi wakamba ne, Nansha, Sala mukashi webe neakulelele muana wewe neumuidike dina ne, Isaka, nenjadike n andi yeye ne tunkanunuma tuandi tshihungidi tshianyi bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele
Mulau wa Buihi Matuku akakumbana muanda mutekete ku nyima kua dituta dia mai a mu musulu kudi Yehowa
Labana wakebesha Yakoba ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi tshinyi, wakunyema kundi mu musokoko, wakuya ne bana banyi bakashi bu bahika bakuata mu nvita, anyi
Bena Peleshete wakahaula misoko ya mu tshibanda kabidi
Monai
Ndi nkutendekena ne, Tahuluka kundi bi waya ku tshianza tshia bakashi, nenye bianyi ku tshianza tshia balume ne biwaya ku tshianza tshia balume, nenye bianyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Bualu mvua munufikile munda
Kupimabu biakudia bionsu abi

Nunku ulue biebe mu butuku, wewe ne bantu badi n ebe, nubalamine mu tshisuku; ne dinda habanda diba, wewe ubike hatshiatshia, uye ku musoko lubilu; hashishe haluhukeye ne bantu hadiye n abo bua kuluangana n ebe, wewe neubenzele bu mûdi musue
Balaminyi bakadi balala munda mua nsubu
Hakumukabo, bakambilangana ne, Muntu eu kena wenza bualu bua lufu anyi bua lukanu
Nakalubakana kabidi bua tshikena kumona etshi, hualu bua tshiakatshijingulula
Bana ba Halima, tshinunu tshimue ne dikumi ne muanda mutekete
Amen

Bikalaku muntu muhele, umue wa bana benu, ku mbelu kua muntu yonso mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe, kanukoleshi mitshima yenu, kanubuikidi tshianza tshienu kudi muan enu udi muhele; kadi nubulule tshianza tshienu kudiye, numusombeshe bintu bidiye musue bua kushikisheye n abi malu andi
Job Dituku dikuabo, hakalua bana halume ba Nzambi kudimuenesha ku mesu kua Yehowa, Satana kabidi wakalua munkatshi muabo bua kudimuenesha ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kadi katuena mua kubaha bana betu bakashi; bualu bua Bena Isalele hakamana kuditshiha ne, Muntu udi ufila muan andi mukashi kudi Muena Benyamina udi ne mulau
Yeye wakaya ku tshishihuidi wakenza malu onso akamuambila mamuen andi
Bana balume ba Yosefe ku meku abo, Manashe ne Efelayima
Bintu bia tshijila biakadi ngombe nkama isambombo ne mikoko binunu bisatu
Nunku yeye wakaya n andi mu nsubu muandi, wakadisha mpunda; bakowa makasa abo, bakadia, bakanua

Matayo Hashishe, Yesu wakambila bisumbu bia bantu ne bayidi bandi ne, Bafundi ne Bafalese badi bashikama mu nkuasa wa Mose; nuenze, nutumikile malu onso adibo banuambila; kadi kanuenji malu adibo benza; bualu bua bobo batu bamba, kadi kabatu benza
Nunku bakabikila dina dia musoko au ne, Soâ
Tshiena musue kubuelakana nabu to
Yeye wakamuha Bileha, muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi, bu mukashi wandi, ne Yakoba wakaya kudiye

Yonatana wakambila Adoniya ne, Bulelela, mukelenge wetu Davidi wakusungila Solomo mukelenge: mukelenge wakatuma Sadoka muakuidi, ne Natana muprofete, ne Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, ne Bena Kelete ne Bena Pelete, bakaya n andi, bakamubandisha ha nyima ha mpunda Sadoka muakuidi, ne Natana muprofete, bakumana kumuela manyi ha mutu mu Gihona, bua kuikaleye mukelenge; bakumana kufumaku ne disanka dinene nunku musoko udi mule tente ne tshianga
Buonso buabo bakadia, bakûkuta; bakangula bihesa bia bidia biakushala bisaka dikumi ne bibidi biule tente
Yeye wakabandamuna ne, Nuenu kabidi nudi nubengela kutumikila mukenshi wa Nzambi bualu bua bilele bienu tshinyi
Kadi Yehu kakatamba kuenda mu nshila wa mikenji ya Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ne mutshima wandi wonso; yeye kakabenga malu mabi a Yalobama akenzesheye Bena Isalele
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Hezikiya, ne malu mimpe akenzeye, monai, bidi bifunda mu mukanda wa tshikena kumona wa Yeshaya muprofete, muana wa Amoza, ne mu mukanda wa bakelenge ba Yuda ne ba Isalele
Udi ne meji ajingulule malu â;
Kanuakibata bakuidi ba Yehowa, bana ba Alona, ne Bena Lewi, kanuakadisunguila bakuidi bu mudi tshilele tshia bantu ba mu makelenge makuabo, anyi

Bulelela, ndi nubatiza mu mai bualu bua nuenu nukudimune mitshima yenu; kadi udi ulua ku nyima kuanyi udi muntambe meme, tshiena ne buakane bua kutuala bisabata biandi; yeye neanubatize mu tshihehudi tshiandi tshidi mu tshianza, yeye neatokeshe tshituilu tshiandi bimpe; yeye neasangishe mponda wandi mu mudiba, kadi yeye neoshe bisote mu kahia kadi kakai kajima tshiendelele
Yosefe wakumuka lubilu, bualu bua mutshima wandi wakajinga bua muakunyi andi, wakakeba muaba wa kudidileye, wakabuela mu nsubu wandi wa bulalu, wakadidilamu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Hingana kabidi, nakukuenzela tshinyi
Mesu enu kâbatangidi ne dinanga, kanubafuidi luse; shihai bantu bakulumpe, bansongalume ne mishikankunde, bana batekete ne bakashi; kadi kanuyi ha buihi ne muntu umue udi ne tshimanyinu atshi
Eyo, bakavuisha mitshima yabo bu dibue dia diamant, bua kabunvu diyisha dia mikenji ne mei akadi Yehowa wa misumba mubatumine ku bukole bua Nyuma wandi mukana mua baprofete ba diambedi
Nebateke dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Dana ku luseke lua ku nôde

Nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba mpindiu ne, Nudi nuenzela mioyo yenu mene bualu bubi, bua meme kunûmushila balume ne bakashi, muana mukese ne muana utshidi wamua mabele, munkatshi mua Bena Yuda, tshiyi nnushila muntu umue, bua tshinyi
Nanku bilota biebe bibidi bidi amu bu tshilota tshimue
Kadi kabakumusha bitendelelu bionso biakadi ku mutu kua mikuna; kadi mutshima wa Asa wakadi muakane kudi Yehowa matuku andi onso
Mpindiewu angata mukajebe, umuke nende
Bena Isalele bakenza mudimu wonso wakambila Yehowa Mose
Nunku yeye wakangambila, wakammanyisha dijingulula dia malu au
Wakahingana kudiye, ne mona, yeye wakadi muimane ha buihi ne mulambu wandi wa kuosha ha kahia, yeye ne miloho ya Moaba yonso
Rakele kuandamuna ne: Paudi umpesha bimuma abi, Yakobe neikale nebe butuku bua lelu
Davidi tatu wanyi wakadi wela meji mu mutshima wandi bua kuashileye dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, nsubu
Amu mu tshipela amu, Maweja Nangila kunupa mana, biakudia bivua bankambua benu kabayi banji kumanya
Bana ba Zatu, nkama tshitema ne makumi anai ne batanu
Kuitabusha bua yeye kuikala bu muntu mufue udi ne tshituha tshia mubidi mubole hamulelabo

Lungenyi elu kabidi ludi lufuma kudi Yehowa wa misumba, Isaiah Mulau wikale kûdi, Aliele, Aliele, Hashishe nentatshishe Aliele, Nenkunyungulule ne bitudilu bianyi, nenkutshintshimike ne mialu ya mata, Nebakutulule hanshi, newambe mei ebe hawikala muinshi mua buloba, Kadi tshisumbu tshia badi n ebe lukuna netshikale bu dinfuenkenya dibotesha, Yehowa wa misumba nealue kûdi ne mikungulu, Tshisumbu tshia bisamba bionso bidi biluisha Aliele, Muanda au newikale bu tshilota Hampakanai
Muntu nansha umue kakunutuila nkanana
Mukelenge wakamba ne, Yeye udi muntu muimpe, udi ulua ne lumu luimpe
Hakamuangalaka bantu, Bena Yuda ba bungi ne bitabushi bimpe ba bualu bua Bena Yuda bakalonda Paulo ne Bânaba; bobo bakabambila ne, Nunanukile mu ngasa wa Nzambi
Hakahita bidimu bisatu, bakahaula musoko; mu tshidimu tshisambombo tshia bukelenge bua Hezikiya ne tshia tshitema tshia bukelenge bua Hoshea, mukelenge wa Isalele, bakanyenga musoko wa Samalea

Muntu yônso udiku pende mwa kwindila bwa se nzuji udi ne bukookeshi atangila tshilumbu tshiende mu tshipungu katshiyi tshipita bule Badi balongolola ne bajadika bukookeshi bwa kudisungila bwa muntu yônso
Mu bualu ebu tudi bamanye ne, Tudi bamumanye, bitualama mikenshi yandi
