Ke mundi nnuteta, bua meme kujadika ne: bena Izrayele nebitabe mikenji yanyi anyi
Bualu kai buonso buenu nuakungelela tshifufu, nansha umue wenu wakummanyisha ne, Muana webe mulume wakahunga dî ne muana wa Yishai
Nudi mua kudia munyinyi wa kabuluku ne wa mbashi bu mudi bakuabo badia; badi kabayi bakane ne badi bakane badi bamanye mua kudia
Ku nyima kua kahia dî dikese ditekete diakunvuika
Nuelangane meshi bu muakadi bunene bua muntu eu, wakadi Abalahama, nkambua wetu, muhe tshia dikumi tshia mu bintu bitambe buimpe biakanyengeye mu nvita
Kuenzabu kabidi mitshi ya ndunga dikumi ne itanu, ya kutshiamakaja pa mabaya avua ku nzubu wa tshijila
Kadi katshia nkumanyisha bualu ebu too ne mpindiewu kuena musue kuitaba
Bana babidi bakakulelelabo mu Ejipitu diambedi tshiyi muanze kulua mu Ejipitu mbana banyi, Efelayima ne Manashe badi banyi bu Lubena ne Shimeona
Yeye wakambila bantu bandi ne, Tangilai, Bena Isalele badi batuhita bungi ne bukole
Dilolu adi, nyunyi ya tulumbu kuikila muaba uvua bena Izrayele batudile
Yonatana wakahesha nsongalume bintu biandi, wakamuambila ne, Uye n abi ku musoko

Mose wakamanyisha Bena Isalele, bakelenge babo bakamuha milangala dikumi ne ibidi, mukelenge mulangala wandi mukelenge mulangala wandi, bu mu nsubu ya batatu abo, ne mulangala wa Alona wakadi munkatshi mua milangala yabo
Mpingana kabidi ku tulu, meme kumona miepu ya mponda muanda mutekete mimpe, minene, mikale ku lukolakola lumue
Nunku, nuenu bananga, bualu bua nudi nudianjila kumanya malu â, dimukai bua, hanuahambuishibua ku mashimi a bantu babi, kanulamuki ku dijadikibua dienu dine
Bua tshitendelelu tshiakadi tshilongolola; mu muaba watshi wa kumudilu muakadi tshitekelu tshia muinda ne mesa ne mitanda ya mampa yakatekabohu; muaba udibo babikila ne, Wa Tshijila
Nebanutungile tshitungu kudi baledi benu mene ne bana benu ne ba tshiota tshienu ne balunda benu; nebashihe bakuabo benu
Kadi masalayi a Bena Kasada akalonda mukelenge mu nyima, akaheta Sedekiya mu mpata ya Yeleko, ne masalayi andi onso akamulekela, akatangadika

Bakukosela bantu bebe ne musoko webe wa tshijila mbingu makumi muanda mutekete, bua kumana ditomboka, bua kuvuisha nshikidilu wa malu mabi, bua kulengeshisha bahambuki kudi Nzambi, bua kubavuishila buakane budi bushala tshiendelele, bua kujadika tshikena kumona ne buprofete, ne bua kujidila muaba muhite tshijila
Mu Luseta muakadi mushikame muntu ne makasa andi matekete, mamu andi wakamulela mulema nunku, kakanza kuenda
Bafundi ne bakuidi banene ba Nzambi bakasua kumukuata ha diba adi mene, kadi bakatshina bantu; bakamanya ne, Buakueleleye lusumuinu elu mbualu buetu
Muana wakadiunda, ne Yehowa wakamusankisha

Hakalabula wakadi ha mutu ha dibanji mai akukudimuka nvinyo, hakadiye kai mumanye kuakufumeye kadi bena mudimu bakatuma mai bakamanya , wakadi ha mutu ha dibanji wakabikila mubaki wa mukashi, wakamuambila ne, Bantu bonso batu bafila nvinyo muimpe diambedi; hanuabo wa bungi, nebafile udi kai muimpe ku nyima; kadi wewe wakuteka nvinyo muimpe tô ne katataka

Katataka kudi yeye udi mumanye mua kunulama bua nuenu kanulenduki, ne udi mua kunuteka ku mpala kua butumbi buandi ne disanka ditamba bunene, kanui ne tshilema; kudi Nzambi umue umuehele, Musungidi wetu, bua Yesu Kilisto Mukelenge wetu, kuikale butumbi ne buneme ne bukokeshi ne bukole, ku mpala kua bikondo bionso ne katataka ne tshiendelele
Yeye wakabambila ne, Mufundi yonso wakuvui shabo muyidi mu bukelenge bua mu diulu udi bu muena nsubu udi uhatula bintu bihia bihia ne bikulukulu mu tshibutshilu tshiandi

Tshishihuidi ne tshikaminu kabiena bibadisha kabidi, Kabena bashala mu buloba bua Yehowa, Kabena bahongoluela Yehowa milambu ya nvinyo, Nenuenze tshinyi mu disanka dia kudia bia kudia, Monai, bakuya kukuabo bualu bua kubutuka kua buloba buabo, Matuku a kubakengesha akufika, Bena Efelayima badi balamina Nzambi wanyi; Bakudinyanga ne tshinyangu tshikole, Nakasangana Bena Isalele Butumbi bua Bena Efelayima nebûmuke kudibo bu mudi nyunyu ubuka, Nansha biakoleshabo bana, Bu munakadianjila kumona, bana ba balume ba Bena Efelayima Yehowa, ubahe; Bubi buabo buonso budi mu Gilegala, Ba mu Efelayima bakutahibua, Nzambi wanyi neabihate, Hoshea Bena Isalele badi bu muonshi udi ulamba bikole, Mitshima yabo idi mitahuluke nseke ibidi; Bulelela, nebambe biabo ne, Badi bamba mei a hatuhu; Bua muana wa ngombe wa ku Bete awena Nebaye n andi kabidi ku Ashû, bua kumufila bu mulambu kudi Mukelenge Yaleba

Muhimbu watshi wakadi bu ntanta wa tshianza, wakadi mulengeshibue ne bilongo bu ku mishiku ya dikoho; tshiowelu tshiakamanya mua kûla tente ne bihiminu Wakenza bitekelu bia biowelu bia tshiamu tshia mitaku dikumi: bule bua tshitekelu tshimue buakadi coudées inai, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées inai, ne bule buatshi bua mulu buakadi coudées isatu
Meliba bâla wakadi muana wa Yonatana; Meliba bâla wakalela Mika
Kanungu ka
Yakoba wakatabala ku tulu tuandi, wakamba ne Bulelela, Yehowa udi kunoko ne meme tshiakamanva bualu ebu
Nennupe Sihone, muena Amore, mukalenga wa mu Eshebone, ne ditunga diende
Kadi ndi ntekemena ne nenumanye ne tuetu katuena babengibue
Shaula wakamana kufila muan andi mukashi, Mikala, mukashi wa Davidi, kudi Palati, muana wa Layisha wa mu Galima
Kabena bakesha bantu bebe bisonsa, ne badi bamba ne Enzai tushola, mona, badi bakulua bantu bebe, kadi dihila didi kudi Bena Ejipitu bebe
Helode wakamba ne, Nakukosa Yone mutu; ahu au undi ngunvua lumu luandi nganyi
Dituku adi Gada wakalua kudi Davidi, wakamuambila ne, Ya, washile Yehowa tshioshelu ku tshishihuidi tshia Alauna, Muena Yebuse

Bana ba bena mudimu ba Solomo: bana ba Sotai, bana ba Hasofeleta, bana ba Peluda, bana ba Yâla, bana ba Dâkona, bana ba Gidele, bana ba Shefatiya, bana ba Hatila, bana ba Pokeleta hasebayima, bana ba Ami
Bualu nudi numupangisha mushindu wa kupetaye biakudia
Yeye wakabakudimuna ne, Muntu udibo babikila ne, Yesu, wakasohakanya buloba, wakabundaba ku mesu, wakangambila ne, Ya ku Siloama, wowe; nunku nakuya, nakuowa, nakutabala
Kadi bua bualu ebu bubi buwakenza wewe wakavuishila bena lukuna ba Yehowa tshikondo tshia kumuhendabo, nunku muana uwakalela neafue biandi bulelela
Nunku nakamanya di adi ne ndi dia Yehowa
Kadi, nansha biobi bikale nanku, utshinke bua kujadika muaba udi tshisamba tshionsu mua kupeta
Mukuabu ikale mulambu wa kuosha
Muambi mulelela ne bambi ba dishima Panuafika mu ditunga dikala Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupe, kanulondi buenzayi bua bena ditunga adi

Bianuambila muntu ne, Kilisto udi aha, anyi, Udi kuakua, kanumuitabushi; bualu bua ba Kilisto ba mashimi nebalue, ne baprofete ba mashimi, nebaleshe bantu bimanyinu ne malu a kukema bua kuhambuisha badibo basungula kudi Nzambi mene, biamanyabo mua kuenza nunku
Bitalu bia bantu aba nebikale bia kudia bia nyunyu ya mulu ne nyama ya ha buloba; kakuena kuikala muntu bua kuyihata
Bakalua ne ndenalio
Bakasangana munkatshi mua Bena Yabesha gilada bakashi nkama inai bakatshidi tumama, kabakadi bamanyibue kudi mulume; bakalua n abo ku tshitudilu tshia mu Shilo, tshidi mu buloba bua Kanâna
Kabakihata Bena Kanâna bakadi mu Gezê: kadi Bena Kanâna batshidi bashikama munkatshi mua Bena Efelayima tô ne ku dituku edi, bakatua bu bahika babo ba mudimu
Nunku mona, bu muakadi muoyo webe bu tshintu tshia mushinga mukole ku mesu kuanyi lelu, muoyo wanyi wikale bu tshintu tshia mushinga mukole ku mesu kua Yehowa, yeye ansungile mu makenga onso
Kakuena bualu busokoka buahanga kusokolodibua; kakuena bualu bua mu musokoko buahanga kumanyibua ne kumueneka
Muntu kai wamubela ku mesu Badi baya n andi ku lukita, Mabuwa a mu tshibanda adi amusankisha, Nunku nudi nukeba kunsamba ne mei a hatuhu munyi
Shaula wakamba ne, Nuambile Davidi ne, Mukelenge kena ukeba biuma bia dibaka anu tukoba tua Bena Peleshete lukama: bua kusombuela bena lukuna ba mukelenge
Kakuena mukenshi mukuabo udi mutambe ei
Edi ndisua dia wakuntuma ne tshijimishi muntu umue wa mu bantu bakampeye, yeye udi musue mbabishe dituku dia kunshikidilu
Tô ne hahita matuku muanda mutekete balengeshe tshioshelu ne hatshiumushile bubi buatshi, nunku, batshijidile

Hakatshiabu Davidi wakabika, wakashiya mikoko mu bianza bia mulami, wakangata bintu abi, wakaya bu muakamuambila Yishai; wakalua ku muaba wakadi makalu a nvita hakadi bena nvita baye ku nvita, hele mbila bua nvita

Mukelenge wa mu Samalea neabutudibue Bitendelelu bia ha mukuna wa Awena nebibutudibue, Ku matuku a ku Gibea tô ne mpindiu, nuenu Bena Isalele nuakuenza bibi; Hanasua kubakengesha, nembakengeshe; Bena Efelayima bakadi bu lukungulu lua ngombe luakuyishabo, Nudikunyine buakane, Nunkukuna malu mabi, Nunku diyoyo nedijuke munkatshi mua bana benu, Nuenu Bena Isalele, nebanuenzele nunku Hoshea Hakadi Bena Isalele bana, nakabananga, Kadi hanakananukila kubabikila, Kadi meme nguakayisha Bena Efelayima mua kuendabo; Nakabakoka ne mionshi idibo bakoka n ai muntu, Kabena bahingana mu buloba bua Ejipitu; Muele wa nvita neufike mu misoko yabo, Bantu banyi badi basue anu kuntombokela; Bena Efelayima, ndi mua kunulekela munyi
Hakatshiabu, Pashû wakahatula Yelemiya mu bikunyi

Ndi nkusengelela ne, Uvuluke, utuambile ne, Bu munakamana kutangila, badi bihila malu mabi, Badi bafua ku muhuya udi uhatuka mukana mua Nzambi, Muadi wa nyama wa ntambue ne dî dia nyama wa ntambue udi ne luonji biakuhuwa; Nyama wa ntambue mukulukashi udi ufua bualu bua kena ukuata tshia kudieye, Dî diakafika kundi mu busokoko, Mu meji a ku bikena kumona bufuku, buowa buakankuata ne muzakalu, biakanyungisha mifuba yanyi yonso
Ahaza wakalela Yehoada; ne Yehoada wakalela Alemeta ne Asemaweta ne Zimeli; ne Zimeli wakalela Mosa
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Kumuki aha tô ne hanalua ne matabisha anyi a kuteka ku mpala kuebe
Nunku nutonde mibi yenu kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu, nuenze bu mudi disua diandi; nuditahulule kudi bena buloba ne kudi bakashi ba bende
Neyikale pambidi pebe wewe, pa balombodi ba mu bukalenga buebe ne pa bantu bebe bonsu
Badi basanka bua bualu buanyi buakane bele mbila ne bikale ne disanka
Bu muakahatukeye munda mua mamu wandi butaka, yeye neahingane kabidi; kena uya ne tshintu tshimue mu bianza biandi tshia mu midimu yonso yakenzeye
Maweja Nangila neanuendeshe diakabi diba dionsu ne miaba yonsu
Wakamba ne, Nengenze nunku, nensasule mayeba anyi, nengase makuabo matambe a diambedi bunene, nensangishilemu maminu anyi onso ne biuma bianyi
Nuakushiha bantu bavule mu musoko eu, nuakûsha misesu yau tente ne bantu banuakushiha
Kusongabu mabue abidi a onikse, a kubueja mu masosu a tshiamu tshia mpawungi
Kadi mu bualu buonso budi muntu ne dikima, ndi ngakula tshiakulakula ndi ne dikima kabidi
Nanku ndi nnujadikila lelu kumpala kua diulu ne buloba ne: nusungule tshinudi basue: ndi nteka muoyi ne diakalenga luseke, lufu ne diakabi lukuabu
Kadi bansanto ba Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu diulu nebangate bukelenge, bukelenge nebuikale kudibo tshiendelele, lahalaha

Nunku wewe Tatenai, gouver neur wa buloba bua dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, ne Shetâ bozenai ne Bena Afâsateka, bena mulongo webe badi dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, kanufiki ha buihi n abo; kanuhumbishi mudimu wa nsubu eu wa Nzambi; gouverneur wa Bena Yuda ne bakulu ba Bena Yuda base nsubu eu wa Nzambi mu muaba wandi
Nubutahulule ku kuela kua nshobo bua buikale buhianyi buenu, ne bua bantu ba bende badi bashikame munkatshi muenu ne badi balela bana munkatshi muenu
Davidi wakabanda bu mu dî dia Gada diakamba Yehowa
Bakamujika ku mukalu wa buhianyi buandi mu Timenata sela wa mu mikuna ya Efelayima, ku nôde kua mukuna wa Gâsha
Â adi matuku a bidimu bia Abalahama, biakadi lukama ne makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu

Yeye wakasungula binunu makumi muanda mutekete bua kutualabo majitu, ne binunu makumi muanda mukulu bua kutahabo mitshi mu mikuna ne tuhita binunu bisatu ne nkama isambombo bua kuenzeshatu bantu mudimu
Ku dituku ku dituku, mu ntempelo ne mu nsubu yabo, kabakalekela kuyisha bantu ne kubambila lumu luimpe ne, Yesu udi Kilisto
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu umona ne ndimba yajiki, tshitunu kumuenzatshi
Nebatunyenge mpunde yetu, batukuate mu bupika
Yeye wakavula bilulu biandi, wakabihanda bihese bibidi
Ne hanakamutangila, nakahona ku makasa andi bu mufue
Pambaleja butumbi buanyi nanku, bena Ejipitu nebajadike ne: meme ndi Maweja Nangila

Bualu bua Nzambi udi wela mikete yandi kudiye, kayi umufuila luse; Bantu badi batuta bikashi bua dibutuka diandi, Yobo Bulelela, tshina tshidiku tshia bantu kumbula tshiamu tshia argent, Badi bumbula tshiamu tshifike mu buloba, Bantu badi bihata midima, Yeye udi umbula tshina mu muaba udi kauyi hehi ne miaba idi bantu bashikame, Buloba budi bumenesha bia kudia, Mabue abu adi ne mabue a saphir Nyunyu itu yadia bintu biakubakulayi kayena mimanye nshila wa ku tshina atshi, Nyama minene kayena mianze kumuihata, Muntu udi wolola tshianza tshiandi bua kulenga mabue makole; Udi uhanda nshila munkatshi mua mabue; Udi wela misulu nkila bua mai kâhueki, Kadi meji nebâsangane kudi kunyi
Nunku muntu udi uhidia kudikokela kudi bukokeshi udi uhidia mei majadikibue kudi Nzambi
Exodus Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe kudi Palô, bualu bua nakakolesha mutshima wandi ne mitshima ya bantu bandi bua kulesha bimanyinu bianyi munkatshi muabo
Kudi muntu udi kai wenza mudimu wa mikenshi, kadi udi witabusha Nzambi udi ubingisha badi kabai benza malu andi, ditabusha diandi didi dibadibua bu buakane
Nunku ndi ngela meshi ne, Bualu bua kanyinganyinga katudi n aku katataka bidi bimpe bua mulume ashale bu mudiye
Nunku bantu bonso bakadi Yishemaele mukuate ku Misepa uya n abo mu buhika bakalukila, bakahingana kudi Yohanana, muana wa Kalea
Yeye wakamba ne, Nuakuenza bualu bubi; bungulushai dibue dinene kundi eku

Mukalu wabo wa ku sude wakadi kunfudilu kua Dishiba dia Luehu, ku tshinkonya tshia mai tshidi tshitangila ku sude; makalu wabo wa ku sude wakayila ku mutu kua Akalabima, wakalonda butshika bua Sina, wakabandila ku sude ku luseke lua Kadeshe bânea, wakayila ku Heselona, wakabandila ku Adâ, wakanyunguluka ku Kâka; wakayila ku Asumona, wakayila tô ne ku kasulu ka Ejipitu; kunshikidilu kua mukalu kuakadi ku mai manene: eu newikale mukalu wenu wa ku luseke lua Sude
Bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba nebipetele diakalenga ku ndelanganyi yebe, bualu witabi mikenji yanyi
Ela meji, ungambile tshindi mua kuitaba kudi wakuntuma kûdi
Nunku Yona wakabika, wakaya ku Ninewe, bu muakamba Yehowa
Lumu luandi elu luakamuangalaka mu luseke luonso lua Yudaya ne ku matshika onso
Mu tshidimu tshisatu tshia bukelenge bua Asa, mukelenge wa Yuda, Bâsha, muana wa Ahiya, wakabanga kukokesha Bena Isalele mu Tîsa; wakabakokesha bidimu makumi abidi ne binai
Nunku muanjelo wakadi uyikila n anyi wakangambila ne, Amba ne, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Ntshidi mukuatshike mukau mukole bua Yelushalema ne bua Siona tô ne mpindiu
Kadi bialeleye muana wa bakashi, yeye neikale mundi udi kayi muakane tô mbingu ibidi, bu matuku a tshijila tshiandi, neikale ne mashi a kudilengesha kuandi tô matuku makumi asambombo ne asambombo
Biela muntu meshi ne, Ndi ndonda malu a Nzambi, hadiye kai ukanda ludimi luandi, kadi udi udinga mutshima wandi, bualu bua Nzambi bua muntu eu budi tshianana
Nunku wewe neumushe Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, Bena Lewi nebikale banyi
Wakabanga mudimu mu dituku dibidi dia mu ngondo muibidi, mu tshidimu tshinai tshia bukelenge buandi

Nuanji kudimuka, nulame mioyo yenu bilengele, bua kanuhu muoyo bua malu anuakatangila ne mesu enu, ne bua mei au kaluhuki mu mitshima yenu matuku onso a muoyo wenu; kadi nuamanyisha bana benu ne bana ba bana benu; dituku dinuakimana ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mu Holeba, hakangambila Yehowa ne, Unsangishile bantu, mbunvuishe mei anyi, bua bobo bamanye mua kuntshina matuku abo onso a ha buloba, ne bua bobo bayishe bana babo

Buakadi nunku bua kujadikabo mulayi kudi tunkanunuina tuonso; kenkudi badi ne mikenshi nkayabo, kadi kudi badi ne ditabusha dia Abalahama kabidi, udi biandi nkambua wa buonso buetu, bu muakafundabo ne, Nakakuvuisha nkambua wa bisamba bia bungi
Moshe kuya kuambila Maweja Nangila bionsu abi
Nudi bangenzele bibi be
Bobo badi tunkanunuina tua Abalahama, anyi
Biwenda mu nshila yanyi, biwatumikila mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi bu muakenda tatu webe Davidi, nenkuleheshile matuku ebe a bungi
Ubihate ku mesu kuanyi, bahatuke biabo

Nuenze malu onso kanui ne ditontolola ne dielangana dia mpata; bua nuenu nulue bantu badi kabai ne bualu ne badi ne mitshima mitoke, bu bana ba Nzambi badi kabai ne tshilema munkatshi mua bena tshikondo tshikonyangala ne tshia tshishiku; banudi numueneka munkatshi muabo du minda ya ha buloba, nuboluele dî dia muoyo; bua meme kuikala ne bua mua kutumbila n abu mu dituta dia Kilisto ne, Tshiakidikisha lubilu tshianana ne tshiakenza mudimu wanyi hatuhu
Kadi pangaya kuambila bena Izrayele ne: Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu mmuntume kunudi, pangebejabu ne: dina diende nnganyi nembandamune tshinyi
Nunku netufue bua tshinyi
Yeye wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa mukelenge wanyi Abalahama, ndi nkulomba ne, Ungendeshe dikasa dimpe lelu, ufuile mukelenge wanyi Abalahama luse
Kadi paudi ubenga bua kumulekela, ndi nshipa muanebe wa balume muanabute
Musangu wakakokesha Yehu Bena Isalele mu Samalea wakadi bidimu makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu
Yoshua wakabayuisha dituku adi bu bahandi ba nkunyi ne basunyi ba mai ba Bena Isalele ne ba tshioshelu tshia Yehowa mu muaba wakadiye musungule tô ne ku dituku edi
Bena Lewi bakabuambula, bakabutuala ku musulu wa Kidilona
Bobo badi batekibue munkatshi mua bantu badi bashihibue
Lumu luabo luakafika ku matshu a bena ekelesia ba mu Yelushalema; bakatuma Bânaba tô ne ku Antiokia
Ngasa wa Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto ikale n enu
Meme nensungile musoko eu bualu buanyi, ne bualu bua muntu wanyi Davidi
Shimei wakambila mukelenge ne, Dî diwakuamba ndimpe: muntu webe nênze bu muakamba mukelenge wandi
Tuasakidila kudi Nzambi bua kuha kuandi kudi kakui mua kuambibua
Yesu wakumuka mu nseke ya Tulo, wakahitshila mu Sidona ne mu nseke ya Dekapoli, wakafika ku dishiba dia Galela
Kadi yeye wakabambila ne, Bantu bonso kabena bamanye mua kuitabusha dî adi, anu bantu badi bahebue bukole bua kuditabusha
Mukelenge Davidi wakangata biamu bia mitaku bia bungi mu Beta ne Belotai, misoko ya Hadadezê

Kadi bikala mulume usangakena ne mushikankunde udi mubangila kudi mulume mukuabo mu budimi, udi umuakuata ku bukole, udi ulala n andi, anu mulume wakalala n andi neafue biandi; kadi kanuenji mushikankunde bualu; yeye kena muenze bualu bubi budibo mua kumushihela; bualu ebu budi bu muntu udi uhika ku mpala kua muena mutumba n andi udi umushiha; bualu bua yeye wakasangakena n andi mu budimi; ne mushikankunde mubangila kudi mukuabo wakadila, ne kakuakadi muntu bua kumusungila
Binyamine uvua mulele bana ba balume dikumi: Bela, Bekere, Ashebele, Ngera, Namane, Ehi, Roshe, Upime, Mupime ne Arde
Isakare udi bu nyama wa bukole bua bungi, mulale tshisaka ku luseke, tshisaka ku lukuabu
Yesu wakambila Bena Yuda bakuitabusha dî diandi ne, Binuashala mu di dianyi, nudi bayidi banyi bulelela; nenumanye kabidi bualu bulelela, ne bualu bulelela nebunuhe budishikaminyi
Kadi kababadi n abo argent yakafilabo mu bianza biabo, bualu bua bobo badi beyemenyibue
Nanku muaba awu nenuikale ne disanka dia bungi, bua bionsu binuikala bakumbaje
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu nkayende mmumanye malu masokome
Nubitumikile ne muoyi mujima, ne bukole buenu buonsu
Juka biebe, bualu ebu budi kûdi, tuetu tudi n ebe; wikale ne mutshima mukole, ubuenze
Matuku onsu bivua amu nanku: divuba dibuikila nzubu, dikenka bu kapia butuku
Kadi Yehoshafata wakakonka ne, Kakuena muprofete wa Yehowa mukuabo kunoko utudi mua kuebesha, anyi
Umue wa bantu ba mukelenge wa Isalele wakamba ne, Elisha, muana wa Shafata, udiku, wakadi wela mai ha bianza bia Eliya
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Nuenu kanuakubala bualu buakenza Davidi, hakadiye utata ne hakadiye ne nsala, yeye ne bakuabo bakadi n andi, anyi
Hakunvua mukelenge mei a mukashi eu, wakadihanda bilulu biandi yeye wakadi wendakana ha mutu ha lumbu ; bantu bakamona ne, Yeye wakadi ne bilulu bikayabala mubishi mua bilulu ham bidi handi
Nunku, mukelenge, ujadike mukandu eu, ufunde dina diebe ha mukanda udi ne mukenji eu, bua muntu kamanyi mua kuwandamuna, bu mudi mukenji wa Bena Madai ne Bena Pelasa, udi kauyi mua kukudimuka
Bobu nkayabu bavua bandomba ne: Utuenzele mvidie, afilele kumpala kuetu
Bualu bua, biwikala balengesha ne Nzambi ku lufu lua Muana wandi, hatuakadi bena lukuna n andi, nunku netutambe kusungidibua ku muoyo wandi hatuakamana kulengesha n andi
Wakatabala lukasa, wakamulonda utumbisha Nzambi; bantu bonso, hakatangilabo bualu ebu, bakatumbisha Nzambi
Mitshima yenu kaizakadi, kaitshinyi
Hashishe nakatandangana ne bantu banene ba mu Yuda, nakabebesha ne, Nudi nuenza bualu ebu bubi bua kunyanga dituku dia lumingu bua tshinyi
Bena Sulia kabakalua mu buloba bua Bena Isalele bua kuhaulabo kabidi
Yeye neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha mukoko wa mulambu wandi, neanshihe kudibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Yelemiya muprofete wakaya mu nshila wandi
Ebe wakalela bana balume babidi dina dia mukuabo diakadi Pelege, mu matuku andi bakabanyangana buloba, dina dia muan abo diakadi Yoketana
Sadoka muakuidi wakangata lusengu lua manyi lua mu Ntenta, wakela manyi ha mutu ha Solomo
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Palô kena ukunvuila nansha, bualu bua kuvudisha malu anyi a kukema mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Yesu wakabakonka ne, Bana, nudi ne tshia kudia, anyi
Tubala tua lubilu lukole tuakaluhuka, tuakakeba kutambakana ha buloba
Nyuma Muimpe udi utumanyisha bualu ebu kabidi, bua hakamaneye kuamha ne, Etshi ntshihungidi tshinahunga n abo; Tshiena nvuluka kabidi mibi yabo ne malu mabi abo
Ulombeshe bilamba biabu bia tshijila, ne mafuta a kubalaba
Ubatelele mihanu ya lin ya kubuikila butaka buabo, mihanu neyikale ku tshimono mifike to ne ku bibelu

Hezikiya wakunvua mei a bantu aba, wakabalesha bintu bionso bia mu bibutshilu biandi, bintu bia argent ne bia or ne bintu bia muhuya muimpe ne manyi a mushinga mukole ne nsubu wa bintu biandi bia nvita ne bintu bionso biakadiye n abi; Hezikiya kakabenga bua kubalesha bintu bionso bia mu nsubu wandi ne mu bukelenge buandi

Judges Hashishe Debola ne Balaka, muana mulume wa Abinoama, bakimba musambu dituku adi ne: Bualu bua balombodi bakalombola Bena Isalele, Unvuai, nuenu bakelenge, telejai matshu, nuenu bana ba bakelenge; Yehowa, hawakumuka ku Sei, Mikuna minene yakazakala ku mesu kua Yehowa; Mu matuku a Shamagâ, muana mulume wa Anata, Bakelenge bakahuwa mu Isalele, Bobo bakasungula nzambi mihia mihia, Mutshima wanyi udi kudi bakokeshi ba mu Isalele Nuenu, badi babanda ha nyima ha tubalu tutoke, ambai bualu; Ku muaba wakadi mutoyi wa bena nvita bakadi ne mata Tabala, tabala, Debola: Hashishe tshituha tshia bakelenge bakashala ne bantu bakahueka; bakadi ne muji wabo mu Amaleka bakumuka mu Efelayima, Bana balume ba bakelenge banene ba mu Yisakâ bakadi ne Debola; Wakashikama munkatshi mua mpangu ya mikoko Bena Gilada bakashikama dishiya dia Yadene; Bena Zebuluna bakadi bu bantu bakamba kufila mioyo yabo tô ne ku lufu, Bakelenge bakaluhuka, bakaluangana; Mitoto ya mu diulu yakaluangana, Musulu wa Kishona, musulu au wa kale kale, Hashishe tubalu tuakatua mikono yatu hanshi, Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamba ne, Yaele, mukashi wa Hebê, Muena Kena, Yeye wakamulomba mai, kadi yeye wakamuha mabele; Yeye wakolola tshianza tshiandi ku mutshi wa mutondo wa ntenta, Yeye wakatua mpala wandi hanshi ku makasa andi, Mamu wa Sisela wakadi mutangile ha disoso dia nsubu, Bakashi benji ba mudimu wandi ba lungenyi bakamukudimuna dî; wakamba ne, Kabena basangana bintu biakunyengabo kudi bena lukuna, anyi

Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Solomo ne, Bua nsubu eu ûdi wibaka, biwenda mu nshila yanyi, biwenza mei anyi, biwatumikila mikenji yanyi yonso, nunku nenjadike dî dianyi kûdi, diakambila Davidi, tatu webe
Yeye wakalua kabidi ku Kana wa Galela kuakakudimuneye mai nvinyo
Bua badi bamba ne, Yehowa kena utumona; Yehowa wakulekela buloba buetu, wakumuka
Bena Kohata bakaya ku mpala batuale bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshijila, ne bakuabo bakashimika nsubu wa tshitendelelu diambedi bobo kabayi banze kulua

Yehowa neunvuishe bantu dî diandi dia butumbi, neamueneshe dihueka dia diboko diandi hanshi mu kuvulangana kua tshiji, mu ludimi lua kahia kadi kashidisha, mu kuhumuka kua nvula, mu tshihuhu ne mu mabue a nvula
Bienzedi Yeye wakalua kabidi ku Dêbe ne Luseta
Mionji ya maluvu a mvinyo neikale miaba yonsu, nansha muntu usuikaku nyama wa mpunde ki mbualu to
Muisambombo wakahongolola luhanza luandi ha musulu munene, Pelata; ne mai akadimu akûma bua nshila alongolodibue bua bakelenge badi bafuma kudi kuhatuka diba
Nengele bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba lupemba mu dina diebe ne dia ndelanganyi yebe
Bena Isalele bakahita Bena Yuda bukole; bakanyema muntu ne muntu ku nsubu wandi wa ntenta
Mona, diabolo udi wamba kuela bakuabo ba munkatshi muenu mu lukanu bua nuenu nutetshibue, ne nenuikale ne dikenga dia matuku dikumi
Nenku Maweja Nangila neanupe ditunga didi luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua Yardene edi kashidi

Bantu basatu bakuabo ba munkatshi mua bena bukitu makumi asatu bakaya kudi Davidi hakadiye mu lubuebue lua Adulama mu tshikondo tshia kunowa; Bena Peleshete bakasa tshitudilu tshiabo mu tshibanda tshia Lefayima
Bakamukudimuna ne, Yesu wa ku Nazaleta

Hakahita matuku â, mukelenge wakalambishila bantu bonso bakadi n andi mu nsubu wandi wa mu Shushana, ne banene ne bakese, bidia bia disanka, mu tshiendedi tshia mu tshibunda tshia ku mbalasa wa mukelenge matuku muanda mutekete
Nusakidile Tatu, wakatuvuisha bantu badi mua kuikala babanyanganyi ba buhianyi bua basanto bua mu munya
Kadi, diba dia kunowa, nufile tshia bitanu tshimue tshia bintu abi kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Eva kumuinyika dina dia Shete, wamba ne: Mvidi Mukulu wakumpesha muana mukuabu pa muaba wa Ebele uvua Kayine mushipe

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Tshiona tshia nvita tshidi mu buloba, Mona mudi marteau wa buloba buonso mukoshibue Wewe Babulona, nakukuelela buteyi, Yehowa wakunzulula nsubu wa bielelu biandi bia nvita, Luai bienu ku nseke yonso bua kumuluisha, Shihai balume ba ngombe yandi bonso, Edi ndî dia badi banyema ne badi bahanduka mu buloba bua Babulona, dia kuambila ba mu Siona bualu bua kudisombuela kua Yehowa Nzambi wetu, disombuela didiye udisombuela n adi ntempelo wandi
Ku bilamba abi, bavua bazolaku Bakerubine

Kanubueshi muntu mukuabo mu nsubu wa Yehowa mene, anu bakuidi ne Bena Lewi badi ne mudimu wabo; bobo nebabuele bualu bua bobo badi bantu ba tshijila; kadi bantu bonso bakuabo batumikile mukenji wa Yehowa
Yeye wakabikila muena mudimu, wakamuebesha ne, Abu mbualu tshinyi
Ulembeleshe tshilulu ha bitubuidi, Ulue ne mushete wa Nzambi ku nyima kua tshilulu, tshilulu atshi netshikale hankatshi ha muaba wa tshijila ne muaba mutambe wa tshijila
Kabidi mikuabu kayena mua kumueneka kabidi bungi abu to
Biakadi bimpe bua tuetu kushikama dishiya dia Yadene
Yoshua wakambila bantu ne, Nuenu kanuena mua kukuatshila Yehowa mudimu, bualu bua yeye udi Nzambi wa tshijila, udi Nzambi wa mukau, yeye kena unujimishila mahanga enu anyi mibi yenu
Nyemenamu lubilu, bualu bua tshiena mua kuenza bualu wewe kuyi muanze kufikaku
Hashishe hakamuangalakabo ku esete, bakasangana mpata munene mu buloba bua Shinâ, bakashikamaku
Masanka Asatu Majalame Ek

Pashishe muntu awu aye kudi mutuangaji, udi wenza mudimu musangu awu, amuambile ne: Lelu ndi mfila bintu ebi, bua kujadika ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu webe, wamfikishi mu ditunga divuaye mulaye bankambua betu
Izake uvua mutambe kunanga Esawu, bualu uvua munange bikole munyinyi wa nyama ya mu tshisuku
Hakaluabo, bakamuambila ne, Muyishi, tudi bamanye ne, Wewe kuena utshina muntu, bualu bua kuena ne bualu ne muntu, wewe udi uyisha bantu nshila wa Nzambi bulelela
Buonso buabo bakabanga kumulayidila bu dî dimana kuhunga
Mona
Kadi bana bakuabu ba balume ba Yuda, Ere ne Onane, bakavua bafuile mu Kenaane
Bakelenge Abishaga Udi Ukuatshile Davidi Mudimu Mukelenge Davidi wakadi muntu mununu, mukoke wa bidimu bia bungi; bakamubikila ne bilulu bia bungi, kadi yeye kakunyua luya
Yeye wakatabala ku tulu tuandi, wamba ne, Nenduhuke bu misangu mikuabo ya diambedi, nendihandishe nkayanyi mu bianza biabo
Nunku hakamuela hanshi, ne mashi andi makuabo akamatshila ha lumbu ne ha tubalu; tuakamudiata muinshi mua bikono
Bakelenge Bukokeshi bua Amasaya Kul
Yeye wakamba ne, Ulombe mutu wa Yone Mubatiji
Nunku Bena Edome bakatombokela Bena Yuda tô ne ku difuku edi
Aba kambantu bawakahetula, anyi

Hashishe Yeshaya, muana wa Amoza, wakatumina Hezikiya dî ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Bualu bua wewe wakundombela bua Saneheliba, mukelenge wa Ashû, edi ndi didi Yehowa muambe bua bualu buandi ne, Wewe wakufunyina nganyi bulobo, wakuhenda nganyi

Yehowa neahite bua kushiha Bena Ejipitu, hamoneye mashi ku mutshi wa ha mushiku wa mbelu ne ku biluwa bia mushiku wa nsubu, neaye biandi ha mutu ha tshibi, neahite, Yehowa neahidishe mushiku ne, Kayi mu nsubu yenu bua kunushiha

Ne bantu aba bonso, bamane kuikala ne bualu buabo buambibua bua ditabusha diabo, kabakangata mulayi; Nzambi wakalongolola tshintu tshitamba buimpe bua bualu buetu, bua bobo kabavuishibu bakane tshishiki kabai n etu
Madidishi atshi, mbalanda watshi, mabue atshi a ngashi, biakadi ne luidi luolumue ne lua tshibuelelu tshia ku luseke lua esete
Hashishe, Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Wewe udi unyingalala bua mudiantondo, ûdi kuyi mukuatshile mudimu, kuyi mudiundishe; mumene bufuku bumue, ekufua bufuku bukuabo
Bualu bua tshiena nkutuma kudi bantu badi bakula muaku ûdi kuyi mumanye ne kudi badi ne ludimi luneme, kadi ndi nkutuma kudi Bena Isalele
Kadi tshiamu tshionso tshia argent ne tshia or, ne malonga a tshiamu tshia mitaku ne tshiamu tshifike bidi bajidila kudi Yehowa; bintu ebi bionso nebikale mu tshibutshilu tshia Yehowa
Mu diba adi mukelenge wa Babulona wakashiha bana balume ba Sedekiya ku mesu kuandi mu Libela
Kanuenji mudimu dituku adi, edi ndituku dia kubuikila bubi buenu ku mesu kua Yehowa
Muntu nansha umwe kêna mwa kwangatshibwa mu tshikisu, bu udi kayi muntu anyi mu dimupula mushinga to

Hakadibo badia hohamue mu Misepa, Yishemaele, muana wa Netanya, ne bantu dikumi bakadi n andi bakajuka, bakataha Gedaliya, muana wa Ahikama, muana wa Shafana, ne muele wa nvita, bobo bakashiha muntu wakatekabo gouverneur kudi mukelenge wa Babulona
John Bulelela, bulelela, udi nuambila ne, Udi kai ubuelela ku mbelu wa luhangu lua mikoko, udi ubandila kukuabo, yeye udi muibi ne munyengi: kadi wabuelela ku mbelu udi mulami wa mikoko
Bobo badi bahesha bakashi ba ndumba difutu; kadi wewe udi ufila difutu kudi balunda bebe bonso, ne udi ubabueshila bua kuluabo ku nseke yonso bua kuenda n ebe masandi
Abrahame kuitaba ne: Eyowa, ndi nditshipa nanku
Kanukuatshi mudimu bua bia kudia bitu biafua, kadi nûkuate bua bidi bishala tô ne ku muoyo wa tshiendelele, bianuha Muana wa muntu; bualu bua Tatu, Nzambi mene, wakamuteka tshimanyishilu
Nudi basue tuetu kubasunga, anyi
Mu tshihela: Bete alabâ, Midina ne Sekaka, ne Nibeshana ne Tshimenga tshia Luehu, ne Enegedi; bimenga bisambombo ne misoko yabi
Udi mufuke muntu ne mukana mua kuakula nnganyi
Matu a ku Tâshishi akatuala bintu biebe biwakenduluka n abi
Hashishe muntu wa buhidia neabuluibue, udi Mukelenge Yesu ulua kushiha ne muhuya wa mukana muandi, neamuvuishe bu tshintu tshia tshianana ku dimueneka dia kulua kuandi
Bakakonka ne, Eu kena Yesu, muana wa Yosefe utudi bamanye tatu andi ne mamu andi, anyi
Bobo bakaluangana ne Bena Hageli ne Yetû ne Nafisha ne Nodaba
Nenuibe, nenushihe bakuabo, nenuende masandi, nenuditshihe ne mashimi, nenuoshile Bâla musenga wa manananshi, nenulonde nzambi ya hatuhu mudi kanuyi bamanye, anyi
Kanyangishi bana bandi munkatshi mua bana babo nansha, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa wakamujidila
Abimeleke wakalua ha buihi ne tshibumba, wakaluangana ne ben atshi, wakasemena ku tshibi tshia tshibumba bua kutshiosha ne kahia

Yesu wakabambila ne, Luhanza lundi nua, nenulunue kabidi; nebanubatize ne dibatiza didibo bambatiza n adi; kadi kushikama ku tshianza tshianyi tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshianyi tshia bakashi kambualu buanyi bua kuha muntu; kushikama nunku kudi bua bakabulongoluelabo kudi Nzambi
Ahaba wakamushihela ne bantu bakadi n andi mikoko ne ngombe ya bungi; wakamuitabushisha bua kuyeye n andi ku Lamota gilada
Pashishe upingane bua kungambila
Butuku abu mene Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Bika biebe, hueka ku tshitudilu tshiabo, bualu bua nakabifila mu bianza biebe
Kadi nuenu nudi nunyanga dina dianyi, hanuamba ne, Mesa a Yehowa adi mabiha, ne bia kudia biandi, milambu ya ha mesa, mbintu bia kulengulula
Ku tshibangidilu tshia buloba tô ne katataka kabena banze kunvua bualu bua muntu utabasha mesu a muntu mulela mufofo
Nukebe kuheta ditalala ne bantu bonso, ne kujidibua kudi muntu kai n aku kena mumanye mua kutangila Mukelenge
Dimukai, kanuena bamanye dituku ne ha diba
Nenunyunguluke mukelenge nunku, muntu yonso ne bintu bia nvita mu bianza biandi; biakela muntu kubuela munkatshi muenu, nebamushihe
Meme kumona kabidi ngombe mikuabu muanda mutekete minyane bikole, ipatuka kabidi mu mayi

Kabena mua kuhana anyi kuhikula tshintu tshia tshijila tshiakajidilabo kudi Yehowa, nansha tshintu tshia muntu anyi tshia nyama anyi tshia budimi bua buhianyi buandi bintu ebi bidi bitambe tshijila kudi Yehowa
Maweja Nangila kupatuka ne Abrame mu ntenta wende, umuambila ne: Tangila mulu ne udi mua kubala mitotu idimu
Biahona tshituha tshia mubidi yabi mufue ha bintu bidibo bakuna mu buloba, bintu ebi nebikale bilengele
Davidi wakamba ne, Mefibosheta
Nulambe munyinyi awu, nuudile muaba wikala Maweja Nangila musungule
Kuikala mutengula kakuena bualu; kuikala kai mutengula kakuena bualu; kadi anu kutumikila kua mikenshi ya Nzambi kudi bualu bunene

Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, ne Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune, bakaya ne bantu bakatentekela buloba, bakadihanda bilulu biabo, bakambila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele ne, Buloba butuakahita bua kutentekela budi butambe buimpe
Binamanya ne tatu wanyi ndi musue kukuenzela bualu bubi, tshiena nkumanyisha, anyi
Yonadaba wakambila mukelenge ne, Tangila, bana balume ba mukelenge bakulua bu muakamba muntu webe
Ndekela, mbanyoke
Bena Ejipitu kusungula bamfumu ba mudimu bavua ne bua kuenzeja bena Izrayele mudimu mukole bua kubatekesha
Yeshaya muprofete, muana wa Amoza, wakalua kudiye, wakamuambila ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Ulongolole malu a mu nsubu muebe; bualu bua neufue, kuena wikala ne muoyo
Hakangata mihote minda yai, kayakaya ne manyi makuabo; yakadi ne meshi yakaya ne manyi mu mpanza, ne minda
Samuele wakabikila bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele ha buihi, bakasungula tshisamba tshia Benyamina
Bualu bua mulayi wa kuhianeye buloba kawakadi kudi Abalahama anyi kudi tunkanunuina tuandi bualu bua mikenshi; kadi wakadika bua buakane bua ku ditabusha
Hashishe, yeye neatangishe mpala wandi ku misoko ya mu buloba buandi idi nuasa ne ngumbu ya nvita, kadi nealenduke, neadishinde hanshi, kabena bamusangana kabidi

Amenona wakatamba kunyingalasha mutshima tô ne bakalueye bu musami, bualu bua muan abo wa bakashi, Tamâ; bualu bua yeye wakatshidi kamama ne bualu buakadi bukole kudi Amenona bua kumuenzeleye bualu bubi

Nakatangila tshimpanga tshituta nsengu ku luseke lua wesete, lua nôde ne lua sude; kakuakadi nyama mikuabo yakamanya kua kuimana ku mpala kuatshi, kakuakadi munga wakamanya mua kuhandishibua ku bukole buatshi; kadi tshiakenza bu muakasuatshi kuenza, tshiakadibandisha kabidi
Nudi bantu ba tshianana, kanuyi lungenyi
Wakosha munyinyi ne tshiseba ku butshika bua tshitudilu
Kadi nebambenge too ne ku diba kaayi
Tuyayi ku mbelu
Kadi wakudibandisha ne wakuhetula Mukelenge wa mu diulu; bua bakulua ne mpanza ya mu nsubu muandi ku mpala kuebe; wewe ne miloho yebe, bakashi bebe ne bakashi bahika bawakabaka nuakunuinamu nvinyo
Hayabo ne nsubu wa tshitendelelu mu nshila, Bena Lewi nebatule nsubu, ne halongololabo tshitudilu, Bena Lewi nebamushimike, bialua muenyi ha buihi nebamushihe
Diba diakufika, Muana wa muntu udi mufila mu bianza bia bantu babi
Neabiele mulu abinyukule
Nakunufundila malu â bua bobo badi basue kunuhambuisha
Bualu muntu ewu Moshe, uvua mutupatule mu Ejipitu, katuena bamanye tshidi tshimuenzekela to
Ndelanganyi ya Ngade kuasulula bimenga abi: Dibone, Atarote, Aroyere, Atrote Shofane, Yazere, Yogbaha, Bete Nimra ne Bete Arane
Nebuhite makelenge makuabo onso buhuekele; kabuena budibandisha ha mitu ha bisamba bia bantu kabidi; nembakeheshe bua bobo kabamanyi mua kukokesha bisamba bia bantu kabidi
Amalama wakabaka Yokebede, muan abo wa bakashi ne tatu wandi, ne yeye wakamulelela Alona ne Mose, bidimu bia Amalama biakadi lukama ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete
Yeye wakelangana meshi ne, Bena kuetu nebajingulule ne, Nzambi udi ubasungila ne tshianza tshianyi; kadi bobo kabakajingulula bualu ebu
Ubateke ku bumfumu bua mutuangaji Arone, bamuambuluishe
Hashishe nakatandangana ne bantu banene ba mu Yuda, nakabebesha ne, Nudi nuenza bualu ebu bubi bua kunyanga dituku dia lumingu bua tshinyi
Bua kutangila muntu muluate bilulu binefuke, anyi
Yehowa wakakonka Abalahama ne, Sala wakaseka bua tshinyi, wamba ne, Meme nendele muana, hankadi mukoke aha, anyi

Hakadi ujeka uhukila Petelo ne Yone, bantu bonso bakabunguila mu mbalanda udibo babikila ne, Wa Solomo, batamba kukema, Hakamona Petelo bualu ebu, wakambila bantu ne, Nuenu Bena Isalele, bualu ebu budi bunukemesha munyi
Â mei audi mua kuambila Bena Isalele
Kabidi kuena mua kukosa miosa ya muanabute wa mukoku
Minisitila kavulambedi udi mwa kulebeka amwe makookeshi enda kudi ba meena
Dipembu dimpe diabi nedinsankishe

Bana bakashi ba Selofehada bakenza muakambila Yehowa Mose, bualu bua Mahala ne Tîza ne Hogela ne Mileka ne Noa, bana bakashi ba Selofehada, bakadi babakibua kudi bana balume bakadi bana babo ne tatu abo
Yeye kakamutangila kabidi
Mubidi wanyi udi bidia bilelela, mashi anyi adi bia kunua bilelela
Yeye wakakonka ne, Muntu webe udi bu nganyi bua wewe udi utangila mbua mufue bu meme
Yeye wakunzulula tshibi, wakaya lubilu
Kadi bikala mulume wandi mumukande mu dituku diakunvueye, nunku kuditshiha kuandi ne mei andi onso kabiena bualame, mulume wandi wakavuisha malu au bu malu a hatuhu, Yehowa neamubiukidile bualu abu
Kadi tshivuadi tshia dima tshidibo baulambila nebatshishihe, biaulambilabo mu tshivuadi tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku, nebatshisukule bimpe ne mai

Bienzedi bia Hezikiya bikuabo ne bukole buandi buonso ne bu muakumbuleye dina dinene ne mitubu bia kutuma mai munda mua musoko, kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi

Makenga neikaleku, katshia tshisamba tshia bantu tshiabanga tô ne ku tshikondo atshi makenga bu nunku kâkadi manze kumueneka; kadi mu tshikondo atshi bana benu bonso badi ne men abo mafunda mu mukanda wa muoyo nebabande
Hezikiya wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi; Manashe, muan andi mulume, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Shikamai mu buloba, nukuatshile mukelenge wa Babulona mudimu, nenuikale ne diakalengele
Yeye wakamuosha muaba
Pashishe kuamiaminaye kabidi bana bende ba balume, ne ku bilamba biabu
Yuda kuamba ne: Mvua mutumine mukaji ewu mbuji umvua mumulaye
Tshibanda tshia Hinoma netshikale tshijibikila tô ne ku Azele
Mbimpe kutshinyangakaja, bualu ntshipie mikiya
Kadi hakahita bidimu bibidi, Pokio Festo wakahingana ha muaba wa Felika; kadi bualu bua wakasua kuikala ne diakalengele kudi Bena Yuda, Felika wakashia Paulo mu lukanu
Kadi yeye kakaha kudimuna dî, bakajingulula bualu ebu

Bakuidi muanda mutekete nebaye ne mpungi muanda mutekete ya nsengu ya bimpanga ku mpala kua mushete wa tshihungidi; dituku dia muanda mutekete nenunyunguluke musoko misangu muanda mutekete, ne bakuidi nebele mpungi
Biakabuela mulume ne mukashi ba bintu bionso, bu muakamuambila Nzambi, ne Yehowa wakamuinshidila tshibi

Bantu aba bonso, muntu ne muntu, bakakosa matamba, bakalonda Abimeleke, bakâteka kuinshi kua nsubu, bakosha nsubu ne kahia; nunku bantu bonso bakadi mu tshibumba tshia mu Shekeme bakafua kabidi, bu bantu tshinunu ne balume ne bakashi

Bualu bua ndi ngitabushishibua bualu ebu, ndi mumanye ne nenshaleku mu mubidi, E, bulelela, nenshale n enu bonso bua kudiunda kuenu ne kusanka kuenu bia mu ditabusha; bua ditumbisha dienu dikumbane mu Kilisto Yesu mu bualu buanyi bua dikala dianyi n enu tshiakabidi
Yesu wakamubela ne, Hua, Umuka munda muandi
Wakidika dina dia muaba eu ne Betele kadi diambedi dina dia musoko diakadi Luze
Mu matuku â baprofete ba ku Yelushalema bakalua ku Antiokia
Bena mudimu ba mukelenge bakamuambila ne, Hamana udi muimane mu tshiendedi
Yoshua wakumuka ku Lakisha ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadi n andi, bakalua ku Egelona, bakasaku tshitudilu, bakauluisha
Yehowa udi wamba ne Lumbululai bilumbu ne kulumbulula kuakane ne enzai bienzedi biakane; nuhandishe udi ne bintu biandi bi nyengibue mu bianza bia mumukengeshi
Kadi Yakobe, tatuende kumuinyika ne: Binyamine, mmumue ne: Diboku dia bukole
Bana ba balume ba Elekana: Amasai ne Ahimota
Nennuvuishile bihendu bia tshiendelele ne bundu bua tshiendelele, bidi bantu kabayi bahua muoyo
Kadi wewe wimane biebe hehi n anyi, nenkuambile mei onso, ne mikenji ne malu bindi musue wewe kubamanyisha, bua bobo babienze mu buloba bundi nnuha
Batuangaji, bana ba Arone, baye ne mashi a ngombe awu kudi Maweja Nangila
Hakadibo badia, bakela dî bamba ne Muntu wa Nzambi, lufu lua diku ludi mu luesu elu
Malu makuabo a bungi adiku kabidi akenza Yesu; biâfundabo onso, ndi ngamba ne, Buloba bujima mene kabuena bukumbana miaba ya kuteka mikanda yafundabo
Bana ba balume ba Yelamele, muan a bute wa Heselona, bakadi Lama, muan a bute wandi, ne Buna ne Olena ne Ozema ne Ahiya
Nunku Yoaba wakatuma Uliya kudi Davidi
Meme kujadika ne: nuvua batombokele Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu bushiwa
Bakadi benda n andi bakimana bahue; bakuama dî, kadi kabakamona muntu
Bualu bua muntu yonso udi wamua mabele kena muanze kujalama mu dî dia buakane, bualu bua utshidi muana mukese
Matuku onso a Hanoka akadi bidimu nkama isatu ne makumi asambombo ne bitanu

Dutelonone Mose Udi Ubavuluisha Dî Diaka balaya Yehowa ku Holeba Â mmei akambila Mose Bena Isalele dishiya dia Yadene mu tshihela mu Alabâ tshitangilangane ne Sufa, hankatshi ha Palana ne Tofele ne Labana ne Heselota ne Dizababa

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent dia nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mûle tente ne musenga wa manananshi, ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Ehaba, muana mulume wa Helona

kudi nsubu wanyi wa tshijila hakamunyangabo, ne ku buloba bua Isalele hakabubutulabo, ne kudi Bena Yuda hakayabo mu buhika; bua malu â nennufile mu bianza bia bantu ba ku luseke lua esete bu bintu biabo, ne bobo nebashimike ntenta yabo munkatshi muenu, nebashikame munkatshi muenu; nebadie mamuma enu, nebanue mabele enu
Nuenu nuakumvua diyi diende mu diulu, unulongesha bua kumutumikila
Nuenu bena Izrayele, telejayi: Maweja Nangila, Maweja Nangila nkayende, ke Mvidi Mukulu wetu
Filipo wakamuambila ne, Lua umone

Yeye udi dinkenka dikole dia butumbi bua Tatu ne tshifuanyikishi mene tshia Bunzambi buandi, ne udi wimanyika bintu bionso ku dî dia bukole buandi; hakamaneye kuhetela bantu diuvua dia ku malu mabi abo, wakashikama ku tshianza tshia bukole tshia Mutambe Bunene wa mulu
Mose ne Eleazâ bakenza muakambila Yehowa Mose

Yeye wakavungulula mukanda, wakamona muaba wakafundabo ne, Nyuma wa Nzambi udi ham bidi hanyi, Bualu bua yeye wakangela manyi ha mutu ne, Ambila bantu bahele lumu luimpe; Ambila bantu bualu bua tshidimu tshiakitabusha Mukelenge
Moshe kumuka kua mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bua kuya kutendelela Maweja Nangila
Hatuakafika ku nyima kua tshisenga tshikese, dina diatshi Kauda, tuakadi ne bualu bukole bua kuambula buatu bukese; hakabubandishabu, bakanyengela buatu bunene mionshi ha nyima bua kubukuatakasha
Kadi tuetu kubatshimuna, kubanyenga matunga abu
dikosa dia bitadi pa makasa a mushinga, bitadi pa kumpanyi ne bitadi pa muntu ne muntu bilondeshila kanungu ka ;
Ndi nkusengelela bua kundayidila
Bantu bonsu bavua bungi nunku: Tshisamba tshia Rubene:
Nanku tuma diyi lukasa bua bantu bumushe bimuna biabu ne bintu biabu bionsu bidi mu mpata, bualu bantu ne bintu bikale mu mpata nebifue ku mabue a mvula
Ndi mumanye ne, Munda muanyi, mu mubidi wanyi mene, kamuena muikale bualu buimpe; bualu bua disua dia kuenza bimpe didi kundi, kudi bakole bua mua kuenza n abu bimpe kabuenaku
Yeye wakamba ne Yehowa akusankishe muan anyi, kunshikidilu kua kalolo kebe kuakatamba tshibangidilu tshiaku bualu bua wewe kuakalonda bansongalume, nansha bahele nansha babanju
Biakane umulombele bukelenge kabidi, bualu bua yeye udi mukulu wanyi: umulombele ne Ebeyatâ muakuidi, ne Yoaba, muana wa Seluya
Kutuadijaye kulomba Mvidi Mukulu wamba ne: Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa mfumuanyi Abrahame, lelu ndi nkusengelela ne: ungendeshe diakalenga, ukumbaje biuvua mulaye mfumuanyi Abrahame
Bakashiyaku mpingu yabo; Davidi ne bantu bandi bakaya n ai
Ku tshikondo atshi mukelenge Yeholama wakafuma ku Samalea, wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso
Nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Kakunulokeshila kabidi mvula
Matayo Kanulumbuludi malu adi munda mua bantu bakuabo, nunku bobo kabena balumbulula matu adi munda muenu
Nunku bakakokela Yelemiya ku mionshi, bakanuihata mu dina; ne Yelemiya wakashala mu tshiendelu tshia balami ba nsubu wa lukanu
Yesu wakabakonka ne, Kanuena banze kubala mu Mukanda wa Nzambi anyi, ne, Ndi nuambila ne, Nebanunyenge bukelenge bua Nzambi, nebabuhe tshisamba tshidi tshikuama mamuma abu
Pangumusha tshianza tshianyi, neumone nyima wanyi, bualu muntu kena mua kumona mpala wanyi to
Kadi Mvidi Mukulu wenu, Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu, ke udi mulongolole makuta mu bibombi bienu
Tatu wanyi wakafila bintu bionso mu bianza bianyi; kakuena muntu udi mumanye Muana, anu Tatu; kakuena muntu udi mumanye Tatu, anu Muana ne udi Muana musue kulesha Tatu
Dituku disatu: nundambule ngombe milume dikumi ne umue, mikoku ya bimpanga ibidi, bana ba mikoku dikumi ne banayi, badi bamane kukumbaja tshidimu tshijima, kabidi ne mbuji wa mpumbu umue

Nakatangila kabidi, ne nakunua dî dia banjelo ba bungi banyunguluka nkuasa wa butumbi ne dia bifukibue bidi ne muoyo, ne dia bakulu, ne bungi buabo bakadi lubombo misangu lubombo, ne binunu bia binunu; bamba ne dî dikole ne, Nakunvua tshintu tshionso tshifukibue tshidi mu diulu, ne tshidi ha buloba, ne tshidi munshi mua buloba, ne tshidi ha mai manene, ne bintu bionso bidimu biamba ne, Ne bifukibue binai bidi ne musyo biakamba ne, Amen
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ, Igala, muana mulume wa Yosefe
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nengumushe Bena Yuda kabidi ku mesu kuanyi bu munakumusha Bena Isalele, nenyenge musoko eu wa Yelushalema mene unakusungula, ne nsubu unakuamba ne, Nenjadikemu dina dianyi
Nunku yeye wakahidia kuanua
Mose wakangata manyi adibo bela ha mutu, wakantumina manyi ku nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne ku bintu bionso biakadimu, wakadidila
Ke midimu idi bena Merari ne bua kuenza mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Yesu wakabambila kabidi ne, Ditalala dikale kunudi; bu muakantuma Tatu, nunku mundi nutuma
Kanuenji mudimu nansha mukese dituku adi eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele mu bikondo bienu bionso mu nsubu yenu yonso
Hakatutatshi ku buatu, kabuakamanya mua kutulama kuakadi kuvuila tshihuhu, tuakalekela kuita, luhehele luakatuendesha
Hakatshiabu, Agipa ne Bênike bakahia ne kudilesha kunene, bakabuela mu muaba wa kunyua bilumbu, ne tumanda ne bantu banene ba musoko; hakamba Festo dî, bakalua ne Paulo
Wakashikama mu buatu, wakayisha bisumbu bia bantu
Witabusha, wabatijibua, nebamusungile; wahidia, nebamuhishe

Nuenu nenudie bana banuakalela, munyinyi wa bana benu balume ne wa bana benu bakashi bakamuha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bualu bua kanyinganyinga kadi kanukuata bua ditshintshimika dia misoko yenu ne bua makenga adi bena lukuna benu banukengesha n au
Bakasangana mashi a baprofete ne a basanto ne a bonso bakashihibua ha buloba munkatshi muau
Bana ba Bebai nkama isambombo ne makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu
Tshianana ndi mua kubashipa
Katuena ne bukole bua kuya ku luendu muntu ne muntu ne mukashi wandi udi muena ditabusha, bu mudibo benza kudi bapostolo bakuabo, ne kudi bana babo ne Mukelenge, ne kudi Kefa, anyi
Wakabika mu nsunagoga, wakabuela mu nsubu wa Simona

Luse ludi lukenga musangu mule, ludi luenzela bakuabo bimpe; luse kaluena ne mukau; luse kaluena lufunafuna, kaluena ludisua; luse kaluena luenza malu a dikamakama, kaluena ludikebela bintu, kaluena lukuata tshishi lubilu, kaluena lubala malu mabi adibo baluenzela; kaluena lusanka bua malu mabi, ludi lusanka bua kuikala ne malu a bushua; ludi tutuala malu onso, ludi luitabusha malu onso, ludi lutekemena malu onso, ludi ludikankamika mu malu onso

Bakafika kudi Hilekiya muakuidi munene, bakafila kudiye argent yakaya n ai Bena Lewi, balami ba ku bibuelelu, yakasangishabo ku bianza bia Bena Manashe ne Bena Efelayima ne kudi difuka dia Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda ne Bena Benyamina ne bonso ba mu Yelushalema mu nsubu wa Nzambi
Yosefe, bayandi, wakadi muntu muakane, yeye kakasua kumulesha kudi bantu, wakamba kumulekela mu musokoko
Kanupendi muena mapapa
Yoshua wakamba ne, Aka

Bimenga bia kunyemena Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua kumanyisha bena Izrayele ne: Panuikala bamane kusabuka musulu wa Yardene, bafike mu ditunga dia Kenaane, nusungule bimenga bikuabu bidi muntu mua kunyemena, pikalaye mushipangane mu mpukapuka
Bakamba ne, Kuteyi Mukelenge Nzambi webe
Hashishe wewe newikale ne diakalengele biwadimuka bua kutumikila mikenji ne mei biakambila Yehowa Mose bua Bena Isalele; wikale ne dikima ne mutshima mukole; kutshinyi, kukuatshiki buowa
Bakelangana tuima ku mitu, bakaluangana miele mu mbale; bakadishinda hanshi hohamue; nunku badi babikila muaba au ne, Helekatahasulima, udi mu Gibeona
Nubivuluke, nubienze; bualu ebu budi lungenyi luenu ne budimu buenu ku mesu kua bantu badi bunvua mikenji ei yonso, badi bamba ne, Bulelela, bantu aba banene badi ne lungenyi ne budimu

Kadi Kilisto, mumane kulua muakuidi munene wa mu bintu bimpe bilualua, bualu bua tshitendelelu tshitamba bunene ne buakane, katshî tshiasa ne bianza, tshidi bu kuamba ne, Katshiena tshia bifukibua ebi, kembua mashi a mbushi ne a bana ba ngombe, kadi bua mashi andi mene, wakabuela mu muaba mutambe tshijila musangu umue tshiendelele, mumane kuangatshila bantu dihikula dia tshiendelele
Hakafikeye hehi ne Yeleko, mufofo wakadi ushikama kukala kua nshila ulomba
Bakakuatshila mpingu mudimu yakabambila Yehowa ne, Kanuenji bualu ebu
Hashishe Boaza wakambila Luta ne, Muan anyi, kuena munvue, anyi

Hashishe hakajimina bena nvita bonso, hakafuabo munkatshi mua bantu, Yehowa wakangambila ne, Lelu nenuhite ku Ala, butshika bua Moaba: hanualua ba buihi ne Bena Amona, kanubatatshishi, kanuluanganyi n abo; bualu bua tshiena munuhe buloba bua Bena Amona bu buhianyi buenu, bualu bua nakamana kuha bana ba Lota buloba abu bu buhianyi buabo
Yakakuata Obeda edome ku sude; ne bana bandi ku tshiluminu
Samuele Davidi Udi Uhingana ku Yelushalema Bakambila Yoaba ne, Mona, mukelenge udi udila madilu bua Abashaloma
Muena mudimu wa Abrahame kubandamuna ne: Maweja Nangila mmumane kungendesha diakalenga
Panudi anu numbenga kanuyi nungitaba, meme nemvudije kabidi makenga enu misangu muanda mutekete
Yehezekele Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, tangisha mpala webe ku mikuna ya mu Isalele, uyambile mei a kuyibela
Nakamuitaba ne, Ndi mmona luesu lunene lua mai adi asaba, ne mpala walu udi utangila ku node
Kadi kabakamunvuila, bakenza bu mu bilele biabo bia diambedi
Hakunvua Davidi lumu elu, yeye wakatuma Yoaba ne bena nvita bandi bonso ba bukitu
Ke padibu babikila muaba awu ne: Abele Misrayime, mmumue ne: muaba wa madilu a bena Ejipitu
Nudi mua kudia bintu ebi miaba yonsu
Solomo Udi Ulomba Meji kudi Nzambi Kul
Mu kunyingalala kuanyi nakabikila Yehowa; e, nakadila kudi Nzambi wanyi

Katataka nuenu ne balumbuludi nuambile kamanda bua yeye kulua n andi kunudi, bu badi basue kumanya bualu buandi bimpe; tuetu tudi bamane kudilongolola bua kumushiha diambedi yeye kai muanze kulua ha buihi
Moshe kuambila bena Izrayele ne: Bantu bakuabu ba kunudi bambule bia mvita bua kuluisha bena Madiyane, bua bapete dinyoka didi Maweja Nangila mubafundile

Nakatangila nkuasa ya butumbi, ne bakashikamahu, ne bakabaha bukole bua kulumbuluisha; ne nakatangila mioyo ya bakoshibua mitu bualu bua bumanyishi buabo bua Yesu, ne bualu bua dî dia Nzambi, ne bobo bakadi kabai bakukuna nyama wa luonji, anyi tshifuanyikishi tshiandi, ne hakadi kabai bangata tshimanymu ha mpala habo ne ha tshianza tshiabo; bobo bakikala ne muoyo, ne bakakokesha ne Kilisto bidimu tshinunu
Gayo, muena nsubu undi mushikame ne muena ku nsubu kudi bena ekelesia bonso basangishilamu, udi unuela muoyo
Mu buloba abu buonso kabakâsangana bakashi bakuabo ne mpala milengele bu muakadi bana ba bakashi ba Yobo
Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Badi bankuatshisha meme tshiji, anyi
Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne bibidi tshia bukelenge bua Yolama, muana wa Ahaba, mukelenge wa Isalele, Ahazaya, muana wa Yeholama, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakabanga kukokesha

Bu muakufika tshianza tshianyi kudi makelenge akadi ne mpingu, tshiena ngenzela musoko wa Yelushalema ne mpingu yau Kadi halua Mukelenge kushikisha mudimu wandi wonso udiye wenzela mukuna wa Siona ne musoko wa Yelushalema, yeye neakengeshe bienzedi bia mu mutshima wa diambu wa mukelenge wa Ashû, neuhuekeshe butumbi bua kudilesha kuandi
Genesis Hakahita bidimu bibidi bijima, Palô wakalota tshiota, yeye wakadi muimane hehi ne musulu
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuikale talala, kanutshinyi Nzambi, Nzambi wa tatu wenu, wakanuha bintu mu bibombi bienu, meme nakadi ne argent yenu
Bantu bakahingana ku musoko mu musokoko dituku adi, bu bantu badi ne bundu batshimukabo mu nvita
Davidi wakabutula misoko ei, kakashiya nansha mulume nansha mukashi ne muoyo; wakaya ne mikoko ne ngombe ne nyama ya mpunda ne tumelo ne bilulu biabo, wakahingana kudi Akisha
Bualu bua mikenshi yonso idi misangisha mu dî dimue, ndî edi ne, Sua mukuenu bu mûdi mudisue
Tshiena ngakula bua dikengela dia bintu; bualu bua nakuyila mua kuikala ne mutshima muhole mu malu onso andi n au
Hashishe yeye wakabambila ne, Yai, numubikile
Ba mu nsubu wa Ahazaya kabakadi ne bukole bua kujadika n abu bukelenge
Kadi binuikala kanuyi baditshiha, bualu ebu kabuena bubi kunudi
Yeye wakadi n abo musokome mu nsubu wa Nzambi bidimu bisambombo; Atalaya wakadi ukokesha mu buloba
Mona, tuetu tudi bena mudimu lelu eu, ne bua buloha buwakaha bankambua betu bua kudiabo mamuma abu ne bintu biabu biakane, mona, tuetu tudi bena mudimu mu buloba ebu
Nunku wewe wakashiha kuditshiha kua kudi Yehowa, ne mukandu unakakuambila bua tshinyi
Dîku, kazubu ka nshindameenu ka tshinsanga tshia bantu, badi badilongolola mu lungenyi lwa kujadika bumwe bwaadi, bushindame bwaadi ne bubukubi bwaadi
Yeye wakambila bantu ne, Nudilongolole ku dituku disatu, kanuyi ha buihi ne bakashi nansha

Mikenji ya bena Levi Bitekedi bia miendu bia mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Utumine bena Izrayele diyi bakutuadile mafuta mimpe a tumuma tua olive, bua kutemesha nawu miendu dilolu dionsu
Bianuambilabo ne, Yeye udi mu tshihela, kanuyi; anyi ne, Yeye udi mu tusubu tua tshisokomenu, kanuitabushi
Abinê wakamba mei â kabidi mu matshu a Bena Benyamina; Abinê wakaya ku Hebelone bua kuambileye Davidi mu matshu andi mei mimpe onso akamba Bena Isalele ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa Benyamina
Wewe wakambila bantu bebe ne, Binuikala kanuyi balue ne muakuny enu, kanuena numonangana n anyi ku mesu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bantu aba nebampetule musangu bule munyi
Hakamona Bena Isalele bonso ne, Mukelenge kena witabusha dî dietu, bobo bakebesha mukelenge ne, Tuetu tudi ne luseke luetu lua bintu mu Davidi kudi kunyi
Nanku, muanabute mulume wa ngombe, wa mukoku nansha wa mbuji, numundambule meme
Nebabuikile tshilamba tshifikuluke ku tshitekelu tshia miendu, ku miendu yatshi, ku lukuatu, ku mbabula ne ku tulangi tua mafuta
Disanka dia Kuhita kua Yehowa dia Bena Yuda diakadi ha buihi, Yesu wakabanda ku Yelushalema
Muanjelo wa Mukelenge wakimana ha buihi n abo, butumbi bua Mukelenge buakabatemena; bakatamba kutshina
Yeye wakosha mifuba ya bakuidi ha bioshelu biabo, wakalengesha Yuda ne Yelushalema
Bamfumu kufika ne milambu ayi kumpala kua nzubu wa tshijila
Anu meme nkayanyi nakuhanduka bua kukuambila

Muakuidi neatangile ha disama, neateke tshintu tshidi ne disama edi ha buatshi tô matuku muanda mutekete, halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, yeye neatangile ha disama, bikala disama ditampakane mu tshilulu, nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama, nansha mu tshiseba tshidibo benza n atshi mudimu edi ndisama dia nsudi; tshintu etshi katshiena tshiakane
Badi mu Yudaya mu tshikondo atshi banyemene ku mikuna; badi mu musoko bahatuke; badi mu ntshiamba kabahinganyi mu musoko
Hakinvuabo bua dibika dia bafue, bakuabo bakaseka; kadi banga bakamba ne, Netunvue dî diebe kabidi bua bualu ebu
Unvua dî dia muadi wanyi, Yehowa, mu dinda neunvue di dianyi; Bualu bua wewe kuena Nzambi udi usanka mu malu mabi; Bantu badi bafunafuna kabena bamanye mua kuimana ku mesu kuebe
Abalahama wakadi ne bidimu makumi tshitema ne tshitema hakamutengulabo
Dituku divua Tamare ulela, bantu kumona ne: nealele bana ba mapasa
Yehowa wakankonka ne, Yelemiya, udi umona tshinyi
Kadi balombodi bakuabu kabavua bangata miaku ya Maweja Nangila ne mushinga

Mukelenge wakambila bena meji ba mu Babulona ne, Muntu yonso wabala tshifundu etshi, wandesha dijingulula diatshi nebamuluatshishe bilulu bikunzubile, nebamuele lukanu lua or mu nshingu muandi, nebamuteke bu muisatu munkatshi mua bakokeshi na bukelenge ebu
Kadi muntu ne muntu udi ne tshihedi tshiandi kudi Nzambi, mukuabo nunku mukuabo nunku

Aba mbana ba Bileha, wakaha Labana Lakele muan andi mukashi yeye wakalelela Yakoba bana aba buonso buabo bakadi muanda mutekete Bantu aba bonso bakalua ne Yakoba mu Ejipitu bonso bakahatuka munda mua Yakoba, kababadi bakashi ba bana bandi bakadi makumi asambombo ne basambombo, ne bana ba balume ba Yosefe bakamulelelabo mu Ejipitu bakadi babidi, bantu bonso ba mu nsubu bakalueye n abo mu Ejipitu bakadi makumi muanda mutekete
Yeye kena muana wa Yelubâla, anyi

Muanjelo muisatu wakela mpungi ne mu diulu muakahona mutoto munene mutema bu tshimunyi, wakahona ha tshituha tshisatu tshia misulu, ne ha mishimi ya mai; ne dina dia mutoto didi Bululu, ne tshituha tshisatu tshia mai tshiakalua bululu; ne bantu ba bungi bakafua bualu bua mai, bualu bua akavuishibua bululu
Hashishe Palô wakatabala Wakalala tulu kabidi, wakalota tshiota tshikuabo, wakamona miehu ya mponda muanda mutekete minene, miakane idiundile ku lubalabala lumue
Aba bakadi bana ba balume ba Nâla
Biamulonda musombuedi, kabafidi mushihi mu tshianza tshiandi, bualu bua yeye wakashiha mukuandi ku mpukahuka, kakadi n andi lukuna diambedi

Ku mukalu wa Yuda ku luseke lua esete tô ne ku luseke lua wesete kuikale muaba wa tshijila unudi nujidila Yehowa; butshiama buau buikale coudées binunu makumi abidi ne bitanu, bule buau buikale muomumue ne bule bua buhianyi bua tshinga tshisamba ku luseke lua esete to ne ku luseke lua wesete; ne tshitendelelu tshikale munkatshi muau
Tshiona tshiakafuma lubilu mulu bu tshihehele tshikole tshihita, tshiakûsha mu nsubu muonso muakadibo bashikame tente
Wakamba ne, Ndi bianyi di dia muntu udi wela lubila mu tshihela ne, Nululamishe nshila wa Mukelenge, bu muakamba muprofete Yeshaya
Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Kabena baha ba mu tshikondo etshi tshimanyinu
Bantu bonso ba mu tshisumbu bakalua n andi ku butshika bua tshitudilu, bakamushiha ne mabue, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Ntshidi kabidi mua kunvua mei a balume anyi bakashi himbabo misambu, anyi
Nuenu batshimbakanyi, nenunange butshimbakane musangu bule munyi
Ndi nnusengelela ne, Nubingambile
Bualu kai nuenu kanuena bamanye ne, Tshiakunuambila bua mitanda ya bidia
Yozefe kuambila tatuende ne: Tatu, lekela kuenza nanku
Hashishe Yeshua ne Bani ne Kadamiele ne Shebanya ne Buni ne Shelebaya ne Bani mukuabo ne Kenani bakimana ha tshibandilu tshia Bena Lewi, bakadila kudi Yehowa Nzambi wabo ne mei makole

Ndi ngamba ne, Musambu Wewe udi uhita bana balume ba bantu bonso bulengele; Luata muele webe wa nvita ha lubese luebe, wewe muena bukitu; Mu butumbi buebe wende biebe utamba bukole mu nvita Mikete yebe idi mitue bantu badi bahona ku mpala kuebe Nzambi, Udi unanga malu makane ne udi ne malu mabi lukuna
Yeye wakamba ne, Kanana udi muedibue mulau, yeye neikale muhika wa bahika kudi bana babo
Muena meji udi mutambe muhote munyi
Bualu bua meme ndi mumanye kutomboka kuenu ne tshitshu tshienu: monai, hantshidi ne muoyo munkatshi muenu lelu, nuakumana kutombokela Yehowa; nenutambe kutomboka ku nyima kua lufu luanyi
Wakangata makalu nkama isambombo masungula, ne makalu onso makuabo a mu Ejipitu ne tuhita tua makalu onso
Nsongakashi eu wakadi ne mpala muimpe be, wakatshidi kamama, kayi muanze kumanyibua kudi mulume, yeye wakahueka ku mushimi wa mai, wakasuna mulondo wandi tente, wakabanda kabidi
Nakajadikibua mu bukelenge buanyi, ne butumbi buanyi buakahita bua diambedi bunene
Yeye wakakolesha mutshima wandi, wakasa lumbu luakadi lushimbuka, wakajadika bibumba ne lumbu luakadi ku mpenge, wakakolesha Milo mu musoko wa Davidi, wakatula bintu bia nvita ne ngabu bia bungi
Neanusangishe, bua kunupingaja mu ditunga dia bankambua benu
Tuvua bakuenzele bimpe

Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe bakasabuka bavuale bintu biabo bia nvita ku mpala kua Bena Isalele, bu muakabambila Mose; bantu bu binunu makumi anai bakadi ne bintu biabo bia nvita bilongolola bakasabuka ku mpala kua Yehowa, bua kuluangana ku mpata ya Yeleko
Hakafikabo munkatshi mua bisamba abi kuakayabo, bakanyanga dina dianyi dia tshijila; bualu bua bantu bakuabo bakamba bua bualu buabo ne, Aba mbantu ba Yehowa, bakaluhuka mu buloba buandi

Nzambi Udi Umueneka kudi Yakoba ku Betele Yakoba wakabika ku Be sheba wakaya mu nshila wa ku Halana Hakafikeye ku muaba mukuabo yeye wakalalaku butuku abu, bualu bua diba diakamana kubuela, yeye wakangata dibue diakadi ku muaba au, wakasamahu mutu wandi, waka lala tulu
Abrahame kushala mu ditunga dia bena Peleshete matuku mulongulongu
Kadi yeye wakayila ne, Tshiena mumanye bualu, tshiena ngunvua mûdi wamba: yeye wakaluhuka, wakaya ha mbelu; tshitala tshiakasama

Yeye wakabambila ne, Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Kakuena muntu wakashia nsubu wandi, anyi mukashi wandi, anyi bana babo, anyi bamuledi, anyi bana bandi, bualu bua bukelenge bua Nzambi, udi kai uheta bintu bikuabo bitambe bia diambedi misangu ya bungi mu tshikondo etshi; halua tshikondo tshikuabo, neahete muoyo wa tshiendelele
Matuku au neikale dikenga dikole, ku tshibangidilu tshia bufuki buakafuka Nzambi tô ne katataka kakuakadi dikenga bu edi, kadiena dilua kabidi tshiendelele
Bakamuambila ne, Mbia Kaisa
Yesu wakamutuma kuandi ne, Kubuedi mu musoko
Diela dia muoyo dia kudi meme Paulo difunda ne tshianza tshianyi, ntshimanyinu mu mukanda wonso; nunku mundi nfunda
Nebukadenesâ wakabebesha ne, Edi ndî dia bushuwa, anyi
Bualu bua nuenu kanuena nuamba, Nyuma wa Tatu wenu udi wamba munda muenu
Uyilamike mu matumba anayi pa buipi ne mikolu yonsu inayi ya mesa
Wakenzaku tshioshelu, wakatshidika dina ne, El Elohe Isalele
Pikalabi bishale, nubilame bua kudia malaba
Yeye wakabatuma ku Beteleheme, wakamba ne, Yai bienu, nulonde bualu bua muana bitulu bitulu; hanuamusangana, nulue kundi ne dî, nunku meme kabidi nendue kumukukuila
Kadi nakuamba ne, Nasha, Mukelenge; tshintu tshia tshianana anyi tshia tshijila katshiena tshianze kubuela mukana muanyi
Muntu webe wakadi ne bana balume babidi, bubidi buabo bakaluangana hakadibo mu budimi, nansha muntu wakadiku bua kubasunga, nunku umue wakakuma mukuabo, wakamushiha
Bânaba wakasua kuya kabidi ne Yone wakadibo babikila ne, Mâko
Etu ntupitene tua bisamba bia Bena Isalele
Dana nealumbuluile bantu bilumbu biabo, bu tshimue tshia mu bisamba bia Bena Isalele
Bualu bua hobo bakulua ne bimuna biabo ne ntenta yabo; bakafila bu bungi bua mikumbi; hobo ne tumelo tuabo kabakabadibua; bakafila mu buloba bua kububutula
Yehowa neikale Mukelenge wa buloba bujima

Kanungu ka Bibambalu biônso bibidi bidi bitwilangana mu Tshisangilu Tshinene pa mianda eyi: a lwendu lwa kulonda mu diakajilula dia Dîyi dikulu bilondeshila tunungu twa too ne ku twa Dîyi dikulu edi ; b dianyisha dia diludika ne dikuba dia ditunga pa lukasa kudi bilwilu ne dieelangana dia mvita bilondeshila tunungu twa ne twa Dîyi dikulu edi ; c diteeleja dia muyuki wa Mulombodi wa ditunga pa ngikadilu wa mianda ya Ditunga bilondeshila kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi ; d diteeka dia bantu basatu beena Kabadi komekela mianda ya Dîyi dikulu bilondeshila bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi

Kanungu ka Dipangadika dia kulondeshisha ne dia kufunda Mulombodi wa ditunga ne Minisitila kavulambedi badi badieelela tukanda kudi tshitupa tshinene tshia bia bisatu bibidi bia beena Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga badi benza Tshisangilu tshinene bilondeshila dikasa dia kulonda dilongolola kudi dîyi diludiki dia mianda ya munda mwaatshi
Nunku meme ne bana betu ne bena mudimu banyi ne bena nvita bakadi bandonda katuakavula bilulu bietu; muntu yonso wakaya ne bintu biandi bia nvita ku mai
Mu matuku au diyoyo dia bungi diakabika bualu bua Nshila wa Nzambi
Bakatumikila; mikenji ya Nzambi waho ne ya kudilengesha kuabo; bimbi ba misambu ne batuadi bakenza nunku, bu muakadi mukenji wa Davidi ne muan andi Solomo
Muena Lewi, bayandi wa mukashi wakashihabo, wakabakudimuna ne, Nakalua ku Gibea wa mu buloba bua Benyamina, meme ne mukashi muhika unakabaka, bua kulalaku
Au mmena abo wa mu tshisamba tshia Lubena, Shamua, muana mulume wa Zaku
Hashishe bakatumina Izebele dî ne, Nabota udi mushihibue ne mabue
Mutuangaji atue munu mu mashi awu, aalabe ku matumba matalame adi ku tshilambuilu tshia milambu ya kuosha
Esâ hadona muan andi wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Neutulekele tufua bonsu, tubutuka nanku anyi
Yeye wakangambila ne, Akuenjibua

Bana ba Yosefe ba mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima binunu makumi anai ne nkama itanu
Kadi bobo bakabenga kungunvuila, bakasaka makaya, bakajibika matshu abo bua bobo kabunvu
Yeye kena unemeka nzambi ya ba tatu andi, kena unemeka nzambi udi bakashi banyisha anyi nzambi yonso mukuabo; bualu bua yeye neaditumbishe ku mutu kua buonso buai

Nunku numusankidile mu Mukelenge ne disanka dionso; ne nutumbishe bantu badi nunku; bualu bua yeye wakalua ha buihi ne lufu bualu bua mudimu wa Kilisto, yeye wakahana muoyo wandi ku lufu bua kunkumbashila bintu biakadi bishala ku dikuatshisha dienu kundi
Padi bionsu ebi binuenzekela kanuyi nungitaba, nanku nemvudije makenga enu awu misangu muanda mutekete, bua malu mabi anudi benza
Yeye kena mua kutamba kuvuluka matuku a muoyo wandi; bualu bua Nzambi udi umuvuishisha disanka mu mutshima wandi
Yehowa wakampa bintu, Yehowa wakangata bintu; dina dia Yehowa ditumbishibue

Isaiah Ngimbile wanyi munanga musambu wanyi wa dinanga Yeye wakabubundulula, wakumusha mabue onso akadimu, wakakunamu mionshi ya tumuma yakatamba buimpe, Nunku, nuenu badi bashikame mu Yelushalema, Nakadi kumanya mua kuenza tshinyi mu budimi buanyi Mpindiu nennuambile Nenkubutule, Bualu bua budimi bua tumuma tua nvinyo bua Yehowa wa misumba Mulau wikale kudi badi balamakasha nsubu ne nsubu, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba mu matshu anyi ne, Bualu bua hectares neyilue anu ne tshihiminu ne ntshihiminu tshimue tshia homer netshikuamishe anu tshihiminu tshimue tshia épha Mulau wikale kudi bantu badi bajuka hatshiatshia Mu bidia biabo bia disanka badi ne tshisanji ne lunzenze, Bua malu â bantu banyi badi babuela mu buhika Nunku Muaba wa Bafue wakudiundisha kunvua kuau kua nzala, Muntu muhuekele udi muiname, Kadi Yehowa wa misumba udi mutumbishibue ku kulumbulula kuakane
Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Wewe newikale mulami wa bantu banyi Bena Isalele, wewe newikale mukelenge wabo
Ya dituku dia Tshidimu tshipiatshipia Dituku dia kumpala dia ngondu wa muanda mutekete, kanuenji mudimu to
Nunku kakunyua dî dia Yehowa; bakahingana mu nshila yabo bu muakadi dî dia Yehowa
Nenteke mesu anyi kudibo bua kubenzela bimpe, nendue n abo mu buloba ebu kabidi
Hashishe, nakamba mu mutshima wanyi ne, Bualu budi bukuata muhote nebunkuate kabidi; tshindi muvudishile meji ntshinyi

Bualu bua Môdekai, Muena Yuda, wakadi muntu muibidi ku nyima kua mukelenge Ahashawelosha, ne wakadi munene munkatshi mua Bena Yuda, wakadi muitabushibue kudi tshisumbu tshia bana babo, mukebe diakalengele dia bana babo, muambile bana babo mei a ditalala
Nuenu bafundi ne Bafalese, nudi bena lubombo
Kupampakanaye bikole, kupanda bilamba biende
Elisha wakamuambila ne, Wangate buta ne mikete; wakangata buta ne mikete
Ubambile ne, Unvuai dî dia Yehowa, nuenu bakelenge ba Yuda, ne ba mu Yuda bonso, ne Bena Yelushalema bonso, badi babuelela ku bibi ebi
Ne bishimikidi bia lumbu lua musoko biakalengeshibua ne mabue a mushinga mukole a mishindu yonso

Mukelenge wanyi, bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo ne bu mudi mutshima webe ne muoyo, bualu bua Yehowa wakakukanda bua wewe kumatshishi mashi hanshi ne bua wewe kudisombuedi ne tshianza tshiebe, nunku badi n ebe lukuna ne badi bakeba kuenzela mukelenge wanyi bibi, bikale bu Nabala

Muakuidi munene wa Nzambi udi udidila ne bakulu bonso; nakangata mikanda kudibo mitumine bana betu, nakadi ngenda mu nshila wa ku Damaseke bua kusuika bakadiku mu nkanu, ne bua kulua n abo ku Yelushalema bua kubakengeshabo
Bana ba Yakobe kuenza bionsu abi

Bena Peleshete kabidi bakadi bahaule misoko ya mu bibanda ne ku luseke lua ku Sude kua Yuda, bakadi banyenge Bete shemeshe ne Ayalona ne Gedelote ne Soko ne misoko yandi, ne Timena ne misoko yandi, ne Gimezo ne misoko yandi; bakashikamamu

Wakateka bakeluba munda mua muaba eu: mahuahua a bakeluba akadi malehe, nunku lusongo lua dihuahua dimue diakalua ku tshimanu tshimue tshia nsubu, ne dinga diakatua ku tshimanu tshikuabo: nsongo ya mahuahua abo akatuangana munda mua nsubu
Dituku adi nusanke, nutuhike bua disanka, bualu bua difutu dienu didi dinene mu diulu; bualu bua bankambua babo bakenzela baprofete nunku kabidi
Nunku Hilama wakaha Solomo mitshi ya cèdre ne ya cyprès bu muakasueye muonso
Bakambila Davidi ne, Wewe kuena ubuela munemu, anu haumusha bafofo ne balema, bela meji ne Davidi kena mua kubuelamu

Enza biebe tshilulu tshia kuteka ku mbelu kua tshitendelelu tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin mutambe buimpe, utshienzeshe kudi muntu udi ne lungenyi lule lua kulengesha
Padi Arone wasa tshifulu atshi, pandi ntshimona, nengikale mfuila bena Izrayele luse nansha bobu batupakana padibu bantuadila milambu
Kadi nuenu kubenga, ditambisha kunuenza
Ekesode Mikenji Dikumi Dut

Bialuangana balume ne biakuma umue mukuabo ne dibue anyi biamututeye tshisusu, kena umushiha kadi yeye udi ulala ha bulalu, biabikeye kabidi ne udi wenda ne mulangala wandi, muntu wakamukuma neabinge, kadi yeye neamufute bua matuku akalaleye hanshi, ne mushinga wa kuondahibua kua ndi

Wewe nkayebe neulekele kulama buhianyi bunakukuha; nenkuenzeshe bua wewe kukuatshila badi n ebe lukuna mudimu mu buloba bûdi kuyi mumanye; bualu bua nsola tshiji tshianyi bu kahia kadi kosha tshiendelele
Bakela dî bikole ne, Wewe Muana wa Nzambi, tudi n ebe bualu kai
Ndi nuambila kabidi ne, Kubuela kua kamelu mu disu dia kashingi kudi kutamba kubuela kua muntu mubanshi mu bukelenge bua Nzambi butekete
Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Bakumana kuangata difutu diabo
Kuena mumanye ne kunfudilu kua bualu ebu nekuikale anu ne kanyinganyinga
Kadi ba bidime bakamukuma, bakamuhingisha hatuhu
Tshianza tshiakandenga, tshiakantuishisha binu bianyi hanshi ne bianza kabidi
Bienzedi bia Zekâya bikuabo bidi bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele
Hakamaneye bintu bionso, tshiole tshinene tshiakalua ku luseke alu; wakabanga kukengela bintu
Tobiya wakantumina mikanda bua kuntshinyisha n ai

Bualu bua nuakuamba ne, Yehowa wakutubishila baprofete mu Babulona; edi ndî didi Yehowa wamba bua mukelenge udi mushikame mu nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Davidi, ne bua bantu bonso badi bashikame mu musoko eu, bana benu mene badi kabayi baluhuke n enu bua kuya mu buhika
Hanakadi n abo, nakubalama mu dina diebe diwakumpa; ne nakabalama, ne kakuakadi umue wakujimina anu muana wa dibutuka, bua kushikisha dî diakadi difunda mu Mukanda wa Nzambi
Kadi ndi ngambila nuenu, badi bashala mu Tuatila, kudi bungi buenu badi kabai ne diyisha edi, badi kabai bamanye malu male a Satana, mbu mudibo bamba ne, Tshiena nteka bujitu bukuabo ham bidi henu
Kadi kanukoshi miepu ne muele to
Bionso biyaya ku muaba umue; bionso bidi anu dinfuenkenya dia buloba, nebiandamuke dinfuenkenya dia buloba kabidi

Bena Nafatale kabakihata bantu ba mu Bete shemeshe, anyi ba mu Bete anata; kadi bakashikama munkatshi mua Bena Kanâna, bena buloba; kadi Bena Bete shemeshe ne Bena Bete anata bakabakuatshila mudimu wa mulambu

Wakangata kabidi diminu dia mu buloba ebu, waka dikuna mu budimi buakadi ne buloba buimpe; wakaditeka hehi ne mai a bungi, wakadikuma bu mutshi wa saule, diakatoloka, ne diakalua muonshi udi ulamba kauyi mutambe bule, matamba a muonshi atangilangana n andi, ne miji yau iya muinshi muakadiye
Nemmujadike bu mudibo basa tshikudika mu muaba mushindame, ne yeye neikale bu nkuasa wa butumbi kudi ba mu nsubu wa tatu andi
Yehowa wakangambila kabidi ne, mona, lelu eu nakukuteka ha mutu ha bisamba ne makelenge, Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Yelemiya, udi umona tshinyi
Mu muaba wawa neufue biebe, ne mu muaba wawa nemuikale makalu ebe a mushinga mukole, wewe mufuishishi wa nsubu wa nfumu webe bundu
Kanusedianganyi nabu
Nunku mukelenge ne Hamana bakalua ku bidia bia disanka biakabalongoluela Esetê
Yesu wakakonka ne, Wakundenga tshianza nganyi
Wakatabasha mesu ebe munyi
Bûngi bwa batshipwita bakulumpa pamwe ne mushindu wa kubasungula ne kusungudibwa badi babuleeja kudi dîyi didi ditangila masungulangana
Ne wewe kampanda, utu walumbuluisha batu benza malu a nunku, ne utu wenza biebe muomumue, udi welangana meshi ne, Meme nempanduke mu dilumbuluisha dia Nzambi, anyi
Panudi nulamba munyinyi wa muana wa mbuji, kanuedimu mabele a mamuende to
Aba mbana ba balume ba Oholibama, mukashi Wa Esau mukelenge Yeusha ne mukelenge Yalama ne mukelenge Kola, aba mbakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Oholibama, muana wa Ana, mukashi wa Esau
Bena Izrayele nebitabe malu audi ubambila
Bâsha, muana wa Ahiya, wa mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ, wakamuelela tshifufu
Nuenu nuakadibisha mu miaba ya batatu benu bu bana ba bantu babi bakavulangana, bua kudiundisha bukole bua tshiji tshia Yehowa kudi Isalele
Hakahita bidimu bisatu, bantu babidi ba Shimei bakanyemena kudi Akisha, muana wa Mâka, mukelenge wa mu Gata
Bua bualu ebu kanuena nudituadila bubi, hanuanyukula bintu bidi bitamba buimpe kanuena nuona bintu bia tshijila bia Bena Isalele, bua nuenu kanufu
Nanku dilaya dionsu didi mukaji musela ulaya, nansha padiye uditshipa bua kujila tshintu, bayende udi mua kujadika, nansha kushipa dilaya diende, nansha mutshipu wende
Bakaya, bakambila bantu bualu bua Nzambi ne, Kudimunai mitshima yenu
Bantu ne bakelenge ba mu Gilada bakakonkangana ne, Muntu kai wahanga nvita bua kuluangana ne Bena Amona
Ekesode Nsubu wa Tshitendelelu Ek
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuenu nudi bamanye muntu au ne mei akadiye wamba
Wewe udi musulula kudi mukashi, anyi
Nanku bua kumusha mikiya pambidi pa muntu awu, bangate butu bua ngombe uvuabu balambule bua kukobolola nende bantu
Bikala mulambu wa mundi wa kumuvuisha n au ditalala wa munkatshi mua mikoko wa kudia kudi Yehowa, neafue mulume nansha mukashi udi kayi ne tshilema
Bakumusha milambu ya kuosha bua kuyifila kudi Yehowa bu muakadi kutahulula kua nsubu ya batatu abo, bana ba mu ditunga, bu muakafundabo mu mukanda wa Mose
Wakamba ne, Yehowa, ndi nkusengelela ne, Uvuluke munakuenda ku mpala kuebe mu bushuwa ne mu buakane bua mutshima, ne munakuenza malu akadi mimpe ku mesu kuebe
Kakuena muntu udi ne dinanga didi ditambe edi, dia muntu udi ufuila balunda bandi
Kakuena mvidie mukuabu to, amu yeye
Kunyangabu ditunga dijima ne bintu bionsu bia bena Amaleke too ne bia bena Amore bavua basombe mu Ashashone Tamare

Mukelenge wakimana mu muaba wandi, wakahunga ne Yehowa tshihungidi bua kulonda ku nyima kua Yehowa ne bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi ne malu adiye musue muntu enze, ne mutshima wandi wonso ne muoyo wandi wonso, ne bua kutumikila mei a tshihungidi akadi mafunda mu mukanda eu
Jeremiah Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu tshikondo atshi nebahatule mifuba ya bakelenge ba Yuda, ne mifuba ya baminyampala babo, ne mifuba ya baprofete babo ne mifuba ya Bena Yelushalema bonso mu majambu abo
Genese Yakoba Udi Uvudishila Efelayima ne Manashe Disanka Hakashika malu a bakambila Yosefe ne, Mona tatu webe udi usama; yeye wakaya kudiye ne bana bandi ba balume babidi, Manashe ne Efelayima
Kanukunyi biakudia, kanusolu mionji yenu ya mvinyo, kanunowi bidimenene bia tshidimu tshishale, nansha tumuma tua mvinyo tua ku mionji inuvua kanuyi basole
Bualu ebu buakadi buimpe ku mesu kua Palô ne ku mesu kua bantu bandi bonso
Bantu ne bakelenge ba mu Gilada bakakonkangana ne, Muntu kai wahanga nvita bua kuluangana ne Bena Amona
Yakobe ubamona, kuelaye diyi dikole wamba ne: Muaba ewu mmitanda ya Mvidi Mukulu
Yoshua ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadi n andi bakahingana ku tshitudilu tshia ku Gilegala
Tatu wanyi udi utumbishibua mu bualu ebu ne, Nudi nukuama mamuma a bungi; nunku nenuikale bayidi banyi
Mu matuku a Helode, mukelenge wa Yudaya, muakuidi wa Nzambi wakadiku, dina diandi Zakâya, wakadi wa mu mulongo wa Abiya; mukashi wandi wakadi wa mu bana bakashi ba Alona, dina diandi Elisabeta
Katataka wewe ubafundile musambu eu, wayisha Bena Isalele bonso musambu; uteke musambu eu mukana muabo, newikale bu mumanyi wa bualu buanyi kudi Bena Isalele
Bakamba ne, Nasha
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Tuakufuma ku Beteleheme yuda; tuyaya ku nyima kua mikuna ya Efelayima, nkunakafuma

Mutshima udi uteketa, binu bidi bikanka, Buina bua nyama ya ntambue Nyama wa ntambue wakasunsuluila bana bandi munyinyi, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Mona, ndi nkuhidia, nenshidishe makalu ebe mu kahia, muele wa mata neumane bana bebe ba ntambue, bintu biebe biwakunyenga, nembiumushe ha buloba, bantu kabena bunvua kabidi dî dia ba messager bebe
Ke Maweja Nangila kungambila ne: Bena Izrayele badi bamba bimpe
Nunku kembualu bua kuanyina bikala bakuatshishi bandi badiandamuna bu bakuatshishi ba malu makane; kunshikidilu kuabo nekuikale bu mudi bienzedi biabo
Padi muanenu musue kusumbisha budimi buende, bua dikenga didi dimukuata, anu muena diku ke udi ne mushindu wa kupikula budimi abu
Balumbuluishi Gideona Udi Ukuata Bakelenge ba Midiyana Bena Efelayima bakamuambila ne, Bualu kai wakatuenzela nunku, kuakatubikila hawakaya kuluangana ne Bena Midiyana
Bantu bakuabu badi babikila bena Emi ne: mbena Refayime, bu mudibu babikila kabidi bena Anake
Yoaba wakebesha Amasa ne, Muan etu, udi mukole, anyi
James Nvita ne difuilangana bia munkatshi muenu biakulua kudi kunyi
Wakabuela mu luesu; wakamba ne, Uhongoluele bantu, badie
Amen
Ku Pâbâ ku wesete banai ku tshibandilu, ne babidi ku Pâbâ
Bumuka mu Rimone Perese, kuyabu ku Libna
Abalahama Udi Ulomba Nzambi bualu bua Sodoma Bantu aba bakabika, bakatangila ku Sodoma, ne Abalahama wakaya kubashindikila mu nshila
Bantu bonso bakabalabo ba mu tshitudilu tshia Dana bakadi binunu lukama ne makumi atanu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama isambombo
Hashishe Abishai, muana wa Seluya, wakakonka mukelenge ne, Mbua eu mufue udi ne bua kuhenda mukelenge wanyi nunku bua tshinyi
