Mubidi webe udi luhanza luenza ne dibumba, ludi kaluyi luhanga nvinyo misangisha, tshifuka tshiebe tshidi bu tshisumbu tshia blé tshidi tshisuika bilongo bia nsungubidi

Yeye wakamuela lusumuinu luandi ne, Belama, muana mulume wa Beô, muntu wakadi ne disu diandi dibuikila, udi Wamba ne, Udi unvua mei a Nzambi, udi ne lungenyi lua Nzambi wa mu diulu, udi utangila bilota bia Nzambi wa Bukole, hahoneye hanshi ne mesu andi adi matabale
Kadi udi muibe mpingu ya mvidie indi ntendelela bua tshinyi
Biwalua ne mulambu wa bintu bia kumudilu binudi nuhuola kudi Yehowa, nufile bintu bidi mu miehu biosha mu kahia, miehu mihia mihia idibo ba tua diambedi
Yeye wakabambila ne, Muntu udi n anyi lukuna nguakuenza bualu ebu
Tshiyi muanji kujikija ditendelela dianyi, Rebeka kufika muambuile mulondu wa mayi pa makaya, uya ku mpokolu
Hawela mpungi bikole tshiakabidi, bantu ba mu bitudilu bia ku sude nebaye ku luendu luabo, bobo nebele mpungi bikole bua luendu luabo
Mu dina adi kamuakadi mai, anu bitotshi; ne Yelemiya wakabuela mu bitotshi
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba dî edi

Yeye wakalongolola tshioshelu tshia Yehowa, wakafilahu milambu ya kuosha ne ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala ne ya kusakidila n ai Nzambi; wakelela Bena Yuda mukenji bua bobo batendelele Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele
Bualu tshidi tshinuvuluija dituku dimvua mupatule bantu benu mu Ejipitu
Wakela dî diandi bikole ne, Tatu Abalahama, unfue luse, utume Lazalo, atue lusongo lua munu mu mai, antalashe ludimi luanyi, bualu bua meme ndi ne dikenga mu kahia aka

Mose Udi Ubadimusha bua Mpingu Hashiha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bisamba bidi ku mpala kuenu, hanuabihata, hanuahiana buloba buabo, nudimuke, kanukuatshibu kudi mateyi abo bua kubalonda, habajimishabo ku mesu kuenu; kanukonkanganyi bua nzambi yabo ne
Bualu bua bakabala bana balume ba Lewi bakadi bakumbana bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ku mutu, bu muakadi mei a kunshikidilu a Davidi
Bualu bua tuetu tudi ne muakuidi munene wakuhita mulu onso, Yesu Muana wa Nzambi mene, tulamate dijukula dia ditabusha dietu
Solomo wakitaba ku makonka andi onso; yeye kakamusokoka bualu bumue, wakamuambila malu onso
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kadi kanuakungunvuila, nunku nuakunkuatshisha tshiji ku bienzedi bia bianza bienu, bua kudivuishila dikenga

Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Angata bintu bidibo bafila kudi bantu aba bakadi mu buhika, Heledai, Tobiya ne Yedaya mene; dituku adi mene, wewe muine, ya ku nsubu wa Yoshiya, muana wa Selanya, kuakatulabo hakafumabo ku Babulona
Hakunvua bantu bonso bakadi mu tshibumba tshia mu Shekeme lumu elu, bakabuela mu nsubu wa mabue wa Ele belita
Kadi binuikala kanui nujimishila bantu mibi yabo, Tatu wenu kena unujimishila mibi yenu
Filipo wakadi Muena Bete saiîa, musoko wa Andele ne Petelo
Bakulu ba mu Yabesha bakamuambila ne, Utuheshe matuku muanda mutekete bua tuetu kutuma bamessager ku nseke yonso ya Isalele; nunku bikala kakuyi muntu wa kutusungila, netulue kudi

Bantu bine aba badi bamanyisha majinga abo mu tshibûngi tshia bisumbu bia tshidiidi tshishindika kudi dîyi dikulu didi kabidi dijadika ne kwenza tshisumbu tshia tshidiidi tshia mu kabumwe kudi tshibawu tshia dipàangila dia ditunga
Bienzedi bia Zimeli bikuabo biakenzeye, ne tshitungu tshiakatungileye, kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele, anyi

Bantu ba Tshijila ba Yehowa Bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu; Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanusungula munkatshi mua bisamba bionso bidi hanshi ha buloba, bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba buhianyi buandi
Timothy Nunku ku mpala kua malu onso, ndi nkusengelela bua milombu ne mitendelelu ne mitendekenu ne masakidila bikale bienzele bantu bonso

Nebahue muoyo bua bundu buabo ne bua ditomboka diabo diakantombokelabo, haluabo kushikama mu buloba buabo kabayi ne bualu budi bubahumbisha, ne kakuyi muntu umue wa kubatshinyisha, hanabumusha munkatshi mua bantu ba bende bua kubahingasha, hanabasangisha bua kubumusha mu maloba a bena lukuna babo, ne hanamuenesha tshijila tshianyi mu malu andi mbenzela ku mesu kua ba mu bisamba bia bungi bia bantu
Dibatiza dia Yone diakafuma kudi kunyi; mu diulu anyi kudi bantu
Nenteke mesu anyi kudibo bua kubenzela bimpe, nendue n abo mu buloba ebu kabidi
Yeholama wakadi ne bidimu makumi asatu ne bibidi hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu muanda mukulu
Halua dituku dia kulumbulula, bujitu bua dikenga dienu nebutambe bua Tulo ne bua Sidona
Izake kulayangana nabu, kakuyi kadiwu

Muambi Kuditshiha Lubilu Kudi Hatuhu Ulame makasa ebe hawabuela mu nsubu wa Nzambi; kusemena ha buihi bua kunvua kudi kuhita milambu ya bahote buakane, bualu bua bobo kabena bamanye ne, Tudi tuenza bualu bubi
Diula Nzambi ne fuaku biebe
Ubatelele kabidi tuputula tua muinshi tua buanda bua ndanda, tumukila mu tshimonu too ne mu binu bua butaka buabu kabumueneki
Neanunyoke, bualu tuetu katuena kabidi ne mushinga kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne kudi bantu bende
Kadi muntu ne muntu nebabike mu mulongo wandi: Kilisto, mamuma a kukuama diambedi; ne hashishe, bantu ba Kilisto nebabike halueye
Tuapangi ne mayi mene a kunua
Nebanubadile mulambu udibo banyukula bu bintu biakushihulabo ku tshishihuidi ne bu bintu biakukamabo ha tshikaminu
Bena Lewi: bana ba Yeshua ne Kadamiele ne ba Hodaweya, makumi muanda mutekete ne banai

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bishai dibendela mu buloba, Nulongolole ba mu bisamba bia bantu bua kuluangana n andi, Buloba budi buzakala, budi ne dikenga, Bena nvita ba mu Babulona bakulekela kuluangana, Muena mikanda udi unyema bua kusangakaneye ne mukuabo, bakunyenga bisabukilu bionso, Bualu bua Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakundia, Ba mu Siona bambe biabo ne, Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Babulona neikale anu mishiki ya nsubu minyanguke, Nebakungule diatshimue bu nkungulu ya nyama ya ntambue, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nendue n abo ku tshishihelu bu bana ba mikoko, Tangila muakunyengabo Sheshaka, Mai manene akabanda ha mutu ha Babulona, Misoko yabo yakushala bikulu, Nenkengeshe Bele mu Babulona, Bantu banyi, luhukai munkatshi muandi
Kadi malu onso adi afuma kudi Nzambi, wakatulengesha kudiye bualu bua Kilisto wakatuha mudimu wa kulengeshisha bakuabo kudiye: ne
Dutelonone Diulu, teleja matshu, nengambe, buloba bunvue mei a mukana muanyi
Muntu yonso unvue biandi lubilu, atukishe kai muanze kuakula, kakuatshi tshishi lubilu; bualu bua tshishi tshia muntu katshiena tshienza malu makane a Nzambi
Yeye wakabandamuna, wakabakonka ne, Mose wakanuambila tshinyi
Katataka binuasua kulesha mukelenge wanyi luse ne bulelela, nungambile, ne binuahidia, nungambile kabidi: nunku meme ndi mua kuya ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Tshitupa tshia kumpala
Nuenu ba mu tshiota tshia Lewi, nuvudishile Yehowa disanka

Nzambi atambe kuela Abinê mulau binahanga kuenzela Davidi malu onso akamulaya Yehowa; bua kunyenga bukelenge mu nsubu wa Shaula ne bua kujadika nkuasa wa butumbi wa Davidi ku mutu kua Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda ku Dana tô ne ku Bê sheba
Hakashikisha Solomo kulomba kuandi ne kutendekena kuandi kudi Yehowa, wakajuka ku mpala kua tshioshelu tshia Yehowa kuakatueye binu biandi hanshi ne bianza biandi biolola mulu

Nunku nakatanda n abo, nakabela mulau, nakabakuma, nakatua nsuki yabo, nakabatshihisha kudi Nzambi ne, Kanufidi bana benu bakashi kudi bana babo balume, kanuangatshidi bana benu balume bakashi kudibo, kanudiangatshidibo nuenu kabidi
Yehowa neakume ba mu Ejipitu, neabatahe ne neabasangashe kabidi; nebahingane kudi Yehowa, ne yeye neitabushe bua bamulombe, neakoleshe mibidi yabo
Makalu a nvita anai akadi afuma hankatshi ha mikuna ibidi; mikuna ei yakadi mikuna ya tshiamu tshia mitaku
Bimenga bionso bia Bena Gêshona ku meku abo biakadi dikumi ne bisatu ne miaba yabi ya ku matshika
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Ya biebe, ubatambe bukole; nebafidibue mu bianza biebe
Nunku bakamulengulula, kabakamuha kantu kakese
Hashishe nennuenzele bu munakelangana meji bua kubenzela bobo

Uhumuna njiya yebe ham bidi ha bisamba bia bantu bidi kabiyi bikumanye, Bualu bua bakadia Yakoba, Kuvuluki malu a tshishiku a bankambua betu bua kutulesha n au: Wewe Nzambi wa luhandu luetu, utukuatshishe bua butumbi bua dina Bua tshinyi ba mu bisamba bia bantu badi batukonka ne, Dihumuna dia bena lukanu difike ku matshu ebe
Bualu bua malu adi akuata bana ba bantu adi akuata nyama kabidi; mufuafua umue mmufuafua mukuabo; bidi ne muhuya muomumue; bantu kabena bahita nyama buakane; malu onso adi hatuhu
Tshiena nkutuma kudi bantu bangi badi bakula muaku ûdi kuyi mumanye ne kudi badi ne ludimu luneme, badi bakula mei audi kuyi mumanye mua kujingulula
Tshintu tshionso tshidiye ulala hadiye ku katshetshi netshikale ne bukoya, ne tshintu tshionso tshidiye ushikama netshikale ne bukoya
Bela wakalela bana ba balume: Adâ ne Gela ne Abihuda ne Abishua ne Nâmana ne Ahoa ne Gela ne Shefufana ne Hulama
Nunku ekelesia yakakoleshibua mu ditabusha, yakadi ivulangana ku dituku ku dituku
Tshiena mua kuitaba bua nuye ne bakaji ne bana to, bualu nudi nuleja patoke munudi ne meji makuabu mabi munda muenu

Bituha bionso bia mubidi bidi biakashangana ne bidi bilamakashangana kudiye bua dikuatshishangana dia manungu onso, bu mudi mudimu wa tshituha tshionso, bidi bidiundisha mubidi mujima, tô ne hatentamabi bu nsubu mu dinanga
Tatuabu Yetro kubakonka ne: Lelu munudi bapingane lukasa nanku mmunyi
Bafalese bakalua kudiye, bakamukonka ne, Biahidia mulume mukashi wandi neashihe mukenshi wa Nzambi, anyi

Bakabala Shekeme ne miaba ya ku matshika mu mikuna ya Efelayima, tshimenga tshia kunyemenamu, ne Gezê ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Kibesayima ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Bete holona ne miaba ya ku matshika; bimenga binai
Bakabahesha, muntu ne muntu, diyeka ditoke; ne bakabambila bua kuanza kuikisha tshituha tshihi tô ne hakumbashibua bahika n abo, ne bana babo ba mu Kilisto, badi balua kushihibua bu bobo

Dutelonone Bintu Bifila kudi Bena Lewi Bakuidi ba mu Bena Lewi, ne tshisamba tshionso tshia Lewi kabena ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele; bobo nebadie munyinyi wa milambu ya Yehowa idibo bosha ha kahia bu buhianyi bua Yehowa

Nakasangana mukanda wa kulondolola kua bankambua ba bantu bakadianjila kuhingana, malu akadi mafundamu nunku: Aba mbantu ba luseke bakumuka mu buhika, bakadi bangatshibue, bakadi Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, muangate, bakahingana ku Yelushalema ne ku Yuda, muntu yonso ku mosoko wandi; bakalua ne Zelubabela ne Yeshua ne Nehemiya ne Azaya ne Lâmeya ne Nahamani ne Môdekai ne Bileshana ne Misepelete ne Bigewai ne Nehuma ne Bâna
Nuenu nenutendelele Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, yeye neayudishe disanka ku bidia bienu ne ku mai enu, nennumushile disama munkatshi muenu
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nuenu, bakokeshi ba Bena Isalele, nuitabushe bua malu makole anuakenza ne ashike
Bikala Nzambi n etu, nganyi udi mumanye mua kutuhumbisha
Yeye wakunvua Paulo wakula; Paulo wakamutangila talala; hakamanyeye ne, Yeye udi ne ditabusha dia kukoleshibua, wakela di diandi bikole ne, Imana ne makasa ebe Wakabika lukasa, wakenda
Muntu yonsu udi umulenga, udi upia mikiya, ushala nayi too ne ku dilolu
Tera kushala ne muoyi bidimu nkama ibidi ne bitanu, kufuila mu Arane

Hakunvua Asa mei â akamuambila Odede muprofete, yeye wakakolesha mutshima wandi, wakumusha malu mabi onso akadi mu buloba bua Yuda ne Benyamina, ne mu misoko yonso yakanyengeye mu mikuna ya Efelayima; yeye wakashila kabidi tshioshelu tshia Yehowa tshiakadi ku mpala kua tshibuelelu tshia ku nsubu wa Yehowa
Bua malu â nennuvuishe bantu bahetudibue ne bahuekeshibue ku mpala kua bantu bonso, bualu bua kanuena nulama mei anyi, kadi nudi nulesha bantu kansungusungu mu diyisha dia mikenji
Katataka nudi basue kubuesha Bena Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema bu bahika benu bakashi ne balume; kadi nuenu kanuakenzela Yehowa Nzambi wenu bibi, anyi
Kena musue kupesha muanabu muana bua kusangukaye
Bu mudi tshilongo tshia nsungubidi munkatshi mua meba, wanyi munanga udi nunku munkatshi mua bana ba bakashi
Bonso badi bakula miaku mikuabo, anyi
Nunku bualu butudi tukeba kabidi ne, Bituikala mu mubidi anyi katui mu mubidi, mbua kumusankisha
Ebu budi bualu bundi nuambila ne, Nebajimishile bantu mibi yabo yonso ne bihendu biabo bidibo bahenda n abi Nzambi, kadi kabena babajimishila bihendu bidibo bahenda n abi Nyuma

Mose wakabatuma ku nvita, bantu tshinunu ku tshisamba ku tshisamba, Pinehasa, muana mulume wa Eleazâ muakuidi, wakaya n abo ne bintu bikuabo bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne mpungi ya kuela n ai dî dikole mu tshianza tshiandi
Badi bakeba muoyo wanyi bafuishibue bundu, bakeheshibue
Imbe biandi misambu
Belâma wakaya ne Balaka, bakalua ku Kîyata husota
Nansha muntu musue kundambula bimuna bia bungi, ku tshimuna tshionsu asakidile anu milambu mikuabu ituatedi eyi
Bualu bua kumudilu, udi nsakidila Nzambi wanyi mu Yesu Kilisto bua buonso buenu, bualu bua ditabusha dienu didi dimanyishibue ba buloba buonso
Anyi, muntu udi ne tshintu kai tshia kushintakasheye bua kuangateye muoyo wandi kabidi
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Au mmena a balume badi banutahuluila buloba bua buhianyi buenu, Eleazâ muakindi ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna
Yoaba wakamba ne, Tshiena mua kujanguluka n ebe bua bualu ebu
Hakahita manga matuku, mukelenge Agipa ne Bênike bakalua ku Kaisalia bua kuela Festo muoyo
Kadi nganyi udi mua kumuibakila nsubu, bualu bua yeye udi uhita diulu ne diulu didi ku mutu kua diulu bunene
Wakenza malu mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa, bu muakenza Uziya, tatu wandi
Nunku, muana wa muntu, akula ne ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele, ubambile ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Batatu benu bakahenda dina dianyi hakantombokelabo

Kadi bua bualu ebu nakafuidibua luse, bua munda muanyi bu muntu mubi muhite bakuabo, Yesu Kilisto amueneshe lutulu luandi luonso, bu tshileshilu kudi bantu balua kumuitabusha tô ne ku muoyo wa tshiendelele
Yai bienu lubilu kudi tatu wanyi, numuambile ne, Muan ebe Yosefe wakamba ne, Nzambi wakanvuisha mukelenge wa buloba bua Ejipitu buonso, Ulue biebe kundi, kujanguluki
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Nuenu nudi nungambile lungenyi kai lua kukudimuna n alu bantu aba badi bangambila ne, Uheheshe tshikokedi tshiakatukengesha n atshi tatu ebe

Badi bamanye dina diebe nebakueyemene; Nuimbile Yehowa udi mushikame mu Siona misambu ya kumutumbisha n ai; Bualu bua yeye udi usombuela mashi abo udi ubavuluka; Yehowa, unfuile luse, bua meme kumanyisha bantu bua butumbi buebe buonso, Ba mu bisamba bia bantu bakuhona mu dijimba diakumbulabo; Yehowa wakudimanyisha kudi bantu, wakukosa bilumbu biabo; Budi bantu babi n abu mbua kualukila mu Muaba wa Bafue; Bualu bua kabena bahua badi bakengela bintu muoyo tshiendelele, Yehowa, juka biebe; kuitabushi bua bantu bakutambe bukole, Yehowa, ubakuatshishe buowa, Psalms Yehowa, wewe udi wimana kule kuakua bua tshinyi

Mu dituku dia kulumbulula mukelenge mukashi wa ku sude neabike ne bantu ba tshikondo etshi, neabahishe; bua yeye wakalua biandi kunfudilu kua buloba bua kunvua lungenyi lua Solomo; monai, udi mutambe Solomo udi aha

Balami ba bintu bikale bena mukashi umue, bakokeshe bana babo ne ba mu nsubu yabo bimpe, bualu bua bobo bakenza mudimu bimpe bu balami badi badiangatshila muaba mubandila ne dikima dikole mu ditabusha dia mu Kilisto Yesu
Yeye wakalekela Mose
Maweja Nangila anuakidile bimpe, anupe bupole
Muena nvita wa mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina wakaya lubilu, Wakafika ku Shilo dituku adi mene ne bilulu biandi bionso bihandika ne buloba buela mu mutu
Tshidi ne bwikadi bufila kudi mêyi a ditunga
Dî edi didi mua kueyemenyibua ne, Bituikala bamane kufua n andi, netuikale ne muoyo hohamue ngandi
Bana ba balume ba Heselona bakaleleye bakadi Yelamele ne Lama ne Kelubai
Kabakadi banze kuela Yone mu nsubu wa lukanu
Hakaleha musangu mule, mukelenge wa bantu aba wakalua, wakabala n abo bintu
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Ku bianza bia bena mudimu ba banfumu ba mu buloba buebe
Kadi bantu ba mukelenge bakahidia kulenga bakuidi ba Yehowa bianza biabo
Butumbi ne buneme bidi ku mpala kuandi; bukole ne disanka bidi mu tshitendelelu tshiandi
Hilekiya wakambila Shafana secrétaire ne, Nakusangana mukanda wa mikenji wa Mose mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Nanku bena Izrayele bavua ne mudimu wa kutangila bantu, pakumvuabu ne: Nuenze madiotu anu bungi bua tshibidilu, bu munuvua nuenza matuku onsu patuvua tunupa bisosa, kupangabu tshia kuenza

Musoko wikale ne madimi: ku luseke lua nôde coudées nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, ku luseke lua sude coudées nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu, ku luseke lua esete coudées nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu ne ku luseke lua wesete coudées nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu
Aba mbantu bakasabuka dishiya dia Yadene mu ngondo wa kumudilu hakadi musulu mûle muhatuke mu mielelu yau; bakihata bantu bonso bakadi mu bibanda ku esete ne ku wesete
Muntu au amanye bualu ebu ne, Bu mutudi mu mei a mu mikanda hatudi katuiku, netuikale nunku kabidi mu bienzedi hatuikala n enu
Bua bulelela, bualu buakavuishibua butumbi diambedi kabuena buvuishibua butumbi nunku katataka, bualu bua butumbi budi butamba budiku
Dinanga dianyi dikale ne buonso buenu mu Kilisto Yesu
Sara kumvuaye buowa, kuyila wamba ne: Tshiena museke to
Ku dituku dia kumudilu dia Lumingu ne Lumingu, muntu ne muntu wa munkatshi muenu adibutshile bintu, bu muakabiheteye, bua kakuikadi masangisha a bintu hanalua

Mu diba adi wewe neuvuluke bienzedi biebe, neukuatshike bundu hawitabusha bana benu ba bakashi, mukulu ebe ne muakuny ebe, ne hanabafila kûdi bu bana bebe ba bakashi bawakalela, kadi kambualu bua tshihungidi tshiwakuhunga n anyi
Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda bakushiha tshihungidi tshinakuhunga ne bankambua babo
Kadi wewe udi wamba ne, Nzambi udi mumanye tshinyi
Môdekai wakahingana ku tshibi tshia mukelenge
Hashishe Holama, mukelenge wa Gezê, wakalua bua kukuatshisha Bena Lakisha; Yoshua wakamushiha ne bantu bandi bonso, kakashiya nansha umue
Nanku pinganayi lukasa bua kuangata tatu wanyi
Bakadi ne dihetu, bakenza malu a bundu ku mpala kuanyi; nunku nakabumusha, hanakamona muanda eu
Ubuele ne nyama milume muanda mutekete ne mikaji muanda mutekete idi kayiyi ne mikiya
Biasua Nzambi wetu utudi tukuatshila mudimu kutusungila, yeye neatuhandishe ku tshikutu tshia kahia kakole ne mu tshianza tshiebe kabidi, mukelenge
Hakahita bidimu bibidi, mala andi akahatuka bualu bua disama diandi; yeye wakafua bua masama makole
Bakaya, bakatula tshitudilu tshiabo mu Kîyata yalima mu Yuda; nunku badi babikila muaba au ne, Mahane dana tô ne lelu; monai, udi ku nyima kua Kîyata yalima
Buloba nebukuame bintu bia bungi, nuenu nenukute mafu tente, nenushikame bienu talala
Mayi kuvulangana, kubandisha buatu kulu
Eu mmukenji bua ntempelo: nseke yonso idi inyunguluka muaba eu wa ha mutu ha mukuna ikale miaba mitambe tshijila

Mose wakabambila ne, Binuenza bualu ebu, binuangata bintu bia nvita bua kuya n abi ku nvita ku mpala kua Yehowa, ne bena nvita bonso badi basabuka Yadene ku mpala kua Yehowa to ne hashikisheye kuihata bantu bonso badi n andi lukuna ku mpala kuandi, ne hateketa bena buloba bonso ku mpala kua Yehowa, hashishe nenuhingane, kanuena ne bualu bubi kudi Yehowa ne kudi Bena Isalele, ne buloba ebu nebuikale buhianyi buenu ku mesu kua Yehowa

Hashishe bantu bakuabo bakadi ku mutu kua Bena Efelayima, Azaya, muana wa Yohanana, ne Belekiya, muana wa Meshilemota, ne Yehizikiya, muana wa Shaluma, ne Amasa, muana wa Hadelai, bakimana ku mpala kua bantu bakadi bafuma ku nvita
Yakobe kusumba muaba uvuaye muase ntenta wende, kudi bana ba Amore, muashi wa tshimenga atshi, ku mushinga wa nkanu lukama ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole
Kadi anyisha bua meme kunyemena mu kasoku kaudi umona pabuipi apa, bualu nkakese
Hakatshidiye wakula, mukuabo wakalua, wakamba ne, Kahia kafuma kudi Nzambi kakatuluka mu diulu, kakosha mikoko ne bansongalume bakadi bayilama, kakabishidisha
Dîba adi, badi bamupingana kudi muntu wa kumpala uvwa mumutwa munyima
Paudi usumba, nansha usumbisha budimi kudi mukuenu, kumuenzedi bibi to
Kadi Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bua bualu buenu, yeye kena mungunvuile; Yehowa wakangambila ne, Kuakushika, kungambidi bualu ebu kabidi
Yakoba wakamukonka ne, Ungambile dina diebe Muntu wakamuebesha ne, Udi unkonkela dina dianyi tshinyi
Badi bumbulamu tshiamu tshifike mu mbuebue, tshiamu tshia kabanda mu mikuna

Nakakuluatshisha ne mayeka akadi ne malenda mimpe, nakabuesha bisabata bia tshiseba tshia nyama wa mu mai ku makasa ebe, nakakujingila tshilulu tshia lin tshinefuke, nakakuluatshisha tshilulu tshia soie
Kakuena mvidie mukuabu to, anu meme
Wakasa bioshelu bikuabo mu nsubu wa Yehowa wakamba Yehowa ne, Meme nenjadike dina dianyi mu Yelushalema
Bakuabo ba mu meku a bana ba balume ba Kohata bakadi ne misoko yabo mu buloba bua Efelayima
Eliya wakabambila ne, Bingikala muntu wa Nzambi, kahia kafuma mu diulu, kakuoshe ne bantu bebe makumi atanu
Nanku, muntu yonsu nansha tshintu tshionsu tshidi tshilenga bintu abi, netshipete dinyoka
Ngershone uvua mulele bana ba balume babidi: Libni ne Shimeyi
Kadi bua bualu ebu kabutangadiki munkatshi mua bantu, tubakanyinai ne, Kanuambidi muntu bualu mu dina edi kabidi tshiendelele
Bambe munkatshi mua bisamba ne, Yehowa udi ukokesha

Bua bualu ebu, Yehowa wa misumba, mumane kuntuma bua kumuhetela butumbi kudi ba mu bisamba bia bantu bakanuhaula, udi wamba ne, Monai, nenkume tshianza tshianyi ha mutu habo, ne bobo nebikale bintu bia kuhaulabo kudi bakadi babakuatshila mudimu; nenumanye ne Yehowa wa misumba wakuntuma
Genese Tunkanunuina tua Abalahama ne Ketula Kul
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Hinganai kundi ne meme nempingane kunudi
Bayidi bandi bakamba ne, Katataka wewe udi utujukuila bualu, kuena ubuamba mu lusumuinu
Hakashika malu â, yeye wakumukaku, wakamona musangishi wa mulambu, dina diandi Lewi, mushikame ku tshilambuidi, wakamuambila ne, Undonde
Nunku yeye wakangambila, wakammanyisha dijingulula dia malu au
Kadi, bakaji, bana, bimuna, ne bintu bionsu bidi mu tshimenga atshi, nubiangate, nuenza nabi munudi basue
Baprofete, bobo badi bashala ne muoyo tshiendelele, anyi

Ne ntempelo wa Nzambi udi mu diulu wakunzuludibua; ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshiandi mu ntempelo wandi wakamuenebua; ne miele ya nvula, ne mei, ne mikungulu, ne kukanka kua buloba, ne mabue a nvula, biakalua
Mukelenge wa Ejipitu wakabambila ne, Bualu kai, nuenu Mose ne Alona, nudi nulekesha bantu midimu yabo, yai bienu ku midimu yenu
Yeye ke udi ulombola ditunga dijima dia Ejipitu
Tshintu tshionso tshia dikumi tshia ngombe anyi tshia mikoko bidibo babala netshikale tshintu tshia tshijila kudi Yehowa
Abalahama wakafua bintu bionso biakadiye n abi kudi Isaka
Wewe newambile Bena Isalele ne, Manyi au neikale ku mesu kuanyi bu manyi a tshijila adibo bela ha mutu ku bikondo bienu bionso
Kadi kabena mua kusemena pa buipi ne tshilambuilu, nansha ne muaba udi bintu bia tshijila to

Bobo bakela nshobo bu muakenza bana babo bana ba Alona ku mpala kua Davidi mukelenge, ne Sadoka ne Ahimeleke, ne ku mpala kua bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo ya bakuidi ne ya Bena Lewi, nsubu ya batatu abo bakadi tuhita tô ne ku nsubu ya bakunyi babo
Yesu wakabambila ne, Tangilai bimpe, nudimukile luevene lua Bafalese ne lua Basadoke

Hakelanganeye meji, yeye wakabenga kukuata Môdekai nkayandi, bualu bua bakamumanyisha bua tshisamba tshia Môdekai; nunku Hamana wakakeba bua kushiheye Bena Yuda bonso bakadi mu bukelenge bua Ahashawelosha, ba mu tshisamba tshia Môdekai mene
Monai, hakadi Balaka ulonda ku nyima kua Sisela, Yaele wakaluhuka bua kusangakena n andi, wakamuambila ne, Lua biebe, nenkuleshe muntu ûdi ukeba
Mulombodi umue amukosele muminu pa muaba awu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila

Hakabatuma Yoshua ku ntenta yabo, hashishe yeye wakabandisha disanka, wakabambila ne, Yai bienu ne biuma bia bungi ku ntenta yenu, ne bimuna bia bungi, ne tshiamu tshia argent ne or ne tshiamu tshia mitaku ne tshiamu tshifike, ne bilulu bia bungi; nuabanyangane ne bana benu bintu binuakanyenga kudi bena lukuna benu
Bakuidi bakabuela munda mua nsubu wa Yehowa bua kumulengesha, bakalua ne bukoya buonso buakamonabo mu ntempelo wa Yehowa ku tshiendedi tshia mu nsubu wa Yehowa

Kanungu ka Padi bibambalu biônso bibidi bitwilangana mu Tshisangilu Tshinene, bilo bia batshipwita munwamfwanka ke bidi bishaala bilo bia Tshisangilu Bulombodi badi babushiilangana kudi Mulombodi wa batshipwita munwamfwanka bamukombola kudi Mulombodi wa batshipwita bakulumpe
Nunku Hushai, mulunda wa Davidi, wakalua mu musoko; ne Abashaloma wakabuela mu Yelushalema
Nulekele anu bana ba bakaji ne muoyi
Elisha wakebesha mukelenge wa Isalele ne, Ndi n ebe bualu kai
Bayidi bandi bakavuluka dî didi difunda mu Mukanda wa Nzambi ne, Lukunukuna lua ku nsubu webe nelundie
Yeye wakambila bakulu ne, Nutuindile bienu kunoko tô ne ha bialua kunudi kabidi, ne monai, Alona ne Hû badi n enu, muntu udi ne tshilumbu aye biandi kudibo

Kadi ehuka ku biakulakula bia hatuhu; bualu bua ben abi nebatambe kudiunda mu malu adi kâi anemekela Nzambi; ne mei abo neavulangane bu mputu wa lubangu; Humenayo ne Fileto badi munkatshi muabo; bobo bakamana kuhambuka mu nshila wa mei malelela, bamba ne, Kubika kua bantu ku lufu kuakumana kulua, ne badi banyanga ditabusha dia bakuabo

Yeshaya Ngimbile wanyi munanga musambu wanyi wa dinanga Yeye wakabubundulula, wakumusha mabue onso akadimu, wakakunamu mionshi ya tumuma yakatamba buimpe, Nunku, nuenu badi bashikame mu Yelushalema, Nakadi kumanya mua kuenza tshinyi mu budimi buanyi Mpindiu nennuambile Nenkubutule, Bualu bua budimi bua tumuma tua nvinyo bua Yehowa wa misumba Mulau wikale kudi badi balamakasha nsubu ne nsubu, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba mu matshu anyi ne, Bualu bua hectares neyilue anu ne tshihiminu ne ntshihiminu tshimue tshia homer netshikuamishe anu tshihiminu tshimue tshia épha Mulau wikale kudi bantu badi bajuka hatshiatshia Mu bidia biabo bia disanka badi ne tshisanji ne lunzenze, Bua malu â bantu banyi badi babuela mu buhika Nunku Muaba wa Bafue wakudiundisha kunvua kuau kua nzala, Muntu muhuekele udi muiname, Kadi Yehowa wa misumba udi mutumbishibue ku kulumbulula kuakane
Baledi ba mukaji, nebaleje bakulu ba mu tshimenga tshilamba tshia bulalu, tshidi ne makeji a mashi a dituku dia kumpala, divua mulume mubuelele mukaji awu mu nzubu
Moshe udi usengelela Maweja Nangila bua afuile bena Izrayele luse Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ndi muenzele bantu aba bishima bia bungi bua kubaleja bukole buanyi
Ikala ne bukole, tantamana biebe
Yeye wakungenzela bimpe
Biakabuela mulume ne mukashi ba bintu bionso, bu muakamuambila Nzambi, ne Yehowa wakamuinshidila tshibi
Kadi nebikale bipie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Mu diba adi dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nenyange dihetu dia Bena Yuda ne dihetu dinene dia Bena Yelushalema muomumue
Nuenu kabidi nudilongolole, bualu bua Muana wa muetu nealue ha diba dinudi kanui belangana meshi
Nenufile mpumbu wa mbushi umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne bana balume ba mikoko babidi ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala

Meshobaba ne Yameleke ne Yoasha, muana wa balume wa Amasaya, ne Yoele ne Yehu, muana wa balume wa Yoshibeya, muana wa balume wa Selaya, muana wa balume wa Asiele, ne Eleyehoenai ne Yâkoba ne Yeshohaya ne Asaya ne Adiele ne Yesimiele ne Benaya ne Ziza, muana wa balume wa Shifi, muana wa balume wa Alono, muana wa balume wa Yedaya, muana wa balume wa Shimeli, muana wa balume wa Shemaya; bantu aba batuakutela men abo nunku bakadi bakelenge ba mu meku abo ne ba mu nsubu yabo bakatamba kuyisangana
Abiyama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi; bakamujika mu musoko wa Davidi; Asa, muan andi wa balume, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Balongolole nunku muana wa mukoko ne mulambu wa bia kudia ne manyi, ku dinda ku dinda, bua kubifila bu mulambu wa kuosha buatshia buatshia
Ndi bianyi bidia bidi ne muoyo biakafuma mu diulu; biadia muntu bidia ebi, neikale ne muoyo tshiendelele; bulelela, bidia binafila ku muoyo wa ba ha buloba nmubidi wanyi
Biwamona ne, Mbimpe bua kuya n anyi ku Babulona, lua n anyi, ne meme nenkuenzele bimpe

Mei a buneme kaena akumbana kudi muhote; Diha didi bu dibue dia mushinga mukole ku mesu kua muen adi; Udi ubuikidila dihanga dia muntu udi ukeba dinanga, Dî dia mibelu didi dibuela mu mutshima wa muena lungenyi Muntu mubi udi ukeba kutomboka, Kusangakana ne nkashama udi ne bana bandi banyengibue kudiye Bi uhingisha muntu malu mabi ku malu mimpe, Tshibangidilu tshia matandu tshidi bu kuhatuka kua mai; Udi ubingisha muntu mubi ne udi uhisha muntu muakane, Bua tshinyi muhote udi ne mushinga mu tshianza tshiandi bua kusumba n au meji, Mulunda utu wananga mu bikondo bionso, Muntu udi kayi ne lungenyi udi uhunga tshihungidi, Udi unanga bubi udi unanga matandu, Udi ne mutshima wa mashimi kena uheta diakalengele, Udi ulela muana muhote udi ne kanyinganyinga; Mutshima wa disanka udi buanga hudi busangasha bimpe, Muntu mubi udi witabusha mbueshilu misokoka muinshi mua tshivualu Mujinguludi wa mianda udi utangisha mpala wandi ku meji, Muana mulume muhote udi uvuisha tatu andi kanyinganyinga, Kembimpe bua kufutshisha muntu muakane tshibau, Udi ukanda mei andi udi ne lungenyi, Muhote mene, biahuweye biandi, udi mubadibue bu muena Nsumuinu Udi udihandulula kudi banga bantu udi ukeba anu bualu budiye musue, Muntu muhote kena ne disanka mu dijingulula dia mianda, Halua muntu mubi, dihetu didi dilua kabidi; Mei a mukana mua muntu adi bu mai adi ne ndondo; mpokolo wa meji udi kasulu ka mai kadi kahueka

Padi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa kabiyi bifila diandamuna pa dipatula dia lupetu lwa nzanzanza mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu, Mulombodi wa Ditunga, mu dilomba dia Bukalenga bunene dikala dishintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila, udi wenzeja bulongolodi bwa Tshingenyingenyi budi butangila dipatula dia lupetu
Yeye wakenzela Abalama bimpe bua bualu buandi, wakamuha mikoko ne ngombe, ne balume ba nyama ya mpunda, ne bahika balume ne bahika bakashi, ne mashina a nyama ya mpunda ne tumelo
Hakûkutabo, wakambila bayidi ne, Angula
Basungi ba bantu badi ne disanka, bua nebabidike ne, Bana ba Nzambi

Hashishe tshiji tshikole netshinkuate dituku adi, ne meme nembalekele, nengumushe mesu anyi kudibo ne bobo nebajimishibue; ne matata ne makenga a bungi nealue kudibo; bobo nebambilangane dituku adi ne, Malu â mabi onso kaena alua kutudi bualu bua Nzambi wetu kena munkatshi muetu, anyi
Malu â nunku adi lusumuinu: bakashi aba badi bu bihungidi bibidi; umue wabo wa ku mukuna wa Sinai udi ulela bana bua kuikalabo bahika, yeye udi Haga
Umupeshe bintu binuikala bapeta kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu: mikoku, mbuji, ntete ya kuenza bukula
Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mona, nenfile musoko eu mu bianza bia Bena Kasada ne mu bianza bia Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, ne yeye neaunyenge
Bantu bonso bakamba hohamue ne, Netuenze mei onso akutuambila Yehowa Mose wakambila Yehowa mei akamba bantu
Nunku Mikaya wakabambila mei onso akunvueye hakabala Baluka mukanda mu matshu a bantu bonso
Kakuena tshidi mua kukolela Maweja Nangila to

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua bobo bakubenga mikenji inakateka ku mpala kuabo, ne kabena batumikila dî dianyi, kabena bendelamu, kadi bakulonda anu mampaka a mu mitshima yabo, ne bakulonda Babâla, bu muakabayishabo kudi batatu abo
Bakabangila kukeba ku muan a bute to ne ku muan a mukala, bakasangana luhanza mu tshibombi tshia Benyamina
Sànka ukole mu mikolu, bwà kukèba mudimu, Nansha makenga, nansha mabika ni malu eee Ndi anu muku nangà
Nakatangila muanjelo mukole wela lubila ne dî dikole ne, Nganyi udi muakane bua kubulula mukanda, ne bua kulamuneye bimanyishilu biau
Bakamuandamuna tshiakabidi ne, Mukelenge awile bantu bandi tshilota, ne tuetu netumuleshe dijingulula diatshi
Nunku mukelenge wakaya ku Gilegala, ne Kimehama wakaya n andi; Bena Yuda bonso ne tshituha tshia Bena Isalele kabidi bakalua ne mukelenge
Ebu mbungi bua bantu bakadi Nebukadenesâ muye n abo mu buhika: mu tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete, Bena Yuda binunu bisatu ne makumi abidi ne basatu

Nenuikale ne disanka dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne nuenu ne bana benu balume ne bana benu bakashi, ne bahika benu balume ne bahika benu bakashi, ne Bena Lewi badi ku mbelu kuenu badi kabayi ne buhianyi kunudi
Hanakatangila ne nuenu kanuakansungila, nakateka muoyo wanyi mu tshianza tshianyi, nakasa buka kudi Bena Amona, ne Yehowa wakabafila mu tshianza tshianyi; nuakalua kundi bua kunduisha lelu munyi
Shaula wakamba ne, Nemmufile kudiye bua yeye ikale bu buteyi kudiye ne bianza bia Bena Peleshete nebikale ham bidi handi
Hakayai bua kusumba manyi, mubaki wa mukashi wakalua; yakadi ne bintu biai bilongolola yakabuela n andi ku disanka dia dibanji; bakinshila tshibi
Nusanke mu ditekemena dienu, nuikale ne ditantamana mu makenga; nunanukile mu kutendelela
Bua bualu ebu nakanuambila ne, Nuditahuluile misoko isatu
Bana ba bakaji ba Selofade kuitaba diyi dia Maweja Nangila divuaye muambile Moshe
Bua bingambila bantu lumu luimpe, tshiena ne tshia kutumbila n atshi; bua bualu budi bunkuata bua kuluamba, bua ndi ne mulau bingikala tshî ngambila bantu lumu luimpe
Nunku bakajadika bukelenge bua Yuda, baka vuisha Lehabama, muana wa Solomo, bukole bidimu bisatu; bualu bua bakenda mu nshila wa Davidi ne wa Solomo bidimu ebi bisatu
Meme Moshe, mvua mupeshe ndelanganyi ya Rubene ne ya Ngade tshitupa tshia ditunga dia mikuna dia Ngilaade, ne bimenga bionsu bivuamu
Bafalese bakalua kudiye, bakamukonka ne, Biahidia mulume mukashi wandi neashihe mukenshi wa Nzambi, anyi

Dituku dikuabo hakadi bana bandi ba balume ne bana bandi ba bakashi badia bidia ne banua nvinyo mu nsubu wa mukulu wabo, messager wakalua kudi Yobo, wamba ne, Bakadi badima mu madimi ne lukasu lukoka kudi ngombe, ne nyama ya mpunda yakadi idia mashinde ha buihi n ai
Ebu kambualu bukuabo anu kunyingalala kua mutshima
Bakaya mu madimi, bakahuola mamuma abo, bakatua tumuma tuabo tua nvinyo ku makasa abo, bakadia bidia bia disanka, bakabuela mu nsubu wa nzambi wabo, bakadia, bakanua, bakela Abimeleke mulau

Chronicles Bena Isalele mu bungi buabo, bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo, ne tupitene tua bantu tshinunu ne tua bantu lukama, ne bakokeshi bakadi bakuatshila mukelenge wabo mudimu mu milongo yonso ya mu ngondo ne ngondo ya mu ngondo yonso ya mu tshidimu, mu tshisumbu ne tshisumbu muakadi bantu binunu makumi abidi ne binai
Moaba neakuatshike bundu bualu bua Kemoshe, bu muakakuatshika Bena Isalele bundu bualu bua Betele, tshieyemenu tshiabo
Nubalekele, badi balombodi bafofo, Bialombola mufofo munga mufofo, bubidi buabo nebahone mu dina
Eku nkutantamana kua basanto, badi batumikila mikenshi ya Nzambi, ne ditabusha dia Yesu
Bualu uvua musue kunumusha mu njila uvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munuambile bua kulonda
Mulume wakabika bua kuyeye, kadi tatu andi muenu wakamusengelela, nunku yeye wakalalaku kabidi
Adoni bezeke wakamba ne, Bakelenge makumi muanda mutekete bakadi ne biala biabo ne bana ba nkasa banene bikoseke bakadi badia bidia biabo muinshi mua mesa anyi; bu munakuenza, Nzambi wakunsombuela
Bena Gelika bakuabo bakadi munkatshi mua bakaya kutendelela Nzambi ku disanka
Yeye wakavunga mukanda, wakauhingisha mu bianza bia mulami wau, wakashikama; bonso bakadi mu nsunagoga bakamutangila talalâ

Uliya wakambila Davidi ne, Mushete wa Yehowa ne Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda bidi mu ntenta; ne mukelenge wanyi Yoaba ne bantu bonso ba mukelenge wanyi badi ne tshitudilu tshiabo mu madimi, nunku bundi n abu mbua kubuela mu nsubu wanyi bua kudia ne bua kunua ne bua kulala ne mukashi wanyi, anyi
Uluatshishe Alona bilulu bijidila, umuele manyi, umujidike, bua angenzele biandi mudimu wa buakuidi
Musangu eu nentume milau yanyi yonso ku mutshima webe ne kudi bena mudimu bebe ne kudi bantu bebe, bua kukumanyisha ne, Kakuena nzambi mukuabo bu meme mu buloba buonso

Ba mu Benyamina: Eliada, muena bukitu, ne bantu binunu nkama ibidi bakadi ne mata ne ngabu bakadi n andi; ku nyima kuandi Yehozabada ne bantu binunu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu bakadi ne bintu bia nvita bilongolola bakadi n andi
Nunku bonso ba mu Benyamina bakafua dituku adi bakadi binunu makumi abidi ne bitanu; buonso buabo bakadi ne miele, bakadi bena bukitu
Kadi nuenu nudi nunkonka ne, Tuakukunyoka munyi
Kadi balonda ha nyima kabena mua kusanka bua bualu buandi
Nakunvua babikila nkata ai ne, Nkata idi inyunguluka bu nvunde
Yeye udi unubikila udi mua kueyemenyibua, yeye kabidi nênze buala budiye munubikidile
Muakuidi neafue munu wandi mu mashi makuabo, nealabe ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshia kahia, neahongolole mashi makuabo ku tshiaku tshia tshioshelu
Ikale mabueja mu masosu abidi engelela bu tshiamu tshia mpawungi

Nunku udimuke biebe, ndi nkusengelela, kunu nvinyo anyi maluvu makole, kudi tshintu tshidi katshiyi tshimpe; mona, wewe newimite difu, neulele muana wa balume; dihaya kadibeyi ku mutu kuandi; bualu bua muana eu neikale Munazi kudi Nzambi ku difu dia mamu wandi; yeye neabange kusungila Bena Isalele mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Ushiye disoso ku mutu kua tshikowelu bua kubueshamu mutu, nyungulula disoso ne muonshi muhindakasha, bu mudibo benza tshikowelu tshia nvita tshikowelu katshihandiki nansha

Nunku newambile muntu wanyi Davidi ne, Yehowa wa mu diulu udi wamba ne, Nakakubikila mu mpangu ya mikoko hawakadi ulama mikoko, nakakuvuisha mukelenge ku mutu kua bantu banyi Bena Isalele; nakadi n ebe kuonso kuwakaya, nakashiha bena lukuna bebe bonso ku mpala kuebe; nenkuvuishe dina dinene bu mena a badi ne butumbi hanshi ha buloba

Yehezekele Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi, mu ngondo wa dikumi, mu dituku dia dikumi ne dibidi dia ngondo, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, tangisha mpala webe kudi Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, umubele, ne bonso ba mu Ejipitu
Muena tshiota wakamba ne, Tshiena mua kudihikuilatshi, bingenza nunku, nenyange buhianyi buanyi, utshihikule wewe muine, bualu bua tshiena mua kutshihikula
Mukalenga kuambila balombodi ne: Muntu ewu udi muwule ne Mueyelu wa Mvidi Mukulu
Nzambi wakaha Solomo ngenyi ya bungi be ne dijingulula ditambe ne bunene bua mutshima, biakadi bungi bua nsenga ya ku muelelu wa mai manene
Nyuma wa Nzambi wakabanga kumuenzesha mu Mahane dana, hankatshi ha Solea ne Eshetaola
Muhimbu watshi wakadi bu ntanta wa tshianza; wakalengeshibua bu mubangu wa luhanza, bu tshifuanyikishi tshia tshilongo; tihiakûla tente ne bihiminu bia mai binunu bisatu
Hakalaleye munkatshi muabo matuku kâi mahite ha muanda mukulu anyi dikumi, wakahueka ku Kaisalia; hakatshiabu, wakashikama ha tshilumbuluidi, wakamba bua kuluabo ne Paulo

Mukelenge wakajuka ku nvinyo ya bidia bia disanka ne tshiji tshikole, wakaluhuka, wakendakana mu tshibunda tshia mu luhangu luandi; Hamana wakajuka bua kulombeye muoyo wandi kudi Esetê mukelenge mukashi; bualu bua yeye wakajingulula ne, Mukelenge neakebe kungenzela bibi
Mu diulu, anyi kudi bantu
Mutshima wanyi kawakukuma ku argent wa muntu, anyi ku ngolo wandi, anyi ku bilulu biandi

Bualu bua ku mpala kua matuku au muntu kakaheta difutu ku mudimu wandi, anyi difutu ku mudimu wa bimuna biandi; muntu yonso wakaluhuka anyi wakabuela kakadi ne ditalala bualu bua bena lukuna bandi; bualu bua nakasonsola bantu bonso bua muntu ne muntu aluishe muena mutumba n andi
Mukashi udi mubumbakasha kudi mulume wandi hatshidi mulume ne muoyo, kadi biafua mulume wandi, yeye udi mumanye mua kuya ku dibaka kudiye musue, kadi anu mu Mukelenge
Kanuikadi bu bobo; bualu bua Tatu wenu udi mumanye binudi n abi bualu diambedi kanui banze kumulomba
Nanku kanuakusomba makuta kudi bantu ba bisamba bikuabu to
Amasaya wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi abidi ne tshitema; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Yehoadana wa mu Yelushalema

Utumikile mei a Yehowa, Nzambi webe, bua kuenda mu nshila yandi, ne bua kulamata mikenji yandi ne mei andi onso ne mikandu yandi ne mianda yandi yonso bu mudibi bifunda mu mikanda ya Mose, bua wewe wikale ne diakalengele mu malu onso audi wenza, ne mu nshila yonso ludi wenda; bua Yehowa kujadikeye di diandi diakangambileye ne, Bikala bana bebe badimuke mu nshila yabo, benda ku mpala kuanyi mu bulelela ne mitshima yabo yonso ne mioyo yabo yonso, hashishe, wewe kuena uhanga muntu wa kushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Isalele tshiendelele

Yehowa neakufile mu tshianza tshianyi lelu eu: nenkushihe, nenkutule mutu webe; nendishe nyunyu ya mulu ne nyama ya mu tshisuku bitalu bia bena nvita ba Bena Peleshete lelu; bantu bonso ba ha buloba nebamanye ne, Nzambi udi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele bulelela; ne bantu bonso ba mu tshisumbu etshi nebamanye ne, Yehowa kena Usungila bantu bua muele wa nvita ne bua difuma, bualu bua nvita idi mu bianza bia Yehowa, yeye nennufile mu bianza bietu
Mei enu ikale ne ngasa misangu yonso, matue bu lueho, bua nuenu mimanye mua kuandamuna muntu ne muntu dî

Luka Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne itanu tshia bunfumu bua Tibelio Kaisa, hakadi Ponto Pilato ngovena wa Yudaya, ne hakadi Helode muloho wa Galela, ne hakadi muan abo Filipo muloho wa luseke lua Itulaya ne Takoniti, ne hakadi Lusania muloho wa Abilene, ne hakadi Ana ne Kayafa bakuidi banene, dî dia Nzambi diakalua kudi Yone, muana wa Zakâya, mu tshihete
Nuenze midimu yenu matuku asambombu

Hebrews Bualu bua muakuidi mimene yonso, muangatshibue munkatshi mua bantu, udi ubueshibua mu mudimu bua kukuatshisha bantu mu malu a kudi Nzambi bua yeye afile bintu bihebua ne milambu mishiha bua mibi, udi mumanye mua kuikala ne lutulu kudi bahote ne kudi bahambuki, bualu bua yeye muine udi musuikibue ku butekete; ne bua bualu ebu yeye udi ne bualu bua kufila milambu bua mibi yandi kabidi muomumue ne ya bantu
Bualu hua meshi a ha buloba ebu adi maho, te ku mesu kua Nzambi
Tshiena mpuwa talalâ bua bidimba biandi, Muntu kai udi mua kuvula bivualu Muntu kai udi mua kubuela mu mbanga yandi
Kadi wewe mubenge, katuena tuya mu Ejipitu to
Psalms Mukelenge, wewe udi muikale muaba wa tuetu kushikamamu mu bikondo bionso
Hashishe yeye wakela tshiseba ha nyima ha mpunda, yeye wakambila muena mudimu ne, Uye lubilu, kujingakanyi anu ku dî dianyi
Udi Yehowa udi Nzambi, yeye wakututemeshila munya
Mulami kai udi mua kuimana ku mpala kuanyi
Bakalua ne mutu wandi ha dilonga, bakauha nsongakashi; ne yeye wakalua n au kudi mamu andi
Bantu bakangata bidia bia mampa diambedi luevene kaluyi luanze kubuelamu, ne binu bidibo benza n abi mampa bakabikuta mu bilulu biabo, bakabiteka ha maha abo
Luta Luta ne Boaza ku Tshtshihuidi Naomi, mamuen andi, wakamuambila ne, Muan anyi, tshiena nkukebela muaba wa kuikisha bua wewe wikale ne disanka, anyi
Kubisuikabu mu bilamba, kubiambula pa makaya
Hakûsheye biasu bionso tente, yeye wakambila umue wa bana bandi ba balume ne, Umpe tshiasu tshikuabo

Ba Bena Lewi: Shemaya, muana wa Hashuba, muana wa Azelikama, muana wa Hashabeya wa bana ba balume ba Melali; ne Bakabaka, Heleshi ne Galela ne Mataniya, muana wa Mika, muana wa Zikeli, muana wa Asafa, ne Obadaya, muana wa Shemaya, muana wa Galala, muana wa Yedutuna, ne Belekiya, muana wa Asa, muana wa Elekana, bakadi bashikama mu misoko ya Bena Netofa

Hakatangila Zimeli ne, Bakanyenga musoko, yeye wakabuela mu nsubu wa mukelenge, wakamuosha, wakafuilamu, bua malu mabi akenzeye ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kuendeye mu nshila wa Yalobama ne bua malu mabi akenzesheye Bena Isalele
Yehowa wakambila Yoshua ne, Wambile bakuidi badi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi ne, Umukai mu Yadene
Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wewe kuena ujuka ha bulalu bûdi mulale, kadi wewe neufue bulelela
Bakamukonka ne, Yeye wakakuenzela tshinyi
Eu mmukenji bua ntempelo: nseke yonso idi inyunguluka muaba eu wa ha mutu ha mukuna ikale miaba mitambe tshijila
Ndi nuambila ne, Bulelela, yeye kena ubika bua kumuha tshintu bua yeye udi mulunda wandi, kadi bualu bua dinanukila diandi yeye neabike, neamuhe bintu bionso bidiye n abi bualu
Boaza wakalua mufume ku Beteleheme, wakambila banowi ne Yehowa ikale n enu, bobo bakamukudimuna ne, Yehowa akusankishe
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Palô neabamone, neasambibue bua tshisumbu tshiandi tshia bantu bavule badi bashihibue ku muele wa nvita, Palô muine ne masalayi andi onso
Palô Wakabikila Mose ne Alona, wakamba ne, Yai bienu, nushihele Nzambi wenu nyama mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Aba bonso mbana balume ba Davidi ha mutu ha bana balume ba bakashi bahika babakibue kudiye; Tamâ wakadi muan abo mukashi
Mesu a Isalele akadi bileshileshi bualu bua bununu buandi, yeye kakamanya mua kumona bimpe Yeye wakalua n abo ha buihi n andi, yeye wakatuangana n abo mishiku, wakabuhukila
Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Ya biebe talalâ

Nyuma wa Yehowa wakamutulukila bikole, ne yeye wakamuhanda, bu muakadiye mua kubanda kana ka mbushi; yeye kakadi ne tshintu mu tshianza tshiandi; yeye kakambila tatu wandi anyi mamu wandi bualu buakenzeye
Hashishe Izebele wakatuma mukenji kudi Eliya ne, Nzambi yonso bambe kungenzela malu mabi onso binahanga kuvuisha muoyo webe bu muoyo wa umue wabo makelela ha diba edi
Aba mbantu bakabikilabo ba mu tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele, bakelenge ba bisamba bia batatu abo, bakadi ku mutu kua binunu bia Bena Isalele
Dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Meshulemete, muana mukashi wa Halusa wa mu Yoteba
Njiji neikale mu ditunga dionsu dia Ejipitu: mu nzubu yonsu ne panshi ponsu
Mmudileje nanku diba divua bena Ejipitu bakengeshe bena Izrayele bikole

Hakalua dituku dia kumudilu dia disanka dia bidia bidi kabi biela luevene, diakashihashihabo bana ba mikoko ya Kuhita kua Yehowa, bayidi ba Yesu bakalua kudiye, bakamuebesha ne, Udi musue tuye kulongolola ha wewe kudila Kuhita kua Yehowa kudi kunyi
Muntu yônso udi mwa kuya ku Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu bwa kuleeja dibenga kumvwangana dia Dîyi dikulu ne dipangadika diônso dia bwenji anyi dia buludiki
Witabushe kutendekena kua muntu webe, ne kua bantu bebe Bena Isalele, hatendelelabo ku muaba eu; bulelela, unvue biebe mu muaba webe, mu diulu mene; ne haunvua, utubuikidile mibi yetu
Mutshi eu nguewe muine, mukelenge
Bumue Yehowa neatuenzele bimpe bu mudi midimu yandi yonso ya kukema, bua muntu eu umuke kutudi
Dibadika Milambu a
Nuenu nenuhikule muan a bute wa nyama wa mpunda ku muana wa mukoko, ne binuahanga kumuhikulai nenutshibule nshingu wandi, nenuhikule ban a bute bonso ba bantu kabidi
Nyuma wakambila Filipo ne, Ya ha buihi, ulamate ku dikalu edi
Balaame kuandamuna ne: Bualu udi untatshisha
Danyele wakakudimuna mukelenge ne, Bualu busokoka budi mukelenge muebeshe mbualu budi bena meji, bamanyi ba malu a mitoto, bena buloshi ne batempi ba mbuku kabayi bamanye mua kumujinguluilabo
Bakela Bena Benyamina munkatshi, bakabihata, bakabadiata ku miaba yakambabo kuikisha tô ne ku Gibea kudi kuhatukila diba
Yeye udi kai ne dinanga udi muikale mu lufu
Hakashikisheye kuamba dî edi, monai, bana ba mukelenge bakafika, bakabandisha mei abo, bakadila; mukelenge ne bantu bandi bonso bakadila bikole kabidi
Nunku nuelele bantu aba mukenji ne, Balekele mudimu, kabashi musoko au tô ne hangamba dî dikuabo
Uvuluke bukese bua matuku anyi; Muntu kai wamanya mua kushala ne muoyo kayi utangila lufu

Mose wakaha Bena Gada ne Bena Lubena ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe muana mulume wa Yosefe buloba bua Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole ne buloba bua Oga mukelenge wa Bashana, bungi bua misoko yabo to ne ku matshika abo onso

Kadi mu muaba wawa Yehowa neikale n etu mu butumbi, Bualu bua Yehowa udi mulumbuluishi wetu, Yehowa udi mutueledi wa mikenji, Mionshi ya buatu buebe yakusululuka; Muena musoko kena wamba ne, Ndi ne disama, Yeshaya Nuenu ba mu bisamba bia bantu, luai bienu ha buihi Bualu bua Yehowa udi ne bisamba bionso bia bantu tshiji, Bashihibue babo nebimashibue, Bintu bionso bia mu diulu nebivingutuke kabidi; Bua muele wanyi wa nvita wakunua mashi makumbane mu diulu
Munda muandi mudi musokoka bibutshidibue bionso bia meshi ne bia lungenyi
Bua misangu yonso inuadia bidia ebi ne inuanua luhanza elu, nudi nuambila bantu bua lufu lua Mukelenge tô ne halueye
Nunku nenvuishe mukuna wa Seî tshikulu ne tshihela tshia tshianana; ku muele wa nvita nenshihe muntu wabuelamu ne muntu wahatukamu
Ku luseke luabo lukuabo bakasa kudi Bena Tekoa; kadi bantu babo banene kabakalenga bianza biabo ku mudimu wa Mukelenge wabo
Bualu ditunga didi mua kunubenga, bu muvuadi dibenga bantu bavua badianjila kuasamu

Kadi biumuka muntu udi kai muena ditabusha, umuke biandi; bualu bua muan enu mulume anyi muan enu mukashi wa ma Kilisto kena ushala mu buhika mu malu a nunku; Nzambi wakanubikila bua nuenu nuikale mu ditalala

Bana banyi bakese, bandi mukuatshikile didinyenga dia ha kulela kabidi bua bualu buenu tô ne bamueneka Kilisto munda muenu, nakadi musue kuikala n enu katataka bua kukudimuna dî dianyi; bualu bua mutshima wanyi udi uhampakana bua bualu buenu
Yeye wakahingisha bintu biakajidila tatu wandi ne bintu biakajidileye kabidi, bintu bia argent ne bia or ne malonga makuabo mu nsubu wa Yehowa

Muntu au wakaluidikisha ne luidi luakadi mu tshianza tshiandi, bule bualu buikale coudées Hashishe yeye wakalua n anyi ku tshibuelelu tshidi tshitangila ku luseke lua esete; hakabandeye ku tshibandilu tshiatshi, wakidikisha mushiku watshi wa mbelu, wakaumona muikale luidi lumue mu butshiama buau; mushiku wa mbelu mukuabo mutangilangane ne tshitendelelu wakadi luidi lumue mu butshiama buau
Kuambulaye kela bua kumukosa mutu

Yeye wakalua mu ntempelo mu Nyuma Muimpe; hakabuelamu baledi ba Yesu ne muana bua kumuenzela bu muakadi tshilele tshia mikenshi ya Mose, Shimeona wakamuambula mu maboko, wakatumbisha Nzambi, wakamba ne, Mukelenge, mpindiu wewe udi ulekela muhika webe aye biandi Bualu bua mesu anyi akumona luhandu luebe Luwakulongolola ku mesu kua bantu bonso; Munya wamueneka kudi bisamba bia bende Tatu andi ne mamu andi bakakema bualu bua malu akamuambabo; Shimeona wakabasankisha, wakambila Malia mamu wandi ne, Muana eu udi mutekela bualu bua kuhona ne bua kubika kua bantu ba bungi mu Isalele, ne bualu bua tshimanyinu tshiahetulabo; muele wa nvita neutubule muoyo webe, nunku meshi a mu mitshima ya ba bungi neamueneke
Nudi nuteta Yehowa munyi
Hashishe mukelenge wakolola dikombo dia or kudi Esetê
Bakamba ne, Butudi n abu mbua kuha Bena Benyamina badi bashala buhianyi, bua tshisamba tshimue katshijiminyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Nanku, padi bena Izrayele bandambula mulambu wa ditua ndondu, Arone ne ndelanganyi yende nebikale bangata tshiadi ne tshibelu
Hashishe Ezela wakajuka, wakatshihisha bantu banene ba bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne Bena Isalele bonso ne, Tuetu netuenze bu mu dî edi

Bualu bua Nzambi bua bushua ne budi kabui bunyanguka ku mesu kua Nzambi Tatu budi nunku, bua kuya kutangila bana ba nshîa ne bakashi ba mu lufuila mu dikenga diabo, ne bua kudilama kai ne ditoba dia ku malu a ha buloba

Tshituha tshia Bena Isalele tshiakabatahuluila Mose, tshiakashilangana ne tshia bena nvita, tshituha tshiabo tshiakadi mikoko binu nu nkama isatu ne makumi asatu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama itanu, ne ngombe binunu makumi asatu ne bisambombo, ne nyama ya mpunda binunu makumi asatu ne nkama itanu, ne bantu binunu dikumi ne bisambombo
Nunku kapitene wakamuangata, wakaya n andi kudi kamanda, wakamuambila ne, Paulo, muena lukanu, wakumbikila kudiye, wakungambila bua kulua ne nsongalume eu kûdi, udi ne dî dia kukuambila
Nenkusungile, bua wewe kukokesha bantu bu mudi mutshima webe musue; wewe newikale mukelenge wa Isalele
Shaluma, muana wa Yabesha, wakamuelela tshifufu, wakamukuma ku mesu kua bantu, wakamushiha, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Bakuabo ba ku mutu kua biota bia batatu abo bakafila bintu biabo bia kuenza n abi mudimu

Alona ne bana bandi balume neboweshe bianza biabo ne makasa abo ne mai mu tshiowelu, hayabo mu ntenta wa kusangakena, nebowe mai bua bobo kabafu nansha, anyi hayabo ku tshioshelu bua kuosha nyama ha kahia kudi Yehowa

Hakabuelabo mu nsubu, yeye wakadi mulale tulu ha bulalu buandi mu nsubu wandi wa bulalu; bobo bakamutua muele, bakamushiha, bakamukosa mutu, bakaya n au; bakenda tô butuku bujima mu nshila wa ku Alabâ
Kanuena mua kundambula milambu ya mashi a nyama pamue ne mampa adi mela buanga

Hakadi Hananya muprofete mumane kutshibula mutshi wa tshikokedi wakadi ha nshingu wa Yelemiya muprofete, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ne, Ya wambile Hananya ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wewe wakutshibula mutshi wa tshikokedi udibo benze ne mitshi, kedi newikale ne mutshi wa tshikokedi tshia tshiamu mu muaba wau
Bakabunvua bakula mu miaku mikuabo, batumbisha Nzambi
Wakenza bibi bia ha masoso a nsubu ne tubaya tutshiamakane
Yeye wakabakonka diba diakabangeye kusangala
Nunku mitshi yonso idi mimpe itu yakuama mamuma mimpe; kadi mitshi mibi itu yakuama mamuma mabi
Mukaji kuandamuna ne: Nyoka mmundinge, meme panyi kudia tshimuma
Kutekemena kabidi kudi muntu wende Moshe
Bualu bua bakuenda masandi, ne mashi adi ha bianza biabo; bakulonda malu a masandi ne mpingu yabo; bakuela bana babo ba balume bakandelelabo mu kahia bu milambu ya kuoshela mpingu
Bobo nebenze mukaba wa efoda bu mudibo benza efoda, newikale tshituha tshimue tshia ku efoda, ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin mutambe buimpe

Bena Isalele bakamuambila ne, Netuye anu mu musesu munene, bituanua mai ebe nansha tuetu nansha bimuna bietu, netukufute, anji kuitabusha bua tuetu tuhite anu ha makasa etu, katuena bienza bualu bukuabo

Yeye wakabelela lusumuinu elu ne, Muntu kai wa munkatshi muenu, bikaleye ne lukama lua mikoko, hajimisheye mukuabo, kena ushîa minga makumi tshitema ne tshitema mu tshihela wenda ukeba udi mujimine tô ne haumoneye
Izake kavua mua kujingulula kabidi Yakobe bimpe to, bualu maboku ende avua ne miosa bu a Esawu
Nunku nakadikuma hanshi ku mpala kua Yehowa matuku makumi anai, bualu bua Yehowa wakamba ne, Nembashihe

Tunkanunuina tua Solomo Muana wa balume wa Solomo wakadi Lehabama, Abiya wakadi muan andi, Asa wakadi muan andi, ne Yehoshafata wakadi muan andi, Yolama wakadi muan andi, Ahazaya wakadi muan andi, ne Yoasha wakadi muan andi, Amasaya wakadi muan andi, ne Azaya wakadi muan andi, ne Yotama wakadi muan andi, Ahaza wakadi muan andi, Hezikiya wakadi muan andi, ne Manashe wakadi muan andi, Amona wakadi muan andi, ne Yoshiya wakadi muan andi
Kanungu ka Mêyi a maalu a mpetu adi aleeja makookeshi ne majitu a Mbulamatadi
Balaame kumuandamuna ne: Kadi mvua mudianjile kukuambilane: mudimu wanyi udi amu wa kumanyisha bantu tshidi Maweja Nangila ungambila
Mayi a tshipupu mamane kukama, Nowa kushala ne muoyi bidimu nkama isatu ne makumi atanu
dilonda dia mêyi adi aludika bumuntu mu musoko;
Bana babo ne Yosefe dikumi bakaya mu Ejipitu bua kusumbabo bia kudia

Hashishe, mutshima wa Yudasa, mumutungidi, wakatamba kunyingalala, hakamoneye ne, Bakumuhisha, wakahingana ne bituha bia mpalata makumi asatu kudi bakuidi banene ne kudi bakulu, wakamba ne, Nakuenza bibi bualu bua nakutungila muntu tshitungu udi kai ne bualu
, ngombe
Atue munu mu mashi awu, amiamine mashi misangu muanda mutekete ku luseke ludi lumueneka lua tshilamba tshidi tshilembeleja muaba wa tshijila udi Maweja Nangila
Kakuena mukuabu to
Nudi mua kudisumbila bia kudia kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kudia; nenudisumbile mai a kunua kudibo ku argent, bua nuenu kunua

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakatuadishila disanka mu malu onso anuakenza ne tshianza tshienu; yeye wakamanya ngendu yenu mu tshihela etshi tshinene; mu bidimu ebi makumi anai Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakadi n enu; kanuakakengela tshintu
Bakela mei makole, bakaditaha ne tuele ne miele ya nvita bu mudi tshilele tshiabo tô ne hakahueka mashi abo ham bidi habo

Matthew Hashishe, Yesu wakambila bisumbu bia bantu ne bayidi bandi ne, Bafundi ne Bafalese badi bashikama mu nkuasa wa Mose; nuenze, nutumikile malu onso adibo banuambila; kadi kanuenji malu adibo benza; bualu bua bobo batu bamba, kadi kabatu benza
Bualu bua nudi ne bualu bua kuikala ne didikankamika bua, hanuenza bu mu disua dia Nzambi, nudi mua kuangata mulayi
Mukelenge Sedekiya wakambila Yelemiya ne, Ndi ntshina Bena Yuda bakubuela ku luseke lua Bena Kasada, bua tshifidibu mu bianza biabo, ne bua bobo kabantshimbishi
Nebadie kundi, kadi tshiena mbunvuila
Kuyabu kumonangana ne Balaame, bamuambila mikenji ya kudi mukalenga Balake
Bua bualu ebu Yesu kakendakana munkatshi mua Bena Yuda kabidi; wakumukaku, wakaya mu luseke luakadi hehi ne tshihela, ku musoko dina diau Efelayima; wakalalaku ne bayidi

Yehowa wakangambila ne, Kumutshinyi nansha; bualu bua nakumufila ne bantu bandi bonso ne buloba buandi mu tshianza tshiebe; wewe neumuenzele yeye bu mu wakenzela Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, wakadi ushikama mu Heshebona
Nudi bamanye bionsu bidi Maweja Nangila muenze
Bahika ba bungi badi batombokela bakelenge babo matuku â
Yehowa neadianjile kuhandisha ba mu ntenta ya Bena Yuda, bua butumbi bua tshiota tshia Davidi ne butumbi bua badi bashikame mu Yelushalema kabutambi bua Bena Yuda
Yehowa wakangambila kabidi ne, Udiangatshile kabidi bintu bia mulami muhote
Yehowa neanutumine milau ne makenga ne mahumbisha mu malu anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu, tô ne hanuajimishibua ne hanûmushibua lubilu ha buloba; bualu bua bubi bua bienzedi bienu, bua nuakundekela
Wenze bu mudi lungenyi luebe; kuitabushi bua mutu wandi udi ne nsuki mitoke tô ubuele mu Muaba wa Bafue ne ditalala
Kadi tatuabu kavua mumanye bionsu bivua bienzeka abi to
Bubi buebe budi mua kukengesha muntu bu wewe, Bualu bua makengesha mavule adi alua kudibo, bakuabo badi badila; Kadi kakuena umue udi wamba ne, Nzambi Mufuki wanyi udi kudi kunyi
Bobo bakatamba kuela mbila ne, Umushihe ku mutshi mutshiamakane
Pashishe kufuaye

Bialua tshiole nansha tshihuhu anyi biakuata bintu mamoma ne butu, nansha mikumbi nansha meshi, biatshintshimika bena lukuna misoko yabo; bialua makenga ne masama onso; biakutendelela ne biakutendekena muntu yonso, nansha Bena Isalele bonso, bualu bua muntu yonso udi mumanye disama diandi ne ntatu yandi, ne biololabo bianza biabo ku nsubu eu; unvue biebe mu muaba webe mu diulu; ubabuikidile mibi yabo, ufute muntu yonso bu muakadi bienzedi biandi, nguewe udi mumanye mutshima wandi bualu bua wewe nkayebe udi mumanye mitshima ya bantu ; bua bobo bakutshine, bende mu nshila yebe hatshidibo bashikame mu buloba buwakaha batatu betu
Bantu bonso nebikale n enu lukuna bua dina dianyi; kadi wananukila tô ne kunshikidilu neasungidibue
Dituku adi bena Kora bonsu kubutuka

Mu dituku disambombo bana balume ba ngombe muanda mukulu ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana balume ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai, bu mudi mukenji wamba, ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Nênze anu malu akamanabo kuenza
Yakoba wakatuangana ne Lakele mishiku wakabandisha di diandi, wakadia
Yehowa neanutumine biusha bia mu Ejipitu, ne disama dia muiaka, ne mpusu ne lubila: masama adibo kabayi mua kuondaha
Nuakushikama mu buneme ha buloba, nuakudisankisha ne masanka enu; nuakudiundisha mitshima yenu ilue manyi a bungi bua dituku didibo bashiha
Bana babo ne Yosefe dikumi bakaya mu Ejipitu bua kusumbabo bia kudia
Au mmeku a Bena Gada, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi anai ne nkama itanu

Kadi biahidiabo ditalala, ne bialuanganabo n enu, hashishe nenubatshintshimike; ne hafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu aba mu bianza bienu, nenushihe balume bonso ne miele ya nvita; kadi bakashi ne bana bakese ne bimuna ne bintu bionso bia mu musoko, nenudiangatshile ebi; nuenu nenudie bintu bionso bia badi n enu lukuna, bidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe
Yesu wakamuandamuna ne, Bulelela, bulelela, adi nkuambila ne, Bikala muntu kai muledibue tshiakabidi, kena mumanye mua kutangila bukelenge bua Nzambi

Biasua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, kunvua mei a Labashake, wakatuma mukelenge wa Ashû, mukelenge wandi, bua kubendeye n au Nzambi wa muoyo, neamubele bua mei akunvua Yehowa, Nzambi webe; nunku ulombele difuka dia bantu didi dishala Nzambi
Neajadike ntshinyi andi a kushimbula n au ngumbu ku mpala kua ngumbu yebe, neashimbule bibumba ku bisui biandi
Bualu bua yeye udi wamba mu musambu mukuabo kabidi ne, Kuena ufila Webe wa Tshijila bua kubeleye

Ndi ndomba bualu ebu ne, Luse luenu lutambe kudiundadiunda mu dimanya ne mu dijingulula dia malu onso; bua nuenu mimanye mua kujadika malu adi makane; ne bua nuenu nuikale ne mitshima mitoke, kanui balenduishi ba bakuabo, tô ne halua dituku dia Kilisto; ne bua nuenu nûshibue tente ne mamuma a buakane adi afuma kudi Yesu Kilisto bua butumbi ne kutumbishibua bia Nzambi
Kadi bobo kabakunvua, kabakateleja matshu, bakalonda anu lungenyi luabo ne tshitshu tshia mu mitshima yabo mibi; bakalukila ku nyima, kabakaya ku mpala nansha
Wakamumanyisha dina dia Yehowa
Tuetu bamane kufika mu Kadeshe Barneya, meme kunuambila ne: Tuafiki pabuipi ne mikuna ya bena Amore, idibu batupa kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu
Balumbuluishi Mpingu ya Mika ne Muakuidi Wandi Muntu wakadiku wa ku mikuna ya Efelayima, dina diandi Mika

Muntu mukuabo kikadi mu ntenta wa kusangakena hayeye kufila mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buandi mu muaba wa tshijila ne bubi bua ba mu nsubu muandi ne bubi bua Bena Isalele, tô ne hahatukeye mu nsubu
Bualu bua wakamba dî edi, yeye wakalengesha bintu bionso bia kudia

Hashishe Shaula wakamba ne, Nakuenza bibi, kadi unnemeshe katataka, ndi nkusengelela, ku mesu kua bakulu ba bantu banyi ne kua Bena Isalele, uhingane n anyi kabidi bua meme kutendelela Yehowa, Nzambi webe
Kadi yeye wakabambila ne, Nuenu nubahe bia kudia
Kubambilabu ne: Maweja Nangila mmututume bua kubadika bena Izrayele bonsu bakadi bakumbaja bidimu makumi abidi ne bisambuke
Kadi ku nyima Danyele, udibo babikila ne Beleteshasâ, bu mudi dina diandi dia nzambi wanyi, ne udi ne nyuma wa nzambi ya tshijila munda muandi, wakalua ku mpala kuanyi
Bia kudia bidiku bua difu, ne difu didiku bua bia kudia, kadi Nzambi neavuishe diodio ne biobio bu bintu bia tshianana
Shaula wakadiundadiunda mu bukole, wakadi utshiudisha Bena Yuda bakadi mu Damaseke, wakabaluisha ne, Eu udi Kilisto
Nanku bua bintu bionsu bidi muntu ulambula Maweja Nangila bua kashidi, kabena mua kubipana nansha kubipikula to, bu mudi muntu, nyama nansha budimi bupiana
Nebakuvule bilulu biebe, nebakunyenge bilenga biebe bia mushinga mukole

Uvuluke bua wewe kutumbisha mudimu wandi Bantu bonso bakaumona; Mona, Nzambi udi munene, ne katuena bamumanye nansha; Bualu bua udi ukoka mamata a mai mulu; udi matutu alokesha; Muntu kai udi mua kujingulula ditangalaka dia matutu, Mona, yeye udi udinyungulula ne nuele ya nvula, Ku dikuatshisha dia bintu ebi yeye udi ulumbuluisha bantu; Udi ubuikila bianza biandi bibidi ne miele ya nvula, Tshiona tshia mukungulu wa nvula tshidi tshiambila bantu lumu luandi; Yobo E, bua muanda eu mutshima wanyi udi uzakala, Unvua biebe, unvua tshiona tshia dî diandi Yeye udi utuma bua kukungulau muinshi mua diulu dionso, Ku nyima kuau tshiona tshia mukungulu wa nvula tshidiku; Nzambi udi ukunguisha mukungulu ne dî diandi didi dikemesha bantu; Bualu bua udi wamhila neige ne, Mata ha buloba; Udi ukonyisha bianza bia muntu yonso, Mu diba adi nyama ya mu tshisuku idi ibuela mu bisokomenu, Nvunde udi ufuma ku sude, Ku muhuya wa Nzambi kudi kuhatuka mabue a mashika, Yeye udi ûsha matutu mafike ne tshitelele tente; Adi anyunguluka ne adi akudimuka ku bulombodi buandi, Nansha bikalau mulangala wa kututa n au buloba, Unvua dî edi, Yobo; Wewe udi mumanye bu mudi Nzambi welela matutu mukenji wandi, Udi ujingulula bu mudi matutu alembelela mulu, Wewe muena bivualu bia luya, wewe udi mumanye mua kubalulula n andi diulu Utuyishe dî ditudi bamanye mua kumuambila
Kadi yeye wakabandamuna ne, Mu dilolo nutu nuamba ne, Nvula kena ulua, bualu bua diulu didi dikunze; mu dinda nutu nuamba ne, Lelu nvula nealue, bualu bua diulu didi dikunze kunzu, nvula udi mufinde
Nudi nututangidila talala tshinyi, bu tuetu mbakuendesha muntu eu ku bukole buetu anyi ku buimpe buetu
Kupangabu mua kulondakaja Yakobe ne bana bende
Wewe Wakufuma kudi kunyi

Nebenze bilulu bitambe buimpe, ne bilulu bia tshijila bia Alona muakuidi, ne bilulu bia bana bandi balume, bua kunkuatshilabo mudimu wa buakuidi, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ne bintu bia manananshi bidi bidia dihembu bia mu muaba wa tshijila bobo nebenze malu onso anakukuambila
Nanku, Maweja Nangila kupueka mu divuba dia kapia, kuimanaye pamue ne Moshe, kudisamunaye nkayende dina diende dia Maweja Nangila
Ke pandi nnuambila bua nusungule bimenga bisatu bia kunyemena

Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mukulu tshia bukelenge bua mukelenge Yoshiya, mukelenge wakatuma Shafana, muana wa Asalaya, muana wa Meshulama secrétaire mu nsubu wa Yehowa wamba ne, Ya biebe kudi Hilekiya, muakuidi munene, bua yeye a bale argent yakafilabo mu nsubu wa Yehowa, yakasangisha balami ba ku mbelu kudi bantu; bayifile mu bianza bia badi ku mutu kua mudimu wa mu nsubu wa Yehowa; bobo bayifile mu bianza bia bena mudimu badi balongolola miaba minya nguke mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Musumbi wa bintu kasanki biandi, muhanyi wa bintu kâshi madilu, bua tshiji tshikole tshidi tshihona ham bidi ha tshisumbu tshiabo tshionso

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bakelenge nebikale batatu bebe balami, Nebamanye mua kunyenga muena bukitu tshintu tshidiye ukuata mu nvita, Kadi Yehowa udi wamba ne, E, nebanyenge muena bukitu bantu badiye ukuata mu nvita, Nendishe badi bakukengesha minyinyi ya ha mibidi yabo mene, Isaiah Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Bualu kai, hanakulua, kakuakadi muntu bua kungakidila
wewe umukudimune dî ne, Nansha
Hezikiya eu wakakanga mushimi wa mai a ku mutu kua Gihona, wakâlombola ku luseke lua ku wesete kua musoko wa Davidi
Luakalua lunene bu bintu bia mu diulu; luakela misumba mikuabo ya mitoto hanshi, luakayidiata muinshi mualu
Ne wakadi mushikamehu, mumueneke ku mesu bu dibue dia yasape ne dia sardoine, ne muanzankongolo wakadiku, munyunguluke nkuasa wa butumbi, mumueneke ku mesu bu émeraude
Mbulamatadi udi mwa kupeesha bisumbu bia tshidiidi lupetu lwa mbulamatadi bwa biôbi kwenza nalu didiswisha diabi bwa kusungudibwa anyi kwenza midimu yabi, mu bulongolodi bufila kudi mêyi ne mikandu
Dituku dia dikumi: Akiyezere, muana wa Amishadayi, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Dane
Bulelela, nebabahulumune bua kuya n abo, nansha bana bakese ba mu tshisumbu tshia mikoko mene; bushuwa, ba mu luhangu luabo lua mikoko nebakeme bua bualu bubi bubakuata
Hakunvua bayidi dî adi, bakatua mpala hanshi, bakatamba kutshina
Wakabuela lubilu muakadi mukelenge, wakamulomba ne, Ndi musue umpe mutu wa Yone Mubatiji katataka ha dilonga
Bakidika muaba au ne, Kibelota hatawa, bualu bua bakajikamu bantu bakadi ne lukuka
Bena Lewi: Bana ba Yeshua ne ba Kadamiele, bana ba Hodewa, makumi muanda mutekete ne banai
Nunku nutumikile mikenji ne malu ne mei binakunuambila lelu, nubienze
Anyi, muntu kai udi udisha tshisumbu tshia bimuna ne kena unua mabele a tshisumbu tshiabi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Eu udi mulambu wa Alona ne bana bandi balume udibo bafila kudi Yehowa mu dituku didibo bela manyi ha mutu tshia dikumi tshia épha Nebabusangishe ne manyi mu dilonga, ne hashikishabo kubulamba, nebafile bituha bidi bilamba kudi Yehowa bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu
Nunku Yehowa ikale mulumbuluishi, akose tshilumbu tshidi hankatshi hetu n ebe Yehowa atangile, akule bualu buanyi, ansungile mu tshianza tshiebe
Hashishe Esetê mukelenge mukashi, muana wa Abihayila, ne Môdekai, Muena Yuda, bakafunda ne bukokeshi buonso bua kujadikabo mukanda eu muibidi bualu bua Pulima

Mukelenge ne Yehoyada bakayifila kudi bantu bakadi benza mudimu mu nsubu wa Yehowa; bobo bakabikila bahandi ba mabue ne bena mabaya bua kulongololabo nsubu wa Yehowa, ne bena biamu bifike ne bena biamu bia mitaku kabidi bua kulongololabo nsubu wa Yehowa
Samla, wa mu tshimenga tshia Masreka
Dikenga edi nedikale kudi Bena Ejipitu, ne kudi bisamba bionso bidi kabiyi bibandaku bua kujidila bidia bia disanka dia bitandatanda
Abashaloma wakanyema nunku, wakaya ku Geshû, wakashikamaku bidimu bisatu
Ba bana ba Uziele: Mika; ba bana ba Mika: Shamî
Bakaha bana ba balume ba Gêshoma, ku meku abo, misoko dikumi ne isatu ya mu tshisamba tshia Yisakâ ne tshia Ashe ne tshia Nafatale ne tshia Manashe mu buloba bua Bashana
Hanatuma Âtema anyi Tukiko kûdi, ndi musue wewe wambuluishe bua kulua kundi ku Nikopoli; bua nakudisunguila bua kushalaku tshidimu tshia mashika
Bifukibua bionso bia Nzambi bidi bimpe, ne bantu kabena ne bua kubimasha bikalabo babitabusha ne kusakidila; bualu bua biobi bidi bijidibua ne dî dia Nzambi ne kutendelela
Nunku bakashikisha dî dia Yesu diakambeye hakadiye wamba bualu bua lufu luafueye n alu

Ba mu Damaseke bakenduluka n ebe mushinga bualu bua bintu bivule biwakenza ku bianza biebe, ne bua biuma biebe bikumbana bia mishindu yonso, bakendulukangana n ebe mushinga bua nvinyo ya ku Helebone ne miosa mitoke ya mikoko
Wewe kuena umbuikidila bubi buanyi, Yobo Hashishe, Biledada, Muena Shuhi, wakakudimuna Yobo ne, Wewe newambe mei â musangu bule bishi
Wakadi utua binu biandi hanshi misangu isatu ku dituku ku dituku, ulomba Nzambi wandi, umusakidila bu muakadiye wenza diambedi
Yona mumane kuenda luendu lua dituku dimue munda mua musoko, wakabanga kuela dî ne, Hahita matuku makumi anai, nebabutule Ninewe

Kadi nuenu mbakunanukila n anyi mu makenga anyi; ndi nuha bukelenge bu muakumpa Tatu wanyi bukelenge, bua nuenu kudia ne kunua ku mesa anyi mu bukelenge buanyi; nenushikame mu nkuasa ya butumbi nulumbuluisha bisamba dikumi ne bibidi bia Isalele
Mpindiu tudi tubikila badi badisue ne, Badi ne dikasa dimpe; bulelela, benji ba malu mabi hadi bajadikibua; bulelela, badi bateta Nzambi badi bahanduka
Boaza wakambila bakulu ne bantu aba bonso ne, Nuenu nudi bamanyi ba bualu lelu ne, Meme nakusumba bintu bionso bia Elimeleke ne bia Kiliona ne bia Malona ku tshianza tshia Naomi
Nudi batentekedi
Butshia dinda, lume kutalaja miaba yonsu ivua pabuipi ne mitanda yabu
Yeye wakabakudimuna ne, Ne udi muntu mubi, tshiena mumanye; udi mumanye anu bualu bumue ne, Nakadi mufofo, katataka ndi mona
Dituku edi nedikale tshimanyinu tshia diumvuangana didi pankatshi panyi ne bena Izrayele
Simona Petelo wakamukudimuna ne, Mukelenge, netuye kudi nganyi

Hakahita mukelenge, yeye wakadila kudi mukelenge, wakamba ne, Muntu webe wakaya munkatshi mua nvita; mona, muntu mukuabo wakalua kundi ne munga muntu, wakangambila ne, Ulame muntu eu; biajimineye, nebalombe muoyo webe ku muoyo wandi, anyi wewe neufute ntalanta wa argent
Kanuakupeta biakudia pa madimi enu to
Davidi wakumukaku, wakaya ku Misepa wa mu Moaba; yeye wakambila mukelenge wa Moaba ne, Witabushe bua tatu anyi ne mamu anyi balue, bashikame n ebe tô ne hanamanya tshidi Nzambi musue kungenzela
Mefibosheta, muana wa Yonatana, muana wa Shaula, wakalua kudi Davidi, wakatua mpala wandi hanshi, wakamukukuila
Yeye wakamba ne, Babatijibue mu dina dia Yesu Kilisto

Mu matuku a Yoyakima bakuidi bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo: Melaya wa mu nsubu wa Selaya; Hananya wa mu nsubu wa Yelemiya; Meshulama wa mu nsubu wa Ezela; Yehohanana wa mu nsubu wa Amalia; Yonatana wa mu nsubu wa Maluki; Yosefe wa mu nsubu wa Shebanya; Adena wa mu nsubu wa Halima; Helekai wa mu nsubu wa Melayota; Zekâya wa mu nsubu wa Ido; Meshulama wa mu nsubu wa Ginetona; Zikeli wa mu nsubu wa Abiya; Piletai wa mu nsubu wa Minyamina wa Moadiya; Shamua wa mu nsubu wa Bilega; Yehonatana wa mu nsubu wa Shemaya; Matenai wa mu nsubu wa Yoyaliba; Uzi wa mu nsubu wa Yedaya; Kalai wa mu nsubu wa Salai; Ebê wa mu nsubu wa Amoka; Hashabeya wa mu nsubu wa Hilekiya; Netanele wa mu nsubu wa Yedaya
Kadi Maweja Nangila udi muaba ewu
Bualu bua yeye wakandinga misangu ibidi wakamana kuangata bintu bianyi bia buan a bute, ne lelu wakangata disanka dianyi kabidi
Kujulaye kabidi makunji a mabue manene dikumi ne abidi
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Kutshinyi mukalenga ewu to
Bakasuika mikaba, muntu ne muntu muele wandi; Davidi wakasuika mukaba kabidi ne muele wandi; bantu nkama inai bakalonda Davidi ne bantu nkama ibidi bakashala ha bintu biabo

Davidi wakalongolola biamu bifike bia bungi bua kufulabo n abi misamadi ya kuenzabo n ai bibi ne mabaya makuabo; wakasangisha biamu bia mitaku biakadibo kabayi bamanye mua kubala bujitu buabi; ne mitshi ya cèdre yakadi bungi buakadibo kabayi bamanye; bualu bua Bena Sidona ne Bena Tulo bakalua kudi Davidi ne mitshi ya cèdre ya bungi
Mukuabo, hakamoneye ne, Nakulengeshibua, wakahingana utumbisha Nzambi ne dî dikole; wakadihonena, wakatua mpala wandi hanshi ku makasa a Yesu, wakamusakidila; yeye wakadi Muena Samalea
Bobo bakamukudimuna ne, Muntu webe tatu wetu, udi mukole, utshidi ne muoyo Bobo bakatua mpala yabo hanshi, bakamukukuila
Kadi mukuabo neakonke ne, Bantu bafue nebabike ku lufu munyi
Bavua anu bindila diyi dia Maweja Nangila

Kanuakunvua mei akamba Yehowa mukana mua baprofete ba diambedi, hakadi Yelushalema ne bantu ne diakalengele, ne hakadi misoko numunyunguluke, ne hakadi bantu bashikame mu buloba ku Sude ne mu tshibanda, anyi
Moshe kubikila Beshalele, Okoliyabe ne bantu bakuabu bavua Maweja Nangila mupeshe tshipedi tshia kuenza midimu ayi kuyikumbaja
Kakuakadi muntu wakakufuila luse bua kukuenzela malu â onso a luse; kadi bakakuimasha mu tshisuku, bualu bua bakalengulula muoyo webe mu dituku diakakulelabo
Kuvualabu bilamba bia dibungama

Acts Hakasungulabo bua tuetu kuya mu bualu ku Italia bakafila Paulo ne bakuabo bakadi mu nsubu wa lukanu mu bianza bia Yulio, kapitene ka mu tshisumbu tshia masalayi tshiakadibo babikila ne, Tshia Augusto
Dî edi diakatangadika munkatshi mua bana babo ba mu Kilisto ne, Muyidi eu kena ufua; kadi Yesu kakamba ne, Yeye kena ufua; wakamba ne, Binasua bua ashale ne muoyo tô ne hanalua, mbualu buebe, anyi
Yeye Wakenza midima bu ntenta wandi, mai masangisha ne matutu mafike a mu diulu
Yeye wakabandamuna ne, Bakanuha bienu lungenyi lua kumanya malu a bukelenge bua mu diulu adi masokoka, kadi kabakabahalu
Bakulu abu nebakuambuluishe
Bakelenge aba babidi nebateke mitshima yabo ku malu mabi bua kuenza, nebambilangane mei a mashimi batshidibo bashikame ku mesa amue
Hakambabo ne, Yeye kena kunoko, yeye wakatshihisha ba mu bukelenge abu ne tshisamba atshi bua kuambabo ne, Katuena bamusangane
Pa tshilambuilu apu, nulambuilepu Maweja Nangila milambu ya kuosha
Mukelenge wanyi udi musue bualu ebu bishi
Yehezekele Hashishe Nyuma wakambandisha mulu, wakalua n anyi ku tshibi tshia ku nsubu wa Yehowa tshia ku luseke lua esete, tshidi tshitangila ku esete; ekumona
Mose wakaluhuka ku mpala kua Yehowa ne milangala yonso kudi Bena Isalele bobo bakatangila ne muntu yonso wakangata mulangala wandi
Wewe neuboteshe tshituha, utshiteke ku mpala kua mushete wa Nzambi mu ntenta wa kusangakena kundi nsangakena n ebe, netshikale tshilamba tshia tshima kunudi
Sêgio Paulo wakabikila Bânaba ne Shaula, wakakeba bua kunyua dî dia Nzambi
Bulelela, udi wenza n atshi nzambi, udi umutendelela; udi usonga n atshi luhingu, udi ulukukuila hanshi
Udi ne kanyinganyinga nganyi
Mose wakangata kana ka ngombe kakenzabo, wakakosha mu kahia, wakakabotesha, wakakela mu mai, wakanuisha Bena Isalele mai au
Hashishe nakangata mikanda ya kula kua budimi, wowo wakadi muvunga ne muteka ne tshimanyinu bu muakadi mikenji ne tshilele, ne mukuabo wakadi muvungulula
Kadi tudi tumutangila yeye wakakeheshibua kakese kudi Banjelo, Yesu mene, bualu bua dikenga dia lufu muashibue tshifulu tshia butumbi ne buneme, bua ku ngasa wa Nzambi alabuile muntu yonso lufu
Yesu wakabambila ne, Muprofete udi ne butumbi mu miaba yonso, kadi kena n abu ku luseke luabo ne munkatshi mua bana babo ne mu nsubu wandi
Nanku bitudi benza lelu ebi, ke bivua Maweja Nangila mutume diyi bua tuenze bua kunukobolola
Ne kakuakadi umue, nasha mu diulu, nasha ha buloba, nasha munshi mua buloba, wakamanya mua kubulula mukanda anyi kûtangilabu
Nuvuluke badi mu nkanu, bu munudi basuika n abo; nuvuluke badibo benzela bibi, bua nuenu nutshidi mu mibidi
Kadi Petelo ne bapostolo bakandamuna ne, Butudi n abu mbua kutumikila mei a Nzambi ku mpala kua mei a bantu
Mutuangaji mumane kukenketa tshintu tshidi ne makeji, neatshiteke pa nkayatshi matuku muanda mutekete
Bakamba ne, Itabusha Mukelenge Yesu, neusungidibue ne ba mu nsubu muebe
Bobo bakimba misambu mu nsubu wa kusambakena tô ne hakasa Solomo nsubu wa Yehowa mu Yelushalema; bakenza mudimu wabo bu muakadi milongo yabo
Maweja Nangila udi uyukila ne Moshe Moshe kuambila Maweja Nangila ne: Maweja Nangila unteleje
Kadi mukaji wa bena Madiyane awu, uvua Kozbi, muana wa Sure
Nsongalume wa Yonatana wakambila mikete, wakahingana kudi mukelenge wandi
Hakamoneye ne, Bualu ebu budi busankisha Bena Yuda, wakakuata Petelo kabidi
Muhika wandi mukashi, dina diandi Leuma, wakamulelela Teba ne Gahama ne Tahasha ne Maka
Kadi bantu ba mu musoko bakadi batahuluke; bakuabo bakadi ku luseke lua Bena Yuda, bakuabo ku luseke lua bapostolo
Nunku yeye wakumuka kudiye, wakabuela mu nsubu ne bana bandi ba balume, wakinshila tshibi; bobo bakalua ne biasu kudiye, yeye wakahongolola manyi
Nowa kuashila Maweja Nangila tshilambuilu
Kadi ndi mukushiye ne muoyi, bua ujadike bukole buanyi, kabidi bua lumu luanyi lumanyike pa buloba bujima
Bikala tshituha tshimue ne dikenga, bituha bionso bidi bikenga n atshi; ne bikala tshituha tshimue tshitumbishibua, bituha bionso bidi bisanka n atshi

Yeye wakutuambila bu muakamoneye muanjelo muimane mu nsubu muandi, umuambila ne, Tuma bantu ku Yopa, balue ne Simona, dinga dina Petelo, yeye neakuambile mei a kukusungila n au ne ba mu nsubu webe bonso
Nuenu nuakalua kundi, buonso buenu muakamba ne, Tutume bantu ku mpala kuetu, bua hobo batentekele buloba, bahingane, batumanyishe bua nshila utudi tuyamu, ne misoko itudi tubuelamu

Bidi bimpe bua yeye kuelangana mpata ne muaku udi kauyi mua kukuatshisha mukuabo, Wewe mene udi uvuisha ditshina dietu dia Nzambi bu muanda wa hatuhu, Bualu bua bubi buebe budi buyisha mukana muebe, Mukana muebe mudi mukuhisha, kemmeme; Wewe mene wakadi muntu wa kumudilu wakalelabo, anyi

Bana ba balume ba Yoele: Shemaya muan andi, ne Gogo muan andi, ne Shimei muan andi, Mika muan andi, ne Leaya muan andi, ne Bâla muan andi, ne Bela muan andi; Tigelata pilenesê wakaya n andi mu buhika; yeye wakadi mukelenge wa Bena Lubena
Yeye wakangambila ne, Muana wa muntu, wakumona muanda eu, anyi

Pikala Arone ubuela mu muaba wa tshijila, ikale uvuala tshilamba tshia pa tshiadi tshia dilumbulula, tshidi ne mena a bisamba bia bena Izrayele, bua meme Maweja Nangila ngikale nnuvuluka amu kunuvuluka

Ku malu â bantu bakuabo bamane kuhambuka bakasesuka bua kulonda biakulakula; badi basue kuikala bayishi ba mikenshi ya Nzambi, kadi kabena bajingulula tshidibo bamba anyi tshidibo bakeba kujadika ne, Ntshilelela

Enza nunku ku mesu kua Bena Yuda, ubambile ne, Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Tangilai, nentume dî bua kubikila Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, muntu wanyi; ne yeye neajadike nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge ha mutu ha mabue â anakusokoka, yeye neashimike tshitanda tshiandi tshia bukelenge ha mutu hau
Nakabajimisha, nakababutula, ne kabakamanya mua kubika kahidi; e, bakahona muinshi mua makasa anyi
Yeye wakungela mananashi â ham bidi hanyi, Wakenza nunku bua kundongolola ha kunjikabo

Bangend a mushinga ba ku Sheba ne Lama bakendulukangana n ebe mushinga; bakashintakasha n ebe bintu bia muhuya muimpe bitambe mushinga mukole, mabue a mushinga mukole matamba bulengele ne or, ku bintu biwakenduluka n abi
Nenuikale ne mitshi ya olive mu madimi enu onso, kadi kanuena nudilaba manyi ai ham bidi; bualu bua mamuma neahohoke
Genesis Abalahama wakumuka ku muaba au, wakaya ku Sude, wakashikama hankatshi ha Kadesha ne Shû, wakashikama ku Gelâ
Mapangadika a tubadi ne tubinadi badi baakumbaja mu dîna dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga

Aba mbashihianganyi badi mua kunyemenamu bua kuikala ne muoyo: muntu yonso udi ushiha mukuabo ku mpukahuka, kakadi n andi tshiji diambedi; bu muntu wakuya ne mukuabo muitu bua kutaha nkunyi, ne hakuambeye kutaha mutshi ne kasui, ne kasui kakukuka, kakutaha muntu mukuabo, kakumushiha; muntu eu neanyemene ku umue wa misoko ei, neikale ne muoyo
Hakalua Yosefe kudi bana babo, bakamukohola tshikowelu tshiandi, tshikowelu tshiandi tshia maboko male tshiakadiye muluate, bakamukuata, bakamuela mu mukela, mukela wakadi mûme, kamuakadi mai
; Diel
