Kadi kudi bakuabo ndi mbambila nkayanyi, ke Mukelenge udi wamba, ne, Bikala muan enu wa ma Kilisto ne mukashi udi kai mmena ditabusha, ne mukashi eu udi usanka bua kuikala n andi, mulume kamulekedi nasha

Nakudiata tshikaminu nkayanyi, Bualu bua dituku dia kusombela diakadi mu mutshima wanyi, Nakatangila, ne kakuakadi muntu bua kunkuatshisha; Nakadiata bantu hanshi mu tshiji tshianyi, nakabavuisha Nenvuluishe bantu bua bienzedi bia luse lujalame lua Yehowa, Bualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Bulelela, badi bantu banyi, Mu makenga abo onso yeye wakunvua dikenga, Kadi bakamutombokela, Hashishe, yeye wakavuluka matuku a kale, Wakendesha diboko diandi didi ne butumbi wakabalombola mu ndondo wa mai manene udi kudi kunyi
Kadi wewe neuye kudi bankambua bebe hola, neujikibue muntu mununu
Muudi ungambila bua meme kubambula bu mudi ndeji wambula muana pambidi, bua kubafikisha mu ditunga diuvua mulaye bankambua babu, mbishi

Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi ukuambila, wewe Baluka, ne, Wewe wakuamba ne, Ndi ne mulau: Bualu bua Yehowa wakutentekasha kanyinganyinga ha mutu ha dikenga dianyi; ndi muhungile ne kutua kuanyi kua mikemu, ne tshiena mpeta dikisha

Yeye wakakuata dragon, nyoka au wa kale, udi diabolo ne Satana, wakamusuika bidimu tshinunu, ne wakamuela mu dina didi kadî ne tshishikidilu, ne wakadînshila, ne wakamutekelahu tshimanyishilu ha mutu handi, bua yeye kadingi bisamba bia bantu kabidi, tô ne hashika bidimu tshinunu; ku nyima kua bualu ebu budiye n abu mbua kusuludibua tshituha tshihi
Muntu udi kayi ne meji kena mumanye bualu ebu, ne, Biadiunda bantu babi bu mudi mashinde atoloka, Kadi wewe, Yehowa, udi mushikame mu muaba udi kulu kashidi

Bena Sulia bakanyema ku mpala kua Bena Isalele; Davidi wakashiha Bena Sulia bakadi benda mu makalu binunu muanda mutekete ne binunu makumi anai bakadi benda hanshi; wakashiha Shofaka, kapitene ka masalayi, kabidi
Bena Isalele bakasemena ha buihi ne Bena Benyamina dituku dibidi

Hashishe bakadisangisha kundi, muntu ne muntu, bakadi bazakala bua mei a Nzambi wa Isalele bualu bua bubi bua bantu aba bakumuka mu buhika; nakashikama hanshi ntua mikemu tô ne ku diba dia kufila mulambu wa ku dilolo
Milambu ya kuosha yakadi ya bungi, ne manyi a milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, ne milambu ya bintu bia kunua bia milambu yonso ya kuosha
Chronicles Yehoshafata wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika diatshimue ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi; Yeholama muan andi wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Yeye wakimanyika bantu bonso, muntu ne muntu ne bintu bia nvita mu bianza biandi, ku tshianza tshia balume tshia nsubu tô ne ku tshianza tshia bakashi tô ne ku tshioshelu, banyunguluke mukelenge
Ngondo wa kumudilu, mu matuku dikumi ne anai, diba dia dilolo, ndituku dia kuhita kua Yehowa
Wakashiha binunu dikumi bia Bena Edome mu Tshibanda tshia Luehu; wakanyenga musoko wa Sela mu nvita, wakawidika ne, Yoketele tô ne ku difuku edi
Kadi nansha bikala nanku, disanka dia ne mapa a tshidiidi ndianyishibwa anu bwa beena Kongu, pa kumbusha mapangadika makwabo adi mêyi ne mikandu mwa kwangata
Hashishe yeye wakambila Bena Isalele ne, Nuenu nuikale ku luseke lumue, meme ne Yonatana, muan anyi mulume netuikale ku luseke lukuabo
Hakadiye bidimu bu makumi anai, bualu buakalua mu mutshima wandi bua kuyeye kutangila bana babo, bana ba Isalele

Muntu wa Nzambi wakambila mukelenge ne, Nansha, biwampa tshituha tshia nsubu, tshiena nya n ebe, tshiena ndia, tshiena nnua mu muaba eu; bualu bua Yehowa wakandimusha ne, Kudi bidia, kunu mai, kuhinganyi mu nshila uwakafumina
Nuenu ne ndelanganyi yenu yonsu nuikale nuenza bualu ebu kashidi
Kanungu ka Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu kadi kamanyisha bûngi bwa lupetu bônso bwa Ditunga ku Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshidimu tshiônso ne kafila kaaku ka dioosha
Umusha mesu ebe kundi, bua meme kumanya mua kusanka kabidi; Psalms Nakindila Yehowa ne lutulu, wakatelela matshu andi kundi, Wakampa tula mu dijimba dia kabutu mu bintampi muakadi bitoshi
Abalahama wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakaya ku muaba wakimaneye ku mpala kua Yehowa; wakatangila ku luseke lua Sodoma ne Amola ne Mpata yonso, ne tangilai, muishi wakadi ubanda bu muishi wa tshikutu
Nyama yonso udi wenda ne makama udi mubi kunudi, muntu yonso udi ulenga tshianza ham bidi hai neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Bienzedi bia Zimeli bikuabo biakenzeye, ne tshitungu tshiakatungileye, kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele, anyi
Yeye udi ubala tshiamu tshifike bu nsona, Mukete kawena mumanye mua kumuihata
Wakenza efoda ne or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzu ne bia lin muimpe
Kadi yeye wakamanya meshi abo, wakabambila ne, Bukelenge buonso budi buhanduluke nebufue, nsubu kabidi udi muhanduluke neuhukile ha munga
Bikalabo babikile muena nsubu ne, Belezebula, nebatambe kubikila ba mu nsubu muandi muomumue
Yesu wakamba ne, Nsongalume, ndi nkuambila ne, Bika
Mu dituku adi Yakoba wakumusha mbushi ya bimpanga yakadi ne matoba, ne mashina a mbushi akadi ne matoba, ne mikoko yonso yakadi mifike, wakabika mu bianza bia bana bandi balume
Yeye wakambila tshisumbu tshia bantu ne, Umukai, ndi nnusengelela, ku ntenta ya bantu aba babi, kanulengi tshintu tshiabo tshianza, kabanushihi bua mibi yabo

Hashishe bakelenge batanu ba Bena Amole, mukelenge wa Yelushalema, ne mukelenge wa Hebelone ne mukelenge wa Yâmuta ne mukelenge wa Lakisha ne mukelenge wa Egelona, bakadisangisha hamue, bakaya, bobo ne misumba yabo yonso, bakasa tshitudilu ku mpala kua Gibeona, bakaluangana ne ben au nvita
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu mumane kuipata muntu mu lupangu lua Edene, kutekaye Bakerubine mu lupangu amu ne muela utema kapia
Bena Isalele bonso bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose ne Alona
Muaba wa tshijila ne muaba mutambe tshijila biakadi ne bibi bibidi ku mishiku ya mbelu
Bakelenge ba mu Isalele, bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo, bakafua bintu
Hashishe kahita ka bulami ba ntempelo ne tuhalai bakaya, bakalua n abo, kabai babakoka ku bukole, bua bakadi batshina bantu ne, Nebatukume mabue
Kukosololabu bitata abi mu bitupa bikese bua kupeta buanda
Nunku mukelenge wa Isalele wakadianjila kutuma bantu ku muaba wakamuambila muntu wa Nzambi, wakatusungila nansha musangu umue nansha misangu ibidi

Mu dituku dia makumi abidi ne anai dia ngondo wa tshitema, mu tshidimu tshibidi tshia bukokeshi bua mukelenge Dayawesha, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi muprofete Hagai ne, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Ebesha bakuidi bualu bua mikenji, bakonka ne, Biatuala muntu munyinyi wa tshijila mu luzemba lua tshivualu tshiandi, bialenga luzemba luandi mampa, anyi bialengalu bintu bia mu tshifuadi, anyi nvinyo, anyi manyi, anyi tshia kudia tshia mushindu wonso, bintu ebi nebikale bia tshijila, anyi
Kuvudi muan enu mukashi bilulu, bikaleye muana wa tatu ebe anyi muana wa mamu ebe udi muledibue mu nsubu muenu, anyi muaba mukuabo

Tuakulua lumu lua ditabusha dienu dia mu Kilisto Yesu ne bua dinanga dinudi n adi kudi basanto bonso, bualu bua ditekemena didi dinutekedibue mu diulu, dinuakadianjila kunyua lumu luadi mu di dia bushua dia lumu luimpe ludi lulua kunudi
Tuetu bonso katuena ne tatu umue, anyi
Bena Isalele bakumuka ku Misepa, bakalonda Bena Peleshete, bakabashiha tô ne hakafikabo ku Bete kâ
Arone kusengelela Moshe, wamba ne: Mukalenga wanyi, tudi bena tshibawu
Ne mikumbi yakabatuka mu muinshi ha buloba; bakuiha bukole bu mudi tuminyiminyi tua ha buloba ne bukole
Kadi bantu bakangata bia mu bintu biakahaulabo, mikoko ne ngombe biakatamba bulengele bua kuyishihelabo Yehowa, Nzambi webe, mu Gilegala
Yosefe wakabambila ne Tshiena mua kuenza nunku anu muntu wakasanganabo ne luhanza mu tshianza tshiandi neikale muhika wanyi kadi bakuabo benu nuhingane kudi tatu wenu talala
Bana ba balume ba Yonatana: Pelete ne Zaza
Bana balume ba Isaka: Esau ne Isalele
Hakashikishabo malu onso a mu mikenshi ya Mukelenge, bakahingana mu Galela, ku musoko wabo Nazaleta
Hakadibo bahueka ha mukuna, yeye wakabambila bikole ne, nuambidi muntu mukuabo bualu bunuakumona tô ne habika Muana wa muntu ku lufu
Wakambila bakuabo mu matshu anyi ne, Yai, nuhitshile mu musoko ku nyima kuandi, nutahe bantu
Hakadiye wamba nunku, muntu wakafuma ku nsubu wa mukelenge wa nsunagoga, wakamba ne, Muan ebe udi mufue, kutatshishi Muyishi
Ndi mumanye bualu bua meme kuenza; hangumushabo mu bulami, bantu bangitabushe bua meme kubuela mu nsubu yabo
Ebu mbualu bua batuhu kabidi
Kishi wakambila muan andi Shaula ne, Wangate umue wa bena mudimu, aye n ebe: jukai, nuye kukeba nyama ya mpunda
Bitaku bia makunji awu, bivua bia tshiamu tshikunze
Kanubuelakanyi ne bena mulongo anyi batempi ba mbuku, kanubakebi, kunudionyi kudibo meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Nuenu, bana ba bakashi ba mu Siona, hatukai bua kutangila mukelenge Solomo, ne tshifulu tshia butumbi tshiakamuasabo kudi mamu wandi dituku dia dibaka diandi, dituku mene dia disanka dia mutshima wandi
Lehabama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi

Peter Nunku ndi nsengelela bakulu badi munkatshi muenu, ndi bianyi mukulu n abo, ne mumanyi wa makenga a Kilisto, ne muangatshi wa butumbi budi buamba kubuluibua, ne, Nulame tshisumbu tshia mikoko ya Nzambi tshidi munkatshi muenu, nubalame, kanui benzeshibue ku bukole, kadi ne mitshima ya disanka bu mu disua dia Nzambi; kambualu bua kukeba biuma, kadi nuikale ne mutshima mulongolola bimpe; kanuikadi bu bakokeshi ba badi ku nyima kuenu, kadi nudivuishe bifuanyikishi bimpe kudi mikoko
Nuenu bamane kundambula mulambu wa kuosha wa ku dituku dionsu, ne wa maluvu a mvinyo, nenundambule kabidi mbuji wa mpumbu bua mulambu wa kunukobolola nawu

Bua ditabusha Abalahama, hakamutetabo, wakafila Isaka bu mulambu; yeye wakamana kuitabusha milayi ne disanka, wakadi ufila muan andi umuehele mulela; nyeye wakambibua bualu buandi ne, Nebabikile tunkanunuina tuebe mu Isaka; wakamanya ne, Nzambi udi ne bukole bua kumubisha munkatshi mua bafue mene, kuakamuangateye kabidi mu tshifuanyikishi
Yuda wakambila bana babo ne, Hatuashiha muan etu, ne hatuasokoka mashi andi, netushale ne tshintu kai
Nasha kakese
Kadi Yesu wakamuambila ne, Ndonda meme, shîa bafue bajike bafue babo
Nunku bakalua ne bantu aba ku mpala kua mukelenge
Nuele Malia muoyo; yeye wakanukuatshisha ne mudimu wa bungi
Aba bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu ba Ladana
Bakasangana Adoni bezeke mu Bezeke; bakaluangana n andi, bakashiha Bena Kanâna ne Bena Pelizi
Neabanyine ba munkatshi muabo bintu biakunyengeye, bintu biakuhauleye ne biuma bikuabo
Bana ba Adina nkama isambombo ne makumi atanu ne batanu
Muena Lewi, bayandi wa mukashi wakashihabo, wakabakudimuna ne, Nakalua ku Gibea wa mu buloba bua Benyamina, meme ne mukashi muhika unakabaka, bua kulalaku
Misulu ya mai a muoyo nebatuke munda mua wangitabusha, bu muakamba Mukanda wa Nzambi
Kadi hakahidia Bena Yuda kuitabusha dî diabo, bunakadi n abu mbua kulayidila kudi Kaisa; tshiakadi ne bualu bua kubanda n abu tshisamba tshianyi
Kadi yeye wakamba ne, Ndi yeye mene
Pikale boya bua muaba awu butokoloke, kabidi muaba awu mondoke, mutuangaji neajadike ne: muntu awu udi ne disama dia nsudi
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, mu matuku atshidi alua, nensampishile Davidi Lutonga luakane; yeye neakokeshe bu mukelenge, nealeshe bakuabo meji makane, neajadike kulumbulula kuimpe ne buakane mu buloba
Hashishe Davidi wakebesha Ahimeleke, Muena Hiti, ne Abishai, muana wa Seluya, muan abo ne Yoaba, ne, Udi musue kuhueka n anyi kudi Shaula mu tshitudilu tshiandi nganyi
Nebafue amu kufua
Hashishe, ba gouverneur aba ne miloho bakadisangisha ku mpala kua mukelenge, bakamuambila ne, Mukelenge Dayawesha, wikale ne muoyo tshiendelele
Wakabikila bahika bandi dikumi, wakabaha mpalata Kadi bantu bandi bakadi n andi lukuna, bakatuma miloho bua kumulonda ne, Katuena basue muntu eu ikale mukelenge wetu
Yeye Wakenza tshinyi

Bantu aba kabena bakuatshike maluvi bu munudi nuamba bienu, bualu bua diba didi anu ha tshitema; kadi ebu mbualu buakambabo kudi muprofete Yoele ne, Nzambi udi wamba ne, Halua matuku a kunshikidilu, E, halua matuku au nengitshikishile bahika banyi balume ne bahika banyi bakashi Nendeshe bantu malu a kukema mu diulu Diba nedikudimunyibue midima, Halua bualu ebu, watela dina dia Mukelenge neasungidibue
Panudi nudilongolola bua kuluangana, mutuangaji imane kumpala kua bena mvita ba bena Izrayele, ele lusanzu ne: Nuenu bena mvita ba bena Izrayele, numanye ne: lelu nudi nuluangana ne bena lukuna benu
Usokoke mushete udi ne meyi ne mikenji panyima pa tshilamba atshi
Muana mukuabo wa Yonatana udi mushale, yeye udi mulema
Atumushile nyoka eyi
Yolama wakamba ne, Balongolole dikalu

Kadi wewe ne bana bebe balume ne bana bebe bakashi nenudie tshiadi tshia kunyukulabo ne tshibelu tshia kukuhabo ebi mbintu biebe ne bia bana bebe balume munkatshi mua milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala ya Bena Isalele
Hakahita bidimu bisatu, bantu babidi ba Shimei bakanyemena kudi Akisha, muana wa Mâka, mukelenge wa mu Gata
Samuele wakamuambila ne, Udi nngebesha meme munyi, bualu bua Yehowa wakalekela, wakalua bu muena lukuna webe
Wewe Moshe, ukumbaje malu onsu andi mukuambile lelu aa
Bu mudi bantu basangisha luhela bua kuluosha, bualu nebuikale nunku kunshikidilu kua tshikondo etshi
Muntu kai udi mutekete, ne tshiena mutekete n andi
Yeye wakayila kabidi, wakaditshiha ne
Yelemiya wakambila Sedekiya ne, binakuambilabu, kuena unshiha bulelela, anyi
Nulame mikenji eyi kashidi, miaba yonsu inudi nusomba
Bonso badi benji ba malu a kukema, anyi
Tshilamba tshia mu mushiku wa mbelu wa lupangu, tshivua tshitela bimpe kudi batedi ne buanda bukole bua ndanda busambakaja ne bua miosa ya nyama bufikuluke, bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzuu

Wewe, nyunyu wanyi wa nkutshi, udi usokoma mu mabue a mu mbuebue, mu miaba misokoka ya mu mbuwa; witabushe bua meme kumona mpala webe ne kunyua dî diebe; bualu bua dî diebe didi dimpe ne mpala webe udi mulengele
Bayidi bandi bakavuluka dî didi difunda mu Mukanda wa Nzambi ne, Lukunukuna lua ku nsubu webe nelundie

Hakatangila Yoaba ne, Bakela malu ya nvita ku mpala ne ku nyima banjike, yeye wakasungula bena bukitu bonso ba mu Isalele, wakabatahulula, wakela mualu wa nvita kudi Bena Sulia; wakafila bantu bakuabo mu bianza bia Abishai muakuny andi, wakela mualu wa nvita kudi Bena Amona
Kadi Yesu wakahua
Tshiena mumanye mua kuowamu mai, ngikale muakane, anyi
Yeye wakatuma Petelo ne Yone ne, Yai nutulongoluele Kuhita kua Yehowa bua tuetu kudia
Mulume wakidika bimuna bionso ne nyunyu yonso ya mu diulu ne bimuna bionso bia mu madimi mena abi, kadi mulume kakadi ne mukuatshishi wa bu muakadiye nansha
Mvidi Mukulu udi usambakena ne Moshe pa mukuna wa Sinayi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Pingana kudi bantu, ubambile ne: Lelu ne malaba numushe mikiya, nusukule kabidi bilamba bienu
Yeye udi wamba ne, Ndi mu munya, hatshidiye ne muan abo lukuna, yeye utshidi mu midima tô ne katataka
Bualu buakenjibua Buloba buakamenesha bimenyi, midioko idi yela ntete, bu mudi mishindu yai, ne mitshi idi ikuama mamuma adi ne ntete yai, bu mudi mushindu wai

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakûmisha mai a Yadene ku mpala kuenu, tô ne hanuakasabuka bonso, bu muakenza Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ku Dishiba Dikunze diakumisheye ku mpala kuetu, tô ne hatuakasabuka buonso buetu; bua bantu bonso ba ha buloba bamanye ne, Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshidi tshikole; ne bua nuenu nutshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshiendelele

Ka nudiangatshidi tshintu tshimue tshia mulau tshia musoko au mu tshianza tshienu; nunku Yehowa nealekele tshiji tshiandi tshikole, neanuleshe luse, neanusankishe, neanukumbashe bu muakalayeye batatu benu; hanunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kutumikila mikenji yandi yonso inakunuambila lelu ne bua kuenza malu adi makane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yesu wakumuka mu nseke ya Tulo, wakahitshila mu Sidona ne mu nseke ya Dekapoli, wakafika ku dishiba dia Galela
Wenza bintu ebi ne tshiamu tshia mpawungi: malongu masalame, makopu, ngesu ne mabungu a kulambuila maluvu
Yeye udi ne bukokeshi ne bukole bua kuela nyuma ya bukoya dî, yumuke munda mua bantu
Nunku tshikena kumona tshinakamona diambedi tshiakumuka kundi
Wakusangana bualu bubi kai munda mua muntu webe musangu wonso unakadi n ebe tô ne lelu, bua meme tshiyi kuluangana ne bena lukuna ba mukelenge wanyi
Mîyama wakashala ku butshika bua tshitudilu matuku muanda mutekete, bantu kabakaya ku luendu to ne hakaluabo ne Mîyama kabidi
Bena Peleshete bakadi n andi mukau
Nulame mikenji yanyi bimpe, nuyikumbaje

Hakambeve ne, Bimuna bionso bia matoba ndifutu diebe, hashishe, bimuna bionso biakalela bana bakadi ne matoba, hakambeye ne, Bimuna bionso bia mihola ndifutu diebe, hashishe, bimuna bionso biakalela bana bakadi ne mihola
Udi umbikidila meme ne, Muimpe, tshinyi
Meme nkayanyi ndi mua kutuala malu enu ne bujitu buenu ne kutanda kuenu munyi
Amen

Yehowa, Nzambi wa mulu, wakangumusha ku nsubu wa tatu wanyi ne ku buloba buakandelabo, wakabambila, wakandaya ne, Nempe tunkanunuina biebe buloba ebu yeye mene neatume muanjelo wandi ku mpala kuebe, ne wewe newangatshile muan anyi mukashi kuakua
Hakabalekelabo, bakahingana kudi bana babo, bakabamanyisha malu onso akabambila bakuidi banene ne bakulu
Yoaba wakamba ne, Yehowa avudishe bantu bandi misangu lukama bu mudibo katataka; kadi, mukelenge wanyi, bobo kabena bantu bebe, anyi
Yeye wakahona hanshi lukasa ku makasa andi, wakahuola muoyo wandi; bansongalume bakabuela, bakamusangana mufue, bakaluhuka n andi, bakamujika hehi ne bayandi
Yoaba wakahita Laba bukole, wakahaula musoko
Lubena wakahingana ku mukela, ne Yosefe kakadimu, yeye wakahanda tshivualu tshiandi
Muntu yonso atshine tatu andi ne mamu andi, nuvuluke matuku a lumingu ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bakosha musenga wa manananshi ku mutu kua mikuna, bu muakenza bisamba biakihata Yehowa ku mesu kuabo; bakenza malu mabi a kufuisha n au Yehowa tshiji
Labana Wakabikila dina dia muaba au ne, Yegâsahaduta, kadi Yakoba wakaubikila ne, Galede
Mu dituku adi bimuna biebe nebidie mashinde mu madimi manene
Wakundinga ne: Sarayi mmuanetu wa bakaji bua meme kumuangata bu mukajanyi bua tshinyi
Hakangatabo tshieya tshia Yasona ne tshia bakuabo, bakabalekela

Mona, meme nakusungula Oholiaba, muana mulume wa Ahisamaka, wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana bua kumumatshisha, nakabuesha lungenyi lule mu mitshima ya bantu bonso badi ne meji bua bobo benze bintu bionso binakukuambila

Meme ndi nutumina baprofete ne bena meshi ne bafundi: nuenu nenushihe bakuabo tshianana, bakuabo ha mitshi mitshiamakane; nenukume bakuabo mu nsunagoga yenu, nenubalonde bua kubakengesha ku musoko ne ku musoko; nunku mashi onso a bantu bakane akumata hanshi nealue ha bianza bienu, mashi a Ebele muntu muakane tô ne mashi a Zekâya, muana wa Balakia, unuakashihela hankatshi ha ntempelo ne tshishihelu
Hakabambilabo ne, Umukai ba tshilumbuluidi, bakadi bebeshangana ne, Netuenzele bantu aba tshinyi

Nusangishe bantu bonso, ne balume ne bakashi ne bana bakese ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu, bua buonso buabo bumue, bayile lungenyi, batshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, batumikile mei onso a mikenji ei; nunku bana babo badi kabayi banze kumanya nebunvue, nebamanye mua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tô matuku onso anudi nushikama mu buloba bunudi nuya dishiya dia Yadene bua kubuhiana
Disu diebe didi muinda wa mubidi webe; bikala disu diebe dimona tshintu bimpe, mubidi webe wonso neuteme ne munya; bikaladi dibi, mubidi webe wonso neufike ne mîdima

Ecclesiastes Kudi bualu bubi bunakatangila muinshi mua diba budi bunemena bantu bujitu: muntu udi Nzambi uha biuma, bubanji ne butumbi ne kena uhanga tshintu, kena uheta bukole kudi Nzambi bua kuhidia; kadi muenyi udi uhidia; ebu mbualu bua hatuhu ne bua dikenga dikole

Ku luseke lukuabo lua mu lubanza lua mbalanda, luayila muntu habandeye ku mbelu kua tshibuelelu tshia ku luseke lua nôde, kuakadi mesa abidi ku luseke elu ne mesa abidi ku luseke lukuabo; mbu kuamba ne, Mesa anai munda mua tshibuelelu, ne mesa anai mu luhanza luatshi, mesa muanda mukulu mene akadibo bashihelahu milambu

Bana ba Lubena, muan a bute wa Isalele, ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo muntu ne muntu, ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu balume bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Lubena binunu makami anai ne bisambombo ne nkama itanu
Muntu udi udia bintu bionso kahetudi udi kai ubidia; ne udi kai ubidia balumbuluishi udi ubidia; bualu bua Nzambi mene wakamuitabusha
Udi umushiminyina, ungambila ne: mmumane kumanyangana ne balume
Yesu wakimana, wakamba ne, Balue n andi; hakalueye ha buihi, wakamukonka ne, Udi musue meme nkuenzele tshinyi
Bana balume ba Alona nebabioshile ha tshioshelu, ha nkunyi idi mu kahia tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Katataka tshiena bu munakadi mu matuku a diambedi kudi difuka dia bantu aba
Semenai ha buihi ne Nzambi ne yeye neasemene ha buihi ntemu
Pashishe Moshe ne bakulu makumi muanda mutekete ba bena Izrayele, kupingana ku mitanda
Bantu bonso bakela mbila ne dî dikole hakatumbishabo Yehowa, bualu bua bakajadika bishimikidi bia nsubu wa Yehowa
Psalms Muhote udi wamba mu mutshima wandi ne, Kakuena Nzambi
Kadi Yone wakabalekela, wakahingana ku Yelushalema
Muena mudimu awu kubakolesha ku muoyi, wamba ne: Kanupampakanyi to
Bakadi kuhana mananashi au ku mushinga udi mutambe ndenalio nkama isatu ya kuha bantu bahele
Hakadiye utendelela mu nsubu wa Niseloka, nzambi wandi, Adalameleke ne Shalese, bana bandi balume, bakamushiha ne muele wa nvita, bakanyema mu buloba bua Alalata

Wewe neushikame mu buloba bua Goshene, newikale ha buihi n anyi, wewe ne bana bebe ne bana ba bana bebe, ne mikoko yebe ne ngombe yebe ne bintu bionso biudi n abi, nenkudishileku bualu bua bidimu bia tshiole bidi bishale bitanu; kanulu bu bahele, wewe ne bonso badi mu nsubu webe ne bintu biudi n abi

Musoko wikale bunene nunku: Luseke lua nôde coudées binunu binai ne nkama itanu, luseke lua sude coudées binunu binai ne nkama itanu, luseke lua esete coudées binunu binai ne nkama itanu, luseke lua wesete coudées binunu binai ne nkama itanu
Pikala bena Ejipitu bakumona, nebatshinke ne udi mukajanyi
Anyongobole nyunyi awu nshingu, kayi umukosa mutu
Bahika ba bungi badi batombokela bakelenge babo matuku â
Ndi ne dibatiza diambatizabo n adi, ndi mu bualu bukole tô ne hashikadi
Nunku bobo neboweshe bianza biabo ne makasa abo ne mai, bua bobo kabafu, etshi ntshilele tshiabo tshiendelele kudiye ne bana bandi badi banulonda ku nyima ku bikondo biabo bionso
Tshiakukuambila, anyi

Ne wewe mene kuena uhanduka mu tshianza tshiandi, kadi nebakukuate bushuwa, nebakufile ku tshianza tshiandi; neumonangane ne mukelenge wa Babulona ku mesu mene, ne yeye neayikile n ebe mpala ne mpala mene; neuye ku Babulona
Ndi mumanye ne, Mukenshi wandi udi muoyo wa tshiendelele; nunku malu andi ngamba ndi ngamba bu mudi Tatu ungambila
Nuabutuki
Kadi nenufile milambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia tô matuku muanda mutekete, dituku dia muanda mutekete ndituku dia tshijila, kanuenji mudimu
Hakamaneye bintu bionso, tshiole tshinene tshiakalua ku luseke alu; wakabanga kukengela bintu
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakatemena bualu bua Uza; Nzambi wakamushihelaku bua dihanga diandi; yeye wakafuaku hehi ne mushete wa Nzambi

Hakandamuneye ne, Kudi bantu ba bende, Yesu wakamuambila ne, Nunku bana balela badi badishikamine, Kadi katubalenduishi, uye biebe ku dishiba, wele ndoho mu mai, wangate mushiha wadianjila kulua; hawabuela mukana muau, neusangane nshekela; umuangate, ubaheye bua wanyi ne webe
Katataka ya kuebe, nakadi ngelangana meji bua kukuha butumbi bunene, kadi mona, wewe wakubavudishila butumbi ebu
Yeye wakamusengelela, kadi yeye kakitabusha kuya; kadi wakamuvudishila disanka
Wewe neubutule bakuabo ba mu Bena Isalele badi bashala ne muoyo, anyi
Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Bantu ba tshikondo etshi kabena bashika tô ne hashika malu â onso

Kadi Bena Yuda ba mu Shushana bakadisangisha hamue mu dituku dia dikumi ne asatu ne mu dituku dia dikumi ne anai kabidi; bakikisha mu dituku dia dikumi ne atanu, bakadisunguila dituku dia kudiabo bidia bia disanka ne musangelu
Judges Bena Isalele bakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa kabidi, ne Yehowa wakabafila mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete bidimu makumi anai

Mose ne Alona bakambila Bena Isalele bonso ne, Dilolo nenumanye ne, Yehowa wakunuluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne dinda nenumone butumbi bua Yehowa, bualu bua Yehowa udi munvue munudi numujiana, tuetu tudi banganga bua nudi nutujiana
Kadi mukuabo wakamubela ne, Wewe kuena utshina Nzambi, anyi
Mayi kubabuikila
Yeye wakihata bena Sodoma mu buloba, wakumusha mpingu yonso yakenza batatu andi
Bisamba bia bende bidi bikeba bintu ebi bionso; Tatu wenu udi mu diulu udi mumanye ne, Nudi ne bintu ebi bionso bualu
Ndi nkusengelela ne, Tumuenzele nsubu mukese ha mutu ha lumbu, tumutekele bulalu ne mesa ne nkuasa ne tshitekelu tshia muinda; nunku halueye kutudi, yeye udi mua kubuelamu
Kubambilaye ne: Nuenu bena Kenaane nudi basombe talalaa mu ditunga dienu, amu mudi nyunyi musombe mu disua dibakila mu lubuebue
Bana ba Halima nkama isatu ne makumi abidi
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mulau wikale kudi baprofete bahote badi balonda meji adi nyuma yabo ibalesha, kabayi banze kumona tshikena kumona
Yesu wakambila Petelo ne, Hingasha muele webe mu luhaha; tshiena nua luhanza luakumpa Tatu, anyi
Samuele wakatendelela Yehowa
Mukelenge wakela mukenji bua bualu buabo bua kuha bimbi ba misambu bintu biakadibo n abi bualu buatshia buatshia
Udi kai munsue kena wenza mei anyi; dî dinudi nunvua kandianyi, ndia Tatu wakantuma
Yeye wakulua ku Ayata, Wakumana kuhitshila ku tshibuelelu tshia mu luhongo; Tayika biebe, wewe muana mukashi wa Galima
Nunku bakalumbuluisha Yoasha
Padiye umona ne: disama didi amu muvuadi, kadiena ditampakane mubidi mujima, neateke kabidi muntu awu pa nkayende matuku muanda mutekete makuabu

Kakuena diteta diakunukuata didi kadi dikuata muntu yonso; kadi Nzambi udi mua kueyemenyibua, ngudi kai witabusha bua nuenu nutetshibue ne diteta didi dinuhita bukole; kadi halua diteta, yeye neanuenzele nshila wa kuhandukila, bua nuenu mimanye mua kutantamana mu diteta
Selofehada, muana mulume wa Hefê, kakadi ne bana ba balume nansha, wakadi anu ne bana ba bakashi, mena a bana ba bakashi ba Selofehada

Elela ba mu nsubu eu wa bantombokedi lusumuinu, ubambile ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, elamu mahunda a munyinyi, Sungula mukoko muhite mikuabo ya mu tshisumbu tshiai buimpe, Nunku Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mulau wikale kudi musoko eu udi umatshisha mashi a bakuabo hanshi, kudi luesu elu lunene ludi ne dimoma munda mualu, ne ludi ne dimoma didi kadiyi dianze kumuka

Timothy Dî edi didi mua kueyemenyibua ne, Biasua muntu kuangata mudimu wa mukulu mutangidi, Nunku budi mukulu mutangidi n abu mbua kuikala kai ne bilumbu; ikale biandi muena mukashi umue; ikale biandi muena meshi mahola ne buhuekele; amanye mua kulongolola malu andi bimpe; ikale musankididi wa benyi; ikale muakane wa kuyisha bakuabo

Genese Yakoba Udi Wamba Malu Alualua bua Bana Bandi Yakoba Wakabikila bana bandi bonso, wakamba ne, Nudisangishe hamue bua meme kunuambila bua malu alualua kunudi mu matuku adi kayi manze kulua, Nuenu bana balume ba Yakoba, nudisangishe hamue, unvuai di telejai matshu kudi Isalele tatu enu
Nundekelele bubi buanyi anu musangu eu, nundombele Yehowa Nzambi wenu, yeye angumushile bualu ebu bua lufu
Bua muanda eu neahidie tshihungidi tshia tshijila, nênze bu mudiye musue
Ditalala, ditalala dikale kûdi, ditalala dikale kudi bakuatshishi bebe
Batatu benu bakenza nunku hanakabatuma ku Kadeshe bânea bua kutentekelabo buloba
Hashishe, nakakosa mulangala wanyi mukuabo, Buobumue mene, bua kushiha buobumue bua Bena Yuda ne Bena Isalele
Uliya muakuidi wakenza tshioshelu tshikuabo; wakatshifuanyikisha bu bintu bionso biakamutumina mukelenge Ahaza ku Damaseke
Tatu wabo wakabaha maha manene a argent ne or a bungi ne bintu bia mushinga mukole ne misoko ya ngumbu mu buloba bua Yuda; kadi wakahingisha bukelenge kudi Yeholama, bualu bua yeye wakadi muan a bute
Au mmeku a Bena Lubena, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi anai ne bisatu ne nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi asatu
Ba bana ba Pashû: Eleyehoenai ne Mâseya ne Yishemaele ne Netanele ne Yozabada ne Elasa
Mua Kuenzela Bahika Ek
Meme nennupeshe bukole bua kuipata bena matunga onsu aa
Bituakengeshibua, bualu ebu mbua busambi buenu ne luhandu luenu; anyi bituasambibua, bualu ebu mbua busambi buenu budi bunuenzesha mu dikankamana dia mu makenga momumue atudi tukenga n au
Mu tshidimu tshitanu tshia bukelenge bua Yolama, muana wa Ahaba, mukelenge wa Isalele, hakadi Yehoshafata mukelenge wa Yuda, Yeholama, muana wa Yehoshafata, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakabanga kukokesha
Bakenza bilulu ebi bionso ne buanda bua lin muimpe

Mukelenge wakaditshiha ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo, wakuhikula muoyo wanyi mu makenga onso, bulelela, bu munakuditshiha kûdi ku mpala kua Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, ne, Bulelela, Solomo muan ebe neakokeshe ku nyima kuanyi, neashikame mu nkuasa wanyi wa bukelenge, nunku nengenze bualu ebu lelu
Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Utshidi ungambila bualu buebe bua tshinyi
Wewe newele dî kudi Bena Isalele bua kuluabo ne manyi a olive a kuela mu muinda, muinda uteme matuku onso
Katataka utume bantu ku Yopa, balue ne Simona, dinga dina Petelo; yeye udi ulala mu nsubu wa Simona, mukuonyi wa biseba, nsubu wandi udi kukala kua mai
Kanuena mua kuengulula biamu bua kufula mpingu, kuyitendelela
Yoshua wakabelela nshobo mu Shilo ku mesu kua Yehowa, ne Yoshua wakatahulula Bena Isalele buloba bu muakadi ditahulula diabo

Mufalese wakimana, wakatendelela Nzambi munda munda ne, Nzambi, ndi nkusakidila bua meme tshiena bu bantu bakuabo, bobo badi banyengi, badi babi, badi bena masandi, tshiena kabidi bu musangishi wa mulambu eu
Nakadi n enu mu butekete ne mu ditshina ne mu kuzakala kua bungi
Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nembatumine dikenga didibo kabayi mua kudinyema
Kadi nuenu kabidi anji lalayi munemu, bua ngumvue tshidi Maweja Nangila ungambila
Tatuende muenu wa Moshe kumuambila ne: Mushindu uudi wenza mudimu kawena mukumbane to
Yeye wakamusokoka nunku mu nsubu wa Yehowa tô bidimu bisambombo
Mukelenge Alada, Muena Kanâna, wakadi ushikama ku luseke lua ku Sude lua buloba bua Kanâna, wakunvua lumu ne, Bena Isalele balualua
Mu dituku adi Yehowa neikale anu umue, ne dina diandi nedikale dimue
Nuenu nenudie mampa adi kayi ne luevene dituku adi bualu bua nakahatula bisumbu bienu mu buloba bua Ejipitu, nunku nenujidile dituku edi bu tshivulukidi tshienu tshiendelele
Davidi wakabaka Abinoama wa mu Yizelele kabidi; bubidi buabo bakadi bakashi bandi
Hanakahitshila hehi n ebe mu nshila, nakakumona udibonda mu mashi ebe, ne nakakuambila ne, Ikala ne muoyo mu mashi ebe; e, nakakuambila ne, Mu mashi ebe wikale ne muoyo
Bujitu buabu budi bumpite
Mu ngondo wa kumudilu, dituku dia dikumi ne dinai dia ngondo, nuikale ne disanka dia kuhita kua Yehowa; tô ne hahita matuku muanda mutekete nudie bidia bidi kabiyi biela luevene
Moshe kubatuma bonsu mu mvita, babalombola kudi mutuangaji Pinhase, muana wa Elazare
Hakambeye dî edi, tshiji tshiabo tshiakashika kudiye
Haleha tshituha tshihi kanuena nuntangila, haleha tshituha tshihi kabidi nenuntangile
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Nuakadi nunkebela tshinyi
Bilulu bia tshijila bia Alona nebikale kudi bana bandi balume badi banulonda ku nyima bua kubela manyi ne kubajidila
Bena Ai bonso ne balume ne bakashi bakafua dituku adi bakadi binunu dikumi ne bibidi, bantu bonso ba mu Ai mene
Hashishe bakaya kudi mukelenge Hezikiya ku nsubu wandi, bakamuambila ne, Tuakumana kulengesha nsubu wa Yehowa wonso, ne tshioshelu ne mpanza yatshi yonso, ne mesa a bidia bilesha ne mpanza yau yonso
Yoshiya wakadila Yehowa bidia bia disanka dia kuhita kua Yehowa; bakashiha mikoko ku dituku dia dikumi ne dinai dia mu ngondo wa kumudilu

Kadi meme hanyi bualu ebu busokoka kabuakusokolodibua kundi bua meji andi n au adi mahite a bantu bakuabo, kadi mbua dijingulula dimanyishibue kudi mukelenge, ne bua wewe umanye meji adi mu mutshima webe
Nentabale mesu anyi, nenteleje matshu anyi ku kulomba kudibo balomba mu nsubu eu
Wenze ntenta mukuabu ne bilamba dikumi ne tshimue, bia boya bua mbuji, bua kubuikila pa mutu pa muaba wa tshijila
Nshobo yakakuata Yonatana
Mu matuku au muntu neabike mu muaba wa tatu andi bu lutonga lua ku miji yandi
Mpala wandi wakadi bu muele wa nvula, bilulu biandi biakadi bitoke tô bu neje; balami bakamutshina, bakazakala, bakalua bu bantu bafue
Yuda wakamuambila ne, Mulume au wakabambila bikole ne, Kanuena nu ntangila ku mesu, binuikala kanuyi nulua ne muakuny enu kundi
Sedekiya, muana wa Kenana, wakadienzela nsengu ya biamu, wakamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wewe neusekile n ai Bena Sulia tô ne hajiminabo
Tshiakuluila bua kuluangana n ebe lelu eu, kadi ndi nduangana ne badi n anyi lukuna; Nzambi wakungambila kahidi ne, Uye lukasa; nunku kudibuesha mu malu a Nzambi udi n anyi, bua yeye kakushihi
Hakadibo ne mpata mikole, nunku bakahanduluka, Bânaba wakangata Mâko, wakasabuka n andi ku Kupulio
Buakadiye n abu mbua kuhitshila mu Samalea
biakutuhendabo n abi kudi bantu badi n ebe lukuna, Yehowa, Yehowa avudishibue disanka tshiendelele
Hakambeye dî edi, hakadibo bamutangila, wakangatshibua mu diulu; ditutu diakamuangata, kabakamumona kabidi
Pafikibu mu tshibandabanda tshia Eshekole, kutentekelabu ditunga
Muntu yonsu udi mudipile nkayende mikiya, padiye udia munyinyi wa mulambu wa bobumue, udibu balambula Maweja Nangila, nebamuipate munkatshi mua bena Izrayele

Esau wakabaka bakashi ba bana bakashi ba Bena Kanana: Adamuana wa bakashi wa Elona, Muena Hiti, ne Oholibama, muana wa bakashi wa Ana, muana wa bakashi wa Sibiona, Muena Hiwi, ne Basemata, muana wa bakashi wa Yishemaele, ne muan abo wa bakashi wa Nebayota
Yeye wakambila mukashi ne, Nentambe kuvudisha didinyenga diebe ne kuimitshishibua kuebe neulele bana ne didinyenga, mutshima webe newikale kudi mulume webe, yeye neikale ne bukokeshi ku mutu kuebe
Majimbu ne mbuku, kabiena biambuluisha bena Izrayele
Nunku bantu bakikisha dituku dia muanda mutekete
Bakuabo bakadisua bu mundi tshi ndua kunudi
Davidi wakebesha nsongalume wakamuambila bualu ebu ne, Udi mumanye ne, Shaula ne muan andi mulume Yonatana bakafua munyi
Badi baluata bilulu binefuke batu bikala mu nsubu ya banfumu

Hanakamba mei anyi, kabakankudimuna; Bakangindila bu mudibo bindila nvula, Nakabatuila mimuemue hakadibo kabayi ne tshieyemenu, Nakabasunguila nshila bua bobo kuendela, nakashikama bu nfumu wabo, Yobo Kadi katataka bantu bandi mpita bidimu badi banseka, Bukole bua bianza biabo budi mua kunkuatshisha munyi
Meme nenudimushe bua wa nuenu kutshina: Nutshine udi ne bukole bua kuela bantu mu Ngena; bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Numutshine yeye

Bualu bua Hezikiya wakadianjila kutulombela Nzambi ne, Yehowa muimpe abuikile mibi ya muntu yonso wakudimuna mutshima wandi bua kukebeye Nzambi, Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua bandi, bikaleye kayi mudilengeshe bu mudi mukenji wa mu muaba wa tshijila wamba
Nanku ndi musue kubabutula pa buloba
Buloba buebe budi hanyi
Tuakuenza lelu bu muakamba Yehowa bua kunubuikidila bubi
Kadi, Abrahame kuteka bana ba mikoku muanda mutekete pa nkayabu
Yeye wakamba ne, Mukashi eu udi Bubi mene; wakamusakila munda mua tshihiminu, wakabuikila tshibuikilu tshia tshiamu tshia ntende ku mishiku yatshi
Belâma wakambila muanjelo wa Yehowa ne, Nakuenza bibi, bualu bua tshiakamanya ne wewe wakadi muimane bua kunkanda mu nshila
Dipangadika diônso didibo bamba ne kadieena dineemeka Dîyi dikulu kadieena ne bukola to, kakuyi dieebeja muntu bwaalu
Kukonkabu Izake bua kujadika ne: Rebeka udi ku dibaka anyi mmudisombele
Muan abo ne muntu neafile muan abo ku lufu, tatu neafile muan andi, bana nebatombokele batatu abo ne bamamu abo, nebabashiheshe
Kabakungudi mitu yabo ne dihaya ne kabitabushi bua nsuki yabo ilue mile; kadi bakose nsuki yabo ne tushola
Moshe kutuuta dikombu pa lubuebue, bakulu ba bena Izrayele bonsu batangile
Mena abo akadi Ohola, muan a bute, ne Oholiba, muakuny andi

Beena ku Kabadi ka mianda ya lupetu badi ne tshia kujadika ne badi bamanyi bapiluke mu mianda ya lupetu, ya mêyi ne mikandu ne ya diludika dia mianda ya mbulamatadi ne badi ne tshia kujadika kabidi ne bakaadi bênza midimu eyi bidimu kabiyi bishadila ku dikumi
Mose wakitabusha bua tatu andi muenu ahingane, yeye wakaya mu nshila wa ku buloba buandi
Hashishe, masalayi a ngovena akaya ne Yesu mu nsubu munene wa ngovena, akadisangisha tshisumbu tshiau tshionso kuakadi Yesu
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Songa biebe mabue abidi bu mabue a diambedi: neufundehu mei onso anakafunda ha mabue a diambedi awakatshibula
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuenu bena lubombo, bulelela, Yeshaya wakamba bualu buenu, wakafunda dî ne, Badi bantendelela tshianana, Nudi nulekela mukenshi wa Nzambi, nudi nulonda tshilele tshia bantu
Bituikala babumbakasha n andi mu tshifuanyikishi tshia lufu luandi, netuikale babumbakasha n andi kabidi mu tshifuanyikishi tshia dibika diandi dia ku lufu

Nakasangana mukanda wa kulondolola kua bankambua ba bantu bakadianjila kuhingana, malu akadi mafundamu nunku: Aba mbantu ba luseke bakumuka mu buhika, bakadi bangatshibue, bakadi Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, muangate, bakahingana ku Yelushalema ne ku Yuda, muntu yonso ku mosoko wandi; bakalua ne Zelubabela ne Yeshua ne Nehemiya ne Azaya ne Lâmeya ne Nahamani ne Môdekai ne Bileshana ne Misepelete ne Bigewai ne Nehuma ne Bâna
Ahaba wakabuela mu nsubu muandi mubungame ne mutshima muneme bujitu bualu bua dî diakamuambila Nabota, Muena Yizelele; bualu bua yeye wakamuambila ne, Tshiena nkuha buhianyi bua batatu banyi
Kadi kuaka nenukebe Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nenusangakene n andi hanuamukeba ne mitshima yenu yonso ne mioyo yenu yonso

Nunku bakaya ne mikanda bakadi benda ha nyima ha tubalu tuabo tuakenda lubilu tuakadi mu mudimu wa mukelenge, bakaya lukasa bendeshibue ku mukenji wa mukelenge; bakela mukenji eu mu Shushana, musoko wa mukelenge
Wendeshe lukasa bua kulua kundi; bualu bua Dema wakandekela mumane kusua malu a ha buloba, wakaya ku Tesalonike; Kulesekene wakaya ku Galatia; Tito wakaya ku Dalamatia
Wakadi ne biluwa bia bibi bia ha masoso a nsubu mu milongo isatu, masoso adi matangilangane mu milongo isatu
Bualu bua bena mashimi ba bungi bakamuangalaka ha buloba, kabai bajukula ne, Yesu Kilisto udi mulue mu mubidi

Nudimukile bantu; bualu bua bobo nebanuele kudi balumbuludi babo, nebanukume mu nsunagoga yabo; bulelela, nebaye n enu ku mesu kua bangovena ne ku mesu kua banfumu bua bualu buanyi, nenuikale bu tshimanyishilu ku mesu kuabo ne ku mesu kua bisamba bia bende
Wakamba ne, Mushete wa Yehowa neulue kundi kabidi munyi
Bule bua mbalanda buakadi coudées makumi abidi, butshiama buandi buakadi coudées dikumi ne ibidi
Moshe kuandamuna ne: Kabiena mua kuenzeka to
Hashishe Zebula wakamukonka ne, Mukana muebe muakamba ne, Abimeleke udi nganyi, bua tuetu aba kumukuatshia mudimu, mudi kudi kunyi
Nupeshe mutuangaji Arone ne ndelanganyi yende bintu abi, bualu ke bintu binudi ne bua kubapesha matuku onsu too ne kashidi
Bakimba misambu ne disanka, bakinama mitu yabo, bakatendelela
Bavua bamumvuile kabidi bikole kudi bena diku diabu
Ebu mbuloba bunudi ne bua kuabanyangana ku kuela kua nshobo munkatshi mua bisamba bia Bena Isalele bu buhianyi buabo
Nunku bakalekela mudimu wa nsubu wa Nzambi wa mu Yelushalema; bakalekela mudimu nunku tô ne ku tshidimu tshibidi tshia mu bukokeshi bua Dayawesha, mukelenge wa Pelasa
Ndi nyingalala
Nuakutondesha Yehowa ne mei enu
Sadoka ne Ebeyatâ, bakuidi, kabena n ebe, anyi
Bana babo ne mamu wandi bakamuambila mei au onso mu matshu a bena Shekeme bonso; ne mitshima yabo yakasua kulonda Abimeleke; bualu bua bakamba ne, Yeye udi muan etu
Meme nenteke nyuma wanyi munda muandi, yeye neunvue ngumu, neahingane ku buloba buandi; meme nemmushiheshe ku muele wa nvita mu buloba buandi
Wewe udi uditumbisha bua mikenshi, udi ufuisha Nzambi bundu bua bushihi buebe bua mikenshi, anyi

Hashishe Yuda wakalua ha buihi n andi, wakamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi, witabushe, ndi nkutendekena, bua muntu webe ambile di ku matshu a mukelenge wanyi kunakadi ne tshiji kudi muntu webe, bualu bua wewe udi bu Palo mene
Nenufile bintu ebi ku mutu kua milambu mudi nuosha ne dinda bu mulambu wa kuosha wa tshiendelele
Bua binualonda malu a mubidi, nudi ne bualu bua kufua; kadi binuafuisha bienzedi bia mubidi kudi Nyuma, nenuikale ne muoyo
Wakateka tshioshelu tshia mulambu wa kuosha ku mbelu kua nsubu wa tshiendelele wakoshahu mulambu wa bukula bua manvua bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Nuenu nenuhingane, nenutumikile dî dia Yehowa, nenuenze mikenji yonso inakunuambila lelu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Utatshishe Bena Midiyana, ubashihe, bualu bua bobo badi banutatshisha ne budimu, bakanushima mu bualu bua Peô ne mu bualu bua Kozebi, muana mukashi wa mukelenge wa mu Midiyana, muan abo mukashi, wakamushihabo mu dituku diakalua disama bualu bua Peô

Mukelenge wa Ashû wakangata bantu ba mu Babulona ne ba mu Kuta ne ba mu Awa ne ba mu Hamata ne ba mu Sefâwayima, wakabateka mu misoko ya Samalea mu miaba ya Bena Isalele; bobo bakaheta misoko ya Samalea, bakashikamamu

Hanakadi ngakula, ndomba Nzambi, ntonda bubi buanyi ne mibi ya bana betu Bena Isalele, hanakadi ntendekena ku mpala kua Yehowa Nzambi wanyi bualu bua mukuna wa tshijila wa Nzambi wanyi, bulelela, hanakatshidi utendelela, muntu eu Gabaliele, unakumona ku tshikena kumona tshia diambedi, wakalua kundi lukasa diba dia kufila mulambu wa dilolo
dikuba dia bantu mu ditunga;

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu misoko ya ku mikuna, mu misoko ya mu Tshibanda, mu misoko ya ku luseke lua Sude, mu buloba bua Benyamina, mu miaba idi hehi ne Yelushalema ne mu misoko ya mu Yuda, mikoko neyihitshile muinshi mua maboko a badi bayibala
Luakela malu a bushuwa hanshi, luakenza bu muakadilu lusue kuenza, luakatuta dikasa dimpe
Bua bualu buadi diulu diakukuata kahia nedijimine ne bintu bidimu nebienguluke ne kahia kakole

Ndi nkusengelela ne, Mukelenge wanyi kabadi bualu bua muntu mulembakana, Nabala, mene; bualu bua bienzedi biandi bidi bu kukudimuna kua dina diandi: Nabala ndina diandi ne buhote budi n andi; kadi meme, muhika webe mukashi, tshiakatangila bansongalume ba mukelenge wanyi bakatumeye
Wewe udi mu dihila diodimue
Mose ne Alona bakaya kudi Palô, bakamuambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Bena Ebelu, udi Wamba ne
Ahu meme hanyi ndi muhele ne mukengi, Psalms Disanka didi kudi muntu udi wela meji a luse bua muntu udi ne mubidi mutekete
Nebanushihe ku muele wa nvita: tô ne ku butshika bua buloba bua Isalele nennulumbuluishe; nenumanye ne, Ndi Yehowa
Bena Ete kuandamuna ne: Mukalenga, Mvidi Mukulu mmukuele lupemba, suaku ututeleje
Lua biebe, nenkutume kudi Palo, Ulue biebe ne bantu banyi, bana ba Isalele, badi mu Ejipitu
Hakadiye ushikama mu nkuasa wa bulumbuludi, mukashi wandi wakamutumina dî ne, Kubuedi mu bualu bua muntu muakane eu; lelu nakutamba kukenga mu tshilota bua bualu buandi
Wewe udi mumanye bualu kai butudi katuyi bamanye
Nenudie dituku adi mene mene, kanushiyi tshintu tô ne dinda meme ndi Yehowa
Nanku bantu ba kunudi benji ba midimu ya bianza, bafike bua kuenzela Maweja Nangila mudimu uvuaye muambe
Hakumuka Mose ku mukuna wa Sinai ne mabue abidi a mei a dihungila mu bianza biandi, hakahuekeye nunku, Mose kakamanya ne musunyi wa ha mpala handi wakakonka bualu bua yeye wakadi usomba ne Yehowa
Nebazakale diba dionso, muntu ne muntu bua muoyo wandi, mu dituku dia kubutuka kuebe
Muntu yonso udi ulala ne mukashi muhika, udi mubangila kudi mulume, udi kayi muanze kuhikudibua, nebabakengeshe bubidi buabo, kabena babashiha bualu bua yeye kakadi muhikudibue
Kadi Labashake wakabambila ne, Mukelenge wanyi wakuntuma kudi mukelenge webe ne kunudi kabidi bua kuamba mei â, anyi

Bananga, udi nutendekena bu benyi ne bena luendu ba ha buloba ne, Nuehuke ku nkuka ya mibidi idi iluangana ne mioyo yenu; nuikale ne bienzedi bienu bimpe munkatshi mua bisamba bia bende, bualu bua, mu mianda idibo banusonguela nuenu bu benji ba malu mabi, bobo batumbishe Nzambi mu dituku dialueye, bua midimu yenu mimpe idibo bamona
Bidi mulambu wa kudikobolola
Nanku nenganyishe mupuya muimpe wabi
Bu mudi bungi bua matuku awalala, mbu mudi bungi bua matuku awatuala mibi yabo
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua nakutangisha mpala wanyi ku musoko eu bua kûvuishila makenga, kembua kûvuishila diakalengele, neufidibue mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Babulona, ne yeye neawoshe ne kahia
Bualu bua bakahisha buonso buai bua kuluayi, bua kuhuekayimu ndondo wa buloba, munkatshi mua bukua bantu, hohamue ne badi bahueka mu Dina dia Bafue
Yeye nkayende ke udi mudikebele lufu, bualu udi utshipa baledi bende
Wakavuisha bintu bionso munshi mua makasa andi, wakamuha bua kuikaleye mutu wa malu onso a mu ekelesia, udi mubidi wandi, tshiuwidi tshia udi ûsha bintu bionso tente
Yehowa neafile tshisumbu tshia masalayi a Bena Isalele mu bianza bia Bena Peleshete
Genese Yosefe Udi Ujinguluila Bena Lukanu Bilota Biabo Hakashika malu au, mutuadi wa maluvu wa mukelenge wa Ejipitu ne mulambi wa bidia biandi bakafikisha mukelenge wabo wa Ejipitu munda
Eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele

Bualu bua ndi ngamba ne, Kilisto wakavuishibua muena mudimu wa batengula bua bushua bua Nzambi, bua yeye ajadike milayi yakalaya Nzambi bankambua betu, ne bua ba bisamba bia bende batumbishe Nzambi bua luse luandi, bu muakafundabo ne, Udi Wamba kabidi ne, Udi wamba kabidi ne, Yeshaya udi wamba kabidi ne, Nzambi wa ditekemena anûshe tente ne disanka ne ditalala dia mu ditabusha dienu, bua nuenu nukumbane mu ditekemena mu bukole bua Nyuma Muimpe
Yeye wakamba ne, Udi ne matshu unvue biandi
Elekana bayandi, wakamuambila ne, Wenze biebe budi buimpe ku mesu kuebe; ushale tô ne halekeleye mabele: Yehowa nkayandi ajadike dî diandi
Isaiah Mu matuku au Hezikiya wakadi ne disama dia lufu

Bualu bua Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Monai, nendekeshe di dia tuseku ne di dia disanka, dî dia mubaki wa mukashi ne dia mukashi udiye ubaka mu muaba eu, ku mesu kuebe ne mu matuku ebe
Nukumbaje mikenji eyi mu ditunga dinuakuata, bua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu anuele lupemba mu bionsu binudi nuenza
Mu matumba anai a tshiendelu tshia ha mbelu muakadi mbanza yaya minyungulula ne bimanu; buonso buai inai yakadi bunene bumue, coudées makumi anai mu bule ne coudées makumi asatu mu butshiama
Alona wakabambila mei onso akadi Yehowa wambila Mose, ne yeye wakenza bimanyinu ku mesu kua bantu
Nenudie munyinyi wa bana benu balume ne wa bana benu bakashi
Kanuena bamanye ne luevene lukese ludi lumuangalaka mu mutanda wa bidia mujima, anyi
Bua bualu buandi nudi bena kuitabusha ba Nzambi wakamubisha ku bafue, wakamuha butumbi; bua ditabusha dienu ne ditekemena dienu bikale mu Nzambi
Bielabo mai ha bintu ebi bia kukuna ne biahona tshituha tshia mubidi yabi mufue ha mutu habi, bintu ebi nebikale ne bukoya kunudi
Kudi mvidie ukadi mupatule tshisamba tshia bantu bende mu bupika, muleje bumfumu buende, ne bukole buende, bu munuvua nuenu badimuene anyi

Kadi Yehowa wakadimusha Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda mukana mua muprofete yonso ne mua mumonyi yonso ne, Kudimunai mitshima yenu ku malu mabi enu; nutumikile mikenji yanyi ne mikandu yanyi bu mudi mikenji makelela bankambua benu mukana mua bantu banyi baprofete
Hashishe, nakatangila mudimu wonso ne ngenzelu wau mulengele bidi bivuisha bantu mukau
Ne nuenu nuakadisua, ne kanuakadila bu muakadibi kuikala bimpe, bua yeye wakenza bualu ebu umushibue munkatshi muenu, anyi

Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nuangate mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, nusungulule kana ka ngombe ne kana ka mukoko bia tshidimu tshimue, bidi kabiyi ne tshitema, bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, angata kabidi mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala bua kubishiha ku mesu kua Yehowa ne mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi, bualu bua Yehowa neamueneke kunudi lelu

Meme nengikale tatu wandi, yeye neikale muana wanyi; tshiena ngumusha luse luanyi lujalame kudiye bu munakalûmusha kudi wakadi ku mpala kuebe; luidi nemmujadike mu nsubu muanyi ne mu bukelenge buanyi tshiendelele; nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge neajadikibue tshiendelele
Nunku suika mukaba mu tshimono tshiebe, juka, ubambile mei onso andi nkuambila
Hashishe dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Samuele ne, Nakakudimuna mutshima bua nakasungula Shaula mukelenge, bualu bua yeye wakasesuka, kena undonda, kena utumikila mikenji yanyi
Bantu ba mu Sodoma bakadi babi, bakatamba kuhidia Yehowa
Yehowa wakahueka mu diulu, wakalua ha mutu ha mukuna wa Sinai
Mulau wikale kudibo; bualu bua bakaya mu nshila wa Kana, bakadiela lukasa mu dihambuka dia Belama bua difutu, bakajimina mu ditomboka dia Kola
Umue wa bana ba Ahimeleke, muana wa Ahituba, dina diandi Ebeyatâ, wakahanduka, wakalonda Davidi
Mose wakamba ku mesu kua Yehowa ne, Mona, meme ndi muena tshikukumina, Palo neangunvuile munyi
Baprofete bakafunda ne, Nzambi neabayishe bonso
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bobo nebanusambe hanuamona bienzedi biabo ne midimu yabo; nenumanye ne, Malu â onso anakuenza tshiakuenza hatuhu
Yeye wakalua ku musoko wa Samalea, dina diau Suka, hehi ne muaba wakadi Yakoba muhe muan andi Yosefe
Luse luakakuata Yesu, wakabalenga ha mesu abo; bakatabala lukasa, bakamulonda
Buludi bua muaba wa luhangu nebuikale coudées lukama ne butshiama bualu nebuikale coudées makumi atanu, ne bule bualu bua mulu coudées itanu, ne bilulu bia lin ne nkanu yabi ya tshiamu tshia mitaku
Nuenu basue kuenza nanku, nennuluishe
Kanuena bena mioyo yenu
Yeye wakadi muakuidi wa Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu
Wakabuela mu nyongolo, wakalalamu; dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudiye, diakamukonka ne, Eliya, udi wenza tshinyi kunoko
Paulo wakadi ubasengelela buonso buabo tô ne hakamba butuku kutshia, bua kudiabo, wamba ne, Edi ndituku dia dikumi ne anai anuakadi bashale, bajile bia kudia kanui badie tshintu
Nubiele mu bibombi bienu bua kutuadila muena Ejipitu awu
Pashishe bashipe kabidi muena ngombe awu
Hashishe nenuenze bu munakuenza: kanuena nubuikila mishiku yenu, kanuenji nudia bidia bia madilu

Milambu ya Dia Lumingu ne ya Ngondo Mu dituku dia Lumingu neufue bana balume ba mikoko babidi badi kabayi ne tshilema ba tshidimu tshimue, ne bintu bibidi bia dikumi bia tshihiminu tshimue tshia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi, ne mulambu wa bintu bidibo banua: eu udi mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ku matuku a Lumingu, ku mutu kua mulambu udibo bafila buatshia buatshia
Wewe udi mutambe tatu wetu Yakoba, anyi
Munyi mudi Bena Ejipitu mua kuamba ne, Yeye wakabaluhula bua kubenzela bibi, ne bua kubashiha ku mikuna, ne bua kubajimisha ha buloba
Kadi mesu abo akadi bitayitayi, kabakamumanya
Romans Muntu yonso aditeke ku nyima kua bakokeshi badi ku mutu kuandi
Bana balume ba Uziele: Mika kahita ne Yishiya muibidi
Mona
Bobo kabena bamanye, kabena belangana meji; bualu bua yeye wakumana kubuikila mesu abo ne kabena mua kutangila; wakukanda mitshima yabo ne kabena mua kujingulula
Wewe Wakuteka disanka mu mutshima wanyi, Nendale hanshi, nendale tulu mu ditalala kabidi, Psalms Yehowa, teleja matshu ebe ku mei anyi, unvua meji andi ngela
Lumu bakafika kudi mukelenge wa Ejipitu ne, Bantu bakanyema Palô ne bantu bandi bakakudimuna mitshima yabo, bakamba ne, Tuakenza tshinyi hatuakalekela Bena Isalele ku mudimu wetu
Bualu ebu bunakuamba nebulue, nebuenjibue; edi ndituku mene dinakanuambila
Munyi munvuabo lumu luandi kabai ne muambidi
Tshibidilu etshi netshishale mu bena Izrayele bua bikale bangoshila mikata ya nanku dituku dionsu dia Dikisha
Chronicles Hashishe Solomo wakamba ne, Kadi meme nakakuibakila nsubu Mukelenge wakanyunguluka, wakavudishila Bena Isalele bonso disanka; Bena Isalele bonso bakadi bimane kulu
Pula, mukelenge wa Ashû, wakalua bua kuhaula buloba
Mufundi wakalua kudiye, wakamuambila ne, Muyishi nenkulonde kuonso kuwaya
Numutumbishe ne tshiona tshia dî dia mpungi; numutumbishe ne tshisanji Numutumbishe ne mazele Numutumbishe ne biamu Bintu bionso bidi bihuyakana bitumbishe Yehowa

Yoshua wakadimusha bantu dituku adi, wakabambila ne, Muntu yonso udi ubika bua kuasa musoko eu wa Yeleko kabidi neikale ne mulau ku mpala kua Yehowa; habangeye kuasa musoko neajimishe muan a bute wandi ne hajadikeye bibi bia musoko neajimishe muan a mukala wandi
Kanungu ka Badi basungula tshipwita mukulumpa bwa tshipungu tshia mvula itaanu
Esawu kuitaba

Yehowa wakabafila mu bianza bia Bena Isalele, bakabashiha, bakabihata tô ne ku Sidona, musoko munene, ne ku Miselefota mayima, ne ku tshibanda tshia Misepa tshia ku esete; bakabashiha tô, kabakashiya nansha umue

Yehezekele Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Muana wa muntu, bela baprofete ba Bena Isalele badi badiamba, ambila bantu aba badi bamba mei adi afuma anu mu mitshima yabo mene ne, Unvuai dî dia Yehowa
Bakaya ne Yesu kudi muakuidi munene; bakuidi banene ne bakulu ne bafundi bakalua kusangisha n andi
Ecclesiastes Ulame makasa ebe hawabuela mu nsubu wa Nzambi; kusemena ha buihi bua kunvua kudi kuhita milambu ya bahote buakane, bualu bua bobo kabena bamanye ne, Tudi tuenza bualu bubi
Hakalua tshidimu tshia mamuma ha buihi, yeye wakatuma bantu bandi kudi ba bidime bua kuangata mamuma andi
Tshiakukukuatshila mudimu bualu bua Lakele, anyi
Nunku bukelenge buakajadikibua mu bianza bia Solomo
Yeye kakamujingulula bimpe bualu bua bianza biandi biakadi ne miosa bu bianza bia muan abo Esau, nunku yeye waka muvudishila disanka
Nunku akobolole muena tshibawu anu mushindu ewu bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Bualu bukuabo kabidi, biakudimuka muntu muakane ku buakane buandi, bienzeye bibi ne binateka tshilenduishi ku mpala kuandi, yeye neafue
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Kuambidi muntu bualu ebu, uye biebe, udileshe kudi muakuidi wa Nzambi, ufile tshiakamba Mose bu tshimanyishilu ku mesu kua bantu

Humuna biebe muoyo, kadi humuna muoyo anu talalâ, kuashidi mufue webe eu madilu; ujingile tshitambala ku mutu kuebe, luata bisabata biebe ku makasa; kubuikidi mishiku yebe, ne kudi bidia bia bena madilu

Bualu bua bobo bakumpidia, bakuoshela nzambi mikuabo musenga wa manananshi, bua kunfuishabo tshiji ku bienzedi bionso bia bianza biabo; nunku tshiji tshianyi tshidi ku muaba eu, katshiena tshijima nansha
Kabakushi minyinangana kabidi malu to

Nuakuhenda dina dianyi munkatshi mua bantu banyi anu bua kuheta manza a orge ne bihese bia bidia; nuakushiha bantu badi kabayi ne bua kufua, ne nuakusungila bakuabo badi kabayi ne bua kushala ne muoyo, bualu bua nuakudinga bantu banyi badi bitabusha mashimi enu
Nusangishe bakulu benu bonso ba mu bisamba bienu ne tuhita tuenu kundi, bua meme kubambila mei â onso ku matshu abo, nembikile diulu ne buloba bu bamonyi ba bualu kudibo

Muambi udi Wamba ne, Malu a hatuhu, Muntu udi uheta tshinyi ku mu dimu wonso Tshikondo tshimue tshidi tshiya ku mpala, tshikuabo tshidi tshilonda ku nyima; Diba didi dibanda, didi dibuela, Luhehele ludi luya ku Sude, Misulu yonso idi ibuela mu mai manene, Malu onso adi mûle tente ne ntatu; Malu akadiku diambedi neikaleku; Tshintu tshidiku tshidibo ba manye mua kuamba ne, Kabena bavuluka bantu ba kale; Meme Muambi nakadi mukelenge wa Isalele mu Yelushalema
Upingaje kabidi ku mibangubangu ya tshibombi makuta avua muntu yonsu mutule

Tshiendelu tshia munda mua ntempelo tshiakadi ne tshibuelelu tshitangilangane ne tshibuelelu tshia mu lubanza, tshikuabo ku luseke lua nôde ne tshikuabo ku luseke lua esete; wakidikisha muaba wa hankatshi ha tshibuelelu tshia munda tô ne ku tshibuelelu tshia mu luhanza, wakadi coudées Wakandombola ku luseke lua Sude; nakamona tshibuelelu tshitangile ku luseke lua Sude
Yeye wakenza malu mabi onso akenza tatu wandi ku mpala kuandi; mutshima wandi kawakadi muakane ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, bu muakadi mutshima wa Davidi, tatu wandi

Nuenze anu malu adi makane ne mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa; bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nubuele ne nuhiane buloba buimpe buakalaya Yehowa batatu benu, bua kunuihatshila bantu bonso badi n enu lukuna ku mpala kuenu, bu muakamba Yehowa

Biaya bantu bebe bua kuluanganabo ne bena lukuna babo, mu nshila yonso ûdi ubatumina, ne biakutendelelabo ku musoko eu uwakusungula, ne ku nsubu eu unakuibakila dina diebe, unvue kulomba kuabo ne kutendekena kuabo mu diulu, ujadike malu abo
Bantu badi kule nebalue, nebenze mudimu wa kuasa ntempelo wa Yehowa, nenumanye ne, Yehowa wa misumba wakuntuma kunudi
Wakenza kabidi tshiowelu tshia tshiamu, bunene buatshi ku mubangu ne ku mubangu buakadi coudées dikumi; bule buatshi buakadi coudées itanu; bule bua dinyungulula diatshi buakadi coudées makumi asatu

Bakakumibua mabue, bakakoshibua hankatshi ne nsele, bakateyibua, bakashihibua ne muele wa nvita, bakendakana baluate biseba bia mikoko ne biseba bia mbushi, bakengela bintu, bakengeshibua, benjibue bibi, bakadi ba ha buloba kabai babakanyine bendakana mu bihela ne mu mikuna ne mu nyongola ne mu mena a mu buloba
Samuel Shaula wakambila Yonatana, muan andi mulume, ne bahika bandi bonso bua kushihabo Davidi
Wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakafila milambu ya kuosha bu muakadi bungi buabo bonso
Bakambila Shaula ne, Davidi wakanyemena mu Gata; yeye kakamukebulula kabidi
Yehowa Nzambi webe, wakasanka bualu buebe bua kukushikika ha nkuasa wandi wa butumbi bua wewe kuikala mukelenge ku mpala kua Yehowa Nzambi webe, avudishibue disanka
Nulongolole muaba wa kusesukila mutantshi mule ne mitanda yenu

Bualu bua budi mukulu mutangidi Kadi ikale biandi musankididi wa benyi; anange malu mimpe; ikale ne meshi mahole; enzele bantu bonso biakane; ikale muntu wa tshijila; adikande biandi; alamate dî didi mua kueyemenyibua didi bu mudi diyisha dia Nzambi, bua yeye amanye mua kusengelela bantu ne diyisha dilenge, ne mua kutuisha bena mpata
Nakadi mu mudimu mukole ne mu ntatu, nakadi ne tshitabala misangu ya bungi; nakadi ne nsala ne nyota; nakajila bia kudia misangu ya bungi, mashika akantonda, nakadi ne butaka
Wakajuka, wakendakana mu nsubu, wakabanda kabidi, wakadinana ham bidi na muana; muana wakela nyatshi misangu muanda mutekete, wakabulula mesu andi
Monai, buloba buakakanka bikole; muanjelo wa Mukelenge wakahueka hanshi mufume mu diulu, wakalua, wakumusha dibue, wakashikamahu
Hashishe yeye wakela mai mu dilonga, wakabanga kuowesha bayidi makasa ne kuakuhula ne dituaya diakadiye mudijingile
Kutululabu bibombi biabu panshi lukasa
Bena Yuda bakamunguila, bakamukonka ne, Wewe neutushie ne mioyo yetu kulu kulu musangu bûle munyi
Binabanda mu diulu, wewe udiku
Nenuikale ne bowa, nuteketa mu maboku
Ba Bena Lewi bakadi Yozabada ne Shimeyi ne Kelaya udi Kelita kabidi ne Petahiya ne Yuda ne Eliezê
Manoa wakabika, wakalonda mukashi wandi, wakalua kudi muntu eu, wakamuebesha ne, Wewe udi muntu wakadi uyikila ne mukashi eu, anyi
Kanuedianganyi meshi ne, Meme nakuluila bua kutuma ditalala ha buloba, tshiakuluila bua kutuma ditalala, nakuluila bua kutuma muele wa nvita
Biasanganabo muibi mubuele mu nsubu ne biamukumabo ne biafueye, kabena benze mushiku bualu
Hashishe Abinê wakadi ne tshiji tshikole bua mei akamuambila Ishi boshete; yeye wakamukonka ne, Meme ndi bu mutu wa mbua wa Muena Yuda, anyi

Ezela mufundi wakimana ha tshiambidilu tshia mabaya tshiakalongololabo bua bualu ebu; Matitiya ne Shema ne Anaya ne Uliya ne Hilekiya ne Mâseya bakimana ku tshianza tshiandi tshia balume; Pedaya ne Mishaele ne Malekiya ne Hashuma ne Hashebadana ne Zekâya ne Meshulama bakimana ku tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi
Numumushe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele, bualu kavua musue kulambula Maweja Nangila milambu pa diba diayi
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele bu mu dî dia Yehowa ne, Ba mu tshisamba tshia bana balume ba Yosefe badi bamba dî dilelela
Nunku nakaditshiha bua ba mu nsubu wa Eli ne, Kabena babuikidila mibi ya ba mu nsubu wa Eli ku milambu ya kuosha ne ku bintu bidibo bafila tshiendelele
Mêyi a ditunga adi aleeja mushindu wa kusanka ne budikadidi ebu
Kadi hakafikeye kudi muntu wa Nzambi ku mukuna, yeye wakamukuata ku makasa andi
Hamueneshibua Kilisto udi muoyo wetu, hashishe nuenu kabidi nenumueneshibue n andi mu butumbi
Petelo wakamuambila ne, Bikala bualu bunkuata bua kufua n ebe, tshiena nkuhidia
Kulondolola Davidi Udi Udiundisha Bukelenge Buandi Sam
Udisonsole, utabale bua kukosa nsambu yanyi biakane; Yehowa Nzambi wanyi, unkosele tshilumbu tshianyi bu mudi buakane buebe; Kabambi mu mitshima yabo ne, Eyo, ebu mbualu butudi basue
Kumutuminaye kabidi nyama ya mpunde mikaji dikumi, miambule ntete ya kuenza bukula, mampa, ne biakudia bikuabu bia tatuende kudia mu njila
Bonsu babidi kutungunuka ne luendu
Kadi nebapikule muanabute wa balume wa muntu, nebapikule kabidi muanabute wa nyama udi ne mikiya

Dikuatshisha dianyi didi difuma kudi Yehowa, Yeye kena witabusha bua dikasa diebe diselemuke; Mona, udi ulama Bena Isalele kena ulala tulu, Yehowa udi mulami webe; Diba kadiena dikuenzela bualu mu munya, Yehowa neakulame ku malu makole onso; Yehowa neakulame hawahatuka ne hawabuela, Psalms Nakadi ne disanka hakungambilabo ne, Makasa etu atshidi mimane Yelushalema, udi muasa bu musoko Nkudi bisamba bibanda, Bua bakajadikamu nkuasa ya bukelenge bua kukoselahu bilumbu, Nulombele Yelushalema ditalala

Ndi nsakidila Nzambi misangu yonso bua bualu buenu, bua ngasa wa Nzambi wakanuhebua mu Kilisto Yesu, bua nuakavuishibua babanshi mu malu onso munda muandi, mu dî dionso ne mu lungenyi luonso; bu muakajadikibua tshimanyishilu tshia Kilisto munda muenu

Bana ba balume ba Yakoba bakalua munkatshi mua bantu bafue bakahaula musoko, bualu bua bobo bakanyanga muan abo wa bakashi Bakangata mikoko yabo ne ngombe yabo ne mpunda yabo, ne bintu biakadi mu musoko, ne bintu biakadi mu madimi, ne biuma biabo bionso ne bana babo ne bakashi babo, bakabangata bu bahika babo ba mu nvita bionso mene biakadi mu nsubu
Kadi ba bidime aba bakambilangana ne, Eu udi muhianyi; tuyai, tumushihe, buhianyi nebuikale buetu
Kadi Nowa uvua muena diakalenga kudi Maweja Nangila
Zilpa mupika wa Leya kulelela Yakobe muana mukuabu wa balume
Nanku kabavua mua kuenza tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila to
Muntu eu wakambila Eli ne, Meme nyeye wakahanduka, wakanyema munkatshi mua bena nvita lelu

Milambu ya ku budisuile bua balombodi Bamfumu ba bena mvita bavua balombola bisumbu bia bantu tshinunu nansha lukama, kudisangisha kudi Moshe, kumuambila ne: Tuabadiki bena mvita batuvua nabu mu mvita: muntu nansha umue kena mufue to
Mukelenge wa Isalele wakambila Yehoshafata ne, Tshiakukuambila ne, Yeye katu Wamba malu mimpe bualu buanyi, kadi anu malu mabi, anyi
Mu diba adi nebabakudimune ne, Bualu bua bakashiha tshihungidi tshia Yehowa Nzambi wabo, bakatendelela nzambi mikuabo, ne bakayikuatshila mudimu

Yeye udi uha bantu lungenyi, Yehowa udi mumanye meji adi muntu wela ne, Yehowa, disanka didi kudi muntu ûdi wewe ukengesha, bua kumuha biebe ditalala, bua yeye katatshi biandi mu matuku a Bualu bua Yehowa kena wihata bantu bandi, Bualu bua dilumbulula diakane nedihingane kudi badi bakane, Wajuka bua bualu buanyi bua kutantamena bantu babi nganyi
Bakuidi: Bana ba Yedaya ba mu nsubu wa Yeshua nkama tshitema ne makumi muanda mutekete ne basatu
Bule bua tshilulu tshimue buakadi coudées makumi asatu, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées anai bilulu dikumi ne tshimue biakadi ne luidi lumue
Wakabuela ne bayidi bandi mu buatu, wakalua mu nseke ya Dalamanuta
Kubikilaye Arone ne Miriyame muaba awu

Jeremiah Yehowa wakahesha bihondo bibidi bia mamuma a nfigi biteka ku mbelu kua ntempelo wa Yehowa, hakadi Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, mumane kuya ne Yekoniya, muana wa Yehoyakima, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne baminyampala ba mu Yuda ne bena mabaya ne batudi ba biamu, mumuke n abo ku Yelushalema, mulue n abo ku Babulona

Nenuambe ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne, Tatu wetu wakadi Muena Sulia, wakadi wamba kufua; ne yeye wakaya mu Ejipitu, wakashikamamu bantu banya banya; yeye wakalua tshisamba tshinene tshia bukole ne bantu ba bungi

Mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete mu ngondo wa kumudilu, mu dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakenzesha masalayi andi mudimu mukole mu nvita yandi ne Bena Tulo
Nudi mua kudia bintu ebi bia mu mai bintu bidi ne mialala ne mabamba bidi mu mai manene ne mu misulu
Pilato wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi Mukelenge wa Bena Yuda, anyi
Bena Shekeme bonso bakadisangisha hamue ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa Milo bakaya, bakateka Abimeleke mu bukelenge, muinshi mua mutshi wa telebinta ku dibue dinene diakadi mu Shekeme
Kanuena mua kubenga nansha kakese mikenji imvua munuambile bua kuya kutendelela mvidie mikuabu
Apeshe mutuangaji bintu bionsu abi
Nanku bedi ba kasala, bavua bela bimbe, bamba ne: Ibakayi kabidi tshimenga tshia Eshebone, tumone
Mikenji ya bena Levi Mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi Padi muena Izrayele ulambula Maweja Nangila mulambu wa bintu bia mu madimi, angate bukula, elepu mafuta, atentekepu ne musenga wa kamonya
Butumbi hua Nzambi wa Isalele buakumuka ku mutu kua bakeluba kuakadibu bushikame diambedi, buakaya ku mbelu kua nsubu
Binuamanya mua kuenza nunku mu bienzedi bienu, nuikale ne bantu bonso ditalala
Balume bonso ba mu musoko wabo nebamukume ne mabue tô ne hafueye: nunku nenumushe malu mabi munkatshi muenu; ne Bena Isalele nebunvue, nebatshine
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Wele bintu ebi bia tshishingashinga tshiakuntuilabo mu tshibutshilu
Davidi wakambila Ônana ne, Nansha
Ha diba adi yeye wakababikila; bakashîa tatu abo Zebedayo mu buatu ne bena mu dimu; bakamulonda
Bikala disama dishale mu tshilulu nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama anyi mu tshintu tshia tshiseba, disama edi didi ditampakana, neboshe tshintu atshi mu kahia
Kakanu aku, ukateke pankatshi pa tshilambuilu luseke lua kuinshi

Nenyudishile bia kudia bia musoko eu disanka dikumbane; Nenduatshishe bakuidi badimu luhandu, Mu musoko au nemmueneshile Davidi lusengu; Nenduatshishe bena lukuna bandi bundu, Psalms Monai, bidi bitamba buimpe ne bia disanka Bidi bu manyi a mushinga mukole medibue ha mutu, Bidi bu mume wa ku mukuna wa Hêmona, Psalms Monai, nuvudishile Yehowa disanka, Bishai bianza bienu ku muaba wa tshijila, Yehowa akuvudishile disanka difume ku Siona, Psalms Tumbishai Yehowa
Hatuakadi balalemu matuku makuabo, muprofete, dina diandi Agabo, mufume ku Yudaya, wakahueka ku Kaisalia
Kadi mesu a Nzambi wabo akadi kudi bakulu ba Bena Yuda, kabakabakandisha mu mudimu tô ne hakayabo ne bualu ebu kudi Dayawesha, ne hakabafundileye mukanda bua bualu ebu
Nudi bamanye ne, Hanuakadi ba mu bisamba bia bende, nuakasesuishibua kudi mpingu ya tumama, bu muakamanyabo mua kunulombola

Hanuashikisha kufila tshia dikumi tshia bintu bienu bionso mu tshidimu tshisatu tshidibo bafila tshia dikumi tshia bintu, nenubale Bena Lewi ne benyi ne bana ba nshiya ne bakashi ba mu lufuila; nunku bobo nebadie mu misoko yenu, nebukute
Mabele ebe akasaba, nsuki yebe yakamana kuleha; kadi wakadi butaka kuyi ne tshilulu ham bidi
Kuenzaye bintu bia kukuata nabi mudimu ku miendu: nkala ne bintu bia kuela butu

Nunku mbikidilai baprofete bonso ba Bâla ne batendeledi bandi bonso ne bakuidi bandi bonso: nansha umue wabo kashadi, bualu bua bundi n abu mbua kufila mulambu munene kudi Bâla; yonso washala kena wikala ne muoyo

Tshintu etshi netshikale tshituha tshia Alona ne tshia bana bandi balume kudi Bena Isalele tshiendelele, bualu bua tshidi tshituha tshia bakuidi tshia mu mulambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala ya Bena Isalele, tshidi mulambu udibo babisha mulu kudi Yehowa
Davidi wakambila Gada ne, Ndi munkatshi mua malu manene: tuhone mu bianza bia Yehowa, bualu bua luse luandi ludi lunene; tshihonyi mu bianza bia bantu
Bua bualu ebu bakafikisha muadi wa bahele kudiye, Biahuweye talalâ, muntu kai wamubisha
Ku luseke luabo lukuabo bakasa kudi Bena Tekoa; kadi bantu babo banene kabakalenga bianza biabo ku mudimu wa Mukelenge wabo

Haumuka kundi lelu, wewe neusungile ne balume babidi ha majambu a Lakele ku Selesa ku mukata wa buloba bua Benyamina; bobo nebakuambile ne, Nyama ya mpunda îwakaya kukeba yakamueneka; mona, tatu webe wakalekela kunyingalasha mutshima bua nyama ya mpunda, udi unyingalasha mutshima bualu buebe, wamba ne, Nengenze tshinyi bua muan anyi wa balume
Bantu bakadila kudi Mose, ne Mose wakalomba Yehowa, kahia kakajima
Badiku bwa beena ditunga bônso ba Kongu
Mpindiu ndi nsanka mu makenga andi n au bua bualu buenu, ne ku luanyi luseke ndi nkumbasha mu muhidi wanyi makenga a Kilisto atshidi mashale bua mubidi wandi, ekelesia mene
Hakamona Yoaba ne, Bakasa mualu wa nvita ku mpala kuandi ne ku nyima kuandi, yeye wakasungula bena bukitu ba munkatshi mua Bena Isalele bonso, wakasa mualu wa nvita kudi Bena Sulia
Bena Isalele bakenda mu malu mabi onso a Yalobama akenzeye, kabakasesukaku nansha; tô ne hakumusha Yehowa Bena Isalele ku mesu kuandi, bu muakabambileye kudi bantu bandi bonso baprofete
Katuena ne mushindu wa kubinyenga bidibu nabi to
Arone ne bana bende bikale bowa mayi awu ku bianza ne ku makasa, bangabanga ne kubuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena, nansha bangabanga ne kundambula milambu
Eu mmukalu wa Bena Yuda ku meku abo
Kadi Mose wakanyema ku mesu kua Palo, wakikala mu buloba bua Midiyana, wakashikama hehi ne dina dia mai
Wananga biuma kena usankishibua ku biuma; wananga bubanji kena ukuta bubanji; ebu mbualu bua hatuhu kabidi
Ne tshimanyinu tshikuabo tshiakamuenebua mu diulu; ne mona, dragon mukunze, muikale ne mitu muanda mutekete ne nsengu dikumi, ne bifulu bia butumbi muanda mutekete ha mitu handi
Hakamonabo bualu ebu, bakasokolola dî diakabambilabo bua muana eu
Bualu bua mulambu wetu wa Kuhita kua Yehowa wakashihibua, Kilisto mene
Wakadi ne muakunyi andi mukashi dina diandi Malia, yeye wakadi mushikame ku makasa a Mukelenge, ulelesha dî diandi
Neboshe munyinyi ku kahia butuku abu, nebaudie ne mampa adi kâyi ne luevene, nebaudie ne matamba adi ne bululu
Yeye neikale kûdi bu musangalashi wa muoyo ne bu mudishi wa mu bununu buebe, bualu bua mamuen ebe, udi mukusue, udi muhite bana ba balume muanda mutekete buimpe kûdi, nguakamulela

Biakula muntu muaku unudi kanui bamanye, bakule nunka kudi babidi, kabahitshi ha basatu, balondangane muntu ne muntu, ne umue wenu abajinguluile muaku kadi bikalaku kakui mubajinguluidi, muena muaku ahue biandi mu ekelesia, adiakuile munda munda, akule kudi Nzambi kabidi
Muntu yonsu udi ne disama dia nsudi, udi ne bua kuvuala bilamba bipandike
Bualu bua misangu mikuabo muntu udi wenza mudimu wandi wa lungenyi, wa meji ne mulengele tshishiki udi ushila muntu buhianyi budiye kayi mukuatshile mudimu
Bakamuelela tshiseba ha nyima n andi

Ne ludimi ludi kahia; ludimi ludi buloba bujima bua malu mabi munkatshi mua bituha bietu bia mibidi; ludi lunyanga mubidi wonso ludi lutemesha matuku onso a muoyo kahia, iudi lutemeshibua ne kahia ka ku Ngena
Yoshua wakafunda mei â mu mukanda wa mikenji ya Nzambi; wakangata dibue dinene, wakadimanyika muinshi mua mutshi wa telebinta wakadi hehi ne tshitendelelu tshia Nzambi
Kanuenzedianganyi bibi, nuenu nenutshine Nzambi webe bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Bana ba balume ba Shimeona Yemuele ne Yamina ne Obada ne Yakina ne Soha ne Shaula, muana wa balume wa mukashi wa Bena Kanana, â mmeku a Shimeona
Wakamuvula bilulu biakadiye muluate mu nsubu wa lukanu
Hashishe Yehowa wakangambila ne, Muana wa muntu, udi umona bu mudi bakulu ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele benza mu mîdima, muntu ne muntu mu nsubu wandi wa mindidimbi, anyi
Kadi hakamoneye tshihehele, wakatshina; hakabangeye kudina mu mai, wakadila ne, Mukelenge, unsungile
Yeye kakenza bualu bubi, kabakamusangana ne didinga mukana muandi; hakamuhendabo, yeye kakabahenda kabidi; hakakengeye, yeye kakabakanyina, kadi wakadifila mu bianza bia udi ulumbulula biakane
Abashaloma wakashikama mu Yelushalema bidimu bibidi bijima, yeye kakatangila mpala wa mukelenge
Pa nanku, mwenji wa Dîyi ewu udi mubwêja mapa ne madikadidi aa mu Dîyi dikulu

Bualu bua Davidi wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, wakaha bantu bandi ditalala; yeye udi mushikame mu Yelushalema tshiendelele; ne Bena Lewi kabena ne bualu bua kutuala kabidi nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne bintu biakadimu bia kuenza n abi mudimu
Kuena mutumbishe Nzambi udi ne muhuya webe mu tshianza tshiandi, udi mumanye bienzedi biebe bionso
Moshe udiela panshi, dikombu kuandamuka nyoka
Bakabala mushinga wai, bakausangana muikale bituha bia argent mbombo itanu

Bua bobo badi basue kuhua muoyo bua bualu ebu ne, Diulu diakadiku kale, ne buloba huakakuatakashibua bua mu mai bufume mu mai bua dî dia Nzambi; bualu bua mai â, buloba abu buakadiku mu tshikondo atshi buakabuikidibua ne mai, buakajimina
Udi ukeba mbua mulue, anyi mukenya
Bualu bua nakasengelela bankambua benu bikole mu dituku dinakabaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu tô ne ku dituku edi, mbika ne lunkelu bua kubadimusha ne, Nutumikile dî dianyi
Mu matuku andi Bena Edome bakatombokela Bena Yuda, bakadisunguila mukelenge
Bikala tshintu atshi ha bulalu buakadiye anyi ha tshintu tshiakashikameye hakatshilengeye, yeye neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Kuitabushi bua muena milongo mukashi ashale ne muoyo
Nunku, muana wa muntu, akula ne ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele, ubambile ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Batatu benu bakahenda dina dianyi hakantombokelabo
Hakalua butuku, buatu buakadi mu bunene bua dishiba, yeye wakadi mu mpata nkayandi

Jeremiah Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ku nyima kua diba diakadi Nebuzaladana, kapitene ka bansentedi ba masalayi, umulekele ku Lama, wakadi mumusangane musuika ne nkanu munkatshi mua ba mu Yelushalema ne ba mu Yuda bakakuatabo, ne bakadibo baya n abo mu buhika ku Babulona

Ku tshibi tshia ku ntempelo wa Yehowa, hankatshi ha mbalanda ne tshioshelu, kuakadi balume bu makumi abidi ne batanu bimane ne nyima yabo miele ku ntempelo wa Yehowa ne mpala yabo mitangishe ku luseke lua ku esete; bakadi batendelela diba ku luseke lua esete
Ne udi wenzesha buloba ne bonso badi bikalahu bua kukukuilabo nyama wa luonji wa kumudilu, wakadi ne mputa wa lufu mûme
Hashishe Yeholama wakasabuka ne tupitene tuandi ne makalu onso akadiye n au; bakajuka butuku, bakashiha Bena Edome bakadi babanyunguluka ne tupitene tua makalu
Mbua mene neyidie mubidi wa Izebele mu Yizelele, kabena bamujika nansha
Tangilai bienu, ndi ku luseke luenu, nempingane kunudi, ne nebadime buloba buenu, nebakunemu maminu
Kena wa mamu to
Nomba Badi Batuma Batentekedi Dikumi ne Babidi ku Kanâna Dut

Hebrews Nunku, tushîe diyisha dia malu a tshibangidilu a Kilisto ku nyima, tuyai tô ne ku buakane bua tshishiki; katuteki tshiakabidi bishimikidi bia kukudimuna kua mutshima ku midimu mifue, ne bia ditabusha dia kudi Nzambi, ne bia diyisha dia kubatiza, ne bia ditentekesha dia bianza, ne bia dibika dia bafue, ne bia dilumbuluisha dia tshiendelele
Tuakamuandamuna di ne, Tuakulota bilota, ne kakuena muntu udi mua kutujinguluilabi
Hakadi Yesu umukaku, wakamona muntu, dina diandi Matayo, mushikame ku tshilambuidi, wakamuambila ne, Undonde; yeye wakabika, wakamulonda
Hadi mei avulangana, kudisua kudi kuyisangana kabidi, ne bualu buimpe budi muntu uheta budi hanyi
Davidi wakenzela ba mu misoko yonso ya Bena Amona nunku
Nunku ndi nkusengelela ne, Webeshe mukelenge bualu ebu, yeye kena uhidia kunfila kûdi
Nunku bobo nebikale balumbuludi benu, Kadi bingikala ngumu sha bademon mu dina dia Nyuma wa Nzambi, bukelenge bua Nzambi buakumana kulua kunudi
Kadi Nzambi udiku mu diulu udi usokolola malu masokoka, ne yeye wakumanyisha mukelenge Nebukadenesâ malu akadi ha kulua mu matuku atshidi ku mpala
Bayandi kabidi udi ujuka, udi umutumbisha ne, Bana bakashi bangi bakuenza bimpe, Diakalengele didi didinga, mpala mulengele udi hatuhu, Umuhe difutu dia midimu ya bianza biandi;
Hashishe, yeye udi uya biandi, udi wangata minga nyuma muanda mutekete idi imutamba yeye bubi, idi ibuelamu, idi ishikama; malu a muntu au a hashishe adi atamba a diambedi bubi
Genese Kuledibua kua Isaka Yehowa wakahingana kudi Sala bu muakambeye, ne wakenzela Sala bu muakambeye

Wakangata tshimanyinu tshia ditengula bu tshimanyishilu tshia buakane bua ku ditabusha diakadiye n adi hakadiye kai mutengula, bua yeye kuikala nkambua wa bonso badi bitabusha, nasha bobo kabai batengula kabidi, bua buakane bubadibue kudibo; ne nkambua wa batengula kudibo, kengua anu kudi badi batengula, kadi kudi badi balonda mu makasa a ditabusha diakadi n adi nkambua wetu Abalahama hakadiye kai mutengula

Neubishe udi wambila mukelenge ne, Wewe udi muntu wa tshianana, Neuhishe udi ubenga kunemeka anu bana ba bakelenge, Mu tshituha tshia diba badi bafua; nansha ha diba dia mundankulu mene Bualu bua yeye udi uteka mesu andi ku nshila idi muntu wendela, Kakuena midima, kakuena mufitu mukole Bualu bua yeye kena ne bualu bua kusunguila muntu tshikondo tshijalame Udi utshibula bantu banene bituha bituha, kayi muanze kukonkonona malu abo, Bualu bua udi mumanye midimu yabo, Udi ubakuma bua bubi buabo bualu bua bakasesuka mu nshila, kabayi balonda Nzambi, kabakasua kuenda mu nshila yandi yonso
Wakamuvula bilulu biakadiye muluate mu nsubu wa lukanu
Yone wakamba kubenga ne, Meme ndi ne bualu bua wewe kumbatiza meme, munyi muwakulua kundi

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kadi bakuidi ba munkatshi mua Bena Lewi, bana ba Sadoka, bakadi balama tshitendelelu tshianyi hakahambuka Bena Isalele bua kumuka kundi, bobo bine basemene ha buihi hanyi bua kunkuatshilabo mudimu; bimane ku mpala kuanyi bua kufila manyi ne mashi kundi
Muntu udi kayi ne meji kena mumanye bualu ebu, ne, Biadiunda bantu babi bu mudi mashinde atoloka, Kadi wewe, Yehowa, udi mushikame mu muaba udi kulu kashidi
Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Udi witabusha udi ne muoyo wa tshiendelele
Au mmei ne mikenji bakambila Yehowa Bena Isalele mukana mua Mose mu mpata ya Moaba hehi ne Yadene mitangilangane ne Yeleko
Nukungule bubanji buonsu bua mu tshimenga atshi muaba umue, muaba udi bantu bambilangane malu

Mitshi iudi mufunde ikale mu tshianza tshiebe ku mesu kuabo, hawabambila ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, nengumushe Bena Isalele munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu muakayabo, nensangishe ba ku nseke yonso, nendue n abo mu buloba buabo mene
Bena bukitu basatu bakahita munkatshi mua ma salayi a Bena Peleshete, bakasuna mai mu dina dia mu Beteleheme diakadi ha buihi ne tshibi, bakalua n au kudi Davidi

Muntu wakadi ulua ne lumu wakamuambila ne, Bena Isalele bakatshimuka ku mesu kua Bena Peleshete: bakashiha bantu ba bungi, ne bana bebe ba balume babidi, Hofeni ne Pinehasa, bakafua; bakanyenga mushete wa Nzambi kabidi
Bualu Maweja Nangila kena musue bintu bia mushindu awu to
Hakafika diba ha itanu, wakaya biandi, wakasangana bantu bakuabo bimane; wakabakonka ne, Nuenu nudi nuimanyina aha diba dionso tshianana tshinyi
Kanutendeledi mvidie mikuabu to
Yolama wakamba ne, Tuma muntu ha nyima ha kabalu bua kusangileye n abo, abebeshe ne, Nulualua talalâ, anyi
Nudilame bimpe; bienza muan enu bibi, umubele; biakudimuneye mutshima wandi, umujimishile bubi buandi
Yoshiya wakadi ne bidimu muanda mukulu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi asatu ne tshimue

Hanuatshintshimika musoko musangu mule, hanualuangana n abo bua kûnyenga, kanushihi mitshi ya tumuma ne tusui; nudi mua kudia tumuma atu, kanushihi mitshi, bualu bua mitshi ei idi bu bantu banudi uluangana n abo, anyi

Muakuidi neatangile ha disama didi mu dikoba diandi, bikala miosa ya mu muaba wa disama miandamuke mitoke tô, ne bikala disama dimane kubuela mu munyinyi wandi mene mene, edi ndisama dia nsudi, muakuidi neamutangile, neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane
Nunku Yehowa wakadi ne Bena Isalele tshiji tshikole, wakabumusha ku mesu kuandi; anu tshisamba tshia Yuda nkayatshi tshiakashala
Yakoba wakangata dibue, wakadimanyika bu tshibumba
Ha kudia kabena bowa bianza
Dikanga dia midimu ya tshibidilu anyi ya pa bwaayi badi badindija kakuyi ditontolola bwa kumona mwa kulonda, pikalabio bienzeka, bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka

Kadi nakanutumina bana betu ba mu Kilisto bua ditumba dietu bua bualu buenu kadivuishibu dia hatuhu mu muanda eu; bua nuenu nuikale balongolole bu munakamba; bua, bialua bakuabo ba mu Makedonia n anyi banusangane kanui balongolole, bualu ebu kabutufuishi tuetu bundu tshi ngamba buenu mene
Kadi yeye wakabatumina baprofete bandi bua kubahingisha kudi Yehowa kabidi; bobo bakababela; kadi kabakateleja matshu abo kudibo
