Nzambi wa ditantamana ne wa busambi anuhe bualu ebu mene, bua kuikalangana ne meshi amue bu mudi Kilisto Yesu, bua nuenu nutumbishe Nzambi Tatu ne Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto ne mutshima umue ne dî dimue
Kulelaye balume ne bakaji
Dishiya dia Yadene ba Bena Lubena ne ba Bena Gada ne ba mu tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Bena Manashe bakadi binunu lukama ne makumi abidi bakadi ne bintu bia nvita bionso
Biasua muena nsubu kuhikula nsubu wandi, yeye neasakidile tshituha tshitanu tshia mushinga wa nsubu ha mutu hau, ne nsubu neikale wandi

Bualu bua wewe Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, wakabulula muntu webe bualu ebu, wamba ne, Nenjadike tshiota tshiebe; nunku muntu webe wakadi ne bualu ebu mu mutshima wandi bua kukutendeleleye ne mitendelelu ei
Wakamuambila ne, Angata mukanda webe, ufunde makumi muanda mukulu
Binahesha bintu bianyi bionso bua kudishabo n abi bahele, ne binafila mubidi bua kungoshabo, kadi bingikala tshi ne luse, malu â kena ankuatshisha nasha
Bana ba balume ba Zebuluna, Selede ne Elona ne Yalele
Hangela bianyi mpungi, meme ne bonso badi n anyi, hashishe nuenu kabidi nuele mpungi ku matshika onso a tshitudilu, nuambe ne, Bualu bua Yehowa ne bua Gideona
Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua nuenu kanuikadi bahika babo, nakatshibula mitshi ya tshikokedi yakatekabo ha nshingu yenu, nakanujalamisha
Hakatshiabu Mose wakambila bantu ne, Nuenu nuakuenza bualu bubi bunene Katataka nembande kudi Yehowa, binamanya mua kunubuikidila bubi buenu
Ku nyima kua bualu ebu mukelenge wa Bena Amona wakafua; Hanuna, muana wandi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi

Batentekedi aba bakayamu, bakalua ne Lahaba ne tatu wandi ne mamu wandi ne bana babo ne bintu bionso biakadiye n abi; bakalua ne bena diku diandi bonso kabidi, bakabateka ku butshika bua tshitudilu tshia Bena Isalele
Nenku neashale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ndi munvue
Numbers Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Utume bantu, bua bobo batentekele buloba bua Kanâna, bundi mpa Bena Isalele, usungule mundi ku tshisamba ku tshisamba, mundi yonso udi bu mukelenge munkatshi muabo
Tudi tutumbisha n alu Mukelenge ne Tatu; tudi tuela n alu bantu bakafukibua ne tshifuanyikishi tshia Nzambi mulau

Kadi mu bualu ebu buonso kanuakatumikila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakaya ku mpala kuenu mu nshila bua kunukebela muaba wa kushimika ntenta yenu, mu difutu dikenka kahia butuku, ne mu dî tulu dia diledi munya, bua kunulombola mu nshila unuakadi ne bualu bua kuenda
Amuimanyike ne muoyi kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, bangabanga ne kumuipata bua kuyaye kudi Azazele mu tshipela
Kabena mua kuhesha bena madilu bidia bua kubasamba bua bafue baho; kabena mua kubahesha luhanza lua kubasamba n alu bua lufu lua batatu abo anyi lua bamamu abo

Sedekiya wakadi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne tshimue hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu dikumi ne tshimue; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Hamutala, muana mukashi wa Yelemiya wa mu Libena

Yehowa neamukoleshe hadiye ulala ha bulalu bua butekete bua mubidi Meme hanyi nakamba ne, Yehowa, unfuile luse; Badi n anyi lukuna badi bamba mei mabi bua bualu buanyi ne, Bialua umue wabo kuntangila, udi Wamba mei a kumbomba n au

Titus Meme Paulo, udi muhika wa Nzambi ne mupostolo wa Yesu Kilisto, bualu bua kuitabushisha bantu bakasungulabo kudi Nzambi, ne bua dimanya dia tshishiki dia bualu bulelela bua mu buimpe bua Nzambi, mu ditekemena dia muoyo wa tshiendelele, udi Nzambi, udi kai mua kudinga, mulaye diambedi bikondo bia tshiendelele kabi bianze kuikalaku
Ne wewe, Pashû, ne bonso badi bashikame mu nsubu muebe, nenuye mu buhika
Mukelenge wakamba ne, Nushale mu Yeleko tô ne hamena miedi yenu kabidi, hashishe nenuhingane
Kakuakadi muntu wakamanya mua kumukudimuna dî, dituku adi tô tshiendelele muntu kakadi ne bukitu bua kumukonka bualu
Nanku matuku dikumi ne anayi a ngondu wa kumpala dilolu, too ne ku matuku makumi abidi ne dimue dilolu, nudie anu mampa kaayi mela buanga
Bualu bua nakaheta dikuatshisha dia kudi Nzambi, ndi muimane tô ne lelu eu, nmanyisha bakese ne banene, tshi ngamba manga malu, anu akambabo kudi baprofete ne kudi Mose ne, Alualua
Kudingidi mukuenu
Binuasua anu badi banusue, nenuikale ne disakidila kai
Miakulu mikwabo ya ditunga ke idi yenza bubanji bwa bunkanbwa bwa Kongu budi Mbulamatadi ne tshia kukuba
Nunku numueneke ku mesu kua Yehowa ku bisamba bienu ne ku binunu bienu
Hakayeye ku Yelushalema, wakasua kulamata kudi bayidi; kadi bobo bakamutshina, kabakitabusha ne, Udi muyidi
Yudasa ka Isakaliote nasha wakamukonka ne, Mukelenge, bualu kai buakulua buwadimuenesha kutudi, kui udimuenesha kudi ba ha buloba
Nakukuha kabidi tshiwakadi kuyi mutambe: bubanji ne butumbi; nunku munkatshi mua hakelenge kamuena muikale mukuabo bu wewe matuku ebe onso
Bu muwakuntuma munkatshi mua ba ha buloba, mbu munakubatuma munkatshi mua ba ha buloba kabidi
Mukelenge wakambila mukashi ne Ya ku nsubu kuebe, nendonde tshilumbu tshiebe
Hakadiye mutengula, anyi hakadiye kai mutengula

Yoshua Misoko ya Kunyemena Yehowa wakambila Yoshua ne, Ambila Bena Isalele ne, Nudisunguile misoko ya kunyemena bu munakanutumina dî kudi Mose, mushihi wa muntu mukuabo ku mpukahuka anyemenemu; neyikale tshinyemenu tshienu kudi musombuedi
Hakatangileye bakadi bashikame bamunyunguluke, wakamba ne, Mamu anyi ne bana betu kababa
Yeye wakamba ne, Nue biebe, mukelenge wanyi, yeye wakatula mulondo wandi lubilu mu tshianza tshiandi, wakamunuisha

Ku tshidimu tshionsu, bantu balume bonsu badi munkatshi muenu, nebadileje kudi Maweja Nangila misangu isatu, muaba wikalaye musungule, bua tshibilu tshia mampa adi kaayi mela buanga, bua tshibilu tshia Dinowa biakudia, ne bua tshibilu tshia tuzubu tua Bisasa
Bakadi bamubala n etu, wakadi mumane kuangata luandi luseke lua mudimu eu
Davidi wakabikila umue wa bansongalume bandi, wakamuambila ne, Semena ha buihi n andi, umushihe

Bualu bua mitshima yabo idi yelangana meji a kuenzela bantu bibi, Badi bibaka nsubu ne meji, Lungenyi ludi lûshisha nsubu idi munda muandi tente Muena meji udi mukole; Bua, hakuhabo lungenyi lua kuenza, neumanye mua kuluangana nvita; Meji adi atamba muhote bule; Udi uhangidisha bua kuenza malu mabi, Kuhangidisha buhote kudi bualu bubi; Biwateketa halua dituku dia dikenga, Handisha badibo baya n abo ku lufu; Biwamba ne, Kabiakadi bamanye muanda eu, Muan anyi, udie buitshi, bualu bua budi buimpe, Wamanya ne meji adi muomumue ku muoyo webe: Wewe muntu mubi, kualaminyi ku muaba udi muntu muakane mushikame; Bualu bua muntu muakane udi uhona misangu muanda mutekete, udi ubika kabidi; Kusanki hahona muena lukuna webe, bua Yehowa kamonyi mudiye Kudinyengabashi bua benji ba malu mabi, Bualu bua muntu mubi kena ne nshikidilu muimpe; Muan anyi, tshina Yehowa ne mukelenge kabidi; Bualu bua dibutuka diabo dilualua lukasa; udi mumanye kabutu Mei â kabidi adi mei akamba bena meji

Bulelela, yeye wakulua bua kufuna bulobo ku mpala kua Bena Isalele: muntu wamushiha, mukelenge neanumushe mubanji munene, neamuhe muana wandi mukashi, neahe ba mu nsubu wa tatu wandi budishikaminyi mu Isalele
Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Monai, nentume makenga ku muaba eu; hunvua muntu yonso lumu luau, matshu andi neahate
Mose wakamba ne, Bikala mpala webe kayi uya n anyi, kudimusha kunoko

Yesu wakabakudimuna ne, Binaditumbisha, butumbi buanyi budi tshianana; udi untumbisha nTatu wanyi; nuenu nudi numuamba ne, Yeye udi Nzambi wetu; nuenu kanuakumumanya, kadi meme ndi mumumanye; binamba ne, Tshiena mumumanye, nengikale muena mashimi bu nuenu; meme ndi mumumanye, ntu ngatumikila dî diandi
Pashishe Yakobe kuambila Labane ne: Matuku auvua mungambile bua kuangata mukajanyi akumbanyi, munseleshaku
Midimu ya pa bwayi idi ijika padi mianda ya kutangila ijika
Hakamanya bana babo ba mu Kilisto bualu ebu, bakalua n andi ku Kaisalia, bakamutuma ku Tâso
Hakatshiabu, kabakadi bamanye buloba abu; bakatangila tshinkonya tshia mai tshiakadi ne lusenga, bakasangisha dî ne, Ne tuamanya mua kutuma buatu mu muaba wawa

Yeye wakabambila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Nuambile muntu wakanutuma kundi ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mona, nentumine muaba eu ne bantu badi bashikamamu milau yonso idi mifunda mu mukanda wakubalabo ku mpala kua mukelenge wa Yuda
Kanutshinyi to
Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakabakuata, yeye wakumuka
Hashishe Davidi wakebesha Yehowa tshiakabidi
Bualu buakadi munda mua mutshima mua tatu wanyi Davidi bua kuibakileye dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, nsubu
Ke mudi bukelenge bua mu diulu bufuana mukelenge mukuabo wakasua kubadika bintu biandi biakadi mu bianza bia bahika bandi
Bobo bakamuku dimuna ne, Tuetu, bantu bebe, tudi bana dikumi ne babidi ba muntu umue wa mu buloba bua Kanana, ne mona, muana wa mukala udi mushale ne tatu wetu katataka, ne mukuabo kenaku
Yehowa wakabisha balumbuluishi, bakabasungila mu bianza bia bakadi babahaula
Nanku nuenu nudi bajadike malu manene adi Maweja Nangila munuenzele
Bana ba balume ba Elifasa bakadi Temana ne Omâ ne Sefo ne Gatama ne Kenaza
Kadi Balaka wakalonda ku nyima kua makalu ne kua bantu tô ne ku Haloshete wa munkatshi mua bisamba bia bende; bantu bonso ba Sisela bakafua ku miele ya nvita; nansha umue wabo wakahanduka

Mu matuku au hakadi Môdekai mushikame ku tshibi tshia mukelenge, bantu batungula babidi ba mukelenge, Bigatana ne Teleshe, ba munkatshi mua balami ba ku tshibi, bakadi ne tshiji, bakakeba kushiha mukelenge Ahashawelosha

Bakuhesha mukashi mahuahua abidi a nyunyu wa mukanku munene bua yeye ahahale mu tshihela ku muaba wandi, kudibo bamudisha tshikondo, ne bikondo, ne tshituha tshia hankatshi ha tshikondo bua kumukeye ku mpala kua nyoka
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ndiku, mukelenge wanyi
Bobo bakashikama mu Yelushalema kabidi ha buihi ne bana babo
Bakadinyanga hakatekabo mushiku wabo wa mbelu hehi ne mushiku wanyi wa mbelu, ne dikunshi diabo hehi ne dikunshi dianyi, ne bakadi anu ne lumbu hankatshi hanyi n abo
Kanuenji bibi hanualumbulula tshilumbu, kanunemekedi muntu muhele, kanutumbishi muntu munene, kadi nulumbulule bilumbu bia muena mutumba n enu ne buakane mu mutshima
Wakatemesha minda ku mpala kua Yehowa bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Shaula wakadi ne tshiji tshikole; bualu ebu biuakanyingalasha mutshima wandi
Bakulu betu ne bena kuetu bonso bakatuambila ne, Angata
Yeye wakambila mukashi ne, Mibi yebe yakujimishibua
Ebu budi bualu bundi mbambila malu mu nsumuinu; bua kumona badi bamona kadi kabena bamona bimpe; kunvua badi bunvua kadi kabena bunvua bimpe, kabena bajingulula bualu
Mu tshikondo atshi nakanuambila malu onso anudi ne bualu bua kuenza
Mapangadika a Minisitila kavulambedi badi baatwa tshiâla tshibîdi ku dia bakaji, padibo bienzeka, kudi baminisitila badiye wimikila dikumbaja dia mapangadika awu
Yehowa wakanuihatshila bisamba binene ne bikole; kakuakadi muntu wakanutantamena tô ne ku dituku edi
Bakamana nsubu mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshimue tshia bukelenge, mu ngondo wa Bula, udi ngondo wa muanda mukulu
Bualu bua netubutule musoko eu, bualu bua muadi wabo wakulua munene ku mesu kua Yehowa, ne Yehowa wakatutuma bua kûshiha
Ne meme bianyi kabidi, bana betu, ndi ngitabushishibua ne, Nuenu mene nudi bûle tente ne buimpe, bûshibua tente ne lungenyi luonso, nudi bamanye mua kudimushangana

Tshilobo tshiakaluhuka mu tshitudilu tshia Bena Peleshete, dina diatshi Goleyata wa mu Gata, bule buandi buakadi coudées Wakadi ne tshifulu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku ku mutu kuandi, wakatata tshikowelu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku, bujitu buatshi buakadi bu nshekele Wakadi ne nkete ya tshiamu tshia mitaku ku mikolo yandi, wakadi ne difuma dia tshiamu tshia mitaku ha diaha diandi

Butumbi buikale kudi Nzambi, udi ne bukole bua kunujadika bu mudi lumu luimpe luanyi ne kuamba kuanyi kua Yesu Kilisto, bu mudi dibuluibua dia bualu busokoko buakadi buhuwishibue ku bikondo bia tshiendelele; kadi katataka buakamueneshibua mu mifundu ya baprofete bu mudi mukenshi wa Nzambi wa tshiendelele; buakumanyishibua ku bisamba bionso bua ditumikila diabo mu ditabusha
Wakabuela mu buatu bukuabo, buakadi bua Simona, wakamuambila ne, Semesha buatu tshituha tshibi mu mai
Nunku nudiangatshile balume ba ngombe muanda mutekete ne bimpanga muanda mutekete, nuye n abi kudi muntu wanyi Yobo
Muntu kabaki mukashi wa tatu wandi: muntu kavudi tshilulu tshia tatu wandi
Kadi muanda udibo bahangidisha kawena alubuluka, bualu bua nshikidilu wa malu au neafike anu mu tshikondo tshiakasungula Nzambi
Yeye wakahona hanshi lukasa ku makasa andi, wakahuola muoyo wandi; bansongalume bakabuela, bakamusangana mufue, bakaluhuka n andi, bakamujika hehi ne bayandi
Bualu bua udi bu meme nganyi
Wakabutula musoko, wakanuaminamu luehu
Nunku hakadisangishabo kunoko, tshiakashanguluka; hakatshiabu, nakashikama ha tshilumbuluidi, nakamba bua kuluabo ne muntu eu
Nudi nuamba ne, Muntu udi uditshiha mutshihu ne, Ntempelo, kena musuika, kadi muntu udi uditshiha mutshihu ne, Ngolo wa mu ntempelo, udi musuikibue ku mutshihu wandi
disungula ne diteeka dia batangiludi ba mu polovensa, tulasa tupwekela, tubandila, twa midimu ya bianza ne twa nsungansunga;
Nunku butudi n abu mbua kusankidila bantu ba nunku, bua tuetu tulue benji n abo ba mudimu mu bualu bua bushua
Shaula wakambila Bena Kena ne, Yai bienu, umukai munkatshi mua Bena Amaleka, bua tuetu katunushihi n abo; bualu bua nuenu nuakafuila Bena Isalele luse hakaluhukabo mu Ejipitu
Kayine umvua nanku, kuambila muanabu Ebele ne: Tuye kuendakana
Tshibangidilu Abrame kumuka mu Ejipitu, kupingana kabidi mu ditunga dia Kenaane mu tshitupa tshia kuinshi
Bakimana ditutu nansha matuku abidi nansha ngondo nansha tshidimu, Bena Isalele bakashala mu tshitudilu, kabakaya ku luendu, hakumukadi, bakaya ku luendu
Izake kusomba mu Ngerare
Tshitupa : Bidi bitangila bumfumu bwa kabukulu Kanungu ka Bumfumu bwa kabukulu budi bumanyika
Kumumanyishaye kabidi bishima bivuaye mumuleje bua kuenza
Mutuangaji munkathi mua bana babu udi ne bumfumu
Hakatangila bantu bualu ebu, bakatua mpala yabo hanshi, bamba ne, Yehowa, yeye udi Nzambi; Yehowa, yeye udi Nzambi
Belâma wakabandisha mesu andi, wakatangila Bena Isalele bashikama ku milongo ya bisamba biabo, Nyuma wa Nzambi wakalua kudiye
Dina dia muakuny andi diakadi Yubala, yeye wakadi nkambua wa badi bimba bisanji ne nshiba
Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudibo, bua kubashiha munkatshi mua tshitudilu, tô ne hakafuabo buonso buabo
Udi unkengesha nunku bua tshinyi
Nakanuha miaba yonso inuadiata muinshi mua makasa enu bu munakambila Mose
Bakuidi bakamukudimuna ne, Netshikale tshibihe

Hakakumbana matuku a kudiuvua kuabo, bu mudi mukenshi wa Mose wamba, bakalua n andi ku Yelushalema bua kumufila kudi Mukelenge bu muakafundabo mu mikenshi ya Mukelenge ne, Nebabikile muana mulume yonso udi ubulula difu dia mukashi ne, Wa tshijila wa Mukelenge , ne bua kufila mulambu mushihela Yehowa bu muakambabo mu mikenshi ya Mukelenge ne, Nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi, anyi bana babidi ba nyunyu ya nkudimba
Ku ditamba dionsu kuvua tulongu tukese tusatu, tuikale ne mapu ne bilongu bu mudi mutshi wa amande
Nanku muntu yonsu uvuabu basuma kudi nyoka, uvua utangila nyoka wa tshiamu tshikunze, uvua ushala ne muoyi
Bana ba Bebai, nkama isambombo ne makumi abidi ne basatu
Mukelenge Davidi wakamba ne, Umbikidile Sadoka muakuidi, ne Natana muprofete, ne Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada
Nunku ma buala ebu ndi ntshinta bua kuamba lumu luimpe ku nseke kudi dina dia Kilisto kadi dianze kutedibua, bua meme tshiashi ha bishimikidi biakatekabo kudi munga muntu

Kanuashi nsubu, kanukunyi maminu, kanukunyi mionshi ya tumuma tua nvinyo mu budimi, kanuikadi n abi; kadi nushikame mu ntenta matuku enu onso; bua nuenu nuikale ne muoyo matuku a bungi mu buloba bunudi bashikamemu
Wakabuesha mabue a mikenji mu mushete, wakateka mitshi ya kutuala n ai mushete, wakateka tshibuikilu ha mutu ha mushete
Kadi kabakunvua mei a Yehowa akambeye mukana mua muprofete wandi Yelemiya, nansha yeye nansha bena mudimu bandi nansha bantu ba mu buloba abu
Davidi Udi Uhita Bena Peleshete Bukole Kul
Hakadibo batekemena bualu, ne hakadibo buonso buabo belangana meshi a Yone mu mitshima yabo ne, Yeye udi Kilisto, anyi

Mesa anai akasongabo ku mabue akadiku, mesa ne mesa mikale ne bule bua coudée umue ne tshituha, ne butshiama bua coudée umue ne tshituha, ne bule bua mulu coudée umue, kuakatekelabo tuele ne biamu bia kushiha n abi milambu ya kuosha ne milambu mikuabo
Bualu bua Yoshua kakahingasha tshianza tshiandi tshiakadiye muolole ne difuma tô ne hakabutuleye Bena Ai bonso kabutu
Kapitene ka masalayi lukama ne bakadi n andi balama Yesu, hakamonabo buloba bukanka ne malu makuabo akenjibua, bakatamba kutshina, bakamba ne, Bulelela, eu wakadi Muana wa Nzambi
Kulondolola Badi Batamba Bena Moaba ne Bena Amona Bukole Ku nyima kua malu â Bena Moaba ne Bena Amona ne Bena Meunima bakuabo bakalua kuluangana ne Yehoshafata
Nuenu kanuena bu mudimu wanyi mu Mukelenge, anyi
Bualu bua meme nempite buloba bua Ejipitu butuku abu, nenshihe ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ba bantu ne ba nyama; nendumbuluishe nzambi yonso ya Ejipitu, meme ndi Yehowa
Kadi ndi nuambila bulelela ne, Meme muye mbimpe bienu; bingikala tshî nya, Musambi kena ulua kunudi; kadi binaya, nenutumineye

Bua malu â, amba biebe mei ebe bualu bua buloba bua Isalele, ambila mikuna minene ne mikuna mikese, bihongo ne bibanda ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, nakuamba dî mu mukau wanyi ne mu tshiji tshianyi tshikole, bualu bua nuakufuishibua bundu kudi ba mu bisamba bia bantu
Yuda uvua mulele bana ba balume basatu: Shela, Perese ne Zera
Wakashiha mesu a Sedekiya; ne mukelenge wa Babulona wakamusuika mu nkanu, wakaya ngandi ku Babulona, wakamubuesha mu nsubu wa lukanu tô ne ku dituku dia lufu luandi

Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe bidi bielela bingenyingenyi bia mêyi a mpetu tukanda mu mushindu udibo bateeka bwa dîyi dilongolodi didibo bâmba mu kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu

Mulambu wa benu Izrayele bonsu Padi bena Izrayele bonsu benza bualu bubi mu mpukapuka, budi bubengangana ne mikenji ya Maweja Nangila, badi amu bena tshibawu, nansha bobu kabayi bamanye tshilema tshidibu benza
Tshianana nebikale bena tshibawu, amu bua biakudia

Bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba bua tshiota tshia mukelenge wa Yuda ne, Nendongolole babutudi bua kubutulabo, Ba mu bisamba bia bungi nebahitshile hehi ne musoko eu, muntu yonso ne muena mutumba n andi nebakonkangane ne, Yehowa wakuenzela musoko eu munene nunku bua tshinyi
Bena Isalele bakashikama mu ntenta yabo bu muakenzabo diambedi, Kadi kabakumuka ku malu mabi a ba mu nsubu wa Yalobama akenzesheye Bena Isalele; batshivua bendamu
Kadi, bu muvua Abimeleke kayi muanji kumubuelela mu nzubu, kuambaye ne: Akia
Hakambeye dî edi, kahalai kakuabo kakadi kimane n andi ha buihi kakamukuma, kakamba ne, Wakukudimuina muakuidi wa Nzambi dî nunku tshinyi
Yehowa mene wakungambila ne, Ya uluishe bena buloba ebu, ubabutule
Tatu webe ne meme kabidi tuakukukeba tunyingalala

Isaiah Dî dia tshijila Wewe udi mûle tente ne mbila, Bakokeshi bebe bonso bakanyema diatshimue, Nunku nakamba ne, Bualu bua edi ndituku dia tshintompatompa, Bena Elama bakambula nkaha ya mikete, Bibanda biebe bia mushinga mukole biakadi biule tente ne makalu, Yeye wakumusha tshibuikilu ku mesu kua Bena Yuda
Adi ahita diulu bule, udi mua kuenza tshinyi

Munkatshi mua tshisamba tshia Gada: Lamota wa mu Gilada ne miaba ya ku matshika, tshimenga tshia kunyemenabo kudi mushihianganyi, ne Mahanayima ne miaba ya ku matshika, Heshebona ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Yazê ne miaba ya ku matshika: bimenga bionso binai
Mukashi wakamba ne, Wewe wakelangana meji bua kuenzela bantu ba Nzambi nunku bualu kai

Mu dituku adi Yehowa nealame bantu badi bashikame mu Yelushalema; ne muntu wa munkatshi muabo udi mutambe kuteketa neikale bu Davidi mu dituku adi, tshiota tshia Davidi netshikale bu Nzambi, bu muanjelo wa Nzambi ku mpala kuabo

Nengitshikishile ba mu tshiota tshia Davidi ne ba mu Yelushalema nyuma wa luse ne wa kutendekena; nebamumone wakutuabo difuma; nebamuashile muadi bu mudi muntu washila muan andi umuehele muadi, nebamudile ne kanyinganyinga kakole, bu mudi muntu udila ne kanyinganyinga kakole bua lufu lua muan a bute wandi

Bikilai bananyi ba mata bua kuluisha Bena Babulona, bonso badi banana buta; babanyunguluke ne bitudilu bia bena nvita mu nseke yonso, muntu wandi umue kahanduki: Numufute bu mudi bienzedi biandi, bualu bua wakudibandisha ku mpala kua Yehowa, Wa Tshijila wa Isalele

Kanudi tshintu tshidifuile: nudi mua kuha muenyi udi ku mbelu kuenu tshintu atshi, yeye atshidie; anyi nudi mua kutshihanyisha muntu wa bende; bualu bua nuenu nudi bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yesu wakasangila n abo, wakabela muoyo
Paulo wakamba ne, Bana betu, tshiakamanya ne, Yeye udi muakuidi manene wa Nzambi, bua bakafunda ne, Kuhendi mukokeshi wa tshisamba tshiebe
Kadi nudimuke bua bukole buenu kabuikadi tshilenduishi kudi badi batekete
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Tshindidimbi etshi ne mei â adi mafundahu mbia nganyi

Bena Benyamina bakaluhuka bua kuluangana ne bantu, bakumuka ku musoko basemena kule; bakabanga kubashiha bu muakenzabo misangu mikuabo mu nshila minene, nshila umue udi ufuma ku Betele ne nshila mukuabo udi ufuma ku Gibea, ne mu tshisuku kabidi; bakashiha Bena Isalele bu makumi asatu
Kuyifilaye kudi muntu bua amone mudi muntu uyinyika mena
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Kanuena bamanye lusumuinu elu, anyi
Kuenzabu makunji anayi a mitshi ya ndunga
Mose ne Alona bakaya, bakasangisha bakulu bonso ba Bena Isalele
Umue wa bana balume ba Yoyada, muana wa Eleyashiba muakuidi munene, wakadi muku wa Sanebalata, Muena Holona; nunku nakamuihata ku mesu kuanyi
Yeye wakangambila ne, Muana wa muntu, ya kudi ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele, ubambile mei andi mbatumina
Yeye nealue muaba wa tshijila, ne dibue Ba bungi ba munkatshi muabo nebalenduke; nebadishinde hanshi, nebatshibuke; nebakuatshibue mu buteyi, nebanyengibue
Kadi Yehowa wakatuma tshihehele tshikole ha mai manene, ne tshihuhu tshikole tshiakadi ha mai manene; buatu buakamba kutshibuka
Kueyemenyi buhele bua muntu muhele mu dikosa dia tshilumbu tshiandi

Bualu bua butudi n abu mbua kufua; tudi bu mai akelabo ha buloba, kabena bamanye mua kuasuna kabidi; Nzambi kena unyenga muoyo wa muntu, kadi udi ulongolola bua muntu udibo bihata kikadi bu muntu mubengibue kudiye
Anyi bikaleye mumukume ne mutshi mu tshianza, ne biafileye, yeye udi mushihi wa muntu, nebashihe mushihi wa muntu
Hakalueye Penuele, diba diakabanda, ne Yakoba wakadi utebuka bualu bua tshikundukundu tshiandi
Katataka nakufila makelenge â onso mu bianza bia Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, muntu wanyi; nakumuha nyama yonso ya mu mpata kabidi bua kumukuatshilayi mudimu
Tshitekelu tshia miendu tshia maboku muanda mutekete Beshalele kuenza kabidi tshitekelu tshia miendu tshia tshiamu tshia mpawungi
Hashishe wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, bulelela, muntu webe wakunvua lumu ne, Shaula udi ukeba mua kulua ku Kila bua kubutula musoko bualu buanyi
Neanupe ditunga dijima divuaye mulaye bankambua benu
Nunku nakaya ku musulu wa Pelata, nakumbula, nakangata mukaba mu muaba unakausokoka; ne, monai, mukaba wakumana kunyanguka, kawakadi ne mudimu kabidi
Monai mudi Moaba mushimbuke
Bobo badi bahesha bakashi ba ndumba difutu; kadi wewe udi ufila difutu kudi balunda bebe bonso, ne udi ubabueshila bua kuluabo ku nseke yonso bua kuenda n ebe masandi
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bualu bua nakuambila Nabota, Muene Yizelele, ne, Umpe budimi buebe bua tumuma tukese ku mushinga, anyi biwasua, meme nenkuhe wewe budimi bukuabo
Moshe kubebeja ne: Tshinudi nuenza ntshinyi
Neutshibule mutshi wa mujuwu, uvuaye mukuambuishe ku bukole, neuwumushe pa nshingu
Ba bana ba Hebelone; Yeliya wakadi kahita, Amalia muibidi, Yahaziele muisatu, Yekamama muinai

Bualu bua mukelenge wakadi ne matu akenda ha mutu ha mai manene ku Tâshishi hohamue ne matu a Hilama: akaya ku Tâshishi musangu umue mu bidimu bisatu, akafumaku ne or, argent ne mibanga ne nkima ne kaiba
Kadi nganyi wamanya mua kushala holâ mu dituku dia kulua kuandi
Ke bena Mowabe kuambila bakulu ba bena Madiyane ne: Bantu aba bungi nenku badi mua kutuvinga, bu mudi ngombe idia bisosa bionsu
Badi banji kupingana baminisistila bakwabo padibo kabayi popu anyi padiku tshipumbishi
Bakamubadiladi munyi
Nvula yakaloka tô matuku makumi anai, mai akavulangana, akabandisha buatu ha mutu, buakabandishibua ku buloba
Mukelenge wakakumbasha argent mu Yelushalema bu mabue; wakakumbasha mitshi ya cèdre bu bungi bua mitshi ya sycomore ya mu bibanda
Bakela dî bikole ne, Wewe Muana wa Nzambi, tudi n ebe bualu kai
Awu kuimita difu, kulela muana, dina diende Enoke
Nunku Davidi wakabikila Bena Isalele bonso hamue ku Shihô, kasulu kakese ka ku luseke lua Ejipitu tô ne ku tshibuelelu tshia Hamata, bua kuangatabo mushete wa Nzambi ku Kîyata yalima

Muitanu wakahongolola luhanza luandi ha mutu ha nkuasa wa butumbi wa nyama wa luonji; ne bukelenge buandi buakalua mîdima; ne bakadiangana ndimi yabo bualu bua dikenga, bakahenda Nzambi wa mu diulu bualu bua makenga abo ne bua mputa yabo; ne kabakakudimuna mitshima yabo bua bienzedi biabo
Enza biebe bakeluba babidi ne or mutudibue, ubateke ku matshika a tshibuikilu tshia mushete
Divuba dia Maweja Nangila divua dienda kulu kua bena Izrayele mu munya, pavuabu babanga luendu
Kena mua kutuma bantu mu Ejipitu bua kutusumba to
Bana balume ba Alona bakuidi nebele mpungi, mpungi neyikale bu mukenji, ku bikondo bienu bionso tshiendelele
Mai akahueka hanshi ha tshioshelu, akûsha mutubu tente

Neudie muana wa mukoko umue ne dinda ne mukuabo dilolo, ne tshintu tshia dikumi tshia tshihiminu Eu udi mulambu wa tshiendelele unakanuelela mukenji mu mukuna wa Sinai, mulambu udi utua dihembu, mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia kudi Yehowa
Wakantuma bualu kai

Ne bobo badi ne banfumu bena kuitabusha kababahetudi, bualu bua badi bana babo ba ma Kilisto; kadi, kudi kutamba buimpe, babakuatshile mudimu, bualu bua badi banulubuluila bintu badi bena kuitabusha ne badi banangibua

Yeye wakalota tshiota, wakamona tshibandilu tshi shimika hanshi ne mutu watshi wakateka to ne mu diulu ne mona banjelo ba Nzambi bakadi babandahu, bahuekahu: Wakamona ne Yehowa wakadi muimane ku mutu watshi, wamba ne Ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Abalahama, kaku webe ne Nzambi wa Isaka buloba budi ulalahu nenkuhebu wewe ne tunkanunuina tuebe
Etu ntukanunuina tuabo: muan a bute wa Yishemaele wakadi Nebayota; hashishe Kedâ ne Adabele ne Mibesama, Mishema ne Duma, Masa, Hadada ne Tema, Yetû, Nafisha ne Kedema

Bualu bua dikenga difume kudi Nzambi diakankuatshisha buowa, Bingikala muvuishe or bu ditekemena dianyi, bingikala musanke bualu bua bubanji buanyi buakadi bunene, bingikala mumone diba hakatemadi, bikala mutshima wanyi muteyibue mu busokoko, bualu ebu kabidi buakadi kuikala tshilumbu tshibi tshidi balumbuluishi ne bua kukengesha bahidi ba Nzambi, Bingikala musanke bualu bua dibutuka dia muntu wakankina, tshiakuitabusha bua mukana muanyi muenze bualu bubi bikala bantu ba mu ntenta wanyi kabayi bambilangane ne, Muenyi kakalala mu musesu butuku, Bingikala mubuikile malu mabi anyi bu mu tshilele tshia bantu, bualu bua nakatshina tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu, Nakadi kusua bua umue ikaleku bua kungunvuileye
Bonso bakamanyeye ne bakashi bakadi bafume ku Galela bamulonda bakadi bimanyine ha bule, batangile malu â
Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi, diamba ne, Diambedi tshiyi muanji kukufuanyikisha munda mua mamu webe nakakumanya, Mu diba adi nakamba hanyi ne, Aka, Mukelenge Yehowa
Wakabenzela nunku, wakabasungila mu tshianza tshia Bena Isalele, bua bobo kababashihi
Nanku mukalenga awu ne ndelanganyi yende, nebashale mu bukalenga matuku a bungi, balombola bena Izrayele
Pashishe, Moshe kutuluka ku mukuna, muikale ne mabue abidi a mikenji mu bianza, mafunda emu ne emu

Ne bobo nebaluangane nvita ne Muana wa Mukoko, ne Muana wa Mukoko neabahite bukole, bualu bua yeye udi Mukelenge wa bakelenge ne Nfumu wa banfumu; ne bantu badi n andi, babikidibue, ne basungidibue, ne ba kueyemena, nebahite bukole kabidi
Pawaye mulale, kulotaye tshilota
Bantu batungula nansha babidi nansha basatu bakamutangila ha mbelu
Yesu wakabakonka ne, Nuakunyua malu â onso, anyi
Nenuikale ku mbelu kua ntenta wa kusambakena munya ne butuku tô matuku muanda mutekete, nutumikile dî dia Yehowa bua kanufu bienu, bualu bua Yehowa wakangambila nunku
Mukashi kai, bikaleye ne mpalata Hamumoneye, neabikile balunda bandi ne bena mutumba n andi, neabambile ne, Nusanke n anyi, bua nakumona mpalata wakadi mujimine
Nudi bamanye mushindu utuvua mu Ejipitu, ne mushindu utuvua bapitshile mu matunga a bisamba bionsu bivua mu njila

Nakunvua dî difuma mu diulu, bu dî dia mai a muenji a bungi ne bu dî dia mukungulu munene; ne dî dinakunvua diakadi bu dia bimbi ba nkombe bimba ne nkombe yabo; ne badi bimba bu musambu muhia muhia ku mpala kua nkuasa wa butumbi, ne ku mpala kua bifukibue binai bidi ne muoyo ne bakulu; ne kakuakadi muntu wakamanya mua kuyila musambu eu, anu bantu aba tshishikula tshimue ne mbombo inai ne binunu binai, bobo mene bakasumbibua mu ba ha buloba

Wakatuala bintu bimpe bionso bia mu bibutshilu bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne bia mu nsubu wa mukelenge; wakakosa bintu bia or bionso bituha bituha biakenza Solomo, mukelenge wa Isalele, mu ntempelo wa Yehowa, bu muakamba Yehowa
Mvidi Mukulu, wewe ke udi mufuke bintu bionsu, mubipeshe muoyi
Nakatangila nyama wa luonji ne bakelenge ba ha buloba, ne bena nvita babo, badisangisha bua kuluanganabo ne yeye wakadi ushikama ha nyima ba kabalu, ne kudi bena nvita bandi
Nunku diha edi diakula n adi muhika webe mukashi kudi mukelenge wanyi difidibue kudi bansongalume badi ne mukelenge wanyi

Bua badi benza nunku kabena bakuatshila Mukelenge wetu Kilisto mudimu, kadi badi bakuatshila anu mafu abo mudimu; ne bua mei abo a lubombo ne a kutumbisha n au bantu hatuhu badi badinga mitshima ya badi kabai badimuke
Bualu mudi dituku difundile tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja Nangila anyi
Dî diakakudimuka muntu, diakuikala munkatshi muetu tshituha, diakadi diule tente ne ngasa ne bulelela; tuakumona butumbi buandi, buakadi bu bua muana umuehele udi mulela kudi Tatu wandi
Bena Emi ke bavua badianjila kuasa mu ditunga dia Are
Neahanduke hashiheye tshihungidi tshiakahungeye, anyi

Yeye neangate nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo ne mitshi ya cèdre ne bintu bikunze kunzû ne mabeshi a hisopa, nealue bintu ebi ne nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo mu mashi a nyunyu wakashihabo ha mutu ha mai adi ahueka, yeye neamiamine mashi ham bidi ha muena nsudi udiye musue kulengesha misangu muanda mutekete, neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu udi muakane, nealekele nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo mu tshisuku
Yeye wakandamuna ne, Bulelela, Eliya udi ulua, nealongolole bintu bionso bu muakadibi diambedi; kadi meme ndi nuambila ne, Eliya wakamana kulua, kabakamumanya, bakamuenzela bualu buakasuabo

Adi atamba buloba bule ku tshidikishilu tshiau, Biahileye mu nshila, biakuateye muntu mu lukanu, Bualu bua yeye udi mumanye bantu badi ne mashimi; Kadi muntu udi kayi ne meji neahete lungenyi, Biwafila mutshima webe kudi Nzambi, Bikala bualu bubi mu tshianza tshiebe, ubûmushe kule; kuitabushi bua malu mabi ikale mu ntenta webe

Moaba wakushikama talalâ, kayi ne ntatu, ku buana buandi tô ne mpindiu, Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, mu matuku alualua nentume basendeki kudiye, nebamusendeke, nebahongolole bintu bidi mu milondo yandi, nebashihe milondo yandi bihese
Balaka wakambila Belâma ne, Tshiakakusengelela bua kulua kundi, anyi
Hakabalabo nunku, monai, Yonatana ne muambudi wa ngabu wandi kabakadiku

Nenufume ku nsubu yenu ne mitanda ya mampa ibidi ya kunyukula, milamba ne bituha bibidi bia dikumi bia épha ya bukula bubotesha busangisha ne luevene, ebi mbintu bihuola bia diambedi bifila kudi Yehowa

Wewe neubale bidimu bia kubanda kua buloba muanda mutekete, bidimu muanda mutekete misangu muanda mutekete, neubale nunku bidimu muanda mutekete bia kubanda kua buloba misangu muanda mutekete tô ne ku bidimu makumi anai ne tshitema
Yeye wakabayisha mu bitendelelu biabo, buonso buabo bakadi bamutumbisha
Solomo wakakokesha Bena Isalele bonso mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi anai
Yeye wakumukaku, wakaya ku Betele: hakadiye uya mu nshila, bana ba balume bakaluhuka mu musoko, bakamuseka, bakamuambila ne, Banda biebe, muena lubala
Bantu badi kule nebalue, nebenze mudimu wa kuasa ntempelo wa Yehowa, nenumanye ne, Yehowa wa misumba wakuntuma kunudi
Elisha wakaya ku Gilegala kabidi, tshiole tshiakadi mu buloba
Bidimu abi nkama inayi ne makumi asatu bikumbana, dituku dia tshivulukilu, bisamba bionsu bia bena Izrayele kupatuka mu Ejipitu balondangane bimpe mu milongu
Yeye wakalua, wakakukuila mukelenge Solomo

Mu dituku dia muanda mutekete bana balume ba ngombe muanda mutekete, ne bimpanga bibidi ne bana balume ba mikoko dikumi ne banai ba tshidimu tshimue badi kabayi ne tshilema, ne milambu yabi ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua, ku bana balume ba ngombe ne ku bimpanga ne ku bana ba mikoko bu bungi buai bu mudi mukenji wamba; ne mpumbu wa mbushi bu mulambu wa kunubuikidila n au bubi, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bukula ne ya bintu bidibo banua
Bana muanda matekete ba Muena Yuda dina diandi Sekua, muakuidi mimene wa Nzambi, mbakadi benza nunku
Muntu webe udi musue anu bua kusabuka Yadene ne mukelenge; mukelenge udi ne bua kunfuta difutu bunene nunku bualu kai
Bakuidi bakalua ne mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa mu muaba wau wa tshijila wa mu nsubu, ku muaba mutambe wa tshijila muinshi mua mahuahua a bakeluba
Ku nyima kuandi Hananya, muana wa Shelemeya, ne Hanuna, muana muisambombo wa Salafa, bakalongolola tshituha tshikuabo
Bua muanda eu muntu nealekele tatu wandi ne mamu wandi, nealamate mukashi wandi, bubidi buabo nebalue mubidi umue

Udi uhita bukole ne udi ulama midimu yanyi tô ne kunshikidilu, nemuhe bukokeshi ha mutu ha bisamba bia bende; ne yeye neabakokeshe ne dikombo dia tshiamu tshifike, bu mudi bifuadi bia mufumbi bidi bitshibuluka bihesa bihesa; bu munakangata kabidi bukokeshi kudi Tatu wanyi
Hashishe wakajuka, wakalonda Eliya, wakamukuatshila mudimu
Bantu abu kupitshila luseke lua ku mikuna, kufika mu tshibandabanda tshia Eshekole, kutshitentekela

Mose wakangata argent ya buhikudi bua bantu bakahita Bena Lewi bungi; yeye wakangata nshekele kudi ban a bute ba Bena Isalele bu tshinunu tshimue ne nkama isatu ne makumi asambombo ne itanu, bu nshekele udibo bafile mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu
Bakahingana ku malu mabi akenza bankambua babo, mbakabenga kunvua mei anyi; bakulonda nzambi mikuabo bua kuyikuatshilabo mudimu
Hakenzeye malu a kukema munkatshi muabo kabakalekela bantu ne baye, anyi
Hakatuteye ha mai, mai akahanduluka eku ne eku; Elisha wakasabuka

Tuetu tudi bantu bafukibue bu nuenu, tudi banuvuile ne lumu luimpe, bua nuenu nulekele malu â a hatuhu, nulonde Nzambi wa muoyo, wakafuka diulu ne buloba ne mai manene ne bintu bionso bidimu; mu bikondo bia ku nyima yeye wakitabusha bua bisamba bionso bia bende biende mu nshila yakadi mitshima yabo misue
Muntu udi udia munyinyi wandi neuvuwe bilulu, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo, ne mundi udi utuala mubidi wandi mufue neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Wakananukila kumusengelela ne yeye wakângata
Ke Maweja Nangila kunuambila ne: Ndi Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wenu, udi munupatule ku bupika mu Ejipitu
Balume aba bakamuambila ne, Netudie mioyo yetu bua kukufuila
Neikale muena tshibawu, bualu mmubenge miaku yanyi, munyangakaje mikenji yanyi

Mukalu wa buhianyi buabo wakadi Solea ne Eshetaola ne Ishemesha, ne Shalabina ne Ayalona ne Yitela, ne Elona ne Timena ne Ekelona, ne Eleteke ne Gibetona ne Bâlata, ne Yehuda ne Bene belaka ne Gata limona, ne Me yâkona ne Lakona ne mukalu udi hehi ne Yopa
Yehowa wakunvua

Mu ditu ku adi diodimue Noa ne bana bandi, Sheme ne Hama ne Yafete, bana ba Noa, ne mukashi wa Noa, ne bakashi basatu ba bana bandi bakabuela mu buatu, bobo ne nyama yonso ya mushindu ne mushindu ne bimuna bionso bia mushindu ne mushindu, ne bintu bionso budi bidikoka hanshi bia mushindu ne mushindu, ne nyunyu yonso ya mushindu ne mushindu, tshionso tshidi ne mahuahua
Katataka, Yehowa, tuakulua ne bintu biakaboba diambedi mu buloba buwakutuha

Kadi nakabenzela malu â bualu bua dina dianyi, bua kadihendibu ku mesu kua ba mu bisamba bia bantu, kuakadibo bashikama, bantu mene bakadi bantangila hanakadimuenesha kudi Bena Isalele mu dituku dinakabahatula mu Ejipitu
Kanubatshinyi, bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi unuluila nvita
Bana ba Bigewai binunu bibidi ne makumi asambombo ne muanda mutekete
Hashishe nakela mukenji bua tuetu kujila bia kudia ku musulu wa Ahawa, bua tuetu kudihuekesha ku mesu kua Nzambi wetu, ne bua yeye atuleshe ne bana betu bakese ne bintu bietu nshila mululame
Mikoko yanyi idi yunvua dî dianyi, ndi muimanye, idi indonda; ndi nyiha muoyo wa tshiendelele; kayena ifua tshiendelele, kakuena mukuabo udi winyenga mu tshianza tshianyi
Butumbi buikale kudiye tshiendelele

Munkatshi mua bisamba ebi kanuena nusangana ha kuikisha, anyi kua kutalasha munda mua makasa enu; Yehowa neanutumineku mitshima izakala ne mesu a buowa ne kusamina kua muoyo; nenuikale ne mpata bua mioyo yenu; nenuikale ne buowa munya ne butuku, kanuena nuikala ne ditekemena dia mioyo yenu
Pashishe muntu awu neateke tshisaka tshia biakudia atshi panshi kumpala kua nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu, adiele panshi bua kukukuila Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Mu matuku onso a tshijila tshiandi kabateki dihaya ha mutu n andi, neikale mundi wa tshijila tô ne hashikisheye matuku adiye musue kubijidila kudi Yehowa; nsuki ya ha mutu n andi neyikale mile
Chronicles Yoshiya wakadi ne bidimu muanda mukulu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi asatu ne tshimue
Ke muaba uvua Abrahame musumbe kudi Efrone, muena Iti, bua muaba wa kujika bafue awu wikale wende
Dibadika Milambu ya bia pa madimi Maweja Nangila kutuma Moshe bua kumanyisha bena Izrayele ne: Panuafika mu ditunga dindi musue kunupa bua nuenu kusomba, nungoshile nyama mijima bua kundambula

Muntu yonso udi ulenga tshianza ham bidi ha bintu ebi neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo; muntu yonso udi utuala tshituha tshia mubidi mufue wa bintu ebi, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo
Bialua muntu kunudi kai ulua ne diyisha edi, kanumuitabushi mu nsubu, kanumuedi muoyo; bualu bua udi umuela muoyo udi muabanyanganyi n andi wa midimu yandi mibi

Tubadi ne tubinadi, twa beena mwaabo ne twa basalayi, tudi tulonda ndondu ya pankatshi pa matunga idi ditunga ditaba mu njila mululame, mêyi, mapangadika maludiki, padiwo kâyi abengangana ne mêyi ne mikandu ne kabukulu kadi kafila bulongama bwa bantu bônso ne bibidilu bia mulowu
Pashishe mukalu awu udi upitshila ku Zifrone, ushikidila mu Ashare Enane
Nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe, bualu mvua munange muntu wanyi Abrahame
Kadi nenshale bianyi ne bantu binunu muanda mutekete mu Isalele, badi kabayi banze kutua binu biabo hanshi kudi Bâla, badi kabayi banze kuluangana n andi mishiku

Bakuabo badi bumusha mikalu; Badi banyenga nyama wa mpunda wa muan a nshiya; Badi basesuisha hakengi mu nshila ku bukole; Bulelela, bu mudi nyama ya mpunda ya mu tshisuku yendakana mu tshihela, Badi bahuolela bimuna bia kudia bidi bishala mu budimi, Badi balala butaka butuku bujima kabayi ne tshilulu, Badi baboleshibua ku nvula ya ku mikuna, Bakuabo badi bumusha muan a nshiya ku dibele, Nunku bahele badi bendakana butaka; badi ne nzala, kadi badi batuala bisumbu bia blé

Wakadi muangate ntalanta umue wakalua, wakamba ne, Mukelenge, nakamanya ne, Wewe udi muena tshinyangu, utu wahuola biudi kui mukune, utu wasangisha biudi kui mutangadishe; nakatshina, nakaya, nakasokoka ntalanta webe mu buloba, tshintu tshiebe katshitshi
Azaya, muakuidi munene, ne bakuidi bonso bakamutangila ne, monai, yeye wakadi ne nsudi ha mpala handi, bakamûmusha lukasa; yeye kabidi wakahatuka lukasa, bualu bua Yehowa wakamana kumukengesha
Kumuambilabu ne: bimuna bia bena Izrayele kabiena bifua nansha tshimue
Pikala bantu aba bafue lufu lua patupu mudi bantu bonsu bafue, nanku nenujadike ne: Maweja Nangila kena muntume to

Bilembi bia minyinyi ya mu mai nebimane kukala kua musulu, ku Enegedi tô ne ku Ene gelayima, nebelemu tuhamba tuabo; minyinyi idimu neyikale ya mishindu ya bungi, neyikumbane ya bungi, bu mudi minyinyi ya mu Mai Manene
Luke Mu matuku au Kaisa Augusto wakela mukenshi ne, Bafundishe mena a ba ha buloba bonso
Mvidi Mukulu udi ulaya Moshe ne: nempikule Izrayele Mvidi Mukulu kuambila Moshe kabidi ne: Meme ndi Maweja Nangila
Bualu bua dituka adi nedilue kudi bonso badi bashikame ha buloba buonso

Nunku badi babikila matuku a ne, Pulima, bu mudi dina dia Pû, Nunku bua mei onso akatuabo mu mukanda eu, ne bua malu onso akatangilabo ku mesu ne bua malu onso akadi abakuata, Bena Yuda bakahunga dî diabo bualu buabo ne bua bana babo baledibue ne bua bantu bonso bakalamata kudibo ne, Tuetu katuena tuhanga kuvuluka matuku â abidi bu muakafundabo, ne mu tshikondo tshiakasungulabo, ku tshidimu ku uhidimu; netuvuluke matuku â ne netualame ku bikondo bionso kudi ba mu meku onso ne ba ku nseke yonso ne ba mu misoko yonso; matuku â a Pulima kaena mua kuhanga munkatshi mua Bena Yuda nansha kuvuluka kuau kudi tunkanunuina tuabo tshiendelele
Bualu bua nudi nulesha muntu lutulu, bianuvuisheye bahika, biadieye bintu bienu, bianukuateye lukole, biadibandisheye, bianukumeye ku mesu
Au mmeku a Bena Lewi ku nsubu ya batatu abo
Nunku muanjelo wakadi uyikila n anyi wakangandamuna ne, Kuena mumanye bintu ebi, anyi
Bantu bakamusangana hakadiye wangula nkunyi, bakalua n andi kudi Mose ne Alona ne kudi tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele
Bakamuambila ne, Mona, bakole makumi atanu badi munkatshi mua bantu bebe badi kunoko; ludi tukusengelela ne

Bienzedi bia Yalobama bikuabo biakenzeye ne bukole buandi ne nvita yandi, ne muakanyengeye Damaseke ne Hamata, misoko ya Yuda, wakayihingisha mu bianza bia Bena Isalele, kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele, anyi
Hatuakalua mu Makedonia mene, mibidi yetu kayakadi ne dikisha, kadi tuakadi tutatshishibua ku nseke yonso; nvita yakadi ham bidi, ne ditshina diakadi munda muetu

Mutentekedi wakamba ne, Yeye wakafika kudibo, kadi kena uhingana; tshiendeshilu tshia dikalu tshidi tshifuanangana ne tshiendeshilu tshia Yehu, muana wa Nimishi, bualu bua yeye udi wendesha dikalu lukasa lukasa
Hatemesha Alona minda dilolo, yeye neoshe musenga wa manananshi bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa ku bikondo bienu bionso
Ntuadile mbuji ibidi mimpe ya nkungulu, bua ndambile tatuebe munyinyi mushindu udiye musue

Nenkukebe ne mutshima wanyi mujima; Nakulama dî diebe mu mutshima wanyi, Wewe Yehowa, usankishibue, Mishiku yanyi idi ilondela bantu Ndi ne disanka mu dilonda dia mei ebe, Nengelangane meji bua mikenji yebe, Nendisankishe mu mikenji yebe mifunda, Wenzele muntu webe malu mimpe makumbane, Utabashe mesu anyi, bua meme kumona Ndi muenyi ha buloba ebu; Muoyo wanyi udi muhandike bua dijinga dindi n adi Wewe udi ubela badi badisue, badi bedibue mulau, Ungumushile dihetu ne kulengulula, Hashikama baminyampala bangelela tshifufu, Mei ebe awakammanyisha adi disanka dianyi, Muoyo wanyi udi ulamata ku luhuishi; Nakakulondela bienzedi bianyi, ne wewe wakungitaba

Bansongalume bakadi bakola n andi bakamuambila ne, Ukudimune bantu aba bakabambila di adi ne, Tatu webe wakatuvudisha tshikokedi tshiakanemesha bujitu, kadi wewe utuheheshetshi; wewe ubambile ne, Kantengenene kanyi nekahite tshimono tshia tatu anyi bunene
Nzambi wakamba nunku ne, Tunkanunuina tuandi netuikale mu buloba bua bende, bobo nebababueshe mu buhika, nebabenzele bibi bidimu nkama inai
Kadi yeye kakunyua dî diandi; kadi bualu bua yeye wakamuhita bukole, yeye wakamukuata ku bukole, wakalala n andi

Nengambule maboko a mukelenge wa Babulona mulu, kadi maboko a Palô nealembelele hanshi; nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa hanateka muele wanyi wa nvita mu bianza bia mukelenge wa Babulona, ne hawololeye ha buloba bua Ejipitu
Bantu bakadi binunu dikumi ne bisambombo, ne mulambu wa Yehowa wakadi bantu makumi asatu ne babidi

Nzambi wakamba ne, Tuenze muntu ne tshifuanyikishi tshietu mufuanangane n etu, balue bakokeshi ba minyinyi ya mu mai manene ne ba nyunyu ya mulu, ne ba bimuna, ne ba buloba buonso, ne ba tshintu tshionso tshidi tshidikoka hanshi
Kadi, nansha biobi bikale nanku, utshinke bua kujadika muaba udi tshisamba tshionsu mua kupeta

Kadi baka lua tuhalai, katuakabasangana mu nsubu wa lukanu; tuakahingana, tuakamba ne, Tuakusangana nsubu wa lukanu muinshila bimpe ne balami bimane ku bibi; kadi hatuakunzulula, katuakusanganamu muntu
Kabidi nenukuate ditunga dia Kenaane, didibu banupesha kudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu
Bualu ndelanganyi yonsu ya bena Izrayele neikale imba anu musambu ewu
Bua bituikala ne muoyo, tudi ne muoyo bua Mukelenge; bituafua, tufuafua bua Mukelenge; nunku, bituikala ne muoyo, anyi bituafua, tudi ba Mukelenge
Abinê wakayikila ne bakulu ba mu Isalele, wakabambila ne, Mu matuku akashala ku nyima nuenu nuakasua Davidi bua kuikaleye mukelenge ku mutu kuenu
Nennanukile kukuata buakane buanyi ne tshiena mkulekela nansha
Ha mutu handi hakimana baselafima; Bakananukila kuelangana mei, bambilangana ne, Bishimikidi bia ku mbelu kua nsubu biakakanka bua dî dia wakadi wela lubila, ne nsubu wakûla tente ne muishi wa kahia

Nuenu bamane kungoshila milambu ya dituku dionsu, ne ya dituku dia kumpala kua ngondu, pamue ne milambu ya tshibidilu ya bukula ne ya maluvu a mvinyo, nenundambule kabidi milambu yonsu eyi, bua dipembu dimpe dia milambu ya kuosha eyi dinsankishe
Udi ne tshinyi mu tshianza tshiebe

Bakambila mukelenge ne, Muntu wakatushiha, wakabelela tshifufu bua kutûmusha munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bimpe ufile bana bandi muanda mutekete mu bianza bietu, tuetu netubowe ku mesu kua Yehowa mu Gibea wa Shaula wakadi musungula kudi Yehowa
Diba adi mukajebe Sara neikale mumane kulela muana wa balume
Kadi ku nyima babidi bakalua, bakamba ne, Muntu eu wakamba ne, Ndi mumanye mua kubumbula ntempelo wa Nzambi ne mua kumuihata kabidi matuku asatu
Yakobe kushala nkayende dishiya
Hashishe Davidi wakabikila Siba, muhika wa Shaula, wakamuambila ne, Nakafila bintu bionso, biakadi kudi Shaula ne kudi ba mu nsubu wandi bonso, kudi muana wa mukelenge webe
Bakamba ne, Katuena ne bia kudia bihite mitanda itanu ne mishiha ibidi, anu bituaya kusumba bia kudia bia bantu aba bantu
Nanku anu Maweja Nangila nkayende kubanyoka, kubabutula bonsu nkong
Hashishe bakelenge ba Bena Peleshete bakalua kudiye ne milemu mibishe muanda mutekete yakadi kayiyi mianze kûma, ne yeye wakamusuika n ai
Bayidi dikumi ne umue bakaya mu Galela, ku mukuna wakabambila Yesu
Nunku Sadoka muakuidi, ne Natana muprofete, ne Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, ne Bena Kelete ne Bena Pelete bakaya, bakabandisha Solomo ha nyima ha mpunda wa mukelenge Davidi, bakaya n andi ku Gihona
Bana kumuandamuna ne: Mulombodi awu uvua mutuele amu kutuela nkonku ya bungi, utuebeja ne: Tatuenu utshidi ne muoyi anyi
Kadi hakatshiabu, Nzambi wakatuma tshishi tshiakadia mudiantondo, wakafubidila
Bimenga bionso bia Bena Lewi munkatshi mua buhianyi bua Bena Isalele biakadi bimenga makumi anai ne muanda mukulu ne miaba yabi ya ku matshika

Abalama wakambila mukelenge wa Sodoma ne, Nakamana kubisha tshianza tshianyi bua kuditshiha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu, mufuki wa diulu ne buloba, ne, Tshiena ngangata nansha nshinga nansha muonshi wa bisabata nansha kantu kebe kamue, bua wewe kuambi ne, Nakavuisha Abalama bubanji
Mikenji idi ilesha Bujitu bua Bena Bintu Biatuta muntu muhika wandi mulume anyi muhika wandi mukashi ku disu, ne biafuadi, yeye neamumushe ku butaka buandi bualu bua disu diandi
Buonso buabo bakadi ne mabedi makole bakamûnguila bualu bua kubalengeye bianza

Nakatangila lungenyi lua nunku muinshi mua diba, luakunkemesha, luakumueneka bu bualu bunene kundi: Musoko mukese wakadiku, anu bantu banya banya bakadimu; mukelenge munene wakalua kuluisha, wakautshintshimika ne wakasa bibumba; bakasanganamu muena meji muhele; bua lungenyi luandi yeye wakasungila musoko, kadi kakuakadi muntu wakavuluka muhele eu
Nzambi wakendesha Danyele diakalengele ne luse ku mesu kua kahita ka bantu batungula
Kulondakajabu Yakobe mu njila matuku muanda mutekete
Nzambi wakamuambila ne, Dina diebe nYakoba, kabakubikidi ne Yakoba kabidi, nebakubikile ne, Isalele
Kadi Bena Isalele kabena bakuluila; bualu bua kabena bunvua di dianyi; bualu bua bonso ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele badi ne mitu mikole bu dibue ne mitshima ya tshitshu
Kupeshaye muanabu yonsu tshilamba tshimpe
Ebu mbuhianyi bua Bena Zebuluna ku meku abo, bimenga ne misoko yabi
Nzambi wakamba ne, Bulelela, nengikale n ebe, nenkuhe tshimanyinu etshi tshidi tshilesha ne nakukutuma hawahatula bantu badi mu Ejipitu, nenutendelele Nzambi ha mukuna eu
Badi batendelela mvidie eyi mushindu mubi udi ukuatshisha bundu
Yehowa wakambila Yoshua ne, Tangisha difuma didi mu tshianza tshiebe ku Ai; bualu bua nengufile mu tshianza tshiebe
Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Diba nedilue, didiku katataka mene, diunvua bafue dî dia Muana wa Nzambi; badi bunvua nebikale ne muoyo

Bualu bua ba bungi badi benda, banakanuambila malu abo misangu ya bungi, ne bandi nuambila katataka ne binsonshi ku mesu ne, Badi bena lukuna lua mutshi mutshiamakane wa Kilisto; kunshikidilu kuabo didi dibutuka, nzambi wabo ndifu diabo, butumbi buabo budi mu bundu buabo; badi belangana meshi a malu a ha buloba
Kabena bamanye mua kufua bundu kabidi, bakadifila ku masandi bua kuenzabo malu a bundu onso ne lukuka lukole
Badi mwa kukanyika bantu bwa kwenzabo busalayi mu mushindu udi mêyi a ditunga mafunda
Meme kutua binu panshi bua kuela Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa mfumuanyi Abrahame, tuasakidila

Monai, Mukelenge Yehowa neankuatshishe; Muntu kai wa munkatshi muenu udi utshina Yehowa, Ahu nuenu bonso badi batemesha kahia, Isaiah Telejai matshu enu kundi, nuenu badi balonda buakane, Tangilai kudi Abalahama tatu wenu, Bualu bua Yehowa wakusamba Siona, Unvuai dî dianyi, nuenu bantu banyi; Buakane buanyi nebusemene ha buihi tshituha tshihi, Bandishai mesu enu mu diulu, Nungunvuile, nuenu badi bamanye buakane, Bualu bua tshibayibayi netshibadie bu tshivualu, Tabala, tabala, udiluatshishe bukole, Kenguewe wakakosa Lahaba Kenguewe, anyi, wakakamisha mai manene, Ka bantu bakuhikudibue kudi Yehowa nebalukilemu, Meme, meme mene, nyeye udi unusumba; Wewe nnganyi bua kuhila Yehowa Mufuki webe muoyo, Muena lukanu udi mukoke nyima neasululuke ku nkanu lubilu; Bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa Nzambi webe, Nakuteka mei anyi mukana muebe, Tabala, tabala, Kakuena umue wa munkatshi Malu â abidi akukukuata Bana bebe ba balume bakufua tshihuka Nunku unvua bualu ebu, wewe muena dikenga, Mukelenge webe Yehowa, Nzambi webe, udi wakuila bantu bandi mu tshilumbu tshiabo, Nenduteke mu tshianza tshia badi bakukengesha, bakukuambila ne, Isaiah Tabala, tabala, wewe Siona, Umuke mu dinfuenkenya, uditutule ham bidi hebe; Bua Yehowa udi wamba dî ne, Bakanuhana tshianana, nebanuhikule kabayi banuhikula ne argent

Nzambi wakamudimusha mu tshilota, wakayila mu luseke lua Galela, wakalua mu musoko dina diau Nazaleta, wakashikamamu, buala bua kushikisha dî diakamba baprofete ne, Matayo Mu matuku au Yone Mubanji wakalua wambila bantu mu tshihela tshia Yudaya ne, Kudimunai mitshima yenu; bualu bua bukelenge bua mu diulu budi hehi
Bumfumu bwa kabukulu budi ne dikanyika dia kukolesha bumwe ne dikongangana dia ditunga
Andamukai bua kunvua kubela kuanyi
Ndi mua kufuila mu njila
Kutedi dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi webe, tshitelatela, bua Yehowa kena ubingisha muntu udi utela dina diandi tshitelatela
Bualu bua nakasanka bikole hakalua bana betu banmanyisha bua bushua buebe, ne bu mûdi wenda mu bushua
Bana ba balume ba Esheke muan abo: Ulama muan a bute wandi, ne Yeusha muana muibidi ne Elifelete muisatu
Hakafika dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa kumudilu, bakashikisha malu a balume bonso bakadi babake bakashi ba bende
Nunku Davidi wakabika ne dinda dionso, yeye ne bantu bandi, bua kuhingana ku buloba bua Bena Peleshete
Bualu bua nembabuikidile mibi yabo, ne tshiena nvuluka malu mabi abo kabidi
Yehowa wakayikila ne Mose mpala ha mpala bu mudi muntu uyikila ne mulunda wandi

Psalms Bulelela, Nzambi udi muimpe mu bienzedi biandi kudi Bena Isalele, Kadi mbu mundi ngamba bualu buanyi, makasa anyi akamba kusesuka Bualu bua nakadi mukuatshile bantu badi badisue mukau, Bualu bua kabena ne kanyinganyinga ha kufua kuabo; Kabena habo ne makenga adi bantu bakuabo n au, Nunku kudisua kudi bu lukanu ludi lujingila mu nshingu yabo, Mesu abo adi atuntumuka bualu bua mafuta abo, Badi babuidia bantu, mu bubi buabo badi bamba mei a kukengesha n ai bakuabo; Badi babandisha mei a mukana muabo tô ne mulu, Bua malu â bantu bandi badi bahingana kudibo; Badi bamba ne, Monai, aba mbantu babi; Bulelela, nakalengesha mutshima wanyi hatuhu, Bualu bua dinda tô ne ku dilolo nakukumibua, Bu meme muambe ne, Nengakule nunku, Hanakela meji bua kumanya bualu ebu, tô ne hanakabuela mu muaba wa tshijila wa Nzambi, Bulelela, wewe udi ubateka mu miaba ya busenu; Mona mudibo babutuke kabutu mu katuha ka diba
Kadi Yishemaele ne bantu bandi muanda mukulu bakahanduka mu bianza bia Yohanana, muana wa Netanya, bakaya kudi Bena Amona
Nzambi wakamba ne, Etshi tshidi tshimanymu tshia tshihungidi tshindi nteka hankatshi hetu ne bintu bionso bidi n enu to ne tshiendelele
Anu dituku adi, lubuebue lua Makpela luvua mu budimi bua Efrone, luseke ludi diba dipatukila lua Mambre, kushala mu dina dia Abrahame, kabidi ne mitshi yonsu ivua mikuna mu budimi amu
Nunku, mukelenge wanyi, ndi nkutendekena bua kungunvuila; ndi nkusengelela bua kulomba kuanyi kufike kûdi, bua wewe kumpingashi mu nsubu wa Yonatana secrétaire, bua tshifuidimu
Mu tshituha tshia Bena Isalele nenuangate umue kudi makumi atanu, wa bantu ne wa ngombe ne wa nyama wa mpunda ne wa mikoko, nubifile kudi Bena Lewi badi balama nsubu wa Yehowa
Wangate manyi adibo bela ha mutu, wamiamine ha nsubu wa tshitendelelu ne ha bintu bionso bidimu, ujidile nsubu ne bintu biandi bionso, neikale mujidila
Moshe kuitaba bua kusomba kua muntu awu
Kadi kakuvua muntu nansha umue uvua mua kumujinguluila bilota abi to
Mulau wikale kudi muntu udi ukonka tatu ne, Udi ulela tshinyi
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Gada, Eleyasafa muana mulume wa Deuele
Bena Isalele bakadila kudi Yehowa, bualu bua yeye wakadi ne makalu a biamu nkama tshitema, yeye wakatamba kukengesha Bena Isalele bidimu makumi abidi
Yeye wakakolesha mutshima wandi, wakasa lumbu luakadi lushimbuka, wakajadika bibumba ne lumbu luakadi ku mpenge, wakakolesha Milo mu musoko wa Davidi, wakatula bintu bia nvita ne ngabu bia bungi
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba dî edi
Luka Yesu wakafika mu Yeleko, wakadi uhita
Pilato wakasua kuenzela tshisumbu tshia bantu biakane, wakabalekelela Balaba; hakakumeye Yesu, wakamufila bua kumushihabo ku mutshi mutshiamakane
Yeye wakamukonka ne, Bualu kai buakakuambila Yehowa
Bu muakantuma Tatu udi ne muoyo, ne bu mundi ne muoyo bualu bua Tatu, nunku wandia meme neikale ne muoyo bualu buanyi
Bakatumina mukelenge wa Moaba ba messager muomumue, kadi yeye kakitabusha; ne Bena Isalele bakashikama mu Kadesha
Bualu bua nakumutangila ku mutu kua mabue, Udi mumanye mua kubala bana ba Yakoba nganyi
Kanuangatshi tshibombo tshia kuya n atshi mu nshila, kanuangatshi bikowelu bibidi ne bisabata bikuabo ne tshihangu, bualu bua muena mudimu udi ne buakane bua kuheta bidia biandi
Yakasungila Samalea mu tshianza tshianyi, anyi

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu matuku au hanuavulangana ne hanuakumbana ba bungi mu buloba, kabena batela kabidi mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa, kabena belangana meji bualu buau, kabena bauvuluka, kabena baya kudiu bua kukeba lungenyi, kabena bawenza kabidi
Wakalukila, wakangata ngombe ya ku tshikokedi, wakayishiha, wakatumpa minyinyi yai ne mutshi wa tshikokedi, wakayila bantu bandi, bobo bakadia
Nanku dishipula dia ntete mu ditunga dienu, neditungunuke too ne ku matuku a dinowa dia tumuma tua mvinyo
Eyowa, bena Izrayele, nudi balengulula Maweja Nangila, mulami wenu uvua munupeteshe muoyi
Mvua mukuenzele mudimu bua kusela Rakele
Netuambe ne, Bantu ba bisamba bia bende, bakadi kabai balonda buakane, bakaheta buakane, buakane mene budi bua ku ditabusha
Samuele wakamba ne, Bawakadi bu muntu muhuekele ku mesu kuebe, kabena bakuteka ku mutu kua bisamba bia Bena Isalele, anyi

Bualu bua hakambilabo bantu bonso mukenshi wonso kudi Mose, bu mudi mikenshi yamba, wakangata mashi a bana ba ngombe ne a mbushi bohamue ne mai ne miosa mikunze ne hisopa, ne wakamiamina mukanda muine, ne bantu bonso, wamba ne, Au adi mashi a tshihungidi tshiakanuelela Nzambi mukenshi bualu buatshi
Kadi bua nuenu kumupeta, anu nuenu bamukebe ne muoyi mujima ne bukole buenu buonsu
Nundeshe ndenalio
Bualu bua diambedi muana eu kayi muanze kumanya mua kubenga malu mabi ne mua kusungula malu makane, buloba bua bakelenge aba babidi baudi utamba kutshina nebushale dikolo
Nakamukudimuna dî ne, Ndi Muena Amaleka
Angatayi nansha nsongakaji yanyi ibidi eyi
Izake kutshinyika dina ne: Lukuna Sitna
Bua bualu ebu bunakukuambila, Mona, Yehowa udi hankatshi hetu n ebe tshiendelele
Tshibangidilu Yakobe kumvua bana ba Labane bamujana, bamba ne: Yakobe mmunyenge bubanji buonsu bua tatu
Ei mmikenji yakelela Yehowa Bena Isalele mukana mua Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai
Kadi hakahita bidimu makumi abidi ne bisatu bia bukelenge bua Yoasha, bakuidi kabakanza kulongolola miaba ei
Nutu nuenza bienzedi bia tatu wenu
Malu akadiku diambedi neikaleku; malu akenzabo diambedi nênjibue; kakuena tshintu tshihia tshihia muinshi mua diba
Kadi bobo bakalengulula di diandi, bakaya ku malu abo, mukuabo ku budimi buandi, mukuabo ku kuenda mushinga; banga bakakuata bantu ba mukelenge, bakabenzela bibi, bakabashiha

Kadi Yehowa wakambila Samuele ne, Kutangidi mpala wandi, anyi bule buandi, bualu bua meme nakamuhidia; Yehowa kena utangila bu mudi bantu batangila, bualu bua bantu badi batangila anu mubidi, kadi Yehowa udi utangila mu mutshima
Tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi tshidi bu musamu ku mutu wanyi; wakungela tshituha ne tshianza tshiandi tshia balume
Nebamanye ne, Ndi Yehowa
Muntu uvua moshe ngombe awu, neasukule kabidi bilamba biende, wowe mayi
Bantu Luse luebe lujalame ludi mua kuambibua mu lukita, anyi
Lakele wakamba ne, Nakasangana bibula bikole ne mukulu wanyi wa bakashi, nakumutamba bukole, wakamuidika dina ne, Nafatale
Hakamumoneye, wakalua n andi ku Antiokia
Badi bahanduka ku muele wa nvita nebaluhuke mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua kuhingana ku buloba bua Yuda, anu bantu banya banya mene
Yeye wakungambila ne, Ndi bianyi Yesu wa ku Nazaleta ûdi ukengesha
Teka tshianza pa kebe Pikala muntu mulekela bimuna biende binyange budimi bua bende, nansha mionji yende ya mvinyo, muena bimuna neapingajile muena budimi bimuma bilenga bia mu madimi ende
Yeye wakamuhabi, wakaya kudiye, ne mukashi wakimita difu kudiye
Bakumukamu, bakashikama dishiya dia mai a Ânona, mu tshihela tshidi ku butshika bua buloba bua Bena Amole, mai a Ânona adi ku butshika bua Moaba, hankatshi ha Moaba ne Bena Amole
Kanunyangishi dina dianyi dia tshijila, kadi nengikale mujidibue munkatshi mua Bena Isalele meme ndi Yehowa udi unujidila, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu bua kuikala Nzambi wenu meme ndi Yehowa
Kadi kubumushaye mu ditunga divua Izake
Wakabikila bena mabanza a mukelenge wandi bonso, wakebesha wa kumudilu ne, Udi ne dibanza dia mukelenge wanyi bungi munyi

Ne muanjelo unakatangila muimane ha mai manene ne ha buloba, wakabisha tshianza tshiandi tshia bukole mulu; wakaditshiha kudi udi ne muoyo tshiendelele, wakafuka diulu ne bintu bidimu, ne buloba ne bintu bidihu, ne mai manene ne bintu bidimu, ne, Kakuena dishanguluka kabidi; kadi mu matuku a dî dia muanjelo wa muanda mutekete, hadiye wamba kuela mpungi, mpadi bualu busokoka bua Nzambi bushika, bu mudi lumu luimpe luakambileye bahika bandi, baprofete
Badi Bafila Bintu Biabo Hashishe, tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele tshionso tshiakumuka ku mesu kua Mose
Uvuadike Arone bilamba biende bia tshijila
Bakulu bende kumukonka ne: Udi musue kushala mukalenga wetu, ututumina diyi anyi

Hashishe bantu bakuabo bakalua, bakambila Yehoshafata ne, Tshisumbu tshia bantu tshinene tshidi tshilua kûdi tshifuma ku Sulia dishiya dia dishiha dia Luehu; monai, tshitshidi ku Hazazona tamâ udi Ene gedi mene
Bubanji buonsu bua mfumuanyi Abrahame budi anu mu dina dia muanende awu
Dî diandi diakazakasha buloba tshikondo atshi, kadi katataka wakutulaya wamba ne, Musangu umue mukuabo kabidi meme nenzakashe, kembuloba nkayabu, kadi diulu kabidi
Bonso badi n anyi lukuna badi banungana hohamue bua bualu buanyi

Mu dituku dia muanda mutekete Nzambi wakadi mumane kushikisha mudimu wandi wakenzeye, yeye wakikisha dituku dia muanda mutekete ku mudimu wonso wakenzeye Nzambi wakavudishila dituku dia muanda mutekete disanka, wakadijidila, bualu bua yeye wakikisha dituku diadia ku mudimu wandi wonso wa kufuka ne kuenza
Nuenu nenudie mampa adi kayi ne luevene dituku adi bualu bua nakahatula bisumbu bienu mu buloba bua Ejipitu, nunku nenujidile dituku edi bu tshivulukidi tshienu tshiendelele
Batekemu mushete wa ndondu, baujika ne tshilamba tshilembeleja, bua kabaumonu kudi bantu to
Ashe neikale ne bintu bia kudia bia bungi, neavudishe bintu bia kudia bidi bitambe bilengele

Bualu bua bintu ebi bionso bidi bijimina nunku, bunudi n abu mbua kuikala bantu ba mushindu kai mu bienzedi bia tshijila ne bia Nzambi, hanudi nutekemena ne hanudi nuendeshe lukasa dilua dia dituku dia Nzambi
Kadi nuenu nuakenza bimpe hanuakadi n anyi ne buobumue mu dikenga dianyi
Yakoba wakambila Lakele ne, Ndi muan abo ne tatu ebe, ndi muana wa Lebeka, Lakele wakaya lubilu, wakamanyisha tatu andi
Bualu bua yeye wakalamata Yehowa; kakasesuka mu nshila wandi, kadi wakatumikila mikenji yandi yakambila Yehowa Mose
Meme Maweja Nangila, ndi ngamba ne: muntu wa kunudi nansha umue, kena mua kubuelela mukaji wa mulela wende mu nzubu
Ashê ikale ne tshituha tshimue tshituangane ne mukalu wa Dana, ku luseke lua esete tô ne ku luseke lua wesete
Hanuakuna bintu tshidimu tshia muanda mukulu, nenudie bintu bia diambedi biakadi bishale mu nsubu yenu, tô ne ku tshidimu tshia tshitema hanuahuola bintu, nenudie bintu bia diambedi biakadi bishale
Edi ndituku dia lumingu dia dikisha dienu, nujinge mu mitshima yenu, eu mmukenji kunudi tshiendelele
Badi bambula kabidi ne bilamba bia ku lupangu, ne tshilamba tshia mu mushiku wa lupangu
Mulume wandi udi mumanye mua kujadika kudi tshiha kuandi kuonso anyi mei andi onso, anyi udi mua kumusha malu au ne malu a hatuhu
Yeye wakitabusha Yehowa, ne Yehowa wakabala kuitabusha kuandi ne, Mbuakane buandi
Bakashiyaku mpingu yabo; Davidi wakela mukenji wandi, bakayosha ne kahia
Pandi nnufikila munda, nennyangakaje miaba inudi nulambuila mvidie yenu milambu
Wakakunyibua mu buloba buimpe, hehi ne mai a bungi, bua wowo wase matamba ne ukuame biau mamuma ne ulue muonshi mulengele
Hakatshia butuku, Yehowa wakatangila bisumbu bia Bena Ejipitu mu ditutu diakadi ne dinkenke dia kahia, wakabatshinyisha
Bakela lufu ne Muaba wa Bafue mu dishiha dia kahia
Bakumuka mu Litema, bakashikama mu Limona pelese
Hatshiatshia, bakamba hanshi kutoka, mukelenge wakajuka, wakaya lukasa ku buina bua ntambue
Muntu wa kapitene kakuabo ka masalayi lukama wakadi munanga kudi nfumu wandi, lufu luakadi lumutonde
Bana ba balume ba Mika: Pitona ne Meleke ne Talea ne Ahaza
Kanuhuodi bintu bidi bidimenena anyi tumuma didi tudimenena etshi ntshidimu tshia kubanda kua buloba
Ba bungi bakashihibua bualu bua nvita ei yakadi ya Nzambi
Hilama wakatuma bantu bandi bakadi ne lungenyi lua kundesha matu ha mutu ha mai manene ne bantu ba Solomo
Bakambilangana ne, Mitshima yetu kayakadi itema munda muetu, anyi, hakadiye utuambila malu mu nshila, hakadiye utujinguluila Mukanda wa Nzambi

Mu dilolo wakabuelamu, hakatshiabu yeye wakahingana mu nsubu muibidi wa bakashi mu bianza bia Shâshagaza, muntu mutungula wa mukelenge wakadi ulama bakashi bandi bahika bakabakeye; yeye kakadi ubuela kudi mukelenge kabidi bikala mukelenge kayi musanke bualu buandi, ne bikaleye kayi mumubikile mu dina
Umuambile kabidi ne, Yehowa udi Wamba ne, Mu muaba wakalakila mbua mashi a Nabota mbua neyilake mashi ebe mene mene
Paulo ne bakadi n andi bakumuka ku Pafo, bakasabuka ku Pêge wa mu Pampulia

Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Bualu bua kanuakumi mei anyi, monai, nentume dî bua kuangata ba mu meku onso a ku luseke lua ku nôde, mmudi Yehowa wamba; nembikile Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, muntu wanyi; nendue n abo bua kuluisha bena buloba ebu ne bonso badi bashikamemu, ne bua kuluisha ba mu bisamba bidi binunyunguluke
Kadi mu butshiama luseke ludi diba dibuelela, lupangu luvua ne metre makumi abidi ne atanu mu bule
Nulonde anu dilumbuluisha didi diakane, nunku nenuikale ne muoyo, nenuhiane buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha

Mose wakatuma miloho ku Kadesha kudi mukelenge wa Edome ne, Muan enu Isalele udi wamba ne, Wewe udi mumanye makenga onso akutukuata: bankambua betu bakaya mu Ejipitu, ne tuetu tuakashikama mu Ejipitu musangu mule, Bena Ejipitu bakadienzela bibi ne bankambua betu kabidi: ne hatuakadila kudi Yehowa, yeye wakumpa dî dietu, wakatuma muanjelo wakatuhatula mu Ejipitu, ne tangila, tudi mu Kadesha, musoko udi ku butshika bua buloba buenu mene

Yonadaba, muana wa Shimea, muan abo ne Davidi, wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge kedi meji ne, Bakashiha bansongalume bonso, bana ba mukelenge, bualu bua anu Amenona nkayandi wakafua; bualu bua Abashaloma wakahangidisha bualu ebu ku didiku diakakuateye muan abo mukashi Tamâ ku bukole
Davidi wakaya, yeye ne bantu bandi nkama isambombo bakadi n andi tô ne hakafikabo ku kasulu ka Besô, kuakashala bantu bakuabo ku nyima
Yakoba wakadi ne Lakele tshiji, wakakonka ne, Meme ndi bu Nzambi udi mujidike munda muebe ne, Kuledi, anyi
Nyuma wakangambula, wakalua n anyi mu tshiendelu tshia munda, ekumona
Sheta wakalela muana mulume kabidi, wakamuidika dina ne, Enosha Etshi ntshibangidilu tshiakabikilabo dina dia Yehowa
Leviticus Bikala mulambu wa mundi wa kumuvuisha n au ditalala, yeye neafile muana wa ngombe, nansha mulume nansha mukashi, udi kayi ne tshitema, ku mesu kua Yehowa
Kadi nushiye muaba hankatshi henu ne mushete bule bua coudées Yoshua wakambila bantu ne, Nudijidile, bualu bua makelela Yehowa nênze malu a kukema munkatshi muenu
Bimuma bionsu ebi kabikadi ne bulema pambidi to
Bakumuka ku mukuna wa Shefe, bakashikama mu Halada
Biangenzela muntu mudimu, andonde; muena mudimi wanyi neikale kundi ngikala; biangenzela muntu mudimu, Tatu neamutumbishe
Bualu bua nembabuikidile mibi yabo, ne tshiena nvuluka malu mabi abo kabidi
Malu adi mu musambu awu neanusonguele
Nunku wewe wakubatumina malu â onso
Mukelenge, unvue dî dianyi
Bantu ba mu Bete azamawete makumi anai ne babidi
Kadi binuikala kanuyi nunvua dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kuenza mikenji yandi yonso ne mei bindi nnuambila lelu, hashishe milau ei yonso neyilue kunudi, neyinukuate
Nebanshipe bua kukuangata wewe
Mukashi wakambila Eliya ne, Katataka ndi mumanye ne, Wewe udi muntu wa Nzambi ne dî dia Yehowa didi mukana muebe didi dilelela
Kadi yeye neasungidibue mu kulela kuandi kua bana, bikala bakashi bananukila mu ditabusha ne mu dinanga ne mu malu a tshijila adi ne buhuekele
Yeye wakalua ha buihi handi ne mukashi wakamuebesha ne, Wewe udi Yoaba, anyi
Kuvudishi malu mabi; kuikadi muhote; udi musue kufua dituku dia lufu luebe kadiyi dianze kufika bua tshinyi
Lebeka wakunvua bakambila Isaka Esau muan andi mei au Esau wakaya mu budimi bua kukebeye ntole, ne bua kuhinganeye n andi

Fundila muanjelo wa ekelesia wa ku Pêgamo ne, Ndi mumanye kûdi wikala, kudi nkuasa mene wa bukelenge bua Satana; ne udi ulama dina dianyi bikole, ne kuakahidia ditabusha dianyi, nasha mu matuku a Antipa, mumanyishi wanyi, wanyi wa kueyemena, wakashihibua munkatshi muenu, kudi Satana wikala
Nembatete ne badi benda mu di dianyi, anyi

Nunku Gideona ne lukama lua bantu bakadi n andi, bakalua ku butshika bua tshitudilu mundankulu hakatekabo bansentedi bahia bahia anu musangu muihi; bakela mpungi, bakashiha milondo yakadi mu bianza biabo

Yeye neujidile Yehowa matuku a tshijila tshiandi, nealue biandi ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bihanga diandi, kadi matuku a diambedi adi hatuhu bualu bua tshijila tshiandi tshiakadi tshionyibue
Hakimanabi talalâ, biakabuikila mahuahua

Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Bakashi ba mu lufuila ba bungi bakadi mu Isalele mu matuku a Eliya, hakadi diulu dibuikila bidimu bisatu ne ngondo isambombo, ha kalua tshiole tshinene ha buloba bu onso; kadi Eliya kakatumibu a kudi bakuabo, anu ku Salefata mu boloba bua Sidona, kudi mukashi wakadi mu lufuila

Ne ebu mbualu bualua ku mikuna yakadibo babundulula ne lukasu diambedi; kuena mua kuyaku bualu bua buowa nebukukuate bua meba ne mingonge; kadi neyikale anu miaba ya kutumaku ngombe ne miaba idi mikoko mua kudiata

Nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Nakadianjila kuamba ne, Ba mu nsubu webe ne ba mu nsubu wa tatu webe nebende ku mesu kuanyi tshiendelele; kadi katataka Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu ebu bumuke kundi, bualu bua badi bantumbisha nembatumbishe, ne badi bampetula, nembalengulule
Ebu bualu buakenza bantu aba banene basatu
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Pekaya ne malu onso akenzeye bidi bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele
Aba mbantu bakasabuka dishiya dia Yadene mu ngondo wa kumudilu hakadi musulu mûle muhatuke mu mielelu yau; bakihata bantu bonso bakadi mu bibanda ku esete ne ku wesete
Juka biebe, bikila dina dia nzambi webe; bumue nzambi au nele meji a bualu buetu, bua tuetu katufu nansha
Unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe bu muakanuambila Yehowa, Nzambi webe, bua matuku ebe ikale a bungi, ne bua wewe ukume dikasa dimpe mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi webe, ukuha
Bitata abi bivua bivuluija bena Izrayele ne: muntu udi kayi wa ku ndelanganyi ya Arone, kena mua kuoshila Maweja Nangila musenga wa kamonya to
Muloho wa mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge, hueka diambedi muan anyi kai muanze kufua
Bienzedi Mu Kaisalia muakadi muntu, dina diandi Kônelio, yeye wakadi kapitene ka tshisumbu tshia masalayi lukama, tshiakadibo babikila ne, Tshia Bena Italia

Yeye wa kamba ne, Ndi Nzambi wa tatu ebe, kutshinyi bua kuya mu Ejipitu, bualu bua nenkuvuisheku tshisamba tshmene nenye n ebe mu Ejipitu, nennumusheku kabidi bulelela, Yosefe neateke bianza biandi ha mesu ebe Yakoba Wakabika ku Be sheba, bana balume ba Isalele bakatuala Yakoba tatu abo ne bana babo ne bakashi babo mu makalu akabatumma Palo
Malu Akadi Muambi Umona Meme Muambi nakadi mukelenge wa Isalele mu Yelushalema
Yoshua wakamuangalasha bantu, mu ntu ku buhianyi buandi mundi ku buhianyi buandi
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ka meme eu
Bakunvuila dî diandi bualu bua yeye wakabakemesha ne mbuku yandi tô musangu mule
Ndi nuambila ne, Bikala buakane buenu kabui butambe bua bafundi ne bua Bafalese, kanuena nubuela mu bukelenge bua mu diulu
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Udi unkonkela bua bualu buimpe tshinyi
Mulume wakidika mukashi wandi dina ne, Eva, bualu bua yeye udi muledi wa bonso badi ne muoyo

Yoshua wakamba ne, Bua bualu ebu nenumanye ne Nzambi wa muoyo udi munkatshi muenu, ne yeye kena uhanga kunuihatshila Bena Kanâna ne Bena Hiti ne Bena Hiwi ne Bena Pelizi ne Bena Gigashi ne Bena Amole ne Bena Yebuse ku mpala kuenu
Yeye wakafunda mukanda, nunku ne, Kulaudio Lusia udi utumina ngovena wa butumbi Felika muoyo

Nembafile mu bianza bia badi bakeba mioyo yabo, mu bianza bia Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, ne mu bianza bia bantu bandi; kadi ku nyima kua malu â bantu nebikale mu Ejipitu, bu muakadibo mu matuku a diambedi

Muakuidi neamutshihishe, neambile mukashi ne, Bikala mulume kayi mulale n ebe, ne wewe kuyi musesuke mu malu mabi kudi mundi udi kayi mulume webe, wewe wikale mubingishibue kudi mai a bululu adi elesha mulau

Hakadibo badia, diabolo mumane kubuesha munda mua Yudasa Isakaliote, muana wa Simona bualu bua kutungila Yesu tshitungu; hakamanya Yesu ne, Tatu wanyi wakufila bintu bionso mu bianza bianyi, nakufuma kudi Nzambi, nempingane kudi Nzambi; Yesu wakabika ku mesa, wakavula bivualu biandi, wakangata dituaya, wakadijingiladi
Nengenze malu onso anualomba mu dina dianyi, bua Tatu atumbishibue bua Muana

Nunku, mukelenge Agipa, tshiakahidia kutumikila tshikena kumona tshia mu diulu, kadi nakambila ba mu Damaseke diambedi, ne ba mu Yelushalema, ne ba mu luseke luonso lua Yudaya, ne ba bisamba bia bende kabidi, bua kukudimunabo mitshima yabo, batshinguluke kudi Nzambi, benze malu adi makanangane ne dikudimuna dia mitshima yabo
Kadi meme ndi nuambila ne, Eliya wakumana kulua, bakumuenzela bualu buakasuabo, ba muakadibo bamufundile

Nenfile kabidi biuma bionso bia musoko eu, luhetu luau luonso ne bintu biau bia mushinga mukole bionso, ne bintu bionso bia mu bibutshilu bia bakelenge ba Yuda mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo; bobo nebabihaule, nebabiangate, nebaye n abi ku Babulona
Corinthians Nuikale bidikishi banyi, bu mundi meme kabidi muidikishi wa Kilisto

Nunku bakasungula bimbi ba misambu, Hemana ne Asafa ne Etana bua kuimbabo bikole ne biamu bia mitaku bia kukumakasha; ne Zekâya ne Aziele ne Shemilamota ne Yehiele ne Uni ne Eliaba ne Mâseya ne Benaya bakadi ne nzenze bua kuimbabo tshimbidi tshia Alamota; ne Matitiya ne Elifelehu ne Mikeneya ne Obeda edome ne Yiele ne Azazaya bakadi ne bisanji bua kuimbabo tshimbidi tshia Sheminita, bua kubishabo misambu
Nuakunvua bihendu bidiye uhenda n abi Nzambi; nudi nuamba tshinyi
Filipo wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge, utuleshe Tatu, ebu mbualu butudi basue
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Hingana kudi mukelenge webe mukashi, udikokeshe mu tshianza tshiandi
Yelemiya Edi ndî dia kudi Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Fundai mei onso anakukuambila mu mukanda
Hawalua ne mulambu wa bukula budibo balamba mu nfulu, nebuikale mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene busangisha ne manyi, anyi mikata ya bukula budi kabuyi ne luevene idi ne manyi mela ha mutu
Yeye udi Mukelenge wa Isalele; atuluke biandi ku mutshi mutshiamakane, netumuitabushe

Mukelenge ne Yehoyada bakayifila kudi bantu bakadi benza mudimu mu nsubu wa Yehowa; bobo bakabikila bahandi ba mabue ne bena mabaya bua kulongololabo nsubu wa Yehowa, ne bena biamu bifike ne bena biamu bia mitaku kabidi bua kulongololabo nsubu wa Yehowa
Yonatana wakashiha masalayi a Bena Peleshete akadi mu Geba; Bena Peleshete bakunvua lumu elu

Nunku hafila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bantu bonso badi n enu lukuna mu bianza bienu, ne hanuaheta dikisha mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana, hashishe nenujimishe tshivulukidi tshia Amaleka muinshi mua diulu; kanuhu muoyo bua bualu ebu nansha
Shafana wakaubala ku mpala kua mukelenge
Muntu yonsu udi udiundisha lupangu luende, utentamuna mikalu ne muena mutumba, asangane muena tshibawu kuenza anyi
Dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Meshulemete, muana mukashi wa Halusa wa mu Yoteba
Nunku wewe neumushe Bena Lewi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, Bena Lewi nebikale banyi
Yefeta wakabambila ne, Meme ne bantu banyi tuakadi ne nvita mikole kudi Bena Amona, ne hanakanubikila, nuenu kanuakansungila mu bianza biabo

Bakamba ne, Monai, batu badia bia kudia bia disanka dia Yehowa ku tshidimu ku tshidimu ku Shilo udi ku node kua Betele ne ku esete kua nshila udi mubande ku Betele muye ku Shekeme, ne udi ku sude kua Lebona
Nunku yeye wakalua kudi Simona Petelo
Yeye kena Nzambi wa bafue, udi Nzambi wa badi ne muoyo; bualu bua bonso badi ne muoyo bua bualu buandi
Neadikande bidimu bikuabo bua kaluishi kabidi mukelenge wa ku nôde
Bushuwa, badi badia bia kudia biandi bishema nebamuhangishishe mu nvita, bena nvita bandi nebatangalake bu mudi mai a mu musulu mabasalale mahite mielelu yau; ba bungi nebahone hanshi bashihibue
Bakadia bidia bia disanka matuku muanda mutekete; dituku dia muanda mukulu diakadi dituku dinene dia disangisha, bu muakadi mukenji mujadike

Bikala mulume eu wa ku nyima mumukine, mumufundile mukanda wa kushiha dibaka kabidi, mumuheu mu bianza biandi, mumûmushe mu nsubu wanyi, anyi biafua mulume eu wa ku nyima wakamuangata bu mukashi wandi, mulume wa diambedi, wakamûmusha mu nsubu wandi, kena mua kumuangata bu mukashi wandi kabidi, bualu bua mukashi wakumana kunyangisha; bualu ebu budi bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa
Solomo wakashikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge wa Davidi, tatu wandi; bukelenge buandi buakajadikibua bikole
Yeye wakunzulula tshibi, wakaya lubilu
Kadi Yehu kakabenga malu mabi onso a Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, akenzesheye Bena Isalele; wakashala ne tuana tua ngombe tua or tuakadi mu Betele ne mu Dana
Hakatangila Nâmana muntu wakadi umulonda, wakatuluka mu dikalu diandi bua kusangakeneye n andi, wakamuebesha ne, Malu kai

Muntu mubi udi ulengulula Nzambi bua tshinyi, Wewe wantangila bualu ebu, bualu bua utu watangila kanyinganyinga ne dikenga, Utshibule diboko dia muntu mubi, Yehowa udi Mukelenge tô ne tshiendelele; Yehowa, wewe wakunvua kulomba kua badi ne mitshima mihuekele; Bua wewe kulumbulula bilumbu bia bana ba nshiya ne bia badi bakengeshibua ne kulumbulula kuakane; Misambu Ndi nyemena kudi Yehowa; Bua mona mudi bantu babi banana buta buabo, Hashimbulabo bishimikidi bia nsubu, Yehowa udi mu ntempelo wandi wa tshijila, Yehowa udi uteta muntu muakane; Yeye nealokeshile bantu babi makala a kahia; Bualu bua Yehowa udi muakane; udi unanga buakane; Misambu Yehowa, unkuatshishe; bualu bua muntu muakane kenaku kabidi; Badi bambilangana mashimi, muntu ne muntu ne muena mutumba Yehowa udi umushe bonso badi ne mishiku ya lubombo, Badi bamba ne, Netudivuishe bantu bakole ku ndimi yetu; Bualu bua badi bakengesha bahele, bualu bua badi bakengela bintu Mei a Yehowa adi mimpe; Wewe Yehowa, neubalame; Bantu babi badi bendakana ku nseke yonso, Misambu Yehowa, musangu bule munyi wewe neuhue bualu buanyi muoyo
Ne yeye wakadi ne difu, wakadi udila, muikale ne didinyenga dia kuleleye, ne mu dikenga dia kumuleleshabo

Ezekiel Di dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Wewe kabidi, muana wa muntu, ashila Tulo muadi, ambila Tulo, udi mushikame ku tshibuelelu tshia ku mai manene, udi ngend a mushinga munkatshi mua bantu ha bungi badi mu maloba a ku muelelu wa mai manene, ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Matshika a buloba buebe akadi anu munkatshi mua mai manene, Bakahanda mabaya ebe onso a kuenza n au matu Bakasonga nkaya yebe Tshilulu tshiebe tshia kuendesha n atshi buatu Bantu ba ku Sidona ne ba ku Âwada Bakulu ba ku Gebala ne bena lungenyi bandi bakadi munkatshi muenu Bantu ba ku Pelasa, Luda ne Puta bakadi mu tshisumbu tshia masalayi ebe, bakadi baluanganyi bebe ba nvita; bakakudika ngabu yabo ne bifulu biabo bia biamu ku bimanu biebe, bakalesha bakuabo butumbi buebe

Nuenu nenufue munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabo, ne buloba bua bantu badi n enu lukuna nebunumine Bantu benu badi bashala nebanyingalale ne makenga a mibi yabo mu buloba bua bantu badi n enu lukuna, nebanyingalale ne makenga a mibi ya batatu abo kabidi
Tuetu katuena tuhiana n abo buloba budi dishiya dia Yadene to ne ku mpala, bualu bua buhianyi buetu budi dishiya dia munemu ku esete kua Yadene
Tshibangidilu Mvidi Mukulu udi ulaya ne: Sara nealele muana Maweja Nangila kumuenekela Abrahame ku mitshi ya tshijila ya ku Mambre
Bakashi bakadiku kabidi, batangidile ha bule; munkatshi mua bakashi aba muakadi Malia wa ku Magadala, ne Malia mamu wa Yakobo mukese ne wa Yose, ne Salome
Bena Yuda bakakema ne, Muntu eu udi mumanye mikanda, kai muanze kuiyila, munyi
Kadi Paulo wakelangana meshi ne, Kembimpe bia kuya ne muntu wakumuka watushîa mu Pampulia, kai muye n etu ku mudimu

Bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nakuditshiha meme nkayanyi ne, Musoko wa Bosela neulue tshintu tshidi tshikuatshi ha bantu buowa ne tshidibo bahenda, bu tshihela ne tshidibo bela mulau; misoko yau yonso idi mu ntshiamba neyikale bikulu tô ne tshiendelele
Nukumbaje bionsu bidibu banuambila

Meku a Bena Kohata akangata tshiabo tshituha; bana ba Alona muakuidi, Bena Lewi mene mene, bakangata tshiabo tshituha munkatshi mua tshisamba tshia Yuda ne mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona ne mu tshisamba tshia Benyamina, bimenga dikumi ne bisatu
Kanungu ka Bishimikidi bia ditunga bidi : Mfumu wa Ditunga; Tshimamwenda wa Bukalenga; Bukalenga bunene; Bukalenga bwa bandumbulula
