Bene hadada, mukelenge wa Sulia, wakabanda ha nyima ha kabalu, wakahanduka ne bantu bakuabo bakadi babanda ha tubalu
Nundeshe tshidibo balambula n atshi

Kadi muntu udi utantamana mu mutshima wandi, kai ne bualu budi bumuenzesha, kadi udi ne bukole bua kuenza bu mudiye musue, ne wakamana kudisunguila bualu ebu mu mutshima wandi bua kulama muan andi mukashi utshidi kamama, yeye nenze bimpe
Bua bikala bantu bangi bakafua bua bushihi bua mikenshi bua muntu umue, ngasa wa Nzambi ne diha dia ku ngasa wa kudi muntu umue, Yesu Kilisto mene, biakatamba kukumbanyina bantu bangi
Kulondolola Bukokeshi bua Manashe Bak
Mukelenge wakambila muntu wa Nzambi ne, Undombele luse lua Yehowa, Nzambi webe, bua yeye angakashile tshianza tshianyi kabidi
Mai manene adi ne nvi mitoke tô
Yesu wakabambila ne, Luai ku nyima kuanyi, nenuvuishe bilembi bia bantu
Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshimue tshia bukelenge bua Yolama, muana wa Ahaba, Ahazaya wakabanga kukokesha mu Yuda
Neafile bena ditunga adi mu bianza bienu

hakashindikeye matutu a mu diulu, hakahandileye mai manene mukalu wau, ha diba adi nakadi hehi n andi bu muena Nakadi nsanka mu buloba buandi Nunku, bana banyi ba balume nungunvuile: Unvuai diyisha, nuikale ne meji, kanudihetudi nansha
Mulume neikale mubingishibue ku bubi, ne mukashi eu neadituadile bubi buandi
Nunku mukenji eu wakaya kuonso bua bena meji bashihibue, bakakeba Danyele ne balunda bandi bua kubashiha
Yeye wakambila bayandi ne, Ndi mumanye ne, Muntu eu udi muntu muakane wa Nzambi utu walua kutudi
Bakashiha bionso biakadi mu musoko ku miele yabo, balume ne bakashi, bana ne bakulumpe, ngombe ne mikoko ne mpunda

Lufu lua Ban a Bute Hakalua mundankulu Yehowa wakashiha ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu, muan a bute wa Palô wakadi ushikama ha nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge tô ne ku muan a bute wa muntu wa mu nsubu wa lukanu, ne bana bonso ba bute ba bimuna

Bukelenge buinai nebuikale ne bukole bua tshiamu tshifike; bualu bua bu mudi tshiamu tshifike tshitshibula bintu bionso bituha bituha ne tshibibotekasha, ne bu mudi tshiamu tshifike tshibotesha bintu ebi bionso, nunku bukelenge abu nebutshibule, nebubutule makalenge â onso
Pakuatshikaye, tuangatangane nende bua tumulelele bana

Hakamubikila Davidi, yeye wakadia, wakanua ku mpala kuandi; Davidi wakamunuisha maluvu, wakakuatshika; kadi dilolo wakahatuka bua kulala ha bulalu buandi ne bantu ba mukelenge wandi, kakaya ku nsubu kuandi
Kutelabu kabidi tukaba tua kusuika tshilamba tshia efode tshia mutuangaji munene
Ku luseke luandi lukuabo bakasa kudi Hananya, umue wa benji ba manananshi
Bobo bakumuka ne bakaya ku mikuna, bakashalaku matuku asatu tô ne kakahingana babakebi; bantu bakabakeba mu nshila yonso, kadi kabakabamona
Yeye wakatuma bansongalume ba Bena Isalele, bakoshila Yehowa nyama, bakamushihela ngombe ya milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala
Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Yeye neamuteke ha mutu ha bintu biandi bionso

Nunku, Kilisto kabidi, kakaditumbisha bua kuvuishibua muakuidi munene, kadi wakamutumbisha nyeye wakamuambila ne, bu mudiye wamba kabidi mu muaba mukuabo ne, Nyeye mu matuku a mubidi wandi wa ha buloba, hakatendeleleye ne mitendelelu ne misengelelu misangisha ne muadi mukole ne binsonshi kudi yeye wakadi ne bukole bua kumusungila ku lufu, ne hakamunvuilabo bua ditshina diandi dia Nzambi; nasha yeye muikale Muana, wakayila ditumikila ku malu akakengeye n au
Moshe kubambila ne: Panudi nukumbaja bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila munuambile bua kuenza, yeye neadileje kunudi ne butumbi buende
Hashishe balume aba bakaya bua kutentekelabo buloba bua Layisha, bakakonka bana babo ne, Nudi bamanye ne efoda ne telafima ne luhingu luakasongabo ne luhingu luakatulabo bidi mu nsubu ei, anyi
Wakakeba mua kumumona

Bantu aba bonso, muntu ne muntu, bakakosa matamba, bakalonda Abimeleke, bakâteka kuinshi kua nsubu, bakosha nsubu ne kahia; nunku bantu bonso bakadi mu tshibumba tshia mu Shekeme bakafua kabidi, bu bantu tshinunu ne balume ne bakashi
Bualu mukaji awu kudi mulume ewu udi ne mikiya

Nomba Kuhita kua Yehowa Yehowa wakambila Mose mu tshihela tshia Sinai mu ngondo wa kumudilu wa tshidimu tshibidi tshiakaluhukabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne, Bena Isalele nebadie bintu bia kuhita kua Yehowa mu tshikondo tshinakasungula
Bonso bakitaba ne, Bamushihe ku mutshi mutshiamakane
Nukuatshishe basanto ne bintu bidibo bakengela; nusankidile benyi misangu yonso
Wakadi ne nkete ya tshiamu tshia mitaku ku mikolo yandi, wakadi ne difuma dia tshiamu tshia mitaku ha diaha diandi
Wakangata mukanda wa dihungila, wakaubala ku mpala kua bantu, bobo bakamba ne, Mei onso akuamba Yehowa netuênze, netuatumikile
Kadi bakuabo ba mu luseke lua Bafalese, bakadi bamane kuitabusha, bakabika bamba ne, Butudi n abu mbua kutengula ba bisamba bia bende, ne bua kubambila bua kuenzabo mikenshi ya Mose
Bualu abu kushala tshivulukilu kudi bena Izrayele

Bualu bua bantu bakuabo bakabombelela munkatshi muenu mu musokoko; bobo bakadi ne malu abo mafundibue diambedi ku dihila edi; badi kabai ba Nzambi, bandamuna ngasa wa Nzambi wetu ku malu a masandi, badi babenga Nfumu wetu umue umuehele, udi kabidi Mukelenge wetu, Yesu Kilisto

Wakidikisha bujitu bua or ya tshioshelu tshia musenga wa manananshi ne or ya kuenza n ai luidi lua dikalu dia bakeluba bakadi bolola mahuahua abo, bakabuikila mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa
Munanga, kuidikishi bualu budi bubi, kadi idikisha bualu budi buimpe
Kadi Yehowa wakabenga bua kubutula Bena Yuda, anu bualu bua muntu wandi Davidi, bualu bua wakamulaya bua kumushileye bana bandi muinda tshiendelele

Yoshua Badi Bahita Bena Amole Bukole Kakunyua Adoni sedeke, mukelenge wa Yelushalema, bu muakanyenga Yoshua Ai, ne muakauhauleye; ne bu muakenzeleye Yeleko ne mukelenge wau ne bu muakenzeleye Ai ne mukelenge wau; ne bu muakaheta Bena Gibeona budishikaminyi kudi Bena Isalele, ne bu muakashikamabo munkatshi muabo; nunku bobo bakatamba kutshina, bualu bua Gibeona wakadi musoko munene, mufuane tshimenga tshia bakelenge mene mene, ne bualu bua musoko eu wakatamba Ai bunene, ne balume bonso bakadi ne bukitu
Hakatshiabu, bakahueka ku mukuna, tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu tshiakasangila n andi
Nenufile bintu ebi bidi kabiyi ne tshilema ku mutu kua milambu idibo bosha buatshia buatshia, ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Balami ba bimuna bia Bena Gelâ bakatandangana ne balami ba bimuna bia Isaka, bakamba ne, Dina dia mai edi ndietu
Ne bua bualu buebe wewe newikale bu umue wa bahote mu Isalele
Buloba bua Gilada buakadi bua bana ba balume bakuabo ba Manashe
Bualu bua tshihungidi tshidi ne bukole bikalaku lufu lua muen atshi; katshiena ne bukole mu matuku atshidi mutshihungi ne muoyo
Mukalu wa Bena Manashe wakadi ku Ashê tô ne ku Mikemetata udi ku mpala kua Shekeme; wakayila ku tshianza tshia balume tô ku musoko wa Bena Ene tapua
Wakamuambila malu onso akamuenzela muntu au
Labana wakasangisha bantu bonso bakadiye n abo, wakabalambishila bidia bia dibanji
Yeye wakosha musenga wa manananshi mu tshibanda tshia muana wa Hinoma kabidi; wakosha bana bandi mu kahia, bu muakadi tshilele tshibi tshia bisamba biakadi Yehowa muihate ku mpala kua Bena Isalele

Bua bualu ebu nakakushîa mu Kulete, bua wewe kulongolola malu akadi mashale, ne bua wewe kusunguisha bakulu ku musoko ne ku musoko bu munakakuambila; bikalaku muntu udi kai mua kubandibua, udi ne mukashi umue, udi ne bana bandi badi bena ditabusha, badi kabai babandibua bua dinyanguka dia muoyo anyi bua huhidia
Muntu ne muntu udibo babala wakabita bidimu makumi abidi neafile kuha kua Yehowa
Yakobe ufika ne biakudia abi kudi tatuende Izake, kumuamba ne: Tatu
Samuele wakalumbulula Bena Isalele mu Misepa
Bayidi babidi bakaya, bakalua mu tshimenga, bakasangana bu muakabambileye; bakalongolola Kuhita kua Yehowa
Biahita bidimu bia bungi, wewe udi mumanye mua kuhandisha mushinga wa bintu, ne bialeha bidimu bikese, wewe neuhuekeshe mushinga wabi bu mudi bungi bua bintu bidiye ukusumbisha
Nunku meme hanyi tshiena mbalesha dinanga, tshiena mbafuila luse, kadi nempingashe dikenga bu difutu dia bienzedi biabo ha mitu babo

Aba mbakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Bena Holi, mukelenge Lotana ne mukelenge Shobala ne mukelenge Sibiona ne mukelenge Ana ne mukelenge Dishona ne mukelenge Eze ne mukelenge Dishana, aba mbakelenge ba Bena Holi mu buloba bua Sei
Mukashi wakambila nyoka ne, Tudi mua kudia mamuma a mitshi yonso idi mu budimi, kadi mamuma a mutshi udi munkatshi mua budimi, Nzambi wakamba ne, Kanuadi, kanualengi, bua kanufu
Nunku Solomo wakatula bintu ebi bia bungi bionso; kabakamanya mua kubala bujitu bua tshiamu tshia mitaku
Yesu wakamumona wakamuambila ne, Wewe udi Simona, muana wa Yona; nebakuidike dina ne, Kefa kukudimuna kua muaku ne, Petelo
Samuele wakatshina mua kuambila Eli bua tshikena kumona
Bimuna bionso bidi ne mikono mihanduluke, bidi bihingishilula bintu mukana: nudi mua kudia nyama ei
Ndi njadika ne: kudi bualu, kadi kabuena pabuipi to: Mutotu neupatuke mu ndelanganyi ya Yakobe
Bantu bakitabusha ne hakunvuabo ne, Yehowa wakulua kudi Bena Isalele, wakumona dikenga diabo, bakinama mitu yabo, bakatendelela
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wewe wambila Bena Isalele ne, Nuenu nkayenu nuakumona bu munakusomba n enu mufume mu diulu
Anu mushinga uvuabu bafile bua kusomba tshimuna awu neujikije bualu
Ne mu mikenshi yenu bakafunda ne, Dî dia bantu babidi didi dilelela
Aba banai bakadi bana balume ba Shimei

Bialeleye muana mulume udi munyengi wa bintu ne mumatshishi wa mashi hanshi, anyi udi wenza bualu bukuabo budi bua mushindu eu; udi uhanga kuenza malu akadiye ne bua kuenza, kadi wakudia munyinyi muelele mpingu ha mikuna, ne wakunyanga mukashi wa muena mutumba n andi, wakuenzela bahele ne bakengi bibi, wakunyenga bintu ku bukole, kakuhingasha tshieva kudi muen atshi, wakutangisha mesu andi ku mpingu, wakuenza malu a bundu, wakusombesha bakuabo bintu bua kuheta kasombela ne wakudiangatshila makasa, muntu eu neikale ne muoyo, anyi
Kubutuka kudi kusungudibua, kudi kuhumuka ne buakane
Muana wa muntu kabidi kakuluila bua bantu bamukuatshile mudimu, wakuluila bua kubakuatshila mudimu, ne bua kufila muoyo wandi bua kuhikula n au bantu ba bungi

Bikala tatu andi kayi ne bana babo, yeye neaheshe muan abo udi umulonda mu diku diandi buhianyi buandi, yeye mene neabuhete, eu udi mukenji wa tshiendelele kudi Bena Isalele, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Kuvudi mamu webe mukuabo anyi tatu webe mukashi bilulu, bualu bua yeye wakavula bana babo bilulu, bobo nebadituadile bubi buabo
Tuetu tudi bakese, bobu badi ba bungi
Kanungu ka Mu dilonda dia bulongolodi bwa kanungu ka ka Dîyi dikulu edi, bulongolodi bwa mbulamatadi wa tshimpitshimpi momumwe ne bwa mbulamatadi wa bilwilu,badi babuteeja kudi Mulombodi wa ditunga
Nunku Mose wakambila Alona ne, Ebu mbualu bakamba Yehowa ne, Nenjidibue kudi bantu balualua ha buihi n anyi, nentumbishibue ku mesu kua bantu bonso Alona wakahuwa talalâ

Bulelela, mei anyi kaena a mashimi, Mona, Nzambi udi ne bukole buhite ne kena uhetula muntu, Kena Usungila mioyo ya bantu babi, Kena umusha mesu andi kudi bantu bakane; Bikalabo bedibue mu nkanu, yeye udi ubalesha bienzedi biabo Udi ujikula matshu abo bua bamanye mua kunvua diyisha, Biunvuabo dî diandi ne biamukuatshilabo mudimu, Kadi bikalabo kabayi bunvua dî diandi, nebashihibue ku muele wa nvita, Badi babenga Nzambi mu mitshima yabo badi baditekelamu tshiji; Badi bafua mu bunsongalume buabo, Udi ubandisha bakengi ku dikenga diabo, E, wakasua kukukoka bua kukumusha mu makenga, Kadi wewe udi mule tente ne kulumbuluisha kua bantu babi; Kuitabushi bua tshiji tshiebe tshikuteye bua wewe kuhetula Nzambi; Muadi webe neumanye mua kukumbana bua wewe kukengi, anyi
Pa kusakidila pa bina abio, Minisitila kavulambedi udi upeta makookeshi a pabwawo adi amwambulwisha mu midimu yende
Yeye wakabambila ne, Mutshima wanyi udi utamba kunyingalala, lufu nduntonda; nushale aha, nuikale n anyi tshitabala
Buloba buonso kabuena ku mpala kuebe, anyi
Ushimike luhangu lua tshilulu lunyunguluke, ukudike tshilulu tshia ku mbelu kua luhangu
Dina dia mai dia Yakoba diakadihu
Muhimbu wa bimanu bia ha mbelu bia nsubu mituangane wakadi coudées itanu, ne tshituha tshia tshibumba tshiakashala tshiakadi coudées itanu
Kanuikadi ne bihiminu bibidi mu nsubu yenu, ne tshinene ne tshikese
Kadi nsongalume kakadi mumanye bualu, anu Yonatana ne Davidi bakadi bamanye bualu
Labana wakabuela mu ntenta wa Yakoba ne mu ntenta wa Lea ne mu ntenta ya bena mudimu babo ba bakashi, kakasangana mpingu
Mona, ndi nfuma muanjelo ku mpala kuebe, bua kukulama mu nshila ne bua kulua n ebe mu muaba unakakulongoluela
Bakenza mukaba wa efoda bu muakadibo benza efoda ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzû ne bia lin, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose

Ndi nkulesha lungenyi lua kusumba ngolo kundi udi mulengeshibue mu kahia bua wewe ulue mubanshi, ne bivualu bitoke bua kudiluatshisha n abi bua bundu bua butaka buebe kabumueneki, ne buanga bua kulaba ku mesu ebe bua wewe umanye mua kutangila
Bakambula tshitalu tshia Asahele, bakatshijika mu lukita lua tatu wandi luakadi mu Beteleheme
Hakabikileye Abashaloma, yeye wakaya kudi mukelenge, wakatua mpala wandi hanshi ku mpala kua mukelenge; mukelenge wakatua Abashaloma mishiku
Hakatshiabu, bakaluhuka mu Betania, Yesu wakadi ne nsala
Balaame kuandamuna ne: Mbafiki
Kaleba wakamuha mishimi ya mai yakadi ku mutu ne yakadi kumanda kabidi
Bayidi bandi bakalua ha diba adi mene; bakakema bualu bua yeye wakadi wakula ne mukashi; kadi muntu kakamufuka ne, Udi ukeba tshinyi
Bualu bua nuenu nkayenu nudi bamanye bimpe ne, Dituku dia Mukelenge dilualua bu mudi muibi ulua butuku
Bakamba ne, Mu dibatiza dia Yone
Bantu babi mene badi basombesha badi babi bintu ne, Netubiangate bionso kabidi
Udi ne tshia kudisungila
Monai, di dia Yehowa diakalua kudiye ne, Muntu eu kena wikala muhianyi wa bintu biebe nansha, kadi yeye uwalela nkayebe neikale muhianyi wa bintu biebe
Pashishe Yakobe kulaya Yozefe, umuambila ne: Nkadi mikolu ku tshiina
Hatuakadi tuya ku muaba wa kutendelela, nsongakashi muhika wakasangakana n etu, wakadi ne nyuma mubi wakadi umubukisha, wakamuenesha banfumu andi bintu bia bungi bualu bua lubuku luandi
Nubivuluke, nubienze; bualu ebu budi lungenyi luenu ne budimu buenu ku mesu kua bantu badi bunvua mikenji ei yonso, badi bamba ne, Bulelela, bantu aba banene badi ne lungenyi ne budimu
Bobo bakangata bintu bia Mika biakenzeye ne muakuidi wakadiye n andi, bakalua ku Layisha, kudi bantu bakadi talalâ ne kabayi ne bualu, bakabashiha ne miele ya nvita, bakosha musoko ne kahia
Kadi kamina nuhingana kabidi ku buloba budi mitshima yenu ijinga bua kuhingana
Au mmeku a bana balume ba Efelayima, bungi buabo buakabalabo buakadi binunu makumi asatu ne bibidi ne nkama itanu Aba mbana balume ba Yosefe ku meku abo
Bualu bua hakadi muntu webe mushikame mu Geshû wa mu Sulia wakaditshiha mutshihu ne, Biampingisha Yehowa mu Yelushalema, meme nentendelele Yehowa

Nunku Davidi ne Abishai bakafika kudi bantu ba Shaula butuku; monai, Shaula wakadi mulale tulu munkatshi mua makalu ne difuma diandi dishimika hanshi ku mutu wandi; Abinê ne bantu bonso bakadi balala, bamunyunguluka
Tuakunyangakaja ditunga dijima too ne ku Dibone, too ne ku Nofa, ne ku Medeba mene
Shaula wakamba ne, Nzambi angenzele bualu ebu ne bukuabo ha mutu, bualu bua wewe Yonatana neufue bulelela
Bantu ba bungi bakâdisha bivualu biabo mu nshila, bakuabo bakâdisha bisala bia mitshi biakakosabo mu madimi
Bualu bua bundi n abu mbua kukuambila mei adi anemesha bujitu
Muaba awu, uvua mpokolu ya mayi dikumi ne ibidi ne mabue a ngaji makumi muanda mutekete
Bualu buonso budi kabui buakane budi bualu bubi; ne bualu bubi budiku budi kabui bua lufu
Yeye wakamukukuila
Kadi binuikala kanuyi nutendelela, ha diba adi mene nebanuele munda mua tshikutu tshia kahia kakole; ne nzambi kai udi mua kunuhandisha mu bianza bianyi
Nuditete munda muenu ne nudi ne ditabusha anyi; nudijadike bienu
Mikoko yanyi idi yunvua dî dianyi, ndi muimanye, idi indonda; ndi nyiha muoyo wa tshiendelele; kayena ifua tshiendelele, kakuena mukuabo udi winyenga mu tshianza tshianyi
Tera kuangata muanende Abrame, Lote muana wa muanende Arane ne Sarayi mukaji wa Abrame

Bakajila bintu bu muakadi bukole buabo, ndi mumanyi wa bualu ne, tô ne hakahitabo bukole buabo; bakabifila bu muakasua mitshima yabo, Bakatusengelela ne disengelela dia bungi bua ngasa eu ne buobumue bia mu kukuatshishangana kua basanto; ne kabakenza anu bu mutuakatekemena, kadi bakadianjila kudifila kudi Mukelenge, ne kutudi, bu mu disua dia Nzambi

Shaula wakakeba kuasa Davidi difuma dimusompoke dikuate mu tshimanu tshia nsubu; kadi Davidi wakehela, wakumuka ku mesu kua Shaula, difuma diakakuata mu tshimanu tshia nsubu; Davidi wakanyema, wakahanduka butuku ebu
Kabidi netumanye bimuna bidiye musue bua tuetu kumulambula amu patuafika kutudi tuya
Ne udi kai udia, kena udia bua Mukelenge, ne udi Nzambi
Bana ba Halifa lukama ne dikumi ne babidi
Wakabayisha ne, Kabakafunda mu Mukanda wa Nzambi ne, Nebabikile nsubu wanyi ne, Nsubu wa tshitendelelu tshia bisamba bionso, anyi

Hakadibo basankisha mitshima yabo, monai, bena musoko, bantu balembakane, bakanyunguluka nsubu, bakume ku tshibi; bakambila mukelenge wa nsubu muntu mununu ne, Lua ne muntu au wakalua mu nsubu muebe bua tuetu tumumanye
Yeye wakateka masalayi mu nseke yonso ya Edome; Bena Edome bonso bakalua bahika ba Davidi
Kadi yeye eu, udi ulua kuluisha mukelenge wa ku sude, nênze bu mudi mutshima wandi musue; kakuena muntu udi mua kumutantamena

Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Binuikala kanuyi baunvuile, ne binuikala kanuyi bauteka mu mitshima yenu, bua kunemeka dina dianyi, nennutumine mulau, nenkudimune masanka enu alue milau; eyo, nakumana kuavuisha milau, bualu bua kanuena nuteka dî dianyi mu mitshima yenu

Muntu kai wa munkatshi muenu, bikaleye utamba kuelangana meshi, udi mumanye mua kulunga ku bule buandi nkubita Binuikala kanui bamanye mua kuenza bualu butambe bukese, nudi nuelelangana meshi a malu makuabo tshinyi
Muinshi mua nsubu ai muakadi tshibuelelu tshiai ku luseke lua esete, hakasua muntu kubuelamu ufuma ku tshiendelu tshia ha mbelu
Nakuamba anu dî nansha
Hashishe, mukelenge wakahandisha Shadalaka, Meshaka ne Abedenego mu province wa Babulona
Yesu wakajosha bayidi bandi, wakamba ne, Nuenu bahele nudi ne disanka, bua bukelenge bua Nzambi budi buenu
Kanutemeshi kahia mu matshika enu onso dituku dia Lumingu
Bakamulesha luse luabo, bakamusamba bua makenga onso akadi Yehowa mumutumine
Bantu bakuabo bakavudishila bantu bakadi ne disua dia kushikama mu Yelushalema disanka
Nsenji kena muakane kunudi bualu bua udi uhingishilula bintu mukana, kadi kena ne mikono mihanduluke
Nunku Yehowa wakatumina Bena Isalele tshihuhu; Bena Isalele binunu makumi muanda mutekete bakafua
Uvua ulombola bintu biende bionsu uvua amu Yozefe
Âpakashada wakalela Shela ne Shela wakalela Ebe
Kupetabu diakalenga kudi bena Ejipitu
Kabakalonda dibala dia argent kudi bafutshi ba bena mudimu eu, bualu bua bakadi mua kueyemenyibua
Natana wakambila Davidi ne, Yehowa wakukubuikidila bubi buebe, wewe kuena ufila
Bakambila Shaula ne, Davidi wakanyemena mu Gata; yeye kakamukebulula kabidi
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, nendumbulule bilumbu bidi hankatshi ha mukoko ne mukoko ne bia hankatshi ha bimpanga ne mpumbu ya mbushi

Mukalu wabo wakadi ku Mahanayima, Bashana mujima, bukelenge buonso bua Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, ne misoko yonso ya Yai, idi mu Bashana, misoko makumi asambombo: ne tshituha tshia Gilada ne Ashetalota ne Edelei; misoko ya mu bukelenge bua Oga mu Bashana yakadi ya Maki, muana wa Manashe, ya tshituha tshia bana ba Maki ku meku abo
Kubisuikabu kaba kamue

Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Bualu bua meme nakakutumbisha munkatshi mua bantu, nakakusungula mukelenge ku mutu kua bantu banyi Bena Isalele, nakanyenga bukelenge kudi ba mu nsubu wa Davidi, nakakuhabu; kadi wewe kuakuenza bu muntu wanyi Davidi, wakatumikila mikenji yanyi, wakandonda ne mutshima wandi wonso, bua kuakuenza malu akadi mimpe ku mesu kuanyi; kadi wewe wakutamba bantu bonso bakadi ku mpala kuebe bua kuenza bibi, wa kudienzela nzambi mikuabo, wakutula mpingu bua kunfuisha n ai tshiji, wakungela meme ku nyima kuebe; nunku nentume malu mabi kudi ba mu nsubu wa Yalobama, nenshihe bana balume bonso ba mu nsubu wa Yalobama ne badi mu nsubu wandi ne badi ha bule mu Isalele; nenkombe ba mu nsubu wa Yalobama bu mudibo bakomba diala dia butue, tô ne hashikadi dionso
Bana ba balume ba Hananiya: Pelatiya ne Yeshaya; muan andi wa balume Lefaya, muan andi wa balume Anana, muan andi wa balume Obadiya, muan andi wa balume Shekaniya
Bantu banene bonso ba mu nseke yonso ne miloho ne ba gouverneur ne bonso bakadi benzela mukelenge mudimu bakakuatshisha Bena Yuda; bualu bua ditshina dia Môdekai diakabakuata
Kanujanyi bena diku dienu to
Bantu aba badi balami ba mikoko, bualu bua bakadi balami ba bimuna, bakalua ne mikoko yabo ne bimuna biabo ne bintu bionso bidibo n abi
Bua bikala Nzambi kai mubange kuahula matamba malelela, kena ubenga kuahula wewe kabidi
Pashishe, kupitaye kumpala kua Moshe wamba kabidi ne: Ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa luse ne dinanga, ndi ne lutulu luvule, ndi nkumbaja bionsu bindi ndaya bantu, tshiena mfika munda lukasa

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nengitabushe bua nuenu nunsangane, nenkudimune buhika buenu, nennusangishe bua kunûmusha mu bisamba bionso ne mu miaba yonso inakunuihata; nendue n enu kabidi mu muaba unakanuangata hanakanutuma mu buhika
Ebu mbuhianyi bua Bena Benyamina ku mikalu yabo ku meku abo
Debola wakambila Balaka ne, Bika biebe, bualu bua Yehowa wakafila Sisela mu bianza biebe lelu; Yehowa kena mudianjile ku mpala kuebe, anyi
Wakateka bakashi benji ba mudimu ne bana babo ku mpala, ne Lea ne bana bandi ku nyima kuabo, ne Lakele ne Yosefe ku nyima kuabo
Ku nkanu aku, ubuejeku mitshi bua kuambula tshilambuilu
Nuenu bena Izrayele, ndelanganyi ya Yakobe, ntenta yenu inudi nusomba idi mimpe mitambe
Kakunyua Zebula, mukelenge wa mu musoko, mei a Gala, muana wa Ebede, tshiji tshiandi tshiakadi tshikole

Yehowa wakadi n anyi tshiji bualu buenu, wakamba ne, Wewe kuena ubuelamu: Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, utu wimana ku mpala kuebe, yeye neabuelemu: ukoleshe mutshima wandi, bualu bua yeye neahianyishe Bena Isalele buloba
Bakumuka ku Dishiba Dikunze, bakashikama mu tshihela tshia Sina
Yeye wakabambula mu maboko andi, wakabasankisha, wakabalenga bianza
Muntu au wakamba ne, Mukelenge, ndi ngitabusha
Yehowa neadisunguile mukelenge mukuabo ha mutu ha Bena Isalele, yeye neashihe bonso ba mu nsubu wa Yalobama mu dituku adi; yeye kena muenze nunku katataka, anyi
Bena Sulia kabakalua mu buloba bua Bena Isalele bua kuhaulabo kabidi

Wewe neuhone ha mikuna ya mu Isalele, wewe ne bisumbu biebe bionso bia masalayi, ne bantu bonso badi n ebe; nenkufile kudi nyunyu ya mishindu yonso idi idia munyinyi, ne kudi nyama ya mu mpata bu bia kudia biai
Hashishe Mika wakamba ne, Katataka ndi mumanye ne Yehowa neangenzele bimpe, bualu bua meme ndi ne Muena Lewi bu muakuidi wanyi
Nakakonka muanjelo wakadi uyikila n anyi ne, Badi baya ne tshihiminu tshia épha kudi kunyi
Kutekaye tshilambuilu tshia tshiamu tshia mpawungi mu ntenta amu
Ke padi bena Izrayele kabayi badia munyinyi wa mu tshikundukundu tshia nyama too ne ku lelu, bualu bavua bakoyobole Yakobe tshikundukundu
Nudi nunkonka ne, Tuakuiba bintu biebe kudi kunyi
Bakalua n andi ha nyima ha tubalu, bakamujika ne bankambua bandi mu Yelushalema, musoko wa Davidi
Nzambi wa ditalala nkayandi anujidile tshishiki; ne nyuma yenu ne misûke yenu ne mibidi yenu ilamibue mu buakane buonso, kanui ne kudiu, mu dilu
Munkatshi mua tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe, Tanaka ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Gata limona ne miaba ya ku matshika: bimenga bibidi
Nyuma wa Yehowa neakutulukile bikole, wewe newambe n abo dî dia Nzambi, wewe neukudimuke bu mu ntu mukuabo

Hakunvua Tou, mukelenge wa Hamata, ne, Davidi wakashiha masalayi onso a Hadadezê, mukelenge wa Zoba, yeye wakatuma Hadolama muan andi mulume kudi mukelenge Davidi bua kumuela muoyo, ne bua kumuvudishileye disanka bualu bua yeye wakadi muluangane ne Hadadezê, wakamuhita bukole; bualu bua Hadadezê wakadi uluangana ne Tou; yeye wakalua ne mpanza ya mishindu yonso ya or ne ya argent ne ya tshiamu tshia mitaku
Kadi neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Nuleshe kujalama kua dinanga dienu ne kua ditumba dietu bua bualu buenu ku mesu kua ekelesia
Aba mba mu bana balume ba Gada bakadi tupitene tua masalayi; wakatamba buhuekele wakadi ku mutu kua bantu lukama; wakatamba bunene wakadi ku mutu kua bantu tshinunu

Bualu bubi budi bunkemesha ne budi bunkuatshisha buowa Baprofete badi bamba mei mu mena a nzambi ya tshianana, Jeremiah Nuenu, hana ba Benyamina, nyemai bua kudihandisha, Nenshihe muntu eu mulengele ne muengeleke, Balami ba mikoko nebalue kumuluisha, bobo ne bisumbu biabo bia mikoko; Nulongolole nvita bua kumuluisha; Jukai, tuye kumulesha butuku, Bualu bua Yehowa wa misumba wakuamba ne, Bu mudi mushimi uhatula mai adimu, Wewe Yelushalema, udimuke, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Nengambile banganyi mei, nendimushe banganyi bua kunvuabo
Biankengeshabo, nebanukengeshe kabidi; bienzabo dî dianyi, nebenze dî dienu kabidi

Wambile Shemaya, Muena Nehelama, ne, Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Bualu bua wewe wakutuma mikanda mu dina diebe kudi bantu bonso ba mu Yelushalema ne kudi Sefanya muakuidi, muana wa Maseva, ne kudi bakuidi bakuabo bonso, wakufunda ne, Yehowa wakukusungula bu muakuidi mu muaba wa Yehoyada muakuidi, bua balombodi bikale mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne ha mutu ha muntu yonso munale udi udivuisha muprofete ne bua kumubuesha mu nkanu ne mu tshikunyi

Lota wakabambila ne, Mukelenge wanyi, kuenji nunku, tangila, muntu webe wakamana kusangana luse ku mesu kuebe, ne wewe wakavudisha luse luebe kundi hawakasungila muoyo wanyi, tshiena mua kunyemena ku mikuna, bua bualu bubi nebunkuate, nenfue bianyi

Bua nakangata kudi Mukelenge bualu bunakanuha ne, Butuku buakamufilabo, Mukelenge Yesu wakamema bidia; hakasakidileye Nzambi, wakabitshibula, wakamba ne, Ebi bidi mubidi wanyi wakanuhebua bualu buenu; enzai nunku bua kubuluka
Ei ngendu ya Bena Isalele ku bisumbu biabo, bakaya ku mpala

Mulambu wandi wakadi dilonga disalame dia tshiamu tshia argent, bujitu buadi buakadi nshekele lukama ne makumi asatu, ne dilonga dia ndondo dia argent wa nshekele makumi muanda mutekete bu nshekele wa mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bubidi buabi biule tente ne bukula bubotesha busangisha ne manyi bu mulambu wa bukula, ne nkutu wa or wa nshekele dikumi mule tente ne musenga wa manananshi; ne muana mulume wa ngombe ne tshimpanga tshimue ne muana mulume wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia; ne mbushi wa mpumbu bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi; ne ngombe ibidi ne bimpanga bitanu ne mbushi ya mpumbu itanu ne bana balume ba mikoko batanu ba tshidimu tshimue bu mulambu wa kuvuisha n au ditalala eu udi mulambu wa Ahila, muana mulume wa Enana
Hashishe muakuidi wakamba ne, Tusemenai ha buihi ne Nzambi
Kanuena bamanye ne, Tuetu netulumbuluishe banjelo, anyi
Bantu ba bungi bakadi bashikame bamunyunguluke; bakamuambila ne, Tangila, mamu ebe ne bana benu badi ku bula bakukeba

Bakafunda bubandi buakamubandabo ha mutu handi ne: Bakakumina n andi banyengi babidi milonda mu bianza ne ku makasa ku mitshi mitshiamakane, mukuabo ku tshianza tshiandi tshia balume, munga ku tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi
Pashishe kuambilaye baminganga bende bua bumishe tshitalu atshi bua katshibodi to
e anyi wakatuanyabo kudi nyama mukuabo; ne munyinyi munyanguke kawena muanze kubuela mukana muanyi
Nakunuambila malu â bua nuenu nuikale ne ditalala munda muanyi
Nyuma wanyi neikale munkatshi muenu; kanutshinyi
Makuabo akamata ha buloba buakadi ha mutu ha mabue, kâkadihu ne buloba bua bungi; tshituha tshihi akatoloka bua kâkadi ne buloba bule; hakabanda diba, akababuka, akafubidila bualu bua kâkadi ne miji
Nuenu balombodi bafofo, nudi numusha kishi kakese mu maluvu, nudi numina kamelu
Dituku dibidi: Netaneyele, muana wa Shuware, wa mu tshisamba tshia bena Isakare
Milambu ivua mfumu yonsu mufila ivua nunku: Dilongu disalame dia tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, dikale ne bujitu bua grame
Numuke ne nuenu nuakadi bahika mu Ejipitu: nutumikile mikenji ei yonso
Yesu wakabambila ne, Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Basangishi ba mulambu ne bakashi ba masandi badi badianjila kubuela mu bukelenge bua Nzambi ku mpala kuenu
Nakakoleshibua bualu bua tshianza tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, tshiakadi kundi; nakasangisha bantu banene ba mu Isalele bua kuyabo n anyi

Wakidikisha bujitu bua mesa a bidia bilesha, ku mesa ne mesa; ne bua argent ya mesa ne mesa; ne bua or ya bitubuidi bia munyinyi ne malonga ne makoho, ne bujitu bua or ya bihanza bionso, ne bua bihanza bia argent kabidi
Nunku ditabusha didi difuma ku diunvua, ne diunvua didi bua dî dia Kilisto

Udi ne luseke luandi mu dibika dia ku lufu dia kumudilu udi ne disanka ne udi wa tshijila; lufu luibidi kaluena ne bukokeshi ku mutu kuabo; kadi nebikale bakuidi ba Nzambi ne ba Kilisto, ne nebakokeshe n andi bidimu tshinunu
Bana ba Palosha binunu bibidi ne lukama ne makumi muanda mutekete ne babidi
Mpindiu nakulua bua kukujinguluila malu adi akuata bana benu mu matuku alualua; bualu bua tshikena kumona etshi tshidi tshikulesha malu a mu matuku adi kayi manji kulua
Bantu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Yuda, nebase mitanda ku tshisumbu ku tshisumbu luseke ludi diba dipatukila, muaba udi dibendela diabu
Nenjule tshiiji tshiabu, ne bantu badi kabayi ne lungenyi

Bukokeshi hua Yalohama Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne bitanu tshia bukelenge bua Amasaya, muana wa Yoasha, mukelenge wa Yuda, Yalobama, muana wa Yoasha, mukelenge wa Isalele, wakabanga kukokesha mu Samalea, wakabakokesha tô bidimu makumi anai ne tshimue
Wewe udi uteleja matshu ebe ku tshifufu tshidi Nzambi wela, anyi

Biakulenduisha disu diebe, wadimasha; bua wewe kubuela mu bukelenge bua Nzambi ne disu dimue kudi kutamba bua wewe kuimashibua mu Ngena ne mesu abidi; amu tshikusu tshiabo katshiena tshitua, kahia kakena kajima
Ngasa wa Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto ikale n enu
Ditutu didi Dibuikila Tshitendelelu Ek
Bene hadada wakanyemena mu musoko, wakabuela mu tshisokomenu munda mua nsubu

Hashishe mukelenge wakabikila bakulu bonso ba mu buloba, wakabambila ne, Tangilai bu mudi muntu eu ukeba diyoyo; wakantumina mukenji bua kuangateye bakashi banyi ne bana banyi ne argent yanyi ne or yanyi; tshiakabenga nansha
Hashishe yeye wakabikila Solomo muan andi, wakamuelela mukenji bua kuibakileye Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, nsubu

Nusangishe bantu bonso, ne balume ne bakashi ne bana bakese ne benyi badi munkatshi muenu, bua buonso buabo bumue, bayile lungenyi, batshine Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, batumikile mei onso a mikenji ei; nunku bana babo badi kabayi banze kumanya nebunvue, nebamanye mua kutshina Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tô matuku onso anudi nushikama mu buloba bunudi nuya dishiya dia Yadene bua kubuhiana
Bualu buakadi munda mua mutshima mua tatu wanyi Davidi bua kuibakileye dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, nsubu
Wakashila bintu bionso bia mu diulu bioshelu mu biendedi bibidi bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Tshidimu tshia makumi atanu netshikale tshidimu tshia disanka dinene kunudi, kanukunyi bintu, kanuhuodi bintu bidi bidimenena anyi tumuma tudi tudimenena
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuenu bena ditabusha dikese, nudi nutshinyina tshinyi
Yone Hakashika malu â, Yesu wakadi wendakana mu Galela; kakadi wendakana mu Yudaya, bualu bua Bena Yuda bakadi bakeba mua kumushiha
Kamushintakashi nansha, nyama muimpe ku nyama mubi anyi nyama mubi ku nyama muimpe, biashintakasheye nyama ku nyama mukuabo, nyama eu ne nyama wakashintakasheye handi nebikale bia tshijila
Nunku Esetê wakajuka hanshi, wakimana ku mesu kua mukelenge

Yeye nênze nunku ne muana mulume wa ngombe, bu muakenzeye ne muana mulume wa ngombe wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu, muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi buabo nunku, ne bubi buabo nebuikale bubuikidibue
Mvua musue kubutula bena Izrayele bonsu, kabayi mua kubatela kabidi pa buloba

Bualu bua tuakulua lumu ne, Bakuabo ba munkatshi muetu bakuya kunudi, bakunutatshisha ne mei abo, badi bamba kuona mioyo yenu; tuetu katuakubatuma ne mukenshi kunudi; hatuakuhunga dî dimue, tuakula meshi ne, Mbimpe tusungule bantu, tubatume kunudi ne bana betu bananga, Bânaba ne Paulo, bobo mene bakafila mioyo yabo bualu bua dina dia Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto

Kuena utusangasha kabidi, Utuleshe luse luebe lujalame, Yehowa, Ngunvue bianyi tshidi Nzambi, Yehowa mene, wamba; Bulelela, luhandu luandi ludi ha buihi ne badi bamutshina, Luse lujalame ne lulamatu lua bushuwa biakusangakanangana; Lulamatu lua bushuwa ludi lutoloka mu buloba; Bulelela, Yehowa neatuheshe masanka adi mimpe, Buakane nebuende ku mpala kuandi, Psalms Yehowa, uteleje matshu ebe, witabe kundi, Ulame muoyo wanyi, bualu bua ndi muntu udi munange Nzambi; Unfuile luse, Mukelenge, Usankishe muoyo Bualu bua wewe, Mukelenge, udi muimpe, Yehowa, uteleje matshu ebe ku kutendelela kuanyi, Mu dituku dia dikenga dianyi nenkubikile; Mukelenge, kakuena umue bu wewe munkatshi mua nzambi ya hatuhu; Ba mu bisamba bionso bia bantu biwakufuka nebalue kukukuila ku mesu kuebe, Mukelenge, Bualu bua wewe udi munene, ne udi wenza malu a kukema; Unyishe nshila webe, Yehowa, bua ngende mu bushuwa buebe; uvuishe mutshima wanyi mutshima Mukelenge Nzambi wanyi, nenkuele tuasakidila ne mutshima wanyi wonso, Bua luse luebe lujalame lûdi undesha ludi lunene; Nzambi, badi badisue bakujuka bua kuntantamena, Kadi wewe, Mukelenge, udi Nzambi udi ufuila bantu luse ne Uhingane kundi, unfuile luse; Undeshe tshimanyinu tshia disanka diebe kundi, Psalms Bishimikidi bia musoko wandi bidi mu mikuna ya tshijila
Nunku Shaula wakalekela kulonda Davidi, wakaya kuluangana ne Bena Peleshete
Bena Yuda bakamuebesha ne, Katuena tuamba bulelela ne, Wewe udi Muena Samalea, udi ne demon munda, anyi
Biafila balume aba bu mudi bantu bonso bafue, anyi biabakuata bualu bu mudibu bukuata bantu bonso, nunku Yehowa kena muntume
Izake kuinyika mpokolu ewu dina ne: Matandu Esheke , bualu bavua bamukeba matandu

Yeye wakamema mitanda itanu ne mishiha ibidi, wakatangila mulu, wakatendelela Nzambi, wakatshibula mitanda, wakaifila mu bianza bia bayidi bua kubitekabo ku mpala kua bantu; yeye wakababanyina buonso buabo mishiha ibidi
Kadi bituamba ne, Kudi bantu, tudi tutshina bantu; bualu bua bantu bonso badi bitabusha Yone ne, Udi muprofete
Mukelenge neabambile ne, Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Bualu bua nuenu nuakenzela umue wa mu bana betu badi batambe kuhuekela nunku, nuakangenzela meme

Mose wakabambila ne, Binuenza bualu ebu, binuangata bintu bia nvita bua kuya n abi ku nvita ku mpala kua Yehowa, ne bena nvita bonso badi basabuka Yadene ku mpala kua Yehowa to ne hashikisheye kuihata bantu bonso badi n andi lukuna ku mpala kuandi, ne hateketa bena buloba bonso ku mpala kua Yehowa, hashishe nenuhingane, kanuena ne bualu bubi kudi Yehowa ne kudi Bena Isalele, ne buloba ebu nebuikale buhianyi buenu ku mesu kua Yehowa
Muana mukashi yonso udi ne buhianyi munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, neikale mukashi wa umue wa mu tshisamba tshia tatu andi, nunku muntu ne muntu wa Bena Isalele neikale ne buhianyi bua batatu abo
Tshilota tshidi tshilua ne malu a bungi; diakula dia muhote didi dihatula mei a bungi
Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mukulu tshia bukokeshi bua Nebukadenesâ, wakumusha bantu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi asatu ne bantu babidi ku Yelushalema bua kuya n abo mu buhika
Hakunvueye tshisumbu tshia bantu tshihita, wakakonka ne, Ntshinyi
Muntu mulume wakadi mu Yelushalema, dina diandi Shimeona; muntu eu wakadi muakane, wakadi kabidi mutumikidi wa mei, wakadi utekemena disamba dia Isalele; Nyuma Muimpe wakadi n andi
Hakatshia butuku Yakoba wakamona ne Lea wakambila Labana ne, Bualu ebu buwakungenzela budi munyi
Nunku mai a lueho kêna mamanye mua kuhatula mai mimpe

Bienzedi bia Solomo bikuabo, bia kumudilu ne bia kunshikidilu, kabiena bifunda mu kulondolola kua Natana muprofete, ne kua Ahiya, Muena Shiloa, ne mu kulondolola kua bikena kumona bia Ido, mumonyi wa malu, biakamoneye bia Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, anyi
Bana ba Elama mukuabo tshinunu ne nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu ne banai
Nanku muaba onsu uvua mukaji awu musombe, nansha bulalu buvuaye mulale pawaye ku tshijila tshia bakaji, bidi bipia mikiya
Nsubu mukuabo wakadiku ne mushiku wandi wa mbelu mutangilangane ne mbalanda wa tshibuelelu etshi, ne bakuvuwamu milambu ya kuosha

Nunku ba gouverneur ne miloho bakakeba bualu bua kubanda n abu Danyele bua muanda wa mu dikokesha diandi dia bukelenge, kadi kabakamusangana ne bualu anyi dihanga, bualu bua yeye wakamanya mua kueyemenyibua, ne kabakasangana dituhakana anyi dihanga munda muandi
Nuikalangane ne ditalala munkatshi muenu
Tuakuenzela Yehowa Nzambi wetu bubi kai
Bua bualu ebu mpindiu tuakuhingana kûdi kabidi bua wewe uye n etu bua kuluangana ne Bena Amona; wewe newikale mukelenge wetu wa Bena Gilada bonso
Tshimuangi Mvidi Mukulu udi umanyisha dikenga dia ndekelu Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ndi ntumina mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne bantu bende dinyoka dia ndekelu

Bakuidi, bakuatshi ba mudimu wa Yehowa, Hashishe, Yehowa wakakuatshika mukau bua buloba buandi, Yehowa wakakudimuna bantu bandi dî, Nennûmushile bena luseke lua nôde, nembatume kule; Wewe buloba, kutshinyi nansha
Kadi mutshi wa olive wakayambila ne, Nshiye mafuta anyi andi ntumbisha n au Nzambi ne bantu kabidi, bua kuya kuhehukahehuka ku mutu kua mitshi mikuabo, anyi
Patupu netufue
Yehowa, ndi nkusengelela bua tshianza tshiebe tshikale kundi ne ku nsubu wa tatu wanyi; kadi katshikadi kudi bantu bebe bua bobo bikale ne tshihuhu etshi
Muntu yonso wa munkatshi mua Bena Isalele anyi wa benyi badi munkatshi muabo udi ulemba nyama anyi nyunyu bua kudia neahongolole mashi andi hanshi, neajibikile ne dinfuenkenya dia buloba

Yesu wakandamuna ne, Mukenshi wa kumudilu udi nunku: Unvua, Isalele, Mukelenge Nzambi wetu, Mukelenge udi umue; sua Mukelenge Nzambi webe ne mutshima webe wonso ne muoyo webe wonso ne lungenyi luebe luonso ne bukole buebe buonso
Kumona ne mesu kudi kutamba kujinga buakane; ebu mbualu bua hatuhu, bu kuihata kua luhehele
Hakahita bidimu makumi abidi, Solomo wakamana nsubu ibidi: nsubu wa Yehowa ne nsubu wa mukelenge
Ezekiel Wewe kabidi, muana wa muntu, ambila mikuna ya mu Isalele dî dia baprofete, uyambile ne
Mu matuku au, hashika dikenga, diba nedifikuluke, ngondo kena ukenka, mitoto neituke mulu, neihone, nebanyukule bukole buakadi buendesha bintu ebi mu diulu
Maweja Nangila kuambila kabidi Moshe ne: Ndi nkupesha bukole bua kuenza bishima

Bakangata tshikowelu tshia Yosefe, bakashiha mbushi, bakina tshikowelu mu mashi, bakatuma tshikowelu tshia maboko male kudi tatu wabo, bakamba ne, Tuakutshisangana hanshi, umanye ne ntshikowelu tshia muan ebe, anyi
Bana ba Sena, binunu bisatu ne nkama isambombo ne makumi asatu
Tshilamba tshionsu, tshikale ne metre dikumi ne anayi mu bule ne metre abidi mu butshiama
Nebabutuke bonsu

Bualu bua buloba buakamana kumina nvula wakaloka ha mutu habu misangu ya bungi ne budi bumenesha midioko idi ikuatshisha bantu badibo babudimina, budi buangata disanka kudi Nzambi; kadi bikala buloba bumenesha meba ne nyiny a tshisonga, budi buhidibua ne budi hehi ne mulau; kunshikidilu kuabu nkuhia
Diba nedikudimuke midima ne ngondo neakudimuke mashi, diambedi dituku adi dinene dia Yehowa, didi dikuatshisha bantu buowa, kadiyi dianze kulua

Dituku adi Davidi wakadianjila kuela mukenji bua kusakidilabo Yehowa kudi Asafa ne bana babo ne musambu eu, ne, Nusakidile Numuimbile misambu, numuimbile misambu ya kumutumbisha n ai, Nutumbile mu dina diandi dia tshijila; Kebai bienu Yehowa ne bukole buandi, Nuvuluke bienu bienzedi bia kukema biakuenzeye, nuenu tunkanunuma tua Isalele muntu wandi, Yeye udi Yehowa Nzambi wetu; Udi uvuluka tshihungidi tshiandi kashidi, tshihungidi tshiakahungeye ne Abalahama, Wakaujadika kudi Yakoba bu mukenji ne kudi Isalele Wakamba ne, Nenkuhe buloba bua Kanâna, Hakadibo anu bantu banya banya bua bungi buabo, hakendakanabo ku tshisamba ne ku tshisamba, kakitabusha bua muntu umue kubenzela bibi
Bualu bavua balambule Maweja Nangila mulambu wa manananshi, avua kaayi a tshijila
Mulambu wonso wa bukula budi busangisha ne manyi, anyi mulambu wa bukula nkayabu, newikale wa bana balume ba Alona, muntu tshituha tshiandi muntu tshituha tshiandi
Muntu yonso udi usangisha manyi bu au, anyi udi waela muenyi, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bana babo
Yeye wakatuma bamessager kudi Abimeleke mu musokoko bamba ne, Gala, muana wa Ebede, ne bana babo bakatua ku Shekeme, badi bakeba mua kukutombueshila bena musoko
Hakatshiabu Mose wakabuela mu ntenta wa kusambakena, ne monai, mulangala wa Alona wa mu nsubu wa Lewi wakadi muele ntonga ne bilongo, wakakuama tumuma tukese tua amandes
Nundeshe ndenalio
Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Tentekashai milambu yenu ya kuosha ha kahia ha mutu ha milambu yenu mikuabo, nudie munyinyi wai
Tuvua badimuene bishima binene ne bia dikema, bivua Maweja Nangila mukengeshe nabi mukalenga awu, diku diende ne bantu bende bonsu

Udie anu tshituha tshiabu tshidi tshikukumbanyina, Dikasa diebe didiate ku nsubu wa muena mutumba n ebe anu misangu mibalê, Muntu udi ubanda muena mutumba n andi tshibandabanda Kueyemena muntu udi kayi mua kueyemenyibua mu tshikondo tshia dikenga Udi wimbila mutshima udi unema bujitu misambu Bikala muena lukuna webe ne nzala, umuhe bia kudia; bikaleye ne nyota, umuhe mai a kunua
Biwenza nunku, ne Bikala Nzambi numuambile dî diandi nunku, wewe neumanye mua kuikala ne bukole ne bantu nebaye ku miaba yabo talalâ
Muana mukashi wa Palô wakumuka mu musoko wa Davidi, wakabuela mu nsubu wakamuashila Solomo; hashishe yeye wakasa Milo
Mukelenge wa Isalele wakambila Yehoshafata ne, Tshiakukuambila ne, Yeye katu Wamba malu mimpe bualu buanyi, kadi anu malu mabi, anyi
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne bisatu ne nkama mai
Wakenza mitshi ya acacia, wakaladika tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yonso bua kutuala n ai mesa
Tuakubutula Eshebone

Davidi wakamunyenga bantu bakadi benda ha nyima ha tubalu tshinunu tshimue ne nkama muanda mutekete, ne bakadi benda hanshi binunu makumi abidi; Davidi wakakosa tubalu tuonso mifungu yatu, kadi wakasungula tukuabo bua makalu lukama
Yeye neanunyenge tshia dikumi tshia bimuna bienu; nuenu nenuikale bahika bandi
Hakambeye dî edi, tshilala tshiakasama

Buakabuluibua Ku nyima kua malu â nakunvua dî bu dî dikole dia tshisumbu tshinene tshia ba mu diulu bamba ne, bualu bua dilumbulula diandi didi dilelela ne diakane; bualu bua wakulumbuluisha mukashi wa masandi mimene, yeye wakanyanga buloba ne masandi andi, ne wakasombuela mashi a bahika bandi mualombe ku tshianza tshiandi
Ke bikulu ba Esawu, bavuabu balele kudi Reyuwele, muana wa Basmate

kadi bakatombokela Nzambi Kadi yeye wakabasungila bualu bua dina diandi, Wakabela Mai Manene Makunze kabidi ne akakama; Ka wakabasungila mu bianza bia wakabakina, Mai akubuikila bakengeshi babo, Hashishe, bakitabusha mei andi, Bakahua bienzedi biandi muoyo lukasa; Kadi bakasamina muoyo ne lukuka lukole mu tshihela; Yeye wakabaha tshintu tshiakalombabo, Bakadi ne Mose mukau kabidi mu tshitudilu; Buloba buakabulula mukana muabu, buakamina Datana, Kahia kakatema munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshiabo; Bakenza kana ka ngombe ku Holeba, Bakashintakasha wabo wa butumbi Bakahua Nzambi Musungidi wabo muoyo, wakabenzela bienzedi bia kukema mu boloba bua Hama Nunku yeye wakamba ne, Nembabutule; Hashishe, bakahetula buloba abu buimpe, Kadi bakatontolola mu nsubu yabo ya ntenta, Nunku yeye wakabisha tshianza tshiandi bua kuditshiha bua bualu buabo ne, nentangadishe tunkanunuma tuabo munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu ba bende, Bakadilamika kudi Bâla Peô; Nunku bakakuatshisha Yehowa tshiji bua bienzedi biabo, Hashishe, Pinehasa wakajuka, wakashikisha tshilumbu, Bualu ebu buakabadibua kudiye bu buakane Bakakuatshisha Yehowa tshiji kabidi ku mai a Meliba, Bualu bua bakanyingalasha mutshima Kabakabutula bena buloba abu kadi bakabuelakana ne ba mu bisamba abi bia bantu, Bakakuatshila mpingu yabo mudimu, Bulelela, bakashihela bademon bana babo baledibue, Bakatatshisha mashi a bantu bakadi kabayi ne tshilumbu hanshi, Nunku bakadibihisha ku bienzedi biakenzabo, Bua malu â tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakatemena bantu bandi bua kuba kengesha, Wakabafila mu bianza bia bisamba bia bantu ba bende; Bena lukuna babo kabidi bakabakengesha, Yeye wakabahandisha misangu ya bungi, Kadi yeye wakamona dikenga diabo Wakavuluka tshihungidi tshiandi bua bualu buabo, Yeye wakabayuisha bantu ba kufuidibua luse Utusungile, wewe Yehowa Nzambi wetu, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, avudishibue disanka, Psalms Sakidilai bienu Yehowa, bualu bua yeye udi muimpe; Bantu badi Yehowa muhikule bambe biabo nunku, hakumusheye mu maloba onso bua kubasangisha hamue, Bakendakana mu tshihela, mu tshihela tshia lusenga muakadi kamuyi nshila; Bakadi ne nzala ne nyota, mitshima Nunku bakadila kudi Yehowa mu ntatu yabo, Yeye wakabalombola mu nshila mululame, Basakidile biabo Yehowa bua luse luandi lujalame Bualu bua yeye udi uha muntu tshidiye ujinga, Banga bantu aba bakashikama mu mîdima ne mu mufitu muhite bukole, bualu bua bakatombokela mei a Nzambi, Bua malu â yeye wakahuekesha mitshima yabo ne mudimu mukole; Nunku bakadila kudi Yehowa mu ntatu yabo, Wakabaluhula mu midima ne mu mufitu mukole, Basakidile Yehowa bua luse luandi lujalame Bualu bua wakutshibula bibi bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, Bantu bahote badi badivuishila dikenga bua diya diabo mu nshila wa ditombokela diabo, Mitshima yabo idi ikenuka mishindu ya bia kudia yonso; Nunku bakadila kudi Yehowa mu ntatu yabo, Wakabatumina dî diandi, wakashikisha masama abo, Basakidile Yehowa bua luse luandi lujalame Bafile milambu kudiye ya kumusakidila n ai, Bakahueka ku mai manene mu matu, bakamona biabo bienzedi bia Yehowa, Bualu bua wakela mukenji, wakahehesha tshihehele tshiakadi bu tshihuhu, Bakabanda mulu, bakahueka kabidi muinshi mu mai a ndondo, Bakatenkakana eku ne eku, bakadi balendukalenduka bu muntu mukuatshike maluvu, Nunku bakadila kudi Yehowa mu ntatu yabo, Wakaholesha tshihuhu bua tshituye biatshi, Ka bobo bakasanka bualu bua mavuala au akabatama, Basakidile biabo Yehowa bua luse luandi lujalame Bamunemeshe mu disangisha dia bantu, Udi ukudimuna misulu bua kuluayi tshihela tshia lusenga, Udi ukudimuna buloba bufuke bua kuluabu tshihela tshia luehu, Udi ukudimuna tshihela tshia lusenga bua kuluatshi dishiba dia mai, Mu miaba yaya udi ushikamisha badi ne nzala, Badi bakuna maminu mu madimi, badi batentula mionshi ya tumuma mu manga madimi, Udi ubavudishila disanka, badi bavulangana ba bungi; Hadi bungi buabo bukeheshibua, ne hadibo bahuekeshibua hanshi yeye udi uhongolola kulengulula kuandi ha baminyampala, Kadi udi ushikika bahele mu muaba wa mulu bumushibue biabo mu dikenga, Bantu bakane badi batangila bualu ebu, badi basanka; benji ba malu mabi badi bahuwa biabo

Lewitiki Bienza muntu bualu bubi, yeye mumane kuditshiha ne muikale mumanyi wa bualu, mubumone ne mesu andi, mubumanye mu mutshima wandi kadi yeye muhidie kumanyisha bantu, yeye neadituadile dihila dia bubi buandi
Hakunvua bena lukuna betu bonso lumu elu, bisamba bionso bia bantu biakatunyunguluka biakatshina, biakadi ne bundu bunene ku mesu; bualu bua bobo bakajingulula ne, Nzambi wabo nguakenzesha mudimu eu
Kuyilabu njila wa Mayi manene makunze
Kadi bena buloba bakashiha bantu aba bakelela Amona tshifufu; bena buloba bakahingisha Yoshiya muan andi mu bukelenge mu muaba wandi
Hashishe, Yehowa wakamatshisha mu Sodoma ne Amola soufre ne kalua bia mu diulu kudi Yehowa

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nenjidile dina dianyi dinene diakanyangabo munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu, dinuakanyanga bienu mene munkatshi muabo; ne ba mu bisamba abi nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, hanadimuenesha bu Wa Tshijila ku mpala kuabo ku bienzedi bindi nnuenzela
Hakikila nyunyu ya bikololo ha bitalu ebi, Abalama wakayihata
Bualu yeye mudidile Maweja Nangila, nenuikale bena tshibawu
Kumuangalaye nabu mu ditunga dia Ure wa bena Babilone, kuya kuasa mu ditunga dia Kenaane
Nudi numbikila ne, Muyishi ne Mukelenge; nudi nuamba bimpe, bua meme ndi nunku
Hashishe muntu udi uhanduka ku muele wa nvita wa Hazaele, Yehu neamushihe; muntu udi uhanduka ku muele wa nvita wa Yehu, Elisha neamushihe
Luai ne mulambu kudiye, luai ku mpala kuandi
Hakabatangila mukelenge wa Isalele, yeye wakebesha Elisha ne, Tatu wanyi, nembashihe, anyi
Butuku ne munya tudi tutamba kulomba Nzambi bikole bua tuetu kunumona ku mesu, ne bua tuetu kukumbasha malu anudi nuhanga kuikala n au mu ditabusha dienu
Bualu bua wakuanza kufunyina Nzambi ku disua diandi nganyi

Yoaba, muana wa Seluya, ne bantu bakuabo ba Davidi bakaluhuka, bakasambakena n abo hehi ne dishiha dia mu Gibeona; bakashikama hanshi, bakuabo ku muelelu umue wa dishiha, bakuabo ku muelelu mukuabo wa dishiha
Biwikala Kilisto, utuambile hatoke
Mai akahingana, akabanda ha mutu ha makalu ne ha mutu ha masalayi akadi enda ha tubalu, ha mutu ha bisumbu bionso bia Palô, biakabalonda mu bunene bua mai, nansha umue wabo wakahandika
Nujingulule malu onso; nulamate malu adi mimpe; nuehuke ku malu mabi a mushindu wonso
Kadi muntu nansha umue wa kunudi, kena mua kukengesha muanabu muena Izrayele to

Kulua kuandi kudi bu mudi kuenzesha kua Satana, ne bukole buonso, ne bimanyinu, ne malu a kukema a mashimi, ne kudinga kuonso kua malu mabi kudi batshidi bajimina mu lufu; bualu bua kabakitabusha dinanga dia bualu bulelela bua bobo basungidibue
Mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Wewe udi ukeba tshinyi
Mose wakinama mutu wandi lubilu, wakatendelela
Kadi Yesu wakamuebesha ne, Yudasa, udi utungila Muana wa muntu tshitungu ku kutuangana kua mishiku, anyi
Munkatshi muabo mudi Humenayo ne Alesandelo; banakafila kudi Satana, bua bayishibue ne, Kanuhendi Nzambi
Petelo wakambila Yesu ne, Mukelenge, hatudi kunoko mbimpe; biwasua, nengase bitanda bisatu, tshikuabo ntshiebe, tshinga ntshia Mose, tshikuabo ntshia Eliya
Kakuena Muena Yuda anyi Muena Gelika; kakuena muhika anyi mudishikamine; kakuena mulume anyi mukashi; bualu bua buonso buenu nudi muntu umue mu Kilisto Yesu
Bena Shimeona bakaya n abo

Mfumu yônso wa ditunga dijima, wa polovensa, wa musoko anyi wa kabukulu udi ne tshia kusungila bumwe bwa Ditunga ne bujima bwa malaba aadi, tshianana badi bamupiisha ne tshibawu tshia dipangila dia ditunga

Dutelonone Yehowa Neabuele Bisamba bia Bena Kanâna Unvuai, Isalele, nenusabuke Yadene lelu, bualu bua kuihata bisamba bidi binuhita bunene ne bukole, ne misoko minene idi ne mpangu mile idi mihite mulu, bantu banene badi bale, bana balume ba Anaka, banudi bamanye; nuakulua lumu luabo ne, Nganyi udi mua kuimana ku mpala kua bana balume ba Anaka

Basadoke bakahia kudiye, badi bamba ne, Dibika dia ku lufu kadienaku; bakamukonka ne, Muyishi, Mose wakafundila ne, Biafua muan abo ne muntu, biashîeye mukashi wandi kai ne muana, muan abo angate mukashi wandi, alelele muan abo wakafua bana

Butuku abu mene muanjelo wa Yehowa wakaya munkatshi mua tshitudilu tshia Bena Ashû, wakashiha bantu binunu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu ne bitanu; hakabika bantu ne dinda dionso, bakasangana bitalu bia bantu bamane kufua bonso

Nudimuke, kanuedianganyi meji mabi mu mitshima yenu ne, Tshidimu tshia muanda mutekete, tshidibo balekelelangana bintu tshikadi ha kulua, ne kanuenzedi muan enu muhele bibi, bua kubenga kumuha tshintu; bua kadidi kudi Yehowa bualu buebe, ne bua wewe kushadi ne bubi
Kanudipishi mikiya panudi nulenga nyama, nyunyi nansha bilandadi bidi ne mikiya

Hanateka mutshima wanyi ku dijingulula dia meji ne ku dimona dia midimu idi yenjibua ha buloba bualu bua bakuabo badiku badi kabayi baheta tulu ku mesu munya ne butuku , nunku nakatangila midimu yonso ya Nzambi, nakamona ne, Muntu kena mumanye mua kujingulula midimu yonso idi mienjibue muinshi mua diba, nansha muntu munanukile bua kuyikeba, yeye kena usheta; bielangana muena lungenyi meji ne, Nakayimanya, yeye mene kena ne bukole bua kuyisangana

Yoele Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yoele, muana wa Petuele, ne, Unvuai dî edi, nuenu bantu bakulumpe; Ambilai bana benu muanda eu, Tshintu tshiakashiyabo kudi mukumbi udi ukosa Tabalai, nuenu bakuatshiki ba maluvu, dilai bienu; Bualu bua tshisamba tshia bantu tshiakulua kubunda ba mu buloba buanyi, Tshiakunyanga mionshi yanyi ya tumuma tua nvinyo, Asai muadi bu mukashi utshidi kamama muluate bilamba bikayabala Mulambu wa bia kudia ne mulambu wa bia kunua yakushika, Madimi akubutudibua; bualu bua manvua Ba bidime bakufua bundu, Muonshi wa tumuma udi munyanguke, Luatai bilulu bikayabala, asai muadi, nuenu bakuidi, Jidilai tshikondo tshia kujila bia kudia, Aka

Hashishe Davidi wakaha Solomo muan andi luidi lua mbalanda wa ntempelo, ne lua nsubu wandi, ne lua bibutshilu biandi, ne lua nsubu ya ku mutu, ne lua nsubu ya munda muandi, ne lua muaba wa tshibuikilu tshia or; ne luidi lua ngenyi yandi yonso ya biendedi bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa, ne ya nsubu yandi yonso, ne ya bibutshilu bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa, ne ya bitekelu bia bintu bia tshijila; ne ya milongo ya bakuidi ne Bena Lewi, ne ya midimu yonso ya mu nsubu wa Yehowa, ne ya mpanza yonso ya mu nsubu ya Yehowa
Bantu ba mu Bete azamawete makumi anai ne babidi

Hakatangila Mose ne bantu bakadi batomboka Alona wakabanda bua kudifuishishabo bundu kudi bena lukuna babo , Mose wakimana ku mbelu kua tshitudilu, wakamba ne, Udi ku luseke lua Yehowa alue biandi kundi Bana balume bonso ba Lewi bakadisangisha kudiye
Dî dia Nzambi diakafuma kunudi, anyi
Hakatshiabu, yeye wakaluhuka, wakimana, wakambila bantu bonso ne, Nuenu nudi bakane; meme nakelela mukelenge wanyi tshifufu, nakamushiha; kadi wakashiha bonso aba nganyi
Mukenji ewu nuulame kashidi ku ndelanganyi ne ku ndelanganyi yenu yonsu
Muntu mulenge mayi awu, neikale kabidi ne mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Biwikala ne mukashi wa ngombe anyi wa mukoko, kumushihi ne muana wandi dituku dimue

Kanungu ka Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu kadi katangila malomba a ditangilula ngumvwilu wa Dîyi dikulu, pa dilomba dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga , dia Bukalenga bunene, dia Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe, dia Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia Batshipwita munwamfwanka, dia tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia beena tshibambalu tshimwe ne tshimwe tshia Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga, dia banguvenêla ba polovensa ne dia balombodi bia bimamwenda wa bukalenga bia polovensa
Kadi nuenu bena Izrayele, Maweja Nangila mmunukebe, munupatule kabidi mu Ejipitu, munuvua munkatshi mua dikenga dikole, bua nuikale tshisamba tshiende yeye, bu munudi lelu

Nakuvuluka dî dia Mukelenge diakambeye ne, Bulelela, Yone wakabatiza bantu ne mai, kadi nuenu nenubatijibue mu Bikala Nzambi mubahe kuha kuakutuheye hatuakuitabusha Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto, ahu meme nakadi nganyi wa kufuilangana ne Nzambi
Hashishe Abalahama wakahingana kudi bansongalume bandi, bakabika, bakaya bonso hohamue ku Be sheba, Abalahama wakashikama mu Be sheba

Dielulula MIKENJI YA MAWEJA NANGILA Meyi ne mikenji binudi ne bua kukumbaja matuku onsu mu ditunga, didi Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu, munupe bua kusomba kashidi, bidi nunku: Muaba wa kutendelela wikale anu umue Nunyangakaje miaba ya tshijila yonsu, idibu base pa nsongu ya mikuna minene ne mikese, munkathi mua mitshi ya dileji, muaba udibu batendelela mvidie kudi bisamba binuanyenga matunga abi
Bakambilangana ne, Mitshima yetu kayakadi itema munda muetu, anyi, hakadiye utuambila malu mu nshila, hakadiye utujinguluila Mukanda wa Nzambi
Moshe kuitaba diyi dia Maweja Nangila
Ne Yehowa kakakudimuna mutshima wandi bua makenga akadiye musue kubatumina, anyi
Ba Bena Lewi bakadi Yozabada ne Shimeyi ne Kelaya udi Kelita kabidi ne Petahiya ne Yuda ne Eliezê

Hakaya bifukibue ebi, nkata yakaya, hakimana bifukibue ebi talalâ, nkata ai yakimana kabidi; hakajuka difukibue ebi hanshi, nkata yakajuka n abi diakamue; bualu bua nyuma wa bifukibue bidi ne muoyo wakadi munda mua nkata
Tudi bamanye ne, Nzambi wakakula ne Mose, kadi muntu eu, katuena bamanye kuakufumeye

Anji kuikala ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima: udimuke bua kutumikila mikenji yonso yakakuambila muntu wanyi Mose; kusesuka ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi, nunku newikale ne diakalengele kuonso kuwaya
Maweja Nangila uvua wakula mu divuba amu uyukila ne Moshe
Usangishe biakudia bia mishindu yonsu, ubitekele mu buatu bua numone mua kudia wewe ne bena diebe, kabidi ne nyama
Bantu bakaluhuka, bakahaula tshitudilu tshia Bena Sulia

Ku luseke lua ku nôde kabidi, enza bilulu bidi bituangane to ne ku coudées lukama, ne makunshi makumi abidi ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku makumi abidi; bitubuidi bia ku makunshi nebikale bia argent
Tudi bantu bamue

Yelemiya Â mmei a mu mukanda mufume ku Yelushalema wakatuma Yelemiya muprofete kudi bakadi bashala ba munkatshi mua bakulu bakaya mu buhika, ne kudi bakuidi, baprofete ne bantu bonso bakadi Nebukadenesâ mumushe ku Yelushalema bua kuya n abo mu buhika ku Babulona
Katataka, tudi mu tshianza tshiebe, utuenzele budi buimpe ku mesu kuebe
Dî edi diakatangadika munkatshi mua bana babo ba mu Kilisto ne, Muyidi eu kena ufua; kadi Yesu kakamba ne, Yeye kena ufua; wakamba ne, Binasua bua ashale ne muoyo tô ne hanalua, mbualu buebe, anyi
Yahata wakadi kahita, Ziza muibidi; kadi Yeusha ne Belia kabakadi ne bana balume ba bungi; nunku bobo bakadi babadibue mu nsubu umue wa batatu babo
Ke bena Izrayele bakuabu bonsu kushisha kusemena kudi Moshe
Bantu bakuabu, kushisha kumuambuluisha bua kumushipa
Kadi mu bualu ebu ndi nuha dijingulula dianyi: ebu mbualu bunudi n abu, nuenu mbakabanga bualu ebu tshidimu tshia ku mpala, kembua kuenza nkayaku, kadi mbua kusua kuenza kabidi
Kanulu ne tshintu tshidi tshitonda Yehowa mu nsubu muenu bua kufuanangana n atshi: nuhidie tshintu atshi, nuikale n atshi lukuna; atshi ntshintu tshibihe tshia tshijila

Bualu bua nudi bamanye bu mutuakashikama mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ne mutuakahita munkatshi mua bisamba biakadi mu nshila; ne nuenu nuakatangila malu mabi abo ne mpingu yabo ya mitshi ne ya mabue ne ya tshiamu tshia argent ne tshia or yakadi munkatshi muabo; bua muntu kikadi munkatshi muenu, nansha mulume nansha mukashi nansha diku dia bantu nansha tshisamba, udi akudimuna mutshima wandi kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kukuatshila nzambi ya bisamba abi mudimu; ne bua muji udi ukuama mamuma a mulungu ne a bululu kawikadi munkatshi muenu
Ngunwua nanku, meme kumukonka ne: Kadi pikala nsongakaji awu mubenge bua tuetu kuya nende, ndi mua kuenza tshinyi
Hashishe yeye wakalua n anyi mu nshila wa ku tshibuelelu tshia ku luseke lua nôde tô ne ku mpala kua ntempelo; nakatangila, ekumona

Muanjelo muisatu wakela mpungi ne mu diulu muakahona mutoto munene mutema bu tshimunyi, wakahona ha tshituha tshisatu tshia misulu, ne ha mishimi ya mai; ne dina dia mutoto didi Bululu, ne tshituha tshisatu tshia mai tshiakalua bululu; ne bantu ba bungi bakafua bualu bua mai, bualu bua akavuishibua bululu
Moshe udi umonangana ne Mvidi Mukulu ku mukuna Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Banda ku mukuna kundi eku usombaku

Ne yeye kabidi, udi ne bukitu, udi ne mutshima bu mutshima wa nyama wa ntambue, nênguluke; bualu bua Bena Isalele bonso badi bamanye ne tatu webe udi muntu mukole ne bantu badi n andi badi bena bukitu
Nunku, mukelenge, ujadike mukandu eu, ufunde dina diebe ha mukanda udi ne mukenji eu, bua muntu kamanyi mua kuwandamuna, bu mudi mukenji wa Bena Madai ne Bena Pelasa, udi kauyi mua kukudimuka
Yeye wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakatshiangata
Bintu bionsu bidiye nabi mbifumine anu ku bubanji buonsu bua tatu budiye munyenge
Pashishe, wangate kabidi bintu abi, ubiteke pa tshilambuilu pa mutu pa mulambu wa kuosha, bua bikale mulambu wa dipembu udi unnunkila meme Maweja Nangila
Kadi bobo kabakunvuila, kabakateleja matshu abo, kadi bakakolesha mitshimi yabo, bua kabunvu biabo, kabitabushi diyisha dianyi
Pikala Maweja Nangila mumane kubutula bantu abu, kanulondi bibidilu biabu to
Kanuena bena mioyo yenu
Ndi musue kulama ne kudisha bimuna biebe bu mumvua ngenza

Nenufile milambu ya buatshia buatshia nunku, milambu ya kuosha ha kahia tô matuku muanda mutekete, idi itua dihembu kudi Yehowa, nenufile milambu ei ku mutu kua milambu mudi nuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua

Mpanza yonso ya kunuina mukelenge Solomo yakadi ya or, ne mpanza yonso ya mu nsubu wandi wa ditu dia Lebanona yakadi ya or kabidi; kabakabala argent bu tshintu tshia mushinga mukole mu matuku a Solomo
Ndi nkutshihisha mu dina dia Nzambi ne, Kunkengeshi; bua Yesu wakamana kumuela dî ne, Hatuka munda mua muntu eu, wewe nyuma wa bukoya
Kanudisombuedi ne bana benu, kanujilanganyi nabu
Yeye wakamba ne, Batangile mukashi eu wakedibua mulau, bamujike bualu bua yeye wakadi muana wa mukelenge
Dutelonone Matuku a Masanka Majalame Ek

Bantu bamwela diboku mulu Bwa bwimpa bwenda Yoyoyo Kemayi Muntu wa bwela mu cyalukamu Kusekiseki mwineba Maria Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Kabulu kwamba kusekiseki mwineba Kumanyimanyi ciya Maalu se tubwa twa ku njìngu Muntu yonso udi ne bwenda mu mucìma maamù eyo Yoyoyo kemayi, yoyoyo balumiana Mucima se lubanza lua maalu Wewa muswe kucina maalu Sanka olonda meyi ne mikandu ya Mulopo Kwema dinanga munda mwebe Unanga Nzambi webe kumpala kwa bionso Unemeke baledi bembe Kuvualakanyi kantu ka mukwebe shabana eyo Mukàjì wa benda kelengi

Bualu bua tuakudianjila kubanda Bena Yuda ne Bena Gelika kabidi ne, Buonso buenu nudi munshi mua bukokeshi bua bubi; bu muakafundabo ne, Kakuena muntu udi ujingulula buakane bua Nzambi, Bonso bakahambuka, bakalua ba tshianana bonso; Muminu wabo udi bu lukita lubulula: Mukana muabo mudi mûle tente ne milau ne bululu; Makasa abo adi aya lubilu bua kumatshisha mashi; Dibutula ne kanyinganyinga bidi mu nshila yabo; Kabena bamanye nshila wa ditalala
Mu muaba wa tshijila wakenza bakeluba babidi ne mitshi ya olive, bule buabo bua mulu buakadi coudées dikumi
Malonga onso a or ne a argent akadi binunu bitanu ne nkama inai
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Nakunvua tshitanu tshia Bena Isalele, ubambile ne, Dilolo nenudie munyinyi, dinda nenukute bidia, nuenu nenumanye ne, Meme ndi bianyi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Ne tshimue tshia bifukibue binai bidi ne muoyo tshiakahesha banjelo muanda mutekete mpanza ya ngolo muanda mutekete miûle tente ne tshishi tshia Nzambi udi ne muoyo tshiendelele
Hashishe bakangata mifuba yabo, bakayijika muinshi mua mutshi wa mu Yabesha, bakajila bia kudia tô matuku muanda mutekete
Ku tshikondo atshi Yoshua wakahingana, wakanyenga Hasô, wakashiha mukelenge wau ne muele wa nvita; bualu bua Hasô wakadi ku mutu kua makelenge au onso diambedi
Buonso buabi bisatu biakadi ne madidishi ku nseke yonso mabuikila ne tubaya tutshiamakashe
Mose Wakabikila bakulu bonso ba Bena Isalele, wakabambila ne, Nusungule bana ba mikoko bungi buai buikale bungi bua meku enu, nuyishihe bua kuhita kua Yehowa
Bikaleye kayi muhikudibue nunku, yeye neumuke halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, yeye ne bana bandi
Bualu muntu musemene pabuipi ne mukuna nebamushipe
Bana ba balume ba Heleme, muan abo wa balume: Sofâ ne Yimena ne Sheleshe ne Amala

Bualu ku bisamba bionsu, nansha bidi ne bantu bapite bungi, kakuena tshisamba tshidi ne mvidie pabuipi natshi, bu mudi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu pabuipi netu, misangu yonsu itudi Kunubikila, tumulomba diambuluisha

Yonatana wakakudimuna Shaula ne, Davidi wakunsengelela bikole bua kuyeye ku Beteleheme; yeye wakungambila ne, Witabushe bua meme kuya, bualu bua badi mu tshiota tshietu badi bashihela Yehowa nyama mu musoko; muan etu wakumbikilaku: binasangana luse ku mesu kuebe, witabushe bua meme kuya kutangila bana betu
Bualu bua dikolesha dia mubidi didi ne mushinga muimpe kakese; kadi buimpe bua Nzambi budi ne mushinga muimpe mu malu onso, budi ne mulayi wa muoyo wa mpindiu ne wa muoyo ukadi ha kulua
