Yeye wakela dî kudi muntu wakadi muluate bivualu bia lin, wakadi ne kalondo ka mai a mukanda ka mufundi kasuika mu tshifuka tshiandi
Kadi kabidi ne bukookeshi bwa kulumbulwisha badibo babunda nabo bilumbu ne bavwa babambulwisha
Butuku abu Mvidi Mukulu kumuenekela Labane muena Arame mu tshilota, umukandika ne: Udimuke, kukengeshi Yakobe ku bualu nansha bumue
Ezekiel Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi kabidi ne, Muana wa muntu, wamanyisha Yelushalema bua malu mabi andi a tshinyangu
Netuambe tshinyi

Bana ba Nafatale ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Nafatale binunu makumi atanu ne bisatu ne nkama mai

Tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudi Bena Isalele kabidi, ne yeye wakamba ne, Bualu bua tshisamba etshi tshiakashiha tshihungidi tshinakahunga ne batatu abo, kabakunvua dî dianyi, meme kabidi tshiena ngihata bisamba bia bantu ku mpala kuabo, biakashiya Yoshua hakafueye: bua meme kuteta n abo Bena Isalele bua kumanya ne bobo nebalamate nshila wa Yehowa bua kuendamu bu muakenza batatu abo
Aba mbana ba balume ba Gilada, muana wa Makî, muana wa Manashe

Mose wakabikila Yoshua, wakamuambila ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso ne, Wikale ne bukole ne mutshima wa dikima, bualu bua wewe uyaya ne bantu aba mu buloba buakalaya Yehowa batatu babo bua kubahabu; ne wewe neubahianyishe buloba abu
Muntu yonsu udi ulenga tshintu tshivua muena disama edi musombe, neapie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Solomo wakalua ne bintu bionso biakajidila tatu wandi Davidi Nzambi, bintu bia argent ne bia or ne malonga onso, wakabiteka mu bibu tshilu bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Kadi kilo ne grame ivua mishale, kuenzabu nayi nkanu ya ku makunji, mitu ya makunji ne milonda ya kulamakaja nayi makunji awu

Bialuangana balume ne badi bakulua mukashi udi ne difu, ne yeye udi utula difu, kadi dikenga dikuabo kadiena dilonda ku nyima, yeye wakamukuma neafutie mulume wandi bintu bidiye musue, yeye neamufute bintu bidi balumbuluishi bamba
Kadi, mudi bilamba ebi bia tshijila, udi ne bua kubivuala amu yeye muanji kuowa mayi
Bakamba ne, Idi muanda mutekete, ne tushiha tukese
Bienzedi bia Uziya bikuabo ne malu onso biakenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ha Yuda, anyi

Mose wakatendekena Yehowa, Nzambi wandi, wakamba ne, Yehowa, bualu kai tshiji tshiebe tshidi tshitambe bukole kudi bantu bebe bawakaluhula mu buloba bu Ejipitu ne bukole bunene ne tshianza tshia bukole

Nansha nanku, pa kupanga diumvwangana munkatshi mwa bibambalu biônso bibidi ebi, badi mwa kwanyisha dîyi kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwanfwanka panyima pa dikonkonona dia ndekeelu anu pikala tshitupa tshitamba bunene tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka tshianyisha; c mêyi malongolodi badi mwa kuapatula anu pikala Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu, pa dilomba dia Mulombodi wa Ditunga, kajadika diumvwangana diawu ne Dîyi dikulu, mu tshipungu tshia matuku dikumi ne ataanu
Bantu betu bayile kabidi mua kunanukila mu midimu mimpe bua kuhetabo bintu bidibo n abi bualu; bua kabikadi bu bantu badi kabai bakuama mamuma
kupangisha dijinga diônso dia kufikisha ku bukalenga bwa nkaya;
Mifungu yakadi ham bidi hai, misunyi yakamueneka, ne dikoba diakayibuikila mu miaba yonso; kadi kakuakadi muhuya munda muai
Wakakudimana ha bulalu buandi, wakatangisha mpala wandi ku tshimanu, kakadia tshintu
Ahaza wakalela Yala; Yala wakalela Alemeta ne Asemaweta ne Zimeli; Zimeli wakalela Mosa; Mosa wakalela Binea; ne Lefaya muan andi, ne Eleasa muan andi, ne Asela muan andi

Bualu ebu buakalua kudi Bena Yuda bu mukenji wa Yehowa bua kubumusha ku mesu kuandi bua malu mabi onso a Manashe akenzeye; ne bua mashi a bantu bakadi kabayi ne bilumbu akamatshisheye hanshi; bualu bua yeye wakûsha Yelushalema tente ne mashi a bantu bakadi kabayi ne bilumbu; nunku Yehowa wakabenga bua kubabuikidila mibi yabo
Bionsu kuenzeka amu muvua Yozefe muambe
Kadi binuadikankamika hanuenza bualu buimpe ne nudi mikenga, bualu ebu budi bua kusakidila ku mesu kua Nzambi
Kadi Mvidi Mukulu uvua mumone mumvua mudipuekeshe, mumone kabidi mudimu mukole undi mukuenzele
Bakamanyisha Davidi; nunku yeye wakaya ku dibue dinene, wakashikama mu tshihela tshia Maona
Bantu bonso nebikale n enu lukuna bua dina dianyi; kudi wananukila tô ne kunshikidilu neasungidibue
Nunku nuenze bu munuakuditshiha, nushikishe mitshihu yenu
Bena matempu ba bungi bakasangisha mikanda yabo, bakayosha ku mesu kua bantu bonso
Mose wakatuma bantu bua kutentekelabo buloba bua Yazê, ne bakanyenga misoko ei kabidi, bakihata Bena Amole bakadimu
Kadi udi bua bantu bonsu, ne bua badi muaba ewu lelu, ne bua ndelanganyi yenu yonsu, nansha bua badibu kabayi banji kulela

Mose wakenza bu muakamuambila Yehowa, wakangata Yoshua, wakamushikika ku mpala kua Eleazâ ne kua tshisumbu tshionso, wakatentekasha bianza biandi ha mutu n andi, wakamuambila dî, muakambila Yehowa Mose
Hawela mpungi bikole, bantu ba mu bitudilu bia ku esete nebaye ku luendu luabo
Davidi wakambila Abigayila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, wakukutuma kundi lelu, asankishibue
Kanuena mua kuyilenga, padiyi mifue
Numanye bienu ne, Bantu badi ba ditabusha mbobo badi bana ba Abalahama
Nansha umue wabo wakashala anu Kaleba, muana mulume wa Yefune ne Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna

Hashishe wakalua n anyi ku tshibuelelu tshia ku tshiendelu tshia munda mua ntempelo ku luseke lua ku nôde; wakatshidikisha bu muakidikisheye bikuabo, nsubu yatshi ya bansentedi, biluwa biatshi, ne mbalanda watshi

Monai, Amalia, muakuidi munene, udi ku mutu kuenu mu malu onso a Yehowa, ne Zebadaya, muana wa Yishemaele, mukokeshi wa tshisamba tshia Bena Yuda, udi ku mutu kuenu mu malu onso a mukelenge; Bena Lewi kabidi nebikale tuhita ku mpala kuenu

Mei a mukana mua muena meji adi ne kalolo, Ku tshibangidilu tshia mei a mukana muandi kudi butshimbe; Muhote udi utudisha mei, Midimu ya bahote idi ibatekesha; Mulau kûdi, wewe tshisamba, tshidi ne mukelenge mutshikale muana, Disanka kûdi, wewe tshisamba, tshidi ne mukelenge muneme, Bua bufuba musaka wa nsubu udi uhuka; Bidia bidi bisankisha bantu; Kuhendi mukelenge mu meji ebe nansha; Ecclesiastes Wele bidia biebe ha mutu ha mai, Uhe bantu muanda mutekete nansha muanda mukulu tshituha tshia bintu biebe, Bikala matutu mûle tente ne mai a nvula, Udi utangila bu mudi luhehele luenza kena ukuna bintu; Bu mûdi kuyi mumanye mudi luhehele luheha, bu mûdi kuyi mumanye mudi mifuba idiunda munda mua mukashi udi ne difu, nunku kuena mumanye mudimu wa Nzambi udi wenza malu onso

Nenufile milambu ya buatshia buatshia nunku, milambu ya kuosha ha kahia tô matuku muanda mutekete, idi itua dihembu kudi Yehowa, nenufile milambu ei ku mutu kua milambu mudi nuosha buatshia buatshia ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua
Mai manene enze tshiona ne bionso bidimu biele bibila, Misulu ya mai itutakashe bianza; ku mpala kua Yehowa; bualu bua udi ulua kulumbuluisheye ba ha Misambu Yehowa udi ukokesha; bantu bazakale
Kanuena mua kuteka mabue mu ditunga dienu, kuazola bua kuatendelela to
Yeye wakahita munkatshi muabo, wakaya biandi
Dituku kai dituakakutangila mulue muenyi, tuakubuesha mu nsubu
Nengendeshe bantu ha mutu heńu kabidi, bantu banyi Bena Isalele mene; nebanuangate bu bintu biabo, nenuikale buhianyi buabo ne kanuena nubashiya kabayi ne bana kabidi

Mukashi udi ne lufuila lua bushua ne udi ha nkayandi, udi utekemena Nzambi, ne udi unanukila mu kusengelela ne mu kulomba kuandi butuku ne munya Kadi yeye wa mu lufuila udi ukeba anu bua kudisankisha udi mufue hatshidiye ne muoyo
Nyama minene mai yakahatuka mu mai manene, kayiyi mifuanangane, nyama mukuabo mushilangane ne mukuabo
Nundombe biuma bungi buonsu bunudi basue, ne bintu bikuabu bidi mua kunusankisha

Yeye wakadila ku mpala kuandi tô matuku muanda mutekete hakadibo badia bidia bia disanka; ne hakalua dituku dia muanda mutekete, yeye wakamujinguluiladi, bualu bua yeye wakamutatshisha bikole; ne yeye wakajinguluila bana babo dijimbu
Bakenza bibuiku bikuabo ku mutu kua bibumba bia makunshi; bakenzahu mamuma a grenades nkama ibidi mu milongo minyunguluke tshibuiku tshikuabo
Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu badi bakenzulula mu tshimwe tshia bisatu tshiaku panyima pa bidimu biônso bisatu
Sheshebasâ wakalua n au onso, hakumuka bakadi mu buhika ku Babulona bua kuyabo ku Yelushalema
Yoshua wakadihanda bilulu biandi, wakadikuma mpala wandi hanshi ku mpala kua mushete wa Yehowa tô ne ku dilolo; yeye ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele bakadiela buloba mu mitu
Hakamonabo bualu ebu, bakajiana ne, Wakuya kulala mu nsubu wa muntu mubi
Nemvudije ndelanganyi yebe bu lusenga lua ku muelelu wa mayi manene, ludi muntu kayi mua kubala

Nunemeke ndondu wenu ne Mvidi Mukulu Nuenu bena Izrayele, lelu nudi bimane bonsu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, pamue ne bamfumu ba midimu mishilangane, bakulu ba ditunga, bana benu, bakaji benu, ne benyi badi basombe munkatshi muenu mu mitanda, badi bamunguila nkunyi, banusunyina mayi
Yoshua wakamututshila mpala hanshi, wakamutendelela, wakamukonka ne, Mukelenge wanyi udi Wambila muntu wandi tshinyi
Nenushale ne muoyi matuku a bungi panu
Buonso buetu tudi bana ba muntu umue, tudi bambe mei a bushuwa, katuena batentekedi
Bua Yeshaya udi wamba ne, Mukelenge, wakuitabusha muwakuamba nganyi
Kadi unyeme nkuka ya bansongalume; londa ku nyima kua buakane, ditabusha, dinanga, ditalala, hohamue ne badi babikila dinu dia Mukelenge ne mitshima mitoke
Mukelenge wa Isalele wakamuambila ne, Kulumbulula kuebe nekuikale nunku, wewe wakadikosela tshilumbu
Benze nzubu wa tshijila ne ntenta, tshilamba tshia kubuikila pa mutu pa ntenta, nkanu, mabaya, mitshi, makunji ne bitaku

Hakadi Noa mu tshidimu tshia nkama isambombo tshia muoyo wandi, mu ngondo muibidi ne dituku dia dikumi ne muanda mutekete dia ngondo, mu dituku adi mene, mishimi yonso ya mu mai manene yakahongoloka ne bibi bionso bia mu diulu biakunzuludibua
Bakahaula misoko ei yonso, bualu bua mu misoko ei muakadi bintu bia bungi
Abashaloma wakatuma dî, wakabikila Ahitofele, Muena Gilo, muena lungenyi wa Davidi, ku musoko wandi, ku Gilo mene, hakadiye ufila milambu
Nê wakalela Kishi; Kishi wakalela Shaula; Shaula wakalela Yonatana ne Malekishua ne Abinadaba ne Eshebâla
Mukelenge wakangambila ne, Bika, uye mu Damaseke, nebakuambilemu malu onso akukusunguilabo bua wewe kuenza
Ahiya wakangata tshilulu tshihia tshihia tshiakadiye n atshi, wakatshihandulula bihese dikumi ne tubidi
Hashishe nuenu balaminyi nenubike, nenunyenge musoko; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neaufile mu bianza bienu
Labana wakamuambila ne, Kabena benza nunku mu buloba buetu, katuena tufila muan a mukala ku dibaka diambedi mukulu andi kayi muanze kuya
Hakashikishabo kudia, Yesu wakakonka Simona Petelo ne, Simona wa Yona, wewe udi mutambe aba bakuabo kunnanga, anyi

Luai ne tshia dikumi tshionso mu nsubu wa kubutshila bintu, bua bia kudia bikale mu nsubu muanyi; Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Nuntete mpindiu ne muanda eu, numone bingikala tshiyi mununzuluile bibi bia mu diulu, munulokeshile masanka, kanuyi nukengela bintu bikuabo kabidi

Hakunvuabo dî edi, bakatumbisha Nzambi ne mutshima umue, bakamba ne, Mukelenge wetu, wewe wakafuka diulu ne buloba ne mai manene ne bintu bionso bidimu; wewe wakamba kudi Nyuma Muimpe mukana mua tatu wetu Davidi, muntu webe ne, Bakelenge ba ha buloba bakutantamana bua kuluangana, Bulelela, mu musoko eu, Helode ne Pontio Pilato ne bisamba bia bende ne Bena Isalele bakadisangisha bua kuelela Muana webe wa tshijila Yesu, uwakela manyi ha mutu, tshifufu, ne bua kuenza malu onso akasungula tshianza tshiebe ne mutshima webe diambedi ne, Alue
Mukelenge wakabandamuna ne, Muanda eu udi wa bushuwa, bu mudi mukenji wa Bena Madai ne Bena Pelasa, udi kauyi mua kukudimuka
Samuele wakamba ne, Nenye munyi
Nuatendelelaku bualu buanyi
Ndi ngendakana nebe matuku onsu
Shaula wakela difuma diandi; bualu bua wakamba ne, Neushihe Davidi, difuma dimusompoke dikuate ku tshimanu tshia nsubu
Kadi Nzambi udiku mu diulu udi usokolola malu masokoka, ne yeye wakumanyisha mukelenge Nebukadenesâ malu akadi ha kulua mu matuku atshidi ku mpala
Pashishe kumukabu mu Asherote bua kuya kuasa mitanda mu tshipela tshia Parane
Alauna wakabanduluka, wakatangila mukelenge ne bantu bandi balue kudiye; Alauna wakaluhuka, wakatua mpala wandi hanshi ku mesu kua mukelenge
Isaka wakakuna bintu mu buloba abu, ne tshidimu atshi wakahuola lukama lukama, Yehowa wakamusankisha
Padi ditoba didi ku tshimana dikale dikunze nansha difike, kabidi diumbule tshimana, mutuangaji apatuke, injile, akange ku nzubu aku matuku muanda mutekete
Pashishe Moshe kuasa lupangu luvua lunyungulula ntenta wa kusambakena ne tshilambuilu
Numuase mabue, numushipe
Nuenu nenuihate bantu badi n enu lukuna, nenubashihe ne muele wa nvita
Nakamba ne, Bamujingile tshitambala tshitoke ku mutu kuandi
Kadi badi bamba ne, Ebu mbualu bua hatuhu; bua netulonde anu malu atudi basue kulonda, netuenze bietu, muntu ne muntu, bu mudi tshitshu tshia mu mutshima wandi mubi
Mutshima wanji wakabungama hakadiye wakula; nakamukeba, kadi tshiakamuheta; nakamubikila, kadi yeye kakuitaba
Bana bakese, muntu kanuhambuishi; muntu utu wenza malu makane udi muakane bu mudiye Yeye muakane; yeye utu wenza bibi udi wa diabolo; bualu bua diabolo udi muenze bibi ku tshibangidilu
Muntu webe udi musue anu bua kusabuka Yadene ne mukelenge; mukelenge udi ne bua kunfuta difutu bunene nunku bualu kai
Kadi nsubu ya mu misoko idi kayiyi minyungulula ne lumbu neyikale ne madimi, nudi mua kuyihikula, ne bena nsubu nebahingane halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene
Nunyishe, meme nempuwe bianyi; Monai mudi mei malelela ne bukole bua kutuisha muntu
Bualu bua batendeledi balengeshibue musangu umue kabakadi ne dimuma dia mibi kabidi
Nuenze mitshi yenu ya tumuma tukese nunku ne mitshi ya olive kabidi
Mulambu awu mbua kukobolola mfumu wa bena Izrayele bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse
Hakûkutabo, bakabanga kuhehesha buatu, bakela blé mu mai
Nunku wakaya mu nshila mukuabo; kakahingana mu nshila wa kuakafumeye ku Betele

Monai, baminyampala bonso bakadi bashikamamu, men abo ne, Elishama secrétaire, ne Delaya, muana wa Shemaya, Elenatana, muana wa Akabo, Gemaleya, muana wa Shafana, Sedekiya, muana wa Hananya, ne baminyampala bakuabo bonso
Mukelenge udi ha buihi
Yeye wakamba ne, Nulue kundi ne mulondo muhia muhia, nuelemu luehu
Kadi Abalama wakambila Salai ne, Mona, muena mudimu webe udi mu tshianza tshiebe, umuenzele bu mûdi musue Salai wakamuenzela bibi ne yeye wakanyema ku mesu kuandi
Yakobe kupita kumpala kuabu bonsu, kudiela panshi misangu muanda mutekete, usemena kudi mukuluende Esawu
Kumuambilaye ne: Wambile bena Izrayele, basungule mu buloba buabu bimenga, ne miaba ya kudishila bimuna biabu, babipeshe bena Levi

Butuku abu mene Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Wangate ngombe wa tatu webe, ngombe wandi muibidi bidimu muanda mutekete, ushimbule tshioshelu tshia Bâla tshidi tatu webe n atshi, utahe mutshi wa Ashela udi hehi n atshi, wibakile Yehowa, Nzambi webe, tshioshelu ha mutu ha dibue edi, mu muaba mulongolola, wangate ngombe au muibidi, umufileku bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne nkunyi ya mutshi wa Ashela uwataba
Bana ba Imê, tshinunu tshimue ne makumi atanu ne babidi
Yeye wakebesha Isaka ne, Wewe kuakunshilaku disanka, anyi

Bobo bakadila kudi Yehowa, bakamba ne, Tuakenza bibi, bualu bua tuetu tuakalekela Yehowa, tuakakuatshila Babâla ne Bashatelota mudimu; kadi katataka utusungile mu bianza bia badi n etu lukuna, ne tuetu netukukuatshile mudimu
Utshilombe nansha mu muaba wa mu ndondo wa mu buloba, nansha mu muaba udi mulu mene
Mu tshilota atshi Mutumibue wa Mvidi Mukulu kumbikila ne: Yakobe
Nunku ndi nusengelela bua nuenu kudia, bualu ebu nduhandu luenu, bualu bua lusuki lua ku mutu kua umue wenu kaluena lujimina

Muprofete mununu wakadi mushikame mu Betele; ne umue wa bana bandi ba balume wakalua, wakamuambila malu onso akenza muntu wa Nzambi mu Betele didiku adi; bakambila tatu wabo kabidi mei akambileye mukelenge
Kadi ndi n ebe bualu ebu ne, wakalekela dinanga diebe dia kumudilu

Tshibanda tshionso tshia Hinoma, tshidi ne bitalu ne butue, ne madimi onso adi ayila tô ne ku kasulu ka Kidilona, tô ne ku ditumba dia tshibi tshia tubalu ku luseke lua esete, nebikale miaba ya tshijidila kudi Yehowa; kabena babitula kabidi, kabena babishimbula tô ne tshiendelele
Kadi tshianza tshia Ahikama, muana wa Shafana, tshiakadi tshikuatshisha Yelemiya, bua kabamufidi mu bianza bia bantu bua bobo bamushihe

Ne bualu bukuabo bakashi bakuabo ba mu tshisumbu tshietu bakadi ku lukita dindadinda bakatukemesha; hakahangabo kumona tshitalu tshiandi, bakahingana, bakamba ne, Tuakumona bikena kumona bu banjelo bakatuambila ne, Yeye udi ne muoyo

Yeye wakimana ku mpala kua tshioshelu tshia Yehowa ku mpala kua Bena Isalele bonso, wakolola bianza biandi bualu bua Solomo Wakenza tshiambidilu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku: bule buatshi buakadi coudées itanu, ne butshiama buatshi buakadi coudées itanu, ne bule buatshi bua mulu buakadi coudées isatu, wakatshidika mu tshiendedi; yeye wakimana ha mutu hatshi, wakatua binu biandi hanshi ku mpala kua Bena Isalele bonso, wakolola bianza biandi kulu , wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, kakuena Nzambi mukuabo bu wewe mu diulu anyi hanshi ha buloba; udi ulama tshihungidi tshiebe ne luse lujalame ne bantu bebe badi benda ku mpala kuebe ne mitshima yabo yonso; wakashikisha kudi Davidi tatu wanyi milayi yonso wakamulaya; bulelela, wewe udi wamba dî mukana muebe, udi udishikisha ne bianza biebe, bu muakuenjibua lelu eu
Luai kundi, bonso badi ne mu dimu mukole, badi ne bujitu bunene, meme nenuhe dikisha
Mu dituku adi nemuikale misoko itanu mu buloba bua Ejipitu idi ne bantu bakula muaku wa Bena Kanâna, ne badi baditshiha kudi Yehowa wa misumba
Bakumuka mu Libina, bakashikama mu Lisa

Ba bakuidi: Yedaya ne Yehoyada ne Yakina ne Azâya, muana wa Hilekiya, muana wa Meshulama, muana wa Sadoka, muana wa Melayota, muana wa Ahituba, mukokeshi wa mu nsubu wa Nzambi; ne Adaya, muana wa Yelohama, muana wa Pashû, muana wa Malakiya, ne Mâsai, muana wa Adiele, muana wa Yakela, muana wa Meshulama, muana wa Meshilemita, muana wa Imê; ne bana babo ba ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu babo tshinunu ne nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi asambombo, bantu bakole ba kukuatabo mudimu mu nsubu wa Nzambi
Bobo bakahaula mpala yabo hanshi

Bimenga bia kunfudilu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Yuda ku mukalu wa Edome ku Sude biakadi Kabesêle ne Edê ne Yagû, ne Kina ne Dimona ne Adada, ne Kedeshe ne Hasô ne Yitenana, ne Zifa ne Teleme ne Bealota, Hasôhadata ne Keliyota heselona eu udi Hasô mene , Amama ne Shema ne Molada, Hasâ gada, Heshemona, Bete pelete, ne Hasâ shuala ne Bê sheba ne Bizeyoteya, Bâla ne Iyima ne Eseme, Eletolada ne Kesila ne Homa, ne Sikelaga ne Mademana ne Sanesana, ne Lebaota ne Shilihima ne Ayina ne Limona: bimenga bionso bidi makumi abidi ne tshitema ne misoko yabi
Bakalua, bakûsha matu abidi tente, akamba kudina

Kadi Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, wakansungula munkatshi mua bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wanyi, wakampingisha mu bukelenge bua Isalele tshiendelele; bualu bua yeye wakasungula Yuda bua kuikaleye ku mutu; wakasungula tshiota tshia tatu wanyi mu tshisamba tshia Yuda; munkatshi mua bana ba tatu wanyi yeye wakalesha diakalengele kundi bua kumpingisha mu bukelenge bua Isalele; ne munkatshi mua bana banyi balume Nzambi wakumpa bana ba bungi yeye wakasungula Solomo muan anyi bua kushikameye mu nkuasa wa bukelenge bua Yehowa ku mutu kua Bena Isalele
Tshibandilu tshia ku tshioshelu tshikale ku luseke lua esete

Nakinama dî dikole difuma mu nkuasa wa butumbi diamba ne, Tangilai, nsubu wa tshilulu wa Nzambi udi munkatshi mua bantu, ne yeye neikale n abo, ne bobo nebikale bantu bandi; ne Nzambi mume neikale n abo, neikale Nzambi wabo
Hashishe Davidi wakajuka ne bantu bonso bakadi n andi, bakasabuka dishiya dia Yadene; hakatshiabu nansha umue wabo wakashala, buonso buabo bakadi basabuka
Mose wakadi ne tshiji kudi ba ku mutu kua bena nvita, tuhita tua binunu binunu ne tuhita tua nkama nkama, bakahingana ku nvita

Nebamanye ne, Ndi Yehowa, haladikabo bana babo bashihibue munkatshi mua mpingu yabo ne kuinshi kua bioshelu biai ku nseke yonso, ha mutu ha mukuna wonso muhuekele, ha mutu ha mikuna mibande yonso, muinshi mua mutshi wonso udi ne muoyo ne muinshi mua mutshi wonso wa telebinta, miaba ei yakafidilabo bintu bia muhuya muimpe kudi mpingu yabo yonso
Mutshima wa mukelenge Davidi wakasua kuya kudi Abashaloma: bualu bua yeye wakasambibua bualu bua Amenona, bua yeye wakafua
Minyinyi ya mu mai idi mu musulu neyifue, mai neanunke muhuya mubi, mai a mu musulu neatonde Bena Ejipitu
Wewe wakadi muhika hawakabikidibua, anyi
Kuambulaye dianza dia bukula, kuboshila Mvidi Mukulu pa tshilambuilu
Oteniele, muana wa Kenasa, muan abo ne Kaleba, wakaunyenga: yeye wakamuha Akasa, muan andi wa bakashi, bu mukashi wandi
Bumuka mu tshibandabanda amu, kusabukabu musulu wa Amone, udi ufumina ku bena Amore, upitshila mu tshipela, pashishe uleja mikalu pankatshi pa bena Mowabe ne bena Amore
Bakamutendekena ne, Ututume munda mua ngulube, tubuelemu
Shaula ne bantu honso bakadi n andi bakunguila hamue, bakalua bua kuluangana nvita; ne monai, muntu ne muntu wakatuisha mukuandi, kuakadi tshintompatompa tshinene
Kanuena mua kushipa bana bua buenzayi bua batedi babu
Tuetu kubashipa, katuyi bashiye muntu nansha umue ne muoyi

Eleazâ wakalela Pinehasa, Pinehasa wakalela Abishua, ne Abishua wakalela Buki, ne Buki wakalela Uzi, ne Uzi wakalela Zelaya ne Zelaya wakalela Melayota, ne Melayota wakalela Amalia, ne Amalia wakalela Ahituba, ne Ahituba wakalela Sadoka, ne Sadoka wakalela Ahimâsa, ne Ahimâsa wakalela Azaya, ne Azaya wakalela Yohanana, ne Yohanana wakalela Azaya yeye Wakenza mudimu wa buakuidi mu nsubu wakasabo kudi Solomo mu Yelushalema , ne Azaya wakalela Amalia, ne Amalia wakalela Ahituba, ne Ahituba wakalela Sadoka, ne Sadoka wakalela Shaluma, ne Shaluma wakalela Hilekiya, ne Hilekiya wakalela Azaya, ne Azaya wakalela Selaya, ne Selaya wakalela Yehosadaka; Yehosadaka wakaya mu buhika hakaya Yehowa ne Bena Yuda ne Bena Yelushalema ku tshianza tshia Nebukadenesâ
Mukelenge wakafudila biamu ebi bionso mu maloba a dime a mu mpata wa Yadene, hankatshi ha Sukota ne Saletana
Ku nyima mutshima wa Davidi wakanyingalala bualu bua yeye wakakosa tshihesa tshia tshikowelu tshia Shaula
Bua bukole bua tubalu budi mukana muatu, ne mu mikila yatu; bua mikila yatu idi ifuana nyoka, ne idi ne mitu; ne tudi tukengesha n ai bantu
Utekemu kabidi tshitekelu tshia miendu
Ndi mumanye ne, Nudi bana ba Abalahama; kadi nudi nukeba mua kunshiha, bua di dianyi kadiena ne muaba munda muenu

Nuenu nuakuitabusha Yehowa bu Nzambi wenu lelu, nuakuamba ne, Tuetu netuende mu nshila yandi, netutumikile mei andi ne mikenji yandi ne mikandu yandi, netunvue dî diandi; ne Yehowa wakanuitabusha bu bantu ba buhianyi buandi bu muakanulayeye, bua nuenu nutumikile mikenji yandi yonso, ne kunubandisha ku mutu kua bisamba bionso biakafukeye mu butumbi ne mu dina ne mu buneme; bua nuenu nuikale bantu ba tshijila kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bu muakuambeye
Ndi nuambila ne, Halua dituku dia kulumbulula, nebalumbuluishe bantu bua mei onso a tshianana akadibo bamba

Bana ba balume ba Sela: Yeule ne bana babo nkama isambombo ne makumi tshitema, Bana ba balume ba Benyamina: Salu, muana wa balume wa Meshulama, muana wa Hodaweya, muana wa Hasenua, ne Yibeneya, muana wa Yelohama, ne Ela, muana wa Uzi, muana wa Mikela ne Meshulama, muana wa Shefataya, muana wa Leule, muana wa Yibeniya; ne bana babo mu bikondo biabo nkama tshitema ne makumi atanu ne bantu basambombo
Mukaji awu kuimita difu, kulela muana wa balume
Ne yeye wakalua, wakanuambila bakadi kule ne bakadi ha buihi lumu lua ditalala; bua bualu buandi bubidi buetu tudi ne ha kubuelela kudi Tatu mu Nyuma umue
Buhianyi buitanu buakadi bua tshisamba tshia Bena Ashê ku meku abo
Mai adi aluhuka mu milondo yandi, bana bandi nebikale munkatshi mua mai a bungi, mukelenge wandi neahite Agaga bunene, bukelenge buandi nebutumbishibue
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Wakumona bimpe, bualu bua ndi ndama dî dianyi bua kudishikisha
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nudimuke, kanukumi mitshima ku biuma; bua muntu kena ne muoyo bualu bua bungi bua bintu bidiye n abi
Nuenu nudi ne bualu bua kujimisha miaba yonso yakadi bisamba binudi nuihata bitendelelaku nzambi yabo ku mutu kua mikuna mile, ne ku mutu kua tukuna tukese ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi
Genese Nzambi Udi Wambila Abalahama bua Kufileye Isaka bu Mulambu Hakahita malu au Nzambi wakateta Abalahama, wakamuambila ne, Abalahama yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Bantu aba badi balami ba mikoko, bualu bua bakadi balami ba bimuna, bakalua ne mikoko yabo ne bimuna biabo ne bintu bionso bidibo n abi
Tshiena ne buimpe bua kudiangatshila tshituha tshia luse ne bulelela biwakalesha muntu webe, nakasabuka musulu eu wa Yadene anu ne tshibangu, katataka nakulua bisumbu bibidi bia bintu
Makuabu kuamiaminaye ku tshilambuilu
Bena Isalele bakadiku bakadia bidia bia kuhita kua Yehowa ku tshikondo atshi ne bidia bidi kabiyi ne luevene tô matuku muanda mutekete
Bualu ke muaba uvuabu bajiike bena Izrayele bavua ne lukuka lua munyinyi

Biakuenzelabo bibi ne kakuena muntu udi kayi wenza malu mabi ne wewe udi n abo tshiji, udi ubafila mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo bua kuyabo n abo bu bahika mu buloba bua bena lukuna, mu buloba budi kule anyi budi ha buihi; kadi biabangabo kuelangana meji munda muabo mu buloba buwakabatuma bu bahika, ne biakudimunabo mitshima yabo, biakutendekenabo mu buloba buwakabatuma bu bahika, bamba ne, Tuakuenza bibi, tuakuenza bualu buhote, tuakahambuka; biahinganabo kûdi ne mitshima yabo yonso ne mioyo yabo yonso, mu buloba bua bena lukuna babo bakababuesha mu buhika, biakutendelelabo ne mesu abo matangile ku buloba buabo buwakaha bankambua babo, ne ku musoko eu uwakusungula, ne ku nsubu eu unakuashila dina diebe; unvue kulomba kuabo ne kutendekena kuabo mu diulu kûdi ushikama, ujadike bualu buabo
Hanani, umue wa bana betu, wakalua kundi ne bakuabo bakadi bafume n andi mu Yuda; nakabakonka bualu bua Bena Yuda bakadi bashale bakumuka mu buhika ne bua Yelushalema kabidi
Ndi akolesha buabo, ebu bikole ku mesu kua Nzambi ne kua Kilisto Yesu ne kua banjelo bandi basungula, bua wewe kutumikila malu â kui mudianjile kukosa bualu munda muebe ne kui ne kansungunsungu
Solomo wakasangisha makalu ne bena tubalu; wakadi ne makalu tshinunu ne nkama inai, ne bena tubalu binunu dikumi ne bibidi biakatekeye mu misoko yakadi ne makalu ne hamue ne mukelenge mu Yelushalema
Ditunga edi nedikale dienu kabidi
Hakaluabo ne argent mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Hilekiya muakuidi wakasangana mukanda wa mikenji wakafundabo kudi Mose
Bualu ebu buakatamba kunyingalasha mutshima wanyi; nunku nakumusha bintu bionso bia Tobiya mu nsubu
Ebu mbuloba bua Bena Lefa
Uteke bidia ne mai ku mpala kuabo, bobo badie, banue, bahingane kudi mukelenge wabo
Nzambi wakabaha tula mu Ejipitu, yeye udi ne bukole bu nyama wa mbowa
Bakangata bintu bionso bia bantu ne bia bimuna kabidi
Bana ba balume ba Yada, muan abo wa balume ne Shamai: Yete ne Yonatana; Yete wakafua kayi ne bana ba balume
Yehowa wakamba ne, Nebaluangane n ebe, kadi kabena bakuhita bukole; bualu bua meme ndi n ebe bua kukuhandisha
Wakaya biandi, wakayikila ne mukashi, ne yeye wakasankisha Shimishona bimpe
Bakabika hatshiatshia honso: hakatshiabu, Samuele wakabikila Shaula ha mutu ha nsubu, wamba ne, Juka, bua meme nkutume
Bualu bobu badile, bambikile, nembateleje
Wakabuela mu buatu muakadibo, tshihehele tshiakabatama; bobo bakatamba kukema; bualu bua kabakajingulula bualu bua mitanda bimpe; mitshima yabo yakadi mikole

Yehowa, Nzambi webe, udi ne disanka bualu buebe, wakukushikika mu nkuasa wa butumbi wa Isalele, atumbishibue; bualu bua Yehowa udi munange Bena Isalele tshiendelele nunku wakukusungula mukelenge bua wewe kulumbulula malu biakane ne kuenza malu adi makane
Bialua Timote kunudi, nuamanya bua yeye kuikala n enu kai ne ditshina, bualu bua yeye udi wenzela Mukelenge mudimu bu mundi ngenza; nunku muntu kamuhetudi nasha

Hakunvua muprofete wakamu hingishila mu nshila lumu elu, yeye wakamba ne, Au mmuntu wa Nzambi wakahidia dî dia mukana mua Yehowa: nunku Yehowa wakamutua kudi nyama wa ntambue, yeye wakamuhandulula, wakamushiha bu mu dî dia Yehowa diakamuambileye

Dituku dia lufu lua Isalele diakalua ha buihi, Wakabikila muan andi Yosefe, wakamuambila ne, Bingikala ne luse ku mesu kuebe, ulenge tshianza tshiebe muinshi mua tshibelu tshinyi, uditshihe bua kungenzela malu mimpe ne a bushuwa, ndi nkutendekena ne, Kabanjiki mu Ejipitu
Hashishe Sheshebasâ eu mene wakalua, wakajadika bishimikidi bia nsubu wa Nzambi udi mu Yelushalema; batshidi basa nsubu au ku musangu au tô ne katataka, kabena banji kumumana

Hakafikabo ku muaba udibo babikila ne, Kabalubalu ka Mutu, bakamukumina milonda mu bianza ne ku makasa ku mutshi mutshiamakane, bakenzela bantu babidi nunku kabidi, mukuabo ku tshianza tshia balume, mukuabo ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ndi muenyi kunoko, ndi Muena Amaleka

Yonadaba wakamuambila ne, Lala ha bulalu buebe bu muntu udi ne disama; halua tatu webe kukutangila, umuambile ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Anji kuitabusha bua muan etu wa bakashi Tamâ alue bua kundisheye bidia, alongolole bia kudia anu ku mesu kuanyi, bua meme mbitangile, mbidie anu ku tshianza tshiandi
Nunku bakalongolola midimu yabo, ne bakuidi bakimana mu miaba yabo ne Bena Lewi ku milongo yabo bu muakadi mukenji wa mukelenge
Kadi kanuhu muoyo bua kuenzelangana bimpe ne bua kukuatshishangana; bua Nzambi udi usanka ne milambu ya nunku
Kutendeledi nzambi mukuabo nansha; bualu bua Yehowa udi ne dina diandi dia Mukau, udi Nzambi wa mukau
Hakamumona bakuidi banene ne tuhalai, bakela mbila ne, Umushihe ku mutshi mutshiamakane, umushihe ku mutshi mutshiamakane

Nomba Badi Bakuatshisha Bakuidi ne Bena Lewi Yehowa wakambila Alona ne, Wewe ne bana bebe balume ne ba mu nsubu wa ba tatu ebe nenutuale mahambuka a ku buakane a bantu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, wewe ne bana bebe balume nenutuale mahambuka a mudimu wenu wa buakuidi
Bienzedi bia Ahazaya bikuabo biakenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele, anyi
Ajikije mikiya yonsu kumpala kua Maweja Nangila bua muntu ashale kayi ne mikiya

Mulume eu nealue ne mulambu wa kubuikila n au disambuka diandi dia mikenji kudi Yehowa, ku mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusangakena, neafile tshimpanga tshia mulambu wa kubuikila n au disambuka diandi dia mikenji
Abrame ne Nahore kusela bakaji: dina dia mukaji wa Abrame divua Sarayi, dia mukaji wa Nahore divua Milka

Tuakatekemena ditalala, kadi diakalengele kadiakulua kutudi; Badi bunvua kufembula kua tubalu tuabo kufuma mu Dana; Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, nentume nyoka munkatshi muenu, Nakadi kusua kuikala ne bukole bua kudisamba n abu mu kanyinganyinga kanyi; Unvuai
Nakatangila nyama wa luonji mukuabo uhatuka mu buloba, wakadi ne nsengu ibidi mifuane ya muana wa mukoko, ne wakakula bu dragon
Kadi bakatangila bantu bualu ebu, bakatshina, bakatumbisha Nzambi, bualu bua yeye wakaha bantu bukole nunku
Nakabaha tshituha tshia mulambu wanyi wa kuosha ha kahia, tshintu tshidi tshitambe tshijila bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi bua bantu ne mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji
Bua malu â wakatuma tshituha atshi tshia tshianza tshiakafunda tshifundu etshi
Mbu muakamba Yeshaya diambedi ne, Ahu, netuambe tshinyi
Bihanga ne mahu a tshitekelu biakadi bia tshituha tshia or tshimue, bakatula bintu bionso ne tshiamu tshia or nkayandi
Mukuabo wakamuambila ne, Tudi tukusengelela ne, Witabushe bua kuya ne bantu bebe

Yesu wakamba ne, Simona, Simona, mona, Satana wakalomba mua kunuangata bualu bua kunusengeye bu ntete; kadi nakukulombela wewe Nzambi bua ditabusha diebe kadihangi; wewe, hawakudimuka, ukoleshe mitshima ya bana benu

Mu tshisamba tshia Nafatale, Kedeshe wa mu Galela ne miaba ya ku matshika, tshimenga tshia kunyemenabo kudi mushihianganyi, ne Hamata dô ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Kâtana ne miaba ya ku matshika; bimenga bisatu
Nzambi wakamba ne, Buloba buvuishe bifukibua bidi ne muoyo bu mudi mishindu yabi, ya bimuna ne bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi, ne nyama yonso ya ha buloba bu mudi mishindu yai, bualu buakenjibua
Udi mutuma kudi Nzambi udi wamba mei a Nzambi; bualu bua yeye kena umulobela Nyuma

Bobo bakamba ne, Bulelela, tuakutangila ne Yehowa udi n ebe, nunku tuakuambilangana ne, Tutshihangane n ebe, tuhunge n ebe tshihungidi, bua wewe kutuenzedi bualu bubi, bu mutuakadi katuyi tukulenga tshianza, tuakukuenzela anu malu mimpe; tua kukumusha talalâ, ne katataka wewe udi musankishibue kudi Yehowa

Mu ngondo muitanu, mu dituku dia dikumi dia ngondo tshidimu tshiakadi tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshitema tshia bukokeshi bua mukelenge Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona Nebuzaladana, kapitene ka bansentedi ba masalayi, mukuatshishi wa mukelenge wa Babulona, wakalua ku Yelushalema
Nuelangane muoyo ne dituangana dia mishiku dia tshijila
Bana ba, balume ba Kaleba, muan abo wa balume ne Yelamele, bakadi Mesha, muan a bute wandi tatu wa Zifa; ne bana ba balume ba Malesha: Hebelone

Mu diba adi dikanka dinene dia buloba diakadiku, ne tshituha tshia dikumi tshia musoko tshiakûhuka; ne bantu binunu muanda mutekete bakafua mu dikanka dia buloba; bakuabo bonso bakadi bashale bakatshinyishibua, bakatumbisha Nzambi wa mu diulu
Rakele kuinyika muana awu dina ne: Naftali

Nunku kabena ne bua kudiangatshila nkunyi mu madimi abo, anyi kutaha mutshi mukuabo muitu bua kutshiaba nkunyi, bualu bua nebatemeshe kahia kabo ne bielelu abi bia nvita; nebahaule bantu aba bakabahaula, nebanyenge bintu bia bantu aba bakanyenga bintu biabo
Chronicles Yoasha wakadi ne bidimu muanda mutekete hakababangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha mu Yelushalema bidimu makumi anai; dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Sibeya wa mu Bê sheba
Netubabutule

Bena Isalele bonso ne bakulu babo ne tuhita ne balumbuluishi babo bakimana ku luseke ne luseke lua mushete ku mpala kua bakuidi, Bena Lewi, bakadi batuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa; benyi kabidi bakimana bu bantu baledibue ba munkatshi muabo; tshituha tshiabo ku mukuna wa Gelezima ne tshituha tshikuabo ku mukuna wa Ebala; bu muakadianjila Mose, muntu wa Yehowa, kubambila, bua kuvudishila Bena Isalele masanka
tshidi tshihita nyama wa ntambue bukole ntshinyi
Kadi bakuabo bakamba ne, Muntu eu wakatabasha mesu a wakadi mufofo, kakamanya mua kusungila muntu eu, kafu biandi, munyi

Bana betu, butudi n abu mbua kusakidila Nzambi misangu yonso bua bualu buenu, bu mudibu buakane, bua ditabusha dienu didi ditamba kudiunda, ne dinanga dia buonso buenu muntu ne muntu dinudi nunangangana n adi didi divulangana; bua muanda eu tuetu tudi tutumbila bua bualu buenu mu ekelesia ya Nzambi bualu bua ditantamana dienu ne bua ditabusha dienu mu makenga enu onso ne mu matata onso anudi nuikala n au

Yeye neatangishe mpala wandi bua kuyeye kudi mukelenge wa ku sude ne bukole buonso bua bukelenge buandi ne bua kuhunga n andi tshihungidi: neamuhe muan andi bu mukashi wandi bua kubutula buloba bua Ejipitu, kadi muanda udiye uhangidisha kawena ujalama ne kawena umulubulula

Hakadiye ne bayidi dikumi ne babidi nkayabo, wakabanga kubamanyisha malu alua kudiye, wakabambila ne, Unvuai, tudi tubanda ku Yelushalema; nebafile Muana wa muntu mu bianza bia bakuidi banene ba Nzambi ne bafundi; bobo nebamuhishe ne lufu, nebamufile mu bianza bia bisamba bia bende; bamuseke, bamutuile mate, bamukume, bamushihe: kadi hahita matuku asatu, yeye neabike kabidi
Yeye wakabambila ne, Yai bienu nuambile nyama au wa budimu ne, Lelu ne makelela ndi ngumusha bademon munda mua bantu, ndi nmana masama a bantu, maihi nenshikishe mudimu wanyi
Matshua a tshioshelu ikale ne bule bua coudées dikumi ne ibidi ne butshiama bua coudées dikumi ne ibidi, nseke yau inai ikale bunene bumue
Yeye udi muledibue mu nsubu webe ne yeye udibo basumba ku argent webe udi ne bua kutengudibua, tshi hungidi tshianyi netshikale munda muenu bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele

Nunku halua matata ne makenga makole kudibo, musambu eu newikale bu mumanyi wa bualu, neudiambe kudibo; bana babo kabahu musambu eu muoyo, bualu bua meme ndi mumanye meji adibo n au mu mitshima yabo lelu diambedi tshiyi muanze kulua n abo mu buloba bunakabalaya
Kuyitendeledi, bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu webe
Hadileye kundi, nemmunvuile, bualu bua meme ndi ne luse

Yehowa neanunzuluile masanka adiye n au mu diulu bua kunulokeshila nvula ha buloba mu tshikondo tshia nvula, ne bua kunuvudishila disanka mu malu anudi nuenza ne bianza bienu; nuenu nenusombeshe bisamba bia bungi bintu, kadi nuenu kanuena nusomba bintu kudibo
Bualu bua Nzambi webe wakananga Bena Isalele bua kubajadika tshiendelele, nunku yeye wakakuhingisha mukelenge ku mutu kuabo bua wewe kuenza malu mimpe ne makane
Mashinde adi afubidila, tshilongo tshidi tshitutuka, Mashinde adi afubidila, tshilongo tshidi tshiumuka; Wewe udi wambila ba mu Siona lumu luimpe, Monai

Anu kuditshiha ne mitshihu ya mashimi, Bua mianda yaya buloba budi buasa muadi, Kadi muntu kabambakashi mei ne mukuabo, kabandi mukuabo; Ne wewe, muakuidi, neulenduke mu munya; Bantu banyi badi babutudibua bualu bua kabena ne lungenyi; Bu muakakumbanabo ba bungi, Badi badia bukute bua malu mabi a bantu banyi, Bualu ebu nebuikaleku ne, Bu mudi bantu, mbu mudi muakuidi; Nebadie, kadi kabena bukuta; Masandi ne maluvu ne nvinyo mihia mihia Bantu banyi badi balomba lungenyi ku tshibasa tshia mutshi, Badi bashihela mpingu milambu ha mitu ha mikuna mile, Tshiena nkengesha bana benu ba bakashi habuelabo mu bundumba, Bena Isalele, nansha binualonda malu a masandi, Bena Isalele bakulua bena tshitshu Bena Efelayima bakudilamika kudi mpingu yabo, Kunua kuabo kua maluvu kudi kuamba kushika, Luhehele luakuya n abo mu mahuahua alu; Hoshea Unvuai dî edi, nuenu bakuidi
Kabakepeshi mudimu wenu to
Bualu bua udi ne mashi munda muau; wakela ha dibue didi hatuhu, ne kakâhongoluela hanshi ha buloba bua luhuishi luabuikile
Makunji onsu avua masuikakaja ne milonda ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole
Ne ba munkatshi mua bantu ne bisamba ne miaku ne matunga badi batangila bitalu biabo matuku asatu ne tshituha tshia hankatshi ha dituku, ne kabena bitabusha bua bitalu biabo biladikibue mu lukita
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Ha mutu ha nsubu yonso ya mu Moaba ne mu misesu yonso muadi udi kuonso; bualu bua nakutshibula Moaba bu dilonga dia tshianana

Isaka wakatamba kuhampakana, wakamba ne, Muntu kai wakangata munyinyi wa ntole, wakulua n au kundi, ne nakudia diambedi wewe kuyi muanji kulua, ne nakamuvudishila disanka
Bualu bua nenduile bena musoko eu nvita bua kubasungila, bua bualu buanyi ne bua bualu bua muntu wanyi Davidi

Salai wakambila Abalama ne, Mona, Yehowa wakumpidisha bua kulela, ndi nkutendekena ne, Uye biebe kudi mukashi, muena mudimu wanyi, binamanya mua kuheta bana kudiye Abalama wakitabusha di dia Salai

Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Nensemene ba buihi n enu bua kulumbulula bilumbu bienu; nengikale mumonyi udi utuisha batempeshi ba mbuku ne bena masandi lubilu, bantu badi baditshiha ne mitshihu ya mashimi, badi bakengesha muena mudimu hadibo bamufuta difutu diandi ne mukashi wa mu lufuila ne muan a nshiya, bantu badi bakengesha muntu wa tshisamba tshia bende ne badi kabayi bantshina mene
Mukelenge wa Ejipitu kakumuka mu buloba buandi kabidi, bualu bua mukelenge wa Babulona wakanyenga makelenge onso akadi malamate mukelenge wa Ejipitu ku kasulu ka Ejipitu tô ne ku musulu wa Pelata
Bana hadibo balela mu tshikondo tshisatu badi mua kubuela mu disangisha dia Yehowa

Ne muinshi wa kahia ka dikenga diabo udi ubanda tshiendelele; ne kabena ne dikisha munya ne butuku, bobo badi bakukuna nyama wa luonji ne tshifuanyikishi tshiandi, ne yonso udi wangata tshimanymu tshia dina diandi
Tshiyole tshia nzala katshiyi tshianji kuenzeka, Yozefe kulela bana ba balume babidi ne mukajende Asnate, muana wa Potifera, mutuangaji wa mu tshimenga tshia One

Muntu udi wela tatuende nansha mamuende milawu, numushipe

Yesu wakabela demon, wakumuka munda mua muana; ha diba adi mene muana wakadi mukoleshibue
Hanuafila kuha kuenu, hanuela bana benu mu kahia, kanuena nudinyanga ku mpingu yenu yonso tô ne ku lelu eu, anyi
Hanuakatangila Nahasha, mukelenge wa Bena Amona, ulua bua kunuluisha, nuenu nuakangambila ne, Nansha, mukelenge utukokeshe, hakatshidi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mukelenge wenu
Hakamanabo kufila milambu, mukelenge ne bantu bonso bakadi n andi bakinama mitu yabo, bakatendelela
Genese Hagâ ne Yishemaele Salai, mukashi wa Abalama, kakamulelela bana nansha, wakadi ne mukashi muena mudimu, Muena Ejipitu, dina diandi Haga

Kanukengeshi muntu wakabuela mu mudimu wa difutu, udi muhele ne udi kayi ne bintu, nansha umue wa bana benu nansha muenyi udi ushikama mu buloba buenu ne mu misoko yenu; nubafute difutu diabo buatshia buatshia diambedi diba kadiyi dianze kubuela; bualu bua bobo badi bahele ne badi bakuma mitshima yabo ku difutu; bobo kabadidi kudi Yehowa bualu buenu, ne bualu ebu kabuikadi bubi kunudi

Budi bulua ne bintu bia bungi kudi bakelenge bawakateka ku mutu kuetu bua malu mabi etu; bobo badi ne bukokeshi bua mibidi yetu ne bua bimuna bietu, bu mudi disua diabo, ne tuetu tudi mu dikenga dikole
Tshihiminu etshi tshidi bu tshia dikumi tshia épha
Muntu udi ushiha nyama neafute muena nyama, muoyo ku muoyo
Padibi kabiyi nanku, ndi njadika ne mutshipu ne: bu mudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne muoyi, nudi batentekedi

kadi bakatombokela Nzambi Kadi yeye wakabasungila bualu bua dina diandi, Wakabela Mai Manene Makunze kabidi ne akakama; Ka wakabasungila mu bianza bia wakabakina, Mai akubuikila bakengeshi babo, Hashishe, bakitabusha mei andi, Bakahua bienzedi biandi muoyo lukasa; Kadi bakasamina muoyo ne lukuka lukole mu tshihela; Yeye wakabaha tshintu tshiakalombabo, Bakadi ne Mose mukau kabidi mu tshitudilu; Buloba buakabulula mukana muabu, buakamina Datana, Kahia kakatema munkatshi mua tshisumbu tshiabo; Bakenza kana ka ngombe ku Holeba, Bakashintakasha wabo wa butumbi Bakahua Nzambi Musungidi wabo muoyo, wakabenzela bienzedi bia kukema mu boloba bua Hama Nunku yeye wakamba ne, Nembabutule; Hashishe, bakahetula buloba abu buimpe, Kadi bakatontolola mu nsubu yabo ya ntenta, Nunku yeye wakabisha tshianza tshiandi bua kuditshiha bua bualu buabo ne, nentangadishe tunkanunuma tuabo munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu ba bende, Bakadilamika kudi Bâla Peô; Nunku bakakuatshisha Yehowa tshiji bua bienzedi biabo, Hashishe, Pinehasa wakajuka, wakashikisha tshilumbu, Bualu ebu buakabadibua kudiye bu buakane Bakakuatshisha Yehowa tshiji kabidi ku mai a Meliba, Bualu bua bakanyingalasha mutshima Kabakabutula bena buloba abu kadi bakabuelakana ne ba mu bisamba abi bia bantu, Bakakuatshila mpingu yabo mudimu, Bulelela, bakashihela bademon bana babo baledibue, Bakatatshisha mashi a bantu bakadi kabayi ne tshilumbu hanshi, Nunku bakadibihisha ku bienzedi biakenzabo, Bua malu â tshiji tshia Yehowa tshiakatemena bantu bandi bua kuba kengesha, Wakabafila mu bianza bia bisamba bia bantu ba bende; Bena lukuna babo kabidi bakabakengesha, Yeye wakabahandisha misangu ya bungi, Kadi yeye wakamona dikenga diabo Wakavuluka tshihungidi tshiandi bua bualu buabo, Yeye wakabayuisha bantu ba kufuidibua luse Utusungile, wewe Yehowa Nzambi wetu, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, avudishibue disanka, Misambu Sakidilai bienu Yehowa, bualu bua yeye udi muimpe; Bantu badi Yehowa muhikule bambe biabo nunku, hakumusheye mu maloba onso bua kubasangisha hamue, Bakendakana mu tshihela, mu tshihela tshia lusenga muakadi kamuyi nshila; Bakadi ne nzala ne nyota, mitshima Nunku bakadila kudi Yehowa mu ntatu yabo, Yeye wakabalombola mu nshila mululame, Basakidile biabo Yehowa bua luse luandi lujalame Bualu bua yeye udi uha muntu tshidiye ujinga, Banga bantu aba bakashikama mu mîdima ne mu mufitu muhite bukole, bualu bua bakatombokela mei a Nzambi, Bua malu â yeye wakahuekesha mitshima yabo ne mudimu mukole; Nunku bakadila kudi Yehowa mu ntatu yabo, Wakabaluhula mu midima ne mu mufitu mukole, Basakidile Yehowa bua luse luandi lujalame Bualu bua wakutshibula bibi bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, Bantu bahote badi badivuishila dikenga bua diya diabo mu nshila wa ditombokela diabo, Mitshima yabo idi ikenuka mishindu ya bia kudia yonso; Nunku bakadila kudi Yehowa mu ntatu yabo, Wakabatumina dî diandi, wakashikisha masama abo, Basakidile Yehowa bua luse luandi lujalame Bafile milambu kudiye ya kumusakidila n ai, Bakahueka ku mai manene mu matu, bakamona biabo bienzedi bia Yehowa, Bualu bua wakela mukenji, wakahehesha tshihehele tshiakadi bu tshihuhu, Bakabanda mulu, bakahueka kabidi muinshi mu mai a ndondo, Bakatenkakana eku ne eku, bakadi balendukalenduka bu muntu mukuatshike maluvu, Nunku bakadila kudi Yehowa mu ntatu yabo, Wakaholesha tshihuhu bua tshituye biatshi, Ka bobo bakasanka bualu bua mavuala au akabatama, Basakidile biabo Yehowa bua luse luandi lujalame Bamunemeshe mu disangisha dia bantu, Udi ukudimuna misulu bua kuluayi tshihela tshia lusenga, Udi ukudimuna buloba bufuke bua kuluabu tshihela tshia luehu, Udi ukudimuna tshihela tshia lusenga bua kuluatshi dishiba dia mai, Mu miaba yaya udi ushikamisha badi ne nzala, Badi bakuna maminu mu madimi, badi batentula mionshi ya tumuma mu manga madimi, Udi ubavudishila disanka, badi bavulangana ba bungi; Hadi bungi buabo bukeheshibua, ne hadibo bahuekeshibua hanshi yeye udi uhongolola kulengulula kuandi ha baminyampala, Kadi udi ushikika bahele mu muaba wa mulu bumushibue biabo mu dikenga, Bantu bakane badi batangila bualu ebu, badi basanka; benji ba malu mabi badi bahuwa biabo

Hashishe wakalua neanyi mu tshiendelu tshia ntempelo tshia mu luhanza, ne nakamona nsubu mitangilangane ne nshila mulongolola ne mabue hanshi munyunguluke tshiendelu; nsubu makumi asatu yakadiku ne mpala yai mitangile ku nshila eu

Hanuatangila malenda au, nuvuluke mikenji ya Yehowa, nuyenze, kanulondi mitshima yenu ne mesu enu adi anuenzesha malu a masandi, nuenu nuvuluke mikenji yanyi yonso, nuyenze, nuikale bantu ba tshijila kudi Nzambi wenu
Mose wakambila tatu andi muenu malu onso akenzela Yehowa Palô ne Bena Ejipitu bualu bua Bena Isalele, ne bua makenga akabakuata mu nshila, ne muakabasungila Yehowa
Nuenze madiotu anu bungi bua tshibidilu
Nansha biandekela tatu wanyi ne mamu wanyi, Yehowa neangambule

Bene hadada wakitabusha dî dia mukelenge Asa, wakatuma tupitene tua masalayi andi bua kuluangana ne bena misoko ya mu Isalele; bakahaula Iyona ne Dana ne Abele maima ne misoko ya bibutshilu bia mu Nafatale
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Mibuabua idi ne mena ai, nyunyu ya mulu idi ne masua ai; kadi Muana wa muntu kena ne ha kuladika mutu wandi
Ha diba adi Pilato wakakeba mua kumulekela; kadi Bena Yuda bakela mei abo bikole ne, Biwalekela muntu eu, kuena mulunda wa Kaisa; muntu yonso udi udivuisha bu mukelenge udi utombokela Kaisa
Bu bidimu makumi anai yeye wakabatuala mu tshihela bu tatu muledi
Nunku muan anyi witabusha di dianyi, bika biebe, unyemene kudi Labana muan etu wa balume, udi mu Halana, ushale n andi matuku makese to ne hashika lukuna lua mukulu ebe ludiye n alu kudi
Wangate bukula bua ntete, wenze mampa adi kaayi mela buanga ne mikata mikanga ne mafuta, kayiyi miela buanga
Tatu kutuandamuna ne: Muena kuanyi Rakele, uvua mundelele bana ba balume amu babidi
Tshibondo tshimue tshiakadi ne mamuma a nfigi mimpe, bu mamuma a nfigi akulua diambedi; tshibondo tshikuabo tshiakadi ne mamuma a nfigi mahite bubi, akadibo kabayi mua kudia
Ne yeye wakashiminyina muntu webe kudi mukelenge wanyi; kadi mukelenge wanyi udi bu muanjelo wa Nzambi, wenze malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuebe

Bualu bua Nzambi udi umue, ne mutuanganyi umue udiku hankatshi ha Nzambi ne bantu, nyeye muntu mene, Kilisto Yesu; wakadifila bu tshintu tshia kuhikula n atshi bantu bonso; bumanyishi bua muanda eu budi ne bua kumanyishibua mu bikondo biabu mene
Isaka wakumukaku, wakashimika ntenta yandi mu tshibanda tshia Gelâ, wakashikamamu
Bena Isalele bakaha Bena Lewi misoko ei ne miaba ya ku mpenge

Muomumue kabidi tshihuhu utshikuate tubalu, mpunda, Mu tshikondo atshi kabidi bantu bonso badi bashale munkatshi mua bisamba abi bionso biakaluisha Bena Yelushalema nebabandeku ku tshidimu ku tshidimu bua kutendelelabo Mukelenge Yehowa wa misumba, ne bua kujidila bidia bia disanka dia bitandatanda

Bualu bua Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakaha bantu balume ba ngombe tshinunu ne mikoko binunu muanda mutekete bua kufilabo bu milambu; ne bantu banene bakaha bantu balume ba ngombe tshinunu ne mikoko binunu dikumi; bakuidi ba bungi bakadijidila
Udi udia mubidi wanyi, udi unua mashi anyi, udi ne muoyo wa tshiendelele, nemubishe dituku dia kunshikidilu
Udi uteka meshi andi ku dituku udi wateka nunku bua Mukelenge; ne udiadia, udiadia bua Mukelenge, bualu bua udi usakidila Nzambi
Miriyame kufuila muaba awu

Bakasemena ha buihi ne mulami wa nsubu wa Yosefe, bakayikila n andi ku tshibi tshia nsubu, bakamba ne, Mukelenge wetu, tuakalua kunoko diambedi bua kusumba bia kudia, ne hatuakafika ku nsubu wa tshilala benyi, tuakasulula bibombi bietu, tuakamona argent yetu yonso munda mua tshibombi tshia muntu ne muntu, tuakulua n ai kabidi mu tshianza tshietu

Hakaya bifukibue ebi, nkata yakaya, hakimana bifukibue ebi talalâ, nkata ai yakimana kabidi; hakajuka difukibue ebi hanshi, nkata yakajuka n abi diakamue; bualu bua nyuma wa bifukibue bidi ne muoyo wakadi munda mua nkata
Bena Isalele bakakudimuna mitshima yabo bualu bua Bena Benyamina, bana babo, bamba ne, Tshisamba tshimue tshidi tshiumushibua munkatshi mua Bena Isalele lelu
Ha mitu ha mikuna ne mu bibanda bionso matamba au neahone hanshi, ne matamba au manene nealale matshibuke mu bihonga bionso bia ha buloba

Nunku buonso buetu bakamana kukola mu bualu bua Nzambi tuikale ne meshi momumue; ne binuikala ne meshi makuabo mu bualu bukuabo, Nzambi neanubuluile bualu ebu kabidi; kadi kutuakamana kufika, tuende bietu mu nshila muomumue
Kudimunai mitshima yenu, andamukai kabidi, bua mibi yenu Ijimishibue; bua bikondo bia kunukankamasha bifume ku mesu kua Mukelenge, ne bua yeye atume Kilisto wakunusunguileye, Yesu mene
Ndi musue kusombuela baluishi banyi, kufuta bonsu badi bankina

Bikaleye kayi ne mushinga wa muana wa mukoko, yeye neafile mulambu wa disambuka dia mikenji kudi Yehowa, nansha nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi nansha mputu nyunyu ibidi, nyunyu umue bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia
Mpindiu bumushe masandi abo a kutendelela kuabo kua mpingu ku mpala kuanyi ne bitalu bia banfumu babo, bateke malu â kule, ne meme nenshikame munkatshi muabo tshiendelele
Bakimanyika babidi, Yosefe wakadibo babikila ne, Bâsaba, wakadi biandi ne dinga dina ne, Yusto, ne Matia
Yeye wakamuambila ne

Yeye wakabika, wakangata muana ne baba wandi butuku, wakaya mu Ejipitu; wakashalamu tô ne hakafua Helode; bua dî dia Mukelenge diakambabo kudi muprofete dishikisha e ne, Hakamanya Helode ne, Bena Meshi badi banseka, wakadi ne tshishi tshikole, wakatuma bua kushihabo bana balume bonso ba mu Beteleheme ne ba ku matshika a musoko ba katataka tô ne ba bidimu bibidi, bu ba tshikondo tshiakumanyineye kudi Bena Meshi
Bienzedi bia Lehabama, bia kumudia ne bia kunshikidilu kabiena bifunda mu kulondolola kua Shemaya muprofete, ne kua Ido mumonyi wa malu, bu mudibo bafunda mikanda ya kulondolola anyi
Nebahone ku muele wa nvita, nebaye n abo bakuata mu bisamba bionso; bantu ba bisamba bia bende nebadiate Yelushalema munshi mua makasa abo tô ne hashika tshikondo tshia bantu ba bisamba bia bende
Bakasabuka Yadene, bakasa tshitudilu tshiabo ku Aloê, ku luseke lua tshianza tshia balume tshia musoko tshiakadi munkatshi mua tshibanda tshia Gada mu nshila wa ku Yasê

Bakajika mifuba ya Yosefe, yakalua n ai Bena Isalele ku Ejipitu, mu Shekeme mu tshituha tshia buloba tshiakasumba Yakoba kudi bana ba Hamo, tatu wa Shekeme, ku bituha lukama bia argent; buakalua buhianyi bua tunkanunuma tua Yosefe
Bualu ebu buakalua bubi kudi ba mu nsubu wa Yalobama, bua kubahidiabo ne bua kubajimishabo ha buloba
John Hakamba Yesu mei â, wakaya ne bayidi bandi dishia dia kasulu ka Kidilona diakadi muaba wa mitshi ya mamuma, wakabuelamu ne bayidi bandi
Hafua wa mu nsubu wa Yalobama mu musoko, mbua neyimudie; biafuileye mu mpata, nyunyu ya mulu neyimuzokole; bualu bua Yehowa wakuamba dî edi
Bakafunda ha mutu handi ne: Bantu babi babidi bakadi bahohela, mukuabo wakahenda Yesu ne, Wewe kuena Kilisto, anyi
Dituku adi too ne butuku, Maweja Nangila kutuma lupepele lufumina kudi diba dipatukila
Musulu wa Kishona, musulu au wa kale kale, musulu wa Kishona mene mene wakabahita bukole
Balami ba bimuna bia Bena Gelâ bakatandangana ne balami ba bimuna bia Isaka, bakamba ne, Dina dia mai edi ndietu

BIDI BITANGILA DIAKAJILULA DIA DIYI DIKULU Bwa kwepula ngenyi miludiki ya mungalata idi mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi ku mpukapuka ya tshidiidi ne ku diyitangilula kadiyi dikengedibwa, diakajilula dia Dîyi dikulu nansha dimwe kadieena mwa kulenga bulongolodi budi butangila Mbulamatadi wa Bukalenga bwabanyangana, lungenyi luludiki lwa disungudibwa kudi bantu bônso, bweena mpala bwa Bukalenga bunene, bûngi ne bule bwa matuku a butumibwa bwa Mulombodi wa ditunga, budikadidi bwa bukalenga bwa bandumbulula, tshibûngi tshia bisumbu bia tshidiidi ne bia bakwidi ba beena mudimu
Mu miaba ei yakashikama bana ba Yosefe, muana wa Isalele
Bana balume ba Bela bakadi Ada ne Nâmana: ne meku a Bena Ada ne meku a Bena Nâmana
Yalobama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakelenge ba Isalele; Zekâya, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Bena Yuda bakahitshibua bukole kudi Bena Isalele, bakanyemena ku ntenta yabo
Bena Yuda bakamuebesha ne, Katuena tuamba bulelela ne, Wewe udi Muena Samalea, udi ne demon munda, anyi
Mukelenge wa Ashû wakatuma Labashake ne masalayi a bungi bua kubika ku Lakisha ne kuya ku Yelushalema kudi Hezikiya
Misangu itanu nakangata mikumu kudi Bena Yuda makumi anai bumushe umue
Mukelenge wakakonka bantu bandi ne, Kanuena bamanye ne muenyampala ne muntu munene wakashihibua mu Isalele lelu, anyi
Hakadiye wakula, Mufalese wakamubikila ne, Udie n anyi bidia bia dinda; wakabuela mu nsubu, wakashikama ku mesa

Paulo wakolola tshianza, wakabanga kudividila ne, Mukelenge Agipa, ndi ne disanka bualu bua lelu ndi ngamba kudividila ku mesu kuebe bua malu onso anakubandibua kudi Bena Yuda; ndi ntamba kusanka bua wewe udi mumanye bilele bia Bena Yuda ne malu abo bimpe; ndi nkutendekena bua wewe kutelesha dî dianyi ne lutulu
Bena Libue ne Bena Atiopa kabidi nebakokeshibue kudiye
Kanutambi kuelangana meshi a makelela, bualu bua makelela neadielelangane meshi
Hakatangila Lea ne, Tshiena ndela bana kabidi, yeye wakangata Zilepa, muena mudimu wandi wa bakashi, wakamufila kudi Yakoba bu mukashi wandi
Kadi Elisha wakamuambila ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo, undi ngimana ku mpala kuandi, tshiena mua kukuangata
Hakabuela bantu muitu, monai, buitshi buakamata hanshi: nansha muntu wakela tshianza mukana muandi bualu bua bakatshina mutshihu
Nenuikale ne biakudia bikumbane bidi binufikisha too ne ku dinowa dia biakudia bia mu tshidimu tshia tshitema
Hashishe, mukelenge wa ku sude neikale ne bukole; kadi umue wa munkatshi mua tupitene tuandi neamuhite yeye bukole, neakokeshe bukelenge, bukokeshi buandi nebuhite bukole

Monai, yeye neabuke kulu, neahahale bu nyunyu wa mukanku, neolole mahuahua andi bua kuluisha ba mu Bosela; mitshima ya bena nvita ba mu Edome mu dituku adi neyikale bu mutshima wa mukashi mu didinyenga diandi dia ha kulela
Kanuena mua kubipua muoyi musangu nansha umue to
Bantu bonsu kutuilangana ku mushiku wa ntenta wa kusambakena
Lewitiki Bukoya bua Mubidi Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Nuambile Bena Isalele ne, Hahatuka tufina mu mubidi wa muntu, tufina atu tudi tubi
Monai bunene bua bimanyinu biandi

Yonatana ne Ahimasa bakadi bashikama mu Ene logela, ne muena mudimu mukashi wakaya kubambila, ne bobo bakaya, bakambila mukelenge Davidi; bualu bua bobo kabakamanya mua kubuela mu musoko ku mesu kua bantu
Nebanufile mu dikenga, nebanushihe; bisamba bionso nebikale n enu lukuna bua dina dianyi

Nunku biadisangisha bena ekelesia bonso mu muaba umue, ne biakulabo buonso buabo mu miaku mikuabo, ne biabuela bantu badi kabai bamanye miaku anyi badi kabai bena ditabusha, bobo kabena bamba ne, Badi bahale, anyi
Tshiena nkulomba ne, Ubumushe ha buloba; ndi nkulomba ne, Ubasungile kudi bubi
Kabidi muntu kena mua kuenza majimbu, kutempa, nansha kulowa bantu, nansha kubuka, nansha kuyukila ne bakishi bua kumvua tshidibu bamba

Yone Hakamba Yesu malu â, wakatangila mulu, wakamba ne, Tatu, diba diakufika; utumbishe Muan ebe, bua Muana akutumbishe; bu muwakumuha bukole bua kukokesha bantu bonso bua kuheye bonso bawakumuha muoyo wa tshiendelele
Bana ba Elama mukuabo, tshinunu tshimue ne nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu ne banai
Nunku Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakafua Oga, mukelenge wa Bashana, ne bantu bandi bonso mu tshianza tshietu kabidi; tuakabashiha, nansha muntu umue wakashala
Ke munudi mua kuenzela mukaji yonsu padiye ulela muana wa balume, nansha wa bakaji

kadi kamungutuka padi Dîyi dikulu edi dipeta Kanungu ka Bulongolodi bwa kalongo ka kumpala ka kanungu ka Dîyi dikulu edi nebupeta bwenzeji mu ngondu makumi asatu ne isambombo yalonda diteeka dia bishimikidi bia tshidiidi mu nkwaasa bidibo balongolola kudi Dîyi dikulu edi
Muaba eu wikale bu tshituha tshikuabo tshia buloba tshiumushibue ku tshituha tshia buloba tshidi tshijidila Yehowa, tshintu tshitambe tshijila, muaba udi mutuangane ne butshika bua Bena Lewi

Yeye wakatangisha bituha bia argent tshinunu tshimue ne lukama lumue kudi mamu wandi; mamu wandi wakamba ne, Ndi njidila Yehowa argent ku tshianza tshianyi bualu bua muan anyi, bua kusongeye n ai mpingu ne bua kutuleye n ai mpingu; nunku nenkuhingishileyi
Ba Kishi; bana ba Kishi: Yelamele
Mu tshitupa tshionsu muikale tshimenga tshia kunyemena
Yeye wakalua ku musoko wa Samalea, dina diau Suka, hehi ne muaba wakadi Yakoba muhe muan andi Yosefe
Nyama ya mu mpata yakalala mu dileshi diau, nyunyu ya mulu yakikila ha matamba au ne bonso bakadi ne muoyo bakadia bia kudia kudiu
Nutumbile mu dina diandi dia tshijila; mitshima ya badi bakeba Yehowa isanke
Kadi nenjadike tshihungidi tshianyi n ebe, wewe neubuele mu buatu ne bana bebe balume ne mukashi webe ne bakashi ba bana bebe
Genese Yosefe ne Mukashi wa Potifâ Bakaya ne Yosefe mu Ejipitu, ne Potifa, kamanda ka masalayi a Palo, Muena Ejipitu, wakamusumba ku bianza bia Bena Yishemaele, bakalua n andi
Aamiamine pa tshibuikidiji tshia mushete ne kumpala kua mushete, bu nuwuaye muenze ne mashi a ngombe mulume
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Lumu lua bulengele buebe luakamuangalaka munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu; bulengele buebe buakadi buimpe tshishiki bualu bua butumbi bunakateka ham bidi hebe

Hakadi balume aba bumuka kudiye, Petelo wakambila Yesu ne, Mukelenge, hatudi kunoko mbimpe, tuasai bitanda bisatu, tshikuabo ntshiebe, tshinga ntshia Mose, tshikuabo ntshia Eliya; Petelo kakamanya tshiakadiye wamba
Mamuma a buakane adi akunyibua mu ditalala kudi bantu badi benzesha ditalala

Yosefe wakamuambila ne, Eku nkujingulula kua tshilota tshiebe bisaka bisatu bidi bu matuku asatu, hahita matuku asatu, Palô neakukose mutu, neakuowe ku mutshi, ne nyunyu ya mulu neyizokole munyinyi wa mubidi webe
Udimuke ne munya udi munda muebe kawikadi mîdima
Balombodi bakuabu ba mu bukalenga kuangata bualu abu ne mushinga, kubueja bapika babu ne bimuna biabu bionsu mu nzubu
Muena nsudi wakalua kudiye, wakamutendekena, wakamutuila binu, wakamuambila ne, Biwasua kuenza nunku, udi mumanye mua kundengesha
Nentume nyama ya tshisuku, ishipe bana benu, ibutule bimuna bienu
Nakunuambila malu â mu nsumuinu; kadi diba nedilue dingikala tshi nuambila malu mu nsumuinu kabidi, nenujukuile bualu bua Tatu
Wakela mikete, yakabamuangalasha; wakahenyisha miele ya nvula, yakabatatshisha
Nebanutshine
Lote kuya kuambila baku bende, bavua babangile bana bende ba bakaji, ne: Jukayi lukasa, numuke mu tshimenga etshi, bualu Maweja Nangila mmusue kutshibutula
Tshisamba tshia Benyamina tshiakangata buhianyi buatshi ku meku atshi; mukalu wabo wakahatuka hankatshi ha Bena Yuda ne Bena Yosefe
Sungula luseke luudi musue
Amasa wakadi mubunguluke mu mashi andi munkatshi mua nshila
Nyuma ngudi uha muoyo, mubidi kawena wenza bualu; mei anakunuambila adi nyuma ne muoyo

Bujitu bua or ya tukanu tua ku matshu tuakalombeye buakadi nshekele Gideona Wakenza efoda ne bintu ebi, wakamuteka mu Ofela, musoko wandi; Bena Isalele bonso bakendaku masandi; nunku efoda eu wakalua bu buteyi kudi Gideona ne ba mu nsubu wandi
Netanele muana mulume wa Sua neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Yisakâ
Mu difuku dia tshitema dia ngondo muinai tshiole tshiakatamba bukole mu musoko; nunku bena buloba kabakadi ne bia kudia

Hashishe Bena Lewi, Yeshua ne Kadamiele ne Bani ne Hashabeneya ne Shelebaya ne Hodiya ne Shebanya ne Petehiya, bakamba ne, Jukai bienu, nuvudishile Yehowa Nzambi wenu disanka ku tshibangidilu tô ne kunshikidilu
Bualu buakulombabo buenjibue
Ba bana ba Imê: Hanani ne Zebedaya
Lewi wakamulambishila bidia bia bungi mu nsubu muandi; basangishi ba mulambu ba bungi ne bantu bakuabo kabidi bakadi bashikame n abo ku mesa
Ulele bana ba bungi, bimuna biebe bivulangane
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Bantu bakanyema mu nvita ne bantu ba bungi bakafua; Shaula ne muan andi mulume Yonatana bakafua kabidi
Kabena bavuluka bubi bumue bua mu malu mabi akenzeye diambedi bua kumubanda n abu
Kanuteki tshintu kumpala kua mpofu, bua adishinde panshi

Kabakadi ne kuhita kua Yehowa munkatshi mua Bena Isalele bu eku, katshia mu matuku a Samuele muprofete; bakelenge bakuabo kabakadi ne kuhita kua Yehowa bu eku kuakenza Yoshiya ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi, ne Bena Yuda ne Bena Isalele bakadiku, ne bantu ba mu Yelushalema
Tshintu tshidi tshibuela mukana mua muntu katshiena tshimubihisha, tshidi tshiluhuka mukana muandi ntshidi tshimubihisha

Ekesode Mulayi wa Dimueneka dia Yehowa Kudibo Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Bikai, yai bienu, ne wewe ne bantu bawakaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, ku buloba bunakalaya Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba ne, Nembuhe bana benu
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Bika, ambula bulalu buebe, endaku
Misangu yonso hakafikeye ku musoko, wakayaku bua kudia
Hakayeye tshituha, wakamona Yakobo muana wa Zebedayo, ne muan abo Yone, bakadi mu buatu balukulula tuhamba tuabo

Yonatana wakasua kuya kudi masalayi a Bena Peleshete mu nshila mubumbakane, dibue disongoloka diakadi ku tshianza tshia balume, dikuabo disongoloka diakadi ku tshianza tshia bakashi: dina dia dikuabo diakadi Bosese, dina dia dinga diakadi Sene
Tshibilu etshi netshikale bu tshimanyinu ku diboku nansha pa mpala yenu, bua kunuvuluija dipatuka dienu mu Ejipitu
Esau wakaya lubilu bua kumuakidila, wakamuela tshituha ku nshingu, wakatuangana n andi mishiku, bakadila
Mukelenge Yolama wakaya ku Yizelele bua kumuondahabo mputa yakamutaha Bena Sulia mu Lama, hakaluanganeye ne Hazaele, mukelenge wa Sulia
Yehowa wakambila Gideona ne, Neufile Bena Midiyana mu tshianza tshiebe, nenkusungile kudi bantu aba nkama isatu bakalaka mai; bantu aba bonso bakuabo baye, muntu ku muaba wandi muntu ku muaba wandi
Ahaza wakalela Yala; Yala wakalela Alemeta ne Asemaweta ne Zimeli; Zimeli wakalela Mosa; Mosa wakalela Binea; ne Lefaya muan andi, ne Eleasa muan andi, ne Asela muan andi
Tudi tusakidila Nzambi, Tatu wa Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto, tudi tunulombela Nzambi misangu yonso
Bakandamuna ne, Mbimpe bamushihe
Meme kutuluka ku mukuna, uvua umueneka mukuate kapia
Muntu yonso udi uvila Muana, yeye kena ne Tatu; kadi muntu udi ujukula Muana udi ne Tatu kabidi
Bantu ba diambedi bakashikama mu buhianyi buabo mu misoko yabo ya Isalele bakadi bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne Bena Netinima
Bua bualu buabo, ba mu Yuda badi mu buhika mu Babulona nebabange kuela bantu bakuabo mulau, bamba ne, Yehowa akuvuishe bu Sedekiya ne bu Ahaba badi mukelenge wa Babulona muoshe mu kahia
Nakadi kusua ne badi banutombuesha baditungule kabidi
Eu wakadi musangu muisatu wakamueneka Yesu kudi bayidi, hakabikeye ku lufu
Bua Nzambi wakuamba dî mu kudijidila kuandi ne, Gilada nguanyi; Manashe nguanyi kabidi; Moaba udi dilonga dianyi dia kuowelamu; Wanfikisha mu musoko mukolesha ne ngumbu nganyi
Hakaya bakeluba, nkata yakaya n abo diatshimue; ne hakolola bakeluba mahuahua abo bua kubuka ha buloba, nkata kayakumuka ku miaba yai ya hehi n abo
Paulo wakamba ne, Nasha ne kalu kakese nasha ne bualu bunene, ndi ndomba Nzambi kambua wewe nkayebe kadi bua bonso badi bunvua mei anyi lelu kabidi, balue bu mundi emu, anu nkanu ei idishadile

Hezikiya wakasungula bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bu muakadi milongo yabo, muntu ne muntu ku mudimu wandi, ne bakuidi ne Bena Lewi, bua kufilabo milambu ya kuosha ne ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, ne bua kuenzabo midimu yabo, ne bua kusakidilabo ne bua kutumbishabo Nzambi mu bibi bia ku tshitudilu tshia Yehowa
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ubalonde, wewe neubahete, kuena uhanga kuhingisha bintu bionso
Wakumusha buta buebe mu tshilaminu tshiebe
Yesu kai muanze kulua, Yone wakadianjila kuambila bantu bonso ba Isalele bualu bua kubatiza kua kukudimuna kua mitshima
Bakamubuikila tshitambala ku mesu, bakamuambila ne, Amba bualu bûdi umona, wakukukuma nganyi

Hakamba Palo kuhidia kundekelu, Yehowa wakashiha ban a bute bonso ba mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne ba bantu ne ba nyama kabidi, nunku ndi mushihele Yehowa ban a bute ba balume ba nyama, kadi ndi muhikule ban a bute ba balume banyi

Bana betu, butudi n abu mbua kusakidila Nzambi misangu yonso bua bualu buenu, bu mudibu buakane, bua ditabusha dienu didi ditamba kudiunda, ne dinanga dia buonso buenu muntu ne muntu dinudi nunangangana n adi didi divulangana; bua muanda eu tuetu tudi tutumbila bua bualu buenu mu ekelesia ya Nzambi bualu bua ditantamana dienu ne bua ditabusha dienu mu makenga enu onso ne mu matata onso anudi nuikala n au
Yeye wakoshesha nsubu wa Yehowa ne nsubu ya mukelenge; wakayoshesha ne nsubu yonso ya mu Yelushalema, nsubu minene yonso mene ne kahia

Nuikale bana batumikidi, kanudifuanyikishi bu munuakadi mu nkuka yenu ya diambedi, mu buhote buenu; bu mudi yeye wakanubikila udi wa tshijila, nunku nuenu kabidi nulue ba tshijila mu malu onso a muoyo wenu; bualu bua dî didi difundibua ne, Nuenu nenuikale ba tshijila, bualu bua meme ndi wa tshijila
Muyidi eu mene wakamba malu â, wakâfunda; tudi bamanye ne, Dî diandi ndilelela
Kadi butudi n abu mbua kuedibua mu tshianga
Yehowa wakatshunguluka kudiye, wakamuambila ne, Ya mu bukole ebu mbuebe, usungile Bena Isalele mu bianza bia Bena Midiyana; tshiakakutuma, anyi
Ubulabe budimbu munda ne panyima
Mutoyi udi ufuma ku musoko, Diambedi Siona kayi muanji kutantamana, wakalela; Wakunvua bualu bu nunku diambedi nganyi
Yosefe wakabakonka ne, Bualu ebu bunuakuenza budi munyi
Bualu bua muntu yonso udi wamua mabele kena muanze kujalama mu dî dia buakane, bualu bua utshidi muana mukese

Kubutuka kua Ahazaya kuakadi bua Nzambi, bualu bua yeye wakaya kudi Yolama; bualu bua hakafikeye kudiye, yeye wakaya ne Yeholama bua kuluangana ne Yehu, muana wa Nimishi, nguakelabo manyi ha mutu kudi Yehowa bua kubutuleye ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba
Muakuidi wa munkatshi mua bana balume ba Alona, udibo bela manyi ha mutu bua kuhianeye mudimu wandi, neaufile kudi Yehowa bu muakelabo mukenji tshiendelele, neboshe mulambu eu mujima

Muakuidi neangate diboko dia tshimpanga diakalambabo, ne mutanda wa mampa adi kâyi ne luevene mu tshisaka, ne mukata udi kauyi ne luevene, neabiteke mu bianza bia Munazi hashikisheye kubeya mutu wandi, muakuidi neabinyukule bu mulambu udibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, ebi mbintu bia tshijila kudi muakuidi bidi bisangisha ne tshiadi ne tshibelu bidibo banyukula ku mpala kua Yehowa, hashika bualu ebu, Munazi udi mumanye mua kunua nvinyo

Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kena uteleja Moshe ne Arone Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne Arone ne: Pikala mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ujinga bua numuenzele bishima, wewe Moshe wambile Arone ne: ela dikombu diebe panshi

Nunku ku mesu kua Bena Isalele bonso ba mu tshisumbu tshia Yehowa, ne mu matshu a Nzambi wetu, nuenze, nukebe mikenji yonso ya Yehowa Nzambi wetu; bua nuenu nuhiane buloba ebu buimpe, bua nuenu nubushile bana benu bu buhianyi buabo tshiendelele

Hakamba Paulo kubulula mukana, Galio wakambila Bena Yuda ne, Nuenu Bena Yuda, bu bualu ebu buikale bua bubi anyi bua dikamakama, nakadi kumanya mua kunyua dî dienu; kadi bikala malu â makonka a mei ne a mena ne a mikenshi yenu nkayenu, nuenu mene nuditangidileu; tshiena musue kuikala mulumbuludi wa malu â
Nuakabala nsubu ya mu Yelushalema kabidi, nuakashimbula, nsubu mikuabo bua kukolesha n ai lumbu

Muana wa balume wa Solomo wakadi Lehabama, Abiya wakadi muan andi, Asa wakadi muan andi, ne Yehoshafata wakadi muan andi, Yolama wakadi muan andi, Ahazaya wakadi muan andi, ne Yoasha wakadi muan andi, Amasaya wakadi muan andi, ne Azaya wakadi muan andi, ne Yotama wakadi muan andi, Ahaza wakadi muan andi, Hezikiya wakadi muan andi, ne Manashe wakadi muan andi, Amona wakadi muan andi, ne Yoshiya wakadi muan andi

Mukelenge wakatuma disalayi diakadi sentedi, wakadiambila ne, Ulue ne mutu wandi; diakaya biadi, diakamukosa mutu mu nsubu wa lukanu, diakalua ne mutu wandi ha dilonga, diakauha nsongakashi, nsongakashi wakauha mamu andi
Hakabandeye mulu kabidi, hakatshibuleye bidia, hakadieye, hakakuleye musangu mule tô ne hakatshiabu, wakumuka

Yeye wakambila mukelenge ne, Mukelenge wanyi kanfunkununyi bua bubi buanyi, kavuluki bualu buhote buakakuenzela muntu webe dituku diakumuka mukelenge mu Yelushalema, mukelenge kateki bualu ebu mu mutshima wandi
Dituku dibidi Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Tshibuashibuashi tshienzeke munkatshi mua mayi, bua kupandulula mayi adi muinshi ne adi mulu
Bua badi balala tulu badi balala tulu butuku; ne badi bakuatshika maluvu badi bakuatshika butuku
Nanku nenudie nukute
Ne banjelo muanda mutekete bakadi ne mpungi muanda mutekete bakadilongolola bua kuyela
Lua, tuye bietu mu budimi
Badi ne bua kuenza mudimu mu ntenta wa kusambakena
Nanku bena Izrayele kumusha bantu bonsu abu mu mitanda yabu
Kadi diba dingafika, ndi ne bua kubanyoka bikole bua tshilema tshidibu benza etshi

Yeye wakahitshisha bana bandi mu kahia mu tshibanda tshia muana wa Hinoma; wakatempa matempu, wakatendelela bakishi, wakahaka manga, wakasangisha dî ne batempeshanganyi ba mbuku ne bena buloshi; yeye wakenza malu mabi a bungi ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kumufuisha n au tshiji
Nunku Samuele wakakudimuka bua kulonda Shaula; ne Shaula wakatendelela Yehowa
Muanjelo wa Nzambi wakamuambila ne, Angata munyinyi ne mikata idi kayiyi ne luevene, ubiteke ha mutu ha dibue edi, witshikishe nsuhu
Kumuenekabu ku mesu a bena Izrayele bu kapia kakole ku lusongu lua mukuna
Yeye wakamana kuteka bantu bu balaminyi bakadi balala munda mua nsubu; yeye wakamuambila ne, Shimishona, Bena Peleshete badi ham bidi hebe
Wewe mene ne Arone, nenuenze kabidi nanku
Hakafika Hushai, Muena Aka, mulunda wa Davidi, kudi Abashaloma, Hushai wakambila Abashaloma ne, Mukelenge ikale ne muoyo musangu mule
Bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bakajuka, bakavudishila bantu disanka; Nzambi wakunvua dî diabo, ne kutendelela kuabo kuakafika tô ne mu diulu ku muaba wandi wa tshijila
Yosefe wakadi mukokeshi wa mu buloba, nyeye mene wakadi uhanyisha bantu bonso bintu, bana babo ne Yosefe bakalua, bakamukukuila hanshi
Bana ba balume ba Lakele bakadi Yosefe ne Benyamina
Kuyi bua kuhumbulula mpumbuluila mu budimi bukuabo, kumuki kunoko nansha, kadi ushale ne bakashi benji banyi ba mudimu
Mana akashika hakabangabo kudia bintu biakasanganabo mu buloba; Bena Isalele kabakadi ne mana kabidi; bakadia anu bintu biakasanganabo mu buloba bua Kanâna tshidimu atshi

Tuakusangana muntu eu mutatshishi wa bantu, ne mutomboshi wa Bena Yuda bonso ba ha buloba, udi biandi tshilobo tshia tshisumbu tshia Bena Nazaleta; yeye wakakeba kuona ntempelo, buakamukuata; hawamukonka nkayebe, nêumanye mua kujingulula malu â onso atudi tumubanda
Davidi wakambila Gada ne, Ndi munkatshi mua malu manene: tuhone mu bianza bia Yehowa, bualu bua luse luandi ludi lunene; tshihonyi mu bianza bia bantu
Yeye wakabebesha ne, Muntu unuakasangila n andi, wakanuambila mei â, wakadi bishi
Yeye neanunyenge bena mudimu benu balume ne bena mudimu benu bakashi ne bansongalume benu badi batamba bulengele ne tubalu tuenu, neabibueshe mu mudimu wandi
Yeye kakamanya mua kuenzaku bualu bua kukema, wakakolesha anu bantu banya banya bakadi ne mabedi bakalengeye bianza
Pashishe tuetu kusabuka musulu wa Zerede wa muenji mukole, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mutuambile
Hashishe Yeshaya, muana wa Amoza, wakatumina Hezikiya dî ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Bualu bua wewe wakundombela hua Saneheliba, mukelenge wa Ashû, meme nakukunvuila
Bakadi ne Bena Isalele tshiji tshikole, bakumuka kudiye, bakahingana ku buloba buabo
udi ukankamasha mutshima wanyi
Bakumuka mu Miteka, bakashikama mu Hashemona, Bakumuka mu Hashemona, bakashikama mu Moselota
Dituku dia muanda mutekete, muena nsudi awu asukule bilamba biende, akungule nsuki, miedi, makiki ne boya buonsu budi pambidi pende
Padi mutuangaji udia munyinyi wa nyama mudifuile, nansha mushipa kudi nyama mukuabu, udi upia mikiya

Tshibuelelu tshia ku nsubu ya munkatshi tshiakadi ku tshianza tshia balume; bakasa tshibandilu tshikonyangala ku nsubu wa hanshi, tshiakaya ku nsubu ya kulu; tshibandilu tshikuabo tshikonyangala tshiakaya ku nsubu ya ha mutu

Yeye nealue n ai kudi muakuidi, neafile mulambu wa kubindila n au bubi diambedi, neanyengabashe nshingu wandi kadi kena umuhandulula nansha, neamiamine mashi makuabo a mulambu wa kubuikala n au bubi ku luseke lua tshioshelu, ne mashi makuabo yeye neahongolole ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu, tshintu etshi mmulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi

Ba ku Tâshishi bakenduluka n ebe mushinga bualu bua bintu biebe bivule bia mishindu yonso, bakashintakasha n ebe biamu biabo bia argent, bia tshiamu tshifike, tshia étain ne tshia lutende ku bintu biebe
Wakenza tshilulu tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin, bakenza tshifuanyikishi tshia bakeluba mu tshilulu kudi bantu bakadi ne lungenyi lule
Moshe ne Yoshuwa, muana wa Nune, kuimana kumpala kua bena Izrayele, kubabadila miaku yonsu ya musambu ewu ne diyi dikole
Nebaye ne luidi mu nshila mululame tô ne ku mukuna wa Galeba, nebanyunguluke tô ne ku Goa
Ku nyima kua bonso, mukashi wakafua kabidi
Muntu kakuhetudi

Bia kudia bia Solomo bia dituku dimue biakadi nunku: bihiminu bia bukula bua blé makumi asatu, ne bua manvua makumi asambombo, ne ngombe ya manyi dikumi, ne ngombe ya mu madimi makumi abidi, ne lukama lua mikoko ha mutu ha ngulungu ne tubuluku ne ntole ne nyunyu ya manyi

Diba ndishala dikese bua Lebanona Mu dituku adi badi ne mahaha nebunvue mei a mu mukandu, Bena kalolo kabidi nebavudishe disanka diabo mu Yehowa, Bualu bua amena tshinyangu wakuvuishibua muntu wa hatuhu, Badi bavuisha muntu bu muhishibu mu tshilumbu ku dî diabo dia mashimi, Nunku Yehowa wakahikula Abalahama udi wamba dî edi bua bana ba Yakoba ne, Kadi hamena bana bandi midimu inuakuenza ne bianza bianyi munkatshi muabo, Bantu kabidi badi batuhakana mu mitshima yabo nebikale ne lungenyi, Isaiah Yehowa udi wamba ne, Badi bahisha luendu bua kuhuekabo mu Ejipitu, Nunku bukole bua Palô nebulue bu bualu bua kunufuisha bundu, Bualu bua nansha bikala bakokeshi bandi ku Soana, buonso buabo nebafue bundu bualu bua bantu badi kabayi Dî dia tshijila Bualu bua dikuatshisha dia Ejipitu didi hatuhu, nunku nakunubikila ne, Lahaba udi mushikame muhuwe
Belâma wakaya ne Balaka, bakalua ku Kîyata husota
Kadi udi ne bualu ebu, bua udi ne bienzedi bia Bena Nikalao lukuna, bindi n abi lukuna kabidi
Nulombe, nebanuhe; nukebe, nenumone; nukokole, nebanunzuluile
Mu tshikondo atshi Hezikiya wakumusha or yonso ya ku bibi bia mu ntempelo wa Yehowa ne ya ku makunshi yakalamika Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda; wakabifila kudi mukelenge wa Ashû

Hashishe Esetê wakamukudimuna ne, Dikonka ne dilomba dianyi bidi nunku: bingikala ne luse ku mesu kua mukelenge, ne biasua mukelenge kuitaba ku dikonka dianyi ne kuenza bu mudi dilomba dianyi, mukelenge ne Hamana balue ku disanka dinene dindi mbalongoluela, ne makelela nengenze bu muakuamba mukelenge

Yehowa wakasonsola mitshima ya Bena Peleshete ne ya Bena Alabâ badi ha buihi ne Bena Atiopa bua kuluanganabo ne Yeholama; bakalua kudi Bena Yuda, bakahaula buloba, bakaya ne bintu bionso biakadi mu nsubu wa mukelenge ne bana bandi balume ne bakashi bandi; bakamushila anu muana umue, Yehoaza, muan andi wa mukala
Nuikale ne bihimu bimpe ne bihiminu bimpe, nuikale ne épha Nutumikile mei anyi onso ne mikenji yanyi yonso, nubienze, meme ndi Yehowa

Nakafila Bena Lewi kudi Alona ne bana bandi balume bu kuha kuabo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bua kukuatshila Bena Isalele mudimu mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, ne bua kubuikidila Bena Isalele bubi buabo, bua bualu bubi kabukuatshi Bena Isalele haluabo ha buihi ne ntenta wa kusambakena
Meme Moshe ndi mumanye ne: bena Izrayele badi ne tshitunu, badi bonsu bantomboji
Yozefe ufika mu mpata, kupambukaye mu njila
Bakâhuka bua kuya kulala mu Gibea
Dituku dikuabu Yozefe uvua ubuela mu nzubu bua kuenza mudimu wende
Yeye wakalomba Nzambi kabidi; ne diulu diakatuma nvula ne buloba buakamenesha mamuma abu
Bule bua mukeluba umue buakadi coudées dikumi, ne bule bua mukuabo buakadi muomumue
Hakaleha musangu mule, mukelenge wa bantu aba wakalua, wakabala n abo bintu
Neahanduke hashiheye tshihungidi tshiakahungeye, anyi
Yoshua wakajadika mabue au dikumi ne abidi munkatshi mua Yadene mu muaba wakadiata makasa a bakuidi bakatuala mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei: adiku tô ne ku lelu
Bintu ebi bidi ku mpala kuebe mbia nganyi
Ke kuvua ndimi ya kapia ilakuka, iya mulu, yenza mavuba a muinshi mufike
Ne nemuhe mutoto wa nkesha
Bakasa musoko, bakasanka mamu
Kadi mutshi wa nfigi wakayambila ne, Nshiya kushemakana kuanyi ne mamuma anyi mimpe bua kuya kuhehukahehuka ku mutu kua mitshi mikuabo, anyi
Yeye udi ukeba tshinyi

Kanungu ka Ditangilula dia dîyi nansha dimwe kadieena mwa kwenzeka tshikondo tshia Bukalenga bwa tshimpitshimpi anyi tshia Bukalenga bwa bilwilu, nansha tshikondu tshia bumfumu bwa ditunga bwa tshitupa tshiipi anyi padi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpa bipanga mwa kubweeja bisangilu mu budikadidi
Bakamuihata
Tangilai matu kabidi, nasha wowo manene be, adi endeshibua ku bihehele bikole, kadi adi atshunguludibua ku tshidimba tshitamba bukese, kuonso kudi mutshima wa muena yenda musue
Bobo bakatuma dî, bakabikila bakelenge ba Bena Peleshete, bakabambila ne, Numushe mushete wa Nzambi wa Isalele kutudi, uye ku muaba wau, kautushihi ne bana betu

Matuku anyi adi bu mundidimbi udi uleha hamba diba kubuela; Kadi wewe Yehowa, udi mushikame mu nkuasa wa butumbi kashidi; Wewe neujuke, nenfuile musoko wa Siona luse; Bualu bua bantu bebe badi ne mabue au dinanga, Nunku ba mu bisamba bia bantu nebatshine dina dia Yehowa, Bualu bua Yehowa neibake Siona kabidi, Neateleje matshu andi ku kulomba kua bakengi, Bafundile ba mu tshikondo tshialua bualu ebu, Bualu bua wakuntangila hanshi ku muaba wandi wa tshijila wa mulu
Kusuikakajabu nsongu yayi ibidi, ku masosu abidi a tshiamu tshia mpawungi avua ku mampinda a tshilamba tshia efode

Mukelenge wakajinga Abinê, wakamba ne, Bianza biebe kabiakadi bisuikibue, Hashishe bantu bonso bakalua kudi Davidi bua adie biandi, diba ditshidi mulu; kadi Davidi wakaditshiha ne, Nzambi atambe kungela mulau binalabula bidia anyi bintu bikuabo diambedi diba kadiyi dianze kubuela
Bakadi bamutelesha tô ne hakambeye dî edi; hashishe bakabandisha mei ne, Bumusha muntu eu ha buloba, kabiakadi bimpe bia yeye kuikala ne muoyo
Samuele wakajuka ku Gilegala, wakaya ku Gibea wa mu buloba bua Benyamina
Musangu wa kumpala uvua mundinge
Bakatuma mikanda ei ya kumanyisha n abi bantu bonso ba mu nseke yonso ne, Budi Bena Yuda n abu mbua kudilongolola bua dituku adi bua kudisombuelabo kudi bena lukuna babo
Bualu bua nsubu wa kusambakena wa Yehowa wakasabo kudi Mose mu tshihela ne tshioshelu tshiandi biakadi ku mutu kua mukuna wa Gibeona mu tshikondo atshi
Kakuakadi muntu wa bakadi ku mesa wakamanya buakamuambidileye dî edi
Nunku bisumbu bienu bibidi bidi biluhuka dituku dia Lumingu nebikale balami ba nsubu wa Yehowa mudi mukelenge muana
Bumuka ku Ashemona, kuyabu ku Mosherote
