Disanka ne tuseku bidi biumushibua mu madimi Heshebona ne Eleale badi badila, tô ne ku Yahaza badi bunvuisha bantu di diabo, ku Soâ tô ne ku Holonayima ne ku Egelata sheleshiya; bualu bua mai a mu Nimelima kabidi neakame

Ba munkatshi mua Bena Yisakâ, bakamanya mua kujingulula malu a tshikondo atshi, bua kumanyabo malu akadi Bena Isalele ne bua kuenza, bakadi nkama ibidi ku mutu kuabo; bana babo bonso bakalonda mikenji yabo
Diambedi tshiakadi mbungama ku mesu kuandi
Shaula ne bobo ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadi mu tshibanda tshia Ela, baluangana ne Bena Peleshete
Yehoyakima wakafila argent ne or kudi Palô; kadi wakalambuisha bena buloba bu muakamba Palô; wakalambuisha muntu ne muntu bu mu bintu biakadiye n abi, bua kulambuleye Palô neko
Bikalabo babakibue kudi balume ba mu tshisamba tshikuabo tshia Bena Isalele, nunku nebanyeme buhianyi buabo ku buhianyi bua batatu etu, nebabusangishe ku buhianyi bua tshisamba tshiakayabo
Aba bonso mbakadi babake bakashi ba bende; bakashi bakuabo bakabalelela bana
Nuyilongeshe ndelanganyi yenu, bua ikumbaje tshidi Mvidi Mukulu musue
Nuikale ne muoyomukese muimpe, bua, mu bualu budibo banusonguela, bobo badi bahenda bienzedi bienu bimpe binudi n abi mu Kilisto bafuishibue bundu

Muan abo wa balume wakimana ku tshianza tshiandi tshia balume, Asafa mene, muana wa Belekiya, muana wa Shimea, muana wa Mikaele, muana wa Bâseya, muana wa Malakiya, muana wa Eteni, muana wa Zela, muana wa Adaya, muana wa Etana, muana wa Zima, muana wa Shimei, muana wa Yahata, muana wa Gêshoma, muana wa Lewi
Nudi nuhetula ekelesia wa Nzambi ne nudi basue kufuisha badi kabai ne bia kudia bundu, anyi

Ne muanjelo mukuabo wakaluhuka mu tshioshelu, nyeye udi ne bukokeshi ha mutu ha kahia; ne wakela dî dikole kudi wakadi ne muele mutuisha wa kunowa n au, ne, Utume muele webe mutuisha wa kunowa n au, usangishe bisumbu bia tumuma tua nvinyo tua ku muonshi wa ha buloba; bualu bua tumuma tuabu tuakulua bimpe
Bumuka mu Risha, kuyabu ku Kehelata
Binualonda mei, anyi binuatumikila mikenji yanyi, binuayenza, nennuhe nvula mu tshidimu tshia nvula, ne buloba nebukuame bintu bia bungi, ne mitshi ya mu madimi neyikuame mamuma a bungi

Nakalunuisha Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, ne bahika bandi ne baminyampala bandi ne bantu bandi bonso; bantu ba bisamba bikuabo badi babuelakana n abo; bakelenge bonso ba mu buloba bua Uza, bakelenge bonso ba mu buloba bua Bena Peleshete, ba mu Ashekelona, ba mu Gaza, ha mu Ekelona ne ba mu Ashedodo badi bashale

Bikala bantu ba mu nsubu banya banya, muena nsubu neatahulule muana wa mukoko ne muena nsubu udi hehi n andi ku bungi bua bantu badi mu nsubu, bobo babale bungi bua bantu badi mua kudia muana wa mukoko umue

Yeye wakabakudimuna di ne, Yai bienu, nuambile Yone malu anuakumona ne anuakunvua ne, Bafofo badi batabala, balema badi benda, bena nsudi badi balengeshibue, bena mahaha badi bunvue, bafue badi babishibue ku lufu, badi bambila bahele lumu luimpe lua Nzambi
Bakabashiya bua kutetabo n abo Bena Isalele, bua kumanya ne bobo nebatumikile mikenji ya Yehowa yakeleye batatu abo kudi Mose

Hakafika diba dia dilolo diakafilabo milambu ya kuosha, Eliya muprofete wakasemena ha buihi, wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Abalahama ne wa Isaka ne wa Isalele, bantu bamanye ne, Wewe udi Nzambi wa mu Isalele, ne meme muntu webe nakuenza malu â onso anu ku dî diebe
Tuvua bana dikumi ne babidi ba tatu umue
Padi tunyama etu tufua, muntu utulenga, neapie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Neumukume ne mabue, neumushihe; bualu bua yeye wakakeba mua kunusesuisha mu nshila wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu
Kuolola kua mahuahua au nekûshe nseke yonso ya buloba buebe, Imanuele
Nunku Mose wakambila Alona ne, Ebu mbualu bakamba Yehowa ne, Nenjidibue kudi bantu balualua ha buihi n anyi, nentumbishibue ku mesu kua bantu bonso Alona wakahuwa talalâ
Wakahingana kudiye, ne mona, yeye wakadi muimane ha buihi ne mulambu wandi wa kuosha ha kahia, yeye ne miloho ya Moaba yonso

Tshibuelelu tshia ku nsubu ya munkatshi tshiakadi ku tshianza tshia balume; bakasa tshibandilu tshikonyangala ku nsubu wa hanshi, tshiakaya ku nsubu ya kulu; tshibandilu tshikuabo tshikonyangala tshiakaya ku nsubu ya ha mutu
Bualu bua Mose kale tô ne katataka udi ne bambi ba malu andi mu nsunagoga ya misoko yonso, badi babala mei andi nunku ku Lumingu ku Lumingu
Angata dianyi dionso didi ku mala ne lukutu lua ku mutshima ne tumuma tubidi ne, dianyi diabi, ubioshile ha tshioshelu
Hakunvuabo malu â, bakahua, bakatumbisha Nzambi ne, Nzambi wakuha bisamba bia bendekabidi kukudimuna kua mutshima bua kuikalabo ne muoyo
Yeye wakamutuma ha bule tô ngondo ibidi; yeye wakaya ne balunda bandi, bakajinga matuku akatshidiye kamama ku mutu kua mikuna
Kadi Bena Yuda kabakamanya mua kuihata Bena Yebuse ba mu Yelushalema: Bena Yebuse badi bashikama ne Bena Yuda tô ne ku dituku edi
Tatu wa muana wakela dî diandi lukasa ne, Ndi ngitabusha; unkuatshishe, umane mpata yanyi
Bantu bonso bakabika bu muntu umue bamba ne, Katuena tuya, muntu mu ntenta muntu mu ntenta yetu, ne katuena tuahuka, muntu ku nsubu wandi muntu ku nsubu wandi
Pashishe Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu kuamba ne: Monayi, muntu wenji bu umue wa ku tuetu, watufuanyi ku dijingulula dia malu mimpe ne mabi
Yesu wakabakudimuna ne, Nakunuambila, kadi kanuena nuitabusha; malu antshidi ngenza mu dina dia Tatu wanyi adi angamba
Kena mupete mpingu mu ntenta wa Rakele to
Malachi Dî dia tshijila Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nakunusua, kadi nudi nuamba ne, Wakutunanga munyi

Kanungu ka Bwa kulondolola pa lukasa ndongamu wabu, Bukalenga bunene budi mwa kulomba kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi kudi Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpe dianyisha dia kwangata, mu olodonase dîyi , mapangadika adi pa tshibidilu ku bukookeshi bwa dîyi mu mapangadikadîyi bwa tshipungu tshikese ne pa mianda mimanyika
Ahiya wakadi mufofo, mesu andi akadi bileshileshi bua bununu buandi
Bua tshinyi ndi ne bua kuikala bu muhambuke munkatshi mua mikoko ya balunda bebe
Bakaji aba kukengesha Izake ne Rebeka bikole
Maweja Nangila kupueka bua kubandila tshimenga ne kaleya bivua bantu abu base
Yeye wakabambila ne, Mushindu eu udi mumanye mua kumuka anu ku ditendelela

Mesu enu akatangila bualu buakenza Yehowa bualu bua Bâla peô; Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakashiha balume bonso munkatshi muenu bakalonda Bâla peô; kadi nuenu bakalamata Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, nudi ne muoyo lelu eu
Kuladi ne mulume bu mudibo balala ne mukashi, bualu ebu budi bubi
Simona Petelo wakabuela mu buatu, wakakoka tuhamba ku mpata, tûle tente ne minyinyi minene lukama ne makumi atanu ne isatu; minyinyi yakadi bungi nunku, kadi tuhamba katuakadi tuhandike

Wakumusha luhingu lua Ashela mu nsubu wa Yehowa, wakaya n alu ku mpenge ya Yelushalema ku kasulu ka Kidelona, wakaluosha ku kasulu ka Kidelona, wakalubutula bu luhuishi, wakela luhuishi ha nkita ya bantu ba tshianana
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; kakasesuka mu malu mabi a Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, akenzesheye Bena Isalele matuku andi onso
Tuyai bietu hanshi, tutompakashe muaku wabo, nunku kabena mua kunvuangana muaku wabo kabidi
TEKEL, bakukuidikisha mu tshiamu tshia kuidikisha n atshi bujitu, bakukusangana kuyi mukumbane
Nubale bonsu badi ne bidimu bituadije ku makumi abidi, badi mua kuenza mudimu wa bena mvita

Kadi bualu bua tudi ne nyuma muomumue wa ditabusha bu mudi dî difundibue ne, Nakitabusha, nunku nakakula; tuetu tudi tuitabusha kabidi, nunku tudi tuakula kabidi: tudi bamanye ne, Wakabisha Mukelenge Yesu ku lufu neatubishe kabidi ne Yesu, neatumueneshe n enu ka mesu kuandi
Samuel Samuele wakambila Shaula ne, Yehowa wakantuma kûdi bua kukuela manyi ha mutu bua wewe kuikala mukelenge ku mutu kua bantu bandi Bena Isalele; nunku unvue biebe mei a Yehowa
Wamba dî edi mu nsubu wa Yakoba, Unvuai bienu dî edi, nuenu bantu bahote ne badi kabayi ne mitshima idi ijingulula; Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Kanuena nuntshina, anyi

Nunku Yoshua wakalekesha buloba bujima, ne bua ku mikuna, ne bua ku Sude, ne bua mu bibanda, ne bua ku tukunakuna, ne bakelenge babu bonso: kakashiya nansha umue, wakabutula bonso bakadi ne muoyo, bu muakamba Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele
Nzambi wakamba ne, Kulu ha buihi, umushe bisabata biebe ku makasa, bualu bua muaba udi muimane udi buloba bua tshijila
Wakatuluka lukasa, wakamubuesha mu nsubu usanka
Ke bena Ejipitu kushisha kujika bitalu bia bamuanabute babu, bavua Maweja Nangila mushipe bonsu
Bualu ditunga edi dia Are, ndi mumane kudipesha ndelanganyi ya Lote
Nakunufundila malu â bua bobo badi basue kunuhambuisha
Nakatangila disanka edi ne, Ndifume ku tshianza tshia Nzambi

Mukashi wakadi muluatshisha ne bilulu bikunzubile ne bikunzekunzu, mulengeshibue ne ngolo ne mabue a mushinga mukole ne a perle, muikale ne luhanza lua ngolo mu tshianza tshiandi lûle tente ne malu a bukoya bua masandi andi
Kanungu ka Dibweela dia bilumbulwilu didi dienzeka ku mêsu a bantu bônso, pa kumbusha pikala ngenzelu ewu mwa kwikala ne njiwu ku bulongama bwa bantu bônso anyi ku bibidilu bia mulowu
Yehowa wakalua, wakimana, wakabikila ne, Samuele, Samuele, bu muakenzeye bikondo bikuabo
Tuetu tudi ne dinanga, bualu bua yeye wakadianjila kutunanga
Tshintu tshidi mua kuhita Yehowa bukole, anyi
Pashishe wambile bena Izrayele bonsu ne: Padi muntu ufua kayi mushiye muana wa balume, bapiane bintu biende kudi muanende wa bakaji
Bakamukuminaku milonda mu bianza ne ku makasa ku mutshi mutshiamakane, bakenzela bakuabo babidi muomumue, mukuabo eku, munga eku, Yesu hankatshi

Nahuma Mulau wikale kudi musoko eu udi umatshisha mashi a bantu hanshi, Tshiona tshia nfimbu ne tshiona tshia nkata ya makalu bidi biunvuika, Bena tubalu badi bendesha tubalu tuabo lubilu, Malu â akulua bua masandi mavule a mukashi wa masandi, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Mona, meme ndi nku hidia, Nenkuele bintu bia bukoya ham bidi hebe, Bua mianda ai mundi yonso udi ukumona neakunyeme, wamba ne, No amona eu, Atiopa ne Ejipitu biakadi bukole buandi, Kadi bakaya n andi kukuabo, Wewe kabidi neukuatshike maluvu, Ngumbu yebe ya mata neyikale bu mitshi ya nfigi Mona, bena nvita bebe Suna mai bua kuikala n au mu matuku a kutshintshimika kua musoko, Mu muaba eu kahia nekakushidishe, Bangend a mushinga bebe Bakokeshi bebe badi bu mikumbi, Wewe mukelenge wa Ashû, Kakuena diondaha dia mputa webe,

Mukelenge wakenza makunshi a mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne mu nsubu wa mukelenge a mitshi ei ya sandal; wakenza kabidi bisanji ne nzenze ya bimbi ba misambu kuimba; kabakatangila mitshi ya sandal bu ei kabidi tô ne ku lelu
Mukelenge wa Bena Sulia wakadianjila kuelela tupitene tua makalu andi mukenji ne, Kanuluanganyi ne bantu bakese anyi bantu banene, anu ne mukelenge wa Isalele
Wakumukaku, wakaya ku Penuele; wakabambila muomumue; ne bakelenge ba mu Penuele bakamukudimuna anu di diakamba Bena Sukota

Asa wakumusha Mâka mamu wandi mumuledi kabidi, bua yeye kikadi mukelenge mukashi, bualu bua yeye wakenza luhingu lua bundu lua kutendelela n alu Bashela; Asa wakashimbula luhingu luandi, wakalusunsula tuhese tukese, wakaluosha ne kahia ku musulu wa Kidilona
Mu musoko muakadi muntu, dina diandi Simona, diambedi wakadi mutempeshanganyi wa mbuku, wakukemesha Bena Samalea, udiamba ne, Ndi muntu mimene
Mfumuanyi Abrahame kungandamuna ne: Maweja Nangila undi mvuluka matuku onsu, neakuendeshe diakalenga
Wakafunda ne: Bena Yuda ba bungi bakabala mukanda eu, bualu bua muaba wakashihabo Yesu wakadi hehi ne musoko; mukanda wakadi mufunda mu muaku wa Bena Yuda ne wa Bena Lomo ne wa Bena Gelika
Nunku nempuwishe tshiji tshianyi kûdi, mukau wanyi undi n au kûdi neûmuke, nengikale holâ, tshiena ngikale ne tshiji kabidi
Yosefe wakambila bana babo ne bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu andi ne, Nendianjile kudi Palô, nemmuambile ne, Bana betu bonso ba mu nsubu wa tatu wanyi bakadi mu buloba bua Kanâna bakulua kundi
Uvua utshina ne: Binyamine kapetshi diakabi mu njila
Bakamba ne, Udi muanjelo wandi
Hanakatangila, ekumona tshianza tshiakadi tshiolola kundi, ne munda muatshi muakadi mukanda muvunga
Kanutshinyi, maboko enu ikale ne bukole

Bualu ebu budi tshileshilu tshia dibutuka diabo, kadi ntshia luhandu kunudi, ne luolu ludi lufuma kudi Nzambi; bualu bua nuakahebua ngasa bua bualu bua Kilisto, kena anu bua kumuitabusha, kadi bua kukenga bua bualu buandi kabidi; nudi ne diluangana diodiumue dinuakatangila munda muanyi, ne dinudi nunyua katataka ne didi munda muanyi
Wenzaku mabaya malamika tshiamu tshia mpawungi
Kakuena muntu udi mua kuimana ku mpala kuenu: Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neateke buowa ne dishina kudi bena buloba buonso bunudi nudiata ku makasa, bu muakanuambileye
Bualu bua bintu bionso biakafuma kudiye, bidiku bua bualu buandi, bidi bikala anu kudiye
Bualu bua hakafueye, yeye wakafua ku bubi musangu umue tshiendelele; kadi muoyo udiye n au, udi n au kudi Nzambi

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Unsangishile balume makumi muanda mutekete ba bakulu ba mu Isalele, baudi mumanye ne mbakulu ba bantu, ne bakelenge badi ku mutu kuabo, ulue n abo ku mpala kua ntenta wa kusambakena, bobo bimaneku n ebe
Nanku bantu balume bonsu nebikale bamueneka kumpala kua Maweja Nangila misangu isatu ku tshidimu mu bibilu abi
Kadi neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu

Hakadi Davidi mushikame mu nsubu muandi, Davidi wakambila Natana, muprofete ne, Mona, meme ndi mushikame mu nsubu wa mitshi ya cèdre, kadi mushete wa tshihungidi tshia mei a Yehowa udi mushale mu ntenta
Kadi bakatangila Palô ne, Bualu buakushika, wakakolesha mutshima wandi, kakabinvuila, bu muakamba Yehowa
Wakenza malu mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa; kadi kakenza malu onso bu muakenza Davidi, kaku wandi; Wakenza malu onso bu muakenza Yoasha, tatu wandi

Wewe newoshe muana wa ngombe ku dituku ku dituku bua kubuikidila bantu mibi yabo, wewe neutokeshe tshioshelu hawoshila bintu bia kubuikidila n abi bantu mibi yabo, wele manyi ha tshioshelu bua kutshijidila
Bualu bua hakumbana bintu, badi babidia badi bakumbana kahidi; ne nfumu abi udi ne difutu kai dikuabo, anu bua kuntangila ku mesu
Yai nutangile

Mukelenge wakimana hehi ne dikunshi dia mu nsubu, wakahunga tshihungidi ku mpala kua Yehowa bua kuendeye ku mpala kua Yehowa ne bua kutumikila mikenji yandi ne mei andi ne mikandu yandi ne mutshima wandi wonso ne muoyo wandi wonso, ne hua kuenzeye mei onso a tshihungidi akadi mafunda mu mukanda eu; bantu bonso bakajadika tshihungidi
Batu bambila bantu babi bampetula ne, Yehowa wakuamba ne, Nenuikale ne ditalala
Yeye wakamukudimuna ne, Ndi munvue
Ku tshibangidilu yeye wakadi mushihianganyi, katu wimana mu bualu bulelela, bua yeye kena ne bualu bulelela munda muandi

Hashishe, bakadi banemeka Yehowa bakasombeshangana, ne Yehowa wakabateleja matshu, wakabumuna, ne mukanda wa tshivulukidi wakafundibua ku mpala kuandi bua kuanyisha bantu aba bakadi batshina Nzambi ne bakadi banemeka dina diandi
Nakadiangatshila Bena Lewi mu miaba ya ban a bute bonso munkatshi mua Bena Isalele
Yehowa wakamana ku sungula dituku, makelela Yehowa nênze bualu ebu mu buloba
Corinthians Biakula ne ndimi ya bantu ne ya banjelo, kadi bingikala tshi ne luse, nakulua bu tshiamu tshia mitaku tshidibo bakuma, anyi bu dikasa didi diakula
Matuku onsu, nundambule mulambu wa kuosha mushindu umue ne mulambu unuvua bangoshile ku mukuna wa Sinayi, bua dipembu diawu dinsankishe
Nendue kunudi hanahitshila mu Makedonia; bualu bua nempitshile mu Makedonia; kadi bumue nenshikame n enu musangu, anyi tshidimu tshia mashika tshijima mene, bua nuenu kuntuma ku luendu kunaya
Kakakuata Yelemiya muprofete, kakamba ne, Wewe udi mulekela bua kuya ku luseke lua Bena Kasada
Lomo Nunku bualu bua tuakabingishibua ku ditabusha, tuikale ne ditalala ne Nzambi bua Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto
Bualu bua ndi ne malu a bungi a kunufundila, tshiakasua kunufundila ha mabeshi ne mai a mikanda; kadi ndi ntekemena bua kulua kunudi, ne bua kuakula n enu ku mesu, bua disanka dienu dikumbashibue
Kanungu ka Nkoselu wa tshilumbu yônso badi bamufunda mu mukanda ne bumvwija tshidibo bakosela nanku
Tshimuangi Tshilambuilu ne dilongu dia kuowa mayi Bua kulambula milambu, kuenzabu tshilambuilu tshia mitshi ya ndunga
Kanungu ka Kabeena mwa kumbusha anyi kutanakaja muntu, yêye kayi mudiswîle, ne nzuji udi mêyi ne mikandu imupeesha
Musoko eu udi ne bualu bua kulua bikulu bua tshinyi
Muntu yonso udi wela tatu andi anyi mamu andi mulau nebamushihe bulelela, wakela tatu andi anyi mamu andi mulau mashi andi neikale ham bidi handi
Kuenzaye kabidi bilambuilu muanda mutekete muaba awu
Bakumuka mu Pihahilota, bakahita munkatshi mua dishiba dia mai bakaya mu tshihela bakaya luendu lua matuku asatu mu tshihela tshia Etama, bakashikama mu Mala

Ku nyima bakadilongoluela bintu biabo ne bia bakuidi, bualu bua bakuidi, bana ba Alona, bakadi bafila milambu ya kuosha ne ya dianyi tô ne hatula butuku; nunku Bena Lewi bakadilongoluela bintu biabo ne bintu bia bakuidi, bana ba Alona

Nebanuashile madilu, nebanuambile ne, Mpindiu ba mu maloba a ku muelelu wa mai manene Bualu bua Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Hanakuvuisha tshikulu, bu mudi misoko idi kayiyi ne bantu, hanahongolola mai male ha mutu hebe, ne halua mai manene kukubuikila; hashishe nenkuhuekeshe hanshi hohamue ne badi bahueka mu Dina dia Bafue, kudi bantu ba tshikondo tshia kale, nenkushikamishe mu miaba idi mu ndondo wa mu buloba, mu miaba yakadi mituhu ku kale tô ne mpindiu, ushikame hebe ne badi bahueka mu Dina, bua wewe ushale mu muaba mudi kamuyi bantu, ne bua wewe kushadi mu buloba bua badi ne muoyo

Kadi bikala muntu ne muena mutumba n andi lukuna, umualamina, ubika, umutaha tô ne hafileye, ne bianyemeye ku umue wa misoko ei; hashishe bakulu ba mu musoko wandi nebatuale bantu, nebamukuatemu, nebamufile mu bianza bia musombuedi bua kufueye
Arone pende neikale koku
Wewe neubilengeshe, neubijidile, muntu yonso udi ubilenga tshianza neikale wa tshijila

Musoko wikale bunene nunku: Luseke lua nôde coudées binunu binai ne nkama itanu, luseke lua sude coudées binunu binai ne nkama itanu, luseke lua esete coudées binunu binai ne nkama itanu, luseke lua wesete coudées binunu binai ne nkama itanu
Biasanganabo muntu udi wiba muan abo umue wa Bena Isalele, udi umuenza bu muhika, anyi udi umuhana, hashishe nebashihe muibi: nunku nenûmusbe malu mabi munkatshi muenu
Nanku nebanshipe bua kuangata mukajanyi
Lekela kufua tshiji, uhidie kuikala ne njiya
Bu meme muebe mulambu wa kubuikila n qu bubi bua bantu lelu, bualu ebu buakadi kuikala buimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa, anyi

Bakateka ha mutu handi bubandi buakamabandabo bufunda ne: Eu udi Hashishe, bakakumina diakamue n andi banyengi babidi milonda mu bianza ne ku makasa ku mitshi mitshiamakane, mukuabo ku tshianza tshiandi tshia balume, munga ku tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi
Diha dia luse kadiena dilua bu mudi bubi buakenza muntu umue; bualu bua dilumbuluisha diakalua bua muntu umue ku dihila, kadi diha dituhesha hatuhu diakalua bua malu mabi a bungi ku dibingishibua
Yehowa wakahuka hanshi bua kumona musoko ne tshibumba biakasa bana ba bantu
Bakashiha bakelenge ba mu Midiyana kabidi: Evi ne Lekeme ne Sû ne Hû ne Leba bakelenge batanu ba Midiyana bakashiha Belama, muana mulume wa Beô, ne muele wa nvita kabidi
Kadi kabakunvua, bakakolesha mitshima yabo bu muakenza bankambua babo bakadi kabayi bitabusha Yehowa, Nzambi wabo

Munkatshi mua bisamba ebi kanuena nusangana ha kuikisha, anyi kua kutalasha munda mua makasa enu; Yehowa neanutumineku mitshima izakala ne mesu a buowa ne kusamina kua muoyo; nenuikale ne mpata bua mioyo yenu; nenuikale ne buowa munya ne butuku, kanuena nuikala ne ditekemena dia mioyo yenu

Ba ku Tâshishi bakenduluka n ebe mushinga bualu bua bintu biebe bivule bia mishindu yonso, bakashintakasha n ebe biamu biabo bia argent, bia tshiamu tshifike, tshia étain ne tshia lutende ku bintu biebe

Â mmatuku anakasungula bua nuenu nuambile bantu bua bikondo bia masangisha a tshijila bia kufila milambu ya kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia, mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne mulambu wa bukula ne mulambu wa bintu bia kunua, mulambu dituku diau mulambu dituku diau, malu â adi ha mutu ha matuku a lumingu lua Yehowa ne bintu binudi basue kufila ne ha mutu ha bintu bidi mitshima yenu musue kufila kudi Yehowa

Nunku Nzambi wetu munene, Nzambi mukole ne wa dishina, utu walama bihungidi ne luse lujalame, dikenga edi dikole diakatukuata ne bakelenge betu ne bantu betu banene ne bakuidi betu ne baprofete betu ne batatu betu ne bantu bebe bonso kadikadi dikese ku mesu kuebe, ku tshikondo tshia bakelenge ba Ashû tô ne ku dituku edi

Hakangatabo difutu diabo, bakajiana muena budimi ne, Aba ba kunshikidilu bakakuata mudimu anu tshituha tshimue tshia diba, wewe wakubenda muomumue n etu, tuetu bakusala mudimu dituku dijima mu munya mukole
Wele manananshi ku mulongo ne ku mulongo, manananshi neikale bu tshivulukidi ha mampa bu mulambu wa kuoshila Yehowa ha kahia
Hebrews Tshihungidi tshia kumudilu mene tshiakadi ne mikenshi ya kulonda mu kutendelela kuabo ne tshitendelelu tshiatshi, tshiakadi tshitendelela tshia ha buloba ebu
Yeye wakela nsumuinu binunu bisatu; misambu yandi yakadi tshinunu tshimue ne itanu
Mukelenge Solomo ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadi badisangisha kudiye bakadi n andi ku mpala kua mushete, bakadi bashihela mikoko ne ngombe yakadibo kabayi mua kubala bungi buai
Hakatshia butuku, tshisumbu tshia bakulu ba bantu tshiakudisangisha, bakuidi banene ne bafundi; bakaya n andi ku tshilumbuluidi tshiabo, bakamuambila ne, Biwikala Kilisto, utuambile
Kadi tshidimu tshia Mufikilu wa disanka dinene, badi ne bua kupingaja nzubu awu anu kudi muenaye
Bilembi nebienduluke handi mushinga, anyi
Halua dibika dia bantu ku lufu, yeye neikale mukashi wa nganyi
Matayo Dituku adi Yesu wakaluhuka mu nsubu, wakashikama ku muelelu wa dishiba
Kakuakadi muena Anaka wakashala mu buloba bua Bena Isalele; anu mu Gaza ne mu Gata ne mu Ashedodo bakuabo bakashalamu
Bantu nkama isambombo bakâhuka, bakanyema ku tshihela ku dibue dia Limona, bakalalaku ngondo inai
Maweja Nangila kuambila kabidi Arone ne: Mu ditunga dindi mpesha bena Izrayele, kuakupetamu tshiebe tshitupa tshia buloba, nansha buebe bupianyi to
Nunku kamanda wakatuma nsongalume, wakamuambila ne, Kuambidi muntu mukuabo bu muwakunsokoluela malu â
Kadi bobo bakakolesha mei abo, bakamulomba ne, Bamushihe ku mutshi mutshiamakane
Kushalaye kabidi ne muoyi bidimu nkama inayi ne makumi asatu
Nebamane bualu ebu dituku dimue, anyi
Dî edi didi mua kueyemenyibua; ne bua malu â ndi musue wewe kuâmba, mumanye ne, Nga bushua, hua bantu bakumana kuitabusha Nzambi bananukile mu midimu mimpe
Bu meme mukutumine wewe ne bantu bebe disama dikole dia tshiambu, bonsu nuvua mua kuikala bamane kubutuka

Wewe udi weyemena ku mulangala mutshibuke, bukelenge bua Ejipitu mene: bieyemenahu muntu tshianza tshiandi, neubuele mu tshianza tshiandi, neutshisompoke; Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, udi nunku kudi bonso badi bamueyemena

Udi umeneshila bimuna mashinde, ne nyinyo idi isankisha mutshima wa muntu, Mitshi ya Yehowa idi miule tente ne tshitelele, Nyunyu idi yibakamu masua ai, Mikuna mile idi bua mbushi ya tshisuku; mabue adi tshinyemenu tshia nyama ya nsenji
Yakoba wakamukudimuna ne, Kambualu bua kumpa tshintu nansha, biwitabusha bualu ebu, meme nendishe bimuna biebe, nembilame kabidi
Kujadikabu ne: Maweja Nangila wamonyi makenga etu, watusambi
Bana balume ba Alama badi Usa ne Hula ne Gete ne Masha
Bidimu bimpe muanda mutekete biakadi buloba bua Ejipitu bulua ne bintu bia bungi biakashika
Nunku balume bakashikama, bakadi bu binunu bitanu
Hashishe yeye wakabulula mitshima yabo bua kujingululabo Mukanda wa Nzambi
Yeye wakalumbuluila Bena Isalele bidimu makumi abidi
Yeye wakasua kûsha difu diandi tente ne bihusu biakadi ngulube idia

Ezekiel Mu tshidimu tshisambombo, mu ngondo muisambombo, mu dituku ditanu dia ngondo, hanakadi nshikama mu nsubu muanyi, hakadi bakulu ba Yuda bashikama ku mpala kuanyi, tshianza tshia Mukelenge Yehowa tshiakakuma ham bidi hanyi
Waditshiha mutshihu kudi diulu udi uditshiha mutshihu kudi nkuasa wa Nzambi ne kudi utu washikamahu
Kadi kakosa nsambu idi mitangila masungula a Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne a bena Tshiamwenda wa bukalenga pamwe ne idi mitangila dieebeja dia beena ditunga
Wakasungila kudi muena lukuna wanyi mukole, mu bianza bia bakadi bankina, bualu bua bobo bakampita bukole
Sara umona nanku, kuambilaye Abrahame ne: Ipata mukaji mupika ewu ne muanende, bualu muana wa mukaji ewu kena mua kufuilakana bintu bia bupianyi ne muananyi Izake to
Tshibangidilu Lote udi upanduka ku kabutu ka Sodome ne Ngomore Batumibue babidi kufikamu Sodome dilolu

Hakakokesheye bidimu bibidi, Shaula wakadisunguila Bena Isalele binunu bisatu: binunu bibidi biakadi ne Shaula mu Mikemasha ne ku mukuna wa Betele, ne tshinunu tshikuabo tshiakadi ne Yonatana mu Gibea wa mu buloba bua Benyamina; yeye wakatuma mundi ne mundi ku ntenta wandi wa mu bantu bakashala
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu tshisamba tshionso mudi muntu wa bende mushikame, mu muaba au nudi ne bua kumuha buhianyi buandi
Bualu bua bobo bakuamba kufila mioyo yabo hakuluabo n au
Ebu mbualu bundi nuambila ne, Kanutambi kuelangana meshi bua muoyo wenu ne, Netudie tshinyi

Mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne tshisatu tshia bukokeshi bua Nebukadenesâ, Nebuzaladana, kapitene ka masalayi au, wakaya ne Bena Yuda nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi anai ne bantu batanu, wakababuesha mu buhika
Musangu unudi nunowa biakudia, kanuena mua kunowa too ne bidi ku mpenga kua budimi to
Tuetu tuakudiunvuila mei a mukana muandi mene
Mbuji awu neaye ne bibawu bionsu bia bantu mu tshipela
Matayo Hakahita matuku asambombo, Yesu wakangata Petelo ne Yakobo ne muan abo Yone, wakabanda n abo ku mukuna mule, bobo nkayabo
Nunku Hagai, muena mukenji wa Yehowa, wakambila bantu dî dia Yehowa diakabatumineye ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Meme ndi n enu

Kadi panudi nulambula Maweja Nangila bintu bia tshianyi bia mu madimi enu, nudi mua kuelamu buanga bua mampa ne buitshi, kanuyi nubiosha pa tshilambuilu, bu munudi nuenza ne mulambu udi ne dipembu dimpe didi disankisha Maweja Nangila
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nulale bienu kunoko butuku ebu, nennuambile dî kabidi, bu mudi Yehowa ungambila, ne bakelenge ba Moaba bakashala ne Belâma
Kusuikakajabu nkanu ya bijengu ivua ku tshilamba tshia pa tshiadi, ne ivua ku tshilamba tshia efode ne monji mufikuluke
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Wakakuma mpunda webe misangu isatu bualu kai

Bana ba Yosefe ba mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bonso bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita, bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima binunu makumi anai ne nkama itanu
Luhehele ne mai a dishiha bidi bimunvuila

Binunvua lumu lua umue wa misoko yakanuha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kushikamamu ne, Bantu bakuabo ba tshikamakama, bakumuka munkatshi muenu, bakasesuisha bena musoko wabo ne, Tuye tuenzele nzambi mikuabo mudimu, inudi kanuyi bamanye; hashishe nenuebeshangane, nenukebe, nenukonkangane bimpe; bikala bualu bulelela, bakuenza bualu bua tshikamakama munkatshi muenu, nenushihe bena musoko aba ne miele ya nvita, nenuhaule musoko; nenushihe bimuna ne bintu bidimu ne muele wa nvita
Nakulua ha buloba bu munya, bua yonso wangitabusha kashadi biandi mu midima

Ku luseke lua ku nôde kabidi, enza bilulu bidi bituangane to ne ku coudées lukama, ne makunshi makumi abidi ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku makumi abidi; bitubuidi bia ku makunshi nebikale bia argent
Wakananukila kumusengelela ne yeye wakângata
Ndi ntua kabidi ndondu ne bionsu binuvua bapatuke nabi mu buatu: nyunyi, bimuna ne nyama ya muitu, kabidi ne bivuavua kuenda ne muoyi pa buloba pashishe
Nulengeshibue tshishiki, nusambibue, nuikale ne meshi amue, nuikalangane talala; ne Nzambi wa dinanga ne ditalala neikale n enu
Hanuatangila bena nvita banyunguluke musoko wa Yelushalema, mimanye ne dibutuka diau diakulua
Arone neateke miendu pa tshitekelu tshienza ne tshiamu tshia mpawungi nkayatshi, bua kapia kikale katema kumpala kuanyi meme Maweja Nangila butuku bujima
Kadi bialumbuluisha muntu, bulumbuluishi buanyi budi bulelela; bualu bua meme tshiena nkayanyi, meme ndiku ne Tatu wakuntuma
Kadi bua tatu wandi mene, bualu bua wakakengesha bakuabo bikole, wakanyenga bintu kudi bana babo ku bukole ne wakenza malu adi kâyi makane munkatshi mua bana babo; monai, neafue bua mihi yandi

Kadi bikala dikenga dikuabo dilonda ku nyima, wewe neufue muoyo ku muoyo, disu ku disu, dinu ku dinu, tshianza ku tshianza, dikasa ku dikasa, udi muoshe mukuabo kahia nebamuoshe kabidi, udi utaha mukuabo mputa nebamutahe biandi, udi ukuma mukuabo mibundabunda nebamukume biandi

Mu diba adi dikanka dinene dia buloba diakadiku, ne tshituha tshia dikumi tshia musoko tshiakûhuka; ne bantu binunu muanda mutekete bakafua mu dikanka dia buloba; bakuabo bonso bakadi bashale bakatshinyishibua, bakatumbisha Nzambi wa mu diulu
Bena Amore, bavua base ku mikuna ya Seyire aku, kutuluka bua kunuluisha
Ndi ngakula bu mudi bantu bakula
Muambi Malu Onso Adi Hatuhu Â mmei a Mulambi, muana wa Davidi, mukelenge wa mu Yelushalema
Hashishe Palô wakatuma di, Wakabikila Yosefe, bakamuhatula mu nsubu wa midima lubilu, yeye wakadibeya muedi wandi, wakaluata bilulu bikuabo, wakaya kudi Palô
Nunku yeye wakankonka ne, Muana wa muntu, wakumona muanda eu, anyi
Ebu mbungi bua bintu bia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu biakabalabo bu muakamba Mose biakakuatshila Bena Lewi mu mudimu wabo, mu bukokeshi bua Itama, muana mulume wa Alona, muakuidi
Kadi bingikala ngenza malu au, nasha numbenga meme, nuitabushe malu au; bua nuenu kumanya ne kujingulula ne, Tatu udi munda muanyi, ne meme ndi munda mua Tatu
Ke munudi mua kujikija buenzayi bua mushindu ewu munkatshi mua bena Izrayele nanku
Yeye wakalua n abo kudi mukelenge wa Moaba: bakashikama n andi tô matuku onso akadi Davidi mushale mu musoko wa ngumbu
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Meme ndi bianyi dibisha, ndi bianyi muoyo; udi ungitabusha, nasha biafueye, neikale ne muoyo kabidi; muntu yonso udi ne muoyo, udi ungitabusha, kena ufua tshiendelele
Bimpe yeye ahingane ku nsubu kuandi; anyi biafileye mu nvita, muntu mukuabo neadie tumuma tuandi
Hakahita bidimu bikuabo, yeye wakaya kudi Ahaba ku Samalea
Siba wakamba ne, Meme ndi nkukukuila; mukelenge wanyi, nsangane diakalengele ku mesu kuebe

Balume aba batanu bakadi baye kua kutentekelabo buloba, bakaya, bakabuelamu, bakangata luhingu luakasongabo ne efoda ne telafima ne luhingu luakadibo; muakuidi wakadi muimane ku tshibi tshia musoko hehi ne bantu aba nkama isambombo bakadi ne bintu bia nvita bisuika ham bidi
Diba adi nebumushe dibue didi dibuikila ku tshiina tshia mayi bua kubinuisha

Wenzele Siona bimpe mu disanka diebe dimpe, Hashishe, newikale ne disanka bua milambu mifidibue mu buakane, Psalms Wewe, muena tshinyangu mukole, udi ufuna bulobo Ludimi luebe ludi luamba malu a kabutu awakuhangidisha, Wewe udi utamba kunanga malu mabi ku mpala kua malu mimpe; Wewe, ludimi ludi ludinga bantu, Nzambi neakubetekashe tshiendelele
Kadi Yotama, muan a mukala wa Yelubâla, wakashala, bualu bua yeye wakasokoma
Ehaba, muana mulume wa Helona, mukelenge wa bana ba Zebuluna, wakafua bintu dituku disatu
Nanku koleshayi muoyi, kanutshinyi
Hakadi mukuabo utaha mutshi, tshisui tshiakanuka, tshikahona mu mai; yeye wakadila ne, Aka, mukelenge wanyi, tshiakadi tshisomba
Wakela makalu a Palô ne bisumbu biandi bionso mu mai manene, wakashiha tuhita tuakasunguleye mu Dishiba Dikunze
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakaluhuka, wakashiha ba mu tshitudilu tshia Bena Ashû binunu lukama ne makumi muanda mukulu ne bitanu

Bikala mulume anyi mukashi ne mputa ku mutu anyi ku muedi, muakuidi neatangile ha muaba au, bielanganeye meji ne mputa udi ubuela mu munyinyi wa mubidi, ne nsuki yakuandamuka mitoke tô, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Muntu eu kena muakane edi ndisama dia nsudi didi ku mutu anyi ku muedi
Diasa dia tshisumbu tshia kabumwe didi tshibawu katshiyi kukupula tshia dipangila dia ditunga tshinyokibwa kudi mêyi ne mikandu

Kanungu ka Badi mwa kudidila Kabadi ka Dîyi dikulu bwa kwambaku ne dîyi didibu baswa kupatula kadieena diumvwangana ne Dîyi dikulu kudi: a Mulombodi wa ditunga, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi alonda dîba divwabo bamutumina dîyi dimana kwanyisha kashidi; b Bukalenge bunene, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi alonda dimutuminabu dia dîyi dimana kwanyisha kashidi, c Batshipwita munwamfwanka anyi batshipwita bakulumpa bûngi butwa ku tshia dikumi tshimwe tshia beena mu Tshibambalu ne Tshibambalu, mu matuku dikumi ne ataanu adi aloonda dianyisha diaadi kashidi
Bakalua ne wakadi mufofo kudi Bafalese
Nunku bakakuta Yelemiya, bakamuela mu dina dia mai dia Malekiya, muana wa mukelenge, diakadi mu tshiendelu tshia balami; bakahuekesha Yelemiya ku mionshi

Kadi nuambile mukelenge wa Yuda wakanutuma bua nuenu kuebesha Yehowa ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Bualu bua mei awakunvua, wewe wakalekesha mutshima webe, wakadihuekesha ku mpala kua Yehowa; hawakunvua mei anakamba bua muaba eu ne bua bena muaba eu bua bobo balue bu bantu badi bedibue mulau ne badi babutudibue, wewe wakadihanda bilulu biebe, wakadila ku mpala kuanyi; nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nakukunvuila
Bikala mukashi kayi muonyibue, kadi yeye udi muakane, nunku yeye neikale mubingishibue, nealele bana
Basatu bavua bashale kunyema batangila ku mukuna
Bila mukaji mupika wa Rakele uvua mulele bana ba balume babidi: ke Dane ne Naftali
Bualu bua Yehowa wakateka Yadene bu mukalu hankatshi hetu n enu, nuenu Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada; kanuena ne buhianyi kudi Yehowa: nunku bana benu nebakande bana betu bua kutshinabo Yehowa
Haheteye bukole bua bungi bua bubanji buandi, nênzeshe bantu bandi bonso bua kuyabo kuluangana ne ba mu bukelenge bua Bena Gelika
Paulo wakamuambila ne, Biadi meme nakaledibua Muena Lomo
Au mmena a bana ba balume ba Alona bakuidi bakadi ne manyi mela ha mitu, bakajidilabo bua kuenza mudimu wa buakuidi
Abashaloma wakenzela Bena Isalele bonso nunku, hakaluabo ku tshilumbuluidi tshia mukelenge; nunku Abashaloma wakiba mitshima ya Bena Isalele
Yeye wakafila luseke lua bintu bia mukelenge lua milambu ya kuosha dinda ne dilolo ne ku dituku dia lumingu ne habala ngondo ne ku matuku a bidia bia disanka, bu muakafundabo mu mikenji ya Yehowa
Wenze nkanu makumi atanu ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi bua kusuikakaja bisumbu abi bibidi, bienza ntenta umue
Nunku ludimi ludi tshituha tshikese, ludi lufunafuna malu manene
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakamuambila ne, Nenkumbashile tunkanunuina biebe, tuikale bia bungi, kabena mua kutubala bua bungi bualu
Nunku bantu bakatandangana ne Mose, bakamba ne, Utuhe mai a kunua Mose wakabambila ne, Nudi nutandangana n anyi bualu kai

Tuhita, miloho, ba gouverneur, ne bena meji ba mukelenge, bamane kudisangishaku, bakatangila bantu aba, bakamona ne kahia kakakenza bualu ham bidi habo, nsuki ya ku mitu yabo kayakababuka, binkutu biabo kabiakanyanguka ne muhuya wa kahia kawakadi ham bidi habo, Nebukadenesâ wakamba kabidi ne, Batumbishe Nzambi wa Shadalaka, Meshaka ne Abedenego, wakutuma muanjelo wandi bua kuhandisha bantu bandi bakamueyemena

Nakahatula bintu bianyi bia luendu mu munya, bu mudi bintu bia kuya n abi mu buhika; hakabuela diba, nakaluhula disoso mu tshimanu tshia nsubu ne tshianza tshianyi, nakahatukilaku n abi butuku ne nakabituala ha diaha dianyi ku mesu kuabo
Mukelenge wa Isalele wakaluhuka, wakashiha tubalu ne makalu ne Bena Sulia ne kushiha kukole
Nuakufuma kudi kunyi
Budi bualu buhite butekete bua nuenu kuhangisha bantu, bua nudi basue malu enu atondeshe Nzambi wanyi kabidi, anyi
Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Ambaku, mamu wanyi, tshiena mbenga dî diebe nansha
Bakafuma ku nsubu wa Abinadaba, wakadi ku mutu kua mukuna, ne mushete wa Nzambi; Ahio wakadi wenda ku mpala kua mushete
Hakatangila bantu bonso ne Alona wakafua, Bena Isalele bonso bakamujinga tô matuku makumi asatu

Bimbi ba misambu bakimba bikole ne Yizelaya wakadi ku mutu kuabo, Bakafila milambu ya bungi dituku adi, bakasanka, bualu bua Nzambi wakabasankisha ne disanka dinene; bakashi ne bana bakasanka kabidi; nunku bakunvua disanka dia mu Yelushalema kudi bakadi kule
Kings Hakatangila Atalaya, mamu wa Ahazaya, ne, Muan anyi mulume udi mufue, yeye wakajuka, wakashiha bana balume bonso ba mukelenge
Udi mumanye ne, Yeye neikale muena meji anyi muhote nganyi

Kadi hakunvua Yohanana, muana wa Kalea, ne tupitene tuonso tua bena nvita tuakadi n andi, lumu lua malu mabi akenza Yishemaele, muana wa Netanya, bakasangisha bantu babo bonso, bakaya kuluangana ne Yishemaele, muana wa Netanya, bakamuheta hehi ne dishiha dinene dia mu Gibeona
Bobo kabidi bakadi ku mutu kua batuadishi ba majitu, bakenzesha bena midimu bonso mu mudimu wa mushindu wonso, Bena Lewi bakadi bafundi ne tuhita ne batuadishi ba bintu
Kadi Bena Yuda bakadi bahidia bakavundulula mitshima ya bantu ba bisamba bia bende, bakaivuisha mifike kudi bena kuitabusha
Bobo bakamukudimuna ne, Muntu webe tatu wetu, udi mukole, utshidi ne muoyo Bobo bakatua mpala yabo hanshi, bakamukukuila
Bena Izrayele bavua bafikisha Maweja Nangila munda, benza malu mabi, batendelela mvidie ya bisamba bikuabu
Nulue ne muana wa ngombe udi ne manyi, numushihe, tudie bietu, tusanke bietu, bualu bua muana wanyi eu wakadi mufue, udi ne muoyo kabidi; wakadi mujimine, wakamueneka

Aba mbantu banene bakadi ne Davidi, bakadi n andi ne bukole mu bukelenge buandi; bakadisangisha ne Bena Isalele bonso bua kubueshabo Davidi mu bukelenge, bu mu dî dia Yehowa diakambeye bua Bena Isalele
Muanjelo wa Yehowa wakadi hehi ne tshishihuidi tshia Alauna, Muena Yebuse
Hakambeye nunku, wakamuangalasha disangisha
Nomba Bungi bua Bena Lewi ne Midima Yabo Ebi mbikondo bia Alona ne Mose mu dituku diakasomba Yehowa ne Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai
Bintu biakibakabo n abi lumbu luau biakadi bia yasape; musoko wakadi wa ngolo muimpe, mufuanangane ne ntalatala

Abalahama wakabandisha mesu andi, wakamona ku nyima kuandi tshi mpanga tshiakadi ne nsengu yatshi mile mikuata ku mutshi Abalahama wakaya, wakangata tshimpanga, wakatshishihela Nzambi mu muaba wa muan andi

Kadi Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kolesha mutshima webe mpindiu, Zelubabela; wikale ne mutshima mukole, wewe Yoshua, muana wa Yehosadaka, muakuidi munene; koleshai mitshima yenu, nuenu bantu bonso ba mu buloba ebu; enzai mudimu kabidi, bualu bua Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Meme ndi n enu
Yesu wakabajosha talalâ, wakabambila ne, Bantu kabena bamanye mua kuenza bualu ebu, kadi Nzambi udi mumanye mua kuenza malu onso
Hakamanya Yesu dî edi diakambabo, yeye wakabambila ne, Nudi nutatshishila mukashi tshinyi

Wakahingisha mukalu wa Isalele ku tshibi tshia ku Hamata tô ne ku dishiha dia mu Alabâ, bu mu dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, diakambeye mukana mua muntu wandi Yona muprofete, muana wa Ambai wa mu Gata hefê
Kabakalonda dibala dia argent kudi bafutshi ba bena mudimu eu, bualu bua bakadi mua kueyemenyibua
Mose wakambila tatu andi muenu malu onso akenzela Yehowa Palô ne Bena Ejipitu bualu bua Bena Isalele, ne bua makenga akabakuata mu nshila, ne muakabasungila Yehowa
Mu matuku au muntu neabike mu muaba wa tatu andi bu lutonga lua ku miji yandi
Yeye wakavula bilulu biandi bionso, wakamba dî dia Nzambi ku mesu kua Samuele, wakalala hanshi butaka munya mujima ne butuku bujima

Mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete mu ngondo wa kumudilu, mu dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakenzesha masalayi andi mudimu mukole mu nvita yandi ne Bena Tulo
Bualu bua matuku andi onso adi ne ntatu ne mudimu wandi udi wa kanyinganyinga; mutshima wandi mene kawena wikisha butuku
Nunemeke nfumu munene
Kuta mukanda wa dî dianyi dia tshimanyishilu mu muvungu, jadika diyisha dianyi mu mitshima ya bayidi banyi
Nzambi wakaha Hemana bana ba balume dikumi ne banai ne bana ba bakashi basatu

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Bikala mundi wa munkatshi muenu anyi wa munkatshi mua tunkanunuma dienu munyanguke ku dilenga dia mundi mufue, anyi bikaleye muye ku luendu kule yeye neavuluke kuhita kua Yehowa
Bena Lewi bakabuambula, bakabutuala ku musulu wa Kidilona
Malu a bundu adi ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele benza munemu, adi angihata ku nsubu wanyi wa tshijila, udi umona mene, anyi

Nunku dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Nakahunga tshihungidi ne batatu benu mu dituku dinakabaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu nsubu wa buhika mene ne, Hakumbana bidimu muanda mutekete, bunudi habu mbua kulekela, muntu ne muntu, muan enu wa Bena Ebelu wakudihana kunudi, ne wakunukuatshila mudimu bidimu bisambombo; nudi ne bualu bua kumulekela ne umuke kunudi hatuhu
Kanungu ka Too ne pikalabo bateeka Kabadi ka bulongolodi bwa midimu ya Mbulamatadi, Kabadi ka kabwendela kadi ne makookeshi adibo bateekela Kabadi ka Mbulamatadi ka kabwendela
Katuakudia bintu ebi mu madilu etu, katuakabilenga hatuakadi banyanguke, katuakabifila kudi bakadi mu madilu: tuakutumikila dî dia Yehowa, Nzambi wetu; tuakuenza malu onso akatuambileye
Eku nkudividila kuanyi kudi bantu badi bandumbuluisha
Buloba buonso nebukudimuke bu mpata, ku Geba tô ne ku Limona, ku luseke lua Sude lua Yelushalema
Bana balume ba Luele: Nahata, Zela, Shama ne Miza
Bakamukuata, bakamushiha, bakamuimasha mu budimi
Muakuidi munene wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkutshihisha mu dina dia Nzambi udi ne muoyo, udi biebe Kilisto Muana wa Nzambi, anyi

Gideona wakambila Nzambi ne, Biwasua kusungila Bena Isalele ku tshianza tshianyi bu muwakamba, tangila, nenteke miosa ya mikoko hanshi mu tshishihuidi; bikala mume anu ha miosa ne buloba buonso budi bûme, hashishe nemmanye ne, Wewe neusungile Bena Isalele ku tshianza tshianyi bu muwakamba
Tuhalai tuakahingana kudi bakuidi banene ne Bafalese; bobo bakabakonka ne, Munyi kanuakulua n andi
Bukalenga bunene budi bulombola tshidiidi tshia Ditunga
Kadi muakuidi mimene wakalua ne bakadi n andi, wakabikila balumbuludi ne bakulu bonso ba bana ba Isalele, wakatuma dî ku nsubu wa lukanu bua kuluabo n abo
Mona, hautshidi wakulaku ne mukelenge, meme kabidi nembuelemu ku nyima kuebe ne nenjadike mei ebe
Meme ndi wa wanyi munanga; wanyi munanga nguanyi kabidi; yeye udi udisha mikoko yandi munkatshi mua nsungubidi
Bantu nebashikamemu, kabena bikala ne mulau kabidi; ba mu Yelushalema nebashikame talalâ
Amen
Nunku hakasemena muntu ha buihi n andi bua kumukukuila, yeye wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakamutua mishiku
Bakabihata tô ne ku Yadene; monai, nshila wakadi mûle tente ne bilulu ne bintu biakimasha Bena Sulia mu lubilu luabo
Kanuena bamanye ne, Bulunda bua malu a ha buloba budi ne Nzambi lukuna, anyi
Mesha, mukelenge wa Moaba, wakadi muena mikoko; yeye wakadi ufila miosa ya binunu lukama bia bana ba mikoko ne ya binunu lukama bia bimpanga kudi mukelenge wa Isalele
Hakangambileye dî edi, nakimana uzakala

bababiikila ne batshipwita ba mu Batshipwita ba mu polovensa badi bapatukila mu disungula dia kudi bantu bônso dia tshikosu ne dia muntu ne muntu pa bwende , anyi badi babateeka amu nanku mu diumvwangana bwa tshipungu tshia mvula itanu idibu mwa kwambulula
Kadi katshiena mumunange to
Yeye wakabakudimuna dî, wakabakonka ne, Meme kabidi nenukonke dî dimue, nungambile, Dibatiza dia Yone diakufuma kudi kunyi
Ha diba adi mene mukashi au wakakoleshibua
Yeye wakabayisha mu bitendelelu biabo, buonso buabo bakadi bamutumbisha

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Muele wa nvita ufike kudi Bena Kasada, Muele wa nvita ufike kudi bena mbuku, Muele wa nvita ufike kudi tubalu tuandi, ne kudi makalu andi a nvita, Munanga ukuate mai a mu misulu yandi, Nunku nyama ya mu tshihela ne mibuabua idi idila miadi neyikalemu, ne nyunyu ya nfiondo Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bu muakashiha Nzambi Sodoma ne Amola ne misoko yakadi ha buihi, nunku kakuena muntu washikamamu, kakuena muana wa muntu watulamu
Nanku, pikala mulume awu kayi muenzele mukaji wa kumpala malu awu asatu, mukaji udi mua kumuka, kayi ufuta to
Kadi muntu yonso utu wenza malu mimpe udi ulua mu munya bua bienzedi biandi bimueneke, bualu bua biakenjibua mu Nzambi
Kanubafuidi luse to

Wewe newangate mashi adi ha tshioshelu, ne manyi adibo bela ha mutu, ubimiamine Alona, ha bilulu biandi ne ha bana bandi balume ne ha bilulu biabo, yeye ne bilulu biandi ne bana bandi balume ne bilulu biabo nebikale bijidibue
Bualu, bamuanabute bonsu ba bena Izrayele too ne ku ba bimuna biabu mbanyi meme Maweja Nangila
Kadi padiye kayi muanji kupikula budimi buende, udi mua kubupana kudi muntu mukuabu
Bantu bonso nebakudimune dî ne, Amen
Hakafuma Bena Sulia ku Damaseke bua kukuatshishabo Hadadezê, mukelenge wa Zoba, Davidi wakashiha Bena Sulia binunu makumi abidi ne bibidi
Simona Petelo wakamukudimuna ne, Mukelenge, netuye kudi nganyi

Bakukosela bantu bebe ne musoko webe wa tshijila mbingu makumi muanda mutekete, bua kumana ditomboka, bua kuvuisha nshikidilu wa malu mabi, bua kulengeshisha bahambuki kudi Nzambi, bua kubavuishila buakane budi bushala tshiendelele, bua kujadika tshikena kumona ne buprofete, ne bua kujidila muaba muhite tshijila
Kutedi dina dia Yehowa, Nzambi webe, tshitelatela, bua Yehowa kena ubingisha muntu udi utela dina diandi tshitelatela
Yeye wakashala ne Yehowa minya makumi anai ne mafuku makumi anai; wakajila bia kudia ne mai a kunua
Yehoyada muakuidi wakafila mafuma ne ngabu ne bintu bia nvita biakadi bia mukelenge Davidi, biakadi mu nsubu wa Nzambi, kudi tupitene tua lukama lua bantu
Bua tshinyi udi munshime, munyeme mu musokoku, katuyi balayangane nebe
Nakakoleshibua bualu bua tshianza tshia Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, tshiakadi kundi; nakasangisha bantu banene ba mu Isalele bua kuyabo n anyi
Kadi hanalala tulu mu lufu ne bankambua banyi, hashishe umuka n anyi mu Ejipitu, uye kunjika mu muaba wakabajikabo Yeye wakamba ne, Nengenze bu muwakuamba
Kadi Yehowa kena muanze kunuha mitshima ya kumanya n ai ne mesu a kutangila n au ne matshu a kunvua n au tô ne ku dituku edi
Yone wakambila Yesu ne, Muyishi, tuakutangila muntu umusha bademon munda mua bantu mu dina diebe; tuakumukanda bualu bua yeye kakadi utulonda
Hashishe Natana wakambila Betasheba, mamu wa Solomo, ne, Kuakunvua lumu ne, Adoniya, muana wa Hagita, udi ukokesha, ne mukelenge wetu Davidi kena mumanye bualu ebu, anyi
Biahita bidimu bia bungi, wewe udi mumanye mua kuhandisha mushinga wa bintu, ne bialeha bidimu bikese, wewe neuhuekeshe mushinga wabi bu mudi bungi bua bintu bidiye ukusumbisha
Hakamanya Yesu dî edi diakambabo, yeye wakabambila ne, Nudi nutatshishila mukashi tshinyi
Yoaba ne tupitene tua masalayi bakumuka ku mesu kua mukelenge bua kubalabo bungi bua Bena Isalele
Musombuedi kalondi mushihianganyi eu hadiye ne tshiji tshikole, kamuhetshi, bualu bua nshila udi utamba bule, kamushihi diambedi kabayi banze kumuhisha, bualu bua yeye kakadi n andi tshiji diambedi
Nunku muomumue mu tshikondo etshi difuka dikese didiku bua disungula dia ngasa
Hashishe mukelenge Davidi wakabuela mu nsubu, wakashikama ku mpala kua Yehowa, wakamba ne, Yehowa Nzambi, meme nganyi ne ba mu nsubu muanyi mbanganyi bua wewe wakulua n anyi tô ne ku dituku edi
Mose wakamba ne, Unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe; yeye wakamba kabidi ne, Udi uhetula tatu andi anyi mamu andi afue biandi bulelela
Nunku Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Monai, nenkengeshe mukelenge wa Babulona ne buloba buandi, bu munakukengesha mukelenge wa Ashû
Tatu wanyi wakanunemeshila mutshi wa tshikokedi wa bujitu, kadi meme nennukumbashile majitu makuabo: tatu wanyi wakamutuma ne nsokotshi, kadi meme nennukume ne tuminyiminyi

Tshisamba tshia Shimeyone tshivua ne meku aa: diku dia bena Nemuyele, ndelanganyi ya Nemuyele; dia bena Yamine, ndelanganyi ya Yamine; dia bena Yakine, ndelanganyi ya Yakine; dia bena Zera, ndelanganyi ya Zera; ne dia bena Shawule, ndelanganyi ya Shawule
Kumuinyikilaye lukasa mulondu mu diboku
Bayidi bakalua, bakamukonka ne, Udi ubambidila malu mu nsumuinu tshinyi
Kabakimasha, muntu ne muntu, bintu bia tshinyangu biakadi bibasamina muoyo, kabakalekela mpingu ya mu Ejipitu

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua bantu aba bakuenza malu a hatuhu mu Isalele, bakuenda masandi ne bakashi ba bena mutumba n abo; bakuamba mei a mashimi mu dina dianyi andi tshiyi mubambile bua kuambabo; meme nyeye udi mumanye bualu ebu ne udi mumanyi wabu

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nunku tshiena nfuila ba mu buloba ebu luse kabidi; monai, nenfile bantu aba bonso, muntu ne muntu mu bianza bia muena mutumba n andi, muntu ne muntu mu bianza bia mukelenge wandi; nebavuishe buloba tshikulu, ne tshiena mbahandisha mu bianza bia babashihi
Munya mulelela wakadiku, wakadi ulua ha buloba, utemena bantu bonso
Bana benu ba balume ne ba bakaji nebambule bintu abi

Mu matuku â Petelo wakimana munkatshi mua bana babo ba mu Kilisto, bakadi badisangishe nunku bu lukama ne makumi abidi, yeye wakamba ne, Bana betu, buakadibo n abo mbua kushikisha dî didi difunda mu Mukanda wa Nzambi, diakambabo bua Yudasa diambedi kudi Nyuma Muimpe mukana mua Davidi, yeye wakadi mulombodi wa bakuatshi ba Yesu

Kadi biwangambila ne, Tudi tueyemena Yehowa Nzambi wetu, eu kanyeye mene udi Hezikiya mumushile bitendelelu biandi ku mikuna ne bioshelu biandi, muambile ba mu Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema ne, Bunudi n abu mbua kutendelela ku mpala kua tshioshelu etshi, anyi
Bakuidi banene ba Nzambi ne bakulu bakenzesha bisumbu bia bantu ne, Nulombe Balaba, nushihe Yesu
Mu matuku au Yehowa wakabanga kukehesha Bena Isalele
Bualu bua nengumushe mena a Ba Bâla mukana muandi, kabena batela mena abo kabidi
Munyinyi wa mukoku wa tshimpanga tshibidi wakubanjija nawu batuangaji, uulambila pa muaba wa tshijila
Yefeta wakalumbulula Bena Isalele bidimu bisambombo
Bena Peleshete bakihata Shaula ne bana bandi balume; Bena Peleshete bakashiha Yonatana ne Abinadaba ne Maleki shua, bana balume ba Shaula
Mulami kai udi mua kuimana ku mpala kuanyi
Tangilai, kabena balue ne mashi a mulambu mu nsubu munda mua tshitendelelu; nuakadi kûdia mu nsubu wa tshitendelelu, bu munakamba

Hawabutangila, wewe neusangakene ne bankambua bebe bu muakenza Alona mukulu ebe, bualu bua nuenu nuakahidia dî dianyi mu tshihela tshia Sina, hakatontolola bantu bualu bua mai, kanuakanjidila ku mesu kuabo
Yehowa wakadi ne Yosefe, wakamuendesha diakalengele, wakadi mu nsubu wa mukelenge wandi, Muena Ejipitu
Yeye kena usomba n etu kabidi, anyi
Tulu tua muena mudimu tudi tuimpe biadieye bintu bikese anyi bia bungi; kadi kukuta kua muntu mubanji kakuena kumuladika tulu
Kadi bikalaku kumusha kua mibi, kakuena kabidi kufila kua milambu bua bubi
Hakafikeye ku nsubu wa bakoshi ba miosa ya mikoko wakadi mu nshila, Yehu wakasangila ne bana babo ne Ahazaya, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakabebesha ne, Nudi banganyi
Monai, bonso badi bakuata n andi mudimu eu nebafuishibue bundu, ne bena mudimu bandi badi anu bantu

Monai, Amalia, muakuidi munene, udi ku mutu kuenu mu malu onso a Yehowa, ne Zebadaya, muana wa Yishemaele, mukokeshi wa tshisamba tshia Bena Yuda, udi ku mutu kuenu mu malu onso a mukelenge; Bena Lewi kabidi nebikale tuhita ku mpala kuenu
Bualu bua Yone wakamuambila ne, Kambiakane bua wewe wikale n andi
Yehowa wakamba ne, Tangilai, bantu bonso badi bantu bamue, bonso badi ne muaku umue, au mmalu akabangabo kuenza, ne katataka kakuena bualu budibo basue kuenza budi mua kubakolela
Bua bualu ebu Muana wa Nzambi wakamueneshibua bua kubutuleye midimu ya diabolo
Padi muntu mumane kupita pa bidimu makumi asambombu, nebafute Maweja Nangila nkanu dikumi ne itanu bua muntu mulume
Udienzeshe bua kuheta malu a buimpe bua Nzambi
Muntu eu Mose wakadi ne kalolo be, wakatamba bantu bonso ba ha buloba ne kalolo
Nzambi udi mumanyi wanyi bu mundi nujinga ne dinanga didi munda mua Kilisto Yesu

Bualu bua ku mpala kua matuku â Teuda wakabika biandi, wakamba ne, Meme ndi muntu munene; bantu bu nkama inai bakadisangisha n andi; kadi yeye wakashihebua; bonso bakadi bamutumikila bakatangadishibua, bualu buabo buakalua tshianana

Nunku, bu buakane bujalame buikaleku bua buakuidi bua Bena Lewi bua munshi muabu bantu bakuangata mikenshi munyi muakadibo kukengela bua muakuidi mukuabo abike wa ku mulongo wa Melekisedeke, ne kabadibu wa ku mulongo wa Alona
Bingikala ne matuhakana mu kuamba kuanyi, tshiena n au mu lungenyi luanyi; bulelela, mu nshila yonso tuakanulesha bualu ebu mu malu onso
Chronicles Nunku mudimu wonso wakenza Solomo wa mu nsubu wa Yehowa wakashikishibua
Bana ba balume ba Samuele: muan a bute wandi Yoele ne Abiya muana muibidi
Munyi mudi mumanye mua kusesuisha kapitene kamue kadi katamba kuhuekela munkatshi mua bantu ba mukelenge wanyi bua kutekemenaku Bena Ejipitu bua kunuhabo makalu ne badi benda ha nyima ha tubalu
Ba Bena Amalama ne ba Bena Yisehâ ne ba Bena Hebelone ne ba Bena Uziele: Shebuele, muana wa Gêshoma, muana wa Mose, wakadi kahita ka balami ba bibutshilu

Hashishe tatu wandi ne mamu wandi bakamuebesha ne, Kakuena mukashi munkatshi mua bana bakashi ba bana betu anyi munkatshi mua bantu bonso ba mu tshisamba tshietu, bua wewe kuya kuangata mukashi kudi Bena Peleshete badi kabayi batengula, anyi
Shela wakashala ne muoyo bidimu makumi asatu, wakalela Ebê

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Hanualua mu buloba bundi musue kunuha bu buhianyi buenu ne hanateka disama dia nsudi mu nsubu wa mu buloba bua buhianyi buenu, nunku muena nsubu nealue biandi, neambile muakuidi ne, Ndi ngelangana meji ne ditoba dia disama didi mu nsubu muanyi
Bantu bakaya
Budi bunukuata ntshinyi, nuenu mikuna mile, bua nudi nutuhika bu bimpanga
Yehoyada wakamubakisha bakashi babidi; yeye wakalela n abo bana ba balume ne bana ba bakashi
Shimishona wakamba ne, Nfuafue ne Bena Peleshete
Hashishe kamanda wakasemena hehi, wakamukuata, wakamba bua kumusuikabo ne nkanu ibidi, wakabanga kubebesha ne, Udi nganyi
Tô ne ku dituku edi Bakafuila ba mu nsubu wa Shaula, tatu ebe, ne bana benu ne balunda bandi luse, tshiakakufila wewe mu bianza bia Davidi; kadi wewe wakunkanda bualu bubi ne mukashi eu lelu
Galatia Hakashika bidimu dikumi ne binai, nakaya ku Yelushalema tshiakabidi ne Bânaba; tuakaya ne Tito kabidi
Ne wewe muan andi, Beleshasâ, kuena muanji kudihuekesha, nansha wewe mumanye malu au onso
Yeye wakamba ne, Dina dia Yakoba kadiena dimukumbane, anyi

Mushiku wa mbelu wa ku mpokolo wa mai bakalongolola kudi Shaluma, muana wa Kole hosa, mukokeshi wa luseke lua Misepa; wakawasa, wakaubulula, wakateka bibi ne milonda ne biamu; wakalongolola lumbu lua ku dina dia mai a Shela hehi ne tshibunda tshia mukelenge tô ne ku tshibandilu tshidi tshihueka ku musoko wa Davidi
Hakafikeye kudi tshimpanga tshiakadi ne nsengu ibidi, tshinakamona tshimana ku muelelu wa musulu, wakaya lubilu bua kutshibunda ne tshiji tshikole
Tudi tumutamba bukole, anyi
Utshijidile, bua tshishale tshia tshijila
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Mona, nennulokeshile bidia bia mu diulu, bantu nebaye, nebabisangishe ku dituku bikumbane ku dituku bikumbane
Wakalala tulu muinshi mua mutshi wa genêt: mona, muanjelo wakamulenga tshianza, wakamuambila ne, Juka biebe, udie
Nsongakaji kuya kubikila mamuende mene wa muana
Shebanya ne Yoshafata ne Netanele ne Amasai ne Zekâya ne Benaya ne Eliezê bakuidi bakela mpungi ku mpala kua mushete wa Nzambi; Obeda edome ne Yehiya bakadi balami ba bibi bia nsubu wakadi mushete
Nuenu, balami ba mikoko, asai miadi, nudile; Balami kabena bamona nshila wa kunyemenamu, Unvuai

Epafa, udi umue wenu ne muhika wa Kilisto Yesu, udi unutumina muoyo, udi utshinta bikole misangu yonso bua bualu buenu mu mitendelelu yandi, bua nuenu mijalame bakane tshishiki, ne bamanyishibue bimpe mu disua dionso dia Nzambi
Nunku mukelenge wakalambishila bantu bandi banene bonso ne benji bandi ba mudimu bidia bia disanka dinene bua Esetê; yeye wakaha ba mu nseke yandi dikisha ne maha bu mudi bubanji bua mukelenge
Yeye ke unudi nujana

Buakadi ne mingonge mitoloka kuonso, Hashishe nakamona, nakelangana meji bimpe bua muanda eu; Anu tulu tukese, anu kulala tulu tshituha; Hashishe buhele buebe nebukukuate bu munyengi, Proverbs Ei kabidi idi nsumuinu ya Solomo yakatentulabo kudi bantu ba Hezikiya, mukelenge wa Yuda
Hashishe, neashimike ntenta yandi ya bukelenge hankatshi ha mai manene ne mukuna wa tshijila ne wa butumbi
Rebeka mumane kumvua meji avua Esawu nawu, kubikilaye Yakobe, umuambila ne: Udimuke, mukuluebe Esawu mmukuelele meji a kukushipa bua kujikija tshiji tshiende
Wakuelelangana meshi a bualu ebu mu mutshima webe munyi
Yishai wakahitshisha bana bandi ba balume muanda mutekete ku mpala kua Samuele
Matuku adibu banutshintshimika awu, nebanukengeshe bikole
Dituku adi Gada wakalua kudi Davidi, wakamuambila ne, Ya, washile Yehowa tshioshelu ku tshishihuidi tshia Alauna, Muena Yebuse
Bisamba bia Bena Isalele muanda mutekete biakadi bishala, kabiyi bianze kuangata buhianyi buabo

Esau wakamona hakasankisha Isaka Yakoba ne hakamutumeye ku Padana alama bua kuangateye mu kashi kuakua, ne bu muakamuvudishila Isaka disanka ne muakamudimusheye ne, Kudiangatshidi mu kashi wa bana ba bakashi ba Bena Kanana ne bu muakatumikila Yakoba di dia tatu wandi ne mamu wandi ne bû muakayeye ku Padana alama
Mu matuku au kamuakadi mukelenge mu Isalele; muntu ne muntu wakenza anu malu akadi mimpe ku mesu kuandi

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mu dituku adi, nenkengeshe ba mu tshisamba ne ba mu bukelenge badi kabayi bakuatshila Nebukadenesâ eu, mukelenge wa Babulona, mudimu, ne badi kabayi bitabusha bua kubueshabo nshingu yabo muinshi mua mutshi wa tshikokedi wa mukelenge wa Babulona; nenkengeshe ba mu tshisamba atshi ne muele wa nvita ne tshiole ne tshihuhu, tô ne hanababutula ku tshianza tshiandi
Mvidi Mukulu mmuleje patoke bubi buetu
Udi weyemena nganyi, hawakuntombokela
Neatuute bena Mowabe dikombu ku mbanga
Paulo wakatuluka munshi, wakadiela ham bidi handi, wakamûhukila, wakamba ne, Kanuteki diyoyo, udi ne muoyo munda
Nunku bualu butudi tukeba kabidi ne, Bituikala mu mubidi anyi katui mu mubidi, mbua kumusankisha
Mukashi wakambila Yoaba ne, Mona, nebele mutu wandi kûdi ku nyima ha lumbu
Wewe udi mumanye bualu kai butudi katuyi bamanye
Yesu wakabambila ne, Mmeme
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuenu nuakufuma hanshi, meme nakufuma mulu; nuenu nudi ba ha buloba ebu, meme tshiena wa ha buloba ebu
Yeye wakamuela muoyo, wakamuebesha ne, Mutshima webe udi muakanangane ne mutshima wanyi bu mudi mutshima wanyi muakanangane ne mutshima webe, anyi
Bienzedi bia Abiyama bikuabo ne malu onso akenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi

Mu diba adi dî dia Yehowa dia kalua kudi muprofete Yelemiya ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Wambile mukelenge wa Yuda, wakukutuma kundi bua kungebesha lungenyi, dî edi ne, Tangila masalayi a Palô adi Umuka kuabo bua kulua kunukuatshisha, neâhingane mu Ejipitu ku buloba buau
Nakatangila bualu bubi muinshi mua diba bua muntu mudilamine luhetu tô ne hakamukengeshalu; luhetu elu ludi lujimina mu malu mabi; kadi bialeleye muana wa balume, kena ne tshia kumushila
Ku nyima kua kulela kua Noa, Lemeke wakikala ne muoyo bidimu nkama itanu ne makumi tshitema ne bitanu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Bantu bonso ba mu musoko bakalua kusangila ne Yesu; hakamumonabo, bakamutendekena ne, Umuka ku luseke luetu
Nenufue, nubutuke bonsu ne nzala
Kadi bakalomba Paulo bua kumulamabo tô ne ku dikosa dia tshilumbu tshiandi kudi Augusto, nakabambila bua kumulamabo tô ne hanamanya mua kumutuma kudi Kaisa
Nsongalume wa Yonatana wakambila mikete, wakahingana kudi mukelenge wandi

Yeye wakabavudishila disanka dituku adi, wamba ne, Isalele neavudishile bakuabo disanka bualu buenu, neambe ne, Nzambi anuvuishe disanka dia Efelayima ne dia Manashe, yeye wakateka Efelayima ku mpala kua Manashe
Bianza bia bantu kabiena bimukuatshila mudimu, bu hadiye ne tshintu bualu, bualu bua yeye mene utu waha bantu bonso muoyo ne muhuya ne bintu bionso

Bantu bavule ne ba mu bisamba bia bukole nebalue kukeba Yehowa wa misumba mu Yelushalema ne bua kulengesha n andi Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba dî edi ne, Mu matuku au bantu dikumi ba mu muaku ne mu muaku nebakuate ku luzemba lua tshivuali tshia Muena Yuda, bamuambila ne, Tudi basue kuya n ebe, bualu bua tuakunvua ne Nzambi udi n ebe
Nsubu ei yakadi minyunguluke bimanu bia tshitendelelu yakenda idiunda mu butshiama buai kulu, bualu bua bimanu bia tshitendelelu biakenda bikeha kulu

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba nunku ne, Bualu bua wakadifuishisha bundu, ne butaka buebe buakamueneka hawakenda masandi ne balunda bebe, ne bua mpingu yonso ya tshikama tshiebe kabidi, ne bua mashi a bana bebe bawakafila kudiyi, bua malu â nensangishe balunda bebe bonso bawakadisankisha n abo, bonso bawakananga mene ne bonso bawakadi n abo lukuna hohamue; nenkunguishe bantu aba ba ku nseke yonso bua kukutshintshimikabo, nemmueneshe butaka buebe kudibo bua bobo babumone hatoke
Lomo Nuitabushe muntu udi mutekete mu ditabusha diandi bu muan enu, kadi kembua kuelangana n andi mpata

Kakuena nyama mukuabo bu yeye hanshi ha buloba, Yeye udi utangila bintu bionso bidi bidibandisha, ubihetula; Job Hashishe, Yobo wakakudimuna Yehowa dî ne, Ndi mumanye ne, Wewe udi ne bukole bua kuenza malu onso, Nganyi udi usokoka meji hadiye kayi ne lungenyi
Mona, wanyi munanga, wewe udi mulengele, mona, udi mulengele be; mesu ebe adi bu a nyunyu wa nkutshi

Bakabenga mikenji yonso yakabambila Yehowa, Nzambi wabo, bakadienzela mpingu ya tshiamu tshiakafulabo, tuana tua ngombe tubidi mene mene; bakadienzela Bashela, bakatendelela bintu bionso bia mu diulu, bakakuatshila Bâla mudimu kabidi

Hashishe nakitaba kudibo, nakabambila ne, Nzambi wa mu diulu neakuatshishangane n etu; nunku tuetu bantu bandi netubike, netuase lumbu elu; kadi nuenu kanuena ne buhianyi, nansha tshituha, nansha tshivulukidi mu Yelushalema
Tshianza tshia Bena Midiyana tshiakahita Bena Isalele bukole; bualu bua Bena Midiyana, Bena Isalele bakadimbila mena mu mikuna ne mbuebue, bakadiashila ngumbu ya mabue
Ebi bidi mei mafunda ne mei majalame ne mikenji biakela Yehowa hankatshi handi ne Bena Isalele mukana mua Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai
Ebu mbuhianyi bua Bena Yisakâ ku meku abo: bimenga ne misoko yabi
Bonsu babidi kusemena pabuipi
Bana balume ba Sheme: Elama ne Ashû ne Apakashada ne Luda ne Alama ne Uza ne Hula ne Getê ne Mesheke
Mena a misoko ei akadi: Besê mu tshihela, mu muaba wa mpata, wa mu Bena Lubena; ne Lamota mu Gilada wa Bena Gada; ne Golana mu Bashana wa Bena Manashe

Zechariah Dî dia Yehowa didi dihisha buloba bua Hadalaka, Hamata kabidi, ku butshika bua Damaseke; ne Tulo ne Sidona, Tulo wakadiashila musoko mukoleshibue ne ngumbu, Kadi monai, Mukelenge neauhaule, Musoko wa Ashekelona neumone muanda eu, neutshine; Bantu ba bende nebashikame mu Ashedodo, Nengumushe mashi mukana muabo, Nenyunguluke nsubu wanyi bu mudi bansentedi bamulama, Sanka bikole, wewe muana mukashi wa mu Siona; Yeye neatshibule dikalu dia nvita ku Efelayima, Wewe kabidi, Umanye ne, Bualu Hinganai bienu ku musoko udi ne ngumbu ya mabue, Bualu bua ndi nnana Yuda bu buta buanyi, Yehowa neamueneke ha mutu habo, Yehowa wa misumba neabalame, Yehowa Nzambi wabo nebahandishe mu dituku adi, Monai mudi diakalengele diandi ne buimpe buandi bihite bunene

Bakasangana bualu ebu bufunda ne, Muena Amona ne Muena Moaba kababuedi mu disangisha dia bantu ba Nzambi tshiendelele, bualu bua bobo kabakaya kusangakena ne Bena Isalele ne bidia ne mai; kadi bakaha Belâma mbueshilu bua kubeleye mulau; kadi Nzambi wetu wakakudimuna mulau bua kuluau disanka
Nunku kuenza kua bualu buimpe dituku dia Lumingu kakuena kushiha mukenshi
Naomi wakangata muana, wakamuladika mu tshiadi tshiandi, wakalua ndeshi wandi
Anyi, Kabuobu kuakua
Samuele wakamba ne, Muadi wa mikoko ne wa ngombe unakunvua ku matshu anyi udi bishi
Nanukilai kusua bihedi bitamba bunene
Kuvudi muan abo ne tatu ebe mulume bilulu, kuyi ha buihi ne mukashi wandi, yeye udi mukashi wa tatu ebe mukuabo
Corinthians Nulonde luse, nanukilai kukeba bihedi bia Nyuma, kadi nulambe kubikeba bua nuenu mimanye mua kuambila bantu dî dia Nzambi
Kadi ndelanganyi ya Esawu kubashipa, kubanyenga ditunga adi, kusombamu
Nusakidile Yehowa, bualu bua yeye udi muimpe; bua luse luandi ludi lujalame tshiendelele
Hakatshiabu, Bena Yuda bakasangisha dî diabo, bakadiela mulau ne, Katuena tudia, katuena tunua, tô ne hatuashiha Paulo
Wahona ha dibue edi neatshibuke; biahonenadi muntu, nedimutangadishe bu luhuishi
Tuetu tuakutangila ne tudi tunumanyisha ne, Tatu wakutuma Muana wandi bua kuikaleye Musungidi wa ba ha buloba
Hakalaleye munkatshi muabo matuku kâi mahite ha muanda mukulu anyi dikumi, wakahueka ku Kaisalia; hakatshiabu, wakashikama ha tshilumbuluidi, wakamba bua kuluabo ne Paulo

Ngombe yakaya mu nshila mululame wa ku Bete shemeshe: yakaya anu mu nshila munene, yenda idila muadi, kayakasesuka ku tshianza tshia balume anyi ku tshianza tshia bakashi; bakelenge ba Bena Peleshete bakayilonda tô ne ku mukalu wa Bete shemeshe
Nudimuke, kanulekedi Muena Lewi tô matuku onso anudi nushala mu buloba buenu

Pa kumbusha bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu, Tshibambalu anyi Tshisangilu tshia bibambalu biônso bibidi tshidi mwa kupangadika ne tukanda twikale twa muntu pa nkayenda padibio bikengela kwanyisha mukenji kampanda

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamhila mikuna mile ne mikuna mikese dî edi, udi wamhila bibanda ne mpongo ne, Monai, meme, meme hanyi, nenvuishe muele wa nvita ham bidi henu, nenshimbule bitendelelu bienu bidi ha mikuna
Mushete wa Yehowa wakashala mu Kîyata yalima tô musangu mule bu bidimu makumi abidi; Bena Isalele bonso bakadila muadi kudi Yehowa
Nunku nakambila muanjelo wakadi uyikila n anyi ne, Ebi mbinganyi
Kulondabu bena Izrayele too ne mu mayi manene
Bakashi betu ne bana betu bakese nebashihibue, bualu budi butamba buimpe bua tuetu tuhingane mu Ejipitu nansha
Ahu Bafalese bakamuambila ne, Wewe udi udiamba, dî diebe kadiena dilelela
Baluishi badi bamukengesha bikole, bamuela miketa, bamutatshisha
Nudisange kabidi bua kunnemeka, anu bu munuvua badisange dituku dia kumpala

Wewe neulongolole luhangu lua tshitendelelu, ku luseke lua sude enza bilulu bidi bituangane tô ne ku coudées lukama, makunshi makumi abidi ne nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku makumi abidi, bitubuidi bia ku makunshi nebikale bia argent
Pashishe Tamare kulela Mbuyi uvua ne kakaba kakunze ku diboku
Izake kumuambila ne: Udi mumone ne: nkadi mununu, nkadi mikolu ku tshiina
Bantu bonso ba mu Isalele bakadisangisha kudi mukelenge ku dituku diakadiabo bidia bia disanka mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete
Nunku Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Mulau wikale kudi musoko eu udi umatshisha mashi hanshi

Bena ekelesia bakabashindikila, bakahitshila mu Foineke ne Samalea, benda bambila bantu bua kukudimuna kua mitshima kua bisamba bia bende; bakatamba kusankisha mitshima ya bana babo bonso ba mu Kilisto
Moshe kuela butu abu mulu
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Uziya bia kumudilu ne bia kunshikidilu, Yeshaya, muprofete, muana wa Amoza, wakabifunda

Dibadika BENA IZRAYELE MU MPATA YA MOWABE Balake udi ubikila Balaame Bena Izrayele kuya kuasa mitanda yabu mu mpata ya Mowabe, ku muelelu wa musulu wa Yardene, luseke luawu lua kudi diba dipatukila, muaba uvua mutangilangane ne Yeriko
Yehowa wakamuebesha ne, Bishi
Hakafuma mukelenge ku Damaseke, yeye wakatangila tshioshelu; wakasemena ha buihi ne tshioshelu, wakafilahu milambu
Kulekedi kulama tshihedi tshidi munda muebe, tshiakakuhebua ku mei a baprofete ne hakatentekesha bakulu bianza ha mutu hebe
Tudi tuelela bantu aba ba nunku mukenshi ne tudi tubasengelela mu Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto ne, Benze mudimu wabo talala, ne badidile bidia biabo
Bakashi bakadiku kabidi, batangidile ha bule; munkatshi mua bakashi aba muakadi Malia wa ku Magadala, ne Malia mamu wa Yakobo mukese ne wa Yose, ne Salome
Hakayabo n abo ku Babulona, Yekonya wakalela Shalatiele; Shalatiele wakalela Zelubabela; Zelubabela wakalela Abihuda; Abihuda wakalela Eleyakima; Eleyakima wakalela
Bantu nebapete muaba wa kuasa, bilondeshile bungi buabu
Shadalaka, Meshaka ne Abedenego bakakudimuna mukelenge dî ne, Mukelenge Nebukadenesâ, katuena ne bualu bua kukukudimuna dî mu muanda eu nansha
Wakela Davidi ne bantu bonso ba mukelenge Davidi mabue; bantu bandi bonso ne bena bukitu bonso bakadi ku tshianza tshia balume ne ku tshianza tshia bakashi
Kadi tshidi mukenshi eu ukeba kuheta ndinanga dia mu mutshima mutoke ne dia mu muoyomukese muimpe ne dia mu ditabusha didi kadi ne lubombo

Bualu bua tudi ne bihedi bitahuluka bu mudi ngasa wakatuhabo, bitu ikala ne mudimu wa buambi, tuambe bietu bu mudi tshidikishilu tshia ditabusha dietu; anyi, bituikala ne mudimu wa mukuatshishi, tuenze mudimu wetu bimpe; ne udi uyisha alamate kudi buyishi buandi
Kadi wenze anu tshindi meme nkuambila
Muntu yonsu udi kayi ujila biakudia dituku adi, nebamumushe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele
Tshisumbu atshi tshia bantu netshibakume ne mabue, netshibashihe ne miele yabo ya nvita; nebashihe bana babo ba balume ne ba bakashi, neboshe nsubu yabo ne kahia

Bimanyinu nebikale mu diba ne mu ngondo ne mu mitoto; ha buloba nehikale dikenga dikole dia bantu, nebatshine tshiona tshinene tshia mai manene ne tshia mavuala; bantu nebafue tshihuka bua buowa ne bua ditekemena dia malu alua ha buloba; bualu bua nebanyukule makole a mu diulu
Bualu bua Hadadezê wakadi uluangana ne Toi
Wanyi munanga udi mutoke ne mpala wandi udi lunkunjilakunjila; yeye udi muneme munkatshi mua bantu binunu dikumi
Bu muakambila Yehowa Mose, wakababadila mu tshihela tshia Sinai
Aba bonso bakadi bana ba Obeda edome; bobo ne bana babo balela ne bana babo bakadi ne bukole bua kuenza n abu mudimu; ba Obeda edome bakadi makumi asambombo ne bantu bahidi

Yehoshafata wakimanaku mpala kua tshisumbu tshia Bena Yuda ne Bena Yelushalema, mu nsubu wa Yehowa, mu tshiendedi tshihia tshihia, wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa hatatu betu, wewe kuena Nzambi wa mu diulu, anyi
Hashishe Davidi wakakonka ne, Bena Kila nebaufile ne bantu banyi mu tshianza tshia Shaula, anyi
Numutumbishe ne tshiona tshia dî dia mpungi; numutumbishe ne tshisanji Numutumbishe ne mazele Numutumbishe ne biamu Bintu bionso bidi bihuyakana bitumbishe Yehowa
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Amasaya kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Bana betu, ngasa wa Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto ikale ne nyuma wenu
Demetelio udi ne bumanyishi kudi bonso ne kudi bushua buine; tuetu kabidi tudi tumanyisha bualu buandi; ne wewe udi mumanye ne, Bumanyishi buetu budi bulelela
Tshihungidi tshia Asa ne Bene hadada Kul
Nunku umue wa bakuidi wakumushabo wakahingana, wakashikama mu Betele, wakabayisha mua kutshinabo Yehowa
Ubambile ne, Unvuai bienu dî dia Yehowa, nuenu bakelenge ba mu Yuda ne bantu ba mu Yelushalema
Muntu eu Yalobama wakadi muntu mukole wa bukitu; Solomo wakatangila ne, Nsongalume eu udi unanukila mu mudimu wandi, nunku wakamuteka ku mutu kua bena mudimu bonso ba mu Bena Yosefe
Bana betu, ndi mumanye ne, Nuenu nuakuenza bualu ebu mu dituhakana dienu, bu inuakuenza badi ku mutu kuenu
Kadi, muntu wanyi Kalebe, uvua uleja muoyi muimpe
Meme nengendakane munkatshi muenu, nengikale Nzambi wenu, ne nuenu nenuikale bantu banyi
Meme nengikale Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Nakamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi, ebi mbinganyi
Bena nvita bakaya ku mpala kua bakuidi bakadi bela mpungi, bantu bakuabo bakalonda mushete, bakuidi bakadi benda bela mpungi
Eliya ne Mose bakamueneka kudibo; bakadi bayikila ne Yesu
Kanuenji midimu yonsu ya tshibidilu dituku adi to
Kadi tudi ne bintu bia kudisha n abi mpunda yetu, ne tudi ne bidia ne nvinyo kabidi bualu buanyi ne bua muhika webe mukashi, ne bua nsongalume udi ne bantu bebe; kakuena dikengela dia tshintu
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Bulelela, ndi nkuambila ne, Lelu wewe newikale n anyi mu Paladiso
Diambedi mukelenge wa Ashû wakamumina, hashishe, mu tshikondo etshi Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakutshibula mifuba yandi

Batangalaja amu madilu a Yakobe, Yozefe kuambila balombodi ba mu bukalenga bua bena Ejipitu ne: Ndi nnusengelela ne: Panudi bannange, nundombele kudi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu, akumbaje dijinga dianyi edi: Tatu wanyi kayi muanji kukula muoyi, uvua munshila diyi bua meme kuditshipa bua kumujika amu mu ditunga dia Kenaane mu lukita luvuaye mumane kudilongolola
Moshe kumukuata ku mukila, kumonaye ukadi ne dikombu mu bianza
Pilato wakamba dî diandi ne, Bamuhetshi
Bakuidi kabadi tshintu tshidifuila anyi tshituanya, kudi nyunyu anyi kudi nyama
Kings Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mukulu tshia bukelenge bua Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, Abiyama wakabanga kukokesha mu Yuda
Nuenu nuikale munda muanyi, meme nengikale munda muenu
Nanku nenuikale bena diakalenga mu ditunga, dindi meme Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu munupeshe bua nushalemu ne muoyi matuku a bungi
Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi atanu ne muanda mutekete ne nkama mai
Bobo bakadila kudi Bena Dana

Meme, mukelenge Atashasete mene, Ndi ndelela balami bonso ba bintu badi dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata mukenji ne, Nuhe Ezela muakuidi ne mufundi wa mikenji ya Nzambi wa diulu tshionso tshidiye unulomba lubilu, tô ne ku ntalanta ya argent lukama, ne ku bihiminu bia blé lukama, ne ku bihiminu bia nvinyo lukama ne ku bihiminu bia manyi lukama; ne luehu ludi kaluyi lubadibue bungi bualu
Nuakuyila bua kutangila tshintu kai
Mutuangaji oshe munyinyi wa mafuta onsu pa tshilambuilu

Nunku nakûla tente ne tshiji tshidi Yehowa n atshi; Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua buonso buabo, kudi mutambe buhuekele tô ne kudi mutambe bunene munkatshi muabo Bakûmisha mputa wa bantu ba nyi anu kakese, Bakakuatshika bundu hakadibo benze malu mabi, anyi
Yobo wakadi wenza nunku misangu yonso
Bualu bua yeye wakabambila ne, Meme ndi Muena Yuda
Biwalela bana bakuabo ku nyima kuabo, nebikale bana bebe kabidi nebabidike dina dia bana babo mu buhianyi buabo
Kabena batangila ku bioshelu, bintu bidi bianza biabo bienza, kabena banemeka bintu bidi minu yabo mienze, nansha bikalabi mitshi ya Bashela, nansha bikalabi mpingu ya kutendelela n ai diba

Muena mudimu wa difutu, kai mulami wa mikoko mene, kai muena mikoko, hamoneye nkashama ulua, udi ushîa mikoko, udi unyema, nkashama udi wikuata, udi witangadisha; yeye udi unyema bualu bua yeye udi muena mudimu wa difutu, mikoko kayena bu bualu kudiye
Mavuala a lufu akungela munkatshi, bantu babi bu mai adi atuntumuka bakuntshinyisha
Bayende neamuimanyike kumpala kua Maweja Nangila bua mutuangaji amuenzele malu aa onsu
Abalahama wakamba ne, Muan anyi, Nzambi nkayandi neatuhe muana wa mukoko wa kuosha ha kalua, nunku bubidi buabo bakaya hohamue
Padi muntu awu kayi ne muena diku diabu, udi mua kubupikula, akebe yeye mene mushindu wa kudipikuilabu nkayende
Bu wewe munvue mikenji yanyi, Tunkanunuma tuebe tuakadi kuikala bu nsenga, Hatukai mu Babulona, nunyeme Bena Kasada
Noa wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama isatu ne makumi atanu ku nyima kua nvula munene
Dielulula Pashishe tuetu kualuka, kupingana mu tshipela, batangile ku Mayi manene makunze, bu muvua Maweja Nangila mungambile
Monai, nempe ba mu musoko eu kusangala ne bukole bia mubidi, nenshikishe disama diabo; nembaleshe ditalala ne bushuwa bikumbana
Wewe wakakumbasha tunkanunuma tuabo bu mitoto ya mu diulu; wewe wakalua n abo mu buloba buwakalaya bankambua babo ne, Nenubuhiane

Bualu bua Bena Isalele bakadi benza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wabo, wakabaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu mu bianza bia Palo, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, ne bakatshina nzambi mikuabo, bakenda mu mikenji ya bisamba bikuabo biakihata Yehowa ku mesu kua Bena Isalele, ne mu mikenji ya bakelenge ba Bena Isalele yakenzabo
Nzambi wa bende kikadi munkatshi muenu, Meme ndi Yehowa Nzambi webe wakakuluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu
Nunku numanye bienu ne, Nansha dî dimue dia mei onso akambila Yehowa bualu bua nsubu wa Ahaba nedihone hanshi hatuhu; bualu bua Yehowa wakenza malu onso akambeye mukana mua muntu wandi Eliya

Ku tshimuna tshionsu, nusakidile bukula busambakaja ne mafuta: ku ngombe yonsu, nusakidile bukula kilo tshitema, ku mukoku wa tshimpanga, bukula kilo isambombu, ku muana wa mukoku yonsu, bukula kilo isatu
Yalobama wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakelenge ba Isalele; Zekâya, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Kadi Petelo wakamukonka ne, Nuakusangishila mei enu bua kuteta Nyuma wa Mukelenge munda tshinyi
Nemmanye ne, Nakasangana luse ku mesu kuebe, ne meme ne bantu bebe, kudi kunyi
Mu tshikondo tshia kunshikidilu tshia makelenge â, havulangana malu mabi, mukelenge mukuabo udi ne mpala wa luonji wa disu dikole ne wa budimu neajuke
Hakahita munda munya, bakela mei abo tô ne ku dilolo ha diba diakafilabo mulambu wa kuosha; kadi kakuakadi dî, nansha muntu wakitaba
Kanukudimunyi mitshima yenu kudi mpingu, kanudienzedi mpingu ne tshiamu tshiakengululabo mu kahia ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Hakatshidi Samuele ufila mulambu wa kuosha, Bena Peleshete bakafika ha buihi bua kuluanganabo ne Bena Isalele; Yehowa wakakunguishila Bena Peleshete mikungulu mikole, wakabatatshisha dituku adi, nunku bakashihibua kudi Bena Isalele

Nakafila mikanda ya kusumba kua budimi mu bianza bia Baluka, muana wa Neliya, muana wa Mâseya, ku mesu kua Hanamele, muana wa manseh anyi, ne ku mesu kua bamanyi bakadi bafunda mena abo mu mikanda ya kusumba kua budimi, ne ku mesu kua Bena Yuda bonso bakadi bashikama mu tshiendelu tshia bansentedi ba mukelenge
Nunku halua tshidimu tshia disanka dia Bena Isalele, buhianyi buabo nebusangishibue ku buhianyi bua tshisamba tshiakayabo, nunku buhianyi buabo nebumuke ku buhianyi bua batatu etu
Kuinyikaye Maweja Nangila uvua umuakuisha dina ne: Wewe udi Ele Royi, mmumue ne: Mvidi Mukulu udi mummone

Kadi tshioshelu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku tshiakenzabo kudi Besalele, muana wa Uli, muana wa Hû, tshiakadiku ku mpala kua nsubu wa tshitendelelu wa Yehowa; ne Solomo ne bantu bakadi n andi bakakebelamu Yehowa
Neanutumine kabidi disama dia mukupa, dia bumfofu ne dia lungenyi lunyanguke
Meme nengumushe mesu anyi kudibo dituku adi bulelela, bua malu mabi akenzabo, hakakudimunabo mitshima yabo bua kutendelela nzambi mikuabo
Kadi muntu yonso wampidia ku mesu kua bantu, meme nennuhidie kabidi ku mesu kua Tatu wanyi udi mu diulu
Kadi nuenu nuakahidia bua kuyamu, nuakahidia mukenji wa Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Bakasangisha tshiamu tshia mitaku bu ntalanta makumi muanda mutekete, ne nshekele Bakenza n atshi nkanu ya ku tshibi tshia nsubu, ne tshioshelu tshia nyama ne biamu bitshiamakane, ne malonga onso a tshioshelu, ne nkanu ya ku luhangu, ne nkanu ya ku tshibi tshia luhangu, ne milonda yonso ya mu nsubu, ne milonda yonso ya mu luhangu lua ku muaba wa tshitendelelu
Diba adi, mwuluke bua kukumbaja meyi ne mikenji yende, bindi nnumanyisha lelu ebi
Davidi wakanyenga biamu bia mitaku bia bungi ku Tibehata ne ku Kunu, misoko ya Hadadezê; Solomo wakatula n abi tshiowelu tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku ne makunshi ne mpanza ya tshiamu tshia mitaku

Miloho ya Davidi Yoaba wakadi ku mutu kua masalayi onso a Bena Isalele; Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, wakadi ku mutu kua Bena Kelete ne Bena Pelete; Adolama wakadi ku mutu kua bena mudimu; Yehoshafata, muana wa Ahiluda, wakadi mufundi wa malu a bukelenge; Sewa wakadi mufundi; Sadoka ne Ebeyatâ bakadi bakuidi; ne Ila, Muena Yaî, wakadi muakuidi ku mutu kua miloho ya Davidi

Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Koleshai maboko enu; nuenu badi bunvua mei â a mu matuku â mukana mua baprofete bakadiku mu dituku diakajadikabo bishimikidi bia nsubu wa Yehowa wa misumba, ntempelo eu mene, bua kumuibakabo
Bobo bakakeba mena abo mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua bankambua, kadi kabakâsangana; nunku bakadi bu bantu banyanguke, bakabumusha mu buakuidi
Nenvuishe mutu webe mukole bu dibue dia mbonga mene, muhite dibue dia mutemu bukole

Yona Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yona, muana wa Amitai, diamba ne, Bika, ya ku Ninewe, musoko au muneme, ûbele; bualu bua bubi buabo buakubanda ku mesu kuanyi, Kadi Yona wakabika bua kunyemeneye ku Tâshishi bua kumuka ku mesu kua Yehowa
Yesu wakabakudimuna ne, Binadiamba, dî dianyi didi dilelela; bualu bua ndi mumanye kunakufuma ne kunaya; kadi nuenu kanuena bamanye kunakufuma ne kunaya

Psalms Yehowa udi ukokesha; udi muluate butumbi; Nkuasa webe wa butumbi udi mujadikibue katshia ku kale tô Mai mûla akubandisha, Yehowa, Yehowa mu muaba wandi wa kulu udi mukole, Bileshilu biebe bidi bia bushuwa, Psalms Wewe Yehowa, Nzambi wa disombuela, Udijule, wewe mulumbuluishi wa ba ha buloba; Yehowa, bantu babi nebenze nunku musangu bule munyi

Nendianjile kubafuta dikenga dia musangu muibidi bua malu mabi abo ne bua mibi yabo, bualu bua bakunyanga buloba buanyi ne bitalu bia bintu biabo bibi, ne bakûsha buhianyi buanyi tente ne malu abo a bundu
