Nenudie bidia ebi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tô matuku muanda mutekete, mu muaba udi Yehowa Usungula; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuvudishile disanka ne bintu bienu bionso biakakumbana, ne mudimu wonso unuakenza ne bianza bienu: nenuikale ne disanka dingi
Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo ne bu mudi mutshima webe ne muoyo, tshiena ukulekela

Nunku Gideona ne lukama lua bantu bakadi n andi, bakalua ku butshika bua tshitudilu mundankulu hakatekabo bansentedi bahia bahia anu musangu muihi; bakela mpungi, bakashiha milondo yakadi mu bianza biabo
Yesu wakababikila, wakabambila ne, Nudi bamanye ne, Bakusungudibua bua kulumbulula malu a bantu ba bisamba bia bende badi babalongoluela malu abo ne diambu, bantu babo badi banene badi babakokesha
Numbers Ebi mbikondo bia Alona ne Mose mu dituku diakasomba Yehowa ne Mose mu mukuna wa Sinai
Udi ufuka bena kamama ne bena mahaha ne bantu badi mua kumona ne bantu badi bafofo nganyi
Bakulu ba mu Gilada bakambila Yefeta ne
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Pekaya ne malu onso akenzeye bidi bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Isalele
Uluangane nvita mimpe ya ditabusha, ulamate ku muoyo wa tshiendelele, kuwakabikidibua ne kuwakitabushila Yesu ne dijukula dimpe ku mesu kua bamanyi ba bungi
Yehowa wakangambila ne, Ubambile ne, Kanuyi, kanuluanganyi; bualu bua meme tshiena munkatshi muenu; kanuhonyi ku mpala kua bantu badi n enu lukuna
Nenushishe kuya nende

Pikala muntu musue kuditambisha, kayi ulonda tshidi balumbuluishi ne batuangaji, badi benza mudimu mu nzubu wa Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu, bamba, muntu awu numushipe, bua kujikija buenzayi munkatshi mua bena Izrayele
Ne wakabulula mukana muandi bua kubendeye Nzambi bihendu; bua kuhendeye dina diandi ne nsubu wandi wa tshilulu, bobo mene badi bikala mu diulu

Bualu bua mulume udi kai muena ditabusha udi mujidila mu mukashi wandi, ne mukashi udi kai muena ditabusha udi mujidila mu mulume wandi udi muena ditabusha; bikala bualu ebu kabui nunku, bana benu batshidi babiha; kadi katataka badi ba tshijila
Bienda muana mukashi wa muakuidi masandi, yeye wakadinyanga wakasangisha tatu andi kabidi, nebamuoshe mu kahia
Bualu bua nuakasumbibua ku mushinga mukole; nunku nutumbishe Nzambi mu mubidi wenu
Udi mutambe bunene munkatshi muenu neikale muena mudimu wenu
Wanyi munanga udi mua kuenza bualu kai mu nsubu muanyi, yeye mumane kuenza malu a bundu
Hakadi Yesu uhitshila ha buihi ne dishiba dia Galela, yeye wakamona Simona ne Andele muan abo ne Simona, bela kahamba mu mai, bualu bua bobo bakadi bilembi
Nunku Bena Kena bakumuka munkatshi mua Bena Amaleka
Bantu bonso badi batangisha mpala yabo bua kuya ku Ejipitu bua kushikamaku nebafue ku muele wa nvita, ku tshiole ne ku tshihuhu, ne kakuena umue wabo washala anyi wahanduka mu makenga andi mbatumina

Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bua Bena Isalele ne Bena Yuda bakuenza anu malu adi mabi ku mesu kuanyi ku buana buabo tô ne katataka; Bena Isalele kabena benza bunga bualu, anu buobu budi bunkuatshisha tshiji bua mudimu wa bianza biabo
Bakamuebesha ne, Mesu ebe adi matabale munyi
Kuyabu ne muena mudimu wa Abrahame pambelu
Bualu bua mulume kakafuma kudi mukashi, kadi mukashi wakafuma kudi mulume; bua mulume kakafukibua bualu bua mukashi, kadi mukashi wakafukibua bualu bua mulume
Bualu bua matuku andi onso adi ne ntatu ne mudimu wandi udi wa kanyinganyinga; mutshima wandi mene kawena wikisha butuku
Hakunvua Bâsha lumu elu, yeye wakalekela kuasa Lama; mudimu wakashika
Nunku wewe wabanyina bisamba tshitema ne tshituha tshia tshisamba tshia Manashe buloba ebu bu buhianyi buabo
Dîyi didi difila makanyika a mwa kulongolola nau masungulangana ne dieebeja dia dianyisha dia beena ditunga
Muanjelo wakambila bakadi bimane ku mpala kuandi ne, Vulai bivualu ebi bia bukoya ham bidi handi

Luke Hakahita tshituha tshihi, Yesu wakendakana mu bimenga ne mu misoko mikese, wambila bantu bualu bua Nzambi, wenda ne lumu luimpe lua bukelenge bua Nzambi; bayidi bandi dikumi ne babidi bakadi n andi, ne bakashi bakuabo bakumushileye nyuma mibi munda, bakashikisheye matekete abo: Malia wakadibo babikila ne Muena Magadala, bademon muanda mutekete bakumuka munda muandi, ne Yoana mukashi wa Kuza mulami wa bintu wa Helode, ne Susana ne bakuabo ba bungi, bakadi babakuatshisha ne bintu biabo
Kadi Lehabama wakakokesha Bena Isalele bakadi bashikame mu misoko ya mu Yuda
Meme mumane kulonda bankambua banyi, angata tshitalu tshianyi, uye kutshijika anu muaba udibu bajike bankambua banyi
Tangilai, nudi nueyemena mei a mashimi adi kâyi mua kunukuatshisha
Bualu bua Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kanuena nutangila luhehele, kanuena nutangila nvula, kadi tshibanda atshi netshiule tente ne mai, ne nuenu ne bimuna bienu ne tubalu tuenu nenunueku
Lea wakalua ne bana bandi bakafua mpala yabo hanshi kabidi, Yosefe ne Lakele bakalua ku nyima, bakatua mpala yabo hanshi

Bena Lubena ne Bena Gada ne tshituha tshikuabo tshia Bena Manashe bakamana kuangata buhianyi buabo buakabahabo kudi Mose dishiya dia Yadene ku esete, bu muakabaha Mose, muntu wa Yehowa: ku Aloê udi ku muelelu wa tshibanda tshia Ânona, ne musoko udi munkatshi mua tshibanda, ne mpata mujima wa Medeba tô ne ku Dibona; ne misoko yonso ya Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole wakadi mukokeshe mu Heshebona tô ne ku mukalu wa Bena Amona; ne Gilada ne mukalu wa Bena Geshû ne Bena Mâka ne mukuna wonso wa Hêmona, ne buloba buonso bua Bashana tô ne ku Saleka; bukelenge buonso bua Oga bua mu Bashana, wakadi mukokeshe bantu mu Ashetalota ne mu Edelei wakadi wa bakadi bashala ba Bena Lefa ; bualu bua Mose wakataha bantu aba, wakabihata
Kabidi meyi ne mikandu bia mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu bivua bikandika bua kabasumbishi madimi abu

Amasaya wakabikila Bena Yuda bonso, wakabasangisha bu muakadi nsubu ya batatu abo, wakateka tupitene ku mutu kua bantu tshinunu ne bantu lukama, mu nseke yonso ya Bena Yuda ne Bena Benyamina; yeye wakababala ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ku mutu, bakakumbasha bena nvita binunu nkama isatu bakamanya mua kuluangana ne mafuma ne ngabu
Bapostolo bakambila Mukelenge ne, Udiundishe ditabusha dietu
Mu ntu au wakakujingulula ikale biandi ne disanka Yeye wakamanyisha mamuen andi ne, Muena kunakadi wenza mudimu lelu wakadi Boaza

Mukelenge wakashimbula bioshelu biakadi ku mutu kua nsubu wa Ahaza, biakenza bakelenge ba Yuda; ne bioshelu biakenza Manashe mu biendedi bibidi bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa; wakaubutula, wakela lufuishi luabi mu kasulu ka Kidelona
Yehowa wa kandamuna muanjelo wakadi uyikila n anyi mei makese, mei a kumusamba n au
Eliya wakabambila ne, Kuatai baprofete ba Bâla, nansha umue wabo kanyemi
Bena Yuda bakamukonka ne, Bidimu biebe kabiena bikumbane makumi atanu, wewe wakumona Abalahama, anyi
Nunku Bena Isalele bonso bakadisangisha ku musoko ne mitshima yabo miakanangane bu muntu umue
Gideona wakabanda mu nshila udi uyila kudi badi bashikama mu ntenta ku esete kua Noba ne Yogebeha, wakashiha musumba wabo, bualu bua musumba wakadi mu muaba mukole
Nunku Gada wakafika kudi Davidi, wakamuambila malu au, wakamukonka ne, Udi musue batume bidimu bia tshiole muanda mutekete mu buloba buebe
Numukuatshishe maluvu bualu bua wakudilesha ku mesu kua Yehowa; ba mu Moaba nebabunguluke mu bilushi biabo, nebasekibue
Yesu wakamuandamuna ne, Diambedi Filipo kai muanze kukubikila, hawakadi munshi mua mutshi wa nfigi, nakukutangila
Tatu andi muenu, tatu wa mukashi mene, wakamuhumbisha ne yeye wakalalaku matuku asatu; bakadia, bakanua, bakalalaku
Hakangateye tshihesa, wakumuka lukasa; buakadi butuku
Yeye wakungambila ne, Ndi muana wa Betuele, muana wa Naho, wakamulelela Mileka, nunku nakumuluatshisha kakanu ka ku diulu diandi ne nkanu ya ku maboko
Ke padibu babikila tshimenga atshi too ne ku lelu ne: Bersheba
Bualu bua tshiakambila batatu benu, tshiakabelela mukenji mu dituku dinakabaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bua milambu ya kuosha ne milambu mikuabo
Bantu bakangata bidia bia mampa diambedi luevene kaluyi luanze kubuelamu, ne binu bidibo benza n abi mampa bakabikuta mu bilulu biabo, bakabiteka ha maha abo

Yakoba wakambila bantu bonso ba mu nsubu wandi ne bonso bakadi n andi ne, Umushai nzambi ya bende idi munkatshi muenu, nudilongolole, nuluate bilulu bikuabo, tubike tumuke, tuye ku Betele, nengenzeleku Nzambi, waka ngunvuila mu dituku dia dikenga dianyi, wakadi n anyi mu nshila kunakaya, tshioshelu
Hakafikeye ku Kaisalia, wakabanda ka Yelushalema, wakela bena ekelesia muoyo, wakahueka ku Antiokia
Bua ditabusha Abalahama, hakabikidibueye wakatumikila bua kuyeye ku muaba wakadiye wamba kuangata bu buhianyi; wakaluhuka, kai mumanye kuakadiye uya
Mu tshidimu tshitanu tshia bukelenge bua Lehabama, Shishaka, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, wakalua hua kuluisha Bena Yelushalema, bualu bua bobo bakenzela Yehowa bibi
Meme ne nsangakene n ebe aha, nensombe n ebe ha mutu ha tshibuikilu tshia mushete, hankatshi ha bakeluba badi ha mutu ha mushete, nenkumanyishe malu onso andi nkuhesha bu mikenji kudi Bena Isalele
Udiholeshe, muan etu mukashi, yeye udi muan enu mulume, kuteki bualu ebu mu mutshima webe
Enza makoha makumi atanu ku mibangu ya tshilulu, ne makoha makumi atanu ku mibangu ya tshilulu tshikuabo tshidi tshituangane katshi
Petelo wakamuandamuna ne, Ahu tuetu, tuakushia malu etu onso, tuakukulonda, tuetu netuhete tshinyi

Wewe newenzeshe tshilulu tshia dilumbulula tshia ha tshiadi kudi bantu badi ne lungenyi lule, bobo nebenze tshilulu etshi bu muakenzabo efoda, ne bintu bia or ne bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bilulu bikunze kunzû ne bia lin mutambe buimpe
Bubidi buabi bidiunde hohamue tô ne halua dia kunowa; halua dia kunowa, nengambile banowi ne, Diambedi nusungulule luhela nulusuike mu bisumbu bua kuluosha; hadi nusangishe mponda mu diyeba dianyi
Hakelanganeye meshi a bualu ebu, wakabanga kudila bikole

Wewe Timote, ulame tshiakakuhebua; ehuka ku biakulakula bia hatuhu ne ku mpata ya bantu badi ne lungenyi ludibo batuhakana ne, Ndulelela; bakuabo hakitabushabo lungenyi elu, bakahambuka bualu bua ditabusha

Mikenji ya bena Levi Mua kukobolola mukaji kunyima kua dileta Maweja Nangila kumanyisha Moshe bua ambile bena Izrayele mikenji eyi ne: Padi mukaji ulela muana wa balume, mukaji awu udi upia mikiya matuku muanda mutekete, anu bu muvuaye muyipie mu matuku ende a tshijila tshia bakaji
Yozefe kubuela lukasa mu nzubu wa kulala udila
Kubashihi nansha, bua bantu banyi kabahu muoyo; Bua malu mabi adi mukana muabo, bua mei adi ku mishiku yabo ubabutule mu tshiji tshiebe, ubabutule bua kabikadiku kabidi
Kadi tshisamba tshienu netshikale tshia batuangaji, bantu bajidila, badi bangenzela mudimu
Mushipianganyi wa disu, bamushipe diende
Bualu bua bubi kabuena bunukokesha; bua kanuena munshi mua mikenshi, nudi munshi mua ngasa
Bakangata butue bua mu tshikutu, bakimana ku mpala kua Palô, Mose wakabumiamina mulu, buakenzesha bantu ne nyama mputa ya mbalanga ham bidi

Yeye kena umona nshila yanyi, Bingikala muende ne mashimi, Yeye angidikishe mu tshidikishilu tshidi tshidikisha biakane, bikala dikasa dianyi disesuke mu nshila, hashishe meme nkune ntete, mukuabo adie bidi bitoloka; Bikala mutshima wanyi muteyibue bua mukashi, nunku, mukashi wanyi ahelele bakuabo bukula, Bua muanda eu wakadi kuikala tshilumbu tshifike bukole; bulelela, wakadi kuikala bualu bubi budi balumbuluishi ne bua kukengesha benji bau
Dibue dionsu dikale dibueja mu disosu dia tshiamu tshia mpawungi didi ku tshilamba tshia pa tshiadi
Wakateka tshiamu tshia or ku nseke yonso munda mua nsubu; wakateka tshiamu tshia or ha nyima ha tshioshelu tshionso tshiakadi mu muaba wa tshijila
Messager wakafika kudiye, wakamuambila ne, Bakalua ne mitu ya bana balume ba mukelenge
Katataka ya biebe, uye ne bantu ku muaba unakukuambila, tangila, muanjelo wanyi neaye ku mpala kuebe, kadi dituku dinalua kudibo, nembenzele kabidi bu mudi bubi buabo
Hakashika nyinyo, mamu wa Yesu wakamuambila ne, Kabena ne nvinyo
Aba badi mishimi kayi ne mai; badi bu dibungi dihata kudi tshihehele tshikole; kudibo babatekela bufike bua mîdima

Mukelenge wa Moaba wakambila bakulu ba Midiyana ne, Bantu aba bd bungi nebatukengeshe bu mudi ngombe ukongolesha mashinde a mu budimi ne ludimu luandi Balaka, muana mulume wa Sipô, wakadi mukelenge wa Moaba ku tshikondo atshi
Nunku Davidi wakalombela muana eu Nzambi
Muoyi wa tatu udi anu kudi muana ewu
Bantu bonso bakaya bua kufundishabo mena abo, mutu kuabo mutu kuabo
Wewe neuteke tshibuikilu ha mutu ha mushete neubueshe mabue a dihungila andi nkuha mu mushete

Mu dituku ba disanka dienu, ne mu bikondo binudi nudia bidia bia Yehowa, ne mu tshibangidilu tshia ngondo yenu, nenuele mpungi ku milambu ya kuosha ha kahia, ne ku milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala, neyikale bu tshivulukidi ku mesu kua Nzambi wenu meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu

Kadi binuahidia kunvua dî dianyi, binuahidia kutumikila mikenji yanyi, binuahidia mikandu yanyi, binuabenga mei anyi mu mitshima yenu, kanuyi nuenza mikenji yanyi, binuashiha tshihungidi tshianyi, meme kabidi nennuenzele nunku nengenze malu adi anutshinyisha, nennutumine masama adi anyanyisha mibidi yenu ne disama dia mubidi kahia, masama au neashihe mesu enu, neanyanyishe mitshima yenu, nenukune bintu bienu tshianana, bualu bua bantu badi n enu lukuna nebabidie
Matuku muanda mutekete awu, nudie anu mampa adi kaayi mela buanga
Bibi biakadi binshila, Yesu wakalua, wakimana munkatshi muabo, wakamba ne, Ditalala dikale kunudi
Nutushile muaba mu mitshima yenu; katuakenzela muntu bibi, katuakanyanga muntu, katuakatamba muntu mukuabo budimu

Bualu bua diambedi muana eu kayi muanji kumanya mua kudila ne, Tatu wanyi, ne, Baba wanyi, biuma bia Damaseke ne bintu binyengibue mu Samalea nebiumushibue; nebaye n abi ku mpala kua mukelenge wa Ashû
Meme Yesu nakutuma muanjelo wanyi bua kunumanyisha malu â bua bualu bua ekelesia

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Utatshishe Bena Midiyana, ubashihe, bualu bua bobo badi banutatshisha ne budimu, bakanushima mu bualu bua Peô ne mu bualu bua Kozebi, muana mukashi wa mukelenge wa mu Midiyana, muan abo mukashi, wakamushihabo mu dituku diakalua disama bualu bua Peô
Mfumuanyi Abrahame mmupete diakalenga
Mukelenge wakashiya bakashi bahika babakibue dikumi bua kulamabo nsubu
Nuenu nenutumikile mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, nenubienze, nenushikame mu buloba talala

Bualu bua ndi ngamba ne, Kilisto wakavuishibua muena mudimu wa batengula bua bushua bua Nzambi, bua yeye ajadike milayi yakalaya Nzambi bankambua betu, ne bua ba bisamba bia bende batumbishe Nzambi bua luse luandi, bu muakafundabo ne, Udi Wamba kabidi ne, Udi wamba kabidi ne, Yeshaya udi wamba kabidi ne, Nzambi wa ditekemena anûshe tente ne disanka ne ditalala dia mu ditabusha dienu, bua nuenu nukumbane mu ditekemena mu bukole bua Nyuma Muimpe
Kumonaye Izake banaya ne mukajende Rebeka
Yelemiya muprofete wakamuambila ne, Amen
Bana ba Kîyata alima ne ba Kefila ne ba Bêlota, nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi anai ne basatu
Genese Yakoba ne Esau Badi Balengeshangana Yakoba wakabanduluka, wakamona Esau ulua ne bantu nkama mai

Ne muanjelo unakatangila muimane ha mai manene ne ha buloba, wakabisha tshianza tshiandi tshia bukole mulu; wakaditshiha kudi udi ne muoyo tshiendelele, wakafuka diulu ne bintu bidimu, ne buloba ne bintu bidihu, ne mai manene ne bintu bidimu, ne, Kakuena dishanguluka kabidi; kadi mu matuku a dî dia muanjelo wa muanda mutekete, hadiye wamba kuela mpungi, mpadi bualu busokoka bua Nzambi bushika, bu mudi lumu luimpe luakambileye bahika bandi, baprofete
Bantu aba bakalamata kudi mukelenge, ha mutu ha bantu bakateka mukelenge mu misoko yakadi ne ngumbu kuonso mu Yuda
Bualu bua mibidi ya nyama, miena mashi adi muakuidi mimene ulua n au mu muaba wa tshijila bu mulambu wa kubuikidila n au mibi ya bantu idi yoshibua ku butshika kua tshitudilu
Hashishe mukelenge wa Isalele wakabikila kahita, wakamuambila ne, Ya lubilu, ubikile Mikaya, muana wa Yimela
Mu ditunga dia Ejipitu nemuikale madilu adibu kabayi banji kudila musangu mukuabu ne adibu kabayi mua kudila kabidi to
Bakaya ne mpanza yonso yakadi mu nsubu wa Nzambi, ne minene ne mikese ne bintu biakadi mu bibutshilu bia mu nsubu wa Yehowa ne bia mukelenge ne bia baminyampala bandi, bakaya n abi bionso ku Babulona
Corinthians Eu musangu muisatu undualua kunudi
Bua bualu ebu ditabusha diandi diakabadibua kudiye bu buakane
Meme nkayanyi ndi Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
To ne hashika tshiji tshia muan enu kudi, ne hahueye bualu buwakamuenzela muoyo, hashishe nenkutumine di nenkubikile, nennujimishile bubidi buenu dituku dimue bualu kai
Ahu nakabanduluka, nakatangila ku luseke lua ku node, ekumona, ku luseke lua ku nôde kua tshibuelelu tshia ku tshioshelu, ku mbelu kuatshi, kuakadi luhingu elu lua mukau
Kadi muntu wa Nzambi wakalua kudiye, wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge, kuitabushi bua Bena Isalele kuya n ebe; bualu bua Yehowa kena ne Bena Isalele, bana bonso ba Efelayima mene
Kumukuatabu bua Mvidi Mukulu nkayende akose tshilumbu tshiende
Tuetu bena Izrayele bonsu tudi bantu ba tshijila
Juka biebe, bualu ebu budi kûdi, tuetu tudi n ebe; wikale ne mutshima mukole, ubuenze

Hakadibo bashikama ku mesa, dî dia Yehowa diakalua kuai muprofete wakamuhingisha ne yeye wakela dî kudi muntu wa Nzambi wakafuma mu Yuda ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua wewe wakuhidia dî dia Yehowa, kuakutumikila mukenji wa kukuambila Yehowa
Hakaluabo ku Kapênuma, basangishi ba mulambu wa ntempelo bakalua kudi Petelo, bakamukonka ne, Muyishi wenu kena ufuta tshituha tshibidi tshia nshekela, Yeye wakitaba ne, E, udi ufuta
Nenutante mu ditunga didi ne biakudia bia bungi, bu muvua Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wa bankambua benu munulaye
Bena Izrayele bumuka ku mukuna wa Ore, kuyabu ku Salmona

Bua bikala wewe mukoshibue ku mutshi wa oleve udi udiunda mu tshisuku bu mudi tshilele tshiau, ne biwikala mulamakashibue ku mutshi muimpe wa oleve bu mudi kamui tshilele; bualu budi butamba bua wowo, adi matamba malelela, alamakashibue ku mutshi wau mene
Bakuabo bakadi mu musoko bakaluhuka kudibo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele, bakuabo ku luseke elu, bakuabo ku luseke elu; bakabashiha tô, kakuakadi umue wabo wakahanduka
Bumue Bena Yuda nebunvue bua makenga onso andi mpangidisha kubenzela, bua bobo balekele, muntu ne muntu kuenda mu ushila wandi mubi; bua meme mmanye mua kubabuikidila malu mabi abo ne bubi buabo
Mu dituku adi nebimbe musambu eu: Meme Yehowa ndi mulami wabu; Tshiji katshiena munda muanyi
Kadi yeye wakahidia, wakambila mukashi wa mukelenge wandi ne, Mona, mukelenge wanyi kena mumanye bintu bindi n abi mu nsubu muandi, yeye wakashiya bintu bionso bidiye n abi mu tshianza tshianza

Dikenga ne kanyinganyinga bidi bimutshinyisha; Bualu bua wakuolola tshianza tshiandi bua kutombokela Nzambi, Udi uya kuluangana n andi muinyike mutu, Bualu bua matama andi akulua mafuta, Wakushikama mu misoko yakubutulabo, Yeye kena wikala mubanji, ne biuma biandi kabiena bishala kudiye; Yeye kena wehuka midima; Keyemenyi biandi malu a hatuhu, kadidingi biandi, Nebamufute difutu diandi dionso diambedi dituku diandi kadiyi dianze kufika, Neanyange tumuma tuandi tua nvinyo tubishi, bu mudi muonshi watu wenza, Bualu bua tshisumbu tshia babengi ba Nzambi katshiena tshitanta, Badi bimita ntatu, badi balela makenga, Job Hashishe, Yobo wakakudimuna Elifaza ne, Nakunvua malu a bungi bu nunku, Mei a hatuhu adi ne nshikidilu, anyi
Bisamba ebi bidi bitendelela nzambi yabo munyi
Bana ba Magebisha, lukama ne makumi atanu ne basambombo

Wakazola bilongo bia amande ne tuhanza tusatu tuakadi ku mutu kua mahu a tshitekelu, ne tshihunga tshia or ne tshilongo, wakazola bilongo bia amande ha tuhanza tuakadi ku luseke lukuabo, ne tshihunga ne tshilongo, wakenza matu asambombo nunku

Bikaleye kayi ne bintu bia kubuhikula n abi, nunku buloba buakahaneye nebuikale mu bianza bia muntu wakabusumba tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, mu tshidimu tshia disanka dinene buloba nebuhikudibue ne yeye neahingane mu buloba buandi
Kanungu ka Beena bukalenga bunene badi babweela mu midimu ya Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita munwamfwanka ne tshia batshipwita bakulumpe pamwe ne ya tusumbu tukese twabi
Mpunde kumona mutumibue wa Maweja Nangila, kudituuta ku tshimana
Bena Yuda ne Bena Isalele bakadi bungi bua nsenga ya ku muelelu wa mai manene; badiadia, banuanua, basankasanka
Bualu bua butumbi bua Yehowa buakumuka ku mitu kua bakeluba, buakaya ku mbelu kua nsubu; nsubu wakula tente ne ditutu, ne tshiendelu tshiakula tente ne dinkenke dia butumbi bua Yehowa
Bionsu bivua anu bia tshiamu tshia mpawungi
Nendisombuele kudibo ne kusombuela kukole, nembabele ne tshiji tshianyi tshikole; nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa hanashikisha kudisombuela kudibo
Yelubâla, muana wa Yoasha, wakaya, wakashikama mu nsubu muandi
Hakadi Alona wambila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele nunku, bakatangila ku tshihela, ne monai, butumbi bua Yehowa buakamueneka mu ditutu
Yeye wakalala matuku a bungi mu Yopa mu nsubu wa mukuonyi wa biseba, dina diandi Simona
Bakabanyangana bilulu biandi, bela n abi nshobo
Hashishe yeye wakabikila muena mudimu wandi wakadi umukuatshila mudimu, wakamuambila ne, Umushe mukashi eu kundi, wele nsahi ku tshibi
Yeye neikale muntu munene ku mesu kua Mukelenge; kanu biandi nvinyo ne bintu bidi bikuatangana; yeye neûshibue tente ne Nyuma Muimpe diambedi mamu wandi kai muanze kumulela
Bintu bionso bidi ne mahuahua ne bidi bidikoka hanshi kabiena biakane kunudi; kanubidi
Bungi buabo buakabalabo mu kulondolola kuabo bua kuluangana nvita bakadi binunu makumi abidi ne bisambombo

Mu tshihungu tshia bantu tshidi tshitua, bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima ne benyi badi bafuma ku buloba bukuabo, hatangilabo makenga akalua ku buloba abu ne masama onso adi Yehowa mubatumine ne buloba buonso budi bu butue ne luehu ne bintu bioshibue, kabena bakunamu tshintu, kabena bahuolamu tshintu; ne mashinde kaena amenamu: buloba budi buikala bu kubutuka kua misoko ya Sodoma ne Amola ne Adema ne Seboima yakashiha Yehowa mu tshiji tshiandi tshikole; bantu aba bonso nebambe ne, Bualu kai Yehowa wakuenzela buloba ebu nunku

Ne bingikala ne tshihedi tshia kuambila bantu dî dia Nzambi, ne binamanya malu onso atshidi masokoka ne lungenyi luonso, ne bingikala ne ditabusha dionso dindi mua kumusha n adi mikuna, kadi bingikala tshi ne luse, ndi tshianana
Olodonase miena bwalu mu tulongo tudi kulu etu badi bayitwa tshiâla tshibîdi kudia bakaji kudi Minisitile kavulambedi
Dikima dia mei anyi didi dinene kunudi, kutumba kuanyi kudi kunene bua bualu buenu; nakûshibua tente ne busambi, disanka dianyi didi dihongoloka mu dikenga dietu dionso

Hakamona Hezikiya ne Saneheliba wakalua, wakasua kuluangana ne Yelushalema, yeye wakahunga dî ne bantu bandi banene ne hena bukitu bandi bua kujibika mishimi ya mai yakadi ku mpenge kua musoko; bobo bakamukuatshisha
Nebanumanyishe malu onso a kunoko
Yeye wakabikila bayandi, wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Untumine muena mudimu ne nyama wa mpunda bua meme kulonda muntu wa Nzambi, mpingane kabidi
Mpindiewu, Maweja Nangila neanutshimuine bisamba bionsu binudi nabi mutumba, bidi binupita ku bukole ne ku bungi
Tuvua babenge kabidi kupitshila mu njila wa kuinshi wa mu tshibanda, ne mu misoku ya Elate, ne Eshiyone Ngebere
Abinê wakatumina Davidi ba messager, bakamukonka ne, Buloba ebu mbua nganyi
Maboku ende ne bianza kabiena bipungila
Bualu bua makokeshi yonso udi muena mudimu wa Nzambi kûdi bua kukuvuishila buimpe
nemmuambile ne, Yehowa wakatuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu ne mu nsubu wa lukanu ku bukole bua tshianza tshiandi
Batatu, udi nufundila mukanda, bualu bua nudi bamanye Yesu udi wa ku tshibangidilu

Ebu mbuloba butshidi bushala: nseke yonso ya Bena Peleshete, ne ya Bena Geshû bonso; ku Shihô udi ku mpala kua Ejipitu tô ne ku mukalu wa Ekelona ku luseke lua nôde ludi bibadibue bu lua Bena Kanâna; bakelenge batanu ba Bena Peleshete; Bena Gaza, Bena Ashedodo, Bena Ashakalola, Bena Giti, ne Bena Ekelona; ne Bena Awa kabidi, ku luseke lua Sude; buloba buonso bua Bena Kanâna, ne Meala udi wa Bena Sidona, tô ne ku Afeke ku mukalu wa Bena Amole; buloba bua Bena Gebala ne Lebanona mujima kudi kuhatukila diba, ku Bâla gada udi kuinshi kua mukuna wa Hêmona tô ne ku mukalu wa Hamata; bantu bonso badi bashikama ku mikuna ya Lebanona tô ne ku Miselefota mayima ne kudi Bena Sidona bonso; meme nembihate ku mesu kua Bena Isalele; wewe wanji kubuabanyina Bena Isalele ne nshobo bu buhianyi buabo bu munakakuambila
Buloba kabuakadi busunguluka, buakadi butuhu, midima yakadihu, Nyuma wa Nzambi wakadi unyunguluka ha mutu ha mai
Kadi bakuidi ba ku bitendelelu abi kabakalua ku tshioshelu tshia Yehowa tshia mu Yelushalema; bakadia bidia biakadi kabiyi ne luevene munkatshi mua bana habo
Pikala muntu mudienzele manananshi a mushindu ewu, numumushe munkatshi mua bantu banyi
Hashishe, nenujingulule ditahuluka didi hankatshi ha bantu bimpe ne bantu babi, hankatshi ha badi bakuatshila Nzambi mudimu ne badi kabayi bamukuatshila mudimu
Muntu au amanye bualu ebu ne, Bu mutudi mu mei a mu mikanda hatudi katuiku, netuikale nunku kabidi mu bienzedi hatuikala n enu

Nunku amba biebe ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nansha bingikala mubatume kule munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu, nansha bingikala mubamuangalashe munkatshi mua maloba makuabo, nakadi kudibo bu tshitendelelu tshidi katshiyi tshianze kukumbana munkatshi mua maloba akayabo; kadi Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nennusangishe munkatshi mua bantu ba bende, nennukunguishe aku bua kunuhatula munkatshi mua maloba akanumuangalashabo, ne nennuhe buloba bua Isalele
Bakamukudimuna ne, Bu muntu eu kai muenze bualu bubi, katuakadi kumufila mu bianza biebe
Hakadiye uyikila n abo, Lakele wakalua ne mikoko ya tatu andi, bualu bua yeye wakadi muyilame
Bikaleye muvuishe malu au bu malu a hatuhu, hakunvueye, nunku yeye neamutuadile bubi buandi
Yonatana wakabanda kudibo wenda ukalaba bianza ne makasa; muambudi wa ngabu wandi wakamulonda mu nyima; Bena Peleshete bakashihibua kudi Yonatana, ne muambudi wa ngabu wandi wakashiha bakuabo kabidi

Lemeke wakambila bakashi bandi ne, Ada ne Sila, telejai matshu, bakashi ba Lemeke, unvuai di dianyi, nakashiha muntu bualu bua yeye wakantaha mputa, nakashiha nsongalume bualu bua yeye wakantuta, biasombuelabo Kana nusangu muanda mutekete, bulelela, nebasombuele Lemeke misangu makumi muanda mutekete ne muanda mutekete
Bantu ba Abashaloma bakafika ku nsubu wa mukashi eu, bakamuebesha ne, Ahimasa ne Yonatana badi kudi kunyi
Bualu bavua bashipe bantu bua tshiji
Aba mbantu bakasungula Yehowa bua kutahulula Bena Isalele buloba bua Kanâna
Bakaya ne dibendele ba tshitudilu tshia Lubena, ne Elisû, muana mulume wa Shedeu, wakadi ku mutu kuabo
Pashishe bamiamine mashi ku nseke yonsu ya tshilambuilu
Lea wakalua ne bana bandi bakafua mpala yabo hanshi kabidi, Yosefe ne Lakele bakalua ku nyima, bakatua mpala yabo hanshi
Kadi bakadi belangana meji bua kungenzela bibi
Dilongolola dia Kuhita kua Yehowa diakafika, diba diakadi bu munda munya

Bana ba Hete bakambila Abalahama ne, Mukelenge, utunvuile, wewe udi bu muntu wa Nzambi munene munkatshi muetu, usungule muaba wa majambu nkayebe udi musue kujikarnu tshitalu etshi, kakuena muntu udi mua kukukanda bua wewe kuangata muaba wa kujikamu tshi tatu etshi
Bua tudi bamumanye yeye wakamba ne, Kusombuela mbualu buanyi, nempingishile bantu difutu diabo, wakamba kabidi ne, Mukelenge nealumbuluishe bantu bandi
Nunku mukelenge Yoasha kakavuluka luse luakamulesha Yehoyada tatu wandi; kadi wakashiha muan andi
Kadi wakalamata malu mabi a Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, akenzesheye Bena Isalele, yeye kakâlekela nansha
Ndaku
Ne katataka mene ndi mumanye ne, Tshionso tshiwalomba Nzambi, Nzambi neakuhetshi
Buonso buabo bakabadibua mu kulondolola kuabo mu matuku a Yotama, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne mu matuku a Yalobama, mukelenge wa Isalele
Mukelenge wakitabusha malu au onso bualu bua tshianza tshimpe tshia Nzambi wanyi tshiakadi kundi

Nikodemo, muntu wakalua kudiye diambedi, umue wabo wa Bafalese, wakabambila ne, Mukenshi wetu udi ukosa tshilumbu tshia muntu diambedi kabai banze kunvua dî diandi, kabai banze kumanya bualu buakuenzeye, anyi
Hakamanya Yesu dikonkangana diabo, yeye wakabandamuna ne, Nudi nukonkelangana nunku munda muenu tshinyi
Nakatuma Tukiko ku Efeso
Muntu mukuabo wakatangila bualu ebu, wakamanyisha Yoaba ne, Mona, nakatangila Abashaloma mulembelele ku mutshi
Hakahita tshituha tshihi kabidi, bakadi bimane ha buihi bakambila Petelo ne, Bulelela, wewe udi wabo, bualu bua wewe udi Muena Galela

Nakaluhuka butuku ku tshibi tshia ku luseke lua tshibanda, ku dina dia mai a mibuabua ku luseke lua diala, nakatangila lumbu lua Yelushalema luakadi lushimbuka hanshi ne bibi bialu biakadi bioshibua ne kahia
Maweja Nangila udi unutumina diyi bua nuenu bena Izrayele, kumusha tshiadi ne tshibelu bia nyama inudi nulambula bu mulambu wa bobumue
Kanushipi muntu
Abrahame kuitaba bivua Efrone muakule, kumubadilaye nkanu bungi buvuaye utela, bana babu bumvue
Hashishe, bakamuambila ne, Tudi tukusengelela bua wewe kutuambila ne muanda eu udi mutukuate mbua bubi bua muntu kai
Bua kutangila muntu muluate bilulu binefuke, anyi
Wakasumba tshituha tshia buloba kuakashimikeye ntenta yandi kudi bana ba Hamo tatu wa Shekeme, ku lukama lua kesita
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; wakalonda mu nshila wa malu mabi a Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, akenzesheye Bena Isalele; yeye kakasesukaku nansha
Nunku Yehowa wakaha Bena Isalele buloba buonso buakalayeye bankambua babo; bakabunyenga, bakashikamamu
Nakunuambila malu â bua nuenu kusuangana
Nyeye wakatuhandisha ku bukokeshi bua mîdima, wakatubuesha mu bukelenge bua Muana wa dinanga diandi, utudi ne kuhikudibua kuetu munda muandi, nkujimisha kua mibi yetu
Hakabuelabo mu Samalea, Elisha wakatendelela Yehowa ne, Utabashe mesu a bantu aba bua bobo bamone
Biunvua muntu dî dianyi, ne udi ungunzuluila tshibi, nembuele kudiye, nendie n andi bidia, ne yeye neadie n anyi
Malonga onso a mu nsubu, adi kayi ne bibuikidi, neikale bu tshintu tshidi katshiyi tshiakane

Kadi wewe wikale mu malu awakayila ne awakeyemena ne, Nga bushua; umanya biebe bantu bakakuyishau; ku buana buebe wewe wakamanya Mukanda wa Nzambi, udi mumanye mua kukuvuisha muena meshi tô ne ku luhandu luakulua bua ditabusha dia mu Kilisto Yesu
Hakashikisheye kuamba dî dia Nzambi, yeye wakabanda ku mukuna
Hebelone Udi Buhianyi bua Kaleba Bena Yuda bakalua kudi Yoshua mu Gilegala
Wewe neuhange bulelela, ne wewe ne bantu badi n ebe bujitu bua bualu ebu budi bukutamba bukôle, wewe nkayebe kuena mua kubuenza
Neimane biandi mu buloba bulengele, neabubutule ne tshianza tshiandi
Bakelenge ba mu Isalele, bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo, bakafua bintu
Buonso buabo bakadia, bakûkuta; bakangula bihesa bia bidia biakashala bisaka muanda mutekete biule tente
Unvuai, Isalele, nubienze; bua nuenu nukume dikasa dimpe, ne bua nuenu nukumbane ba bungi, bu muakanulaya Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu enu, mu buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Tshitadikilu tshia mabaya tshiakadi ha mutu ha tshibuelelu ku mpala kua mbalanda
Hakafika diba ha isatu, Yesu wakela dî diandi bikole ne, Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakatani
Bikunyibua bikuabu bivua pa madimi kunyanguka bualu bikavua bimane kupatula miepu, biela ne bilongu
Nebabutule baluishi babu
Bua muanda wa Dina dia Kilisto bobo bakamuangalaka, kabai bangate tshintu kudi ba bisamba bia bende
Bantu bonsu bavua bumvua nuwuaye ungela nsenda, nebatenteke bianza biabu pa mutu pende
Nebabenge kashidi bua kungitaba anyi
Mose ne Alona bakaya kudi Palô, bakenza bu muakamba Yehowa: Alona wakela mulangala wandi hanshi ku mesu kua Palô ne bantu bandi, ne mulangala wakakudimuka nyoka
Hakahita matuku, Felika wakalua ne mukashi wandi Dusila, wakadi biandi Muena Yuda, wakabikila Paulo, wakunvua dî diandi bualu bua ditabusha dia mu Kilisto Yesu

Luse ludi lukenga musangu mule, ludi luenzela bakuabo bimpe; luse kaluena ne mukau; luse kaluena lufunafuna, kaluena ludisua; luse kaluena luenza malu a dikamakama, kaluena ludikebela bintu, kaluena lukuata tshishi lubilu, kaluena lubala malu mabi adibo baluenzela; kaluena lusanka bua malu mabi, ludi lusanka bua kuikala ne malu a bushua; ludi tutuala malu onso, ludi luitabusha malu onso, ludi lutekemena malu onso, ludi ludikankamika mu malu onso

Gideona wakabuela mu nsubu, wakalongolola muana wa mbushi ne mikata ya tshihiminu tshia bukula buakadi kabuyi ne luevene; wakateka munyinyi mu tshisaka ne nsuhu mu luesu, wakalua n abi kudiye muinshi mua mutshi, wakabifila kudiye
Ku mikuna: Shamî ne Yatî ne Soko, ne Dana ne Kîyata sana eu udi Debî kabidi , ne Anaba ne Eshetemo ne Anima, ne Goshene ne Holona ne Gilo; bimenga dikumi ne tshimue ne misoko yabi

Mona, meme nakusungula Oholiaba, muana mulume wa Ahisamaka, wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana bua kumumatshisha, nakabuesha lungenyi lule mu mitshima ya bantu bonso badi ne meji bua bobo benze bintu bionso binakukuambila
Nzambi wakafila bana ba mukelenge wa Midiyana, Oleba ne Zêbe, mu bianza bienu; meme ndi mumanye mua kuidikisha bualu buanyi ne bualu buenu, anyi
Nanku Maweja Nangila kujadika ne: Abrame mmuntu muakane
Ha wenza malu mabi, ke haudi usanka
Tshiena ngitabusha di diandi bua kulekela Bena Isalele
Yeye wakamukuata ku tshianza tshiandi, wakamubuesha mu dikalu diandi
Bakatatshisha Bena Isalele bonso bakadi dishiya dia Yadene mu buloba bua Bena Amole budi mu Gilada bidimu dikumi ne muanda mukulu
Ne bakabaha bukokeshi ha mutu ha tshituha tshinai tshia ba ha buloba, bua kubashiha ne muele wa nvita, ne tshiole, ne lufu, ne kudi nyama ya luonji ya ha buloba

Batuadi ba majitu: Shaluma ne Akuba ne Talemona ne Ahimana ne bana babo Shaluma wakadi ku mutu kuabo , bakadi bimana ku tshibi tshia mukelenge ku esete; bobo bakadi batuadi ba majitu a mu tshitudilu tshia Bena Lewi
Nshingu webe udi bu tshibumba tshia mubanga

Nunku hakunvuabo mukenji wa mukelenge ne dî diandi, ne hakasangishabo bansongakashi ba bungi mu nsubu wa mukelenge wa mu Shushana mu bianza bia Hegai, Esetê wakadi mufidibue mu nsubu wa mukelenge; bakamufila mu bianza bia Hegai, mulami wa bakashi
Nenudisunguluile balumbuluishi ne bafundi mu misoko yonso, idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe, ku tshisamba ne ku tshisamba; bobo nebalumbuluishe bantu bilumbu biabo ne dilumbuluisha didi diakane

Kadi lungenyi elu kaluena munda mua bantu bonso; kadi bakuabo bakadi ne tshilele tshia kutendelela mpingu tô ne katataka, badi badia bintu ebi bu bintu bia kutendelelabo n abi mpingu; ne bualu bua muoyo mukese wabo udi mutekete, udi ulua mubiha
Anyi biaditshiha muntu lubilu ne mishiku yandi bua kuenza bualu bubi anyi bualu buimpe, biaditshiha muntu lubilu nunku ne bikala bualu ebu busokoka ku mesu kuandi, hamanyeye bualu, yeye neahile
Pinganayi ku midimu yenu
Bakamana nsubu eu ku dituku disatu dia mu ngondo wa Adâ mu tshidimu tshisambombo tshia bukokeshi bua mukelenge Dayawesha
Au mmeku a Bena Shimeona, bantu binunu makumi abidi ne bibidi ne nkama ibidi
Muanjelo wa mu diulu wakamueneka kudiye, wakamukolesha
Bualu Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu udi unyoka bantu badi badinga mushindu ewu

Kadi biajidileye budimi buandi ku nyima kua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, muakuidi neamubadile mushinga bu bungi bua bidimu bidi bishala tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, nebamuhuekeshile mushinga wakasanganabo
Mu nzubu emu katshiena utangila tshintu nansha tshimue
Bualu bukuabo kabidi, Yehowa neatume matembue munkatshi muabo, bantu badi bashala nebasokome, tô ne hafuabo ku mpala kuenu

Yehoshafata wakakokesha mu Yuda; wakadi ne bidimu makumi asatu ne bitanu hakabangeye kukokesha; wakakokesha bidimu makumi abidi ne bitanu mu Yelushalema; bina dia mamu wandi diakadi Azuba, muana mukashi wa Shilihi
Bena Yuda ne bakokeshi bakuabo lukama ne makumi atanu bakadia ku mesa anyi ha mutu ha bakalua kutudi kudi ba munkatshi mua bisamba bia bantu biakadi bitunyunguluke
Humukeye kutudi, neaye kudi banganyi
Kushe kulela kabidi Nimrode, tshilobu tshia kumpala tshivua tshidia bumfumu mu matunga a bende
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa, wakenda mu nshila ya tatu wandi ne ya mamu wandi ne ya Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, wakenzesha Bena Isalele malu mabi

Wakasa bitendelelu bia ku mikuna biakashimbula Hezikiya, tatu wandi; wakashila Bâla ne Bashela tshioshelu bu muakenza Ahaba, mukelenge wa Isalele; wakatendelela bintu bionso bia mu diulu, wakabikuatshila mudimu
Kadi kayena ilonda muntu wa bende, neimunyeme, bualu bua kayena mimanye dî dia bantu ba bende
Musangu bule munyi undi mua kuikala ne ntatu munda muanyi, Untangile ne witabe kundi, Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi
Kanusongi lupingu, kanuzodi tshimfuanyi tshidi tshileja tshintu tshidi mu diulu, pa buloba, nansha mu mayi adi muinshi mua buloba
Bualu bukuabu: meme ke udi tatu mueyekele tshilumbu tshia muanende ewu
Bakaya nunku, bakatentekela buloba ku tshihela tshia Sina tô ne ku Lehoba udi mu nshila wa ku Hamata
Bualu bua mesu a Mukelenge adi kudi bakane, Ne nganyi wanuenzela bibi, binuaya bena lukunukunu ba malu mimpe
Gideona wakabambila ne, Ndi musue kunulomba tshintu, muntu ne muntu bampe tukanu tua ku matshu tuakanyengabo mu nvita
Mbimpe tuetu kuha Kaisa mulambu, anyi
Pikala muena Izrayele mubangile mukaji, nebabuelele mukaji awu mu nzubu kudi muntu mukuabu
Moshe kumuandamuna ne: Tuyaya bonsu pamue: bansonga betu ne bantu bakulakaje, bana betu ba balume ne ba bakaji ne bimuna bietu bionsu, mikoku, ngombe ne mbuji
Wakamba kabidi ne, Ndi bianyi Nzambi wa tatu ebe, Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Isaka, Nzambi wa Yakoba Mose wakayikila mesu andi, wakatshina kutangila Nzambi
Binadiamba, dî dianyi kadiena dijalama
Baluishi kumona bukole buebe

Tubalu tuabo tuakadi nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi asatu ne tusambombo; nyama yabo ya mpunda nkama ibidi ne makumi anai ne itanu; tumelo tuabo tuakadi nkama mai ne makumi asatu ne tutanu; nyama yabo ya mpunda yakadi binunu bisambombo ne nkama muanda mutekete ne makumi abidi
Patupu, bantu nebatuseke
Muntu yonso wakamuha tshituha tshimue tshia tshiamu tshia or ne kakanu ka or ka ku munu
Kanuakadia mampa, kanua kanua nvinyo anyi maluvu makole, bua nuenu numanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Yesu wakamukudimuna ne, Nakujukuila bantu dî dianyi hatoke; matuku onso nakadi uyisha mu nsunagoga ne mu ntempelo, muakadi Bena Yuda bonso bunguile; tshiakamba bualu bumue mu busokoko
Ntete ya kuenza bukula, ivua bana ba Yakobe basumbe mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, kujika yonsu
E, bulelela, binahongolodibua ha mulambu ne ha ditendelela dia ditabusha dienu, ndi nsanka bianyi, ne ndi nsanka ne buonso buenu; muomumue nuenu nusanke bienu, nusanke n anyi kabidi
Samuele wakadi ne tshiji tshikole, wakadila kudi Yehowa butuku abu buonso

Nunku bananga banyi, bu munuakatumikila misangu yonso, kembua kuikala kuanyi munkatshi muenu nkayaku, kadi mpindiu nudi nutamba kuenza nunku handi tshîku, nudienzeshe bua kushikisha luhandu luenu ne ditshina ne dizakala, bualu bua Nzambi ngudi wenzesha munda muenu bua kusua ne bua kuenza kabidi bualu bua disua diandi dimpe
Kadi Hamana wakadikanda, wakaya kuandi; wakatuma dî, wakabikila balunda bandi ne mukashi wandi Zeleshe

Nunku bakashikisha dî diakambabo kudi muprofete Yelemiya ne, Bakangata bituha bia mpalata makumi asatu, muakatuabo mushinga wandi, bu mushinga wandi wakatuabo kudi Bena Isalele; bakabifila bua kusumba muaba wakadi wa mufumbi wa bifuadi, bu muakadi dî dia Mukelenge
Ekesode Nzambi Udi Ubaka Mona Bakabika mu Elima ne Bena Isalele bonso, bakalua mu tshihela, dina diatshi Sina, hankatshi ha Elima ne Sinai
Yehowa wakambila Mose mu Midiyana ne, Ya biebe, uhingane mu Ejipitu bualu bua bantu bonso bakasua kukushiha bakafua
Hakafikabo munkatshi mua bisamba abi kuakayabo, bakanyanga dina dianyi dia tshijila; bualu bua bantu bakuabo bakamba bua bualu buabo ne, Aba mbantu ba Yehowa, bakaluhuka mu buloba buandi
Bobo nebadie, muntu tshituha tshiandi muntu tshituha tshiandi ku mutu kua buhianyi bua batatu abo buakahanabo
Bukenshi kabuena bubadibua kudi muntu udi wenza mudimu bu bua ngasa, kadi budi bubadibua bua dibanza
Kadi balami ba mikoku kufika, kuipata bana ba bakaji abu
Bakashimika nsubu wa tshitendelelu mu dituku dia kumudilu dia ngondo wa kumudilu mu tshidimu tshibidi

Nsumuinu Hawashikama bua kudia bidia ne mukokeshi, uteke kele ku mununu webe, Kusaminyi muoyo ku bidia biandi bishemakane, Kudihangishi ne mudimu mukole bua kudivuisha mubanji, Neutshike mesu ebe ku biuma, Kudi bidia bia muena tshitu; Bualu bua bu mudiye welangana meji munda muandi, ke mudiye
Badi badikolesha mu bualu bubi buakuhangidishabo; Badi bahangidisha malu mabi, bamba ne, Kadi Nzambi neabele mukete wandi; Ka nebabalenduishe, bualu bua ndimi yabo yakubahisha
Mose wakambila Yehowa ne, Mona, wewe udi ungambila ne, Uye ne bantu aba, ne wewe kuena muanze kummanyisha muntu udi musue kutuma n anyi
Muntu yonsu udi uleja mpofu njila mubi, asangane muena tshibawu kuenza anyi
Pikalabu bakuate muntu mubuelele mukaji wa bende mu nzubu, babajikile, babashipe bonsu babidi
Nunku miaku idi bu tshimanyinu, kenkudi badi bitabusha, kadi kudi badi kabai bena ditabusha; kadi mayisha a baprofete adi bu tshimanyinu, kenkudi badi kabai bena ditabusha, kadi kudi badi bitabusha

Hashishe wewe neubambile ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Monai, nenkuatshishe bantu bonso ba ha buloba maluvu, kudi bakelenge badi bashikame mu nkuasa wa Davidi, bakuidi ne baprofete ne ba mu Yelushalema bonso
Mukelenge wa ku nôde neabishe tshisumbu tshinene tshia bena nvita, kadi tshisumbu etshi netshifidibue mu bianza bia mukelenge wa ku sude
Yosefe wakalesha tatu andi ne bana babo muaba bua kushikamabo mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu buloba buakatamba buimpe, mu buloba bua Lamesese, bu muakamba Palô
Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Ambaku, mamu wanyi, tshiena mbenga dî diebe nansha
Wakashikama mu buatu, wakayisha bisumbu bia bantu

Yeye wakabambila ne, Bunudi n abu mbua kuenza nunku: tshituha tshienu tshisatu tshialua dituku dia Lumingu netshikale balami ba nsubu wa mukelenge, tshituha tshisatu tshikuabo netshikale ku tshibi tshia ku Sû; ne tshituha tshisatu tshikuabo netshikale ku tshibi ku nyima kua balami aba; nunku nenumanye mua kulama nsubu bua muntu kabuedi
Bakabanga kumubanda ne, Tuakusangana muntu eu utombosha tshisamba tshietu uhidisha bantu ne, Kanulambudi Kaisa, wamba kabidi ne, Meme ndi Kilisto, Mukelenge

Shaula ne bantu bandi bakayila ku luseke elu lua mukuna, ne Davidi ne bantu bandi bakayila ku luseke lualua; Davidi wakaya lubilu bua kuhanduka, bualu bua yeye wakatshina Shaula; bualu bua Shaula ne bantu bandi bakadi bela Davidi ne bantu bandi munkatshi bua kubakuata
Bakahua, mu matuku au ka bakamanyisha muntu malu akamonabo
Yeye kakasumba buloba bua babuki, bualu bua babuki bakadi ne tshituha tshiabo kudi Palo, ne bakadila bintu biakabaha Palo nunku bobo kabakahana buloba buabo
Biadiluilangana Satana, biahandulukeye, kena mumanye mua kuikala, bualu ouandi nebushikile
Nunku yeye wakabatuma ne muonshi ha dididishi dia nsubu, bualu bua nsubu wandi wakadi mutuangane ne lumbu lua musoko, yeye wakashikama ha mutu ha lumbu
Yeye neatume banjelo bandi ne mpungi wa dî dikole, nebasangishe bakusunguleye ba ku mpehele inai, kunfudilu kukuabo kua diulu tô ne kukuabo
Kukuata lukole Nuenu basombeshe muanenu tshintu, kanubuedi mu nzubu muende bua kudiangatshila tshintu tshia tshieya to
Edi ndî kai diakambeye ne, Nenunkebe, kanuena nunmona; kanuena bamanye mua kulua kungikala
Mukashi wakamba ne, Bulelela, Mukelenge, kadi mbua itu yadia nkototo idi imata munshi mua mesa a banfumu bai

Muakuidi neafile mulambu wa kumubuikidila n au bubi buakenzeye, ne bubi buandi nebuikale bubuikidibue, tshituha tshia bukula tshidi tshishale netshikale tshia muakuidi, bu mudibo benza ne mulambu wa bukula
Bobo badi tunkanunuina tua Abalahama, anyi

Kabena balala hohamue ne bena bukitu ba kale, bakuhueka mu Muaba wa Bafue ne bielelu biabo bia nvita mu bianza biabo, bakinama mitu yabo ha miele yabo ya nvita, ne ngabu yabo idi ha mutu ha mifuba yabo, bualu bua ditshina dikole dia bukole buabo diakakuata bantu bakadi ne muoyo ha buloba
Mabue awu, ikale dikumi ne abidi, bungi bua bana ba Yakobe
Hashishe, mukelenge Nebukadenesâ wakakuatshika buowa, wakajuka lukasa; wakakonka miloho yandi ne, Katuakuela bantu basatu basuika mu kahia, anyi
Bantu bandi bakelela Amona tshifufu, bakashiha mukelenge mu nsubu wandi
Mu diba adi ba mu misoko ya mu Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema nebaye kudila kudi nzambi idibo boshila musenga wa manananshi, kadi yoyo kayena ibasungila mu dituku dia dikenga diabo
Nunku Gehazi wakalonda Nâmana
Kadi hakatangileye bisumbu bia bantu, wakadi n abo luse, bualu bua bobo bakadi batata, bakadi bamuangalake bu mikoko idi kayi ne mulami
Mu tshisamba tshia Ashê, Mishala ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Abidona ne miaba ya ku matshika, Halekata ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Lehoba ne miaba ya ku matshika: bimenga binai
Yeye wakasemena ha buihi ne muaba unakimana
Nubadike, nufunde mena a bantu balume bonsu badi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne pa mutu, bikale ne bukole bua kuenza mudimu mu bisumbu bishilangane bia tshiluilu tshia bena Izrayele

Bienza mukokeshi wa bantu bualu bubi ku mpukahuka budi Yehowa uhidia ne biahilabo, ne hamanyeye bualu bubi buakenzeye, neafue mpumbu wa mbushi udi kayi ne tshilema bu mulambu wandi, neatenteke tshianza tshiandi ha mutu ha mbushi, neamushihe kudibo bashihela mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ku mesu kua Yehowa, eu udi mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Hakaya bifukibue bidi ne muoyo ku muaba mukuabo, nkata yakaya n abi diakamue; hakajuka bifukibue hanshi, nkata yakajuka n abi diakamue
Nanku nulambe biakudia munudi basue
Binuamba mu mitshima yenu ne, Nemmanye dî didi Yehowa kayi mutuambile munyi
Bualu bua meme ndi muntu mununu, ne mukashi wanyi udi ne bidimu bia bungi
Nunku bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne batuadi ba majitu ne bimbi ba misambu ne Bena Netinima ne bantu bakuabo ba munkatshi muabo ne Bena Isalele bonso bakashikama mu misoko yabo
Hashishe mukelenge wakabika, wakahanda bilulu biandi, wakalala hanshi mu buloba; bantu bandi bonso bakimana ha buihi n andi ne bilulu biabo bihanda
Kadi witabe amu tshindi nkulomba etshi
Nunku batuhe habo ngombe ibidi: bobo badisunguila ngombe umue, bamusaye, bamuteke ha nkunyi, kabateki kahia muinshi; meme nendongolole ngombe mukuabo, nemmuteke ha nkunyi, tshiena nteka kahia muinshi
Yesu wakabandamuna ne, Nuitabushe Nzambi mene
Wewe neuhidie kudihuekesha ku mesu kuanyi musangu bule munyi
Nenusungule mukelenge wa mu tshisamba ne tshisamba bua kunutahuluila buloba

Balume aba batanu bakadi baye kua kutentekelabo buloba, bakaya, bakabuelamu, bakangata luhingu luakasongabo ne efoda ne telafima ne luhingu luakadibo; muakuidi wakadi muimane ku tshibi tshia musoko hehi ne bantu aba nkama isambombo bakadi ne bintu bia nvita bisuika ham bidi
Usuike makopa makumi atanu ku mibangu ya tshilamba tshia ndekelu tshia luseke lumue
Nebakuate bana benu ba balume ne ba bakaji mu bupika kudi bantu benyi, nuenu batangile
Bualu bua Yehowa wakahuekesha Bena Yuda bualu bua Ahaza, mukelenge wa Isalele, bualu bua yeye wakalekela kukandika Bena Yuda, wakenzela Yehowa bibi

Bualu bua mukelenge wakadi ne matu akenda ha mutu ha mai manene ku Tâshishi hohamue ne matu a Hilama: akaya ku Tâshishi musangu umue mu bidimu bisatu, akafumaku ne or, argent ne mibanga ne nkima ne kaiba
Bakuenza mei a Yonadaba, muana wa Lekaba, akambileye bana bandi balume, ne, Kanunu maluvu a nvinyo
Moshe kutuluka, kuya kuvua bantu, kubalondelaye bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile abi
Alona wakalela Nadaba ne Abihu ne Eleazâ ne Itamâ
Bana ba Bigewai, binunu bibidi ne makumi atanu ne basambombo
Nuvuluke kabidi ne meme ndi bu mufuba wa mifuba yenu ne bu musunyi wa misunyi yenu
Ke padi mulume ushiya tatuende ne mamuende, ulamata mukajende, bua bonsu babidi bikale anu muntu umue
Mukashi wakamuambila ne, Mukelenge, Umpe mai â, tshikadi ne nyota, tshilu tô kunoko bua kusuna
Bakenza bintu bia kuteka ha maha bua kutuishangana bituha bia efoda bibidi
Bualu bukuabo kabidi, Yehowa neatume matembue munkatshi muabo, bantu badi bashala nebasokome, tô ne hafuabo ku mpala kuenu
mu nsuhu wa muitu
Kulondolola Milongo ya bana balume ba Alona yakadi nunku
Hakahingana bena mukenshi ba Yone, Yesu wakabanga kuambila bantu bualu bua Yone ne, Nuakuyila mu tshihela bua kutangila tshinyi
Hadada wa kafua, ne Samala wa ku Maseleka, wakadia bukelenge buandi

Nunku dî edi kadiakafundibua bua bualu buandi nkayandi ne, Ditabusha diandi diakabadibua kudiye, kadi diakafundibua bua bualu buetu kabidi kudibo bamba kubadila ditabusha, badi bitabusha wakabisha Yesu Mukelenge wetu ku bafue, wakafidibua ka lufu bua malu mabi etu, wakabishibua bua dibingishibua dietu
biakutuhendabo n abi kudi bantu badi n ebe lukuna, Yehowa, Yehowa avudishibue disanka tshiendelele
Solomo Udi Usumba Tubalu ne Makalu Bak
Baprofete kabidi bakafua, wewe udi udivuisha nganyi
Kadi Paulo wakela dî diandi bikole ne, Kudienzedi bibi, buonso buetu tudiku
Ku tshikondo atshi Melodaka baladana, muana wa Baladana, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakatumina Hezikiya mikanda ne bintu, bualu bua yeye wakunvua lumu ne, Hezikiya wakadi ne disama
Nsubu wakibakibua ne mabue akasongabo ku muaba wakadi mabue; nunku kabakunvua mikumu ya marteau anyi tshisui anyi tshiamu tshikuabo mu nsubu hakatshidibo bibaka nsubu
Yonsu udi udia munyinyi awu, mmuena tshibawu
Davidi wakatuma bantu kudi Abigayila bua kumuangateye bu mukashi wandi
Samuel Samuele wakafua; Bena Isalele bonso bakadisangisha, bakamujinga, bakamujika mu nsubu wandi mu Lama
Muntu kena udiangatshila buneme ebu nkayandi, kadi udi ubuangata hakabikidibueye kudi Nzambi bu muakabikidibua Alona kabidi
Nunku wadia bidia ebi ne wanua luhanza lua Mukelenge ne budiavi, neahile bua mubidi ne mashi bia Mukelenge
Kadi yeye wakahua, kakamba dî
Ujidile tshilambuilu matuku muanda mutekete bua kujimija mibi yonsu idiku
Ndayi kusomba mu ditunga dimvua mulaye Abrahame, Izake ne Yakobe

Bobo nebabange ku tshidimu tshiakudihaneye nebabale bungi bua bidimu tô ne halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, mushinga wa kudihikula n au newikale bu bungi bua bidimu biakashaleye handi bu muena mudimu
Yaele wakaluhuka bua kusangakena ne Sisela, wakamuambila ne, Buelamu, mukelenge wanyi, ubuele munu, kutshinyi
Nunku ubamanyishe bua malu a tshinyangu a batatu babo
Yehoaza wakadila kudi Yehowa ne Yehowa wakamunvuila; bualu bua yeye wakatangila dikenga dia Bena Isalele diakabakengeshabo n adi kudi mukelenge wa Sulia
Neanunyenge tshia dikumi tshia maminu enu ne tshia tumuma tuenu tua nvinyo, neatshidie kudi tuhita tuandi ne kudi bahika bandi
Maweja Nangila kubabutula, bualu bavua bapepeje ditunga adi
Hakadibo kaba kale ne nsubu wa Mika, bantu bakadi bashikama mu nsubu ya ha buihi ne nsubu wa Mika bakadisangisha hamue, bakihatshila Bena Dana
Yeye wakumukaku, wakaya ku Betele: hakadiye uya mu nshila, bana ba balume bakaluhuka mu musoko, bakamuseka, bakamuambila ne, Banda biebe, muena lubala

Bana ba Gada ku bikondo biabo, ku meku abo, ku nsubu ya batatu abo, bungi bua mena abo, ku bidimu makumi abidi tô ne ha mutu, bakamanya mua kuya mu nvita; bakabala ba mu tshisamba tshia Gada binunu makumi anai ne bitanu ne nkama isambombo ne makumi atanu
Diba diabuedi tshiyole tshia nzala mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, bena Ejipitu kulomba biakudia kudi mukalenga wabu
Bana betu bonso ba mu Kilisto badi banutumina muoyo

Bakanyunguluka ne mei a lukuna kabidi, Nansha meme mubanange, badi bambanda hatuhu; Bakumpingashila malu mabi ku malu mimpe kabidi, Sungula biebe muntu mubi bua kuikaleye ku mutu kuandi; Hamulumbuluishabo, aluhuke mu tshilumbuluidi mumane kuhila, Matuku andi ikale manya manya; munga muntu angate butangidi Bana bandi bikale bana ba nshiya, Bana bandi bikale bena tshiendenda, balombe biabo bintu
Yeye wakimita difu kabidi, wakalela muana wa bakashi
Kolinto Kadi nakadisunguila bualu ebu munda muanyi bua meme tshilu kunudi kabidi ne kanyinganyinga
Ba mu Italia badi banutumina muoyo
Ubasuike mikaba, ubase kabidi ne bifulu ku mutu

Lamentations Monai musoko wakadi tente ne bantu Yeye udi udila bikole bufuku, Bakuya ne Yuda mu buhika bua kuikaleye ne dikenga Nshila ya ku Siona idi idila muadi, Bamukengeshi bakumutshimuna, Bulengele buonso bua muana mukashi wa Siona Mu matuku a makenga andi ne a kanyinganyinga kandi Yelushalema wakenzela Nzambi bibi, Bukoya buandi buakadi ku bilulu biandi; Muena lukuna wandi wakuhaula Bantu bandi bonso badi hatua mikemu Monai, nuenu honso badi bahita mu nshila, Ku muaba wandi wa mu diulu yeye wakatuma kahia hanshi, Mibi yanyi yakusuikibua Mukelenge wakuyisha bena nvita banyi bakole bonso Bua malu â onso udi ndila; Siona udi wolola bianza biandi ne kakuena mumusambi; Yehowa udi mubinge, Nakubikila banangi banyi, Yehowa, tangila biebe, bualu bua ndi mu ntatu, Bakunvua mundi ntua mikemu, Mibi yabo yonso imueneke ku mesu kuebe, Lamentations Mona mudi Mukelenge mubuikile muana mukashi wa Mukelenge wakubutula nsubu yonso ya Yakoba, Yeye wakuhempa lusengu luonso lua Isalele Wakunana buta buandi bu mudi umena lukuna wenza, Mukelenge wakulua bu muena lukuna, Wakusasula tshitendelelu tshiandi ku bukole, tshitandatanda tshia mu budimi; Mukelenge wakuhidia tshioshelu tshiandi, Yehowa wakahangidisha bualu bua kubutula Bibi biandi biakubuela mu buloba; Bakulu ba muana mukashi wa Siona Mesu anyi adi mûle tente ne binsonshi, Hatshidibo baleuka mu misesu Nenkuambile tshinyi, nenkuidikishe ne tshinyi, Bua bualu buebe baprofete bebe bakumona Bantu bonso badi bahita mu nshila Bena lukuna bebe bonso bakubutula mukana muabo Yehowa wakuenza bualu ebu buakuhangidisheye bua kuenza; Mitshima yabo yakadila kudi Mukelenge, Juka, asa muadi mu butuku, Yehowa, utangile uwakuenzela mudiye

Eu nyeye wakafundabo ne, Bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Munkatshi mua bakalelabo kudi bakashi kamuakubika mukuabo mutambe Yone Mubanji; kadi udi mutambe bonso bukese mu bukelenge bua mu diulu udi mumutambe yeye
Wakamba ne, Bialua Esau ku tshisumbu tshimue bua kutshishiha, tshisumbu tshikuabo netshihanduke
Hakadiye mu ntatu nunku yeye wakakeba Yehowa Nzambi wandi, wakatamba kudihuekesha ku mesu kua Nzambi wa bankambua bandi
Nuenu nenulame tshitendelelu ne tshioshelu, nunku mulau mukuabo kaukuatshi Bena Isalele
Nanku muntu ewu kena mupie mikiya nansha
Acts Hatuakumuka ne buatu, bamane kuhanduluka n abo, tuakaya balulame tô ne ku Kosa; hakatshiabu, nakafika ku Lodo; tuakumukamu, nakuya ku Palala

Kadi Sihona, mukelenge wa Heshebona, wakahidia bua tuetu tuhite mu buloba; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanyengabasha meji andi, wakakolesha mutshima wandi, bualu bua kumufila mu tshianza tshienu, bu muakenzeye lelu
Kadi musangishi wa mulambu wakimana ha bule, kakasua kuambula mpala mulu, wakadikuma mu tshiadi, wakamba ne, Nzambi, ndi muntu mubi, unfue luse
Kununganaye wamba ne: Nansha bantu bikale anu ne meji mabi biangatshile ku buana buabu, kadi tshiena ntshipa buloba kabidi bua buenzayi bua muntu

Bikalaku kakui dibika dia bafue, Kilisto kena muanze kubishibua kabidi; ne bikala Kilisto kai muanze kubishibua ku bafue, nunku kuamba kuetu kua dî dia Nzambi kudi hatuhu, ne ditabusha dienu didi hatuhu kabidi
Nuele ba mu nsubu wa Alistobulo muoyo

Kadi biwamona ne, Kulua n anyi ku Babulona kakuena kuimpe, wanji kushala; tangila, buloba buonso budi ku mpala kuebe; udi mua kuya ku muaba wonso udi umueneka ku mesu kuebe bu muaba muimpe ne mukumbane
Badi mu Yudaya mu tshikondo atshi banyemene ku mikuna; badi mu musoko bahatuke; badi mu ntshiamba kabahinganyi mu musoko
Hashishe mutshi eu newikaleku bua muntu kuwosha mu kahia
Mu muanda eu tudi bamanye ne tuetu tutu tuikala munda muandi, ne yeye utu wikala munda muetu, bualu bua wakutuha diha dia Nyuma wandi
Hakashikishabo mei â, bualu buakadi bukole kudibo bua kukanda bantu ne, Kanutushihedi nyama
Mukelenge wakatuma dî bua kubikila Shimei, wakamuambila ne, Asa nsubu webe mu Yelushalema, ushikamemu, kuhatuki bua kuya kuntu nansha
Mutshima wandi udi uditekela malu a bunsonge
Wakafunda mu mukanda nunku ne, Uteke Uliya ku mpala hadi nvita mikole, umushiyeku, bamushihe, afue biandi
Hakayabo mu nsubu, bayidi bandi bakamukonka bualu ebu kabidi
Hashishe yeye wakamba ne, Nzambi angenzele nunku ne malu makuabo ha mutu kabidi biashala mutu wa Elisha, muana wa Shafata, ham bidi handi lelu
Bumuka mu Almone Diblatayime, kuyabu ku mikuna ya Abarime, ivua mitangilangane ne mukuna wa Nebo
Yeye wakalua ha diba adi, wakasakidila Nzambi, wakambila bonso bakadi batekemene buhikudi bua Yelushalema bualu buandi

Kabakatangila bualu buakenzeye Datana ne Abilama, bana balume ba Eliaba, muana mulume wa Lubena; muakabulula buloba mukana muabu, buakabamina, ne ba mu nsubu yabo, ne ntenta yabo ne bintu biabo bionso bia muoyo munkatshi mua Bena Isalele

Mukanda wakafika kudiye mutume kudi muprofete Eliya ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Davidi tatu ebe, udi wamba ne, Bualu bua wewe kuena wenda mu nshila ya Yehoshafata tatu ebe, ne ya Asa mukelenge wa Yuda, kadi udi wenda mu nshila ya bakelenge ba Isalele, wakenzesha Bena Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema malu a masandi bu muakenza ba mu nsubu wa Ahaba, ne bualu bua wewe wakashiha bana benu ba mu nsubu wa tatu ebe bakadi bakuhita buakane; mona, Yehowa neatume tshihuhu tshikole kudi bantu bebe ne kudi bana bebe ne kudi bakashi bebe ne kudi bintu bionso biudi n abi; disama dikole nedikukuate munda muebe, tô ne hahatuka maja ebe onso bualu bua disama edi ku dituku ku dituku
Diku edi divua ne bantu balume
Bakamuambila ne, Wewe udi muhale
Bualu ebu buakenjibua; bualu bua yeye wakabika ne dinda dionso, wakakama miosa, wakanyenga mume wakadi mu miosa, dilonga dîa kûla tente ne mai
Tusulu tua mai ne misulu mikuabo nebikale ha mutu ha mukuna mule wonso ne ha mutu ha mukuna muihi wonso, mu dituku dia kushiha kunene, huhuka bibumba
Nudi bamanye ngasa wa Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto ne, Yeye wakadi mubanshi, kadi wakalua muhele bua bualu buenu, bua nuenu nulue babanshi ku buhele buandi

Dutelonone Misoko ya Kunyemena Hashiha Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bisamba abi bia mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, hanuabihata, hanuaslukama mu misoko yabo ne mu nsubu yabo, nenuditahuluile misoko isatu mu buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
LUENDU LUA BENA IZRAYELE MU TSHIPELA Mayi a bululu Moshe kumuka ne bena Izrayele ku Mayi manene makunze, kuya mu tshipela tshia Shure
Tshimuangi Bilamba bia batuangaji Wambile mukuluebe Arone ne bana bende ba balume: Nadabe, Abihu, Elazare ne Itamare, ubumushe munkatshi mua bena Izrayele, bua bangenzele mudimu wa butuangaji
Bakadi ha buihi ne Yesu, hakamonabo ne bualu buakadi ha kulua, bakamuebesha ne, Mukelenge, tubatahe ne muele, anyi
Pashishe wambile bena Izrayele, bafile pabu mbuji wa mpumbu kudi Maweja Nangila bu mulambu wa kukobolola nawu bantu
Mukelenge amanye biandi kabidi ne, Bikala musoko muashibue ne ngumbu mijadikibue, kabena bafila milambu ne bia bungend a mushinga ne mpunga; nunku neunyanyishe luhetu lua hakelenge
Hakaya batuadi ba mushete wa Yehowa mutantshi wa makasa asambombo, bakashihela Yehowa ngombe ne muana wa ngombe
Yesu wakabambila kabidi ne, Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Meme ndi mushiku wa mbelu wa mikoko
Nunku nebalumbuluishibue ku dituku didi Nzambi ulumbulula malu masokome a bantu kudi Yesu Kilisto, bu mudi lumu luimpe luanyi luamba
Yehowa wakamba ne, Binasangana bantu bakane makumi atanu mu musoko wa Sodoma, nensungile musoko wonso bua bualu buabo
Bialenga muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi munga muntu tshianza diambedi yeye kayi muanze kuowa bianza biandi, yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe ne mai, neikale ne bukoya tô ne dilolo

Yeye wakaubala mu muaba mubaluluke wakadi ku mpala kua tshibi tshia ku luseke lua mai, ku dinda tô ne ku munda munya, ku mpala kua balume ne bakashi ne kua bonso bakadi ne matshu a kunvua; bantu bonso bakateleja matshu abo ku mei a mu mukanda wa mikenji
Nuenu kanuena nulumbuluisha badi mu ekelesia, anyi
Kadi meme nakunuambila dî dianyi, mbika bianyi ne lunkelu bua kunuambiladi, kanuena nungunvuila
Nunku masalayi akangata Paulo, bu muakâmbilabo, akalua n andi mu butuku tô ne ku Antipati
Kadi tshinudi n atshi, nutshikuate bikole tô ne hanalua
Ndi ndijidila bua bualu buabo, bua bobo kabidi bikale bajidila mu bulelela
Bualu bua mukelenge wakadianjila kuhunga dî ne bantu banene ne bantu bonso ba bu Yelushalema bua kudiabo bidia bu disanka dia kuhita kua Yehowa mu ngondo muibidi
Monai, Mose ne Eliya bakamueneka kudibo bayikila n andi
Kadi tshilambuilu tshia mabaya etshi, katshi vua ne tshintu munda to
Bualu bua Manoa kakamanya ne, Yeye udi muanjelo wa Yehowa
Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe ne: Ipatayi muntu awu mu mitanda
Davidi wakamba ne, Nenfuile Hanuna, muana wa Nahasha, luse, bualu bua tatu wandi wakadi n anyi luse
Tshituha tshihi nennuhongoluele tshiji tshianyi tshikole, nemmane difik a munda dianyi kunudi; nennulumbuluishe bu mudi bienzedi bienu, nennuhingashile difutu bua malu enu onso a bundu
Matuku awu kanuenji midimu mikuabu to, anu ya kulamba biakudia
Meme Yone nyeye wakunua ne wakatangila malu â

Bualu budi Bena Isalele ne Bena Lewi n abu mbua kulua ne milambu ya bintu bidibo bakuha bia blé ne ya nvinyo mihia mihia ne ya manyi mu nsubu idi bintu bia tshijila, ne kudi bakuidi badi benza mudimu, ne kudi batuadi ne kudi bimbi ba misambu; katuena tulekela nsubu wa Nzambi wetu
Nebamusokoke mu tshimenga tshia kunyemena, bua musombuedianganyi kamushipi to
Ba mu musoko mukuabo nebaye ku mukuabo bamba ne, Tuyai lukasa bua kulengesha ne Yehowa, ne bua kukeba Yehowa wa misumba
Davidi wakaya, yeye ne bantu bandi nkama isambombo bakadi n andi tô ne hakafikabo ku kasulu ka Besô, kuakashala bantu bakuabo ku nyima
Davidi wakatuma bantu kudi Abigayila bua kumuangateye bu mukashi wandi

Olodonase mushintakajila ngenyi mu Tshipangu tshia baminisitila udi ushindika bulongolodi, ngenzelu wa mudimu wa Bukalenga bunene ne mishindu ya dikwatshishangana pankatshi pa Mulombodi wa Ditunga ne Bukalenga bunene pamwe ne pankatshi pa beena Bukalenga bunene
Kadi mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu uvua anu ne tshitunu

Dituku adi Yesu wakandamuna dî, wakamba ne, Tatu Wanyi, Mukelenge wa diulu ne wa buloba, ndi nkusakidila bualu bua wewe wakusokoka bena meshi ne bena budimu malu â, wakuasokolola kudi bana bakese; bulelela, Tatu, bua bualu ebu buakadi buimpe ku mesu kuebe
Tshisamba kai tshidi ne mikenji ne mei majalame bu mikenji ei yonso inakateka ku mpala kuenu lelu
Uvua mutulombe bua tufike ne muanetu awu bua wewe kumumona
Yoshua Buhianyi buibidi buakadi bua tshisamba tshia Bena Shimeona ku meku abo, buhianyi buabo buakadi munkatshi mua buhianyi bua Bena Yuda
Yeye wakadisangisha bantu kudiye, wakalua kapitene kabo, bakabashiha Davidi mu Soha; hashishe, bakaya ku Damaseke, bakashikamamu, ne yeye wakakokesha mu Damaseke
Biasanganabo muibi mubuele mu nsubu ne biamukumabo ne biafueye, kabena benze mushiku bualu
Wakamutendekena ne, Umusha demon munda mua muan anyi

Bena Isalele bakenza mu musokoko malu akadi kâyi mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wabo; bakadiashila bitendelelu mu misoko yabo yonso ku tshibumba tshia batentekedi tô ne ku misoko yakadi ne ngumbu; bakadijadikila makunshi ne Bashela ku mutu kua mikuna yonso ne muinshi mua mitshi mibishi yonso
Nzambi ya bisamba bia bantu biakubutula batatu banyi, Bena Gozana ne Bena Halana ne Bena Lesefe ne Bena Edene bakadi mu Telasâ, yakabasungila, anyi
Davidi wakamanya ne, Nzambi wakunjadika mukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Isalele; bualu bua bukelenge buandi buakadi bubandishibue kulu bua bantu bandi Bena Isalele
Mukelenge wakashiya bakashi bahika babakibue dikumi bua kulamabo nsubu
Wakadi mushikame ne muloho munene, dina diandi Sêgio Paulo, muntu wa lungenyi

Nunku hanuadisangisha, kanuena bamanye mua kudia bidia bia Mukelenge; bualu bua hanuadia, muntu ne muntu udi udianjila kudia bidia biandi ku mpala kua bakuabo; ne mukuabo udi ne nsala, ne mukuabo udi mukuatshike maluvu
Hakahinganeye, yeye wakela mpungi ku mikuna ya mu Efelayima: ne Bena Isalele bakahueka n andi bafume ku mikuna, yeye wakaya ku mpala kuabo
Esau wakamuebesha ne, Tshisumbu atshi tshinene tshmakusangakena n atshi mu nshila ntshia bualu kai

Wakabambila ne, Nakutamba kusua bua kudia n enu bidia ebi bia Kuhita kua Yehowa, diambedi tshi muanze kukenga; ndi nuambila ne, Tshiona ndia bintu ebi kabidi tô ne hashikishabo malu onso mu bukelenge bua Nzambi
Bualu bua bonso bakenza malu mabi, ne badi bahanga kuheta butumbi kudi Nzambi
Ba bana ba Hebelone; Yeliya wakadi kahita, Amalia muibidi, Yahaziele muisatu, Yekamama muinai

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nenjadike tshihungidi tshinakubunga n ebe, ne neumanye ne, Ndi Yehowa; bua wewe uvuluke, ukuatshike bundu, bua wewe kubuludi mukana muebe kabidi kashidi, bualu bua bundu nebukukuate, hanashikisha kukubuikidila malu mabi onso awakuenza
Bena lukuna banyi bonso nebafuishibue bundu, nebikale ne buowa bukole

Hakahanduluka Lota, Yehowa wakambila Abalama ne, Bandisha mesu ebe ha muaba ûdi muimane, utangile ku nôde ne ku sude ne ku esete ne ku wesete, buloba buonso bûdi umona nenkuhebu ne tunkanunuina tuebe tshiendelele
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Mona, mu musoko eu mudi muntu wa Nzambi, bantu bonso badi bamutumbisha; malu onso adiye wamba adi alua malelela; tuye bietu kudiye, yeye atujinguluile ku luendu kutuyaya

Mikenji ya bena Levi Malu makuabu tuasakidila: Mushinga wa malaya Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele mikenji idi ilonda eyi ne: Padi muntu mulaye Maweja Nangila bua kumulambula muntu, udi mua kukumbaja dilaya diende pa kufuta bungi kampande bua nkanu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, pa mutu pa muntu awu: bilondeshile mishinga eyi: Bua muntu mulume wa bidimu makumi abidi too ne ku makumi asambombu, nebafute Maweja Nangila nkanu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole makumi atanu, bilondeshile tshipimu tshia nkanu tshia muaba wa tshijila
Hanashikisha kubajula, nengalukile kudibo ne nembafuile luse, nembahingashe tshiakabidi, muntu ne muntu ku buhianyi buandi, muntu ne muntu ku buloba buandi
Meme kujikamu kabidi Leya
Muprofete kai wakadi bankambua benu kabai bamukengeshe
Mukelenge amanye biandi kabidi ne, Bikala musoko muashibue ne ngumbu mijadikibue, kabena bafila milambu ne bia bungend a mushinga ne mpunga; nunku neunyanyishe luhetu lua hakelenge
Kadi ndi nnuambila mpindiu ne, Kebai diakalengele kudi Nzambi bua yeye atuleshe luse luandi; bua muanda eu unuakuenza ku bianza bienu, yeye neanuanyishe ne disanka, anyi
Bobo bakalumbuluila bantu bilumbu matuku onso, bakalua ne bilumbu bikole kudi Mose, ne bobo bakakosa bilumbu bikese
Hashika disama dia muntu udi tufina tuhatuka mu mubidi wandi, nebamubadile matuku muanda mutekete bua kumulengesha, ne yeye neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neadioweshe mu mai a mueji, neikale muakane
Utupe biakudia, tushale bapika ba mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu
Nanku tshiena mua kuenzela Mvidi Mukulu bibi, kubunda tshibawu bunene nunku
Nuenu nudi bamanyi banyi ne nakamba ne, Tshiena Kilisto, kadi nakutumibua ku mpala kuandi
Hilama wakatumina Solomo dî ne, Nakunvua dî diwakuntumina, nengenze malu onso awakuamba bua mitshi ya cèdre ne ya cyprès
Kadi bintu bia nyuma kabiena bia kumudilu, anu bintu bia mubidi; hashishe, bintu bia nyuma bidi bilonda

Kadi meme hanyi nembuele mu nsubu muebe Yehowa, undombole mu buakane buebe Bualu bua kakuena mei mukana muabo atudi mua kueyemena, miminu yabo idi bu nkita mibulula, Nzambi, ubahishe; Nunku bonso badi banyemena kudi basanke, Bualu bua wewe, Yehowa, udi uvudishila muntu muakane disanka; Misambu Yehowa, kumbedi mu tshiji tshiebe, Yehowa, unfuile luse, bualu bua ndi ngamba kuteketa; Mutshima wanyi udi unyingalala bikole

Nanku nuambuluishe bena Izrayele bakuabu, too ne pikala Maweja Nangila mubafikishe mu ditunga didiye ubapesha didi dishiya, luseke ludi diba dibuelela lua musulu wa Yardene, bua kupetabu dikisha bu munudi bapete nuenu
Ebu mbualu bua hatuhu ne mudimu wa lutatu
Muntu yonso udi utuala mubidi mufue wa nyama ei, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neikale ne bu koya tô ne dilolo, nyama ei idi mibi kunudi
Hashishe, nebamone muana wa muntu ulua mu matutu ne bukole buandi bunene ne butumbi buandi
Kayey eu wakumiaminabo kukala kua nshila
Katataka ya kuebe, nakadi ngelangana meji bua kukuha butumbi bunene, kadi mona, wewe wakubavudishila butumbi ebu
Nunku meme nennutume mu buhika mu buloba budi buhita Damaseke kule
Dituku dikuabu, padi bana benu banukonka ne: Maweja Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu wetu, mmunuelele meyi ne mikenji ebi bua tshinyi
Hashishe, yeye neakule n abo mu tshiji tshiandi, Meme hanyi nakujadika Mukelenge wanyi ha mutu ha Siona, mukuna wanyi wa tshijila
Yesu wakakonka ne, Bantu dikumi kabena balengeshibue, anyi
Meme ke uvua munupatule mu ditunga dia Ejipitu, munufikishe mu ditunga dia Kenaane, bua ngikale Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu
Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Uheshe bakuidi ba Bena Lewi, tunkanunuma tua Sadoka, badi ha buihi n anyi bua kunkuatshila mudimu, mulum a ngombe bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Bakenza bilulu bia bleu ne bikunzubile ne bikunze kunzu bia kuenza n abi mudimu mu muaba wa tshima, bakenzela Alona bilulu bia tshijila bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Ha buihi ne muaba au hakadi madimi a muntu mimene, mukelenge wa tshisenga, dina diandi Popolio, wakatubuesha mu nsubu muandi, wakatuenzela bimpe matuku asatu
Bakamukonka ne, Muyishi, malu â nealue dituku kai
Isaka wakambila Abalahama, tatu andi ne, Tatu wanyi, yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku, muan anyi Isaka wakamba ne, Tangila kalua ne nkunyi bidiku, kadi muana wa mukoko wa kuosha ha kalua weba
Yonatana wakambila Davidi ne, Tshionso tshidi mutshima webe musue, nenkuenzele tshi

Ônana wakambila Davidi ne, Utshiangate, mukelenge wanyi enze biandi malu adi mimpe ku mesu kuandi; mona, ndi nkuha ngombe ya mulambu wa kuosha ne mitshi ya mu tshihehuidi bua nkunyi ne blé bua mulambu wa bukula; ndi nkuha bionso
Kadi Udi Mutambe Bunene wa mu diulu kena usomba mu nsubu mibaka ne bianza; bu muakamba muprofete ne, Diulu didi nkuasa wanyi wa butumbi, Tshianza tshianyi katshiakenza bintu ebi bionso, anyi
bipupu;
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Meme ndi bianyi dibisha, ndi bianyi muoyo; udi ungitabusha, nasha biafueye, neikale ne muoyo kabidi; muntu yonso udi ne muoyo, udi ungitabusha, kena ufua tshiendelele
Mukumu wonso wa mulangala wa mulau udi Yehowa umukuma n au newikale ne tshiona tshia makasa ne nzenze; nealue kudibo ne diboko diela mulu, utshintshila bua kuluangana n abo
Wakambila kapitene kakuabo ne, Ndi n ebe dî

Bibaki ba lumbu ne batuadi ba bintu bakadiangatshila bintu bia nvita; muntu ne muntu wakenza mudimu ne tshianza tshimue, wakakuata bintu bia nvita mu tshianza tshikuabo; bibaki ba lumbu muntu ne muntu wakadi ne muele wandi wa nvita mubuesha mu mukaba; bakenza mudimu nunku
Ebu mbuhianyi bua tshisamba tshia Bena Efelayima ku meku abo; ne bimenga biakatahuluilabo Bena Efelayima munkatshi mua buhianyi bua Bena Manashe; ne bimenga bionso ne misoko yabi
Bamushipe
Kanulumbuluishi ne kansungansunga
Muakuidi neafue munu wandi mu mashi makuabo, neâlabe ku nsengu ya ku tshioshelu tshia kahia, neahongolole mashi onso makuabo ku tshitaku tshia tshioshelu
Nunku muele wa mata kawena umuka ku nsubu kuebe tshiendelele bualu bua wewe wakandengulula, wakangata mukashi wa Uliya, Muena Hiti, bu mukashi webe
Ubiteke mu tshisaka tshimue, ulue n abi mu tshisaka ne muana wa ngombe ne bimpanga bibidi
Tama wakaya, wakashikama mu nsubu wa tatu andi
Yeye neanutumine masama onso a mu Ejipitu anuakatshina; masama au neanulamate nuenu

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wewe kuena muntu unakambila bantu malu ebe mu matuku a kale, bantu banyi baprofete ba Bena Isalele, bakadi bamba mei abo mu matuku au tô ne ku bidimu bia bungi, babalesha mundualua n ebe bua wewe kubaluisha, anyi
Bobo bakahua
Hakadi Davidi uyikila n abo, mona, tshilobo, Muena Peleshete wa mu Gata, dina diatshi Goleyata, tshiakumuka munkatshi mua Bena Peleshete, tshiamba mei bu muakuambatshi diambedi; ne Davidi wakûnvua
Hakadia Yeholama bukelenge bua tatu andi ne hakadikolesheye, yeye wakashiha bana babo bonso ne muele wa nvita ne bantu banene bakuabo kabidi hakadi mu Isalele

Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, yeye neabeye nsuki yandi yonso idi ku mutu wandi ne muedi wandi ne makiki andi ne miosa yandi yonso, neuvuwe bilulu biandi, neoweshe mubidi wandi ne mai, neikale muakane

Kadi mukashi ne mukashi nealombe mukashi udi ushikama ha buihi n andi, ne mukashi udi ushikama mu nsubu wandi, bintu bia argent ne bia or ne bilulu, nuenu nenubiluatshishe bana benu ba balume ne bana benu ba bakashi, nunku nenuhaule Bena Ejipitu
Palo Wakabikila Mose ne Alona, wakamba ne, Nundombele Yehowa, yeye umushe biula kundi ne kudi bantu banyi, nendekele bantu baye kushihela Yehowa nyama
Kadi mutshi wa nfigi wakayambila ne, Nshiya kushemakana kuanyi ne mamuma anyi mimpe bua kuya kuhehukahehuka ku mutu kua mitshi mikuabo, anyi
Bobo bakanyingalasha mutshima wa Isaka ne wa Lebeka
Miselayima wakalela Ludima ne Anamima ne Lehabima ne Nafetuhima ne Patalusima ne Bena Kasaluha nkambua wa Bena Peleshete ne Bena Kafetô
Kupinganaye mu ditunga dia Kenaane, muaba uvua tatuende Izake musombe
Yoshua Misoko ya Bena Lewi Kul
Yeye wakabakonka ne, Bualu kai nudi nuenza malu â
Davidi udi mumanye mua kukuambila mei kai makuabo bua butumbi buwakuvuisha muntu webe
Nuenu nkayenu nudi bajadike muvua Maweja Nangila munuambule, bu mudi muntu wambula muanende mu njila, too ne munudi bafike muaba ewu
Mukalu wa Bena Lubena wakadi musulu wa Yadene ne mukalu wau
Mulau wa Midima Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Olola tshianza tshiebe mulu, midima ikale mu buloba bua Ejipitu, bantu babubute mu midima
Bialala mukashi ne nyama, nebashihe mukashi ne nyama kabidi, mashi abi neikale ham bidi habi
Aba bonso bakadi bana ba balume ba Yediele bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo bena nvita ba dikima binunu dikumi ne muanda mutekete ne nkama ibidi bakadi ne bukole bua kuluangana nvita
Ehuda wakabuela muakadiye; yeye wakadi mushikame nkayandi mu nsubu wakadi kulu mu muaba mialala
Bikala muntu ne nsala, adie biandi kuandi, bua kanudisangishi bua kulumbuluishibua
Nunku balume bakashikama, bakadi bu binunu bitanu
Bantu kai bakumpa dî dia Nzambi diakalua kudibo munkatshi mua kahia, bu munuakadiunvua, ne bakikala ne muoyo
Hashishe Abashaloma wakamba ne, Biwahidia kuya, ndi nkusengelela ne, Witabushe bua muan etu Amenona aye n etu
Bualu bua mudimu wandi ne wabo wakadi muomumue, wakadi ushikama n abo, bakadi benza mudimu, bua bakadi benji ba nsubu ya bilulu
Nunku nakaya ku musulu wa Pelata, nakumbula, nakangata mukaba mu muaba unakausokoka; ne, monai, mukaba wakumana kunyanguka, kawakadi ne mudimu kabidi

Wakajadika makunshi au ku mbalanda wa ntempelo; wakajadika dikunshi dia ku tshianza tshia balume, wakadidika dina ne, Yakina; wakajadika dikuabo dia ku tshianza tshia bakashi, wakadidika dina ne, Boaza
Biakudia abi nebiambuluishe bantu badi mu Ejipitu mu bidimu muanda mutekete bia tshiyole

Nunku Bena Lewi bakasungula Hemana, muana wa Yoele; ne ba bana babo, Asafa, muana wa Belekiya; ne ba bana ba Melali, Etana, muana wa Kushaya; ne bana babo ba mu mulongo muibidi, Zekâya ne Bena ne Yaziele ne Shemilamota ne Yehiele ne Uni ne Eliaba ne Benaya ne Mâseya ne Matitiya ne Elifelehu ne Mikeneya ne Obeda edome ne Yiele, balami ba ku bibi
Kumubuelelaye mu nzubu

Hashishe, Zelubabela, muana wa Shalatiele, ne Yoshua, muana wa Yehosadaka, muakuidi wa ha mutu ha bakuabo, ne bantu bonso bakadi bashala, bakatumikila dî dia Nzambi wabo, ne mei a muprofete Hagai, bualu bua Yehowa Nzambi wabo, wakamutuma; ne bantu bakadi batshina ku mpala kua Yehowa
Ne monai, nansha muetu umue wa mu tshitudilu tshia Yabesha gilada wakalua ku disangisha
Bualu bua bakahunga dî bua kulua hohamue bua kudila n andi ne bua kumusamba
Mu dipingana diende, muena mudimu wa Abrahame kuya lubilu kumpala kuende, umulomba ne: Bu wewe musue, mpeshaku mayi a kunua
Nuvuluke ngondo wa Abiba bua kutendelela kuhita kua Yehowa wenu; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, wakanuhatula mu buloba bua Ejipitu butuku mu ngondo wa Abiba
Davidi wakashikama mu musoko wa lumbu, bakawidika ne, Musoko wa Davidi
Diba adi nenshishe kuya
Mukelenge mukuabo wakamukonka ne, Muyishi Muimpe, nengenze tshinyi bua kuhiana muoyo wa tshiendelele
Bua tshiena musue kunutangila katataka mu dihita dianyi dia mu nshila, bua ndi ntekemena bua kushala n enu musangu, bitabusha Mukelenge
Mai akadi mu mulondo akashika, ne yeye wakaladika muana muinshi mua katshi kasase

Katataka nuenu nudi nuelangana meji bua kuhumbisha bukelenge bua Yehowa budi mu bianza bia bana ba Davidi; nuenu nudi tshisumbu tshinene, nudi ne bana ba ngombe ba or bakatulabo kudi Yalobama bu nzambi yenu

Habuela bakuidi mu muaba wa tshijila wa mu ntempelo, kababatukimu bua kubuela mu tshiendelu tshia ha mbelu diambedi kabayi banze kutekamu bilulu biakadibo baluata hakadibo benza mudimu wabo, bua bidi bia tshijila; badi ne bua kuluata bilulu bikuabo, hashishe badi bamanye mua kubuela mu luseke lua ntempelo ludi bantu bakuabo bamanye mua kubuela
Ngua bienzedi, anyi
Bualu bua bakahunga dî bua kulua hohamue bua kudila n andi ne bua kumusamba
Nuenu bapite mu njila, basangane disua dia nyunyi kulu kua mutshi nansha panshi, pikala nyunyi awu muladile, nansha mumane kutoya, kanumukuatshi musangu umue ne bana bende to
Nuipate bantu aba bonsu, balume ne bakaji, bua kabatampakaji mikiya mu mitanda yenu
Yeye wakabaheta, wakabambila mei au
Mumiaminyi udi umiamina dî dia Nzambi
Nomba Belâma wakambila Balaka ne, Ungashile bioshelu muanda mutekete, undongoluele balume ba ngombe muanda mutekete ne bimpanga muanda mutekete
Neamulombe kabidi bilamba bia kuvuala
Bakabakudimuna ne, Bifuanyikishi bia or bitanu bia masungu ne bifuanyikishi bia or bitanu bia mpuku bu bungi bua hakelenge ba Bena Peleshete, bualu bua dikenga diodimue diakanukuata ne bakelenge benu
Yehowa Nzambi wakatelela Adama ne mukashi wandi bivualu bia biseba, wakabaluatshishabi
Bu mudi butu kabuyi mua kumusha, boshe tshintu atshi
Yeye udi weyemena Nzambi; Nzambi amusungile, bikaleye mumusue; hualu bua yeye wakamba ne, Ndi Muana wa Nzambi
Kanuenji mvidie ya tshiamu bua kuyitendelela
Balami ba mikoko bakalua, bakabihata, kadi Mose wakabika, wakabasankisha, wakanuisha mikoko yabo mai
Kadi bua nuenu mimanye ne, Muana wa muntu udi ne bukole, hatshidiye ha buloba bua kujimisheye mibi yeye wakambila muena kaneke ne , Bika biebe, ambula bulalu buebe, uye ku nsubu kuebe
Wakatula nkanu mai ya kuteka ku matumba a tshintu atshi bua kubueshamu mitshi
Mu matuku au, hakakola Mose, yeye wakaya kudi bana babo, wakamona mudimu wabo mukole, wakamona Muena Ejipitu ukuma Muena Ebelu, muan abo

Kadi yeye nkayandi wakaya luendu lua dituku dimue mu tshihela, wakashikama hanshi muinshi mua mutshi wa genêt; wakalomba Nzambi bua kufueye, wamba ne, Kuakushika mpindiu, Yehowa angate muoyo wanyi, bualu bua meme tshiena muhite batatu banyi buakane
Tatu, utumbishe dina diebe

Kanubutshidi bintu bienu hanshi ha buloba hadi bishi ne dimoma bibibihisha, ne hadi bibi babumbula nsubu, babiba; di nuenu nubutshile bintu bienu nu diulu mudi kamui bishi ne dimoma bia kubibihisha, ne mudi kamui bibi ba kubumbula nsubu babiba; mutshima webe kabidi udi kudi bintu bia mu tshibutshilu tshiebe
Â mmeku a, Bena Lewi ku bikondo biabo
Ku nyima kuandi bakuidi, bantu ba ku Mpata, bakalongolola
Kings Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mutekete tshia bukelenge bua Peka, muana wa Lemalaya, Ahaza, muana wa Yotama, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakabanga kukokesha

Nyama ya mu tshihela neyisangakaneku ne nyama mikuabo idi idila, Tshihungulu netshienze disua diatshi, netshiele mayi, Nukebe dî edi mu mukanda wa Yehowa, nudibale; Yeye wakuyelela nshobo, Yeshaya Tshihela ne buloba bûme nebikale ne disanka; netshimeneshe bilongo bia bungi, Nukoleshe bianza bidi bitekete, Nuambile badi ne mitshima ikuma lubilu lubilu ne, Mu dituku adi mesu a mufofo matabale, Mu diba adi muntu mulema neatuhike bu ngulungu, Lusenga Tshibebe tshikaleku, ne nshila, Kakuena kuikalamu nyama wa ntambue, Bantu badi Yehowa muhikule nebahingane, Yeshaya Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshinai tshia bukokeshi bua mukelenge Hezikiya, Saneheliba, mukelenge wa Ashû, wakalua, wakaluangana ne bena misoko yonso ya ngumbu ya mu Yuda, wakayinyenga
Ndi nuambila ne, Nunku kabidi disanka didi ku mesu kua banjelo ba Nzambi bualu bua muntu umue mubi wakukudimuna mutshima wandi
Mitshima yenu kayinyingaladi, kanukuatshiki tshiji bualu bua nuenu nuakumpana kunoko; bualu bua Nzambi wakantumina ku mpala kuenu bua kusungila mioyo ya bantu
Kabena badihishisha bua kudifuisha bundu, anyi
Davidi wakambila Abigayila ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, wakukutuma kundi lelu, asankishibue
