Hakafikila dituku diakasungulabo, Helode wakaluata bilulu bia bukelenge, wakashikama ha nkuasa wa butumbi, wakadi ubambila mei mimpe
Mai akavulangana ha buloba matuku lukama ne makumi atanu
Malu onso anudi nuenza, nuenze ne mitshima yenu bu munudi nuenzela Mukelenge; kembu munudi nuenzela bantu; bualu bua nudi bamanye ne, Netuangate difutu dia buhianyi kudi Mukelenge

Muntu yonso udi munvue mei anyi â ne utu wâtumikila neikale bu muena meshi, wakibaka nsubu wandi ha mutu ha dibue; nvula yakaloka, misulu yakûla, bihuhu biakalua, biakadina ku nsubu, kadi nsubu kakuhuka, hua yeye wakadi muibaka ha dibue
Kadi bu muvua Rebeka muikale nkumba, Izake kutendelela Maweja Nangila bua mukajende awu alele muana
Nunku ku dituku adi wakajadika mei â bu mukenji mufunda ne mujalame kudi Bena Isalele tô ne ku dituku edi

Yehezekele Wewe, muana wa muntu, udiule Gogo, umuambile ne, Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Tangila, ndi n ebe tshilumbu, wewe Gogo, mukelenge wa Losha, Nenkuimanyike, nenkuendeshe ku bukole; nendue n ebe ku luseke lua kunfudilu kua nôde; nenkufikishe ha mikuna ya mu Isalele
Mabaya aa avua kabidi ne bitaku makumi anayi bia tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole
Ditumibwa dia ku makanda diônso didi tshianana
Yeye wakimita difu kabidi, wakalela muana wa bakashi

Wakimana, wakavudishila Bena Isalele bonso disanka, muele dî dikole ne, Yehowa wakaha bantu bandi Bena Isalele dikisha bu muakabalayeye atumbishibue; nansha dî dimue dia milayi yandi mimpe yonso yakalayeye muntu wandi Mose kadiakahona hanshi hatuhu
Neutukokeshe, anyi
Bualu bua tshiena nfua bundu bua lumu luimpe; bua ludi bukole bua Nzambi ku luhandu kudi muntu yonso udi witabusha, kudi Muena Yuda diambedi, ne kudi Muena Gelika kabidi
Biamba dikasa ne, Bualu bua tshiena tshianza, tshiena wa mubidi; bualu ebu kabuena budivuisha ne kadiena dia mubidi
Uye kusokoma ku mukuna bua kuvu kubutuka
Binuasua badi banusue, nenuikale ne difutu kai
Kadi bua kumuka ku Kadeshe Barneya, kufika ku musulu ewu, tuvua banenge mu njila bidimu makumi asatu ne muanda mukulu
Bualu kena muenze tshilema tshidi tshikumbanyine dinyoka dia lufu
Yeye wakasangisha n abo dî bua kubafuta muntu ndenalio umue muntu ndenalio umue ku dituku ku dituku, wakabatuma mu budimi buandi

Nunku bakulu bonso ba Bena Isalele bakatua kudi mukelenge mu Hebelone; Davidi wakahunga n abo tshihungidi mu Hebelone ku mpala kua Yehowa; bakela manyi ha mutu ha Davidi bua kuikaleye mukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Isalele, bu mu dî dia Yehowa diakambileye Samuele
Nanku, mutuangaji neakobolole bena Izrayele bonsu basange ntete bu pa tshibidilu
Musulu wa mai wakaluhuka mu Edene bua kumiamina midioko mai, wakahanduluka maboko anai
Biamona muntu muan abo wenza bualu bubi budi kabui bua lufu, nealombe Nzambi, yeye neamuhe mioyo ya badi benza bualu bubi budi kabui bua lufu
Yeye wakatuma Eleyakima, wakadi ku mutu kua nsubu wandi, ne Shebena secrétaire ne bakulu ba munkatshi mua bakuidi baluate bilulu bikayabala, kudi Yeshaya muprofete, muana wa Amoza

Bualu bua malu akadi mikenshi kayi ne kukole bua kuenza bua yakadi mitekete bua mibidi ya bantu, Nzambi, hakatumeye Muana wandi mene ne mubidi mufuane wa malu mabi, ne bua bualu bua bubi, wakahisha bubi mu mubidi; bua buakane budi mikenshi yamba bushikishibue munda muetu, badi kabai benda mu malu a mubidi, kadi badi benda mu malu a Nyuma

Nunku mbikidilai baprofete bonso ba Bâla ne batendeledi bandi bonso ne bakuidi bandi bonso: nansha umue wabo kashadi, bualu bua bundi n abu mbua kufila mulambu munene kudi Bâla; yonso washala kena wikala ne muoyo
Bakosha nsubu wa Nzambi ne kahia, bakashimbula ngumbu ya Yelushalema, bakosha mbalasa yau yonso ne kahia, bakahaula bintu bionso bia mushinga mukole
Nanku nebakunemeke
bietu bilengele, bu mutudi tuenda mu munya; katuendi mu manaya a tshianana ne mu bukuatshiki bua malulu, mu malu a bundu ne a bienzenza bia masandi, mu kutandangana ne mukau
Yehowa wakunyua mei enu hanuakadi basombe n anyi; ne Yehowa wakangambila ne, Nakunvua mei a bantu aba, akukuambilabo; mei onso akuambabo adi mimpe
Luseke lua kuinshi, luvua ne metre makumi atanu

Hashishe yeye wakambila Gehazi ne, Suika mukaba webe, wangate mulangala wanyi mu tshianza tshiebe, ya mu nshila webe; biwasangakena ne muntu, kumuedi muoyo nansha; biakuela muntu muoyo, kuitabi nansha; ya, uteke mulangala wanyi ha mpala ha muana Mamu wa muana wakamba ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo ne bu mudi mutshima webe ne muoyo, tshiena nkulekela
Umpe bakashi banyi ne bana banyi, banakakukuatshila mudimu, undekele, nenye, bualu bua wewe udi mumanye mudimu unakukuenzela
Tshianza tshia Yehowa tshiakadi kudi Bena Yuda bua kubavuisha mutshima umue, bua bobo batumikile mukenji wa mukelenge ne wa bantu bandi banene ku dî dia Yehowa
Dikenga ne kanyinganyinga nebikale kudi muntu yonso udi wenzenza malu mabi, kudi Muena Yuda diambedi ne kudi Muena Gelika kabidi
Bualu ebu buakafikisha Nzambi munda; nunku yeye wakashiha Bena Isalele bakuabo
Enza buatu nunku buludi buabu nebuikale coudées nkama isatu ne butshiama bua buatu nebuikale coudées makumi atanu ne bule buabu bua mulu nebikale coudées makumi asatu
Kuyilamikaye tshiamu tshia mpawungi bua kuambuilaku mesa
Bakandamana butumbi bua Nzambi udi kai unyanguka ku tshifuanyikishi tshia mubidi wa muntu udi unyanguka, ne tshia nyunyu, ne tshia nyama ya mikonu inai, ne tshia bintu bidi bidikoka hanshi

Muntu yonso udi ulua kundi, udi unvua mei anyi, udi wenza, nenuleshe udiye mufuanangane n andi; yeye udi mufuanangane ne muntu wakadi muibake nsubu, wakimba mutubu mule, wakateka bishimikidi ha mutu ha dibue dinene; hakûla musulu, wakakuma ku nsubu, kawakamanya mua kumutshikisha, bualu bua wakadi muibaka bimpe
Noba wakaya wakanyenga Kenata ne misoko mikuabo wakidika musoko wandi ne Noba, bu diba diandi
Mayi awu, kupanduluka bu tshimana ku dia balume, tshikuabu ku dia bakaji

Bu muvua Maweja Nangila mutshishe butuku abu bua kupatula bantu bende mu Ejipitu, ke mudi bena Izrayele pabu, ku ndelanganyi ne ndelanganyi, mua kutshisha dituku adi bua kuvuluka dipatuka diabu mu Ejipitu, bualu ndituku dia tshijila
Mbu mudi bukole bua bunzambi buandi, buakatuha bintu bionso bidi bua muoyo ne bua buimpe bua Nzambi, bualu bua kumanya kuetu kua yeye wakambikila bua butumbi buandi buine ne bua buimpe buandi
Ekesode Yetelo Udi Usomba ne Mose Yetelo, mubuki wa Midiyana, tatu muenu wa Mose, wakunvua malu onso akenzela Nzambi Mose ne Bena Isalele, bantu bandi, ne muakalua Yehowa ne Bena Isalele mu Ejipitu
Nunku Bena Isalele nebajidile dituku dia Lumingu ku bikondo biabo bionso bu tshihungidi tshia tshiendelele
Buloba budi budivuishila maminu nkayabu; diambedi mutoloko, ku nyima muehu, hashishe maminu manene ku muehu
Kadi Mukanda wa Nzambi udi wamba tshinyi
Tshiôtshi etshi tshidi tshianji kulekela ditangila dia tshilumbu etshi ne tshidi tshimanyisha Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu, mianda yônso mimanyika
Nunku tuakatambakana ha buloba
Bakangula bihesa bia bidia biakashala bisaka dikumi ne bibidi biule tente, ne bia mishiha kabidi

Madidishi mikale ne tubaya tutshiamakashe akadi mu bimanu bia nsubu ya bansentedi, mu miaba ya hankatshi ha nsubu ei, ne mu bimanu bia mbalanda, mu nseke yonso ya munda mua tshibuelelu, ne ha tshiluwa ne tshiluwa tshia tshibuelelu hakadi bifuanyikishi bia mabue a ngashi
Pikala Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu numusankishe ne bintu, bu nuwuaye mulaye, kanuakusomba makuta kudi muntu to
Yeye wakamba ne, Mulangala

Ngabilayi kwakalwa maalu Adi ku batoka ne bafika Adi munda mwa bukwadisamba Atonda bantu munda mwa micima wabo Bààbà wanyì, Bààbà Bààbà wanyì twambilayi kwa kalwa maalu Bààbà wanyì twambilayi kwa kalwa maalu Bààbà wanyì twambilayi kwa kalwa maalu Mu Budimi bwa Edena Adama ne Eva bateka Bwà kutangila difunkibwa Nzambi wanyì e Umwayi mwa kalwa maalu : Bwà kudia kwenba Adama ne ututena Kulela kwaba Eva ne umona maalu Cilwàlwa bununu
Matuku onso a Enosha akadi bidimu nkama tshitema ne bitanu, yeye wakafua biandi

Solomo kakabuesha Bena Isalele mu buhika kadi bobo bakadi bena nvita bandi ne bena mudimu bandi ne miloho yandi ne tupitene tuandi ne tuhita tua bena makalu andi ne tua bantu bakenda ha nyima ha tubalu tuandi
Pashishe, usuikakaje tukaba tudi ku tshilamba tshia efode
Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Nuenu nudi nuamba ne, Monai mudi bualu ebu butulonda
Nakakengesha Nshila eu tô ne ku lufu, nsuika balume ne bakashi, mbabuesha mu nsubu ya lukanu
Alona wakamba ne, Mukelenge wanyi, kuikadi ne tshiji tshikole, wewe udi mumanye bantu aba, badi ne mitshima yabo ku malu mabi
Kadi hakayabo bua kumubikila, kabakamusangana
Hakambeye kubuela mu musoko mukuabo, bena nsudi dikumi bakasangila n andi, bakadi bimane ha bule
Etshi ntshikondo tshia kuangata argent ne bilulu ne madimi a olive ne a tumuma tukese ne mikoko ne ngombe ne bena mudimu balume ne bena mudimu bakashi, anyi
Kadi bobo kabakamanya mei au, bakatshina mua kumukonka

Bialua muenyi wa munkatshi muenu mundi mubanji, ne bialua mukuenu udi ushikama hehi handi muntu muhele, biadihaneye kudiye anyi kudi mundi mukuabo wa mu diku diandi, hadihaneye, badi mua kumuhikula, umue wa bana babo udi mua kumuhikula, manseb andi anyi muana mulume wa manseb andi anyi muan abo mukuabo udi mua kumuhikula, bialueye muntu mubanji, yeye udi mua kudihikula
Kanuena ne diakalengele bishi
Nunku Abalama wakaya bu muakamba Yehowa, ne Lota wakaya n andi Abalama wakadi ne bidimu makumi muanda mutekete ne bitanu hakumukeye mu Halana
Mumusombuele pende: padiye mushipangane, numushipe pende
Maweja Nangila, ndi mutekemene lupandu kuudi
Yeye wakadi muinda utema ukenka; nuenu nuakitabusha bua kusanka mu dinkenka diandi musangu
Bisamba bia bantu bikukuatshile mudimu

Danyele Mu tshidimu tshia kumudilu tshia bukokeshi bua Beleshasa, mukelenge wa Babulona, Danyele wakalota tshilota, wakamona bikena kumona ku mutu wandi hakadiye mu bulalu buandi; hashishe, wakafunda tshilota tshiandi, utela malu onso akamoneye
Nanku tuyayi kubondakaja muakulu wabu, bua bapange mua kumyuangana munkatshi muabu
Pashishe, Arone kubajidila bua bikale bantu ba Maweja Nangila
Hatuakumukaku, tuakayila ku nyima kua Kupulio, bualu bua luhehele luakadi lutuhingisha
Mose wakaya mu tshitudilu, yeye ne bakulu ba Isalele
Nenuhatuke dituku edi mu ngondo wa Abiba
Wikale Mvidi Mukulu muambe ne: ke udi muibe awu, bua tshintu tshimue neafute bintu bibidi
Nyuma wakela dî bikole, wakahaluisha muana bikole, wakumuka munda muandi; muana wakadi bu muntu mufue; bantu ba bungi bakamba ne, Wafu
Zekâya Muanjelo wakadi uyikila n anyi wakalua kabidi, wakambisha bu mudibo babisha muntu ku tulu tuandi
Muakuidi wa Nzambi wakasungula balami ba nsubu wa Yehowa

Meme nakamana kulongolola bintu bia mu nsubu wa Nzambi wanyi ne bukole buonso bundi n abu, or ya bintu bia tshiamu tshia or, ne argent ya bintu bia tshiamu tshia argent, ne tshiamu tshia mitaku tshia bintu bia tshiamu tshia mitaku, ne tshiamu tshifike tshia bintu bia tshiamu tshifike, ne mitshi ya bintu bia mitshi; ne mabue a onyx ne mabue adibo balengesha n au bintu ne mabue a mishindu yonso ne mabue onso a mushinga mukole ne mabue manene matoke a bungi
Kanunu kabidi maluvu makole, panudi nusunguluja bintu bidi bia tshijila, ne bidi kabiyi bia tshijila, bidi ne mikiya, ne bidi kabiyi ne mikiya
Kabamutengudi
Yehoshafata wakambila mukelenge wa Isalele ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Udianjile kukonka dî dia Yehowa
Hezikiya wakangata mukanda mu bianza bia ba messager, wakaubala; Hezikiya wakabuela mu nsubu wa Yehowa, wakaubulula ku mpala kua Yehowa
Pashishe, wenze tshitata tshia tshiamu tshia mpawungi tshifuanangane ne tshilongu
Buloba budi bupeta tshitalela ku mayi a mvula
Nenkukuatshishe ne bintu bia ku tshihehudi anyi bia ku tshikaminu tshia tumuma, anyi

Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Neige ya ha mutu ha Lebanona Bualu bua bantu banyi bakumpua muoyo, Bua malu â badi bavuisha buloba buabo bu tshintu tshia kukuatshisha bakuabo buowa, Nembatangadishe ku mpala kua bena lukuna babo Mu diba adi bakamba ne, Luai, tuelele Yelemiya tshifufu; bualu bua mikenji kayena yumuka kudi muakuidi, meji kaena umuka kudi bena meji, ne dî kadiena diumuka kudi muprofete

Mu dilolo wakabuelamu, hakatshiabu yeye wakahingana mu nsubu muibidi wa bakashi mu bianza bia Shâshagaza, muntu mutungula wa mukelenge wakadi ulama bakashi bandi bahika bakabakeye; yeye kakadi ubuela kudi mukelenge kabidi bikala mukelenge kayi musanke bualu buandi, ne bikaleye kayi mumubikile mu dina
Uye ne Arone ne bana bende ba balume ku mushiku wa mbelu wa ntenta wa kusambakena, uboweshe mayi
Bikala Yehowa ne disanka bualu buetu, yeye nealue n etu mu buloba ebu, neatuhebu; buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi
Bana betu, nulue bienu bangidikishi banyi hohamue; nutangile bantu badi benda nunku bu munudi n etu bu tshidikishilu
Nunku ditshina dia Yehowa dikale kunudi; nudimuke bimpe bu munudi nuenza bualu bua kakuena malu mabi kudi Yehowa Nzambi wetu, yeye kena ne kansungusungu, kena witabusha bintu bia mbueshilu kudi muntu
Nunku bakabanga kushiha bakulu bakadi ku mpala kua nsubu
Kanuhendi muena mahaha, kanuteki tshintu tshia ku lenduisha n atshi muntu mufofo, kadi nuenu nutshine Nzambi wenu meme ndi Yehowa

Buwai Mu muaba wandi wa tshijila mudiye mushikame Nzambi udi uhesha bantu bashiya hatuhu nsubu bua bobo bashikamemu, Nzambi, hawakaluhuka bua kuya ku mpala kua bantu bebe, buloba buakazakala, matutu a mu diulu akalokesha nvula Wewe, Nzambi, wakalokesha nvula ya bungi; Tshisumbu tshia bantu bebe tshiakashikama mu buloba abu; Mukelenge udi wamba dî diandi, Bakelenge ba misumba ya masalayi badi banyema, badi banyema
Yeye wakabambila ne, Bonso bashikame, ku tshisumbu ku tshisumbu, mu mashinde
Ezekiel Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kundi ne, Muana wa muntu, tangisha mpala webe ku mikuna ya mu Isalele, uyambile mei a kuyibela
Biunvua muntu mei anyi, biahidieye kuênza, meme tshiena mulumbuluisha; bualu bua tshiakuluila bua kulumbuluisha ba ha buloba, nakuluila bua kubasungila
Kanufiki kundi kanuyi ne milambu to

Hashishe mukelenge Ahashawelosha wakambila Esetê, mukelenge mukashi, ne Môdekai, Muena Yuda, ne, Monai, nakamana kufila ba mu nsubu wa Hamana kudi Esetê, bakamana kumuowa yeye ku tshiowelu bualu bua yeye wakalenga Bena Yuda ne tshianza tshiandi
Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bwa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi, Tshimamwenda wa bukalenga tshidi tshienza mêyi
Alona neafile mbushi wakakuatabo kudi nshobo wa Yehowa bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Bantu ba mu meku a bana balume ba Kohata nebashikame ku luseke lua ku sude
Nunku nuenu kanuakantuma kunoko, kadi Nzambi wakantuma; nyeye wakanvuisha bu tatu wa Palô ne mukelenge wa nsubu wandi wonso, ne mukokeshi wa buloba bua Ejipitu buonso

Nuenu bafundi ne Bafalese, nudi bena lubombo, mulau ulualua kunudi, bualu bua nuenu nudi nunyunguluka mai manene ne buloba bua kuitabushisha nasha muntu umue bualu buenu; kadi bitabusheye, nudi numuvuisha muana wa mu Ngena munutambe nuenu bubi misangu ibidi
Nakunuambila malu â hantshidi n enu
Kanuena badimanye ne Yesu Kilisto udi munda muenu, anyi
Meme ndi mumumanye, bualu bua nakufuma kudiye, yeye wakuntuma
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Muan anyi, ditabusha diebe diakukusungila; uye biebe talalâ, wikale musangale ku disama diebe
Shaula wakaditshiha kudiye mu dina dia Yehowa wamba ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo kabena bakuhisha ku bualu ebu
Yeye wakabika, wakambula bulalu buandi lukasa, wakumuka ku mpala kua bonso; bantu bonso bakakema bua bualu ebu, bakatumbisha Nzambi, bakamba ne, Katuena banze kumona bualu bu ebu diambedi
Wewe muine udi mumanye hanashikama hanshi ne hanajuka; udi ujingulula meji anyi hantshidi kule

Nakaluhuka butuku ku tshibi tshia ku luseke lua tshibanda, ku dina dia mai a mibuabua ku luseke lua diala, nakatangila lumbu lua Yelushalema luakadi lushimbuka hanshi ne bibi bialu biakadi bioshibua ne kahia
Hashishe Eli wakabikila Samuele, wakamba ne, Samuele, muan anyi
Disanka dia dijidila dia ntempelo diakadi ku Yelushalema; yakadi ngondo ya mashika; Yesu wakadi wendakana mu ntempelo mu mbalanda wakadi muidika ne, Wa Solomo
Shila malu a mushimi kaba, kanushihi muntu muimpe udi kayi ne bualu meme tshiena mbingisha muntu mubi
Hakayeye tshituha, wakamona Yakobo muana wa Zebedayo, ne muan abo Yone, bakadi mu buatu balukulula tuhamba tuabo
Noa wakalela bana balume basatu, Shema, Hama ne Yafete
Davidi wakambila Shaula ne, Mitshima ya bantu kayihampakanyi bualu buandi; meme muntu webe, nenye kuluangana ne Muena Peleshete eu
Bena Yuda bakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa; bobo bakatamba kumufuisha mukau ne malu mabi akenzabo akahita a batatu abo bubi
Nzambi kabidi wakamanyishangana n abo ne ku bimanyinu ne ku malu a kukema ne ku bienzedi bia bukole bia bungi ne ku bihedi bia Nyuma Muimpe biakababanyinabo, bu mudi disua diandi
Yeye wakambila Gehazi, muena mudimu wandi, ne, Bikila Muena Shunema eu
Nukuate mudimu bua bantu kabavuluki kabidi nansha mena mene a mvidie ayi miaba yonsu ivuabu bayitendelela
Bobo bakafuma kudi kunyi

Mukanda wa tuludiki twa munda udi uleeja: a bule bwa matuku ne tuludiki twa lwendu lwa bilo, makookeshi ne mapa a mulombodi watshi pamwe ne a bakwabo beena Bilo; b bûngi, mushindu wa dibasungula, dibatwangaja,mudimu ne bukookeshi bwa tusumbu twabi twa tukese twa matuku male pamwa ne diaasa ne lwendu lwa tusumbu tukese twa pa bwatu ne twa mpoolu mikese; c bulongolodi bwa midimu ya munda idibo baludika kudi mufundi wa mukanda wa dipoku wa buludiki bwa mianda ya munda mwa tshibambalu ne tshibambalu; d bulongolodi bwa nnemeekelu wa mêyi ne manyooka mateekela batshipwita munwamfwanka ne batshipwita bakulumpa; e mishindu mishilangana ya dieela dia tukanda , pa kumusha idibo bateeka, bajaadika bîmpe kudi Dîyi dikulu edi

Yeye wakahitshisha bana bandi mu kahia mu tshibanda tshia muana wa Hinoma; wakatempa matempu, wakatendelela bakishi, wakahaka manga, wakasangisha dî ne batempeshanganyi ba mbuku ne bena buloshi; yeye wakenza malu mabi a bungi ku mesu kua Yehowa bua kumufuisha n au tshiji
Mmungambile ne: Ndi mumone mudibu banukengesha kudi bena Ejipitu
Muena lukuna wakamba ne, Nembalonde, nembahete, nentahulule bintu bionso bidi bishala, mutshima wanyi neusanke bualu buabo, nempatule muele wanyi wa nvita, nembashihe ne tshianza tshianyi
Ne tudi tutangila ne, Bobo kabakamanya mua kubuelamu bualu bua buhidia buabo
Mukelenge neabuele mu madilu, muenyampala neadiluatshishe ne bivualu bia kukuatshika kua buowa, ne bianza bia bena buloba nebizakale

Bakuidi, bana balume ba Lewi, bakasungulabo kudi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, bua kumuenzelabo mudimu ne bua kuvudishila bantu disanka mu dina dia Yehowa, nebalue ha buihi: bua mei abo malu onso ne bilumbu bionso bia kukumangana nebijalame
Dituku adi Davidi wakamba ne, Washiha Bena Yebuse, aye biandi ku misulu ya mai, ashihe balema ne bafofo, badi mutshima wa Davidi ukina
Esetê kakanji kubamanyisha bua tshisamba tshiandi anyi bua bana babo; bualu bua Môdekai wakamuambila ne, Kubamanyishibi
Hashishe, Yelemiya wakaya kudi Gedaliya, muana wa Ahikama, ku Misepa; wakashikama n andi munkatshi mua bantu bakadi bashala mu buloba
Mulau wa Mputa ya Mbalanga Yehowa wakambila Mose ne Alona ne, Nuangate manza a butue bua mu tshikutu, Mose abumiamine mulu ku mesu kua Palô
Dituku adi udi ha mutu ha nsubu, ne bintu biandi bidi mu nsubu, katuluki bua kuyeye n abi; udi mu budimi muomumue, kahinganyi
Tshibangidilu Yuda ne Tamare Mu tshikondu atshi, Yuda kushiyangana ne bana babu, bua kuya kusomba kua Ira, mu tshimenga tshia Adulame

Diba diakamba kubuela, bayidi bandi dikumi ne babidi bakalua, bakamuambila ne, Umuangalashe bantu, baye mu misoko ne mu luseke elu bua kulala ne bua kuangata bia kudia: bualu bua kunoko tudi mu tshihela
Nunku ubambile dî edi ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Mulondo wonso neûle tente ne nvinyo
Musoko wa Hamona udiku kabidi Nunku nebalengeshe buloba
Bulelela, bualu ebu buakumana kulua dihanga dinene munkatshi muenu ne, Nudi nuikalangana ne bilumbu
Eliya wakambila Ahaba ne, Juka biebe, udie, unue; bualu bua tshiona tshia nvula ya bungi tshidiku

Bakelenge Solomo Udi Ulekela Yehowa; Bena Lukuna Bandi Badi Bumueneka Mukelenge Solomo wakananga bakashi ba bende ba bungi, basangisha ne muana mukashi wa Palô; bakashi ba Bena Moaba ne ba Bena Amona ne ba Bena Edome ne ba Bena Sidona ne ba Bena Hiti; bakadi ba mu bisamba bakambila Yehowa Bena Isalele ne, Kanubuelakanyi n abo, ne bobo kabalu kunudi nansha, bualu bua bobo nebakudimushe mitshima yenu bua kulonda nzambi yabo; Solomo wakalamata bakashi aba mu dinanga
Mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu ne bena mu bukalenga buende kumvua ne: bena Izrayele mbamane kunyema
Neatumbishe nzambi wakadi hatatu bandi kabayi bamanye, neafile biamu bia or ne bia argent, mabue a mushinga mukole ne bintu bilengele kudiye
Hashishe Yoaba wakajuka, wakaya kudi Abashaloma ku nsubu kuandi, wakamuebesha ne, Bualu kai bantu bebe bakosha budimi buanyi
Hashishe Amasaya wakatahulula bantu bakalua kudiye ku Efelayima bua kubahingisha kuabo; nunku tshiji tshiabo tshiakadia kudi Bena Yuda; bakahingana kuabo bûla ngane ne tshiji tshikole
Kadi bantu badi ba bungi ne etshi ntshikondo tshia nvula ya bungi, katuena bamanye mua kuimana ha bula; kemmudimu wa dituku dimue anyi wa matuku abidi; bualu bua tuakatamba kuenza bibi mu bualu ebu
Nebuzaladana, kapitene ka masalayi, wakabakuata, wakaya n abo kudi mukelenge wa Babulona ku Libela
Bakenza malu onso akabambila mukelenge
Kanuena nutujiana, nudi nujiana Yehowa
Bana ba Halima, tshinunu tshimue ne dikumi ne muanda mutekete
Hakadiye utendelela Nzambi ha nkayandi, bayidi bakadi ha buihi n andi; yeye wakabakonka ne, Bantu badi bangamba meme ne, Nganyi
Wakamuebesha ne
Mu diba adi mukelenge wa Babulona wakashiha bana balume ba Sedekiya ku mesu kuandi mu Libela

Bilamba abi, Arone ne bana bende ba balume babivuale anu padibu babuele mu ntenta wa kusambakena, nansha padibu baye pabuipi ne tshilambuilu tshidi muaba wa tshijila bua mudimu wa butuangaji, nanku butaka buabu kabuakumueneka, kabuena bubakebela lufu to

Abalama wakambila mukelenge wa Sodoma ne, Nakamana kubisha tshianza tshianyi bua kuditshiha kudi Yehowa, Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu Diulu, mufuki wa diulu ne buloba, ne, Tshiena ngangata nansha nshinga nansha muonshi wa bisabata nansha kantu kebe kamue, bua wewe kuambi ne, Nakavuisha Abalama bubanji

Lumu luakufika, Yehowa, ndi mumanye ne nshila wa muntu kena munda muandi; Yehowa, umbele, kadi umbele mu kulumbulula kuakane; Hongolola tshiji tshiebe ha mutu ha bisamba bidi kabiyi bikumanye, Yelemiya Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ne, Unvua mei a tshihungidi etshi, umanyishe bantu balume ba mu Yuda ne Bena Yelushalema, ubambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Mulau neukuate muntu udi kayi unvua mei a mu tshihungidi etshi, tshinakahunga ne bankambua benu dituku dinakabaluhula mu buloba bua Ejipitu, mu ditanda mudibo bafula tshiamu, ngamba bianyi ne, Nutumikile dî dianyi, nuenze malu onso andi nnuambila
Sedekiya, muana wa Kenâna, wakadidila nsengu ya tshiamu, wakamba ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wewe newihate n ai Bena Sulia tô ne habutukabo
Muntu yonso udi utetangana bukole ne bakuabo mu manaya udi udikanda mu malu onso

Bukelenge bua mu diulu kabidi budi bu kahamba kakadi kela mu dishiha, kakakungisha mishiha ya mishindu yonso; hakûla kahamba tente, bakakakoka ku mpata; bakashikama, bakasangisha biakadi bimpe mu bihanza, bakimasha biakadi bibi
Nunku nakakina muoyo, bualu bua mudimu udi muenjibue muinshi mua diba wakannyingalasha
Banzuji, mu dienza dia midimu yaabo, badi bakooka anu ku bumfumu bwa mêyi ne mikandu
Abidana, muana mulume wa Gideoni, wakadi ku mutu kua tshisamba tshia Bena Benyamina
Bantu bakadisangisha ku Betele, bakashikamaku ku mpala kua Nzambi tô ne dilolo, bakabisha dî diabo, bakadila bikole

Milambu inudi mua kulambula Maweja Nangila ikale ya mishindu mishilangane: ya tshiamu tshia mpawungi, ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, ne ya tshiamu tshikunze, bilamba bia boya bua nyama bifikuluke, bikunzubile, ne bikunze kunzuu; bilamba bia ndanda, ne bia boya bua mbuji; biseba bia mikoku ya bimpanga bilaba kakula, ne biseba bia nyama ya nkonga; mitshi ya ndunga; mafuta a kuela mu muendu, manananshi a kusambakaja ne mafuta a kulaba, ne manananshi a mupuya mukole a kuosha; mabue a onikse, ne mabue makuabu a mushinga mukole a kuteka mu tshilamba tshia mutuangaji munene tshia efode ne mu tshilamba tshiende tshia pa tshiadi
Nebafile milambu ya kuosha, anyi

Tangilai, Muena Atiopa, muntu mutungula wa bukokeshi bunene ku nyima kua Kandake, nfumu mukashi wa Bena Atiopa, muikale ku mutu kua tshibutshilu tshiandi tshionso, wakadi mulue ku Yelushalema bua kutendelela Nzambi; wakadi uhingana mushikame mu dikalu diandi ubala mukunda wa muprofete Yeshaya
Nunku Delila wakangata mionshi mihia mihia, wakamusuika n ai, wakamuambila ne, Shimishona, Bena Peleshete badi ham bidi hebe
Sheme, nkambua wa Bena Ebê, muan abo ne Yafete, yeye mene wakalela bana
Hashishe yeye wakamuambila ne, Anji kushikama, muan anyi, to ne hawamanya kunshikidilu kua bualu ebu bualu bua muntu au kena wikisha to ne hashikisheye bualu lelu
Umue wabo, muprofete wabo mene, wakamba ne, Bumanyishi ebu mbulelela
Yosefe wakafunda mukanda bua lu bua buloba bua Ejipitu, udiku to ne katataka, ne, Tshituha tshitanu tshia bintu bionso ntshia Palo, anu buloba bua babuki nkayabo kabuakalua bua Palô
Maweja Nangila mumane kunyanga musulu wa Nile, matuku muanda mutekete kupita nanku
Balaame kuambila Balake ne: Shala muimane pabuipi ne milambu yebe eyi
Kubenga mua kuditshiha kudi kuhita kudinga buakane

Bualu bukuabo kabidi, mukokeshi kanyengi tshituha tshia buhianyi bua bantu bakuabo bua kubihata mu buloba buabo; angate tshituha tshia luhetu luandi mene bua kuhesha bana bandi balume buhianyi buabo, bua bantu banyi kabatangadiki eku ne eku bualu bua bakabumusha mu buloba buabo
Bena Izrayele nebambenge
Nunku, bana betu, nuikale ne lutulu tô ne halua Mukelenge
Bana balume ba Pelese Heselona ne meku a Bena Heselona, Hamula ne meku a Bena Hamula
Bualu bua kumudilu, udi nsakidila Nzambi wanyi mu Yesu Kilisto bua buonso buenu, bualu bua ditabusha dienu didi dimanyishibue ba buloba buonso

Ya usangishe bakulu ba Bena Isalele, ubambile ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu, Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Isaka ne Nzambi wa Yakoba wakamueneka kundi, wakungambila ne, Nakulua kunudi, Hakatangila mudibo banuenzela mu Ejipitu
Hashishe, muanjelo wakadi uyikila n anyi wakaluhuka, wakangambila ne, Banduluka, mona tshintu etshi tshidi tshihatuka ne, Ntshintu kai
Hakasangana Yesu muana wa mpunda, wakashikama ha nyima handi, bu muakafundabo ne, Muana mukashi wa Siona, kutshinyi; mona, Mukelenge webe ulualua mushikame ha nyima ha muana wa mpunda
Bakimana muntu ha muaha wandi muntu ha muaba wandi, banyunguluke tshitudilu; musumba wonso wakanyema; bakela mbila, bakabihata
Kadi katataka hanuakahikudibua ku bubi, ne hanuakavuishibua bahika ba Nzambi, nudi ne mamuma enu a ku dijidila dienu, kunshikidilu kua malu au mmuoyo wa tshiendelele
Bena Yuda ne Bena Benyamina bakadi ku luseke luandi
Kabena mua kunyingalala bua bintu biabu bidibu bashiya mu Kenaane to
Hashishe wakahueka, wakadila mu mai a Yadene misangu muanda mutekete bu muakadi dî dia muntu wa Nzambi; musunyi wakahingana bu wa muana mukese, wakadi muakane
Bakuidi kabakadi mua kubuela mu nsuhu wa Yehowa, bualu bua butumbi bua Yehowa buakûsha nsubu tente
Alona wakolola tshianza tshiandi ku mutu kua mai a mu Ejipitu, biula biakabaha, biakûsha buloba bua Ejipitu tente
Bana ba balume ba Ulama bakadi bena nvita ba bukitu, bena mata, bakadi ne bana ba balume ba bungi, ne bana ba bana babo balela, bu lukama ne makumi atanu

Yosefe, kabidi, wakumuka mu Galela, mu musoko wa Nazaleta, wakabanda mu Yudaya, ku musoko wa Bayidi, udibo babikila ne, Beteleheme, bualu bua yeye wakadi wa mu nsubu wa Davidi ne wa tshiota tshiandi; wakaya nunku bua kufundishabo dina diandi ne dia Malia, wakadiye mubaka, wakadi biandi ne difu
Baketeka nsonga ibidi mikuabo ya tukanu tuhindakana mu masoso abidi, nunku bakatuteka ha bilulu bia efoda bia ha maha ku mpala kua tshilulu
Davidi wakajuka ku Bâle yuda ne bantu bonso bakadi n andi, bakaya kuhingisha mushete wa Nzambi udibo babikila ku DINA, dina mene dia Yehowa wa misumba udi mushikame ha mutu munkatshi mua bakeluba
Padi muntu mulaye bua kulambula Maweja Nangila tshimuna tshia mapiku tshidibu mua kumulambula, tshimuna atshi ntshia tshijila

Nunku nufunde bualu bua Bena Yuda bunudi basue mu dina dia mukelenge, nutekehu tshimanyinu tshia ku kakanu ka mukelenge; bualu bua kakuena muntu udi mumanye mua kukudimuna dî didi difundibua mu dina dia mukelenge, didi ne tshimanyinu tshia ku kakanu ka mukelenge tshitekahu

Ndi nuambila ne, Muntu yonso wangitabusha ku mesu kua bantu, Muana wa muntu neamuitabushe kabidi ku mesu kua banjelo ba Nzambi; kadi muntu yonso wampidia ku mesu kua bantu neahidibue ku mesu kua banjelo ba Nzambi
Diba adi, Maweja Nangila neanufuile munda, anubutule musangu umue
Bualu bua bikala bisamba bia bende bangatshi n abo ba malu a Nyuma, badi ne bualu bua kubakuatshisha kabidi ne bintu bidi mubidi ukengela
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Umubikile
Yeye wakankonka ne, Amosa, udi umona tshinyi
Yoshua wakambila Bena Isalele ne, Nuenu nenutshimbakane musangu bule munyi bua kuya bua kuangata buloba buakanuha Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua benu
Nebanubadile mulambu udibo banyukula bu bintu biakushihulabo ku tshishihuidi ne bu bintu biakukamabo ha tshikaminu
Yeye wakamba ne, Bayiteke bisumbu bibidi ku tshibi tshia ku musoko tô ne dinda
Bobo nebatumikile dî dianyi, bua biahidiabo, nebadituadile bubi buabo, nebafue meme ndi Yehowa wakabajidila
Nunku badi babikila muaba au ne, Gilegala tô ne lelu
Ne mikumbi yakabatuka mu muinshi ha buloba; bakuiha bukole bu mudi tuminyiminyi tua ha buloba ne bukole
Hakadisangisheye n abo, wakabambila bikole ne, Kanumuki mu Yelushalema, kadi nujidile mulayi wa Tatu unuakunvua kundi

Wewe, muana wa muntu, ambila Bena Isalele ne, Nuenu nudi nuamba mei â ne, Ditomboka dietu ne bubi buetu bidi ham bidi hetu, ne mibidi yetu idi miteketangane ne kanyinganyinga bualu buabi; nunku netushale ne muoyo bishi
Bana abu bavua baluangana bikole munda mua mamuabu
Bakalua ne dî adi kudi mukelenge

Kulumbulula Kuakane Nenudisunguluile balumbuluishi ne bafundi mu misoko yonso, idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, munuhe, ku tshisamba ne ku tshisamba; bobo nebalumbuluishe bantu bilumbu biabo ne dilumbuluisha didi diakane
Nuvuluke ne: nuvua bapika mu ditunga dia Ejipitu
Nunku bika biebe ne dinda dionso, ne bantu ba mukelenge webe bakatua n ebe: ne hanuabika ne dinda dionso, ne hatoka hanshi, nuye
Nuakamona miaba mishimbula mu musoko wa Davidi ne, Idi ya bungi; nuakasangisha mai a mu tshina tshia mu tshibanda hohamue
Hakahita bidimu bibidi bijima, Abashaloma wakasangisha bakoshi ba miosa ya mikoko ku Bâla hasô, udi hehi ne Efelayima; Abashaloma wakabikilaku bana balume bonso ba mukelenge

Bakenza biluwa bia ku mbelu kua ntempelo ku mitshi ya olive; bunene buabi buakadi bu tshituha tshinai tshia tshimanu tshia nsubu; bakenza bibi bibidi bia mitshi ya cyprès; bakenza tshibi tshimue ne mabaya abidi ne tshikuabo ne mabaya abidi
Eliya wakamuambila ne, Kutshinyi, ya, wenze bu muwakuamba, kadi udianjile kundambila meme bidia bikese, ulue n abi kundi, hashishe udilambile ne muana webe
Corinthians Bua malu anuakanfundila ndi ngamba ne, Bidi bimpe bua muntu kikadi ne mukashi
Nanku, bena Kekate kabena ne bua kulenga bintu bia tshijila abi ne bianza to, bualu badi mua kufua

Bua biabuela muntu mu disangisha dienu ne tukanu tua ngolo ku minu yandi muluate bilulu bimpe; ne biabuela muntu muhele kabidi muluate bilulu bibi; binuatangila anu kudi muntu udi muluate bilulu bimpe, nuamba ne, Shikama biebe aha mu muaba muimpe; ne binuambila muntu muhele ne, Imanyina biebe aku, anyi, Shikama hanshi hehi ne tshitekelu tshianyi tshia makasa; kanuakutahulukangana munkatshi muenu, ne kanuakulua balumbuludi badi ne meshi mabi, anyi
Wakela Alona manyi ha mutu handi, wakamujidila
Kubuela kua kamelu mu disu dia kashingi kudi kutamba kubuela kua muntu mubanshi mu bukelenge bua Nzambi butekete

Nunku bantu bakela mbila, ne bakuidi bakela mpungi; hakunvua bantu muadi wa mpungi, bakela mbila bikole, ne lumbu luakadishimbukila, ne bantu bakabuela mu musoko, muntu yonso wakabuelamu anu mu buludiludi n andi, bakanyenga musoko
Moshe kuenza bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile
Nzambi wakamba ne, Buloba bumeneshe bimenyi bionso, midioko idi yela ntete ne mitshi idi ikuama mamuma adi ne ntete yai, bu mudi mushindu wai
Hakadi bukelenge hua Lehabama bujadikibue bimpe, ne hakakoleye biakane, yeye wakasesuka ku mikenji ya Yehowa, ne Bena Isalele bakamulonda
Kumvuaye dilomba diende, kumupeshaye buledi bua bana
Yeye wakadi uyisha bantu mu ntempelo ku dituku ku dituku; butuku wakalubuka, wakalala mu mukuna udibo babikila ne, Oleve
Bakabambila bu muakamba Yesu; bakitabusha ne, Yai bienu
Bikololo biakalua kudiye ne dinda ne bidia ne munyinyi, biakalua habi kabidi dilolo; wakanua mai a mu kasulu
Wakalongolola mampa ha mesa ku mpala kua Yehowa, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Ana wakamutuma musuika kudi Kayafa, muakuidi munene
Yeye uvua mungambile ne: Sangisha bena Izrayele bonsu
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Yotama ne malu onso akenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Bayidi bakamuambila ne, Labi, Bena Yuda bakadi bakeba kukukuma mabue anu katataka, wewe uyayaku kabidi, anyi
Pikalabo bakeepesha dinyooka bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu mieela panyima pa dikosa dia tshilumbu, badi bafila dinyooka anu mudi mêyi ne mikandu mipiamipia midifunda
Sheshana kakadi ne bana ba balume, anu bana ba bakashi
Yesu wakamukonka ne, Wewe udi muyishi wa Isalele, kuena mumanye malu â

Muakuidi neashikike mukashi ku mpala kua Yehowa, neasulule nsuki ya mukashi, neateke mulambu wa bukula wa tshivulukidi mu bianza biandi, eu udi mulambu wa mukau, muakuidi neangate mai a bululu adi elesha mulau mu tshianza tshiandi
Nakabambila ne, Buonso buenu, muntu ne muntu, nuimashe bintu bionso bia tshinyangu bidi binusamina muoyo, kanudinyangi ne mpingu ya mu Ejipitu, bualu bua meme ndi Yehowa Nzambi wenu
Shaula wakatumina Yishai di ne, Witabushe, ndi nkusengelela, bua Davidi ikale n anyi, bualu bua yeye udi ne diakalengele ku mesu kuanyi
Bualu bua misangu mikuabo muntu udi wenza mudimu wandi wa lungenyi, wa meji ne mulengele tshishiki udi ushila muntu buhianyi budiye kayi mukuatshile mudimu
Hakamubikileye, yeye wakimana ku tshibi
Galatia Nuenu Bena Galatia bahote, ku mesu kuenu kuakatekabo Yesu Kilisto mushihibue ku mutshi mutshiamakane hatoke, wakanuhambuisha nganyi
Bua muana wa bakaji, nebafute nkanu isatu
Nuele Malia muoyo; yeye wakanukuatshisha ne mudimu wa bungi

Bakatela mena a bantu bakuabo bua kufilabo bintu kudi bana balume ba Alona, bakuidi bakadi bashikame mu madimi akadi ku mpenge kua musoko ne musoko, ne bua kuhabo balume bonso ba bakuidi bintu biabo ne kudi bonso bakadi babadibue mu kulondolola kua Bena Lewi
Bavua balama kabidi mionji yonsu ya kuasa nayi ntenta
tukeheshe tshihiminu tshia épha bua tusumbe bahele ku tshiamu tshia argent Yehowa wakuditshiha ku bulengele bua Yakoba ne, Buloba kabuena mua kuzakala bua muanda eu, anyi
Ebi mbiakahaula Davidi
Bule buawu buikale bua metre umue

Bikaleye kayi ne mushinga wa muana wa mukoko, alue biandi ne nyunyu ya nkutshi ibidi anyi mputu nyunyu ibidi, umue bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia ne mukuabo bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, muakuidi munene neayifile bua kumubuikidila n au bubi, ne yeye neikale mulengeshibue
Bana ba Adina, nkama inai ne makumi atanu ne banai

Nunku wakajuka, wakaya ku Salefata; hakafikeye ku tshibi tshia musoko, wakatangila mukashi wa mu lufuila wakadi wangula nkunyi; wakamubikila, wakamuambila ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Untuntshile tuima tukese mu dikoho, nnueku

Kadi ebu mbualu butuenzela Bena Gibea; netubelele nshobo bua kuluangana n abo; neusungule bantu dikumi ku lukama lua bantu ba mu bisamba bionso bia Bena Isalele, ne lukama ku tshinunu tshia bantu, ne tshinunu tshimue ku binunu dikumi bia bantu, bua kutuadilabo bantu bia kudia; ne hafikabo ku Gibea wa Benyamina, bobo nebabenzele bu mudi bualu buhote buonso buakenzabo mu Isalele
Kadi Abishai, muana wa Seluya, wakanusungila, wakataha Muena Peleshete, wakamushiha

Bua malu â, mena, nakuolola tshianza tshianyi ha mutu hebe, nakukehesha bia kudia biebe bia buatshia buatshia, nakukufila mu bianza bia badi n ebe lukuna bua bakuenzele bu mudibo basue, bana bakashi ba Bena Peleshete mene badi bakuatshika bundu bua malu ebe a tshikama

Tshibilu tshia Biakudia bia tshianyi Maweja Nangila kuambila Moshe bua amanyishe bena Izrayele mikenji idi ilonda eyi ne: Panudi bamane kufika mu ditunga dindi munupe, nuye kudi mutuangaji ne biakudia bia tshianyi bia mu madimi enu binudi nunowa
Wakatendelela biandi Yehowa, wakamba ne, Yehowa, ndi ukukonka ne, Tshiakamba dî edi hantshivua mu buloba buanyi, anyi
Neabanyine ba munkatshi muabo bintu biakunyengeye, bintu biakuhauleye ne biuma bikuabo
Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Tshiena ngûsha diulu ne buloba tente, anyi
Bualu bua ditabusha dia mu dina diandi, dina diandi diakukolesha muntu eu unudi nutangila ne unudi bamanye; bulelela, ditabusha diakufuma kudiye ndiakumuha bukole ku mesu kua buonso buenu

Yeye wakamuambila ne, Wewe udi mumanye ne, Bukelenge ebu buakadi buanyi, ne Bena Isalele bonso bakateka mesu abo kundi bua meme kubakokesha; kadi bukelenge buakukudimuka mpindiu buakulua bua muan etu, bualu bua Yehowa wakamuhabu

Nunku kanuitabushi bua Hezikiya anudinge, anyi bua kunuitabushisha bua nuenu kueyemena mei andi; bualu bua nansha nzambi umue wa tshisamba tshimue anyi wa bukelenge bumue wakadi ne bukole bua kuhandisha n abu bantu bandi mu tshianza tshianyi, ne mu tshianza tshia batatu banyi; Nzambi wenu neanuhandishe bishi
Hashishe nakela mukenji, bakalengesha nsubu; nakahingashamu malonga a mu nsubu wa Nzambi ne milambu ya bukula ne manananshi
Bena Bukitu ba Davidi Kul
Yeye wakateka balami ku bibi bia ku nsubu wa Yehowa, bua muntu wakadi kayi muakane kabuedi mu nsubu
Bakamba mei bua Nzambi wa Yelushalema akamuvuisha bu nzambi ya ba ha buloba, idibo basonga ku bianza bia bantu

Mu matuku a Yoyakima bakuidi bakadi ku mutu kua nsubu ya batatu abo: Melaya wa mu nsubu wa Selaya; Hananya wa mu nsubu wa Yelemiya; Meshulama wa mu nsubu wa Ezela; Yehohanana wa mu nsubu wa Amalia; Yonatana wa mu nsubu wa Maluki; Yosefe wa mu nsubu wa Shebanya; Adena wa mu nsubu wa Halima; Helekai wa mu nsubu wa Melayota; Zekâya wa mu nsubu wa Ido; Meshulama wa mu nsubu wa Ginetona; Zikeli wa mu nsubu wa Abiya; Piletai wa mu nsubu wa Minyamina wa Moadiya; Shamua wa mu nsubu wa Bilega; Yehonatana wa mu nsubu wa Shemaya; Matenai wa mu nsubu wa Yoyaliba; Uzi wa mu nsubu wa Yedaya; Kalai wa mu nsubu wa Salai; Ebê wa mu nsubu wa Amoka; Hashabeya wa mu nsubu wa Hilekiya; Netanele wa mu nsubu wa Yedaya

Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wangate Yoshua, muana mulume wa Nuna, udi ne Nyuma munda muandi, utentekashe tshianza tshiebe ha mutu n andi, umushikike ku mpala kua Eleazâ muakuidi ne ku mpala kua bantu bonso, umuambile dî ku mesu kuabo
Mikenji eyi idi itangila muntu yonsu udi ne disama dia nsudi, kadi kayi ne mushindu wa kupeta bintu bia tshibidilu bia kudikobolola nabi
Neambule makala a kapia adi pa tshilambuilu tshia muaba wa tshijila, ela mu mbabula
Wakimasha bituha bia mpalata hanshi mu ntempelo, wakumuka biandi, wakaya wakadiowa

Bika, muele wa nvita, taha mulami wanyi wa mikoko, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nengele tshituha etshi tshisatu mu kahia, Zechariah Monai, dituku dia Yehowa dilualua, dialuabo kuabanyangana bintu biebe munkatshi muenu mene biakanyengabo mu nvita
Bikaleye kayi ne muana wa bakashi, yeye neaheshe bana babo buhianyi buandi
Muyidi wakadi mumanyibue kudi muakuidi munene wakaluhuka, wakakula ne mukashi wakadi ulama ku tshibi, wakabuela ne Petelo
Mutuangaji neangate mayi a tshijila mu dibungu

Bakasangana Muena Ejipitu mu budimi, bakatua n andi kudi Davidi, bakamuha bintu bia kudia, wakadia; bakamunuisha mai; bakamuha tshisumbu tshia nfigi ne bisumbu bia tumuma tukese tume bibidi: hakadieye bintu ebi, muoyo wandi wakahingana kudiye, bualu bua kakadia tshintu, kakanua mai tô minya isatu ne matuku asatu

Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, wakalua ku musoko hakadi bantu bandi batshintshimika musoko; ne Yehoyakina, mukelenge wa Yuda, ne mamu wandi ne bantu bandi ne tuhita tuandi ne tupitene tuandi bakaluhuka, bakaya kudi mukelenge wa Babulona
Hashishe, mukelenge wakela dî bua kubikilabo batempi ba mbuku, bamanyi ba malu a mitoto, bena muhongo ne Bena Kasada, bua bobo bajinguluile mukelenge bilota biandi

Kadi Yehoyada muakuidi wakangata mushete munene, wakela tubulu mu tshibuiku tshiau, wakauteka ha buihi ne tshioshelu ku tshianza tshia balume tshia ku tshibi tshia mu nsubu wa Yehowa; bakuidi bakadi balama tshibi bakatekamu argent yonso yakatuabo n ai mu nsubu wa Yehowa
Munyi muamuitabushabo kabai banze kunvua lumu hiandi

Nsubu ya bansentedi ya munda mua tshibuelelu tshia ku luseke lua esete yakadi isatu ku luseke lua tshinga tshianza ne isatu ku luseke lua tshianza tshikuabo; buonso buai yakadi bunene bumue; biluwa bia ku luseke ne ku luseke biakadi bunene bumue kabidi
Mu muaba wonso badi bangoshila musenga wa manananshi ne badi bafila mulambu, mulambu muakane mene, mu dina dianyi; bualu bua dina dianyi didi dinene munkatshi mua ba mu bisamba bia bantu

Yeye wakalenduisha ba bungi; bulelela, bakadishinda, Bakabandisha mei abo, bamba ne, Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, Mukelenge udi ne dina ne, Yehowa wa misumba, Wewe, muana mukashi udi mushikame mu Ejipitu, Ejipitu udi lukungulu lua ngombe lulengele, Masalayi andi mabueshibue mu mudimu wandi ku difutu Tshiona tshiandi tshidi bu tshiona tshia nyoka udikoka hanshi; Yehowa udi wamba ne, Neatahe ditu diandi, Muana mukashi wa Ejipitu neakuatshike bundu, Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Monai, nenkengeshe Amona, nzambi wa Nô, ne Palô ne Ejipitu ne nzambi yabo ne bakelenge babo; nenkengeshe Palô mene ne badi bamueyemena
Abimeleke wakambila Isaka ne, Umuka kutudi, bualu bua wewe udi ututamba bukole
Nuenu nenuhidie balume bakuabo, anyi
Nuakudibutshila bintu mu matuku a kunshikidilu
Hakatantamaneye, muana umue wakahatula tshianza, ne muleleshi wakasuika muonshi mukunze ku tshianza tshiandi, wakamba ne, Yeye wakaluhuka diambedi
Aba mbana ba tatu wa Etama: Yizelele ne Yishema ne Yidebasha; dina dia muan abo wa bakashi diakadi Haselele poni; Penuele, tatu wa Gedô, ne Ezê, tatu wa Husha
Bantu bakatamba kukema
Abrahame ukenzakana, kumonaye mukoku wa tshimpanga, nsengu yatshi mipatame mu mutshi
Buloba mbunene, tuabulukangane
Udi muana undi mulele, pantshivua ne dikanda dionsu
Nunku Bena Lewi bakahuwisha bantu bonso ne, Nuikale talalâ, bualu bua edi ndituku dia tshijila, kanunyingalashi mitshima yenu
Wakabambila ne, Yehowa udi mumanyi wa bualu kunudi, ne wandi wakedibua manyi udi mumanyi wa bualu dituku edi ne kanuakasangana tshintu tshia bende mu tshianza tshianyi
Udi wangata tshituha tshiau bu nkunyi, udi wota kahia; e, udi utemesha n atshi kahia, udi ulamba bidia
Maweja Nangila kumuenekela Izake, umukandika ne: Dikasa diebe kadidiatshi mu Ejipitu to
Nentume muele wa nvita ku nyima kuabo, tô ne hanababutula bonso
Kanubenzedi bibi to
Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne bibidi tshia bukelenge bua Yolama, muana wa Ahaba, mukelenge wa Isalele, Ahazaya, muana wa Yeholama, mukelenge wa Yuda, wakabanga kukokesha

Yeye wakanuhuekesha, wakanufuisha nzala ne wakanudisha ne mana a mu diulu, anudi kanuyi bamanye, ne akadi batatu benu kabayi bamanye; bua kunumanyisha ne, Muntu kena wikala ne muoyo bualu bua bidia nkayabo kadi utu wikala ne muoyo bualu bua mei onso adi ahatuka mukana mua Yehowa
Mikenshi yakabuela kabidi bua bushihi bua mikenshi buvulangane

Malu â adi mimpe ne adi avuishila bantu mushinga muimpe; kadi ehuka ku kuebeshangana kua malu mahote, ne ku mena a bankambua malongolola, ne ku kutandangana, ne ku kufuilangana bua mikenshi; malu â kena mamanye mua kuvuishila muntu mushinga muimpe, adi hatuhu
Hakaya Yesu mu nsubu wa mukelenge, hakamoneye bena nshiba ne tshisumbu tshia bantu bateka mutoyi, yeye wakamba ne, Shiai mpunga, muana kena mufue, udi mulale tulu
Hashishe nakangata mikanda ya kula kua budimi, wowo wakadi muvunga ne muteka ne tshimanyinu bu muakadi mikenji ne tshilele, ne mukuabo wakadi muvungulula
Nunku, muana wa muntu, humuna muoyo, humuna muoyo ne kanyinganyinga kakole ne mutshima wa majia ku mesu kuabo
Bantu bonso bakasua kumulenga bianza, bualu bua bukole buakadi bufuma munda muandi, bakashikisha masama a buonso buabo

Mukelenge wanyi, bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo ne bu mudi mutshima webe ne muoyo, bualu bua Yehowa wakakukanda bua wewe kumatshishi mashi hanshi ne bua wewe kudisombuedi ne tshianza tshiebe, nunku badi n ebe lukuna ne badi bakeba kuenzela mukelenge wanyi bibi, bikale bu Nabala
Bantu bakamukonka ne, Tuakunvua mu mikenshi ya Nzambi ne, Kilisto udi wikala tshiendelele; ahu munyi mûdi wamba ne, Budi n abu Muana wa muntu mbua kubishibua

Nakatendelela Yehowa Nzambi wanyi, nakalonda mibi yanyi kudiye, nakamba ne, Mukelenge, Nzambi mimene udi ukuatshisha bantu buowa, udi ulonda tshihungidi tshiandi ne udi ulesha luse lujalame kudi bantu badi bamunanga ne badi batumikila mikenji yandi; tuakuenza malu mabi, tuakuhambuka mu nshila wa buakane, tuakuenza bibi, tuakutomboka, tuakusesuka ku mikenji yebe ne mei ebe
Udi ushikama nkayebe ne bantu bimana ku mpala kuebe dinda tô ne ku dilolo munyi
Bualu bua ku mulambu umue yeye wakuvuisha bantu badi bajidibua bakane tshishiki tshiendelele
Bantu ba mu Nebo mukuabo makumi atanu ne babidi
Bualu ebu nunku nebulue kudi bantu ba tshikondo tshibi etshi
Kadi bantu ba tshianana ba bungi bakadi bunvua mei andi ne disanka
Bakayifila ku nshobo kudi bana ba balume ba Melali, ku meku abo, misoko dikumi ne ibidi mu tshisamba tshia Lubena ne tshia Gada ne tshia Zebuluna
Nufuila bakuabo luse helanganabo n enu mpata; nusungile bakuabo, nubahatule mu kahia; nufuile bakuabo luse ne ditshina; kadi nuikale ne tshilulu tshidi ne matobe a malu mabi a mubidi lukuna
Kadi ndi mbanda kabidi kudi Maweja Nangila ku mukuna bua kumulomba, misangu mikuabu ne udi mua kungitaba bua kunufuilaku luse, ku tshilema tshienu etshi
Aba mba mu bana balume ba Gada bakadi tupitene tua masalayi; wakatamba buhuekele wakadi ku mutu kua bantu lukama; wakatamba bunene wakadi ku mutu kua bantu tshinunu
Ndi ne dibatiza diambatizabo n adi, ndi mu bualu bukole tô ne hashikadi
Yeye udi muan etu

Bu mudi muntu usangisha tshiamu tshia argent, tshiamu tshia mitaku, tshiamu tshifike, tshiamu tshia lutende ne tshiamu tshia êtain mu ditanda, bua kuimba mubanze ne kubiela kahia bua kubiengulula, nunku nennusangisheku mu tshiji tshianyi ne mu tshiji tshianyi tshikole, nennuelemu, nennuengulule
Misambu Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, ndi munyemene kûdi
Arone ne bana bende ba balume nebangate mikata ayi, bua kuyidila pa muaba kampande wa tshijila
Yeye kabidi wakafuka bisamba bionso bia bantu, bafuma mu muntu umue, bua kuikalabo ha buloba buonso; wakatahulula bikondo biabo bidianjile kulongolola diambedi, ne mikalu ya miaba yabo yashikamabo
Yehoshafata wakambila mukelenge wa Isalele ne, Meme ndi bu wewe, bantu banyi badi bu bantu bebe, tubalu tuanyi tudi bu tubalu tuebe

Timothy Ndi nkuambila bikole ku mesu kua Nzambi ne kua Kilisto Yesu, ulualua kulumbuluisha badi ne muoyo ne badi bafue, bua dimueneka diandi ne bua bukelenge buandi: Ambila bantu dî dia Nzambi mene; nanukila kubambila misangu miakane ne misangu idi kayi miakane; ubakande ku malu abo, ubabele, ubasengelele ne lutulu luonso ne diyisha
Ku bantu makumi muanda mutekete abu, bantu babidi, Eldade ne Medade, bavua bashale ku mitanda
Badi balekela difila dia dinyooka pikala, bilondeshila mêyi ne mikandu mieela panyima pa dikosa dia tshilumbu: dinyooka edi badikupula; bwaalu buvwabo badifila kabutshiyi ne ngikadilu wa tshibawu
Tangila, Lebeka udi ku mpala kuebe, umuangate, uye n andi, yeye neikale mukashi wa muana mulume wa mukelenge webe bu muakamba Yehowa
Maweja Nangila kumvua tshijanu atshi

Bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba bua nsubu ya mu musoko eu ne bua nsubu ya bakelenge ba Yuda yakushimbulabo bua kunguisha mishiki bua kudihandula ku miele ya nvita, bua kudikuatshisha bua kuihataku Bena Kasada badi balua bua kubaluisha, ne bua kûsha muaba eu tente ne bitalu bia bantu bandi nshiha mu tshifik a munda tshianyi ne mu tshiji tshianyi tshikole, ne bua bubi buabo bundi nsokokela musoko eu mpala wanyi
Ebere kulela bana ba balume babidi: muanabute dina diende Pelega, bualu mu matuku ende ke muvua ditapulukangana dituadija munkatshi mua bantu
Ha mutu ha balume bakabalabo mu kulondolola kuabo ku bidimu bisatu tô ne ku mutu, muntu yonso wakadi ubuela mu nsubu wa Yehowa, bu muakadi mudimu wa buatshia buatshia wa ku mulongo wa muntu ne muntu
Ngalambulu ngombe mulume umue, ne mukoku wa tshimpanga umue, pa tshilambuilu tshionsu
Kadi bantu aba badi n anyi lukuna, bakadi kabai basue meme ngikale mukelenge wabo, nulue n abo kunoko, nubashihe ku mesu kuanyi

Bualu bua Nzambi kakatusungula bua kutulekela tshishi, kadi bua tuetu kuheta luhandu bualu bua Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto, wakatufuka, bua tuetu, nasha batabale nasha balale tulu, tuikale ne muoyo hohamue n andi
Kadi ba bungi badi ku mpala katataka nebikale ku nyima; badi ku nyima katataka nebikale ku mpala
Nunku Yehowa wakasungila Bena Isalele dituku adi; bakaluangana n abo tô ne ku Bete awena
Bana ba balume ba Yehalelele: Zifa ne Zifaha, Tileya ne Asalele
Mei abo akasankisha Hamo ne Shekeme, muan andi wa balume
Muntu yonso udi uvila Muana, yeye kena ne Tatu; kadi muntu udi ujukula Muana udi ne Tatu kabidi
Mabaya au akadi bu mabaya abidi hanshi, kadi akadi matuangasha ku mutu ne biamu bia masoso, Wakenza bubidi buau ku matumba abidi
Nualukishile bantu bonso mabanza abo: mulambu kudi muenu mulambu, mpunga kudi unudi mua kuhunga, buowa kudi unudi mua kutekela buowa, buneme kudi unudi mua kunemeka
Nendue kunudi hanahitshila mu Makedonia; bualu bua nempitshile mu Makedonia; kadi bumue nenshikame n enu musangu, anyi tshidimu tshia mashika tshijima mene, bua nuenu kuntuma ku luendu kunaya
Yesu wakamuambila ne, Biwasua kuikala muimpe, ya biebe, uhane biudi n abi, ubihe bantu bahele, newikale ne bintu mu tshibutshilu tshia mu diulu, ulue kundonda
Bualu nyama ya mu mpata idi mua kuvulangana, ditunga didi mua kunyanguka

Hakamunuisheye mai, hashishe Bikala mukashi muonyibue, bikaleye muenzele mulume wandi bualu bubi, mai adi elesha mulau neabuele munda muandi, neikale a bululu, ne mubidi wandi neutuntumuke, ne tshibelu tshiandi netshibole ne mukashi neikale ne mulau munkatshi mua bana babo
Kanuadi bana bebe bua kubahitshisha mu kahia ka Moleke, kutedi dina dia Nzambi wenu tshitelatela meme ndi Yehowa
Kulembeleja tshilamba pankatshi pa muaba wa tshijila ne muaba wa tshijila menemene, bua kujika mushete, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe
Davidi wakadi ne diakalengele kudi Nzambi, wakamulomba ne, Nkebele Nzambi wa Yakoba nsubu; kadi Solomo wakamuibakila nsubu

Nunku, ufunde malu awakatangila, ne malu adiku, ne malu adi amba kulua ku nyima kuau: bualu busokoka bua mitoto muanda mutekete iwakatangila mu tshianza tshianyi tshia balume, ne bua bitekelu bia minda ya ngolo muanda mutekete
Hakahita ngondo isatu, tuakabuha mu buatu bua ku Alesandelia buakadi bulale ku tshisenga bua ngondo ya mashika, tshimanyinu tshiabu ne, Diosokuli
Samuele wakambila mulambi ne, Lua ne tshituha tshinakukuha, tshinakukuambila ne, Utshiteke
Nanku bua tuetu kuya kusumba biakudia, anu tuetu baye ne Binyamine
Bana betu, mutshi wa nfigi udi mumanye mua kukuama oleve, anyi
Bakaha mukashi bua kudiluatshisheye ne tshilulu tshia line tshilengele, tshidi tshikenka ne tshitoke; bualu bua tshilulu tshia line tshilengele tshidi bienzedi biakane bia basanto
Hashishe, Danyele wakakudimuna dî ku mpala kua mukelenge ne, Uditekele bintu biebe, uheshe muntu mukuabo biudi musue kunfuta; kadi nembadile mukelenge tshifundu, nemmumanyishe dijingulula diatshi
Yeye udi ukudimuna bikondo ne bidimu; udi umusha bakelenge, udi ujadika bakelenge; udi ufila meji kudi bena meji, ne lungenyi kudi badi bamanye mua kujingulula malu
Nakamba bua tuseku ne, Tudi tuhote, bua masanka ne, Adi enza tshinyi
Nsongakaji kumusha mulondu lukasa pa makaya, ungamba ne: Nuaku
Nzambi wakamona bienzedi biabo, bu muakalekelabo nshila wabo mubi; ne Nzambi wakakudimuna mutshima wandi bua muanda mukole wakambeye diambedi ne, Nembenzele; yeye kakawenza nansha
Ebeyatâ wakalua kudi Davidi ne efoda
Muntu ne muntu wakangata bintu biandi bia nvita; nuakamba kuya ku mikuna

Eku nkulondolola kua malu a Yakoba Hakadi Yosefe ne bidimu dikumi ne muanda mutekete, yeye wakadi udisha bimuna ne bana babo Yeye wakadi nsongalume wakadi ne bana ba balume ba Bileha ne Zilepa, bakashi ba tatu andi, Yosefe wakalua ne lumu luabo lubi kudi tatu abo
Nuenu bahote, muenji wa munda kena muenji wa ha nyima kabidi, anyi
Amaleka wakalua, wakaluangana ne Bena Isalele mu Lefidima
Yonatana udi mushihibue ha mutu ha mikuna yenu
Ateke tshianza pa mutu pa ngombe awu, bua Maweja Nangila anyishe mulambu, afuile muntu awu luse
Ka meme nakamba ne, Mulau wakunkuata
Basanto bonso badi banuela muoyo, ne ba mu nsubu wa Kaisa badi batamba kusua kunuela muoyo

Ba mu tshisamba tshia Yuda, bantu lubombo ne binunu bibidi bakatekibua tshimanyishilu; Ba mu tshisamba tshia Ashê, lubombo ne binunu bibidi: Ba mu tshisamba tshia Simeona, lubombo ne binunu bibidi; Ba mu tshisamba tshia Zebulona, lubombo ne binunu bibidi; Ku nyima kua malu a nakatangila, ne mona, tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu tshiakadi muntu kai mua kubala, munkatshi mua ditunga dionso, ne munkatshi mua bisamba bionso, ne bantu bonso, ne miaku yonso, bimana ku mpala kua nkuasa wa butumbi ne ku mpala kua Muana wa Mukoko, baluatshishibue maye, ka matoke, bikale ne malala a mabue mu bianza biabo
Wakututuma kudibu bua tshinyi
Ndi nuambila ne, Nasha; badi binuikala kanui nukudimuna mitshima yenu, buonso buenu nenufue muomumue
Samuel Mu matuku au Bena Peleshete bakasangisha masalayi abo bua kuluanganabo ne Bena Isalele
Yakoba wakabikila muaba wakayikidileye ne Nzambi ne Betele
Bua bikata kumushibua kuabo kuakulua dilengesha dia ba ha buloba ne Nzambi, ditabushibua diabo nedilue tshinyi tshikuabo, anu muoyo wa ku bafue mene
Kuhikula kua Ban a Bute Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ubale ban a bute balume bonso ba Bena Isalele ba mu ngondo umue to ne ha mutu, funda bungi bua mena abo
Yeye wakindilaku Samuele matuku muanda mutekete bu muakahungeye n andi dî; kadi Samuele kakaha ku Gilegala; bantu bakabanga kumumuangalala
Bakakolesha lumbu lua Yelushalema tô ne ku lumbu lua muhimbu munene
Nuye mu ditunga edi didi ne biakudia bia bungi
Wanuitabusha udi ungitabusha meme, wangitabusha meme udi witabusha wakuntuma
Sungula muaba muimpe wa mu ditunga bua basemu
Nemmuande bukuondo buanyi, neakuatshibue mu buteyi buanyi; nendue n andi ku Babulona, nemmulumbuluishileku bua ditomboka diandi diakantombokeleye
Bualu bua dikamakama diandi mu masandi andi buloba buakanyanguka, ne wakenda masandi ne mabue ne bibasa bia mitshi

Benaya, muana wa Yehoyada, muana wa muena bukitu wa mu Kabesele, wakadi muenze malu manene, wakashiha bana babidi ba Aliele wa mu Moaba; yeye kabidi wakabuela mu lubuebue, wakashiha nyama wa ntambue hakadi neige hanshi ha buloba
Abalahama ne Sala bakadi ne bidimu bia bungi, bakadi bakoke, miloû ya bakashi yakashika kudi Sala
Kadi mpindiewu, Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wenu mmunuvudije bu mitotu ya mulu

Yoaba wakambila mukelenge ne, Yehowa, Nzambi webe, akumbashe bantu bu mudiye musue, nansha misangu lukama lukama, mesu a mukelenge wanyi atangile bualu ebu; kadi mukelenge wanyi udi ukeba disanka ku bualu ebu bua tshinyi

Ku Aloê udi ku muelelu wa tshibanda tshia Ânona ne ku musoko mukuabo udi mu tshibanda tô ne ku Gilada, katuakasangana musoko umue wakatuhita bukole bua kûnyenga; Yehowa, Nzambi wetu, wakafua misoko yonso mu tshianza tshietu; anu buloba bua Bena Amona, katuakalua ha buihi n abu; buloba buonso bua dishiya dia kasulu ka Yaboka, ne misoko ya ku mikuna ne miaba yonso yakatukanda Yehowa, Nzambi wetu
Kulongololabu bimenga ebi bimpe, kubikolesha ne bimana

Nunku hakunvuabo mukenji wa mukelenge ne dî diandi, ne hakasangishabo bansongakashi ba bungi mu nsubu wa mukelenge wa mu Shushana mu bianza bia Hegai, Esetê wakadi mufidibue mu nsubu wa mukelenge; bakamufila mu bianza bia Hegai, mulami wa bakashi
Kadi Yeye ke uvua munudianjidile mu njila, bua kunukebela muaba wa kuasa mitanda
Kadi wewe wimane biebe hehi n anyi, nenkuambile mei onso, ne mikenji ne malu bindi musue wewe kubamanyisha, bua bobo babienze mu buloba bundi nnuha
Butuku budi buamba kutshia, munya wakusemena ha buihi, nunku tuvule bienzedi bia midima, tuluate bintu bia nvita bia munya
Samuele wakatendelela Yehowa

Yehowa mene wakamuambila ne, Hitshila mu musoko, munkatshi mua misesu ya Yelushalema mene, funda tshimanyinu ha mpala ha bantu badi bahumuna muoyo ne badi badila bualu bua malu a bundu adi bakuabo benza munkatshi muau
Kadi ubambile ne, Matuku akukumbana ne tshikena kumona tshionso netshijadikibue
Hakamona bayidi bandi bualu ebu, bakakema ne, Mutshi wa nfigi wakafuba lubilu nunku munyi
Uliya wakumuka ku nsubu wa mukelenge; mukelenge wakamutumina bia kudia
Kanuena bamanye ne badi benza mudimu ne bintu bia tshijila, badi badia bintu bia mu ntempelo; ne badi bakuata mudimu wa tshioshelu badi bangata tshituha tshiabo ku tshioshelu, anyi
Bantu bonsu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Yuda badi
Nempe bantu aba dikasa dimpe kudi Bena Ejipitu, ne hayabo, kabena baye ne bianza bituhu
Hashishe Shaula wakasemena ha buihi ne Samuele ku tshibi, wakamuebesha ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Ungambile kudi nsubu kua mumonyi wa malu
Kadi nuenu kanuakatumikila dî dianyi; nuakuenza nunku bua tshinyi
difila ne dilama mikanda ya nzubu mu dineemeka dia bulongolodi bwa ditunga;
Bakamukonka ne, Wewe kabidi udi mukuabo wa bayidi bandi, nasha

Mose wakabikila Datana ne Abilama, bana balume ba Eliaba, ne bobo bakamba ne, Katuena tulua, bualu budi bukese bua wewe wakumuka n etu mu buloba budi bûle tente ne mabele ne buitshi bua kubishiha mu tshihela, udi musue kudibandisha bu mukelenge wetu kabidi, anyi

Yehowa neafikishe kûdi wewe, ne kudi bantu bebe, ne kudi ba mu nsubu wa tatu webe, matuku mabi adi kayi manji kulua diambedi, katshia difuku diahanduluka Bena Efelayima kudi Bena Yuda, neanutumine mukelenge wa Ashû mene
Bakamuebesha ne, Biwikala kui Kilisto, kui Eliya, kui muprofete au, tshiudi ubatijila bantu ntshinyi

Nyeye unakusungula tshihela bu nsubu wandi, Yeye udi useka diyoyo didi mu musoko, Udi wendakana ha mutu ha mikuna bu muaba wandi wa kudileye mashinde, Mbowa udi witabusha bua kukukuatshila mudimu, anyi
Kadi ndi ntshina ne, Bu muakadi nyoka udinga Eva ne budimu buandi, bumue meshi enu neahambuishibue ku dilamata diau ne butoke buau bidi kudi Kilisto
Yeshaya wakabambila ne, Nuambile mukelenge wenu ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Kanutshinyi mei anuakunvua akumpenda n au bantu ba mukelenge wa Ashû
Nunku, tshihungidi tshia kumudia ka tshiakujadikibua katshî ne mashi
Padiye umona ne: mputa mmutokoloke tshiakabidi, neambe ne: mputa wa mushindu ewu kena ne mikiya to
Bobo bakabanyangana maloba a bisamba bia bantu akadi kukala kua mai manene, muntu ne muaku wandi, muntu ne muaku wandi, bu mudi meku abo ne bisamba biabo
Yeye wakamba ne, Wangate muan ebe mulume, muana umuehele, ûdi munange, Isaka mene, uye biebe mu buloba bua Moliya, umufileku bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kalua, ha mutu ha mukuna undualua kukulesha
Bayidi bakatangilangana, bela mpata munda ne, Udiye wamba nganyi
Nujadike ne: buloba ne budi ne bufuke, anyi budi buatuka

Aba mbana balume ba Gilada: Yezê ne meku a Bena Yezê, Heleke ne meku a Bena Heleke; Aseliele ne meku a Bena Aseliele; Shekeme ne meku a Bena Shekeme; Shenuda ne meku a Bena Shenuda, Hefê ne meku a Bena Hefê
Kanudi mashi; bua nukume dikasa dimpe ne bana benu badi banulonda ku nyima, hanuenza malu adi mimpe ku mesu kua Yehowa
Makonka adi ajuka mu mitshima yenu bua tshinyi
Muadi newikalemu ne kusumakana menu, hanuatangila Abalahama ne Isaka ne Yakoba ne baprofete bonso bashikame ku mesa mu bukelenge bua Nzambi, ne hanuaditangila bahatula ku bula
Neajadike ntshinyi andi a kushimbula n au ngumbu ku mpala kua ngumbu yebe, neashimbule bibumba ku bisui biandi
Esawu kuitaba ne: Ke meme ewu, tatu
Bakamuha argent makumi muanda mutekete ya mu nsubu wa Bâla belita; ne Abimeleke wakafuta n ai bantu bahote ne ba hatuhu bakamulonda
Kakahanda dime diakadi hanshi, monai, tshintu tshikese tshibulunge tshiakadi ha tshihela, tshiakadi tshikese bu dime dikuatakane ha buloba

Hakahangabo kubasanganamu, bakakoka Yasona ne bana babo bakuabo ba mu Kilisto ku mpala kua bakelenge ba musoko, bakela mbila ne, Bantu aba bakamana kutombuesha bonso ba ha buloba bakufika kunoko kabidi; Yasona wakababuesha mu nsubu muandi; bantu aba bonso batu benza malu adi ashiha mikenshi ya Kaisa, bamba ne, Mukelenge mukuabo udiku, dina diandi Yesu
Bena Amona bakaluhuka, bakasa mualu wa nvita ku tshibuelelu tshia musoko; ne bakelenge bakalua kudibo bakadi ha buabo mu tshisuku

Hakafika bakuabo bakadi ku mutu kua meku abo ku nsubu wa Yehowa wa mu Yelushalema, bakafila bintu biabo bu muakasua mitshima yabo kufila bia kuasabo n abi nsubu wa Nzambi mu muaba wandi; bu muakadibo bamanye mua kufila, bakafila bintu mu tshibutshilu tshia bintu bia mudimu, dariques Nunku bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne bantu bakuabo ne bimbi ba misambu ne batuadi ba bintu ne Bena Netinima Ezra Hakafika ngondo wa muanda mutekete, hakadi Bena Isalele bashikame mu misoko yabo, buonso buabo bakadisangisha bu muntu umue ku Yelushalema

Bualu bua mitshima yabo idi yelangana meji a kuenzela bantu bibi, Badi bibaka nsubu ne meji, Lungenyi ludi lûshisha nsubu idi munda muandi tente Muena meji udi mukole; Bua, hakuhabo lungenyi lua kuenza, neumanye mua kuluangana nvita; Meji adi atamba muhote bule; Udi uhangidisha bua kuenza malu mabi, Kuhangidisha buhote kudi bualu bubi; Biwateketa halua dituku dia dikenga, Handisha badibo baya n abo ku lufu; Biwamba ne, Kabiakadi bamanye muanda eu, Muan anyi, udie buitshi, bualu bua budi buimpe, Wamanya ne meji adi muomumue ku muoyo webe: Wewe muntu mubi, kualaminyi ku muaba udi muntu muakane mushikame; Bualu bua muntu muakane udi uhona misangu muanda mutekete, udi ubika kabidi; Kusanki hahona muena lukuna webe, bua Yehowa kamonyi mudiye Kudinyengabashi bua benji ba malu mabi, Bualu bua muntu mubi kena ne nshikidilu muimpe; Muan anyi, tshina Yehowa ne mukelenge kabidi; Bualu bua dibutuka diabo dilualua lukasa; udi mumanye kabutu Mei â kabidi adi mei akamba bena meji
Tuetu kushala ku mikuna ya Seyire matuku mapite bungi
Hakalela Seluga Nahô, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama ibidi, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Wewe muine udi mumanye hanashikama hanshi ne hanajuka; udi ujingulula meji anyi hantshidi kule
Mukuabo, hakamoneye ne, Nakulengeshibua, wakahingana utumbisha Nzambi ne dî dikole; wakadihonena, wakatua mpala wandi hanshi ku makasa a Yesu, wakamusakidila; yeye wakadi Muena Samalea

Hashishe baminyampala bakambila mukelenge ne, Tudi tukusengelela bua bashihe muntu eu, bualu bua udi utekesha maboko a bena nvita badi bashala mu musoko eu, ne maboko a bantu bakuabo bonso, habambileye mei a nunku; bualu bua muntu eu kena ukebela bantu diakalengele, kadi udi ubakebela dikenga
Yeye wakitabusha Yehowa, ne Yehowa wakabala kuitabusha kuandi ne, Mbuakane buandi

Nakadi mu nsubu webe nunku to bidimu makumi abidi, nakakukuatshila mudimu bidimu dikumi ne binai bua bana bebe ba bakashi babidi, ne bidimu bisambombo bua bimuna biebe, ne wewe wakakudimuna difutu dianyi misangu dikumi
Butshia dinda, Moshe uya mu ntenta wa kusambakena, kusangana dikombu dia Arone, muena diku dia Levi, dimane kusasa, diele bilongu, dikuame ne bimuma bimane kuboba
Bualu ebu buakulua kundi munyi, bua mamu wa Mukelenge wanyi wakulua kundi
Kakuakadi bualu mu luesu kabidi
Tusangishe bintu bia kudia mu bidimu ebi bimpe, tubiteke mu bianza bia Palo bua bantu kudiabo mu bimenga, tubilame bimpe
Noa wakabanga kuikala tshidime ne yeye wakakuna mitshi ya tumuma tukese
Hakafuma Amasaya ku kushiha kua Bena Edome, yeye wakalua ne mpingu ya Bena Seî, wakayimanyika bu nzambi yandi, wakakukuila ku mpala kuai, wakayoshela musenga wa manananshi
Wewe udi Wamba kadi udi wamba mei a hatuhu ne, Hatuahunga dî, tudi ne bukole bua kuluangana n abu
Yeye wakaya, wakamba malu manene akamuenzela Yesu mu musoko wonso

Kakunyua Yalobama, muana wa Nebata, lumu elu bualu bua yeye wakatshidi mu Ejipitu kuakanyemeye ku mesu kua mukelenge Solomo; Yalobama wakadi ushikama mu Ejipitu, ne bakatuma dî bua kumubikila , nunku Yalobama ne Bena Isalele bonso bakadisangisha hamue, bakambila Lehabama ne, Tatu webe wakanemesha mutshi wa tshikokedi wetu bujitu butambe; nunku wewe uheheshe bujitu bua mudimu eu mukole wakatuenzesha tatu webe ne mutshi wa tshikokedi wa bujitu bubi wakatutekeleye, nunku tuetu netukukuatshile mudimu
Bana balume ba Alona nebabioshile ha tshioshelu, ha nkunyi idi mu kahia tshintu etshi ntshintu tshia mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia, bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Bu muele wa nvula udi uhenya ku esete, ne udi umueneka ku wesete; kulua kua Muana wa muntu nekuikale nunku
Mpindiewu ngajadiki ne: udi untshina meme Mvidi Mukulu, bualu kuena mumpale muanebe umuepele umvua mukupeshe
Nyama ya mpunda yakadi binunu makumi asatu ne nkama itanu, ne mulambu wa Yehowa wakadi makumi asambombo ne umue
Mutu wa muntu yonso wakalua dikunyi, diaha dia muntu yonso diakadi ne mabuba; kadi yeye kakaheta difutu, ne masalayi andi kâkangata difutu, bua mudimu wakenzabo wa nvita ne Bena Tulo
Yehoshafata, muana wa Asa, wakabanga kukokesha mu Yuda mu tshidimu tshinai tshia bukelenge bua Ahaba, mukelenge wa Isalele
Elisha wakateka bianza biandi ha bianza bia mukelenge
Bobu kuandamuna ne: Mukalenga, tuetu tudi bamunyi ba bimuna bu muvua bankambua betu
Nunku Hananya muprofete wakafua tshidimu atshi mene mu ngondo wa muanda mutekete
Bantu bakadi ku mutu kua musoko kabakamanya kunakaya anyi malu anakenza; tshiakanza kuambila Bena Yuda anyi bakuidi anyi bantu banene anyi bakadi ku mutu kua musoko anyi benji ba mudimu
Mukokeshi ikale ne buloba bua ku nseke yonso ibidi ya buloba bua tshijila ne ya buloba bua musoko

Meme kabidi ndi ku nyima kua bakuabo, ndi ne masalayi ku nyima kuanyi; ntu ngambila edi disalayi ne, Ya, yeye waya; ntu ngambila dikuabo ne, Lua, yeye walua; ntu ngambila Buntu wanyi ne, Enza bualu ebu, yeye wenza
Tuakalota bilota bubidi bualu, muntu tshiandi tshiota muntu tshiandi tshilota butuku bumue, mutuadi wa maluvu ne mulambi wa bidia bia mukelenge wa Ejipitu, bakadi basuikila mu nsubu wa lukanu
Hakamanya Hamana ne, Môdekai kena utua binu hanshi, kena unkukuila, yeye wakûlangana ne tshiji tshikole
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Ku tshikondo etshi, hakumbana ngondo yebe, wewe neukongoluele muana wa balume
Kashidi Yuda kena mubuelele kabidi Tamare mu nzubu to

Biatangila muakuidi ne disama kadiena ditampakane mu tshilulu, nansha mu milongo ya buludi nansha mu milongo ya butshiama nansha mu tshintu tshia tshiseba, muakuidi neambile bantu ne, Nuvuwe tshintu tshidi ne disama, ne yeye neatshiteke ha buatshi matuku muanda mutekete makuabo
Pilato wakabakonka ne, Nudi basue meme nulekelele Mukelenge wa Bena Yuda, anyi
Bienzedi bikuabo bia Yehoyakima ne malu onso akenzeye kabiena bifunda mu mukanda wa kulondolola kua malu a bakelenge ba Yuda, anyi
Bualu bua tshiena munusue, anyi
Mona biebe ne, Eu ndi mukenji bua ntempelo
Labana wakamuambila ne Bingikala ne diakalengele ku mesu kuebe ushale biebe, bualu bua meme nakumana kujingulula ne, Yehowa wakunsankisha bua bualu buebe

Dutelonone Biabika muprofete anyi mulotshi wa bilota munkatshi muenu, udi unulesha tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema; ne hashikisheye tshimanyinu anyi bualu bua kukema bua kunubikila ne, Tuye, tulonde nzambi mikuabo mudi kanuyi bamanye, tuyenzele mudimu; kanunvu mei a muprofete au, anyi mulotshi au wa bilota; bualu bua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi munutete, bua kumanya ne, Nudi basue Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne mitshima yenu yonso ne muoyo wenu wonso
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Ashe, Pagiele muana mulume wa Okelana
Wewe newikale ne diese ne disanka; bantu ba bungi nebasanke bualu bua kuledibua kuandi
Basanto bonso badi banutumina muoyo
Bena Peleshete bakadi ku mutu kua mukuna ku luseke lumue ne Bena Isalele bakadi ku mutu kua mukuna ku luseke lukuabo, tshibanda tshiakadi hankatshi habo
Nunku bantu ba mukelenge Hezikiya bakafika kudi Yeshaya
Hebrews Bualu bua Melekisedeke eu, mukelenge wa Salema, muakuidi wa Nzambi Mutambe Bunene wa mu diulu, wakasangakana ne Abalahama hakadiye uhingana ku kushiha kuandi kua bakelenge, ne wakamusankisha
Davidi wakalambishila Abinê ne bantu bakadi n andi bidia bia disanka
Sheba ne Dedana ne bangend a mushinga ba ku Tâshishi ne bana babo banene nebakuele dikonka ne, Wakulua biebe bua kuhaula bantu aba, anyi
Bena Izrayele bonsu bavua bamuindile bangabanga ne kutuadija luendu
Hakamanya Yesu munda munda ne, Bayidi banyi badi bajiana bua dî edi, wakabakonka ne, Bualu ebu budi bunulenduisha, anyi
Dibue dindi muimanyike edi ndia tshijila
Exodus Mose Wakabikila tshisumbu tshionso tshia Bena Isalele, wakabambila ne, Â mmalu adi Yehowa musue nuenu nuenze

Tuditunuelela mukenji kabidi ne, Kanulambuishi bakuidi ne Bena Lewi ne bimbi ba misambu ne batuadi ba bintu ne Bena Netinima Wewe, Ezela, bu mudi lungenyi lua Nzambi webe lûdi n alu mu tshianza tshiebe, sungula balumbuluishi banene ne ba juge bua bobo balumbuluile bantu bonso badi dishiya dia musulu wa Pelata, bonso badi bamanye mikenji ya Nzambi webe; uyishe yonso udi kayi muyimanye
Mulume enzele mukashi wandi budiye n abu bualu; ne mukashi kabidi enzele mulume wandi budiye n abu bualu
Utujimishile mibi yetu, bualu bua tuetu tudi tulekelele muntu yonso udi n etu dibanza
Yeye wakamulelela kabidi Shâfa, tatu wa Mademana, ne Shewa tatu wa Makebena ne tatu wa Gibea; muana wa bakashi wa Kaleba wakadi Akasa
Hakabambila Mukelenge Yesu nunku, wakangatshibua mu diulu, wakashikama ku tshianza tshikole tshia Nzambi
Yeye muine wakututuadila malu mabi etu mu mubidi wandi ku mutshi mutshiamakane, bua tuetu, bamane kufua ku malu mabi, tuikale ne muoyo wa ku buakane; kunuakuondahibua ku mibundabunda yandi
Exodus Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ulue biebe kudi Yehowa ne wewe ne Alona ne Nadaba ne Abihu ne bakulu ba Bena Isalele makumi muanda mutekete, nuntendelele ha bule

Kanungu ka Mweena Kongu yônso udi ne tshia kupangisha muntu yônso anyi tshisumbu tshia bantu mwa kwangata bukalenga ku bukole anyi mwa kudia bukalenga bikala badiaata ku makasa bulongolodi budi mu Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadio edi
Mamuende Rebeka kumuandamuna ne: Muananyi, mulawu awu unkuate meme

Bakenza mbalanda ne makunshi: bule buandi buakadi coudées makumi atanu, butshiama buandi buakadi coudées makumi asatu; mbalanda wakadi ku mpala kuabi, makunshi ne mushiku wa mbelu biakadi ku mpala kuabi

Hakadiye wakulangana abo bualu bua buakane, ne bua didikanda, ne bua tshilumbuluidi tshilualua, Felika wakatshina bikole, wakamba ne, Ya biebe katataka; hanaheta tshikondo tshiakane, nenkubikile kundi
Eliya wakakohola tshikowelu tshiandi, wakatshivunga wakatula ha mai, ne mai akahanduluka eku ne eku; bubidi buabo bakasabuka ha buloba bûme
kalala Oholibama, kalala Ela, kalala Pinona, kalala Kenaza, kalala Temana, kalala Mi bezâ, kalala Magadiele, kalala Hama
Davidi wakamanya ne, Shaula wakalua kukeba muoyo wanyi
Sheme, Apakashada, Shela, Ebê, Pelege, Leu, Seluga, Nahô, Tela, Abalama udi Abalahama mene

Yai, Muena Gilada, wakabika ku nyima kuandi, wakalumbulula Bena Isalele bidimu makumi abidi ne bibidi, Yeye wakadi ne bana balume makumi asatu bakadi benda ha nyima ha bana ba nyama ya mpunda makumi asatu, bakadi ne misoko makumi asatu idibo babikila ne, Hawota yai tô ne lelu, idi mu buloba bua Gilada
Nakuolola tshianza tshianyi, kakuakadi muntu wakuitaba
Yesu wakasua Mâta, ne muan abo wa bakashi, ne Lazalo
Bintu bimpe bia manyi ne bia tumuma tukese ne bia manvua ne bia mamuma adibo bahuola diambedi, bintu bionso bidibo bafila kudi Yehowa, nakukuha bintu ebi
Nunku hanuahuola bintu, nenufile tshi tuha tshitanu kudi Palô ne nuenu nenushale ne bituha binai bua kukunaku kabidi ne bua kudidisha ne bonso banudi n abo mu nsubu yenu, ne bana benu bakese
Kadi yeye wakamutumina miloho yamba ne, Ndi n ebe bualu kai, wewe mukelenge wa Yuda
Yishemaele, muana wa Netanya, wakaya n abo mu buhika, wakabanga kusabuka musulu bua kuya kudi Bena Amona

Nuenu nutumikile mei anyi ne mikenji yanyi, kanuenji bilele ebi bidi bitambe bubi, nansha bana baledibue mu nsubu yenu nansha benyi badi munkatshi muenu bualu bua bena buloba bakadi ku mpala kuenu bakenza malu mabi â onso, ne buloba buakoneka , buloba kabunuluki kabidi hanuabuona, bu muakadi buloba buluka tshisamba tshiakadi ku mpala
Kanuikadi ne muntu dinga dibanza anu dia kunangangana; bua wananga mukuabo wakushikisha mikenshi
Wakasungula bidikishilu biabu nganyi, biwamanya mua kungambila
Mu tshidimu tshia disanka dinene budimi nebuhingane kudi wakabuhana, kudi muena budimi mene

Bikala muntu muenze bualu bubi bua lufu, ne badi bamushiha, nebamuowe ku mutshi; kabashiyi tshitalu tshiandi ku mutshi butuku bujima, bamujike anu dituku adi mene; muntu yonso muowa ku mutshi udi muedibue mulau kudi Nzambi; kanunyangi buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha bua nuenu kubuhiana
Hashishe, yeye wakambila bantu bandi ne, Bintu bia dibanji bidi bilongolola, kadi bantu banakulayila kabena bimpe
Bukokeshi bua Yehoyakima Kul
Bakamukonka ne, Wewe nganyi
Shaula wakamba ne, Tuyai, tulonde Bena Peleshete butuku ebu, tukuate bintu biabo tô ne hatshiabu: katubashidi nansha muntu wabo umue

Badi bajingakane bu mingonge ya meba, Umue wakahatuka kûdi, Yehowa udi wamba dî edi ne, Mpindiu nentshibule mutshi wandi wa tshikokedi udi ha nshingu hebe, Yehowa wakuela mukenji bua bualu buebe ne, Monai, ha mikuna hadi makasa a messager Nahum Mubutudi udi ulua kukubunda Bualu bua Yehowa udi ujadika butumbi bua Yakoba Ngabu ya bena bukitu bandi idi mikunze kunzû, Makalu a mata adi e nza diyoyo mu misesu, Mukelenge wa Ashû udi uvuluka bilobo biandi, Bibi bia ku nkila ya misulu bidi biunzuluka, Bakukuata mukelenge mukashi, Kale Ninewe wakadi mule tente ne bantu, Haulai biamu bia argent
Bua bunene buakamuhesheye, bantu ba bisamba bionso ne ba mu miaku yonso bakazakala ku mpala kuandi ne bakamutshina
Hashishe Solomo wakamba ne, Yehowa wakamba ne, Meme nenshikame mu mîdima mikole

Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba nunku ne, Bualu bua wakadifuishisha bundu, ne butaka buebe buakamueneka hawakenda masandi ne balunda bebe, ne bua mpingu yonso ya tshikama tshiebe kabidi, ne bua mashi a bana bebe bawakafila kudiyi, bua malu â nensangishe balunda bebe bonso bawakadisankisha n abo, bonso bawakananga mene ne bonso bawakadi n abo lukuna hohamue; nenkunguishe bantu aba ba ku nseke yonso bua kukutshintshimikabo, nemmueneshe butaka buebe kudibo bua bobo babumone hatoke
Bena Izrayele bonsu kukeba mua kubasa mabue, kubashipa
Ubele mikaba ku bimono, Alona ne bana bandi balume, teka bifulu ha mitu habo, bobo nebikale ne mudimu wa buakuidi tshiendelele, wewe neujidile Alona ne bana bandi balume
Revelation Nakunvua dî dikole difuma ku ntempelo diambila banjelo muanda mutekete ne, Yai bienu nuhongolole mpanza muanda mutekete ya tshishi tshia Nzambi ha buloba

Luhehele lua ku nôde ludi lulua ne nvula; Kushikama ha ditumba dia ha mutu ha nsubu kudi kutamba Bu mudi mai ma tulala kudi muntu muhungile bua nyota, Bu mudi mushimi wa mai mudiata muinshi mua makasa ne bu mudi mpokolo munyanguke, Kambimpe bua kudia buitshi bua bungi; nunku kambimpe bua bantu bakononone butumbi buabo

Joshua Au mmahianyi akangata Bena Isalele mu buloba bua Kanâna, akababanyinabo kudi Eleazâ muakuidi, ne Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, ne kudi bakadi ku mutu kua meku a batatu a mu bisamba bia Bena Isalele; bakatahulula muhianyi abo ne nshobo, bu muakambila Yehowa Mose, bua bisamba tshitema ne bua tshituha tshia tshisamba
Yeye wakosha musenga wa manananshi mu tshibanda tshia muana wa Hinoma kabidi; wakosha bana bandi mu kahia, bu muakadi tshilele tshibi tshia bisamba biakadi Yehowa muihate ku mpala kua Bena Isalele
Bana balume ba Nafatale ku meku abo Yasele ne meku a Bena Yasele; Guni ne meku a Bena Guni; Yesê ne meku a Bena Yesê, Shilema ne meku a Bena Shilema
Hakalela Shela Ebê, yeye wakashala ne muoyo bidimu nkama mai ne bisatu, wakalela bana balume ne bana bakashi
Dina dia muana yonsu dikale difunda pa dibue bu mudi tshitampi
Bu muakadi bana ba nkasa tshituha tshia tshiamu tshifike ne tshituha tshia dima, nunku bukelenge abu nebuikale tshituha ne bukole, tshituha ne butekete
Wewe udi ne diboko bu dia Nzambi, anyi
Wakalua kudiye, wakadi muimane ha buihi ne mulambu wandi wa kuosha ha kahia, miloho ya Moaba yakadi n andi
Neulele bana anu mu dikenga
Udi ne matshu unvue biandi
Ndi ngamba ne, Lungenyi ludibo bakulesha ne bukole buebe bua kuluangana n abu nvita bidi anu mei a hatuhu
Ku luseke lua sude, ku mpala kua muaba wa coudées makumi abidi ne buludiludi ne nsubu mukuabo, kuakadi mulongo mukuabo wa nsubu

Muntu udi mûkute udi udiata dikatshi dia buitshi muinshi mua makasa, Bu mudi nyunyu udi uhambuka, umuka ku disua diandi, Manyi ne manananshi bidi bisankisha muntu; Kulekedi mulunda webe ne mulunda wa tatu webe; Muan anyi, wikale ne meji, usankishe mutshima wanyi, Muntu mudimuke udi utangila dikenga diamba kumukuata, udi usokoma; Angata tshivualu tshia muntu udi mueyeke muenyi tshieya; ukuate udi mueyeke ba tshisamba tshia bende Biavudishila muntu muena mutumba n andi disanka ne dî dikole ne dinda dionso, Kumatamata kua mai dituku dia nvula wa mudimbi Udi ukeba kumukanda udi bu udi ukanda luhehele, Bu mudi tshiamu tshisakisha tshinga tshiamu, Muntu udi ulama mutshi wa nfigi neadie mamuma au, Bu mudi mpala umueneka mu mai, Muaba wa Bafue ne wa Kubutuka Luesu ludiku lua kulengesha tshiamu tshia argent, Biwatua muhote ne muinshi mu tshinu Umanye bimpe mudi mushindu wa bisumbu bia mikoko yebe, Bualu bua biuma kabienaku tshiendelele; Hatahabo bisoso bia kudisha bana ba mikoko nebikaleku bua bivualu biebe, Newikale ne mabele a mbushi makumbane bua bia kudia biebe, Proverbs Bantu babi badi banyema kakuyi muntu udi ubihata, Bua ditomboka dia ba ha buloba bakokeshi babu badi ba bungi; Muntu muhele udi ukengesha bahele Badi balekela kulonda diyisha dia mikenji badi batumbisha bantu babi, Bantu babi kabena bajingulula kulumbulula kuakane, Muntu muhele udi wenda mu buakane bua mutshima udi utamba Udi utumikila diyisha dia mikenji udi muana mulume udi ne meji, Udi utudisha biuma biandi ku kasombela ne ku makasa Udi umusha matshu andi ku diyisha dia mikenji, Udi uhambuisha bantu bakane bua bobo bende mu nshila mubi Muntu mubanji udi wela meji ne, Ndi ne meji, Hatumba bantu bakane, butumbi bunene budiku; Udi usokoka matomboka andi kena wikala ne diakalengele, Disanka didi kudi muntu udi utshina malu mabi misangu yonso, Bu nyama wa ntambue udi udila, anyi bu nkashama udi ukeba nyama ya kudia, Mukokeshi udi kayi ne lungenyi udi mukengeshi mukole kabidi; Muntu udibo bahisha bualu bua mashi a munga muntu adi ham bidi handi aye mu dijimba; Muntu udi wenda mu buakane neahandishibue, Udi udima budimi buandi neikale ne bia kudia bia bungi, Muntu udi mua kueyemenyibua neavudishibue ne masanka a bungi, Kulesha kansungusungu kakuena kuimpe; Muena lukuka udi wenda lukasa bua kuheta biuma, Udi ubela muntu neahete diakalengele dihite Udi wiba bintu bia tatu andi anyi bia mamu andi, Udi ne mutshima wa lukuka udi usonsola matandu, Udi weyemena mutshima wandi udi muhote, Udi uha bahele bintu kena ukengela tshintu, Habuela bantu babi mu bukokeshi, banga bantu badi basokoma; Proverbs Muntu udi mubedibue misangu ya bungi, kadi udi wela mpala mulu, Hikala bantu bakane ne bukokeshi, bantu badi basanka; Muntu udi unanga meji udi usankisha tatu andi, Mukelenge udi ujadika buloba buandi ku kulumbulula kuakane, Udi ubomba muena mutumba n andi Mu ditomboka dia muntu mubi mudi buteyi, Muntu muakane udi mumanye ne, Bahele badi bakengela kulumbulula kuakane, Babuidi badi batemesha kahia mu musoko, Biatandangana muena meji ne muhote mu tshilumbu, Badi bakeba kumatshisha mashi badi bakina muntu muakane;
