Muhote udi uhatula tshiji tshionso tshidiye n atshi, Biunvua mukokeshi mei a mashimi, Muhele ne mukengeshi badi basangile hamue; Bialumbuluisha mukelenge bahele ne lulamatu lua bushuwa, Lukodi ne kubela bidi biyisha meji, Hikala bantu babi mu bukokeshi, ditomboka didi didiunda; Kengesha muan ebe bua kumuyisha, ne neakuhe dikisha; Bikalaku kakuyi tshikena kumona tshia muprofete, bantu badi balekela kudikanda; Kabena bamanye mua kuyisha muhika ne mei nkayau; Udi umona muntu udi wamba mei andi lukasa lukasa, anyi
Kadi katataka nyaya ku Yelushalema bua kukuatshisha basanto

Nunku juka biebe, uluhuke, wambile bantu bebe mei a kubasamba n au; bualu bua ndi muditshihe kudi Yehowa ne, Biwahidia kuluhuka kudibo, nansha muntu umue neikale n ebe butuku ebu; dikenga edi neditambe makenga onso akakukuata ku buana buebe tô ne katataka bubi
Kadi neikale mupie mikiya too ne ku dilolu
Biakulenduisha tshianza tshiebe tshia balume, watshikosa, watshimasha, bualu bua kujimisha tshintu tshimue tshia mubidi webe kudi kutamba kuya kua mubidi wonso mu Ngena

Malachi Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Monai, ndi ntuma messager wanyi, yeye nealongolole nshila ku mpala kuanyi; Mukelenge unudi nukeba nealue lubilu mu ntempelo wandi, messager wa dihungila, unudi n andi disanka, monai mudiye ulua
Bena Isalele Badi Bumuka ku Sinai Mu tshidimu tshibidi, mu ngondo muibidi, mu matuku makumi abidi a ngondo eu, ditutu bakumuka ku mutu kua ntenta wa dimanyisha ba Yehowa
Mu nzubu wa tshijila wa Maweja Nangila, ke munudi mua kudila biakudia bia tshijila, pamue ne bena meku enu bonsu
Wewe neuyiteke mu ntenta wa kusambakena ku mpala kua mushete kundi ndimuenesha, muaba utudi tusangakana n ebe
Bienzedi Bapostolo ne bana babo ba mu Kilisto bakadi mu Yudaya bakunvua ne, Bisamba bia bende kabidi biakuangata dî dia Nzambi
Kadi amu wewe ne ndelanganyi yebe nenubuele muaba udi mushete wa ndondu
Kadi badi bamubenga, udi ubanyoka lukasa, ubabutula
Malu onso anudi nuenza, nuenze ne mitshima yenu bu munudi nuenzela Mukelenge; kembu munudi nuenzela bantu; bualu bua nudi bamanye ne, Netuangate difutu dia buhianyi kudi Mukelenge
Bua bantu bakutaheye bahone hanshi badi ba bungi; Nsubu wandi udi nshila wa ku Muaha wa Bafue, Proverbs Meji kaena ela dî diau, anyi
Satana wakahuela munda mua Yudasa, wakadibo babikila ne Isakaliote, yeye wakadi wabo wa ba dikumi ne babidi
Kanungu ka Kakuyi dinyangakaja dia bulongolodi bukwabo bwa Dîyi dikulu ditudi nadi edi,mianda idi ilonda eyi idi ku bukookeshi bwa nsungansunga bwa bukalenga bunene:
Yeye wakamuambila ne, Tatu wanyi, wewe wakabulula mukana muebe kudi Yehowa, ungenzele bu mu dî diakahatuka mukana muebe, bualu bua Yehowa wakasombuela bena lukuna bebe, Bena Amona mene, bualu buebe
Badi mwa kubikilamu mwena bukalenga bunene mukwabo yônso

Bualu bua hanakalua n abo mu buloba bunakaditshiha bua kubaha, ne bobo bakatangisha mesu abo ku mukuna wonso mule anyi ku mutshi wonso wa mabeshi a bungi, bakafilahu milambu yabo, bakafilahu bintu biakankuatshisha tshiji; bakoshelaku bintu bia muhuya muimpe, bakahongololaku milambu ya bia kunua
Kumuasaye tshifulu ku mutu
Bamuteke ku butshika bua tshitudilu matuku muanda mutekete, ne ku nyima nebamuhingishe kabidi
Nunku mukelenge ne Bena Isalele bonso bakajidila nsubu wa Yehowa
Nunku badi babikila muaba au ne, Bâla pelasima
Pavua Yakobe musombe muaba awu, Rubene kubuelela Bila, mukaji mupika wa tatuende, mu nzubu
Biakuma ngombe mulume anyi mukashi ne nsengu yandi ne biafueye, nebakume ngombe mabue, kabadi munyinyi wandi nansha, kadi muena ngombe neabinge
Hazaele wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Kanuena nutujiana, nudi nujiana Yehowa
Balami bai kabena bayifuila luse
Muntu yonso udi uhambuisha muntu mufofo mu nshila udi ne mulau
Bua nuelangane meshi bua yeye wakukankamana mu ditontolola dia nunku dia bantu babi diakamutontololabo n adi, bua nuenu kanuhungidi, hikala batekete mu mitshima yenu
Kayena ikala kabidi bu tshintu tshia kunyengabo kudi ba mu bisamba bia bantu, ne nyama ya ha buloba kayena iyidia; kadi neyishikame talalâ kayiyi ne ntatu, ne kakuena muntu wayitshinyisha
Bakahaula biuma bionso bia mu Sodoma ne Amola ne bintu bia kudia, bakaya mu nshila

Mu tshikondo atshi hakadi Eli mulale mu muaba wandi mesu andi akavua bileshileshi, kakamanya mua kutangila bimpe ; muinda wa Nzambi kawakanji kujima ne Samuele wakadi mulale tulu mu ntempelo wa Yehowa kuakadi mushete wa Nzambi: Yehowa wakabikila Samuele, ne yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Asela wakadi ne bana ba balume basambombo, mena abo: Azelikama ne Bokelu ne Yishemaele ne Shealeya ne Obadaya ne Hanana

Dituku adi, Maweja Nangila kubafikila munda, wamba ne: Bantu bonsu bavua bapatuka mu Ejipitu, badi ne bidimu makumi abidi ne pa mutu, kabena mua kufika mu ditunga dimvua mulaye Abrahame, Izake ne Yakobe to, bualu mbantombokele
Nunku Môdekai wakaya, Wakenza malu onso akamuambila Esetê

Muntu udi muakane neasangishe butue buonso bua muana wa ngombe, neabuteke ku butshika bua tshitudilu ha muaba mutoke, nebabulamine tshisumbu tshia Bena Isalele bu mai a kulengesha hau bubi eu udi bu mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi
Kulondolola Bena Amona ne Bena Sulia Badi Batambibua Bukole Sam
Nebaudie ne mampa adi kaayi mela buanga, kabidi ne biseki bia buanji
Ne nyota, tuakunuisha

Biananukilabo kuyila bienzedi bia bantu banyi, bua kuditshihabo ku dine dianyi ne, Bu mudi Yehowa ne muoyo; bu muakuyishabo bantu banyi mua kuditshiha kudi Bala; nebajadikibue bimpe munkatshi mua bantu banyi
Nudimuke mu malu onso anakanuambila, kanuambilanganyi dina dia nzambi mikuabo, bantu bakuabo kabunvu dina adi mukana muebe
Nemmulumbuluishe ne bihuhu ne mashi, nemmulokeshile ne bisumbu biandi bia masalayi ne bantu badi n andi nvula udi uhuka bikole, ne mabue manene a nvula, kahia ne soufre
Tama wakaya, wakashikama mu nsubu wa tatu andi
Bua ndi mumanye ne bualu ebu nebuandamuke bu luhandu luanyi bualu bua disengelela dienu ne bua dikumbasha dia Nyuma wa Yesu Kilisto
Hakaya batuadi ba mushete wa Yehowa mutantshi wa makasa asambombo, bakashihela Yehowa ngombe ne muana wa ngombe

Yeye wakamubandisha ha mutu ha miaba mile ya ha buloba, wakadia bintu biakaboba mu madimi, wakamunuisha buitshi buakadi mu mabue, ne manyi akadi mu mabue makole; Wakamudisha manteke a mabele a ngombe, ne mabele a mbushi, ne dianyi dia mikoko ne bimpanga bia mu Bashana ne mbushi, ne blê yakatamba buimpe, nuakanua nvinyo ya tumuma tukunze tuakadi bu mashi
Muakuidi neangate dikoho neafue munu wandi wa ku tshianza tshia balume mu manyi adi mu tshianza tshiandi tshia bakashi, neamiamine manyi ne munu wandi misangu muanda mutekete ku mpala kua Yehowa
Nakatangila nyama wa luonji ne bakelenge ba ha buloba, ne bena nvita babo, badisangisha bua kuluanganabo ne yeye wakadi ushikama ha nyima ba kabalu, ne kudi bena nvita bandi
Kutshisokokaye mu malenga avua ku muelelu wa musulu wa Nile
Misangu muanda mutekete, anyi
Tshianza tshia Bena Midiyana tshiakahita Bena Isalele bukole; bualu bua Bena Midiyana, Bena Isalele bakadimbila mena mu mikuna ne mbuebue, bakadiashila ngumbu ya mabue
Bualu uvua mungendeshe diakalenga, tshiyi mupete njiwu
Nebushale mu dina dia batuangaji, bu budimi buvuabu balambule Maweja Nangila bua kashidi
Wewe ubambile ne, Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Nuai bienu, nukuatshike maluvu au, nuluke, nudishinde, kanujuki kabidi, bualu bua muele wa nvita undi ntuma munkatshi muenu
Bantu badi ku diyi dia tshisamba tshia Rubene, nebase mitanda yabu ku tshisumbu ku tshisumbu, luseke lua kuinshi kua nzubu wa tshijila, muaba udi dibendela diabu
Utshiteke ku mpala kua bantu banyi ne kua bantu bebe, bobo balumbulule tshilumbu tshietu
Kabidi udi uyipia matuku muanda mutekete, uyipisha ne bulalu buonsu budiye ulala
Mayi avua apatuka munda mua buloba ke avua abupesha tshitalela
Bimuna biandi biakadi mikoko binunu muanda mutekete ne tumelo binunu bisatu, ngombe ibidi ibidi ku bikokedi nkama itanu, bakashi ba nyama ya mpunda nkama itanu
Bene hadada wakamuambila ne, Nenkuhingishile misoko yakanyenga tatu wanyi kuai tatu webe; wewe neudilongoluele misesu mu Damaseke, bu muakadilongoluela tatu wanyi mu Samalea
Yeye wakenzesha mashine mu Yelushalema kudi bantu ba lungenyi lule, bua kuteka mu bibumba ne ha mutu ha ngumbu a kuela n au mikete ne mabue manene
Muntu udi ubikumbaja, nebimupeteshe muoyi
Bakuabo nebele nkila ku mutu kua Tshibanda tshia Abalima bua kutshijibika, ne mu muaba wawa nebajike Gogo ne tshisumbu tshiandi tshionso tshia bantu; nebaubikile ne, Tshibanda tshia Hamona Gogo
Mutuangaji neafue mushinga wa tshimuna atshi, utangila buimpe nansha bubi bua tshimuna
Yehowa wakaha Davidi bakole bua kutamba bena lukuna bandi kuonso kuakayeye
Kakuena muntu udi mua kuimana ku mpala kuenu: Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neateke buowa ne dishina kudi bena buloba buonso bunudi nudiata ku makasa, bu muakanuambileye
Mukelenge wakebesha Danyele, wakadibo babikila ne Beleteshasâ, ne, Wewe udi mua kummanyisha tshilota tshinakulota ne dijingulula diatshi, anyi
Kuha kuonso kuimpe ne diha dionso diakane tshishiki bidi bifuma mu diulu, bahueka hanshi bilua kudi Tatu wa munya, kudi kakui ne dikudimuka anyi mundidimbi wa tshintu tshidi tshinyunguluka
Enza biebe tshioshelu tshia mabaya a acacia, buludi bua tshi nebuikale coudées itanu, butshiama buatshi coudées itanu ne bule buatshi bua mulu coudées isatu

Nenvuishe mei akuhungabo kudi ba mu Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema mei a tshianana mu muaba eu; nembahoneshe ku muele wa nvita mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo ne mu bianza bia badi bakeba mioyo yabo; nenfile bitalu biabo kudi nyunyu ya mulu ne kudi nyama ya ha buloba bu bia kudia biai
Kumukeye mu nsubu wandi, yeye udi mua kuikala mukashi wa munga muntu
Bualu bua yeye wakabuela mu nsubu wa Nzambi, wakangata bidia bilesha, wakahidia, wakahaku bakadi n andi; biakadi tshijila, anu bakuidi ba Nzambi bakadi badia
Bena Ejipitu kabakunua kabidi mayi awu to

Labana wakambila Yakoba ne, Bana aba bakashi mbana banyi, bana bakalelabo mbana banyi, ne bimuna mbianyi, ne bintu bionso biudi n abi mbianyi, ne lelu ndi mua kuenzela bana banyi ba bakashi ne bana bakalelabo tshinyi
Udi ne Muana udi ne muoyo; udi kai ne Muana wa Nzambi kena ne muoyo
Bakenza bitekelu ebi dikumi diatshimue: bakafula tshitekelu ne tshitekelu anu ne tshiamu tshijima; buonso buabi biakadi ne luidi lumue ne tshinfuanyi tshimue

Kadi kabakenza n ai makoho a argent ne bijimishi bia minda ne malonga ne mpungi; kabakenza tshintu tshia argent anyi tshia or ku argent yakaluabo n ai mu nsubu wa Yehowa; kadi bakayifila anu kudi bakenza mudimu ne bakalongolola n ai nsubu wa Yehowa
Nenuenzeleku Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, tshioshelu ne mabue, kanuoshi tshiamu ha mutu hau
Nunyangakaje bilambuilu biabu
Kakusomba pamue ne bana babu to
Nakamba ne, Luidi lua plomb
Matthew Hakashikisha Yesu kuyisha bayidi bandi dikumi ne babidi mikenshi yandi, yeye wakumukaku bualu bua kuyisheye bantu mu misoko yabo ne bua kubambileye bualu bua Nzambi
Bantu bakuabo bakavudishila bantu bakadi ne disua dia kushikama mu Yelushalema disanka
Kadi muambudi wa ngabu wandi wakahidia; bualu bua yeye wakatamba kutshina
Nunku Abinê Wakafika kudi Davidi mu Hebelone ne bantu makumi abidi bakadi n andi
Kadi muntu udi upatula kanyama kafue aku mu mayi, neapie mikiya
Yeye wakamba ne, Yeye wakungambila nunku ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nakukusungula mukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Isalele
, ne bantu
Hakashika malu â, wakaya ne mamu andi, ne bana babo, ne bayidi bandi ku Kapênuma; kabakashalamu matuku a bungi
Nsongalume wakadi mutentekedi, wakabanduluka, wakatangila ne, monai, bantu ba bungi balualua mu nshila wa ku mukuna ku nyima kuandi
Mishikankunde ai yonso yakabika, yakalongolola minda

Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Nengutume, neubuele mu nsubu wa muibi, ne mu nsubu wa muntu udi uditshiha ne mashimi mu dina dianyi; neushale munda mua nsubu wandi, neumuoshe diatshimue ne mabaya andi ne mabue andi kabidi
Mona, wewe wakafuka diulu ne buloba ku bukole buebe bunene ne diboko diebe diolola, ne kakuena bualu budi bukuhita bukole

Mumonyi wa hatuhu udi uhetula kulumbulula kuakane; Bakulongoluela babuidi makengesha, Nsumuinu Nyinyo udi museki wa bantu, maluvu makole adi bu muena diyoyo; Buowa budi mukelenge utshinyisha n abu bantu budi bu muadi wa nyama wa ntambue; Butumbi budi kudi muntu biashilanganeye ne matandu, Muhote kena udima budimi tshikondo tshidi mashika a banga; Meji adi muntu uhangidisha mu mutshima adi bu mai male, Ba bungi badi badiamba ne, Tudi bena luse; Muntu muakane udi wenda mu Mukelenge udi ushikama mu nkuasa wa bukelenge ukosamu bilumbu udi usungulula Muntu kai udi mua kuamba ne, Majitu a mishindu ibidi ne bihiminu bia mishindu ibidi, Muana mene udi umuenesha tshikadilu tshiandi ku bienzedi biandi, Ditshu didi diunvua ne disu didi ditangila, Kunangi tulu, bua kubuedi mu buhele; Musumbi udi wamba ne, Tshidi tshibi, tshidi tshibi; Or ne mabue a bungi a mushinga mukole bidiku; Angata tshivualu tshia muntu udi mueyeke muenyi tshieya; Bidia bidi muntu uheta ku kudinga kuandi bidi bishemakana mukana muandi, Malu adi bantu bahangidisha adi ajadikibua ku kuhunga kua dî; Udi wendakana wamba buambamba udi usokolola malu masokoka; nunku kubuelakana ne muntu udi wakula Biela muntu tatu andi anyi mamu andi mulau, Buhianyi budi muntu uheta lubilu ku tshibangidilu Kuambi ne, Nempingishe bubi ku bubi; Majitu a mishindu ibidi adi atondesha Yehowa; Biendedi bia muntu bidi biendeshibua kudi Yehowa; Budi buteyi kudi muntu bua kuambeye lukasa ne, Tshidi tshia tshijila, Mukelenge udi ne meji udi usungula bantu babi, Nyuma ukebakebe Luse lujalame ne lulamatu lua bushuwa bidi bilama mukelenge; Butumbi bua bansongalume mbukole buabo, Mitutu idi itaha mputa idi ilengesha muntu ku malu mabi; Nsumuinu Mutshima wa mukelenge mu bianza bia Yehowa udi bu misulu ya mai, Nshila yonso udi muntu wendela udi muakane ku mesu kuandi, Kuenza malu makane ne kukosa nsambu biakane Mesu adi ne dihetu ne mutshima udi udibandisha bidi disanka Meji adi muena mutshima wa mudimu uhangidisha adi amuvudishila luhetu luvule, Kuheta tshibutshilu ku ludimi lua mashimi Tshimbambila tshia bantu babi netshibumusheku, Nshila wa muntu mutambe bubi udi mukonyangale, Kushikama ha ditumba dia ha mutu ha nsubu kudi kutamba kushikama Mutshima Hakengeshabo mubuidi, mutshimbakanyi udi uheta meji; Muntu muakane udi umona ba mu nsubu wa muntu mubi bu mudibo; Udi ujibika mu matshu andi bua kaunvu muadi wa muhele nêle biandi dî bikole, kabena bamunvuila nansha
Luhanza alu kaluena luhanza lua mukelenge wanyi ludiye unua n alu ne ludiye utempa n alu matempu anyi
Ndue kunudi ne mulangala, anyi mu dinanga ne mu nyuma wa kalolo

Bena Benyamina kabidi bakashikama mu Geba ne mu Mikemasha ne mu Aya ne mu Betele ne mu misoko yai, ne mu Anatota ne mu Nobo ne mu Ananiya, ne mu Hasô ne mu Lama ne mu Gitayima, ne mu Hadida ne mu Seboima ne mu Nebalata, ne mu Lodo ne mu Ono mu tshibanda tshia bansenda
Hashishe, nakalua kudi bantu bakadi mu buhika ku Tele abiba, bakadi bashikama ku muelelu wa musulu wa Kebâ, ne nakashikama habo mu muaba au matuku muanda mutekete ne mutshima wanyi mukuatshike buowa
Hakunvabo dî dia mukelenge, bakaya biabo; mutoto wakamonabo ku esete wakaya ku mpala kuabo tô ne hakimanau ha buludi hakadi muana, Hakamonabo mutoto, bakatamba kusanka
Mukelenge wakadi ne tshishi, wakatuma masalayi andi, wakashiha batahianganyi aba, wakosha musoko wabo
Mose wakamba ku mesu kua Yehowa ne, Mona, Bena Isalele kabena banze kutumikila dî dianyi, Palô neunvuile muena tshikukumina kudi kunyi
Malu mabi akenzabo neababihishe ku mesu kuabo, malu abo a bundu mene

Utuheshe dikuatshisha diebe mu nvita yetu ne bena lukuna, Bituikala ne dikuatshisha dia Nzambi, nebenze bienzedi bia bukitu; Misambu Wewe Nzambi, unvua muadi wanyi, Kunfudilu kua buloba ndi nkuela dî dianyi, bualu bua wewe udi tshinyemenu tshianyi, udi tshibunda tshikole ku Witabushe bua meme nshikame bianyi tshiendelele mu nsubu webe wa ntenta; Bualu bua wewe, Nzambi, wakunvua mitshihu yanyi, Nealeheshele mukelenge matuku a muoyo wandi; Neashikame biandi mu nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge tshiendelele ku mpala kua Nzambi; Nunku nengimbe misambu ya kutumbisha n ai dina diebe tshiendelele, Misambu Mutshima Yeye nkayandi udi dibue dianyi ne luhandu luanyi, Nenubunde muntu musangu bule munyi bua kumubetekasha, buonso Bantu aba badi bahunga di diabo anu bua kumutuma hanshi ku muaba Mutshima wanyi, uhuwe biebe talalâ, windile Nzambi nkayandi; Yeye nkayandi udi dibue dianyi ne luhandu luanyi, Luhandu luanyi ne butumbi buanyi bidi kudi Nzambi; Nuenu bantu, numueyemene misangu yonso, Bulelela, bantu bahuekele badi anu muhuya, Kanueyemenyi tshinyangu, kanuikadi ne ditekemena dia hatuhu mu kunyenga kua bintu; Nzambi wakuamba dî diandi musangu umue; ne kudi wewe kabidi, Mukelenge, kudi luse lujalame
Bika biebe, wendakana mu buloba buonso, mu bule buabu ne mu butshiama buabu, bualu bua nenkuhebu

Yeye kakadiambila dî edi; kadi bualu bua yeye wakadi ha mutu ha bakuidi tshidimu atshi, wakamba bualu buakadi kabui buanze kulua ne, Yesu neafuile tshisamba tshietu; yeye kakafuila anu tshisamba tshimue, kadi wakafuila bua kusangisha mu tshisumbu tshimue bana ba Nzambi bakadi batangadike

Ekesode Badi Basabuka Dishiba Dikunze Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Nuhingane, Shikamai ku mpala kua Pi hahilota, hankatshi ha Migedola ne mai manene, ku mpala kua Bâla sefona, Shikamai bienu ku mpala kua muaba eu hehi ne mai manene
Mose wakakebakeba mbushi wa mulambu wa kubuikila n au bubi, ne monai, bakamana kuwosha
Mu Gibeona nuakashikama Yiele, tatu wa Gibeona; dina dia mukashi wandi diakadi Mâka; Abidona wakadi muan a bute wandi, ne Sû ne Kishi ne Bâla ne Nê ne Nadaba ne Gedô ne Ahio ne Zekâya ne Mikelota
Nenuikale balunda banyi, binuenza bu mundi nuambila

Nebalue ne tshibelu tshidibo bakuha ne tshiadi tshidibo banyukula hohamue ne dianyi dia milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ku mesu kua Yehowa etshi ntshintu tshiebe ne tshia bana bebe balume tshiendelele, bu muakamba Yehowa
Meme ndi mujadike ne: wewe muele muntu lupemba, nansha mumutshipe, bidi bienzeka anu muudi muambe
Yeye wakalumbuluila Bena Isalele mu matuku a Bena Peleshete bidimu makumi abidi
Nudi bamanye nshila wa kundi nya
Nanku bena Izrayele kabakuditambisha kabidi nanku to
Esetê wakasangana luse ku mesu kua bantu bonso bakamutangila
Mu bibilu bionsu ebi, nudisange bua kuntendelela ne bua kundambula milambu mishilangane: ya kuosha, ya bia mu madimi, ya bobumue, ne ya maluvu
Hakunvua Yone mu nsubu wa lukanu lumu lua malu akadi Kilisto wenza, wakutuma bayidi bandi bua kumukonka ne, Wewe nyeye ulualua, anyi tuindile mukuabo
Matthew Hakatshia butuku, bakuidi banene bonso ne bakulu ba bantu bakasangisha dî diabo ne, Tushihai Yesu; bakamusuika, bakaya n andi, bakamufila mu bianza bia ngovena Pilato
Ha diba adi Nyuma wakamutuma mu tshihela
Bantu bonso badi balela munkatshi muenu nebenze bilele ebi, hafilabo milambu ya kuosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa

Hakamanabo mudimu wonso, bakalua ne argent yakashala kudi mukelenge ne kudi Yehoyada, bakatula n ai mpanza ya kuteka mu nsubu wa Yehowa, mpanza mene ya kuenza n ai mudimu ne nkutu ne mpanza ya or ne ya argent

Hashishe hanatuma matutu mulu, muanzankongolo neumueneke mu matutu, nenvuluke tshihungidi tshianyi tshidi hankatshi hetu ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo, ne mai kaena avulangana kabidi bua kujimishau bintu bionso Muanzankongolo wanyi newikale mu matutu, hanaumona, nenvuluke tshihungidi tshia kashidi tshidi hankatshi ha Nzambi ne bintu bionso bidi ne muoyo ha buloba
Ku mpala kuandi kuakadi kunyengela tshitambala
Nakuikala n ebe to bidimu ebi makumi abidi, mashina a mikoko ne mashina a mbushi kakatula mafu nansha, ne meme tshiakudia mbushi yebe ya bimpanga
Tudi bamanye ne, Muana wa Nzambi wakumana kulua wakutuha meshi bua tuetu tumumanye yeye udi wa bushua; ne tuetu tudi munda mua udi wa bushua, munda mua Muana wandi Yesu Kilisto mene

Kadi nyunyu wa nkutshi kakamona muaba wa kuikala, nunku wakahingana kudiye mu buatu, bualu bua mai akatshidi ha buloba buonso, yeye wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakamukuata, wakamuteka mu buatu muakadiye
Badi mwa kukwata bintu bia muntu anu mu dilonda dia dipangadika diangata kudi bamfumu bakoshi ba nsambu badi ne bukookeshi abu
Nuele Lufo, musungudibue mu Mukelenge, ne mamu wandi ne wanyi, muoyo
Au mmena a balume badi mua kuimana n enu
Halelula, Bete sû ne Gedô, ne Mâlata ne Bete anota ne Eletekona; bimenga bisambombo ne misoko yabi

Nendombe Tatu, yeye neanuhe Musambi mukuabo, ikale n enu tshiendelele, Nyuma wa bulelela mene udi ba ha buloba kabai bamanye mua kuangata, bua bobo kabena bamumona, kabena bamumanye; nuenu nudi bamumanye bua yeye utu wikala n enu, neikale munda muenu
Bikaleye kayi muhikudibue nunku, yeye neumuke halua tshidimu tshia disanka dinene, yeye ne bana bandi
Kadi tô ne ku dituku edi habalabo mei a Mose, tshilulu tshikudika tshidi tshilala ku mitshima yabo
Hakadiye uya bua kumutuntshila, yeye wakamubikila kabidi ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Untuadile tshikese tshia bidia mu tshianza tshiebe
Kuinyikabu muaba awu dina ne: Tabera, mmumue ne: kapia, bualu Maweja Nangila uvua muoshe mitanda yabu muaba awu
Bakadi ne tshilele etshi mu Isalele, bua bana bakashi ba mu Isalele baye ku tshidimu ku tshidimu bua kujingabo muana mukashi wa Yefeta, Muena Gilada, tô matuku anai ku tshidimu ku tshidimu
Ukadi mumane kumfuila luse, nangananga paudi mumpatule mu tshimenga etshi bua kumpandisha
Hakahita tshikondo, Bena Amona bakaluisha Bena Isalele nvita
Gala, muana wa Ebede, wakaluhuka, wakimana ku tshibi tshia musoko; ne Abimeleke ne bantu bakadi n andi bakabika kuakadibo balamina
Exodus Muntu wa tshisamba tshia Lewi wakabaka mukashi, muana wa Lewi
Muanda eu neulue nunku, binuananukila kutumikila dî dia Yehowa Nzambi wenu
Noa wakabanga kuikala tshidime ne yeye wakakuna mitshi ya tumuma tukese
Maweja Nangila kumuenekela kabidi Abrame, umuambila ne: Ditunga edi nendipeshe ndelanganyi yebe
Bualu bua nengikale bu nyama Nenye, nempingane ku muaba wanyi, Hosea Luai bienu, tuhingane kudi Yehowa; Hahita matuku abidi, yeye neahingashe; Tumumanye bietu, tunanukile kukeba kumanya Yehowa

Ei idi ndelanganyi ya bana ba Yishemaele, muana wa Abalahama wakamulelela Haga, Muena Ejipitu, muena mudimu wa bakashi wa Sala: au mmena a bana ba Yishemaele ku bikondo biabo muaba bute wa Yishemaele Nebayota, ne Kedâ ne Adebele ne Mibesama, Mishema ne Duma ne Masa, Hadada ne Tema ne Yetû ne Nafisha ne Kedema
Nasha kakese
Lotane uvua mulele Ori ne Emame
Messager wakafika kudi Davidi wamba ne, Mitshima ya Bena Isalele idi kudi Abashaloma
DIYUKI DIBIDI DIA MOSHE Moshe kuambila bena Izrayele mikenji ya Mvidi Mukulu

Ne kabalu kakuabo kakaluhuka, kabalu kakunze mene; ne bakamuha yeye wakadi ushikama ha nyima haku bukole bua kumusheye ditalala ha buloba, ne bua bantu bashihangane; ne bakamuhesha muele wa nvita munene
Mikenji mishilangane idi itangila mana Moshe kubambila kabidi ne: Biakudia ebi, nubidie bijika anu dituku dimue
Yeye wakabambila ne, Elai tuhamba ku tshianza tshia balume, nenuhete minyinyi
Ki mmomumue anyi

Muanjelo muinai wakela mpungi, ne tshituha tshisatu tshia diba tshiakakuambila, ne tshituha tshisatu tshia ngondo, ne tshituha tshisatu tshia mitoto; bua tshituha tshiabi tshisatu tshikale midima, ne bua munya wa dituku kautemi bu tshituha tshiadi tshisatu, ne butuku muomumue
Neabiele mulu, abinyukule kumpala kua Maweja Nangila
Mu tshidimu tshia makumi abidi ne muanda mutekete tshia bukelenge bua Asa, mukelenge wa Yuda, Zimeli wakakokesha mu Tîsa matuku muanda mutekete
Kadi katuakanuenzesha ne bukole ebu; kadi tudi tudikankamika mu malu onso, bua tuetu kaluishi dihumbisha dimue ku lumu luimpe lua Kilisto
Kadi wewe Arone ne ndelanganyi yebe, nuenze mudimu wa butuangaji ku tshilambuilu, ne muaba wa tshijila menemene, udi kunyima kua tshilamba tshidi tshilembelela
Bakabashiya bua kutetabo n abo Bena Isalele, bua kumanya ne bobo nebatumikile mikenji ya Yehowa yakeleye batatu abo kudi Mose
Biwavuluisha bana benu ba mu Kilisto malu â, wewe newikale muena mudimu muimpe wa Kilisto Yesu, mudiundisha mu mei a ditabusha ne mu diyisha dimpe diwakulonda tô ne katataka
Alona ne bana bandi balume nebaluate mihanu ei hayabo mu tshitendelelu anyi hayabo hehi ne tshioshelu bua kuenza mudimu wabo mu muaba wa tshijila, bobo kabatuadi mahambuka, kabafu
Ku dituku adi tô bakadi basangisha dî diabo bua kumushiha
Bayidi bandi ba bungi, hakunvuabo dî edi, bakamba ne, Dî edi didi dikole, udi mumanye mua kuditabusha nganyi
Wewe wakulua bua kutushiha, anyi
Bualu bua kumudilu, bakafila mei a Nzambi mu bianza biabo

diteeka dia beena midimu ya diondapa nyama mu polovensa bu mudibio mu mukanda wa beena mudimu bashindama ba mbulamatadi; dienza dia ndongamu ya midimu ya dikuba dia nyama ne dilonda dia mapangadika a ba mpulushi ba mianda ya dikuba dia nyama nangananga mu bidi bitangila miaba ya mikalu ne ya dilamina nyama;
Mu dituku adi nemmeneshile ba mu tshisamba tshia Bena Isalele lusengu; nenkuhe hukole bua kubulula mukana muebe munkatshi muabo bua wewe kuakula bimpe; nunku nebamanye ne, Meme ndi Yehowa

Yolama wakalua ne malonga a tshiamu tshia argent ne a or ne a tshiamu tshia mitaku: ebi kabidi biakajidileye mukelenge Davidi kudi Yehowa bu muakajidileye Yehowa argent ne or bia bisamba bionso biakahiteye bukole; bia mu Sulia ne bia mu Moaba ne bia Bena Amona ne bia Bena Peleshete ne bia Bena Amaleka ne biakanyengeye kudi Hadadezê, muana wa Lehoba, mukelenge wa mu Soba

Messager wa nfumu wakela dî dikole ne, Badi banuelela mukenji eu, nuenu ba bisamba bionso ne miaku yonso ne, Diba dinunvua tshiona tshia mpungi, tshia nshiba, tshia nzenze, tshia nkombe, tshia guitare, tshia bimama ne tshia biombelu bionso, tuai mpala hanshi, tendelelai luhingu lua or ludi mukelenge Nebukadenesâ muimanyike

Mulangala webe wa bubi wakuela ntonga, dihetu diakusampila, diyoyo diakudiunda tô ne hakuluadi mulangala wa bubi; kadi kakuena bualu bumue budi bufume kudibo, nansha ku tshintompantompa tshiabo anyi ku diyoyo diabo; kakuena bukokeshi bukole munkatshi muabo
Kadi wewe newoshe munyinyi wa muana mulume wa ngombe, ne tshiseba ne tunvi ne kahia ku butshika bua tshitudilu ebu mbualu bua kubuikidila bubi bua bantu
Mukelenge wakamuambila ne, Umuenzele bu muakuambeye, umushihe, umujike: bua wewe kumusha mashi akamatshisha Yoaba hanshi hatuhu kundi ne ku nsubu wa tatu wanyi
Mukelenge wakamuebesha kabidi ne
Umuleje kudi mutuangaji Elazare, ne kudi bena Izrayele bonsu, bua bajadike ne: yeye ke udi upingana pa muaba webe
Kadi mitshi idi kayiyi ikuama bimuma bia kudia, nudi mua kuyishimbula, kuenza nayi miaba ya kuimanyina, bua numone mua kukuata tshimenga atshi bimpe
Hashishe bena mudimu ba mukelenge bakadi bamukuatshila mudimu bakamuambila ne, Kabena bamuenzele tshintu
Wakamuambila ne, Bulelela, bulelela, ndi nuambila ne, Nenumone diulu dibulula ne banjelo babanda bahueka ha Muana wa muntu
Aba mbantu badi balonda Muana wa Mukoko kuonso kudiye uya

Meme, Yone, muan enu wa ma Kilisto, ne muabanyanganyi n enu wa mu dikenga ne bukelenge ne ditantamana bidi mu Yesu, nakadi mu tshisanga tshidibo babikila ne Patemo, bualu bua dî dia Nzambi ne bua dimanyisha dia Yesu

Ahiezê wakadi kapitene kabo; hashishe Yoasha, ne bana balume ba Shemâ, Muena Gibea, ne Yeziele ne Pelete, bana balume ba Asemaweta, ne Belaka ne Yehu, Muena Anatota, ne Yishemaya, Muena Gibeona, muena bukitu wa munkatshi mua bantu makumi asatu ne ku mutu kua bantu makumi asatu, ne Yelemiya ne Yahaziele ne Yohanana ne Yozabada, Muena Gedela, ne Eluzai ne Yelimota ne Bealeya ne Shemaliya ne Shefataya, Muena Halufa, ne Elekana ne Yishiya ne Azalele ne Yoezê ne Yashobeama, Bena Kola, ne Yoela ne Zebadaya, bana ba Yelohama wa mu Gedô
Muaba onsu udi muntu awu usomba, nansha bulalu budiye ulala, bidi anu bipia mikiya

Yoshua Kunyenga kua Musoko wa Ai Yehowa wakambila Yoshua ne, Kutshinyi, kukuatshila buowa, angata bena nvita bonso; bika biebe, ya ku Ai; tangila, nakamana kufila mukelenge wa Ai ne bantu bandi ne musoko wandi ne buloba buandi mu tshianza tshiebe; ne wewe newenzele Ai ne mukelenge wa musoko bu muwakenzela Yeleko ne mukelenge wau; kadi bintu bia mu musoko ne bimuna, nubiangate bu bintu bienu; utume balaminyi ku nyima kua musoko
Esau wakashikama mu mukuna wa Sei Esau udi Edome
Nulame meyi anyi ne mikenji yanyi bimpe
Tshiena mumusangane ne bualu buafuileye; nenukume, nemulekele
Diambedi Mose udi wamba ne, Ne Yeshaya udi ne dikima dikole, udi wamba ne, Kadi bua Bena Isalele udi wamba ne, Lomo Nunku ndi ngamba ne, Nzambi wakumusha bantu bandi, anyi
Ndi nuambila ne, Nasha; badi binuikala kanui nukudimuna mitshima yenu, buonso buenu nenufue muomumue
Wakabaha muntu ne muntu bilulu bihia bihia, kadi wakaha Benyamina bituha bia argent nkama isatu ne bilulu bihia bihia bitanu
Bikai, tuye; tangilai, muntungidi udiku
Malaki Dî dia tshijila Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nakunusua, kadi nudi nuamba ne, Wakutunanga munyi

Ku tshikondo atshi Yoshua wakalua, wakabutula Bena Anaka ba ku mikuna ne ku Hebelone ne ku Debî ne ku Anaba ne ku mikuna yonso ya Yuda ne ku mikuna yonso ya Isalele: Yoshua wakababutula ne misoko yabo
Bakelenge bana ba Palo bakamumona, bakamuanyishila Palo, bakaya n andi mu nsubu wa Palo
Palô neko wakasungula Eleyakima, muana wa Yoshiya, mukelenge mu muaba wa Yoshiya, tatu wandi; wakamuidika dina dikuabo ne, Yehoyakima; yeye wakumusha Yehoaza, wakamutuma mu Ejipitu, wakafuilamu

Yehoyada wakasungula bena mudimu ba mu nsubu wa Yehowa bakadi mu bukokeshi bua bakuidi ne Bena Lewi bakasungulabo kudi Davidi mu nsubu wa Yehowa, bua kufilabo milambu ya kuosha kudi Yehowa, bu muakafundabo mu mukanda wa mikenji ya Mose; bakimba misambu ne disanka bu muakadi mukenji wa Davidi
Ku dikombu dionsu neufundeku dina dia tshisamba tshiabu
Yeshaya Dî dia tshijila Bakummanyisha tshikena kumona tshikole; Nunku tshimono tshianyi tshiakûla tente ne kanyinganyinga, Mutshima wanyi udi uhampakana, buowa buhite bukole buakuntshinyisha
Mpindiewu ndi muimane ku mpokolu wa mayi
Yehezekele Hashishe yeye wakalukila n anyi mu nshila wa ku tshibuelelu tshia ha bule tshia tshitendelelu, tshibuelelu tshidi tshitangila ku luseke lua esete, ne tshiakadi tshinshila
Mu matuku au ba mu Bena Yuda nebende hohamue ne ba mu Bena Isalele; nebaluhuke hohamue mu buloba bua ku node, nebafike ku buloba bunakaha bankambua benu bu buhianyi buabo
Kadi hûma maminu, yeye neatume bena miele, bualu bua matuku a kunowa akufika
Bua bualu ebu, Maweja Nangila neabanyenge ditunga diabu panuafikamu
Ahaza wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika hohamue ne bankambua bandi mu musoko wa Davidi; Hezikiya, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Ne Yehowa kakakudimuna mutshima wandi bua makenga akadiye musue kubatumina, anyi
Bianza bia bantu kabiena bimukuatshila mudimu, bu hadiye ne tshintu bualu, bualu bua yeye mene utu waha bantu bonso muoyo ne muhuya ne bintu bionso
Kanutedi bujitu bua di dia Yehowa kabidi; bualu bua dî dia muntu yonso nkayadi didi bujitu buandi, nunku nuakunyanga mei a Nzambi udi ne muoyo, a Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wetu
Wakamuambila ne, Bika, ya biebe; ditabusha diebe diakukusungila
Enza mpandu ne tulonga tukese bia tsiutekelu ne or mutambe buimpe
Nujadike mushindu udi ditunga: didi dimpe anyi ndibi
Mitshima yabo yakatamba kunyingalala, bakabanga kumukonka ku muntu ku muntu ne, Mukelenge, mmeme, anyi
Hashishe muprofete wakahuwa, wamba ne, Ndi mumanye ne, Nzambi wakulongolola bua kukushiha bua wewe wakuenza bualu ebu, kuena mutumikile mei anyi
Bantu ba Abashaloma bakenzela Amenona bu muakabambila Abashaloma
Nyuma Muimpe neanuyishe mua kuamba ha diba adi
Nzambi wakambila Mose ne, MEME NDI MUNDI
Yalobama Udi Wenzesha Bena Isalele bua Kuenzabo Malu Mabi Hashishe Yalobama wakasa musoko wa Shekeme mu mikuna ya Efelayima, wakashikamamu; wakumukaku, wakasa Penuele
Yeye wakatendelela Yehowa, wakamba ne, Yehowa, Nzambi wanyi, wewe wakenzela mukashi wa mu lufuila undi mushikame n andi bibi bua kushiha muan andi mulume, anyi
Nanku kanutshinyi to
Hanuatendelela Nzambi, kanuikadi bu bena lubombo; bobo badi basue kutendelela Nzambi bimana mu nsunagoga ne mu masanga a nshila bua bantu babamone
Kulu ne muntu mukuabo nansha: muntu kamueneki ku mukuna nansha: bisumbu bia mikoko ne bia ngombe kabidi bintu ku mukuna
Yesu wakamba ne, Mulekelai, nuitabushe ne, Yeye wakadi mualame tô ne dianjikabo

Yehowa udi Nzambi wa tshiendelele, Yeye udi ukolesha badi bahanga, Nansha tuahanga bitende ne biahungilabo, badi bindila Yehowa nebasangashe bukole buabo; Isaiah Nuenu, maloba a ku muelelu wa mai manene, huwai bua kuteleja; Wakubisha muntu ku luseke lua esete, Udi ubihata, udi uhita ku mpala kuabo kayi ne bualu bumukuata, Wakuenza bualu ebu wakubushikisha Maloba a ku muelelu wa mai manene akumona, akutshina; Badi bakuatshishangana, muntu yonso udi ukuatshisha muena mutumba n andi; Nunku muena mabaya udi ukolesha mutshima wa mutudi wa tshiamu tshia or, Kadi wewe, Isalele muntu wanyi

Yesu wakamuangalasha bantu aba dikumi ne babidi, wakalayangana n abo ne, Kanuyi mu nshila wa ku bisamba bia bende, kanubuedi mu musoko wa Bena Samalea; kadi nuye kudi mikoko idi mijimine ya nsubu wa Isalele
Mubidi kawena utamba bilulu, anyi

nuenu badi bimane mu nsubu wa Yehowa, Tumbishai Yehowa, bua Yehowa udi muimpe; Bua Yehowa wakudisunguila Bualu bua ndi mumanye ne, Yehowa udi munene, Yehowa wakenza malu onso akasueye kuenza, Yeye udi ubandisha Yeye wakashiha ban a bute ba mu Ejipitu, Yeye wakatuma bimanyinu ne malu a kukema Yeye wakabutula bisamba bia bantu bia bungi, Sihona, mukelenge wa Bena Amole, Wakahesha bantu bandi bukole buabo bu buhianyi, Yehowa, dina diebe didiku tô ne tshiendelele; Bualu hua Yehowa nealumbuluile bantu bandi ne kulumbulula kuakane, Mpingu Idi ne mukana, kadi kayena yakula; Idi ne matshu, kadi kayena yunvua; Badi bayenza badi bafuanangana n ai; Nuenu Bena Isalele, nuvudishile Yehowa disanka
Kadi yeye wakahingasha tshianza tshiandi, ne mona, muana mukuabo wakaluhuka
Hashishe, mamu wa bana ba Zebedayo wakalua ne bana bandi kudiye, wakamukukuila, wakamulomba bualu
Hakimanabi talalâ, biakabuikila mahuahua
Bualu bua mai manene akadi abisha mavuala
Pashishe meme nendeje butumbi buanyi
Nzambi wakambila Isalele mu bikena kumona mu butuku ne, Yakoba, Yakoba Yeye wakitaba ne, Ndiku
Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, neanuihatshile bisamba abi ku mpala kuenu bituha bituha: kanubashihi tshikondo tshimue, bualu bua nyama ya muitu neyikumbane munkatshi muenu
Nunku nebikale ne bundu ne tshiji bia bungi
Numukuatshishe maluvu bualu bua wakudilesha ku mesu kua Yehowa; ba mu Moaba nebabunguluke mu bilushi biabo, nebasekibue
Kahia bakahatuka kudi Yehowa, kakosha balume nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu bakadi bafila musenga wa manananshi
Atalaya Udi Unyenga Bukelenge Bak
Ebeyatâ wakambila Davidi ne, Shaula wakashiha bakuidi ba Yehowa
Nunku ndi nusengelela bua kuikala bidikishi banyi
Nebatekepu kabidi mampa a tshijila anudi ne bua kundambuilapu kashidi

Diba ndishala dikese bua Lebanona Mu dituku adi badi ne mahaha nebunvue mei a mu mukandu, Bena kalolo kabidi nebavudishe disanka diabo mu Yehowa, Bualu bua amena tshinyangu wakuvuishibua muntu wa hatuhu, Badi bavuisha muntu bu muhishibu mu tshilumbu ku dî diabo dia mashimi, Nunku Yehowa wakahikula Abalahama udi wamba dî edi bua bana ba Yakoba ne, Kadi hamena bana bandi midimu inuakuenza ne bianza bianyi munkatshi muabo, Bantu kabidi badi batuhakana mu mitshima yabo nebikale ne lungenyi, Yeshaya Yehowa udi wamba ne, Badi bahisha luendu bua kuhuekabo mu Ejipitu, Nunku bukole bua Palô nebulue bu bualu bua kunufuisha bundu, Bualu bua nansha bikala bakokeshi bandi ku Soana, buonso buabo nebafue bundu bualu bua bantu badi kabayi Dî dia tshijila Bualu bua dikuatshisha dia Ejipitu didi hatuhu, nunku nakunubikila ne, Lahaba udi mushikame muhuwe
Kadi Nebuzaladana, kapitene ka masalayi, wakashiya bakuabo bena buloba abu bahite buhele bua kuikalabo bahempi ba mionshi ya tumuma tua nvinyo ne ba bidime ba mu madimi
Yeye wakabaheta, wakabambila mei au
Bena Isalele kabalu ha buihi ne ntenta wa kusambakena bua kabadituadidi bubi buabo, kabafu
Baledi badi ne tshia kwambula bujitu bwa bâna bâbo ne kubeepulaa ku mianda yônso ya tshikisu munda anyi pambelu pa dîku
Yehowa wakumpa mabue au abidi akadi mafunda ne munu wa Nzambi; akadi mafundahu mei onso akanuambila Yehowa ku mukuna munkatshi mua kahia mu dituku dia disangisha dietu
Mose wakashimika nsubu, wakalongolola nkanu ne mabaya, wakabueshamu mitshi, wakajadika makunshi a nsubu
Bikalabo kabayi bitabusha bimanyinu ebi bibidi, kabayi bunvue dî diebe, wewe newangate mai a mu musulu, wele ha buloba bûme, ne mai awakangata mu musulu neakudimuke mashi ha buloba bûme
Nenfile dikosa dia tshilumbu tshiebe mu bianza biabo, ne bobo nebalumbuluishe bu mudi kulumbulula kuabo
Yeye wakalekela ngombe yandi, wakalonda Eliya lubilu, wakamba ne, Ndi nkusengelela ne, Witabushe bua meme kuya kusangana ne tatu wanyi ne mamu wanyi mishiku, hashishe nenkulonde
Kadi misangu yonsu ivua Onane ubuelela mukaji awu mu nzubu, uvua wela mayi a balume panshi
Ebu mbuhianyi bua tshisamba tshia Ashê ku meku abo: bimenga ne misoko yabi
Hanakadi ngamba mei â, Pelataya, muana wa Benaya, wakafua

Samuele wakakudimuna Shaula dî ne, Meme ndi mumonyi wa malu; ya ku mpala kuanyi ku mukuna bualu bua bûdi n abu mbua kudia n anyi bidia lelu; kadi hatshiabu nenkutume, nenkuambile malu onso adi mu mutshima webe
Ditangilula didi dilwa dia kashidi anu padibo banyisha tshingenyingenyi, dilomba anyi difwanyikija kudi beena ditunga
Badi ha buihi n ebe ne badi kule nebakuseke, wewe umena lumu lubi, mûle tente ne diyoyo
Kulondolola Bakalua ne mushete wa Nzambi, bakauteka munkatshi mua ntenta wakadi Davidi mûshimikile; bakafila milambu ya kuosha ne ya kutuisha n ai ditalala ku mpala kua Nzambi
Bafalese bakalua, bakabanga kumukonka malu, bamuteta munda ne, Utuleshe tshimanyinu tshia mu diulu
Kabakamanya ne, Yeye udi utuambila bualu bua Tatu
Mu bitanda amu muakadi mulale tshisumbu tshia bakadi batekete ne bafofo ne balema ne banyane

Hashishe wakalua n anyi mu tshiendelu tshia munda ku luseke lua ku esete; wakidikisha tshibuelelu tshia munda bu muakidikisheye bikuabo, ne nsubu yatshi ya bansentedi ne biluwa biatshi ne mbalanda watshi, wakabimona bikale ne bunene buobumue ne bua bikuabo
Hakamanyeye ne, Ngua ku nyima kua Helode, wakamutuma kudi Helode, wakadi biandi mu Yelushalema matuku â
Nunku nakamba ne, Tshiena nnudisha kabidi
Bakuidi bakamukudimuna ne, Nansha

Bakendulukangana n ebe mushinga bua bilulu bia mushinga mukole, tuzaku tufike tuakadi ne malenda mimpe, bilulu bia mibidi ya mushindu ne mushindu ne mionshi miluke bikole; bangend a mushinga bebe bakalua ne bintu ebi
Bena Yuda kabidi bakamubanda, bamba ne, Malu â adi malelela
Hakadibo baya mu nshila wa ku nsubu wa tshilala benyi, Yehowa wakasangakena n andi, wakamba kumushiha
Muena Peleshete au wakadi usemena ha buihi dinda ne dilolo wakamuenekamueneka matuku makumi anai
Yone Yesu wakalua ku Betania, kuakadi Lazalo wakabisheye ku lufu; wakalalaku matuku asambombo diambedi Kuhita kua Yehowa kakui kuanze kulua
Mukashi wakambila Yoaba ne, Mona, nebele mutu wandi kûdi ku nyima ha lumbu
Kakahanda mume mu tshitudilu butuku, mana akamueneka n au
: Bidi bitangila mapa a bweena mwaabo ne a tshidiidi
Tuetu kutshimuna Sihone, bana bende ba balume, ne tshiluilu tshiende tshionsu

Bantu bakole ba munkatshi mua bena bukitu nebamuele dî diabo mu Muaba wa Bafue, bamuambila ne badi bamukuatshisha ne, Bakuhueka munemu, badi balala hohamue ne badi kabayi batengudibue, munkatshi mua bakushihibua ku muele wa nvita
Davidi wakebesha nsongalume wakamuambila bualu ebu ne, Wewe wakafuma kudi kunyi
Wewe Rubene, udi muananyi, muanabute, udi mashi anyi a kumpala
Nunku nakahueka ku nsubu wa mufumbi wa ngesu, ne monai, yeye wakadi wenza mudimu wandi ku nkata wa dima
Nanku ndi nkusengelela ne: unkuate meme lukole, nshale mupika webe
Ditutu diakalua, diakababuikila, dî diakaluhuka mu ditutu ne, Eu udi Muan anyi munanga, munvuilai

Yeye neangate bintu bia kulengesha n abi nsubu nyunyu ibidi ne mitshi ya cêdre ne bintu bikunze ne mabeshi a hisopa, neashihele umue wa nyunyu mu tshivuadi tshia dima ha mutu ha mai adi ahueka, neangate mitshi ya cêdre ne mabeshi a hisopa ne bintu bikunze ne nyunyu utshidi ne muoyo, neafue bintu ebi mu mashi a nyunyu wakashiheye ne mu mai adi ahueka, neâmiamine ku nsubu misangu muanda mutekete
Nunku hakunvua Ahiya kusesa kua makasa andi hakabueleye ku tshibi, yeye wakamuambila ne, Buela biebe, mukashi wa Yalobama; udi udifuanyikisha bu muntu mukuabo bua tshinyi
Makonka adi ajuka mu mitshima yenu bua tshinyi
Bana balume babidi ba Eli, bakuidi ba Yehowa, bakadiku mena abo Hofeni ne Pinehasa
Kanuakubanda bua kulongolola miaba ya mu lumbu mishimbuke, kanuakuashila ba mu tshiota tshia Isalele lumbu bua bobo bamanye mua kuimana bakandamana mu nvita dituku dia Mukelenge

Netshikale ha mpala ha Alona, ne Alona neatuale mahambuka a Bena Isalele mu muaba wa tshijila hayeye bua kubajidila ne bintu bidibo bafila kudi Nzambi, netshikale ha mpala handi matuku onso bua Yehowa abitabushe
Bidi mutuangaji wangata Padi muntu ufila nyama wa mulambu wa kuosha, tshiseba tshia nyama awu, tshishale amu tshia mutuangaji uvua mulambule mulambu awu
Katuena basue kufua to
Kabiena mua kuenzeka to
Etu ntupitene tua bisamba bia Bena Isalele

Binuasangana muntu mu misoko idi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, unuha, nansha mulume nansha mukashi udi wenza bualu bubi ku mesu kua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, udi ushiha tshihungidi tshia Yehowa, wakaya bua kukuatshila nzambi mikuabo mudimu, ne wakayitendelela, nansha diba nansha ngondo, nansha bintu bikuabo bia mu diulu bindi muhidie; bikalabo banuambile dî edi anyi binuikala bunvue lumu lua bualu ebu ku matshu, nenukebakebe tô ne bikala bualu ebu bua bundu buenjibue bulelela mu Isalele, hashishe nenulue ne muntu wakenza bualu bubi ebu ku bibi bia musoko, nansha mulume nansha mukashi, nenubakume ne mabue, nenubashihe
Bintu bidi bipetesha mikiya Nyama mikuabu idi ipetesha muntu mikiya too ne ku dilolu, padiye uyilenga, yoyi mimane kufua
Bakokeshi ba mu Soana bakulua bahote, Yehowa wakusonsola nyuma wa tshibondakasha munkatshi muabo; Ne kakuena kushala mudimu mukuabo mu Ejipitu, Mu dituku adi Bena Ejipitu nebikale bu bakashi
Biabueleye mu musoko mukuabo
mianda ya nzubu ya mu tshimenga ne ya mu musoko, ya bulongolodi ne bulami bwa njila ne bintu bia tshibûngi bia polovensa ne misoko;
Bantu bandi bonso bakenda n andi hohamue; Bena Kelete bonso ne Bena Pelete bonso ne Bena Giti bonso, bantu nkama isambombo bakamulonda bafume mu Gata, bakadianjila ku mpala kua mukelenge
Bakamuelela tshifufu mu Yelushalema, kadi yeye wakanyemena ku Lakisha, bakamuihata ku Lakisha, bakamushihelaku
Tshisamba tshia bantu banudi kanuyi bamanye, netshinukengeshe, tshinunyenge biakudia bionsu binudi banowe
Maweja Nangila udi tshilobu tshia mvita

Bikala muan etu mulume wa mu Kilisto anyi muan etu mukashi butaka ne bakengela bia kudia bia buatshia buatshia, biabambila umue wenu ne, Yai bienu talala, nuote kahia, nûkute; kadi nuenu kanui nubaha bintu bidi mibidi yabo ikengela; dikuatshisha kai didiku
Abalahama wakitabusha dî dia Efelona Abalahama wakamuidikishila bungi bua argent buakalombeye ku mpala kua bana ba Hete, nshekele ya argent nkama mai bu muakitabusha bahanyi ba bintu
Nzambi wa Abalahama, Nzambi wa Naho ne Nzambi wa tatu wabo ikale mulumbuluishi hankatshi hetu Yakoba wakaditshiha ku ditshina dia tatu wandi Isaka
Bena tshisamba tshia Menashe kulonda, babalombola kudi Ngameliyele, muana wa Pedashure
Bena Refayime bavua bantu ba bukole
Kusangishabu bintu bionsu bivua bena Izrayele bafile kudi Moshe bua midimu ya mu muaba wa tshijila
Nuyikumbaje yonsu, bungi buayi
Pashishe, meme Maweja Nangila nempeshe mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu muoyi wa tshitunu, bua anulonde
Kuyipeshaye Arone ne bana bende ba balume, bu muvua Maweja Nangila muambe

Yeye wakavula bilulu bia mu lufuila, wakaluata bilulu bikuabo, wakadibuikila ne tshilulu tshikudika, wakashikama ku tshibi tshia ku Enayima, hehi ne nshila wa ku Timena, bualu bua yeye wakamona ne, Shela wakamana kudiunda ne kabena banze kumbakisha kudiye
Kadi hakadisueye, ne hakakolesheye mutshima wandi, ne bua malu â yeye wakenza malu a dihetu, bakamûmusha mu nkuasa wandi wa bukelenge, bakamunyenga butumbi buandi
Kadi pikalabu bamuibe bimuna abi ku nzubu kuende, mulami neafute muena bintu
Bavua bumvue bualu ebu ne mu nzubu wa mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu

Bana bandi ba balume bakadi ne tshilele tshia kulambishilangana bia kudia mu nsubu yabo, muntu ne muntu dituku diandi; bakadi batuma dî bua kubikila bana ba bakashi basatu bua kudia n abo, kunua n abo
Genese Yosefe wakadiela ha mpala wa tatu wandi, wakadila, wakatuangana n andi mishiku

Wakamba ne, Eu newikale mushindu wa mukelenge udi unukokesha: neangate bana benu ba balume, neabateke bu bena makalu andi ne badi benda ha nyima ha nyama yandi ya tubalu; bobo nebalumbile lubilu ku mpala kua dikalu diandi; yeye neabasunguile tupitene tua bantu tshinunu bantu tshinunu, ne tua bantu makumi atanu makumi atanu; neabueshe bakuabo mu mudimu wa kuihila madimi andi ne wa kunowa bintu biandi, ne wa kumuenzela bintu bia nvita ne bintu bia makalu andi
Labana wakamuambila ne Bingikala ne diakalengele ku mesu kuebe ushale biebe, bualu bua meme nakumana kujingulula ne, Yehowa wakunsankisha bua bualu buebe
Yehowa udi dibue dianyi, musoko wanyi wa ngumbu ya nvita, ne Nembikile Yehowa, udi muakanangane ne butumbi bua bantu bamutumbisha
Ezekiel Hashishe Nyuma wakambandisha mulu, wakalua n anyi ku tshibi tshia ku nsubu wa Yehowa tshia ku luseke lua esete, tshidi tshitangila ku esete; ekumona
Udi ne matshu unvue budi Nyuma wambila ekelesia

Bulelela, Mose wakadi wa kueyemenyibua mu nsubu wa Nzambi muonso bu muena mudimu, bua kuikaleye tshimanyishilu tshia malu akadi amba kuambibua ka nyima; kadi Kilisto wakadi wa kueyemenyibua bu Muana ku mutu kua nsubu wa Nzambi; tuetu tudi nsubu wandi, bitualamata ku dikima dietu ne ku kutumbila kua ditekemena dietu bikole tô ne kunshikidilu

Etshi netshikale tshimanyinu kunudi: tshidimu etshi nenudie bintu bidi bidimenena mu buloba, mu tshidimu tshibidi nenudie bintu ebi muomumue kabidi; mu tshidimu tshisatu nenukune bintu, nenubihuole; nenukune mitshi ya tumuma tukese, nenudie tumuma tuai

Nebateke dibendele dia tshitudilu tshia Efelayima ku luseke lua ku wesete ku bisumbu biabo Elishama muana mulume wa Amihuda neikale mukelenge wa bana ba Efelayima Bantu bandi bakamubadilabo bakadi binunu makumi anai ne nkama itanu
Abu wewe, udi ulumbuluisha muan enu bua tshinyi
Hakunvua mukelenge Helode bualu ebu, mutshima wandi wakahandika ne ya bantu bonso bakadi n andi mu Yelushalema
Kadi benji ba mudimu wa mu ntempelo bakashikama mu Ofele; Ziha ne Gishepa bakadi ku mutu kuabo
Ha diba adi mene bantu basatu bakadi bimane ku mpala kua nsubu utuakadi, buntumina ku Kaisalia
Kadi padi dikeji kadiyi ditampakana pambidi ponsu, mutuangaji neambe ne: muntu awu kena mupie mikiya to

Muakuidi angate tshituha tshia mashi a mulambu wa kujimisha n au bubi, âlabe ha makunshi a ntempelo ne ba matumba anai a tshioshelu ne mihimbu mitshinyunguluke, ne ha makunshi a ku tshibuelelu tshia ku tshiendelu tshia munda

Wewe udi ushilangana ne bakashi bakuabo ba masandi, bualu bua muntu kena ukukeba bua kuenda n ebe masandi, wewe udi umukeba, ne bualu bua wewe udi umuha difutu, kadi yeye kena ukuha difutu; mu muanda eu wewe udi ushilangana n abo
Tudi ne tshioshelu, tshidi badi bakuata mudimu mu tshitendelelu kabai bamanye mua kudiaku
Bulelela, bonso badi bashikama mu Yelushalema badi bamanye ne, Bantu aba bakuenza tshimanyinu tshidi tshimanyibua; katuena bamanye mua kutshivila

Kadi muntu yonso udi uluhuka ku bibi bia nsubu webe, Uyaya mu misesu, mashi andi neikale ha mutu handi, ne tuetu netubinge; ne muntu yonso udi wikala n ebe mu nsubu, mashi andi neikale ha mitu hetu, biamulengabo tshianza
Buonso buabo bakakema
Bantu bakambila Shaula ne, Wenze tshidi tshimpe ku mesu kuebe
Bualu bua bubi buakadi ha buloba tô ne hakalua mikenshi ya Mose, kadi bubi kabuena bubadibua kudi muntu hadiku kakui mikenshi
Anu butuku abu mukalenga wa bena Ejipitu kubikila Moshe ne Arone kubambila ne: Umukayi ne bena Izrayele mu ditunga dianyi, nuye kutendelela Maweja Nangila bu munuvua bandombe
Yehoyada, muakuidi wa Nzambi, wakela tupitene tua masalayi dî ne, Balue n andi munkatshi mua balami; muntu wamulonda bamushihe ne muele wa nvita
Nyama udi ne mihesa yandi mihandike anyi mitahe mputa kanumufidi bu mulambu kudi Yehowa mu buloba buenu
Pashishe badi basungula muntu udi ne bua kuipata mbuji awu, kumutuma mu tshipela
Newenze tukanu tua or mutambe buimpe tudi tuhindakasha bu mionshi
Samuel Bakambila Davidi ne, Bena Peleshete badi baluangana ne Bena Kila, badi biba bintu bia bishihuidi
Ke pandi ndambula Maweja Nangila biakudia bia tshianyi bia mu ditunga didiye mumpe
Meme nennuambuluishe ne meku enu onsu
Dilongu dia mayi a kumusha mikiya Maweja Nangila kuambila kabidi Moshe ne: Wenze dilongu dia tshiamu tshikunze

Nunku Yeshaya wakambila Hezikiya ne, Unvua dî dia Yehowa wa misumba: Yehowa udi wamba ne, Wamanya biebe, matuku adi alua hayabo ku Babulona ne bionso bidi mu nsubu muebe, ne bionso biakabutshila batatu bebe tô ne ku dituku edi; kabena bashiya tshintu
Hashishe Samuele wakaya ku Lama; Shaula wakabanda ku nsubu wandi ku Gibea wa Shaula
Ke mutuvua bakuate ditunga didi ku mutu kua tshimenga tshia Aroyere, tshidi pabuipi ne musulu wa Amone
Nakamumona ufika hehi ne tshimpanga, wakatshifuila tshiji tshikole, wakabunda tshimpanga, wakatshibula nsengu yatshi ibidi

Mikala, muana mukashi wa Shaula, wakaluhuka bua kusangakeneye ne Davidi, wakamuambila ne, Mona bu mudi butumbi bua mukelenge wa Isalele lelu hakamuangeye bilulu biandi ku mesu kua bakashi ba bena mudimu bandi bu mudi muntu wa tshianana umuangalasha bilulu biandi kayi ne bundu

Davidi wakashikama ne Akisha mu Gata, yeye ne bantu bandi, muntu ne muntu ne ba mu nsubu wandi, ne Davidi ne bakashi bandi babidi, Abinoama, Muena Yizelele, ne Abigayila, muena Kâmele, wakadi mukashi wa Nabala
Bakashiya Bashela mu Samalea kabidi
Wakalua n anyi mu tshiendelu tshia munda mua nsubu wa Yehowa; ekumona

Hashishe hashikisha Yehowa kuenzela mukelenge wanyi malu mimpe onso akamuambileye ne hakutekeye mukelenge ku mutu kua Bena Isalele, bualu ebu kabuena mua kunyingalasha mutshima webe, ne mutshima wa mukelenge wanyi kawena unema bujitu bualu bua mukelenge wanyi wakamatshisha mashi a bakuabo hanshi tshianana, anyi bua mukelenge wanyi wakasombuela
Kadi Petelo wakabumusha buonso buabo, wakatua binu hanshi, wakatendelela Nzambi; wakatshinguluka kudi tshitalu, wakamba ne, Tabita, bika
Nunku Yoshua wakanyenga buloba buonso bu muakambila Yehowa Mose; Yoshua wakabuabanyina Bena Isalele bu buhianyi buabo, tshisamba luseke luatshi tshisamba luseke luatshi
Nunku Mefibosheta wakashikama mu Yelushalema; wakadia bidia ku mesa a mukelenge matuku onso: yeye wakadi mulema
Muena Yuda mukuabo wakadiku, dina diandi Apolo, mulela ku Alesandelo, wakadi ne ludimi luhehele, yeye wakalua ku Efeso; wakadi ne bukole bua mu Mukanda wa Nzambi
Bantu ba lungenyi lule bakadi benza midimu ya mishindu yonso mu tshitendelelu bakaha kudi Mose, bakamuambila ne, Bantu badi balue ne bintu bitamba bungi bia kuenza n abi mudimu wakuamba Yehowa
Davidi wakamba ne, Meme nenfuile Hanuna, muana wa Nahasha, luse, bu muakanfuila tatu wandi luse

Bualu bua nuakamana kunvua lumu lua bienzedi bianyi mu bualu bua Bena Yuda bu munakatamba kukengesha bena ekelesia wa Nzambi, bu munakababutula; ne bu munakadi mpita ku mpala kua bena mulongo wanyi ba bungi ba mu tshisamba tshietu mu bualu bua Bena Yuda bualu bua lukunukunu lukole lunakadi n alu bua bilele bia bankambua betu
Yehoasha wakalala tulu ne bankambua bandi, bakamujika mu Samalea diatshimue ne bakelenge ba Isalele; Yalobama, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Nanku, kena mua kuikala ne mikiya
Hashishe Ahimasa, muana wa Sadoka, wakamba ne, Nye lubilu bua kumanyisha mukelenge ne, Yehowa wakakusombuela kudi bena lukuna bebe
Neamoshile mujima pa tshilambuilu pamue ne bukula
Tshitekelu tshia muendu atshi, tshikale kumpala kua tshilamba tshidi tshilembeleja bua kujika muaba udi mushete wa ndondu
Bantu bakuabo ba munkatshi muabo bakadi ne lukuka be Bena Isalele bakadila kabidi, bakamba ne, Nganyi neatuhe munyinyi wa tuetu kudia
Pashishe atue munu wende wa tshianza tshia balume, udi ulonda tshiala, mu mafuta adi mu tshianza tshiende tshia bakaji, amiamine mafuta awu ne munu misangu muanda mutekete kumpala kua Maweja Nangila

Nunku binuenza bulelela ne buimpe, hanuakuteka Abimeleke mu bukelenge, ne binuenzela Yelubâla ne ba mu nsubu wandi bimpe, ne binuamufuta bu muakadi difutu diandi; bualu bua tatu wanyi wakanuluila nvita, wakamba kunufuila ne muoyo wandi, wakanusungila mu bianza bia Bena Midiyana; ne nuenu nuakabika ku mpala kua nsubu wa tatu wanyi lelu, nuakushiha bana bandi balume makumi muanda mutekete ha dibue dimue, nuakateka Abimeleke, muana wa mukashi, muenji wa mudimu wandi, mu bukelenge ku mutu kua bena Shekeme, bualu bua yeye udi muan enu binuikala benzele Yelubâla ne ba mu nsubu wandi bualu bulelela ne buimpe lelu, nusanke bualu bua Abimeleke ne yeye asanke bualu buenu kabidi; kadi binuikala kanuyi benze bimpe, kahia kahatuke kudi Abimeleke bua kuosha bena Shekeme ne ba mu nsubu wa Milo; kahia kahatuke kabidi kudi bena Shekeme ne kudi ba mu nsubu wa Milo bua kuosha Abimeleke kabidi
Muisambombo wakahongolola luhanza luandi ha musulu munene, Pelata; ne mai akadimu akûma bua nshila alongolodibue bua bakelenge badi bafuma kudi kuhatuka diba
Kadi kanukosu mitshi to
Kadi muntu ne muntu adimuke biandi bu mudiye wasahu
Ahazaya, muan andi, wakakokesha mu muaba wandi
Asombe mu tshimenga tshidiye ujinga
Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nembatumine dikenga didibo kabayi mua kudinyema
Esther Ku nyima kua malu a mukelenge Ahashawelosha wakabandisha Hamana, muana wa Hamedata, Muena Agaga, wakamuteka ku mutu kua bantu banene bonso bakadi n andi
Monai argent ituakasangana mu bibombi bietu, tuakulua n ai kûdi kabidi hatuakafuma ku buloba bua Kanana

Palô wakambila Yosefe ne, Wambile bana benu ne, Enzai nunku, tekai majitu ha nyima ha mpunda yenu, yai bienu ku buloba bua Kanâna; nuangate tatu enu ne bantu badi mu nsubu yenu, nuhingane kundi nennuheshe bintu bimpe bia mu buloba bua Ejipitu, nenudie bintu bidi bitamba buimpe bia mu buloba
Kadi bantu bakuabo balembakane bakakonkangana ne, Muntu eu neatusungile munyi
Bua bualu ebu muhika wakadishinda mukudimane, wakamukukuila ne, Mukelenge, kungenzedi bualu lukasa, nenkufute dibanza dionso
Bua bena Izrayele bonsu banudi nabu bajadike mudimu muimpe undi mubenzele pamue nebe
Uvua mubatete ku Masa, mubabingishe ku mayi a Meriba
Yesu wakamuandamuna ne, Simona, ndi ne dî dia kukuambila
Monai
Mikenji eyi, ke ivua Maweja Nangila muambile Moshe bua kumanyisha bena Izrayele, bavua mu mpata ya Mowabe, dishiya dia musulu wa Yardene, mitangilangane ne Yeriko
Dituku dionsu mfumu umue afile milambu yende bua kujidila tshilambuilu

Ba mu Pelasa, Kusha ne Puta nebikaleku, buonso buabo bikale ne ngabu ne bifulu bia tshiamu, ne ba mu Gomê ne bisumbu biandi bionso bia bantu; Bena Togâma ne bisumbu biabo bionso, bafume ku miaba ya kunfudilu kua luseke lua ku nôde; bantu ba bungi nebikale n ebe

Lewitiki Milambu ya Kuosha Yehowa Wakabikila Mose, wakamuambila mu ntenta wa kusangakena ne, Wambile Bena Isalele ne, Halua muntu ne bintu bidiye musue kuoshila Nzambi, alue biandi ne mulambu wa muana wa ngombe anyi muana wa mukoko
Mose wakamba ne, Wewe wakuamba bimpe, tshiena utangila mpala webe kabidi

Luta waka mba ne, Kunsengeledi bua meme kukushiya ne bua kuhingana tshikulondi, nenye kuwaya, nendale kuwalala, bantu bebe nebikale bantu banyi ne Nzambi webe neikale Nzambi wanyi, nenfue kuwafua, nenjikibuehu kabidi, bialua tshintu tshikuabo hankatshi hetu bua kutuhandulula, anu lufu nkayalu, Yehowa angenzele muonso muenzeye tô ne ha mutu
Nebabueje milonda ku tshilambuilu bua kutshiambuilaku

Nunku Mukelenge Yehowa udi wamba ne, Bualu bua nuakunvuluisha bua mibi yenu, bua malu mabi enu akusokolodibua, ne mibi yenu idi imueneka mu bienzedi bienu bionso; bualu bua badi banuvuluka ku malu â nebunukuate ku bukole
Nenja dike tshihungidi tshianyi hankatshi hetu n ebe, nenkukumbashe ba bu ngi
Wakamba ne, Nasha
Mose wakambila bantu ne, Ebu mbualu buakamba Yehowa bua tuetu tuenze
Nempeshe bena Ejipitu muoyi mukole wa tshitunu bua banulonde

Yehezekele Mu tshidimu tshia makumi asatu, mu ngondo muinai, mu dituku ditanu dia ngondo, hanakadi munkatshi mua bahika ku muelelu wa musulu wa Kebâ, diulu diakabuluka, ne nakamona bikena kumona bia Nzambi
Nakahingana bua kutangila meji ne buhote ne malu a tshianana, kadi muntu walonda mukelenge udi mua kuenza tshinyi
Bantu kabatu batelelula tshihesa tua tshilulu tshidi katshi tshifuatalale ha tshmialu tshikulukulu, bualu bua tshihesa tshihia tshihia netshîlamune tshikulukulu, nunku disoso nedivunde
Kanuena mua kuyikukuila nansha kulonda bibidilu bia bisamba abi
Hashishe, mukelenge atuambile bu mudi disua diandi mu bualu ebu

Nembadishe munyinyi wa bana babo balume ne munyinyi wa bana babo bakashi; ne buonso buabo, muntu ne muntu, neadie munyinyi wa mulunda wandi, mu kutshintshimika kua musoko ne mu dikenga bidi bena lukuna babo, bobo mene badi bakeba mioyo yabo, babakengesha n abi
Pashishe kufuaye

Kadi bakadila Bena Isalele kudi Yehowa, Yehowa wakababishila musungidi, Ehuda, muana wa Gela, Muena Benyamina, muena luboko; Bena Isalele bakafila milambu mu bianza biandi bua kuyeye n ai kudi Egelona, mukelenge wa Moaba

Yeye wakasungula milongo ya bakuidi mu midimu yabo, ne Bena Lewi mu midimu yabo bu muakadi mikenji ya Davidi, bua kuimbabo misambu, ne bua kuenzabo midimu ya bakuidi buatshia buatshia; ne balami ba bibi ku milongo yabo ku tshibi ne ku tshibi; bualu bua Davidi, muntu wa Nzambi, wakela mikenji nunku
Bana bandi bakatangila nshila muakayila muntu wa Nzambi wakafuma mu Yuda

Halua tshikondo atshi, mu muaba wa bintu bia muhuya muimpe nemuikale bintu bibole; Nebashihe balume benu ku muele wa nvita, Ba mu bibuelelu bia ku Siona nebase madilu, nebadie; Yeshaya Mu dituku adi bakashi muanda mutekete nebakuate mulume umue ku tshianza, bamba ne, Netudie bidia bietu tuetu, netuluate bilulu bietu tuetu; kadi anji kuitabusha bua batubikile ku dina diebe; utûmushile bundu buetu
Buhianyi buisatu buakadi bua Bena Zebuluna ku meku abo
Yakobe kuambila Yozefe ne: Basemeja apa, mbele lupemba
Wa Bena Hebelone: Yeliya wakadi kahita ka Bena Hebelone mene bu muakadi bikondo bia batatu abo
Yeye wakateka masalayi mu misoko yonso ya ngumbu ya mu Yuda; wakateka milongo ya masalayi mu buloba bua Yuda ne mu misoko ya Efelayima yakanyenga Asa tatu andi
Bakabikila tshisamba tshia Benyamina ha buihi ku meku abo ne ku meku abo: bakasungula diku dia Bena Mâteli; bakasungula Shaula, muana mulume wa Kishi
Acts Mu Kaisalia muakadi muntu, dina diandi Kônelio, yeye wakadi kapitene ka tshisumbu tshia masalayi lukama, tshiakadibo babikila ne, Tshia Bena Italia
Yeye wakasangana mufuba mubishi wa lubanga lua mpunda, wakolola tshianza tshiandi, wakawambula, wakashiha n au bantu tshinunu

Bakalamata Kedolaomê to bidimu dikumi ne bibidi, ne mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne bisatu, bakatomboka Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne binai Kedôlaome wakalua ne bakelenge bakadi n andi, bakahita Bena Lefa ba mu Ashelota kânayima bukole, ne Bena Zusa ba mu Hama, ne Bena Eme ba mu Shawe kiyatayima, ne Bena Holi ba ku mikuna ya Sei to ne ku Ele palana, hehi ne tshihela
Hakafikeye kudi tshimpanga tshiakadi ne nsengu ibidi, tshinakamona tshimana ku muelelu wa musulu, wakaya lubilu bua kutshibunda ne tshiji tshikole
Muena Lewi muomumue, hakalueye ku muaba au, hakamumoneye, wakahitshila ku luseke lukuabo kabidi
Yehowa wakadi ne Yosefe, wakamuendesha diakalengele, wakadi mu nsubu wa mukelenge wandi, Muena Ejipitu
Kadi bua dî diodiumue diulu didiku katataka ne buloba kabidi biakabutshidibua bua kuhia ne kahia bilamibue tô ne ku dituku dia dilumbulula ne dia dibutuka dia bantu badi babenga Nzambi
Nulame mikenji eyi kashidi, miaba yonsu inudi nusomba

Môdekai wakumuka ku mesu kua mukelenge muluate bilulu bia bleu ne bitoke bia bukelenge, ne tshifulu tshia butumbi tshia or, ne tshikowelu tshikunzubile tshia bilulu bia lin; bena musoko bakadi mu Shushana bakela mbila, bakasanka
Wanyi munanga, ulue lukasa; wikale bu kabuluku anyi bu lukungulu lua ntole ha mutu ha mikuna ya bintu bia muhuya muimpe
Muntu wa Nzambi wakadila
Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne muanda mukulu tshia bukokeshi bua Nebukadenesâ, wakumusha bantu nkama muanda mukulu ne makumi asatu ne bantu babidi ku Yelushalema bua kuya n abo mu buhika
Bidi bienzela ditunga diônso dijima mudimu
Hashishe mukelenge Ahashawelosha wakebesha Esetê mukelenge mukashi ne, Yeye udi nganyi, yeye udi hanyi, udi welangana meji mu mutshima wandi bua kuenza nunku
Panudi basue kupeta bapika balume nansha bakaji, nuye kubakeba anu mu bisamba bikuabu bidi pabuipi nenu

Bualu bua nuenu kanuakakuatshila Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, mudimu ne disanka mu mitshima yenu bua bintu bionso biakanuheye, nunku nenukuatshile badi n enu lukuna mudimu badi Yehowa unutumina, ne nzala ne nyota ne butaka ne kuhanga kua bintu bionso

Bu Yehowa kayi muikale mukuatshishi wanyi, Hanakamba ne, Dikasa dianyi didi diselemuka, Mu divulangana dia matata munda muanyi, masamba ebe adi asankisha mutshima Bakokeshi babi badi bahangidisha malu mabi adi alonda mikenji yabo, Badi belela mioyo ya bantu bakane tshifufu, Kadi Yehowa wakulua tshibumba tshianyi tshile, Yeye ueabahingashile malu mabi abo, Psalms Luai bienu, tuimbile Yehowa musambu; Tuye ku mpala kuandi ne disakidila, Bualu bua Yehowa udi Nzambi munene, Mu tshianza tshiandi mudi mpongo ya ndondo; Mai manene ngandi, bualu bua yeye wakafuka; Luai bienu, tumutendelele ne tumukukuile; Bualu bua yeye udi Nzambi wetu, Ndi Kanukoleshi mitshima yenu bu munuakenza ku Meliba, hakanteta batatu benu, Bantu ba mu tshikondo atshi bakantondesha bidimu makumi anai, Nunku nakaditshiha mu tshiji tshianyi ne, Psalms Nuimbile Yehowa musambu muhia muhia; Nuimbile Yehowa musambu, nuvudishile dina diandi disanka; Nuambile ba munkatshi mua bantu ba bende butumbi buandi, Bualu bua Yehowa udi munene, budiye n abu mbua kutumbishibua Bualu bua nzambi yonso ya bantu ba bende idi bintu bia hatuhu; Butumbi ne buneme bidi ku mpala kuandi; Nuenu ba mu biota bia bantu, nuambike Yehowa malu andi, Nuambike Yehowa butumbi budi buakanangane ne dina diandi
Hakamona Alona bualu ebu, Wakenza tshioshelu ku mpala kua luhingu, Alona wakela dî, wakamba ne, Makelela disanka dia Yehowa nedikaleku
Bantu bonso bakamuangalaka muntu ne muntu ku nsubu wandi; Davidi wakahingana bua kuvudishileye ba mu nsubu wandi disanka

Mu diba adi dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya ne, Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Ya wambile Bena Yuda ne ba mu Yelushalema ne, Yehowa udi ukonka ne, Kanuena nuitabusha diyisha bua nuenu kutumikila mei anyi, anyi
Bimuna bionsu ebi kabikadi ne bulema pambidi to
Nudi nudikolesha ku muele wenu wa nvita, nudi nuenza malu a bundu, ne buonso buenu nudi nunyanga bakashi ba bena mutumba n enu; nenuhiane buloba ebu munyi
Elisha wakabambila ne, Eu kanshila nansha, kammusoko nansha; nundonde, meme nennufile kudi muntu unudi nukeba
Nuele muoyo kudi bana betu ba mu Kilisto ba mu Laodikiya, ne kudi Numpa ne bena ekelesia ba mu nsubu wandi
Nunku mikenshi yakalua ndeshi wetu wa kutufikisha kudi Kilisto, bua tuetu tubingishibue ku ditabusha

Tangila, hantshidi muimane hehi ne mushimi wa mai, ne bana bakashi ba bena musoko bakadi balua bua kusunabo mai, witabushe ne nsongakashi undi ngambila ne, Ndi nkutendekena ne, Utule mulondo webe wa mai, umpe mai a kunua, yeye angandamune di ne, Nua biebe, nennuishe tumelo biebe kabidi, nunku yeye mene ikale mukashi uwakasunguila muntu webe Isaka, nunku nemmanye ne wewe wakufuila mukelenge wanyi luse
Yeye wakabandamuna ne, Nuenu kabidi nudi nubengela kutumikila mukenshi wa Nzambi bualu bua bilele bienu tshinyi
Yeye kabidi neanujadike tô ne kunshikidilu, bua kanuikadi ne tshia kunubandabo n atshi mu dituku dia Mukelenge wetu Yesu Kilisto
Chronicles Lehabama wakaya ku Shekeme; bualu bua Bena Isalele bonso bakadisangisha ku Shekeme bua kumuhingisha mu bukelenge
Ne mukana muabo kamuakasanganyibua mashimi; kabena ne tshilema
Nunku tuakamunyungulula bua kuluangana n andi; kadi Yehoshafata wakadila kudi Yehowa, ne Yehowa wakamukuatshisha; Nzambi wakabenzesha bua bobo kumukabo kudiye
Bakulu ba mu Gilada bakambila Yefeta ne, Yehowa ikale mumanyi wa bualu hankatshi hetu; bulelela, netuenze bu mu dî diebe
Ditshina dia Nzambi kadiena ku mesu kuabo
Ku mbelu kua luhangu tshilulu netshikaleku tshia buanda bua bleu ne bukunzubile ne bukunze kunzû ne bua lin mutambe buimpe, tshienjibue kudi mundi wa lungenyi lule, enza makunshi anai ne nkanu mai

Ne nyama nuakatangila wakafuana nyama wa nkashama, ne makama andi akadi bu akama a nyama wa ours, ne mukana muandi muakadi bu mukana mua nyama wa ntambue; ne dragon wakamuhesha bukole buandi, ne nkuasa wandi wa butumbi, ne bukokeshi bunene
Bobo bakahaula misoko yonso yakadi ha buihi ne Gela, bualu bua ditshina dia Yehowa diakabakuata
Yesu wakambila kapitene ka masalayi ne, Ya biebe; bualu bua wewe wakuitabusha, nebakuenzele tshiwakulomba
Nunku Nâmana wakalua ne tubalu tuandi ne makalu andi, wakimana ku mbelu kua nsubu wa Elisha

Tela wakangata Abalama, muan andi mulume ne Lota, muana wa Halana, muikulu wandi, ne Salai, ma muen andi, mukashi wa muan andi mulume Abalama, bakamuangala mu buloba bua Ula wa Kasada bua kuya ku buloba bua Kanâna, bakafika ku Halana, bakashikamaku
Kubelaye lupemba, wamba ne: Tantayi, nulelangane, nuvulangane buloba bujima
Yoshua, muana wa Nuna, wakadi ne lungenyi munda muandi tente bualu bua Mose wakamutentekasha bianza biandi; ne Bena Isalele bakunvua di diandi, bakenza bu muakambila Yehowa Mose
Nuenu bajadika menemene ne: mbenze nanku, nushipe bantu bonsu ba mu tshimenga atshi ne bimuna biabu
Deuteronomy Katataka, nuenu Bena Isalele, unvuai mei ne mikenji bindi musue kunuyisha, bua nuenu kubienza bua nuikale ne muoyo, nubuelemu, nuhiane buloba budi Yehowa, Nzambi wa batatu benu, unuha
Bakaluangana ne Bena Midiyana bu muakambila Yehowa Mose, bakashiha balume bonso
Hakangatabo tshieya tshia Yasona ne tshia bakuabo, bakabalekela

Miaba Yakadi Bisamba Bikuabo bia Bena Isalele Kabayi Banyenge Bena Zebuluna kabakihata bantu ba mu Kitîlona anyi ba mu Nahalola; kadi Bena Kanâna bakashikama munkatshi muabo, bakabenzesha mudimu wa mulambu
Bakayila ku luseke lua sude, bakafua ku Hebelone, ne Ahimana ne Sheshai ne Talemai, bana ba Anaka bakadimu
Nuakuenza bibi mu bualu ebu
Kanuedianganyi, anu hanuahunga dî bua tshikondo, bua kuikala ne musangu wa kutendelela Nzambi, ne bua kudisangisha kabidi, bua Satana kanuteyi bua dihanga dia kudikanda kuenu
Hakimanyikabo Petelo ne Yone munkatshi muabo, bakabakonka ne, Nuakuenza bualu ebu ne bukole kai, anyi mu dina dia nganyi

Jeremiah Yehowa, wewe udi muakane hanakeba kukuela mpata, Wewe wakubakuna, bakuela miji; badi badiunda; e, badi bakuama mamuma; Kadi wewe, Yehowa, udi mu mmanye meme, Buloba nebuase muadi, Biwikala mulumbile lubilu ne bantu badi benda hanshi, ne Bualu bua bana benu mene ne ba mu tshiota tshia tatu webe Nakulekela nsubu wanyi, Yuda, buhianyi buanyi, Yuda, buhianyi buanyi, wakulua kundi bu nyunyu udi ne matoba matoba udi udia munyinyi, anyi

Hakadibo badia, diabolo mumane kubuesha munda mua Yudasa Isakaliote, muana wa Simona bualu bua kutungila Yesu tshitungu; hakamanya Yesu ne, Tatu wanyi wakufila bintu bionso mu bianza bianyi, nakufuma kudi Nzambi, nempingane kudi Nzambi; Yesu wakabika ku mesa, wakavula bivualu biandi, wakangata dituaya, wakadijingiladi

Yeye wakasa kabidi Bete holona ku mutu kua mukuna ne Bete holona mukuabo mu tshibanda, misoko ya ngumbu, ne bibi bia biamu; wakasa Balata ne misoko mikuabo yakadi n ai Solomo bua kutekamu bintu biandi ne misoko ya makalu andi ne misoko ya bena nvita bandi bakadi benda ha nyima ha tubalu ne misoko yonso yakasua Solomo kuasa mu Yelushalema ne mu Lebanona, ne mu nseke yonso yakakokesheye
Mose wakambila Bena Isalele mei au onso, ne mitshima yabo yakanyingalala bikole
Kembua tudi ne bukokeshi ku ditabusha dienu, kadi tudi bakuatshishanganyi n enu mu disanka dienu; bualu bua nudi nujalama mu ditabusha
Bana bandi bakadi ne mukalu wabo ku Hawila to ne ku Shû, ku mpala kua Ejipitu mu nshila wa ku Ashû, bakashikama batangilangane ne bana babo bonso
Nunku dî edi diakalua bu lusumuinu ne, Shaula udi munkatshi mua baprofete, anyi
Kadi ba bungi bakunvua dî bakitabusha; bungi bua balume buakakumbana bu binunu bitanu
Bintu bionso bidibo balela, ne bia bantu ne bia nyama idibo bafila kudi Yehowa, nebikale biebe, kadi wewe neuhikule ban a bute ba bantu ne ban a bute bonso ba nyama idi kayiyi miakane
Bakangata muntu ne muntu bantu bandi, bakuabo bakadi ne bua kubuela dia Lumingu, bakuabo bakadi ne bua kuluhuka dia Lumingu, bakaya kudi Yehoyada, muakuidi wa Nzambi
Yoshua wakambila bantu ne, Nuenu nudi bamanyi ba bualu buenu bunuakadiambila ne, Tuakusungula Yehowa, bua kumukuatshia mudimu
Gada, tshisumbu tshia bantu netshimunguile, kadi yeye neabakume ku bikankanyi biabo
Bualu bua hanakadi mu Tesalonike, nuakantumina bintu binakadi n abi bualu misangu ne misangu
Udi ne tshilumbu kai
Badi basanka bua bualu buanyi buakane bele mbila ne bikale ne disanka
Tuakuangata ngasa kudiye ne bupostolo, bua kuvudisha ditumikila dia ditabusha munkatshi mua bisamba bia bende bionso, bualu bua dina diandi
Kadi Washeti, mukelenge mukashi, wakabenga kulua ku mukenji wa mukelenge wakatumeye kudi bantu batungula; nunku mukelenge wakadi ne tshiji tshikole, ne tshiji tshiandi tshiakatema munda muandi
Bualu meme ndi Maweja Nangila
Yehowa udi wamba ne, Nenteke balami ha mutu hai, nebayidishe bimpe; kayena itshina kabidi, kayena ikuatshika buowa, kakuena kuikala umue wa munkatshi muai wajimina
Ebu mbualu buakamba bamuledi ne, Yeye nmuntu mukole, numukonke yeye
Bianukonka muntu dî, numuambile ne, Mukelenge udi n ai bualu; yeye neaitume lubilu
Bilele biabo biakadi ku mpala kuanyi bu bukoya bua mukashi utshidi ku katshetshi
Bakaya kudiye bu mudi bantu bakaya kudi muena masandi; bobo baye kudi Ohola ne Oholiba, bakashi aba ba masandi
Nudisangishe bua kuntendelela meme Maweja Nangila

Nunku Yehowa udi wamba ne, Neige ya ha mutu ha Lebanona Bualu bua bantu banyi bakumpua muoyo, Bua malu â badi bavuisha buloba buabo bu tshintu tshia kukuatshisha bakuabo buowa, Nembatangadishe ku mpala kua bena lukuna babo Mu diba adi bakamba ne, Luai, tuelele Yelemiya tshifufu; bualu bua mikenji kayena yumuka kudi muakuidi, meji kaena umuka kudi bena meji, ne dî kadiena diumuka kudi muprofete
Nentume tuishi ku mpala kuebe bualu bua kukuihatshila Bena Hiwi ne Bena Kanâna ne Bena Hiti
Maweja Nangila kuntuma bua kunumanyisha ne: Nupitshile ku mikuna ya Seyire, muaba udibu basombe kudi bana benu, ndelanganyi ya Esawu
Shekeme wakambila tatu wa mukashi ne bana babo ne, Ndi musue kuikala ne diakalengele ku mesu kuenu, nennufute bintu bionso binudi nuamba
Anu meme nkayanyi nakuhanduka bua kukuambila
Nengumushe badi bantombokela ne badi bangenzela bibi munkatshi muenu
Bakadia, bakûkuta; bakangula bihesa bia bidia biakashala bisaka muanda mutekete biule tente
Kushihianganyi
Bantu bakuabo ne bunvue, nebatshine, kabena benza malu au mabi munkatshi muenu kabidi

Dî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya hakadiye musuika mu tshiendelu tshia balami ba nsubu wa lukanu ne, Ya Wambile Ebede meleke, Muena Atiopa, ne, Yehowa wa misumba, Nzambi wa Isalele, udi wamba ne, Mona, nenshikishe mei anyi onso anakuamba bua musoko eu bua kuwenzela malu mabi, kembua kuwenzela malu mimpe; neashikishibue ku mpala kuebe dituku adi
Matuku a Tela akadi bidimu nkama ibidi ne bitanu, Tela wakafua mu Halana
Matayo Nudimuke, kanuenji buakane buenu ku mesu kua bantu ne, Bobo batumone; binuenza nunku, kanuena ne difutu kudi Tatu wenu udi mu diulu
Nsubu mukuabo wakadiku ne mushiku wandi wa mbelu mutangilangane ne mbalanda wa tshibuelelu etshi, ne bakuvuwamu milambu ya kuosha

Bia momumwe, dikanyika dia kuswikangana pankatshi pa bienzeji bishilangana bia Musoko didi dilomba bwa se baasa Tshibutshilu tshia ditunga tshia diabanyinangana mpetu ne bintu, tshiteeka mu bukookeshi bwa Bukalenga bunene
Davidi wakabanduluka, wakamona muanjelo wa Yehowa muimane hankatshi ha diulu ne buloba ne muele wa nvita mu tshianza tshiandi tshiolola ha mutu ha Yelushalema
Nunku Davidi wakula tshishihuidi ne ngombe ku nshekele Davidi wakashilaku Yehowa tshioshelu, wakafilahu milambu ya kuosha ha kahia ne milambu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala
Yesu wakabambila ne, Ndi musue kunukonka bualu: Tshidi tshimpe ntshinyi, kuenza malu mimpe dituku dia Lumingu, anyi kuenza malu mabi; kusungila muoyo, anyi kûshiha
Mai akahingana, akabanda ha mutu ha makalu ne ha mutu ha masalayi akadi enda ha tubalu, ha mutu ha bisumbu bionso bia Palô, biakabalonda mu bunene bua mai, nansha umue wabo wakahandika
Nenvuishe buloba bikulu ne tshihela tshia tshianana; bukole buabu buakadi bubuheshisha dihetu nebujimine, ne mikuna ya mu Isalele neyishale hatuhu, kakuyi muntu wahitshila ha mitu hai
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ya biebe kudi Palô, mukelenge wa Ejipitu, umuambile ne, Lekela Bena Isalele bahatuke mu buloba buebe
Hashishe Boaza wakakonka muena mudimu wandi wakadi ku mutu kua banowi ne, Nsongakashi eu ngua nganyi

to, Tshipwita munwamfwanka anyi tshipwita mukulumpa kêna mwa kwikala popamwe: a mweena Bukalenga bunene; b mweena tshishimikidi tshia ditwa mpanda ku mungalata c mweena bilwilu, bumpulushi ne midimu ya bukubi bwa bantu; d bundumbulula; e mweena mudimu mushindame wa mbulamatadi; f mulombodi mushindame wa telitwale, pa kumusha bamfumu ba musoko, bisamba ne bifuku; g mutumibwa wa mbulamatadi mwikala utshidi ku mudimu, h mweena mu nzubu wa mudimu wa Mulombodi wa Ditunga, wa minisitila kavulambedi, wa Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia ba tshipwita munwamfwanka , wa Mulombodi wa Tshibambalu tshia batshipwita bakulumpa, wa beena mu bukalenga bunene ne, mu tshibûngi wa mfumu wa tshidiidi anyi wa buludiki bwa mbulamatadi, mweena mudimu mu kumpanyi wa mbulamatadi anyi mu kumpanyi ya bubanji busanga; i mudimu mukwabo ônso udibo bateeka muntu musungula
Ke milambu inudi mua kundambula meme Maweja Nangila matuku a bibilu
Dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Hamutula, muana mukashi wa Yelemiya wa mu Libena
Nuenu bamusombeshe makuta, kanuena mua kulomba tshia kasombela to
Muaba wa Kuasabo Ntempelo Hakamona Davidi ne, Yehowa wakitaba kundi ku tshihehudi tshia Ônana, Muena Yebuse, yeye wakafilaku milambu
Bikala muntu kai musue Mukelenge, edibue biandi mulau
Ahu nakabanduluka, nakatangila ku luseke lua ku node, ekumona, ku luseke lua ku nôde kua tshibuelelu tshia ku tshioshelu, ku mbelu kuatshi, kuakadi luhingu elu lua mukau

Bakuidi ba bantu bakadi ne tshilele tshiabo bu nunku ne, hakalua muntu yonso ne nyama wa kushiha bu mulambu, ne hakadi munyinyi eu usaba ha kahia, muhika wa muakuidi wakalua ne nkalafa udi ne menu asatu mu tshianza tshiandi: wakatua mu luesu anyi mu dilonga anyi mu luesu lunene; ne muakuidi wakadiangatshila munyinyi wonso wakakuata ku nkalafa

Muanjelo wakambila Yoshua ne, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Biwenda mu nshila yanyi, ne biwenza mudimu wanyi bimpe, nunku neukokeshe nsubu wanyi ne neulame mbanza yanyi; neakuhe miaba ya kuendela munkatshi mua badi bimana kunoku

Ba gouverneur bonso ba mu bukelenge, balumbuluishi, miloho, bena meji ne bakokeshi bakahunga dî dimue ne, Mukelenge ajadike mukenji, ele mukandu mukole, wamba ne, Muntu yonso walomba bualu kudi nzambi mukuabo anyi kudi muntu mukuabo mu matuku makumi asatu, kayi ubulomba kûdi nkayebe, mukelenge, bamuele mu huma bua ntambue

Wakateka luhingu lua Bashela luakasongeye mu nsubu wa Yehowa, mu nsubu mene wakambila Yehowa Davidi ne muan andi Solomo ne, Nenjadike dina dianyi mu nsubu eu ne mu Yelushalema unakasungula munkatshi mua bisamba bia Bena Isalele tshiendelele; tshiena ngendakasha makasa a Bena Isalele ku buloba ebu bunakaha bankambua babo, biatumikilabo mei onso anakabambila ne mikenji yonso inakabelela mukana mua muntu wanyi Mose
Bikalabo kabai bahanduke, hakahidiabo wakabadimusha ha buloba, kudi kutamba kumueneka ne tuetu katuena tuhanduka, badi bumuka kudi udi utudimusha mu diulu
Kadi yeye kakadi mumanye ne, Yehowa wakamana kundekela
Bantu bakamukonka ne, Tuakunvua mu mikenshi ya Nzambi ne, Kilisto udi wikala tshiendelele; ahu munyi mûdi wamba ne, Budi n abu Muana wa muntu mbua kubishibua

Bualu bukuabo, tatu wanyi, tangila ne tshihesa tshia tshikowelu tshiebe tshidi mu tshianza tshianyi; bualu bua meme nakukosa tshikowelu tshiebe, tshiakukushiha, nunku umanye biebe ne, Kakuena bualu bubi mu tshianza tshianyi: tshiakukuenzela bibi, kadi wewe ngûdi ukeba muoyo wanyi bua kûnyenga
Nunku bunudi n abu mbua kuditeka ku nyima kuabo, kenganu bualu bua tshishi atshi, kadi bua muoyo mukese wenu kabidi
Mu tshidimu tshia dikumi ne binai tshia bukelenge bua Hezikiya, Saneheliba, mukelenge wa Ashû, wakalua, wakaluangana ne bena misoko yonso ya Yuda yakadi ne ngumbu, wakayinyenga
Yeye wakalua ku Nazaleta kuakakoleleye; wakabuela mu nsunagoga dituku dia Lumingu lua Bayuda bu muakadi tshilele tshiandi, wakimana bua kubala mukanda
Badi babulombola kudi Minisitila kavulambedi, udi mwikala mfumu wa Bukalenga bunene
Wewe udi ukenuka mpingu, udi uhaula bia mu ntempelo, anyi

Numuambile ne, Mona, muntu webe Yakoba udi kabidi ku nyima kuetu Bualu bua yeye wakabambila munda ne, Nemmutokeshe munda ne matabisha akaya ku mpala kuanyi, ne hatuatangilangana n andi ku mesu, bumue yeye neangitabushe
Batatu, nakunufundila mukanda, bualu bua nudi bamanye Yesu udi wa ku tshibangidilu
Maweja Nangila kumuambila ne: Ela dikombu adi panshi
Wewe neusungule Alona ne bana bandi balume, ne bobo nebashale ne mudimu wa buakuidi, bialua muenyi ha buihi nebamushihe
Biatuambilabo ne, Anjai kuimana, netulue kunudi aku, hashishe netuimane anu ha wetu muaba, katuena tuya kudibo
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Hawahingana mu Ejipitu, wenza ku mesu kua Palô malu a kukema onso anakuteka mu tshianza tshiebe, kadi meme nenkoleshe mutshima wa Palô, ne yeye kena ulekela bantu
Bavua benza dilongu dinene
Nuele Epaineto, munanga wanyi, muoyo; yeye udi dimuma dia kumudilu dia mu Asia diakukuamishabo kudi Kilisto
Hakaya bakeluba, nkata yakaya n abo diatshimue; ne hakolola bakeluba mahuahua abo bua kubuka ha buloba, nkata kayakumuka ku miaba yai ya hehi n abo
Wa mu tshisamba tshia Shimeona, Shelumiele muana mulume wa Sulishadai
Davidi wakambila Itai ne, Ya, hita ku mpala
Ku nyima kua bualu ebu Yalobama kakalekela bubi buandi; kadi wakasungula bakuidi munkatshi mua bantu bonso ba tshianana, wakabateka mu bitendelelu biakadi ku mikuna
Hashishe bantu ba mu buloba bakangata Yehoaza, muana wa Yoshiya, bakamuhingisha mu bukelenge mu muaba wa tatu andi mu Yelushalema
Muanebe awu neikale bu nyama wa mpunde wa muitu
Tshibangidilu ABRAHAME Mvidi Mukulu udi ubikila Abrame Maweja Nangila kuambila Abrame ne: Umuke mu ditunga dienu, mu diku dienu ne ku nzubu kua batatuebe
Tukanda badi mwa kutweela kabidi mu mushindu wa biamwa udi utamba kukolesha mutshima
Hashishe mukelenge wa Isalele wakasangisha baprofete nkama inai, wakabebesha ne, Tuye ku Lamota gilada bua kuluangana n abo, anyi tushale

John Hakamba Yesu malu â, wakatangila mulu, wakamba ne, Tatu, diba diakufika; utumbishe Muan ebe, bua Muana akutumbishe; bu muwakumuha bukole bua kukokesha bantu bonso bua kuheye bonso bawakumuha muoyo wa tshiendelele
Yehowa umushe muntu udi wenza nunku mu ntenta ya Yakoba, nansha mukonki nansha muitabi, nansha udi ulua ne mulambu kudi Yehowa wa misumba
Bakavuluka mei andi, bakumuka ku lukita, bakahiana, bakambila bayidi dikumi ne umue ne bakuabo bonso malu â onso
Nasha nuamba ne mutshi udi muimpe ne mamuma au adi mimpe, nasha nuamba ne mutshi udi mubi ne mamuma au adi mabi; bua mamuma adi amanyisha mudi mutshi wau
Hashishe ba mu bisamba bidibo bashiye binunyunguluka nebamanye ne, Meme Yehowa nakuibaka misoko yakadi bikulu, nakujadika kabidi miaha yakadi mibutuke
Nunku bantu ba mukelenge Hezikiya bakafika kudi Yeshaya
