Ne bakelenge ba ha buloba bakadi benda n andi masandi, ne bakadi banemeshangana n andi nebikale ne binsonshi, nebadile muadi bualu buandi, hatangilabo muinshi wa ku kuhia kuandi; nebimane ha bule bualu bua ditshina dia dikenga diandi, bamba ne, Mulau, mulau, musoko munene, Babulona, musoko mukole
Kanukudimunyi mitshima yenu kudi mpingu, kanudienzedi mpingu ne tshiamu tshiakengululabo mu kahia ndi Yehowa, Nzambi wenu
Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wetu uvua mutuambile ne: Nudi bashale ku mukuna eku matuku mapite bungi
Hakunvua Yesu dî diabo, yeye wakamba ne, Badi ne bukole kabena ne muondahi bualu, anu badi ne mabedi

Palô ne tshisumbu tshiandi tshinene tshia masalayi ne tshia bena nvita ba bungi kabena mua kumukuatshisha mu dituku dia nvita, haluabo kukungisha mishiki ya buloba ne kuela mabula manene a kutshintshimika n au musoko, bua kushihabo bantu ba bungi
Pikala bantu bakuabu bumvue mudibu bamunyoke nanku, nebatshine
Lea wakamba ne, Nzambi wakumpa difutu dianyi bualu bua meme nakafila muena mudimu wanyi wa bakashi kudi bayanyi, wakamuidika dina ne, Yisakâ
Kuena mua kuwenza amu nkayebe to
Davidi wakambila Akisha ne, Wewe neumanye bu mudi muntu webe musue kuenza
Yoshua wakatuma bantu ku Ai bumuke ku Yeleko, udi hehi ne Bete awena ku esete kua Betele, wakabambila ne, Yai bienu bua kutentekela buloba

Muntu wakadi ne mutshima mulengele ne kalolo neikale ne disu dibi kudi muan abo ne kudi mukashi udiye munange ne kudi bana bandi bakashala; nunku yeye kena ubabanyinaku munyinyi wa bana bandi hadiye udia, bualu bua yeye kena ne tshintu tshishala kudiye mu ditshintshimika ne mu ditata didi bena lukuna banutatshisha n adi ku misoko yenu yonso
Nudimuke kudi mbua, nudimuke kudi benji babi ba mudimu, nudimuke kudi baditahi ba mubidi

Bikala Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, muleheshe matshika enu, bu muakudi tshiheye kudi bankambua benu, bianuheye buloba buonso buakalayeye bankambua benu; binuatumikila mukenji eu, undi munuelele lelu, binuawenza, bua kusua Yehowa, Nzambi wenu, ne bua kuenda mu nshila yandi; hashishe nenusungule misoko mikuabo isatu ha mutu ha misoko ei isatu
Bahika bandi bakamukonka ne, Udi musue tuye kusunguila luhela, anyi
Pikala muntu mupela wa mu tshisamba tshianyi ukenga, wewe mumusombeshe makuta, kumulombi tshia kasombela to
Hashishe Bena Yuda binunu bisatu bakaya ku lubuebue lua mu dibue dia Etama, bakambila Shimishona ne, Kuena mumanye ne, Bena Peleshete badi batukokesha, anyi
Kadi tshivuadi tshia dima tshidibo baulambila nebatshishihe, biaulambilabo mu tshivuadi tshia tshiamu tshia mitaku, nebatshisukule bimpe ne mai

Muntu nansha umwe peshi tshisumbu tshia bantu katshiena mwa kwangata tshitupa tshia buloba bwa ditunga bu mwaba wa kubangila dikeba dia kukudimuna mianda ya tshidiidi anyi dibweeja dia tshimvundu mu ditunga dia Kongu anyi mu ditunga dikwabo diônso to

Muntu udi ulenga bianza ha mubidi wa muntu mufue neikale bu muntu udi kayi muakane tô matuku muanda mutekete, yeye neadilengeshe ne mai au dituku disatu, ne halua dituku dia muanda mutekete yeye neikale muakane, kadi biahidieye kudilengesha dituku disatu, halua dituku dia muanda mutekete yeye kena wikala muakane
Katuena ne dikima dia kuyamu to, bualu bana betu bavua bajadikila ne: bena ditunga adi mbatupite bukole ne bule
Nembahingashe bua kushikamabo munkatshi mua Yelushalema, nebikale bantu banyi, ne meme nengikale Nzambi wabo mu bushuwa ne mu buakane
Nunku udi ne kundi ntumbila mu Kilisto Yesu mu malu adi a Nzambi
Bena Isalele nebadishimikile ntenta yabo, mundi ne muntu ku tshitudilu tshiandi, hehi ne dibendele diandi ku bisumbu biabo
Kunupatuilaye mayi mu lubuebue luvua lupite bukole
Yeye wakamuitaba ne, Nenye, nenteke nyuma wa mashimi mukana mua baprofete bandi bonso
Bualu bua mikenji ei inakunuambila lelu kayena minuhite bukole bua nuenu kuyenza; kayena kule

Bimbi ba misambu, bana ba Asafa, bakadi mu miaba yabo bu muakadi mukenji wa Davidi ne wa Asafa ne wa Hemana ne wa Yedutuna, mumonyi wa malu wa mukelenge; batanu bakadi ku tshibi ne ku tshibi; kabakadi ne bua kumuka ku mudimu wabo, bualu bua bana babo Bena Lewi bakabalongoluela bintu biabo
Bobo kabakajingulula dî diakabambileye
Biahana muntu nsubu mu musoko udi munyungulula ne lumbu yeye udi mua kuhikula nsubu diambedi tshidimu tshimue katshiyi tshianze kuhita, tô tshidimu tshijima yeye udi mua kumuhikula

Ezra Au mmena a bakadi ku mitu ya nsubu ya batatu babo, eku nkulondolola kua bakafuma n anyi ku Babulona, mu bukokeshi bua mukelenge Atashasete: wa bana balume ba Pinehasa, Gêshoma; wa bana ba Itamâ, Danyele; wa bana ba Davidi, Hatusha; wa bana ba Shekanya ne ba Palosha, Zekâya; bakamubalabo n abo bakadi balume lukama ne makumi atanu
Tudi bamanye ne, Kilisto wakabishibua ku lufu kena ufua kabidi; lufu kaluena mua kumukokesha kabidi

Kadi mona, wewe neulele muana wa balume, neikale muena ditalala; nemmuhe ditalala kudi bena lukuna bonso badi bamunyunguluke; bualu bua dina diandi nedikale Solomo; nenvuishe ditalala ne dikisha mu buloba bua Isalele mu matuku andi
Meku a Bena Kohata, Bena Lewi, bakashala, bakangata bimenga bia mu tshituha tshiabo tshia mu tshisamba tshia Efelayima
Mose wakatshina, wakamba ne, Bulelela, bualu ebu buakumanyibua
Kanukunyi ntete ya mishindu ibidi mishilangane mu budimi bua tumuma tukese, anyi nebajidile bintu bionso biakadiundamu ne ntete inuakukuna ne tumuma tukese tudi mitshi ei ikuama

Dî dia Kilisto dikale munda muenu ne bubanshi buadi; mu meshi onso nuyishangane ne nudimushangane ne misambu ya bena kuitabusha ba kale ne ya bena Kilisto ne ya Nyuma; nuimbile Nzambi misambu ne ngasa mu mitshima yenu
Yehowa wakamueneka kudi Abalama, wakamba ne, Nempe tunkanunuina biebe buloba ebu Abalama wakenzela Yehowa, wakamueneka kudiye, tshioshelu
Pashishe kuangataye kabidi bintu abi ku bianza bia Arone ne bia bana bende ba balume, kubitentekajaye pa mutu pa milambu ya kuosha ivua pa tshilambuilu, kubioshila Maweja Nangila
Kadi nuenu badi babanshi, mulau ulualua kunudi, bua nuenu nuakumana kuangata disamba dienu
Bobo bakalumbuluila bantu bilumbu matuku onso, bakalua ne bilumbu bikole kudi Mose, ne bobo bakakosa bilumbu bikese
Mukelenge wakamba ne, Nembafile
Yuda umona bintu abi, kubimanyaye
Nuenu nenuhaule misoko yonso idi ne ngumbu, ne misoko yonso idi miakane, nenushimbule mitshi yonso idi mimpe, nenujibike mishimi yonso ya mai, nenunyange madimi onso adi mimpe ne mabue kabidi

Yeye wakamba ne, Bulelela, yeye udi unanga bantu bonso, Mose wakalelela mikenji Yeye wakadi mukelenge wa mu Yeshuluna, Lubena ikale biandi ne muoyo, kafu nansha, Edi ndisanka dia Yuda; wakamba ne, Bua Lewi yeye wakamba ne, Wakambila tatu wandi ne mamu wandi ne, Tshiena mumumone; Bobo nebayishe bana ba Yakoba mei ebe, ne Bena Isalele mikenji yebe; Yehowa avudishile bintu biandi disanka, Bua Benyamina yeye wakamba ne, Bua Yosefe yeye wakamba ne, ne bua bintu biakakuama mamuma bualu bua diba, bua bintu bimpe bia mu mikuna, ne bua bintu bimpe bia ha buloba ne tshiuwidi tshiabu, Butumbi buandi budi bu muan a bute wa ngombe, Bua Zebuluna yeye wakamba ne, Bobo nebabikile bantu ku mikuna, Bua Gada yeye wakamba ne, Yeye udi udianjila kudisunguila tshituha tshiandi, Bua Dana yeye wakamba ne, Bua Nafatale yeye wakamba ne, Bua Ashe yeye wakamba ne, Milonda yebe ya bibi bia musoko neyikale ya tshiamu tshifike ne tshiamu tshia mitaku, Yeshuluna, kakuena mukuabo bu Nzambi, Nzambi wa kashidi udi muaba webe wa kushikama talalâ, Isalele udi ushikama biandi talalâ, Bena Isalele, nuenu nudi ne disanka, Deuteronomy Mose wakaya ku mpata ya Moaba ku mukuna wa Nebo, ku mutu kua Pisega, kuakadi kutangilangana ne Yeleko
Nebashimbule bioshelu bienu ne makunshi anudi nutendelela n au diba; nengele bana benu bashihibue hanshi ku mpala kua mpingu yenu
Ntshidi ne tshiji tshikole kudi bisamba bidi bishikame tshianana bualu bua hanakadi ne tshiji tshikese, malu mabi akatshibandisha
Balume babidi bafofo bakadi bashikame kukala kua nshila; hakunvuabo ne, Udi uhita nYesu, bakela mbila ne, Mukelenge, muana wa Davidi, utufue luse
Nunku, tshihungidi tshia kumudia ka tshiakujadikibua katshî ne mashi

Muntu mukuabo wakadimu, dina diandi Anania, wakadi mutendeledi muakane utumikile mikenshi ya Mose, lumu luandi luakadi luimpe munkatshi mua Bena Yuda bonso bakadi bashikamemu; yeye wakalua kundi, wakimana ba buihi n anyi, wakangambila ne, Muan etu Shaula, tabala
Kadi bobo bakadisua, kabakatumikila mikenji yebe, bakashiha mei ebe majalame biâtumikila muntu, yeye neikale ne muoyo kudiu , bakasaka makaya, bakambula mpala yabo, kabakunvua
Muku wa Petelo mukashi wakadi ne mubidi wandi mukuatshike kahia ka bungi; bakasengelela Yesu bua disama diandi
Uliya muakuidi wakenza malu onso akamba mukelenge Ahaza
Kadi Yesu wakabandamuna ne, Nudi nuhambuka, kanuena bamanye Mukanda wa Nzambi ne bukole buandi
Bundi n abu mbua kukuatshila nganyi mudimu
Nenteke mulami umue ha mutu hai, yeye neayidishe, muntu wanyi Davidi mene; yeye neayidishe, yeye neikale mulami wai
Shaula wakamuitaba ne, Bualu bua ndi ntamba kutata
Genesis Salai, mukashi wa Abalama, kakamulelela bana nansha, wakadi ne mukashi muena mudimu, Muena Ejipitu, dina diandi Haga
Abalama wakikala mu buloba bua Kanana, Lota wakashikama mu misoko ya mu mpata, wakashimika ntenta yandi tô ne ku Sodoma
Alukila ku dikisha diebe, wewe muoyo Bualu bua wewe wakumpandisha bua muoyo wanyi kawikadi lufu; Nengende ku mpala kua Yehowa Nakadi ngeyemena Yehowa, Nakamba mu ditenkakana dia mutshima wanyi ne
Meme ne Tatu tudi bamue
Bakamukudimuna ne, Abalahama ntatu wetu, Yesu wakabambila ne, Bu nuenu bikale bana ba Abalahama, nuakadi kuenza bienzedi bia Abalahama
Kadi yeye wakatshinguluka, wakababela
Tatu, katataka untumbisha diatshimue n ebe ne butumbi butuakadi n abu n ebe diambedi buloba kabuihu

Bakadi balume, bakashi ne bana, bana bakashi ba mukelenge ne muntu yonso wakadi Nebuzaladana, kapitene ka bansentedi ba masalayi, mushiye mu bianza bia Gedaliya, muana wa Ahikama, muana wa Shefana; Yelemiya muprofete kabidi ne Baluka, muana wa Neliya
Muntu mukuabo udiku mu bukelenge buebe udi ne nyuma wa nzambi ya tshijila munda muandi
Hakunvuabo mikenji, Bena Isalele bakadilamununa kudi bantu ba hatuhu
Yeye kena muana wa muena mabaya, anyi
Bua bualu ebu mbuakankuatshila Bena Yuda mu ntempelo, bakeba kunshiha
Mukalu wa ku esete wakadi Dishiba dia Luehu tô ne kunshikidilu kua Yadene

Di dia Yehowa didi dizakasha tshihela, Dî dia Yehowa didi dilelesha ngulungu bana, Yehowa wakashikama Yehowa neaheshe bantu bandi bukole, Misambu Yehowa, nenkutumbishe, bualu bua wakutula, Ke, Yehowa Nzambi wanyi, nakadila kudi bua wewe unkuatshishe, Ke, Yehowa, wakuhaula muoyo wanyi mu Muaba wa Bafue, Imbilai Yehowa misambu ya kumutumbisha n ai, nuenu bansanto bandi, sakidilai dina Bualu bua tshiji tshiandi tshidiku anu tshituha tshihi, Meme hanyi, hanakadi ne diakalengele, nakamba ne, Wewe Yehowa, bua luse luebe wakadi mujadike mukuna wanyi bua kushindamau bikole; Yehowa nakadi ndila kûdi, Kumatshisha kua mashi anyi kudi mua kukukuatshisha munyi, binahueka mu Dijimba dia Bafue
Yosefe wakambila tatu andi ne, Nansha, tatu anyi, kuenji nunku, bualu bua eu udi muan a bute, utentekashe tshianza tshiebe tshia balume ha mutu handi
Hakadibo bamba mei â, yeye mene wakimana munkatshi muabo, wakabambila ne, Nuikale talala
Yehowa wakambila Mose ne, Ubale ban a bute balume bonso ba Bena Isalele ba mu ngondo umue to ne ha mutu, funda bungi bua mena abo
Mulume yonso udi utendelela anyi udi wambila bakuabo dî dia Nzambi ne mutu wandi mubuikila, udi uhuekesha butumbi bua mutu wandi

Halua dituku dia muanda mutekete, yeye neangate bana balume ba mikoko babidi badi kabayi ne tshilema ne muana mukashi wa mukoko wa tshidimu tshimue udi kayi ne tshilema ne bituha bisatu bia dikumi bia épha bia bukula bubotesha bu mulambu wa bukula busangisha ne manyi ne dikoho dia manyi
Bakuabo benu bakadi nunku; kadi nuakuvuibua, nuakajidibua, nuakabingishibua mu dina dia Mukelenge Yesu Kilisto, ne mu Nyuma wa Nzambi wetu

Yelemiya Shefataya, muana wa Matana, Gedaliya, muana wa Pashû, Yukala, muana wa Shelemeya, ne Pashû, muana wa Malakiya, bakunvua mei akambila Yelemiya bantu bonso ne, Yehowa udi wamba ne, Washala mu musoko eu nealue ku muele wa nvita, ku tshiole ne ku tshihuhu; hadi waluhukamu bua kuyeye kudi Bena Kasada neikale ne muoyo, ne muoyo wandi newikale kudiye bu tshintu tshiakanyengeye mu nvita, ne yeye neikale ne muoyo
Bena Izrayele mene kutuadija kudiabakena, bebejangana ne: Udi mua kutupesha munyinyi wa tuetu kudia nnganyi
Numone ne muntu kahingishidi mukuabo bubi ku bubi buandi; kadi misangu yonso nulondelangane malu adi mimpe muntu ne muntu, ne kudi bonso
Bakatshintshimika musoko to ne ku tshidimu tshia dikumi ne tshimue tshia bukokeshi bua Sedekiya
Nenku nudie munyinyi wa mulambu awu, ujike anu dituku dimue, kauladi to
Nenudie bintu binuakahuola kale, nenumushe bia kale bua kushila bihia bihia muaba
Nendekeshe dî mu misoko ya mu Yuda ne mu misesu ya Yelushalema, dî dia tuseku ne dia disanka, dia mubaki wa mukashi ne dia mukashi udiye Ubaka kabidi; bualu bua buloba nebulue tshihela tshia hatuhu

Bakamuambila ne, Mu Beteleheme wa mu Yudaya; bualu bua dî edi diakufundibua kudi muprofete ne, Wewe Beteleheme, buloba bua Yudaya, Hashishe Helode wakabikila Bena Meshi mu musokoko, wakabakonka diba mene mene diakamueneka mutoto
Moshe kuenza bionsu bivua Maweja Nangila mumuambile

Bantu bakole ba munkatshi mua bena bukitu nebamuele dî diabo mu Muaba wa Bafue, bamuambila ne badi bamukuatshisha ne, Bakuhueka munemu, badi balala hohamue ne badi kabayi batengudibue, munkatshi mua bakushihibua ku muele wa nvita
Nanku mutuangaji akobolole mfumu wa bena Izrayele anu mushindu ewu bua Mvidi Mukulu amufuile luse

Bua nakafila kunudi ku mpala kua malu onso bualu bunakangata kabidi ne, Kilisto wakafuila bua malu mabi etu, bu mudi Mukanda wa Nzambi wamba; wakajikibua, wakubishibua ku lufu hakahita matuku asatu, bu mudi Mukanda wa Nzambi wamba; wakamueneka kudi Kefa, ne ku nyima kudi bapostolo dikumi ne babidi; hashishe, wakamueneka kudi bantu batambe nkama itanu tshikondo tshimue; bakuabo babo ba bungi batshidi ne muoyo tô ne katataka, kadi bakuabo babo bakalala tulu mu lufu; hashishe, wakamueneka kudi Yakobo, hashishe, kudi bapostolo bonso; ne kunshikidilu kua bonso wakamueneka kundi, meme muana wa kabishi
Bualu bua mulambu wetu wa Kuhita kua Yehowa wakashihibua, Kilisto mene
Kuvudi mukashi wa muan ebe bilulu, yeye udi mukashi wa muana webe, kuvudi bilulu biandi
Bobo bakamuku dimuna ne, Tuetu, bantu bebe, tudi bana dikumi ne babidi ba muntu umue wa mu buloba bua Kanana, ne mona, muana wa mukala udi mushale ne tatu wetu katataka, ne mukuabo kenaku
Hakabuela diba, bakatua kudiye ne babedi bonso ne bakadi bakuatshike ne bademon
Bavua baye kutangila bena mudimu bavua bakosa miosa ya mikoku yende
Angatai mutshi wanyi wa tshikokedi ha nshingu yenu, nuyile malu kundi; bualu bua meme ndi ne kalolo ne kanemu mu mutshima wanyi; nunku nenusangane dikisha mu mitshima yenu
Mbua neyidie muntu yonso wa mu nsubu wa Bâsha udi ufuila mu musoko; ne nyunyu ya mulu neyizokole muntu yonso wa mu nsubu wandi udi ufuila mu tshisuku
Aba mbana ba balume ba Oholibama, mukashi Wa Esau mukelenge Yeusha ne mukelenge Yalama ne mukelenge Kola, aba mbakelenge bakaluhuka kudi Oholibama, muana wa Ana, mukashi wa Esau

Udi uhita bukole, nemuvuishe dikunshi mu ntempelo wa Nzambi wanyi, ne kena uluhukamu kabidi; ne neufunde dina dia Nzambi wanyi ham bidi handi, ne dina dia tshimenga tshia Nzambi wanyi, Yelushalema muhia muhia mene, tshidi tshihueka hanshi, tshifuma mu diulu kudi Nzambi wanyi, ne dina dianyi meme dihia dihia
Kuenzabu kabidi mabaya abidi a mutshi wa ndunga
Yonsu wa kudibu kuangata tshiamu tshiende tshia musenga wa kamonya, kuelamu makala a kapia, kabidi ne manananshi bua kulambula Maweja Nangila
Kadi Yesu wakabambila ne, Nukoleshe mitshima yenu; nmeme, kanutshinyi

Wakenza mabaya a mu nsubu makumi abidi a kuteka ku luseke lua ku sude, Wakenza masoso makumi anai a tshiamu tshia argent mu mabaya makumi abidi, masoso abidi mu dibaya dimue a kuteka mu tutshi tua tutuha, ne masoso abidi mu dibaya dikuabo a kutekamu tutshi tua tutuha
Wewe neushihe tshimpanga, newangate mashi atshi wamiamine ha tshioshelu tshionso

Bienzedi Mu matuku â, hakadi bayidi bakumbane ba bungi, Bena Yuda bakadi bakula muaku wa Bena Gelika bakajiana Bena Ebelu ne, Ha kuabanyangana kua bintu ku dituku ku dituku, badi bahua muoyo bua bakashi betu ba mu lufuila
Balume bavua bapanduke, kabidi ne bakaji, bonsu mbabakuate, mbabafile kudi Sihone, mukalenga wa bena Amore
Shaula wakabanga kuteka mesu andi kudi Davidi ku dituku adi
Kanushiyi tshintu tshikese tô ne ku dinda, kadi biashala bintu dinda nenubioshe mu kahia
Kuambaye kabidi ne: Muntu kaayi uvua mua kuambila Abrahame ne: Dimue dituku Sara neamushe bana mabele
Yuda umona Tamare, kuela meji ne: mmukaji mudisombele, bualu uvua musuike tshitambala mu mpala
Kadi biwokala kuyi wenza bimpe, bualu bubi budi bualamina ku mbelu kuebe, mutshima wa bubi newikale kudi, kadi wewe ubukokeshe
Bakuidi banene bakamukudimuna ne, Katuena ne mukelenge mukuabo, anu Kaisa

Yeye wakabambila ne, Unvuai, ndi nnusengelela, tshiota tshinakulota, bualu bua monai, biakadi basuika bisumbu bia blé mu budimi, ne monai, tshisumbu tshianyi tshiakabika, tshiakimana, ne bisumbu bienu biakela tshianza munkatshi, biakatshikukuila
Mweena mwabo mulume, mukaji Mfumu wa Ditunga Kapangu , Tshipangu Dikolesha dia lungenyi, kabukulu, bunkambwa
Udi unanga bantu benyi badi munkatshi muenu, ubapesha bilamba ne biakudia
Buloba nebuikale ne bidimu bia buhafe tô bu bungi bua bidimu binuakuhidia kushiya buloba bua kubandabu hanuakashikamamu
Kanunyingalashi Nyuma Muimpe wa Nzambi, nuakahebua tshimanyishilu kudiye munda muenu tshidiku tô ne halua dituku dia buhikudi
Peka, muana wa Lemalaya, wakashiha bantu binunu lukama ne makumi abidi mu Yuda dituku dimue, buonso buabo bakadi bena bukitu; bualu bua bobo bakahidia Yehowa, Nzambi wa bankambua babo
Bua bualu ebu Bena Yuda bakatamba kukeba mua kumushihabo, bua yeye wakashiha mukenshi wa Lumingu, ne bua wakubikila Nzambi ne, Ntatu wanyi, udivuisha muomumue ne Nzambi
Sarayi kuambila Abrame ne: Udi mumone ne Maweja Nangila kena mumpeshe bana
Yeye kuitaba ne: Ke meme ewu
Yehowa wakalongolola munyinyi munene wa mu mai bua kuminau Yona; ne Yona wakadi munda mua munyinyi wa mu mai minya isatu ne mafuku asatu
Kanuhendi muena mahaha, kanuteki tshintu tshia ku lenduisha n atshi muntu mufofo, kadi nuenu nutshine Nzambi wenu meme ndi Yehowa

Ne muinshi wa kahia ka dikenga diabo udi ubanda tshiendelele; ne kabena ne dikisha munya ne butuku, bobo badi bakukuna nyama wa luonji ne tshifuanyikishi tshiandi, ne yonso udi wangata tshimanymu tshia dina diandi
Bakabanga kusanka
Nenushale ne muoyi matuku mavule mu ditunga didiye munupe kashidi
Abrame kumukonka ne: Maweja Nangila Mvidi Mukulu wanyi, nemmanye ne: ditunga edi nedishale dianyi mushindu kaayi
Wakadi ne mitoto muanda mutekete mu tshianza tshiandi tshia balume, ne mukana muandi muakahatuka muele wa nvita mutue mutuisha nseke ibidi; ne mpala wandi wakadi bu diba hatemadi ne bukole buadi

Nenufile bintu ebi kudi Yehowa mu matuku anudi nudia bidia bia Yehowa, ku mutu kua milambu ya kuditshiha n ai ne bintu budi mitshima yenu misue kufila, ne milambu yenu ya kuosha ne milambu ya bukula ne milambu ya bintu bidibo banua ne milambu yenu ya kuvuisha n ai ditalala
Bana ba Elama tshinunu tshimue ne nkama ibidi ne makumi atanu ne banai
Bakalua mu buloba bua Ejipitu; bualu bua kabakatumikila dî dia Yehowa; bakafika ku Tapanehese
Bua bualu ebu Bena Yuda bakatatshisha Yesu, bua yeye wakenza malu â dituku dia Lumingu
Tshisamba tshia Ngade:
Kanungu ka Mapangadika a Kabadi ka dîyi dikulu kabeena mwa kuatontolola to ne badi ne tshia kuakumbaja diakamwe
Hakatshingulukeye, wakamuambila mu Buena Yuda ne, Laboni, kukudimuna kua muaku ne, Muyishi
Bimbi ba misambu, bana ba Asafa, lukama ne makumi abidi ne muanda mukulu
Enza biebe makunshi atanu a acacia adi ne or ku nseke yonso enza bitubuidi biau ne or, ne enza nkanu ya tshiamu tshia mitaku itanu ya kuelaku
Tuetu kukuata bimuna, ne bintu bionsu bituvua basangane mu bimenga abi
Nenuikale nupeta biakudia matuku asambombu malondangane
Amen

Dî dianyi ne kuamba kuanyi kabiakadi mu mei a meshi a kuitabushisha n au bantu, kadi biakadi mu dimuenesha dia Nyuma Muimpe ne dia bukole; bua ditabusha dienu kadikadi mu meshi a bantu, kadi dikale mu bukole bua Nzambi
Noa wakadi muntu muimpe, wakadi muakane tshishiki mu tshikondo tshiandi, Noa wakendakana ne Nzambi
Adi a njila umwe anyi a mantonya
Bana ba balume ba Uzi: Yizelaya
Yeye wakakonka Yakoba ne, Dina diebe nganyi

Afile bimuna bisatu, kabiyi ne tshilema pambidi, bua kubilambula Maweja Nangila: muana wa mukoku wa tshidimu tshimue bua mulambu wa kuosha, lukungulu lua mukoku lua tshidimu tshimue bua mulambu wa kudikobolola nawu, ne mukoku wa tshimpanga wa mulambu wa bobumue
Hashishe Zêba ne Salemuna bakamuambila ne, Bika biebe, unshihe, bualu bua bu mudi mulume mbu mudi bukole buandi kabidi
Bena Zebuluna bakadi bu bantu bakamba kufila mioyo yabo tô ne ku lufu, ne Bena Nafatale bakamba kufuila ha mutu ha mpata mile
Nsubu wenu udi mushale hatuhu
Kena mua kulengesha ne mitu ya bantu aba, anyi
Yakoba wakatuangana ne Lakele mishiku wakabandisha di diandi, wakadia

Mu dituku adi Mukelenge, Yehowa wa misumba, ne monai, disanka dia bungi didiku ne musangelu, Yehowa wa misumba wakadimuenesha mu dî dinakunvua mu matshu anyi ne, Mukelenge, Yehowa wa misumba, udi wamba ne, Ya biebe kudi mulami eu wa bintu, kudi Shebena mene, udi ha mutu ha nsubu wa mukelenge, umuebeshe ne, Udi wenza tshinyi kunoko, ne udi ne muntu kai kunoko, bua wewe wakudiumbuila majambu
Panudi nuenza tshibilu tshia matuku muanda mutekete, dituku dionsu nungoshile nyama, pamue ne mulambu wa ku dituku ku dituku, ne mulambu wa mvinyo
Bua bualu ebu makenga andi nealue dituku dimue, lufu ne madilu ne tshiole; nebamushidishe mu kahia, bua Mukelenge Nzambi udi umulumbuluisha udi mukole

Kadi bantu bakamuambila ne, Kuyi nansha; bualu bua bituanyema, kabena n etu bualu; biashihabo tshituha tshia buonso buetu, kabena n etu bualu nansha; wewe udi uhita binunu bietu dikumi mushinga mukole; bidi bitamba buimpe bua wewe kudilongolola bua kutukuatshisha ku musoko
Nunku, bana betu, tudi bena dibanza, kendia mubidi bua kulonda malu a mubidi
Mai akavulangana ha buloba matuku lukama ne makumi atanu
Bua muakuidi munene yonso udi musungudibue bua kufileye bintu bihebua ne milambu mishiha; nunku budi muakuidi munene eu n abu mbua kuikala ne bintu bia kufileye

Muanjelo mulami wa bukelenge bua Pelasa wakantantamena matuku makumi abidi ne dimue; kadi Mikaele umue wa banfumu ba banjelo, wakalua kunkuatshisha; nakamushiya mu, muaba au ne muanjelo mulami wa banfumu ba Pelasa
Ne diulu diakûmushibua ku mukanda muvunga hauvungabo; ne mukuna munene wonso, ne tshisanga tshionso biakumushibua ha miaba yabi
Wewe udi mumanye mikenshi ya Nzambi ne, Kushihi muntu, kuendi masandi, kuibi, kudingidi muntu, kunyengi tshintu tshia muntu, unemeke tatu ebe ne mamu ebe
Solomo wakatumina Hulama, mukelenge wa mu Tulo, dî ne, Bu muwakenzela Davidi tatu anyi, wakamutumina mitshi ya cèdre bua kuibakeye nsubu wandi, ungenzele meme nunku kabidi
Kabatangidi lue vene mu miaba yenu yonso tô matuku muanda mutekete; kanushiyi munyinyi unuakashiha wa milambu dilolo dia dituku dia ku mpala butuku buonso tô ne ku dinda
Bantu badi Maweja Nangila kayi mukanyine, mundi mua kubakanyina meme mmunyi
Davidi wakadivuisha dina dinene hakalukileye ku kushiha kua Bena Sulia mu Tshibanda tshia Luehu, bantu binunu dikumi ne muanda mukulu
Anyi wewe, mulume, udi mumanye munyi, ne kuena mua kusungila mukashi webe anyi
Tshimuangi Muaba wa tshijila Ungenzele muaba wa tshijila, mulongolola ne bilamba dikumi bia ndanda
Kadi Yesu kakamukudimuna dî
Katataka buonso buetu tudi munemu ku mesu kua Nzambi bua kunvua malu onso akukuambila Mukelenge
Yosefe Mubandishibue bu Muloho wa Bena Ejipitu Bualu ebu buakadi buimpe ku mesu kua Palô ne ku mesu kua bantu bandi bonso
Nzubu yenu idi itangalaka bu mayi, bu mpangu mimpe ku mielelu ya misulu
Badi bahidia nunku nebadiangatshile dilumbuluisha

Ku nyima wakabuela mu nsubu wa munda mua tshitendelelu, wakidikisha makunshi a ku mbelu; dikunshi ne dikunshi diakadi bunene bua coudées ibidi; mushiku wa mbelu wakadi ne butshiama bua coudées isambombo, ne bule bua tshimanu tshia ku luseke elu lua mushiku buakadi coudées muanda mutekete, bule bua tshimanu tshia ku luseke lukuabo buakadi coudées muanda mutekete
Wakangasa dikoba ne munyinyi, wakansuikakasha ne mifuba ne mifungu
Labane kubikidisha bantu bonsu ba muaba awu, kubalongoluela didia dia tshibilu tshia dibaka
Kadi Bena Samalea bakamuhidia, bualu bua mpala wandi wakadi mutangile ku Yelushalema
Bualu bua Yuda wakatamba bana babo bukole ne mukelenge wakafuma kudiye; kadi bintu bia buan a bute biakadi bia Yosefe
Yehowa Nzambi wakangata mulume, wakamuteka mu budimi bua Edene bua kubuihileye ne bua kubulama
Ndi nkulomba bua umpeshe bakaji banyi ne bana banyi, bua mpingane nabu kuetu, bualu udi mumanye mundi mumane kukuenzela mudimu bidimu bia bungi bua kubasela
Bantu bakela mbila ne, Ndi dia nzambi, kandia muntu
Nuenu mumane ku mbelu ne muntu uwakusombesha tshintu nealuhuke kûdi ne tshieya
Bantu bakakema ne, Eu udi muntu kai
Bantu bakalua ne milambu ya kumusakidila n ai; bantu bakasua kuenza nunku mu mitshima yabo bakalua ne milambu ya kuosha kabidi
Mosa wakalela Binea; Lafa wakadi muan andi ne Eleasa wakadi muan andi ne Asela wakadi muan andi

Nyuma wa Yehowa wakamutulukila, yeye wakalumbuluila Bena Isalele; yeye wakaya kuluangana nvita, ne Yehowa wakafila Kushana lishatayima, mukelenge wa mu Mesopotamia, mu tshianza tshiandi; tshianza tshiandi tshiakahita Kushana lishatayima bukole

Mefibosheta, muana wa Shaula, wakalua bua kusangakeneye ne mukelenge; yeye kakanza kulongolola makasa andi anyi kubeya muedi wandi anyi kuvuwa bilulu biandi ku dituku diakumuka mukelenge tô ne hakahinganeye talalâ
Usonge kabidi mitshi ya ndunga ibidi, uyilamike tshiamu tshia mpawungi ku nseke

Azaya muakuidi wakamulonda ne bakuidi ba Yehowa makumi muanda mukulu bakadi bena bukitu; bobo bakakandisha Uziya mukelenge, bakamuambila ne, Uziya, kambualu buebe bua kuoshela Yehowa musenga wa manananshi, kadi mbua bakuidi, bana ba Alona, badi bajidibue bua kuoshela Yehowa manananshi; umuka mu muaba eu wa tshijila, bualu bua wewe wakuenza bibi; bualu ebu kabuena bukuvuisha butumbi kudi Yehowa Nzambi nansha
Kadi utshidi anu uditambisha, ubenga mua kutekela bantu banyi
Meme ndi mushiku wa mbelu; wabuela kundi, neasungidibue, neabuele, neahatuke, neahete mashinde
Hashishe mulombi wakafua, banjelo bakaya n andi mu tshiadi tshia Abalahama; muntu mubanshi kabidi wakafua, bakamujika
Bana ba balume ba Salama: Beteleheme ne Bena Netofa, Atalota bete yoaba ne tshituha tshia Bena Manahata, Bena Sola mene

Wakumusha bakuidi bonso mu misoko yonso ya mu Yuda, wakanyanga bitendelelu biakadi bakuidi boshahu musenga wa manananshi ku Geba tô ne ku Bê sheba; wakashimbula bitendelelu biakadi ku tshibuelelu tshia ku tshibi tshia Yoshua, mukelenge wa musoko, biakadi ku tshianza tshia bakashi tshia ku tshibi tshia musoko
Kanuena bavuluke mitanda muanda mutekete ya bantu binunu binai ne bungi bua bisaka binuakuangula
Numanyishe bana benu mei â, nubambileu hanuashikama mu nsubu yenu ne hanuenda mu nshila ne hanuaya ne hanuabika

Nunku yeye wakalua ne bantu bonso ku mai; Yehowa wakambila Gideona ne, Yonso udi ulaka mai ne ludimi luandi bu mudi mbua ulaka, wewe neumuteke ha buandi; ne muinu yonso udi utua binu hanshi bua kunueye mai, umuteke ha buandi kabidi
Hatuakalua mu Makedonia mene, mibidi yetu kayakadi ne dikisha, kadi tuakadi tutatshishibua ku nseke yonso; nvita yakadi ham bidi, ne ditshina diakadi munda muetu
Mukelenge wa Yosefe wakamukuata, wakamubuesha mu nsubu wa lukanu muakadi bena buloko ba mukelenge basuikila, yeye wakadi mu nsubu wa lukanu nunku

Bana ba balume ba Davidi bakamulelelabo mu Hebelone: Amenona, muan a bute, muana wa Ahinoama, Muena Yizelele; muana muibidi Danyele, muana wa Abigayila, Muena Kâmele; muana muisatu Abashaloma, muana wa Mâka, muana wa bakashi wa Talemai, mukelenge wa mu Geshû; muana muinai Adoniya, muana wa Hagita; muana muitanu Shefatiya, muana wa Abitala; muana muisambombo Itelema, muana wa mukashi wandi Egela: hakamulelela bana basambombo mu Hebelone kuakakokesheye bidimu muanda mutekete ne ngondo isambombo
Amen; lua, Mukelenge Yesu
Hashishe, bena buatu bakakuatshika buowa, muntu ne muntu wakadila kudi nzambi wandi; bakahatula bintu biakadibo n abi mu buatu ne bakabiela mu mai manene bua kubuhehesha

Hautshidi uya ne udi n ebe lukuna kudi mukelenge, mu nshila mene umusengelele bikole akulekele; biwikala kui wenza nunku, yeye neakukoke kudi mulumbuludi, mulumbuludi neakufile mu bianza bia mpolushe, mpolushe nenkuele mu nsubu wa lukanu

Mukashi wakadi ne mutshima mulengele ne kalolo munkatshi muenu wakatshina mua kuihata makasa ha buloba bualu bua kalolo ne kanemu kakatamba, neikale ne disu dibi kudi mulume udiye munange, ne kudi muan andi mulume ne kudi muan andi mukashi, ne kudi muana muhia muhia wakaleleye ha binu biandi ne kudi bana bonso hadiye mulele; yeye neabadie mu musokoko bua kuhanga kua bia kudia mu ditshintshimika ne ditata bidi bena lukuna banutatshisha n abi ku misoko yenu
Mpindiewu tudi mu Kadeshe, tshimenga tshidi ku mikalu ya ditunga diebe

Yeye neamukose bituha ne mutu ne dianyi, ne muakuidi neabilonge ha nkunyi idi mu kahia kadi ha mutu ha tshioshelu, kadi neuvuwe bintu bia munda ne bioku ne mai, ne muakuidi neoshile bintu bionso ha tshioshelu bu mulambu wa kuosha ha kahia bu tshintu tshidi tshitua dihembu kudi Yehowa
Teka bidia bilesha ha mesa au matuku onso ku mpala kuanyi
Dina dia mamu wandi diakadi Shelomita, muana mukashi wa Dibili, wa mu tshisamba tshia Dana
Pilato wakambila bakuidi banene ne bisumbu bia bantu ne, Tshiena musangane muntu eu ne bualu
Wakenza kabidi mabaya makumi abidi a kuteka ku luseke lua ku nôde, ne masoso a tshiamu tshia argent makumi anai, masoso abidi mu dibaya dimue masoso abidi mu dibaya dikuabo
Bua tshiena munvue munda tshindi mua kudihisha n atshi, kadi tshiena mbingishibua bua bualu ebu; kadi udi undumbuluisha udi Mukelenge
Padi muena Izrayele ulambula Maweja Nangila mulambu wa bintu biosha muiku, wikale amu wa mikata misopakaja ne mafuta, nansha wa tuampa tukese tulaba mafuta, kabiyi biela buanga bua mampa to
Izake mumane kushala mu ditunga adi matuku a bungi, dituku dikuabu Abimeleke, mukalenga wa bena Peleshete, uvua mutangile pa dididishi

Chronicles Hashishe Solomo wakabanga kuibaka ntempelo wa Yehowa mu Yelushalema ha mutu ha mukuna wa Moliya kuakamuenekela Yehowa kudi Davidi tatu andi ha muaba wakasungula Davidi ku tshihehuidi tshia Ônana, Muena Yebuse
Nuenu ke badiye musungule munkatshi mua bisamba bikuabu bidi pa buloba, bua nuikale tshisamba tshiende menemene
Mpindiu bumushe masandi abo a kutendelela kuabo kua mpingu ku mpala kuanyi ne bitalu bia banfumu babo, bateke malu â kule, ne meme nenshikame munkatshi muabo tshiendelele
Kuikadi ne nzambi mikuabo ne meme hohamue
Bobo bakamuambila ne, Biwadivuisha muntu wa bantu aba lelu eu, biwabakuatshila mudimu, biwabakudimuna mei mimpe, bobo nebikale bantu bebe tshiendelele
Muana wa balume udi unemeka tatu andi, muhika udi unemeka nfumu wandi; kadi bingikala tatu, kunemekibua kuanyi kudi hanyi

Nakelangana meji mu mutshima wanyi bua kusankisha mubidi wanyi ne nvinyo, mutshima wanyi mutshikale undombola mu meji; nakateta malu a buhote bua kujingulula tshidi tshimpe bua ba ha buloba benze muinshi mua diulu matuku onso a muoyo waho
Yeye wakasemena ha buihi ne mukelenge, wakimana ku mpala kua mukelenge
Nanku, padi Arone wimane kumpala kua Maweja Nangila, mena awu ikale amueneka pa makaya ende, bua meme Maweja Nangila ngikale nnuvuluka amu kunuvuluka
Nuyilongeshe bana benu, nuyitele panudi basomba mu nzubu yenu, nansha bendakana mu misesu, panudi nulala, nansha nubika
Solomo kakidikisha majitu a biamu ebi bionso, bualu bua biakatamba bungi, nunku kabakamanya bujitu bua tshiamu tshia mitaku tshinonoka
Bonso badi balombodibua kudi Nyuma wa Nzambi, bobo badi bana ba Nzambi
Bualu ebu buakadi bulelela, buakamulesha bua nvita minene
Musengeledi alamate kudi disengelela diandi, muntu udi ufila bintu, abifile ne mutshima mulelela; udi ukokesha, akokeshe ne disuminyina; udi ulesha luse, aluleshe ne disanka
Hakimbabo musambu, bakaluhuka, bakaya mu mukuna wa Oleve
Yeye wakashihibua ku mutshi mutshiamakane bua butekete bua mubidi, kadi udi ne muoyo bua bukole bua Nzambi
Petelo wakamuebesha ne, Biwikala wewe, ungambile bua meme kulua kûdi ha mutu ha mai
Eva kusanka bikole wamba ne: Ndi mufuke muana wa balume ku bukole bua Maweja Nangila
Wadianjila kushiha Bena Yebuse yeye neikale mukelenge ne kapitene
Tshiena mumanye dituku dia lufu luanyi
Bualu bua wewe Mukelenge Yehowa udi mumanye muntu webe
Ele, muan a bute wa Yuda, wakadi muntu mubi ku mesu kua Yehowa; yeye wakamushiha
Muntu au aboleshibue ne dibungi dia mulu, adie mashinde a mu mpata bu nyama

Hakatangila basenshi nyoka mubi mulembelele ku tshianza tshiandi, bakambilangana ne, Bulelela, muntu eu udi mutahianganyi; wakuhanduka mu mai, kadi dilumbulula dilelela kadiena ditabusha bua yeye kuikala ne muoyo
Yesu wakumukaku, wakalua hehi ne dishiba dia Galela, wakabanda ku mukuna, wakashikama
Nakadi mu mudimu mukole ne mu ntatu, nakadi ne tshitabala misangu ya bungi; nakadi ne nsala ne nyota; nakajila bia kudia misangu ya bungi, mashika akantonda, nakadi ne butaka
Tshiyole tshikole tshia nzala atshi netshibutule ditunga
Nanku malu mabi a mushindu ewu kaakutungunuka munkatshi muenu to
Ku muvuadikaye ne tshilamba tshinefuke tshia ndanda

Kadi muanjelo wa Yehowa wakambila Eliya, Muena Tishebe, ne, Juka, uye kusangila ne ba messager ba mukelenge wa Samalea, uheheshe ne, Nudi nuyila kuebesha Bâla zebuba, nzambi wa Ekelona, bualu, bualu bua kakuena Nzambi mu Isalele, anyi

Muana wa balume yonsu mumane kukumbaja ngondu umue, nebamupikule ku nkanu itanu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole, bu mudi mushinga wa mu muaba wa tshijila, mudi lukanu lumue ne bujitu bua grame dikumi
Nudimuke
Dîyi dikulu didi ditabwijibwa didi dilongamangana ne ngenyi ya bikuma eyi

Mu diba adi Yehowa neafuke ditutu didi ne muishi wa kahia mu munya, ne dinkenke dia kahia kadi katema butuku, bua kubiteka ha mutu ha muaba wonso wa mu Mukuna wa Siona udi bantu bashikamemu, ne ha mutu ha bitendelelu bidibo badisangishilamu
Wakenza malu mabi ku mesu kua Yehowa bu muakenza bisamba biakalonda malu a bundu, biakadi Yehowa muihate ku mpala kua Bena Isalele
Kadi Amasaya kakasua kumunvuila; bualu ebu buakadi bua Nzambi bua yeye kubafila mu bianza bia bena lukuna babo, bualu bua bobo bakalonda nzambi ya Bena Edome
Hashishe bakabika, bakaya mu nshila butuku abu
Yeye wakambila mukelenge wandi mukashi ne, Bu mukelenge wanyi muikale ne muprofete udi mu Samalea, yeye wakadi kumuondaha disama diandi dia nsudi
Kadi wewe newoshe munyinyi wa muana mulume wa ngombe, ne tshiseba ne tunvi ne kahia ku butshika bua tshitudilu ebu mbualu bua kubuikidila bubi bua bantu
Nanku, nuenu bena Izrayele, bana benu, ngombe yenu, mpunde yenu, bimuna bienu bikuabu, nansha benyi badi ku mbelu yenu, kanuenji mudimu dituku adi
Dilolo ne dinda biakadi dituku dinai
Kabahanyi tshituha tshiabu, kabashintakashi tshituha tshiabu, kabitabushi bua tshituha tshia buloba tshijidila Yehowa tshibuele mu bianza bia bantu ba bende; bualu bua budi bajidila Yehowa
Yehowa wakambila Manashe ne bantu bandi dî diandi; kadi bobo bakamuhetula
Nzambi webe, kadi wakuhingana, wakudia, wakunua mu muaba wakakuambileye ne, Kudi bitua, kunu mai, nunku kabena bajika mubidi webe mu lukita lua bankambua bebe
Nakamukonka ne, Mukelenge, nengenze tshinyi

Mukalu wabo wakadi ku Helefe ku mutshi wa telebinta wa mu Sananima ne Adami nekeba ne Yabenele tô ne ku Lakuma; wakahatukila ku Yadene; mukalu wakayila ku Azanotatabô, ku wesete, wakayila ku Hukoka; wakafika ku Zebuluna ku sude ne wakatua ku Ashê ku wesete, ne ku Yuda ku Yadene kudi kuhatukila diba

Hashishe, badi bahita mu nshila bu luhehele, Yehowa Nzambi wanyi, wewe kuena wanyi Wa Tshijila Wewe udi ne mesu mahite buakane adi kâyi mua kutangila malu mabi, Wewe udi uvuisha bantu bu minyinyi ya mu mai manene, Yeye udi ukuata buonso buabo ne ndobo; Bua malu â yeye udi ushihela kahamba kandi milambu, Yeye neananukile kuhumuna kahamba kandi tshiendelele Habakkuk Nengimane ha tshibumba tshianyi tshia butentekedi, Hashishe, Yehowa wakangitaba ne, Funda tshikena kumona Bualu bua tshikena kumona etshi ntshia tshikondo Monai, mutshima wa udi udibandisha kawena muakane munda muandi; Bualu bua dikuatshika diandi dia maluvu didi dimuvuisha umena dikamakama, Bantu aba kabena bamubingila tshibingu, anyi
Gideona wakabika, wakashiha Zêba ne Salemuna; yeye kabidi wakangata bilenga biakadi mu nshingu ya tumelo tuabo
Mukelenge wakamuebesha ne, Yeye udi kudi kunyi

Kadi katataka wakamueneshibua bualu bua dimueneka dia Musungidi wetu Kilisto Yesu, wakajimisha lufu, wakamuenesha muoyo wa tshiendelele ne udi kawi mua kunyanguka mu munya, bualu bua lumu luimpe, luakantekabo musambi ne mupostolo ne muyishi bualu bualu
Bakambula tshibuikilu tshiatshi tshiakadi tshibulunge tshia tshiamu tshia ntende, ne mukashi wakadi ushikama munda mua tshihiminu tshia épha
Hashishe, halua bimanyinu ebi bionso kûdi, enza muonso mûdi mua kuenza, bualu bua Nzambi udi n ebe
Samuele wakalumbulula Bena Isalele matuku onso a muoyo wandi
Kamuena ditshina mu dinanga; kadi dinanga diakane tshishiki didi dihata ditshina, bualu bua ditshina didi ne dikengesha; ne yeye udi utshina kena muanze kuvuishibua muakane tshishiki mu dinanga

Bakaha meku a Bena Melali, bakashala ba Bena Lewi, Yokenama ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Kâta ne miaba ya ku matshika, munkatshi mua tshisamba tshia Zebuluna: Dimana ne miaba ya ku matshika, ne Nahalala ne miaba ya ku matshika: bimenga binai

Yehowa, wewe wakungenzesha, ne nakuitabushishibua; Misangu yonso hanakeba kuamba dî, ndi ndila bianyi, Bingamba kabidi ne, Tshiena ntela dina diandi, Bualu bua nakunvua kusonguela kua bantu ba bungi, Kadi Yehowa udi n anyi bu muena bukitu mukole ne mukuatshishi wa buowa, Wewe Yehowa wa misumba, udi uteta buakane bua bantu, Imbilai Yehowa misambu, Dituku diakandelabo Mulau wikale kudi muntu muntu eu ikale bu misoko yakabutulabo kudi Yehowa bualu bua kakanshiha hanakadi mu difu dia mamu wanyi, Bualu kai nakahatuka munda mua mamu wanyi Jeremiah Edi ndî dia Yehowa diakalua kudi Yelemiya mu tshikondo tshiakamutumina mukelenge Sedekiya Pashû, muana wa Malekiya, ne Sefanya, muana wa Maseya muakuidi, wamba ne, Ndi nkusengelela bua kutukonkelaku Yehowa bua bualu buetu; bualu bua Nebukadenesâ, mukelenge wa Babulona, udi uluangana n etu mata
Samuele wakamba ne, Muadi wa mikoko ne wa ngombe unakunvua ku matshu anyi udi bishi
Bakulu abu, nebalumbuluishe bantu matuku onsu bua kukuambuluisha
Kabena babajinga, kabena babasangisha, kabena babajika, kadi nebikale anu bu tunvi hanshi ha buloba
Udi umbikidila meme ne, Muimpe, tshinyi
Mose Udi Unyema Ejipitu Mu matuku au, hakakola Mose, yeye wakaya kudi bana babo, wakamona mudimu wabo mukole, wakamona Muena Ejipitu ukuma Muena Ebelu, muan abo
Ditumibwa dia muntu ewu didi dia matuku makumi asatu adibo mwa kwambulula musangu umwe epele
Yeye wakabambila ne, Nuhe Kaisa bintu bia Kaisa, nuhe Nzambi bintu bia Nzambi

Dituku adi didi dinene, Yehowa wa misumba udi wamba ne, Mu dituku adi nentshibule mutshi wa tshikokedi bua kûmusha mu nshingu yabo, nentshibule nkanu yabo; bantu ba bende kabena babenzesha mudimu bu bahika babo kabidi, kadi nebakuatshile Yehowa Nzambi wabo mudimu, ne Davidi mukelenge wabo unababishila

Nzambi wa Bukole Buonso akusankishe akukumbashe, akuvuishe bana ba bungi bua wewe ulue tshisumbu tshinene tshia bantu, akuhe wewe ne tunkanunuina tuebe disanka dia Abalahama, bua wewe kuhiana buloba buakalaya Nzambi Abalahama
